name: Cosy rooms close to the metro and the River
summary: Welcome to your little pied-à-terre, let you enjoy the beauty of Montreal for a night or even a week. You are looking for rooms VERY well located, clean, close to the subway ? You found! Bike path and rest guaranteed :) 2 rooms closed with 1 queen bed in each of them :)
space: You will have two large rooms available for you with huge closet ! The living room has a tv and games (video and board) available for you Kitchen and bathroom are brand new as the entire appartement :)
description: Welcome to your little pied-à-terre, let you enjoy the beauty of Montreal for a night or even a week. You are looking for rooms VERY well located, clean, close to the subway ? You found! Bike path and rest guaranteed :) 2 rooms closed with 1 queen bed in each of them :)
neighborhood_overview: The place is so close to the water and 15 km bike path . This is a calm neighborhood with a 15 min metro ride to get downtown . Really convenient with nice restaurants and terrasses
notes: If you have any questions , please , ask and we ll be happy to help
transit: We recommend to park the car in the street and do everything by metro (8min walk- 15 min metro to get downtown)- best way to visit the city
access: Guests have access to all spaces except our room which let you more than 950 sq feet :) Living room , rooms , laundry room, balcony, kitchen , bathroom
interaction: We are always available to talk and give more information if needed . Knowing usually how long you stay , we give ideas of best places to eat/ visit We provide à metro map you can keep and write on, in addition with soap, shampoo , conditioner and towels ! We love talking to guest but stay aside when wanted

host.host_about:
Hi everyone, 

We are a couple of French people, living in Montreal for now more than two years. I am an assistant manager in a clothing store and Denis is an IT/electronic engineer.

We are clean, very lively, open minded and we like to meet new people from all over the world to share our experiences :)

Hope to see you soon !

reviews.comments: It was a very nice and warm stay. Alexia gave me detailed instruction in advance of my arrival. Denis welcomed me with a lot of information on the region. The location is very convenient pretty close to the River with a quite park and beautiful view. Room is cozy, clean with a lovely bookcase and quite a few French books to choose from. Overall a great stay. Alexia was so nice to arrange a pick up as I left the phone charger in the room. Really lovely hosts highly recommend!!

Alexia and Denis were very helpful from the beginning. Their house is located close to Verdun Metro and Wellington street so, eateries and shops are very close. The waterfront is about 4 blocks away and you can have a relaxing walk every evening. I wish I could have socialized more with Alexia and Denis. The stay was wonderful and I would recommend their place to my friends.

Alexia & Denis are awesome !  They made our Montreal trip very enjoyable. Denis gave all the travel information we need when we arrived. This location is very close to the subway station and BIXI, so we did not have to drive the car and had no trouble to get around the city. Highly recommended ~
Great hosts who were very accommodating and kept in touch. Nice apartment with on street parking and great local shops.
Very nice hosts. Denis gave us plenty of recommendations not only for our stay at their place but for our trip. The two rooms are spacious and beds quite comfortable. thanks for hosting us!

Dennis met us outside  when we arrived. He and his wife were very helpful in telling us the best places to eat, check out and visit, and also in helping us find our way around. They even got us a metro map to help us maneuver the city.  They provided toiletries and also allowed us to do a load of laundry even though that wasn't in the description.  The apartment was very clean  and comfortable. The apartment is about a half mile from the nearest subway station but the walk is very beautiful and filled with delicious restaurants and cafés. A must stay.
Very nice host! Thank you! We had a great time in your place.

Denis was very kind and helpful with everything! He made us feel right at home, and helped make us an itinerary for our stay in Montreal. The neighborhood was nice and quiet, and the house was about 10 blocks away from the metro station.
Alexia et Denis nous ont très bien accueilli. La chambre correspond bien aux photos et le quartier est sympa. Denis nous a bien conseillé pour la suite de notre séjour. Une adresse que je recommande.

Alexia et Denis sont très accueillant, nous avons passé une très bonne soirée! Merci à vous!
Je recommande!
The host canceled this reservation 60 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
A spotless apartment, and you barely know the hosts are there. There is only one bathroom, which we all shared. But there was never any issue.

It was my 3rd time staying at Alexia&Denis' place and they're not only hosts but truly good friends that you want to make. They're friendly and you'll never get bored when u have a conversation with them. They provide lots of suggestions and advice if you don't know where to go. The bedroom is nice and clean and backyard is awesome. We had a great supper time with A&D in their backyard and we made BBQ! The apartment is located near the water and park is beautiful. The area is quiet and neighborhood is pretty nice. It's 10 mins away from Metro(subway) by feet and we didn't have any hard time traveling around downtown by taking the train. I can't wait to see them again next time!

L'appartement est dans un quartier verdoyant et tres reposant. Les 2 chambres sont grandes et les lits confortables.  Alexia nous a accueilli et nous a fait sentir tres a l'aise chez elle. Elle a été tres accomodante pour l'heure d'arrivée et de départ et nous a même aidé à trouver un endroit pour imprimer nos billets. Je recommande!

Alexia and Denis were very accommodating and easygoing hosts - I really could not have asked for better representatives of Montreal! We had gone into the city not really knowing what to do, and Denis sat with us for a good 15 minutes describing in detail some of his favorite places and the best times to go. Both Alexia and Denis were fluent in English and French, and we would engage in lively discussions on anything from politics to vegetarian recipes to Mario Kart (be warned: Alexia is prepared to defend her championship title on the last one!) On the flip side, they are also perfectly fine giving you space whenever you wish to rest or simply avoid social interaction.
As for the listing itself, parking was readily available on the street and the location was an easy 10 minute walk to the nearest subway station. Bathroom and bedrooms were clean, and the wifi connection was good. The apartment is in a quiet residential neighborhood with no traffic noise, and there are no pets in case any guests might have allergies. I will definitely be recommending this listing to any friends or family visiting Montreal!
Loved the stay ! Will definitely recommend this place. The hosts are extremely friendly. They guided us to local favorites. Will visit them again !
Great value; Denis was a very helpful host! Exactly what you need for a short getaway.

Nice location. Good cafe nearby  called st.lo. bagels. Keep in mind check-in for first say around 6pm. Stay the next day then out by 9am the next  day.  That's two days accommodation which I thought was a bit inconvenient. Beds are fairly hard futon style. My travel buddy got very little sleep in other room. Host helpful with places of interest. Has recently installed new shower. Woken up by noisy traffic both days as close to busy road. Honest review . Nice hosts but probably look for something more comfortable next time. If you're looking for something on a budget this would be a good option.
Nice and quiet place!  Alexia and Denis are very friendly. We stay for one night.
Great place to stay

Séjour très agréable chez Alexia et Denis. Les chambres sont spacieuses et propres, tout comme l'appartement qui est également bien équipé.
Nos hôtes étaient disponibles pour nous donner des conseils même si nous ne les avons pas beaucoup vus car ils travaillaient beaucoup. Du coup, nous avions l'appartement pour nous la plupart du temps.

L'appartement se situe à 10-15 min de la station de métro Verdun mais il y a un arrêt de bus pratiquement au pied de l'immeuble pour s'y rendre.

Le quartier est calme et on y trouve tout ce qu'il faut pour se restaurer ou faire des courses.

Merci encore pour votre accueil à tous les 2! Au plaisir !
Denis and Alexia were very hospitable while I, my wife, and two kids stayed with them. Nice location, close to metro station. Recommended!

Alexia and Denis were great hosts. It was seamless experience finding the place, parking out front and getting settled in. They were very friendly and happy to help suggest things to do while we were on vacation. Would stay here again next time!
Very nice and friendly couple! Their place is very welcoming.
Alexia and Denis were gracious hosts and we'd definitely stay with them again!

Alexia and Denis were wonderful hosts and extremely helpful with the metro, things to do, and general information. There home was very clean, neat, and a great choice for our stay. Would book with them in the future, highly recommend!

Nous avons eu un super accueil et de bons conseils et suggestions pour notre séjour. Alexia & Denis ont été très sympas et pas du tout compliqués. On s'est sentis très à l'aise! Quartier tranquille et très bien situé. Merci!

Alexia and Denis were great hosts. Good communication before arrival. They are extremely helpful with a lot of information. The house was very clean and neat. Highly recommended and definitely to stay there again.

Alexia et Denis nous ont beaucoup attendus, nous venions de loin en voiture et avions pris du retard. Ils se sont montrés d'une gentillesse rare et très accommodants. Un seul petit détail, le lit dans lequel nous avons dormi était un peu dur pour nous, je conseillerais à des adultes de dormir dans la chambre au paysage grec où, d'après notre fils, le lit était confortable. Les enfants s'accommoderaient plus facilement d'un lit plus dur. Sinon, l'appart est très agréable et bien situé très près du fleuve et de jolis parcs. Nous recommandons chaudement ces hôtes.

Unser Aufenthalt bei Alexia und Denis war sehr gut und wir haben uns wohlgefühlt. Beide sind sehr nett, aufgeschlossen und hilfsbereit. Die Wohnung liegt ca 10 Minuten zu Fuß von der Metro entfernt, die einen in 10-15 Minuten zum Zentrum bringt. Es ist sehr ruhig, man kann problemlos auf der Straße vor dem Haus parken. Immer gerne wieder!

It was my 4th time being accommodated by Alexia and Denis(*2nd time visiting with my boyfriend). Amazing couple who you really want to get to know about and have a deep conversation with. They provided useful information about what’s going on in the city. Check in and check out are flexible. Their apartment is close to the Metro station and neighborhood is quiet. We had a fun, relaxing and enjoyable during the long weekend. Looking forward to my visit again next time! Congratulations on your wedding~ Bon voyage ❤️

Super séjour chez Denis et Alexia ! Très accueillants et souriants, ils savent vous mettre à l'aise et sont disponibles dès que nous avons besoin d'aide ou de conseils. Nous nous sommes sentis un peu comme chez nous. L'appartement et les chambres sont spacieux et très propres, il y a tout ce qu'il faut pour passer un bon séjour. Le métro vert est à 10 min à pieds (trajet d'environ 10 min jusqu'à l'hypercentre de Montréal), et des stations de Bixi à proximité de l'appartement. Le quartier de Verdun est très mignon, et ne manquez pas la rue Wellington et la baignade dans le fleuve du Saint-Laurent à proximité ;).

Denis was very nice. We found the place easily under Denis's instructions. During the stay, I enjoyed several free talks with Denis. It is surprising to find he is an engineer and has the same background as us.

Great hosts, fantastic communication. Only thing missing was AC or a fan so the room got very hot with no air flow when it was over 90 during the day. No fault of the host, but perhaps a fan would be good. Very friendly and kind hosts who helped when we had a flat tire and offered to help find a shop to fix it. Would recommend if you need a close place to everything and kind people to chat with!

My first time using air b&b and also first time in Montreal; Alexia and Denis made it a great experience. They have a very clean apartment and are close to the Metro. The recommendations and map were appreciated! Thanks very much :)
Great hosts!

Nice quiet neighbourhood, parking available on street (better practice your parallel parking skills!), nice big rooms, clean and incredibly accommodating hosts. Me and two teammates stayed over a weekend and barely saw the hosts until the last day we were packing, but they were always a quick message away. Loved staying here.

Our stay with Alexia and Denis was better than expected. We interacted with Denis for the most and he was super friendly and always ready to give any advice on what to visit and where to go (the breakfast advice was awesome). Also, our group of four was super impressed with how clean the house was. five star
It was a good stay. We liked how quiet the neighbourhood was, and good location to everything.

name: 3bd/2ba Valley House Near Kaimuki, Upstairs
summary: Brand New construction, in valley neighborhood off of Kaimuki 10th Ave.  Surrounded by lush greens and mountains, 3 bed/2 bath house built in 2015.  You have the entire upstairs of a house, with a private entrance and assigned parking.  Private washer/dryer in unit.  Only 10 min drive to Waikiki.  If you have a big family I also have the downstairs unit (2 bed/1 bath, accomodate up to 8 people) available for rent.
space: 3 bedrooms/2 bathrooms, with a large and brand new kitchen (dishwasher, large fridge, stove/oven, microwave, pots/pans, coffee maker, blender, toaster, rice cooker, plates/utensils, glasswares, everything you would expect in a house).  Two rooms have work desk, and another work desk in the living room, providing a good place to put your laptops.  We have cable and fast wifi there.  The unit comes with assigned parking (fits 1 -2 cars). This brand new house is a country oasis away from the city with easy access to Waikiki and Honolulu downtown (10 min drive to Waikiki, 15 min drive to downtown).  The house is off of 10th Ave in Palolo neighborhood.  10th Ave in Kaimuki is a main street with great local restaurants, shops, bars and parks. Portable crib (pack n play type) available upon request (please request in advance).
description: Brand New construction, in valley neighborhood off of Kaimuki 10th Ave.  Surrounded by lush greens and mountains, 3 bed/2 bath house built in 2015.  You have the entire upstairs of a house, with a private entrance and assigned parking.  Private washer/dryer in unit.  Only 10 min drive to Waikiki.  If you have a big family I also have the downstairs unit (2 bed/1 bath, accomodate up to 8 people) available for rent. 3 bedrooms/2 bathrooms, with a large and brand new kitchen (dishwasher, large fridge, stove/oven, microwave, pots/pans, coffee maker, blender, toaster, rice cooker, plates/utensils, glasswares, everything you would expect in a house).  Two rooms have work desk, and another work desk in the living room, providing a good place to put your laptops.  We have cable and fast wifi there.  The unit comes with assigned parking (fits 1 -2 cars). This brand new house is a country oasis away from the city with easy access to Waikiki and Honolulu downtown (10 min drive to Waikiki, 15 min
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is where the locals live, surrounded by lush greens with a mountain view.  Commuting into the city is very easy.  10 min drive to Waikiki, 15 min drive to downtown.  Close to H1 highway entrance.
notes: There are stairs to get to this unit, 37 steps to be exact.  If you have a large family or family reunion, I have both upstairs unit (3bed/2bath) and downstairs unit (2bed/1bath) of this house available for rent.    Because of how the house has two units, you may hear the noise, footsteps or feel the presence of the people in the other unit. If you need complete silence and privacy, this house may not be for you. A colony of wild chickens live in the neighborhood, and they can make noise in the morning.  Please do not park across the street where "No Parking" signs are, or you may get parking tickets. Do not use or block the driveway going up on the left side of the house as this belongs to a different property owner. This property is in a tropical environment, any food you leave out will attract ants. We provide ant sprays and traps upon request. If this bothers you, this unit may not be right for you.
transit: There are bus lines that runs on 10th ave in Palolo/Kaimuki, but having a car is recommended for this location.
access: You have your own assigned parking to park your car with private entrance to your unit.  You have your own washer/dryer in this unit. There is another unit downstairs (2bed/1bath) which is similar to this unit, also available for rent.
interaction: The owners live about 5 min away in the neighborhood so we are available to answer your questions or help in any way.  Texting is the best way to reach us, but please feel free to call.

reviews.comments: This beautiful home was beyond our expectations and perfect for our family stay. The neighborhood was quiet and close to Honolulu and Waikiki. Thereʻs a nice breeze that flows through the whole house, but if itʻs really hot, thereʻs 2 air conditioning units in the living room and master bedroom. Thereʻs also everything you might need for your stay- even a blender and cooler for a day at the beach.

Erika was a great host! She responded to emails and texts very quickly and answered any questions I had. I let her know that we would have our 18-month son with us so she provided some toys, books, a pack n play and a small plastic tub for him. She welcomed the adults with mac nuts, coffee and wine! The house is exactly as described and photoed. The only thing missing was a washer dryer but there's a laundromat right down the street. We'll definitely be renting from Erika again the next time we travel. Mahalo!

This is a new house, well equipped in a fantastic location. We really enjoyed the great views, the constant refreshing breeze up here--- so different from downtown and Waikiki. There are many lovely walks--- up to a massive Korean temple and a wild trail to a volcanic crater. Down at the bottom of the hill is one of Hawaii's best bakeries, and a number of very good restaurants.
Quiet and convenient house for those looking for a 3 bedroom accommodation. All comforts available.
Immaculate Space. Perfect Location. Prompt Response to question. AAA+
Enjoyed our stay had everything we needed to help us get the most from our holiday

A gorgeous house with everything you could need! Very clean! Fully stocked kitchen including many small appliances such as blender and toaster. Lots of dishes and utensils. Even a dishwasher and washer and dryer and beach towels! We were thoroughly impressed with both the house and Erika. Her communication was always very prompt and she took care of everything we asked. We could not be more pleased.  Location worked well for us. An easy drive to Waikiki and only 20 minutes to Hickham AFB in non-traffic times. Highly recommend!

The house was absolutely amazing. It was remarkably clean and extremely spacious. It's in a great location, very accessible to everything that the island has to offer.  I really enjoyed having a private garage to park our rental car. It allowed us to leave items in the vehicle without having to worry about their safety.  I was absolutely amazed with how gigantic the house was. We were provided with everything a family could need for a long extended stay. We will definitely stay here again!

We really enjoyed our stay. The unit was nice, comfortable and clean.  The kitchen was well-equipped.  It even had a blender.  Check-in and check-out went very smoothly.  Our host, Erika was very accommodating and promptly replied to any questions we had.

Our stay was wonderful! Erica was great with communication, check in & out was truly effortless. The house was spacious, very clean & well equipped with everything you need for a long or short stay. The washer/dryer was awesome to have! Erica provided plenty of laundry soap & dryer sheets! All rooms have an AC unit if needed. Easy access to Waikiki & highways. Great mountain views. Great option for a large group! Thank u Erica!

This is my second time at erikas! But this time a different unit from where I stayed previously. Everything is as listed and communication was even better. Quick to respond and very welcoming with really easy check in and check out process. Thanks again Erika!
Nice place. Very clean and spacious. Located within a short distance to Waikiki
Erika was an amazing host. Easily accessible and very accommodating. Would definitely recommend.
You must stay here, it is comfortable and stylish and has everything you could need to enjoy a great stay.

Erica is a wonderful host and her place is great for large groups or families. I had two little kids with me and she accommodated all our requests. She even bought us breakfast items and would not let me pay for it.  I highly recommend staying at her place! A++++++

A lovely place! We loved the location - within 15 - 20 minutes of most places we wanted to go! The apartment was very clean and in great shape. We appreciated the guide books (especially “Oahu Revealed”) and the current information provided. Erika responded quickly to emails and clearly communicated all the information needed about WiFi, parking, etc.
Our party of 6 was very comfortable in the space. I liked that there were empty hangers available in the closets and power charging strips available. 
We appreciated the air conditioners, but as others have mentioned the main living space has nice windows and we rarely turned it on. My husband and I did use the “fan only” feature on low during the night, which worked well to cover the sound of some very early roosters.
We walked to the Mu-Ryang-Sa temple a few times, which is a little less than a mile and worth a visit. You can also drive up to it.
This was a great place to stay and I definitely recommend it!
it was a great experience. Erika helped us a lot. the house is not too far to the beach. And it provided nearly everything we need. I just love it.
Very clean and cute. The host was quick to respond and answered questions. Left good “need to know” details for your stay at the house
I recommend this place..
This house is in a really good location for exploring the island. Very clean and small touches that help you feel comfortable. Would love to come back

Amazing spot, even better than it looks.  It's a bit far from most things, around a $20 uber so really not bad at all, also don't trust the weather, the clouds hit the mountains so it seems like it's always drizzling but it'll be completely perfect in Waikiki.
Staying here brought me back to my childhood when life in Oahu was a lot simpler and waking up to the sounds of nature brought back so many wonderful memories.
This is the second summer we have spent at Erika’s house in Palolo valley, and we love it. Super clean, great location, and thoughtful upgrades. AC in all the rooms, and now has a washer and dryer.
Great place to stay and good location.

This place is Wonderful for a large group or Family. Very well furnished and attention to detail is great. Bath supplies, kitchen eating and cookware are all covered. Erika is a nice host, quick to respond and friendly. Even little details like a step in the bathroom so little ones can use the sink are there. Very thoughtful! Mahalo nui loa!
Great place. There was everything there that we needed. The air conditioners were a bit noisy, but it's better than not using it. Good location and parking was great.

Staying at Erika's place was awesome.  She provided so many extra amenities and her home is pristine.  It is centrally located to all the sites and restaurants. I haven't had my family all in one place, at one time and all very comfortable.  
All the comforts of home away from home.  
Erika is super organized, gave great instructions and answered any questions very promptly.
We highly recommend staying at Erika's place.

The house was close to everything, super clean, and had everything we needed to make for a great vacation. (boogie board, coolers, beach umbrella, as well as everything we needed for laundry) We would love to stay here again the next time we visit Oahu!

Erika made my first Airbnb stay an easy breezy experience. She responded super quickly to all my inquiries and requests, such as a pack n play and baby tub for my daughter, and was very understanding when we had a miscommunication involving one of our guests (which was totally my fault). 

My husband initially wanted to stay with another host, but ultimately let me pick, which was the right choice. Erika’s house has a dishwasher, in-unit washer/dryer, and TWO free parking spots, amenities which the other house did not have. She provided everything needed for a comfortable 10-night stay. Literally the only thing we had to buy was toothpaste and baby wash!

We come back to Hawaii almost yearly, but doubt we’ll need such a big house soon. Would love to be Erika’s guest again. Maybe next time we’ll check out the smaller downstairs unit. Mahalo, Erika!
Great location,  perfect amenities

name: Olimpíadas no Rio !
summary: Casa com escritório, 3qt, 3 banheiros piscina e churrasqueira. A 5 km do parque olímpico de Deodoro, próximo ao Estádio olímpico e perto do BRT.
description: Casa com escritório, 3qt, 3 banheiros piscina e churrasqueira. A 5 km do parque olímpico de Deodoro, próximo ao Estádio olímpico e perto do BRT.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

name: F1 weekend appartement à louer
summary: Mon logement est proche de l'aéroport, les transports en commun (bus stop), épiceries. Vous apprécierez mon logement pour l'emplacement. Mon logement est parfait pour les couples, les voyageurs en solo et les voyageurs d'affaires.
description: Mon logement est proche de l'aéroport, les transports en commun (bus stop), épiceries. Vous apprécierez mon logement pour l'emplacement. Mon logement est parfait pour les couples, les voyageurs en solo et les voyageurs d'affaires.
house_rules: - Le prix total du forfait  est de 1200$ CAN - inclut: Logement + 6 billets  entrée aux 3 jours d'activités de F1 au circuit Gilles Villeneuve (essaies libres, classifications et course) - 2 billets chaque jour en places assises (tribune 31) pendant 3 jours : totalisant 6 billets d’une valeur de 550$. - Idéalement, arrivée au logement mercredi soir  jusqu'au lundi avant-midi. (non limitatif) - Personne sérieuse et RESPONSABLE.

name: Room for June Mile End/Little Italy
summary: Renting my room located in Mile End/Little Italy at the corner of Beaubien and Saint Laurent for the month of June. Area has many restaurants and bars. Asking price is $460 + utilities, please send me a message if you're interested for more details!
space: The apartment has it's own washer and dryer and the room itself is large, opening up into the living room. The queen size bed is big for 1 person and can accommodate 2 people (the apartment is a large space able to accommodate 5-6 people at once).
description: Renting my room located in Mile End/Little Italy at the corner of Beaubien and Saint Laurent for the month of June. Area has many restaurants and bars. Asking price is $460 + utilities, please send me a message if you're interested for more details! The apartment has it's own washer and dryer and the room itself is large, opening up into the living room. The queen size bed is big for 1 person and can accommodate 2 people (the apartment is a large space able to accommodate 5-6 people at once). Located on the brink of both the Mile End and Little Italy areas, home to numerous live music venues, bars, parks and great restaurants. Two depanneurs are located right downstairs, with one being a small grocery store (packaged meat, fresh produce, toiletries, beer, among other things) and more grocery stores down Beaubien street. The Plateau area of Montreal is within a 20 minute walk, and downtown is easily accessed via either a 45 minute walk or public transportation (metro Beaubien is a 10 mi
access: Located on the brink of both the Mile End and Little Italy areas, home to numerous live music venues, bars, parks and great restaurants. Two depanneurs are located right downstairs, with one being a small grocery store (packaged meat, fresh produce, toiletries, beer, among other things) and more grocery stores down Beaubien street. The Plateau area of Montreal is within a 20 minute walk, and downtown is easily accessed via either a 45 minute walk or public transportation (metro Beaubien is a 10 minute walk, bus number 55 is located around the corner, and bus number 80 is a 7 minute walk). Options for Bixi (local bike rental) are located nearby as well.
house_rules: The house is shared with two other people both in their early 20s. They are both currently in school and working, but are easy going people and easy to get along with. The apartment is relatively quiet, but the room is separate from the other two rooms.

name: Sunny, private room on St. Denis
summary: 1 sunny, large, bright room available in 4 bedroom, 3rd floor walk up apartment on the corner of St. Denis & Sherbrooke. Close to vibrant night life but quiet apartment, downtown easily accessible. Bed, desk, window, dresser in a private room.
description: 1 sunny, large, bright room available in 4 bedroom, 3rd floor walk up apartment on the corner of St. Denis & Sherbrooke. Close to vibrant night life but quiet apartment, downtown easily accessible. Bed, desk, window, dresser in a private room. Private bedroom. Access to shared living room, bathroom, and kitchen.  All amenities (from dishes to towels included). Happy to offer recommendations or complete privacy to guests. On the corner of two of Montreal's busier streets, close to downtown as well as the Plateau neighborhood.  Close to vibrant nightlife. Close to bus terminal, metro station (Sherbrooke, orange line), access to street parking (free or metered), easy access to bus to go to airport There will be 2 other individuals living in the apartment.  All kind and respectful, generally not around during weekdays.
neighborhood_overview: On the corner of two of Montreal's busier streets, close to downtown as well as the Plateau neighborhood.  Close to vibrant nightlife.
notes: There will be 2 other individuals living in the apartment.  All kind and respectful, generally not around during weekdays.
transit: Close to bus terminal, metro station (Sherbrooke, orange line), access to street parking (free or metered), easy access to bus to go to airport
access: Private bedroom. Access to shared living room, bathroom, and kitchen.  All amenities (from dishes to towels included).
interaction: Happy to offer recommendations or complete privacy to guests.
house_rules: No smoking and no pets.

reviews.comments: si la descripción del anuncio es correcta, la casa muy bien localizada , muy limpia y muy cómoda.
It was an awesome stay!! Room is tide and clean, love the neighborhood, perfect location and the price is very reasonable. Highly recommend
Great place located in central Montreal! It is within walking distance to all the sights and sounds of Montreal and extremely convenient for travelers.

I had a very nice and relaxing time staying at Stephanie's place. The room was bright and tidy and the apartment was as well. I was made to feel very welcome and the all the house info is printed out for easy access. Fantastic neighbourhood as well.

Bon accueil de Stéphanie, très arrangeante pour l'entrée dans le logement. Jolie chambre bien localisée,  belles serviettes fournies. Attention au lit (assez mou, à ressorts), et aux toilettes (communes à la salle de bain dans une coloc de 5 avec nous il faut bien viser pour y accéder) ; mais le prix étant très bas on ne veut pas se plaindre ! :)
Très bon quartier, et très bon accueil !!

The was exactly how I imagined it. Stephanie was really accommodating and respectful of my quietness. Can't beat the price and location combo everything is within 2min in every direction. Also a good coffee shop right underneath the apartment is so convenient. Only wish I had access to the balcony but that's just me. Overall perfect!

name: Aloha Adventure, Family Friendly Tropical Vacation
summary: Aloha Adventure, Family Friendly Tropical Vacation (see email below) Aloha, Our second home, tastefully decorated two bedroom one bath apartment, sleep up to 6 people.
space: Aloha, As you enter the apartment through a short hallway you enter a brand new fully equipped kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops and everything you need to prepare your own meals while enjoying a nice breeze across the apartment. Automated central air conditioning is there to maintain the temperature to your liking  to ensure pleasant stay.  The floors are done in porcelain tiles throughout the apartment complementing the freshly painted walls and new furniture.  Bathroom has been completely updated with brand new plumbing, tub, toilet and vanity with granite.  Master bedroom features a queen size bed as well as a computer desk with complimentary laptop computer and wireless printer for your use.  The second bedroom features one double and one single bed.  Living room features a brand new double size sleeper sofa for additional guests. In the living room, while sitting on the comfortable sofa, you can enjoy the 50" flat screen smart TV with free acce
description: Aloha Adventure, Family Friendly Tropical Vacation (see email below) Aloha, Our second home, tastefully decorated two bedroom one bath apartment, sleep up to 6 people. Aloha, As you enter the apartment through a short hallway you enter a brand new fully equipped kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops and everything you need to prepare your own meals while enjoying a nice breeze across the apartment. Automated central air conditioning is there to maintain the temperature to your liking  to ensure pleasant stay.  The floors are done in porcelain tiles throughout the apartment complementing the freshly painted walls and new furniture.  Bathroom has been completely updated with brand new plumbing, tub, toilet and vanity with granite.  Master bedroom features a queen size bed as well as a computer desk with complimentary laptop computer and wireless printer for your use.  The second bedroom features one double and one single bed.  Living room features a brand
neighborhood_overview: Close to anything in Waikiki. Only 8 minutes on foot to Hilton Hawaiian Resort beach, Ala Moana Shopping Mall or only few minutes to Hawaii Convention Centre. Number of reastaurants, stores, car rentals etc in close proximity to our building.
notes: The price includes 14% Hawaiian tax. There is no other booking fees or any other surprising fees. You self check-in with the codes that will be provided upon reservation so you can check-in at any time after 4PM on your check in date even if your plane is arriving late. We do provide linens and towels in the apartment. We also provide beach towels so you can save some space when packing your luggage.
transit: All this within 3 minutes walk, some much closer: Food pantry and ABC stores in the neighboourhood, Subway, 7-11 store, 2 neigbourhood pubs, Japanese Restaurant, Tony Romas restaurant. Several Scooter rental places within 3-5 muntes, Dollar rent-a-car  within 5 minutes on foot. Explore what else you may like, type (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Ala Wai Blvd Honolulu in the (Hidden by Airbnb) maps.
access: Easy access via Highway H1 or a bus. Codes will be provided to access the lock box and get the fobs to enter the building. It is a self check in so does not matter what time at night you may arrive you are always able to get in. As a guest you have access to the laundry facility at each floor, you have access to the pool as well as to the barbeque area besides the pool.
interaction: We are available via ph (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , or email (Email hidden by Airbnb) In case we can't be reached our property manager Ana is available to assist should something need attention. Detailed info will be provided once you are confirmed. Please contact us via email.
house_rules: 1. Guests must provide their telephone number. 2. Guests must provide their personal email address (for easy communication) 3. No smoking 4. No pets. 5. Check-in 4PM 8. Check-out 11 AM

host.host_about:
Aloha,
We are family of four from Calgary Canada. We went to Hawaii once and fell in love with pretty much everything.

So we decided to buy a second home to use whenever we can. When not able to use it ourselves we rent it out and like to share our enjoyment with people that like to visit Hawaii.
So welcome, stay in our second home.
Mahalo
Ivan and Lili

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 20 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The apartment is in an excellent location and proximity to waikiki/shops/restaurants/stores. The apartment was very well outfitted furniture/beds/linens/beach gear. I felt very safe and secure during my stay due to the gated community and lock system. The only downside to this apartment is that there are cockraches. We ran into quite a few during our stay and that made me feel very uneasy. It is my understanding that it's somewhat common in the tropical environment.

Totally, we satisfied with this apartment. 
Good points:
- Cost performance is very good for family trip
- Location which is near by waikiki 
Bad points:
- Cockroaches were found 3 times
- Parking gate is narrow for vans
Great central location within walking distance to shops, restaurants and Waikiki beach.
It's a great place. My family enjoyed the stay very much.

Ivans apartment is very tidy and comfortable, suited my family very well.
Yes building is a little old and tired but the apartment was fine and matched the listing. Ivans communication was very good and very clear instructions provided. We were able to check in as soon as we arrived and the Air con was running so rooms were nice and cool from the get go. 
We did encounter a few cockroaches in the building this did not impact much on us, we know how difficult elimination can be and took precautions particularly in the kitchen. Certainly did not have big impact on our holiday.
We were happy that Ivans apartment was exactly as advertised and found it just right for a relaxing holiday. Beach towels and plenty of extra equipment in cupboards meant picnic trips to beach were easy. Walked to shops and restaurants and had secure parking.
All good, Thanks Ivan

This condo is as advertised and well positioned to explore Waikiki & Honolulu. It has all the modern amenities and supplies you need to enjoy your stay. Ivan provides great information on enjoying the property and the local area.
Ivan’s place is clean, well equipped and air conditioned.  There is plenty of information to ensure your stay is a positive experience and Ivan is quick to respond to queries.

name: IPANEMA - EXCELLENT LOCATION !!!
summary: The apartment is located in the tourist and safe area of Ipanema, is just 2 blocks away from Ipanema beach, 3 blocks to Lagoa (lagoon) and  block to the subway. It is very close to Leblon and Copacabana. Located in a safe, residential building, 24 hour doorman and elevator. The neighborhood is fantastic, the best beach, lots of restaurants and bars. close to everything: grocery stores, bakeries, shopping and entertainment. The apartment is fully equipped and has all the amenities ready to use, modern and newly renovated is very comfortable and charming with: * A double bed in the bedroom  * Sofa bed single * Air conditioning  * TV 32¨ LCD  * Closet  * High speed wireless internet access  * 1 bathroom and 1 toilet  * Full Kitchen, with stove, refrigerator, Coffe machine and sandwch grill  * Hair Dryer, Iron and Ironing Board The Rio de Janeiro is one of the main cities of the country and is Internationally known for many cultural icons and the scenery Sugar Loaf, the Corcovado Mountain
space: Das Apartment liegt mitten im touristischen und sicheren Bereich von Ipanema, nur 2 Blocks vom Strand entfernt, 3 Blocks von der Lagune und 1 Block von der U-Bahn. Es ist ganz in der Nähe von Leblon und Copacabana. Wohnhaus mit 24-Stunden-Portier und Aufzug. Die Gegend ist toll mit em besten Strand, umgeben von vielen Restaurants und Bars. Lage: Supermärkte, Bäckereien, Geschäften und Unterhaltung, alles was Sie für einen tollen Aufenthalt brauchen in Rio De Janeiro.

It is very close to Leblon and Copacabana. Located in a safe, residential building, 24 hour doorman and elevator. The neighborhood is fantastic, the best beach, lots of restaurants and bars. close to everything: grocery stores, bakeries, shopping and entertainment. Modern und neu renoviert, sehr komfortabel und charmant mit: * Doppelbett  * Einzel-Schlafsofa * Klimaanlage * Deckenventilator  * 42-ZOLL-TV * Begehbarer Kleiderschrank * High-Speed Internet WLAN * 1 Bad * Voll ausgestattete Küche mit Herd, Mikrowelle, Kühlschrank  * Haartrockner, Bügeleisen und Bügelbrett * Kaffeemaschine  * Bettwäsche und Handtücher.
interaction: Should you have any request during your stay please contact me by email (Website hidden by Airbnb) or whatsaap + (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
house_rules: Before you arrive in Rio, we will need some additional information: complete name, passport number, arrival time for check in.  -Just use good sense in the noise-making inside the apartment, and in the common area of the building.  -Make sure to turn of the air conditioning when you go out, save energy and also ... preventing electricity damage.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Olá, meu nome é Marcela, tenho uma inovadora imobiliária que atua com sucesso no mercado do Rio de Janeiro desde 2010. Administramos apartamentos no exclusivo barrio de Ipanema. Respeitando as diversas necessidades e recursos dos nossos clientes, fornecemos a todos eles o máximo de conforto, segurança e bom serviço. Garantindo a elevada qualidade nos nossos alugueis e oferecendo um excelente serviço geral, cumprimos o nosso papel em fazer de sua estadia uma experiência memorável. Por favor, visite o meu perfil para ver os nossos imóveis e os comentários dos nossos hóspedes.

Sejam bemvindos ao Rio de Janeiro!!!!

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Nossa estadia  foi excelente! Fomos bem recebidos na entrada e o check out também foi excelente! O apartamento estava bem cuidado e limpo. Espero que possamos voltar em breve! Obrigada!

The apartment is ideal for two and very, very well located, near boutiques, restaurants, shopping malls and public transportation. Not to mention that the ocean is only two streets away! The check-in and check-out were excellent and the communication before our arrival was fast and very helpful. The apartment is clean, with  terrific cable tv and Wi-Fi. The bed is comfy, and the shower is good. What more could we ask for? We loved our stay at Marcela’s place and are already planning our next stay there.
Nice apartment with great location!

O apartamento da Marcela,é exatamente como está nas fotosporém não tem cofre,como descrito,não haviam lenções suficientes nem cobertores para 3 pessoas e uma das camas(solteiro)estava quebrada.A Marcela não nos recebeu,conforme combinado(estava viajando) e quando telefonei para ela,ao chegar no aeroporto,,como combinado,fui atendida por outra pessoa que me falou que ela havia viajado.O check-in que deveria ser as 09:00hs,só poderia ser feito as 11hs porque a pessoa que lá estava hospedada resolveu alongar sua estadia,acho que isso foi uma falha,que não deveria ter acontecido.Ficamos muito inseguras também porque a portaria do predio estava em reforma,devido a um onibus que entrou,por acidente nela,e a frente do predio estava fechada com compensados de madeira,e isso aconteceu 3 meses antes de nós alugarmos o apartamento,acho que nos devia ter sido colocada tal questão,antecipadamente,para que decidissimos se queriamos ou não alugar o apartamento,com aquelas condições de segurança.A localização do apartamento é muito boa,os porteiros são muito educados e gentis,mas não há cameras de segurança,como nos foi dito que havia,sugerí que fosse colocada uma trava de segurança extra na porta de entrada do apartamento,pois acho isso importante para o (Website hidden by Airbnb) check-out Marcela foi ao apartamento e ela é muito educada e pediu desculpas,mas no check-in,falamos com ela apenas por telefone,e não gostei de seu atendimento.Não conseguimos conectar a internet também...enfim,acredito que Marcela tem um ótimo lugar para oferecer,mas talvez por falta de experiencia,nossa estadia foi bem conturbada,infelizmente...desejo sorte a ela e se corrigir as questões acima citadas para que não mais aconteça com outros hospedes...recomendo o local.

Marcela's Ipanema's apartment was everything we wanted.  Located right in the middle of the high end shopping district, it was so perfect to have an apartment rather than a hotel room.  Just a couple blocks away from the beach made this little apartment a great end to our trip.

The apartment is very nice, it has all you need to feel yourself comfortable. 24h doormen, good wifi, good bed, kitchen has everything to make breakfast at home. Location is safe and close to everything! Marcela was so helpful and nice. We were very glad. Definitely recommend!!!

Clean, good WiFi connectivity, comfortable bed, and appliances that worked without any problems (incl washing machine).  Marcela was responsive and timely, and made herself available to answer any questions that arose during my stay.  Thank you!

A nossa hospedagem não poderia ter sido melhor!
O apartamento é exatamente como nas fotos! Localização perfeita, dois quarteirões da praia, supermercado, farmácia, lojas e muitos restaurantes a poucos minutos a pé! Possui todos equipamentos necessários, além de limpo!
Marcela foi muito gentil, educada, atenciosa e preocupada com o nosso bem estar. Ela foi pontual na chegada e na saída.
Pretendo me hospedar novamente em breve! 
Super Recomendo! :D
The location is perfect for shopping and beach going.  Marcella is a great host.  Reccomended

Marcela, foi um prazer se hospedado por vc, o apto é ótimo, super localização, voltaremos mais vezes. Recomendo a todos se recepcionado pela Marcela Urquiza, uma pessoa excelente!! Foi um prazer!! Obg

Super location - only a block away from Ipanema beach which could not be more central. A huge choice of restaurants and bars all around - safe building with 24hr security. Lovely apartments - kitchen, bathroom, good sized bedroom with storage. Marcela was a great host, super responsive, always appearing at the door whenever I had any questions or required clarifications - one would be lucky to have her as a host. Definitely recommend the place!

We had a great time in Marcela's apartment. The apt is perfectly located very close to the beach and to restos, supermarkets, bus...
Marcela is extremely nice and helpful! Would definitely go back next time I go to Rio. Highly recommended.

Marcela was a great host. Easy to communicate with and responded basically immediately. We had no trouble with anything, but I know if there was a problem I have no doubt that it would have been addressed immediately. 

Marcela is kind and welcoming, and the place virtually matches up to the pictures. It was clean and in a great location.
Lovely apartment and great location. Marcela was very friendly and helpful!! Would definitely stay there again if in Rio. Thanks!

Marcela is an absolute excellent host.  She is prompt, polite and incredibly responsive.  The location could not be better, it really is the best in Ipanema!  The only advise i would give is (and this may be in a translation issue) that this would be by US standards a studio apartment, not a 1 bedroom (i.e. - there is not a separate bedroom).  Otherwise, the description is very accurate.  Had a great stay! Thank you!

Very good location!!!
Marcela is helpful and the place is good for a stay in Rio

Marcela is so simpatic, polite, punctual, gentle. the apartment was clean and ready when we arrived. Everything had functioned properly. in the heart of Ipanema, we were close to everything, supermarket, restaurants, beach etc.. was a good experience!

Marcela's place was in the perfect location and just the right size for one person. It is located on the street with the best shopping in Rio and only two blocks from the beach. I also ate at several excellent restaurants in the neighborhood and everything was within walking distance. As a woman traveling alone this place was just perfect. 

Marcela was responsive nice and accommodative - even allowing for me to check out rather late on the day of my departure. I would highly recommend staying at Marcela's place.

Marcela is really Nice and  helpfull
She speaks all the langages you need:)
Very Nice place near the beach
A place to know!!!
Ciao 

Karine & Sébastien

Great location! Apartment is a nice space for one or two people. Area is very safe with lots of stores, cafés, etc.

Only comment is the hot water in the shower. It's more lukewarm.

But other than that, I had a great time and would definitely recommend Marcela as a host!

Great apt very well situated in ipanema, only 10min walk from ipanema beach. Lots of very nice bar and restaurant. The apt itself is nice, with air conditionning and everything needed as iron, fridge, coffee maker and even water purification. Marcela was great and very professional as i had issues with my booking. I recommend this flat !

I truly enjoyed staying in this apartment. The apartment is beautiful and well taken care off. It has everything you will need for a comfortable stay. The location is amazing and only steps away from the beach and main streets. The host Marcela was great and very great to communicate with. She is always there if you have any questions or need assistance. I would highly recommend this place.

Fantastic accomodation! We couldn't have asked for a better location, in the center of Ipanema neighbourhood, two blocks from the beach. The apartment has everything you need and there is everything around: pharmacie, grocery store, restaurants, bars and especially juice bars!  And the place is really quiet. We stayed there 6 nights and would've extended our stay gladly.  You will not be disappointed if you rent this place.

Excellent location (2 short streets from Ipanema and 5 from Lagoa), cute apartment with all the amenities needed, 24 hours security, lot of shops and restaurants around..Just one thing I don't like, checkout at 10 am, when u have a flight at night is not comfortable..and a free bottle of water in the fridge would be great too!! Thanks!!
Excellent! Close to beach, metro, bus, restaurant. Very safe area! The place to be for 2 in Rio!
The reservation was canceled 32 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We had an excellent stay here - the apartment is in an amazing location, just 2 blocks from the beach and in the centre of everything in Ipanema.  The apartment itself is perfect for two people (although perhaps a little bit of a squeeze for 3, unless you're travelling with a child) and is in a very good condition.

Air conditioning and wifi were a bonus too.

Marcela was lovely and responded quickly to all our questions. She was also flexible with our check-in and check-out times which was really helpful.  We would definitely stay here again!

My wife and I stayed at Marcela's place in the heart of Ipanema (the location could not be better in Ipanema) for 3 nights at the end of January/beginning of February. The apartment was well furnished, clean, quiet, and very secure.  Simply put, it was our home base in Rio while we were there and we were impressed.  The place was in excellent condition and the AC worked very well and was quiet (air blade).  If we return to Rio, we would contact Marcela again and not even consider a hotel (which we did before we committed).

Marcela is an excellent host and walked us through the place.  She left a guide as  to how various household things worked.  Communication before and during we're prompt and friendly.

All in all, we HIGHLY RECOMMEND staying with Marcela in Ipanema.

Glen

Marcela was:
Friendly
On time
Responding to sms
Helpful
Etc.... 

I wanted to extend 3 nights but the place was booked

Marcela é uma ótima anfitriã, foi super simpática e atenciosa! O apartamento é ótimo, localização privilegiada em Ipanema, próximo a várias opções gastronômicas. Adoramos nossa estadia e com certeza, recomendamos! ;)
Great place

Hi, Marcella was a great host to communicate with, prompt and very helpful.  We had a late flight out of rio and she let us stay in the apt until an hour before her new guests checked in.  

The apt is in a great location, close to beach and shops/restaurants.  It is very basic but clean.  Only nits: more and better towels, we got 2 basic towels from Marcella not enough to go to beach and shower.
Marcela's apartment was great - perfect location and exactly what we needed for our stay in Rio. I would definitely recommend staying there.

This apartment is in an excellent location. The place was perfect for my husband and our 1 yr old baby. Its a little small but in great condition and very clean. Marcela was a great host and always quick and helpful with any questions we had before we arrived and while we were there. Without a doubt I would book with her again next time we are in Rio. Which hopefully will be soon!

very good location and location and location!!
and silmple studio ! 근처에 없는게 없어요 쇼핑몰 맛집도 많고 해변도 가깝고 밤에도 밝아서 좋았어요.

Marcela was a lovely host and very accommodating during our stay in the apartment. We arrived early and she was kind enough to let us use another apartment instead. Very flexible and prompt with email and (Hidden by Airbnb) responses would stay again.

Marcela was wonderful and the apt. was exactly as listed.  Marcela went above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable - she even let us arrive early due to an extremely early flight.  We could not have asked for a better location either!  Great spot for staying in Ipanema near the beach in walking distance to Leblon and Ipanema.  I hope to visit again soon and would recommend this apt. to anyone visiting.
good location - good communication

The apartment is located in an absolutely great location. The apartment was very clean and tidy. The main items we used was the WiFi, little fridge, ceiling fan and air con and they all worked brilliantly. The only tiny issue we had is that there is no kettle to boil water for tea. Just a coffee maker. So we had to boil water on the gas stove. But really this didn't bother us too much. And the stove worked fine.
Marcela is very friendly and always cheerful. She also said we could contact her at anytime and she always responded very quickly. All in all, the apartment was wonderful and we would definitely stay here again.

The apartment in Ipanema was great!  It was just as described and all the amenities worked great.  The location is super as well -- it's a few blocks away from Ipanema beach and also located on a street with many restaurants and shops.  It rained while we were there, so we went to the nearby mall, which was really nice and has a movie theater, so you have that easy option as well.  Recommended.

The apartment is in a perfect location, it is a secure location close to the beach and the Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas. There are also many shops and restaurants near it.
It has everything you need for a simple stay in Rio! It is also very clean and in a great condition.
Finally, Marcela is very kind and easy to communicate with. I would definitely recommend staying there.

The apartment is in an excellent location, close to beach, restaurants and shops; and a very secure area. The place it's in great condition and very clean. 
The communication was great, she always responded very quickly and was very helpful and flexible (specially with check in/out). Marcela was an excellent host! I would definitely recommend staying there.

Great location , Clean and nice room   everything worked perferct for our stay in Rio..
Friendly   and  comunicative host
Great neighborhood!!!
Muito bem localizado, o apartamento é muito bom também, a Marcela é um amor e super (website hidden) certeza voltarei a me hospedar neste apartamento.

Marcela was a lovely host, the studio was clean and light with good facilities. The location was amazing, so much more than we had expected with the stunning lagoon and beach either side. Local restaurants and bars were great with a metro just down the road. Marcela was available for contact whenever we needed her and the 24hr security on the door were lovely as well. Great stay, would love to go again. 4 days isn't nearly enough to soak up rio!

What a great host! So happy to have met Marcela!  Always had a smile on her face! The apartment was amazing! Very clean! Great location! Soo close to the beach! Restaurants everywhere! I would recommend this apartment to anyone who wants to have a great time at Ipanema! Thank you Marcela!

We really enjoyed staying at Marcela's place.  We arrived ahead of schedule and Marcela was able to let us in within 10 minutes!  The apartment is in the best location, very convenient and safe.  Highly recommended!

Marcela was very responsive and quick in communication. Very helpful and friendly. The apartment was clean and as described. There is security 24 hrs downstairs and 2 lifts. The apt is a studio with washer available, a decent shower, fridge etc. The pat is in a great location a couple of blocks from the beach, a 10 mins walk from the nearesr subway, and surrounder by lots of shops, restaurants, cafes, and bars within easy walking distance. It is a good, safe neighbourhood. I would recommend both the host and accommodation.

We loved this place! Marcela was lovely! The doorman was great- friendly, funny & allowed us to leave our bags with him between check in/check out and onward journey times! The apartment as was perfect the location!! We would stay here again in a heart beat!

Excellent place! Location was perfect, just a couple minute walk to the beach. Restaurants, a bank, shopping all around. And the host was very responsive and provided excellent suggestions in the area. All in all, a great experience!

Marcela se ha portado excelente, no nos conocimos pero todo estuvo de maravilla y se ocupo de cada detalle incluso con el poco tiempo que tuvo para preparar todo.
Ha cumplido todas las expectativas he incluso fue mejor, el departamento muy lindo y limpio, la ubicación es excelente.

The apartment is nice, clean and comfortable, in an execellent location in Ipanema, just a few blocks from the beach. Marcela was a great host, easy to communicate with and very helpful in accommodating our check-in/check-out times. Had a great time staying there during the World Cup. 
Thanks.

O apartamento é ótimo, organizado, as coisas de boa qualidade, tudo muito limpo, com toda a infraestrurura necessária para uma boa estada no Rio! Sobre a localização é excelente, a 2 quadras da praia, no coração das melhores lojas (o que nos faz gastar um bom dinheiro) hehe, restaurantes, mercados, agências bancárias tudo muito perto. E sobre a Marcela, infelizmente não pude conhecer pessoalmente, mas ela é uma excelente anfitriã, preocupada em atender bem aos seus hóspedes, da toda a atenção e retorno quase que imediato as dúvidas, e super compreensiva e flexivel com o checkout conforme a agenda do apto! Obrigado Marcela e super recomendo você ser a anfitriã no Rio de Janeiro, Voltaremos...

We stayed at Marcella's for 3 nights. Great location, just 2 blocks back from Ipanema beach and in a really safe neighbourhood. Also only a 10 minute walk to the lagoon.The flat itself is compact but has everything you need and really you're not going to be spending much time here with Rio outside!

Marcela was lovely and couldn't have been more accommodating. We stayed an extra night and checked out late, all no problems.

One point to be aware of. This is one of a number of properties Marcella airbnb's and it's not lived in. Consequently you don't get the same experience as when staying in someone's home. However it's a small quibble 

Overall a really positive Airbnb experience. Thanks Marcella!

Nuestra estadía fue de lo mejor, el departamento contaba con todo lo necesario y se encontraba limpio. Definitivamente lo recomiendo!!! Rio es una ciudad maravillosa... con muchas cosas para ver y la ubicación del departamento es excelente, cerca de la playa y de todos los medios de transporte que te conectan con los lugares más importantes para visitar.
Great location and Marcella met me at the apartment with the key.

We had a great time at Marcella's apt. It's perfectly located in Ipanema, two blocks away from the beach, close to bars, restaurants and shops.

The apt. is a nice place to stay in Rio. It's clean, and has everything you need. The hand over of the key was done by the housekeeper, it all went smooth, but she didn't speak anything but Portugese. This makes it hard to ask questions if Portugese is not spoken by the renters.

Marcella is very flexible, we could prolong our stay with two days without any problems. Marcella reacted quickly to our questions and requests which made our stay very pleasent. I would definately recommend the apt. to visitors of Rio.

El departamento es como se anuncia respecto a buena ubicacion y cercano a la playa. Departamento cumplia con todo lo que decia el anuncio. 
Excelente atencion de Nil... al recibirnos y al realizar el check out.
Marcela was great! She was on time and very accommodating, giving us an early check in and check out. The apartment was exactly as presented in the photos. Amazing location and all around great stay.

Mi pareja y yo fuimos al apartamento de Marcela por una semana y realmente quedamos muy conformes!
Marcela es amorosa. Nos respondió a la brevedad todas las preguntas que tuvimos previo a la llegada, y estando ahí nos recibió para darnos las llaves y explicarnos cómo funcionaba todo, y estuvo dispuesta a ayudarnos con todo lo que necesitamos todo el tiempo.
El apartamento es perfecto para dos personas. Es un ambiente pequeño pero ideal para una pareja, con todo lo necesario (ropa de cama, toallas, utensilios, herramientas de limpieza, secador de pelo, etc. etc. etc.) 
Está ubicado excelentemente: a dos cuadras de la playa, muy cerca de la Lagoa, en una calle absolutamente principal llena de supermercados, tiendas de ropa, minimercados, restaurantes, todo a pocos pasos del apartamento. 
Tiene un minimercado 24hs abierto exactamente en la puerta del edificio lo cual es ideal!! 
Tiene portero 24 hs y está en una zona muy segura. 
Definitivamente quedamos encantados tanto con Marcela como con el apartamento. Si volvemos a ir, sin duda iremos al mismo lugar!
Gracias por todo Marcela!

Marcela´s apartment is located in the best spot of Ipanema, just two blocks from the beach. The place is not big but good for the single traveller or couple. It is clean and well maintained. Communication with Marcela was fast and very reliable (I booked one day in advance and I arrived there without stress meeting Marcela in the lobby).

We had a wonderful stay in Rio.  Marcela was incredibly nice and helpful.  We ended up not being able to arrive the first night and she was flexible with our new arrival day/time.  She also gave us a fourth night for a discounted price because of our unforeseen emergency travel changes.  The apartment itself is small but has all of the amenities described online.  It is clean and the best part of it all is that it is in a wonderful neighborhood and only two blocks from the beach. We would definitely stay here again!

Não nos conhecemos pessoalmente, mas o contato foi sempre rápido. Fiz o contato na véspera de noite e na manhã seguinte tudo fechado. As chaves estavam disponíveis e O ap encontrava-se conforme as fotos divulgadas. Localização muito boa duas quadras da praia e com restaurantes e transporte próximos. O que me desagradou um pouco foi o fato do prédio me parecer ser misto, com escritórios comerciais.  No mais tivemos uma excelente estadia.
A Marcela é uma anfitriã excelente. Atenciosa, o apartamento tem tudo o que nós podíamos precisar. É só chegar e você já se sente em casa.
The room was great, easy location, 5 min from the beach and lots to do in the area. Marcela was a very helpful, nice lady! Everything worked and was very clean
Excelente experiência! Apartamento muito bom, localização ótima e anfitriã atenciosa. Recomendo!
Great location! Nice and comfortable apartment in the heart of Ipanema.
The reservation was canceled 26 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Location is an extreme plus finding yourself in one of the major avenues in a great neighborhood. Restaurants, bars, and the beach are all within walking distance. The apartment itself was more than sufficient to what I needed with apartment being kept in a great condition! Security was not of a concern as there is a security guard/receptionist always in the main lobby 24/7. Marcela was a lovely host always making herself available to any concerns I had and responding almost instantaneously to any messages I sent. I highly recommend this listing and will return in ever I get the opportunity.

Gostamos muito do apartamento. Existem muitas opções de comercio por perto. Os porteiros são muito legais.
Fora isso é muito Perto da praia.
A Marcela foi muito gentil e ágil. Voltaríamos sem dúvidas.
Marcela was a good host. The apartment was as described and made sure to accommodate is to have an enjoyable stay. It was in a great location in Ipanema.

O apartamento é pequeno mas super bem localizado, limpo e confortável. A Marcela é muito atenciosa e flexível com o horário de check-out. Voltaria e recomendo! 

This place is very compact but very well located, clean and cozy.

Marcela is an amazing person. Very helpful and flexible with the check-out.

I would totally stay there again. I recommend it.
Lovely and helpful host. The apartment is in an amazing location that is a quick walk to the beach.  Plenty of nice shops and restaurants in the area.  Definitely recommend.
Marcela was very nice, incredibly easy to work with and very flexible with my schedule! I would Highly recommend this very well located apartment!

Although I never met her personally everything just went great. The apartment is small but very convenient for 2 people. It has a great location in ipanema, where there are a lot of cafes, restaurants and shops. It is 5 min walk to ipanema beach. Great location and a good place. I would recommend.
Amazing location and very courteous hostess and building staff. Clean and spacious for a couple. Really good value if you are looking for something simple, functional and in a great location.
Very cute and convenient place to stay. Clean, quiet and safe - perfect for a wayward traveler.  Highly recommended.

The location in Ipanema is amazing.
The flat was as expected and Marcela was a great host.
El departamento de Marcela queda ubicado en una excelente zona de Ipanema. El departamento es pequeño pero muy limpio y cómodo. Seguramente cuando vuleva a Rio de Janeiro repetiré.

Location is perfect. Near all of ipanema's good restaurants and 2 blocks from the beach. It really was all a flawless experience from getting keys, wifi, and handing in the keys. Apartment is exactly as advertised which is always great.
Atendimento excelente, anfitriã muito atenciosa, cumpriu tudo que foi acordado.
Very good location, near public transport stops and shops. The apartment is small but very functional with everything you need!
A experiência foi fantástica! Todas expectativas superadas! :)
Excelente departamento super ubicación !! Volvería sin duda alguna !!! Marcela tuvo una excelente. Atención. !!

Pretty nice location in Ipanema.  Being only 2 blocks from the beach, and several good restaurants within 2 blocks.  I recommend trying ViaSete which is only 1 block away.  Many busses available within 2 blocks, and the subway will be much closer once the expansion is completed.  We had to go to the General Osorio station which was about a 10-15 minute walk away.  The various 24 hr doormen were really friendly despite our language barrier.  There is also one of the locations where you could purchase in advance tickets to the Christ the Redeemer train across the street.

Unfortunately the walls are a little thin; an upstairs neighbor (or outside somewhere) was doing construction and we constantly heard a drill running or somebody hammering something in the mornings.

I love a hot shower with plenty of water, but the water heater is built into the shower head in this bathroom and not so powerful.  So it is either hot water but not  full pressure, or cool water with full pressure.

Apartamento de acordo com as fotos, reformado, bastante aconchegante. Localização excelente em Ipanema, perto da praia e de diversos restaurantes e barzinhos (Venga, Barthodomeu, Le Vin...). Recomendo e voltaria com certeza!!!

We really enjoyed our stay in this AirBnB apartment. It is as advertised and has enough space for two people to be comfortable for a week. All kitchen and bathroom supplies were provided. The location couldn't be beaten. It was easy to get to the beach, eat at great restaurants, and use public transit to get around. I would highly recommend this place, just be sure to check that the price online is in your currency, as the price jumped for us after I paid with my credit card.

O apto é exatamente igual ao anuncio, a localização é fantástica, fizemos muita coisa a pe, fomos até a Lagoa, shop Leblon e claro, a praia. 

Como fui de carro a maior dificuldade foi encontrar vaga pois tem poucos estacionamentos por perto e muito caros. Acabei deixando em um hotel proximo com diarias a R$ 45,00. 

A dica para comer bem e barato é o Kilograma , no inicio da Visconde de Piraja. (ha umas tres quadras do ap da Marcela).

Marcela foi uma boa anfitria e muito disponivel a todo momento.
Leandro Fernandes
Super appartement,  très bien situé en plein centre d'ipanema,  à deux seconde de tous commerces,  restaurants et bien sûr plage !!!
Parfait,  Marcela est très réactive et arrangeante.  Rien à redire !

This apartment was perfect for our needs.  The location is amazing - only 2 blocks from the beach!  There is also everything you need within a block or two: restaurants, coffee shops, etc.  

The apartment is of decent size - a kitchen, bathroom and the bedroom.  It was relatively quiet all 3 nights we stayed. 

Additionally, Marcela was a great host.  She was very responsive and even was able to accommodate us on short notice when our flight plans changed.  I would definitely recommend Marcela and her apartment to anyone looking for a quiet place to crash while spending time on one of the best beaches in the world!

A localização do apartamento é perfeita e o flat é justamente o que mostra nas fotos, muito legal.
O contato com a Marcela desde o momento que fechamos a reserva foi muito cordial e ela sempre foi solicita para responder os questionamentos. 
Uma excelente opção para quem vai ficar no Rio de Janeiro e quer aproveitar o melhor de Ipanema.
Voltarei com toda certeza!:)
Great place. very central. Had a wonderful stay...

We really appreciated our stay here! Marcela was super on top of communication, writing us immediately upon booking and staying in touch as we approached. She left a list of FAQ in the apartment, which we found very helpful. We loved the neighborhood and location - just as expected. The space was smaller and less well lit than we'd anticipated from the photos, so we were not blown away or anything, but it was fine for our needs (traveling through for 3 days). The only issue we faced was the water temperature, which did not correspond with the FAQ left behind. However, we did not ask Marcela about this during our stay because we didn't think it worth the bother for our short stay - so she very well might've fixed it if we asked, and that's on us. A heads up to those staying, though, in case it's of significance to you!
Everything went fine and was well organized. Thanks! Nice location. Apartment is simple but OK. It looks better in Airbnb pictures than in reality

The apartment is in an absolutely perfect location in a beautiful city. Marcela was incredibly good about responding to emails both during the booking process and our stay. While I would 100% stay here again, the apartment is really meant for two people.  There is a seat that converts into a bed for a third person, but it's quite uncomfortable and I'd recommend avoiding counting on it unless you're one of those people that can sleep well on anything, anywhere. Other than that, fantastic stay and wish we were still hanging out on the beach in Rio!

Great spot in trendy Ipanema. Marcela is very communicative and organised everything for our 5 night stay. The flat is simple but perfect for a couple. Great TV and wifi and good aircon. The local area is fantastic, the beach is 1 block away and good local spots include Nik Sushi (famous for its all you can eat) and Barthodemeu Bar. Would highly recommend.
Great location and very close to Ipanema Beach.
Great apartment, great location, everything as described!
Adorei o apartamento. Ótima localização, uma região de ótimos restaurantes, perto da praia e da lagoa. As fotos refletem a realizade do (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza indico e pretendo retornar.
Easy stay with instant book. Very close to beach.

Apartamento muito bom, exatamente como mostrado nas fotos. A localização é o grande diferencial, muito bem situado em Ipanema, muito próximo a praia e a lagoa.. Apartamento limpo, sem dificuldades para pegar e devolver as chaves.. 
Marcela foi muito cordial ajudando sempre que necessário e com rapidez nas respostas.. 
Recomendo..

The location of the apartment is excellent, very close to the beach and plenty of shops/supermarkets in the surroundings.
Marcela was helpful whenever she could adjust the check-in/out hours according to the availability of the apartment.
Regarding the apartment itself, it is very basic but has most of the things you need. The kitchen is well equipped.
The building is old, as most of them in the neighborhood.
It's a good choice if your are looking for location!

Marcela was a prompt and friendly communicator.

The apartment is as described/pictured and very clean. It's in a convenient area near transport, restaurants and the beach. The Internet was reliable. Note that the window looks on to a brick wall but still allows for natural light.
Uncomlicated check in and information on a desk in a room
The flat is ok, clean, calm, perfectly located, safe.
Location is awesome for Ipanema and Lablon. Hot was helpful and attentive. Recommend this host!

Marcela vastasi nopeasti kysymyksiin. Kohde oli kuvauksen mukainen. Sijainti on loistava. Kiinteistön yhteiset tilat ovat kuluneet mutta se ei haitannut. 

Poikkikatu jolla tämä asunto sijaitsee on varmasti Ipaneman parhaita ja siinä on monia hyviä ravintoloita joita tuli kokeiltua.

Gostei muito do apartamento.
O local é excepcional. Super bem localizado.
O apartamento super limpinho.
Também achei muito silencioso.
Os porteiros André e Flávio são super atenciosos.
No mais, tudo foi muito bom. Recomendo e ficaria de novo, com certeza.

Marcela was so pleasant to work with. Everyone was exactly as described. Location was very accessible to anything we needed. Uber drivers found us very easily. The place was clean and we were able to do laundry. 
Thank you so much!!!

Extremely convenient location and very quiet. Very accommodating with check out time and luggage storage. Kitchen a bit under equipped but loads of options for eating out right around the flat. Will book again for a get away weekend for sure
This apartment is pretty basic but the air conditioning and WIFI worked well. The location is fantastic in Ipanema.
The flat has a great location and is very quiet, it is clean with modern utilities. Marcela is always very quick to respond and flexible. I really recommend this place.

Never actually met Marcela, but she was great! Always quick to reply to my messages via (Hidden by Airbnb) . And her housekeeper/assistant Marlucia, who I did meet, was also very nice and helpful, along with the doormen/security guys downstairs. The apartments were also very nice, and had everything I needed. I actually stayed in 3 different ones, all in the same building because I extended my trip, and Marcela was able to accommodate my new departure date this way. I didn't mind changing apartments. The building's location in Ipanema was ideal, and Marcela's professionalism made it well worth it.

Perfect location. Really recommend.
The apartment is fine and clean. Everything went well.
Excelente ubicación y excelente departamento.
Everything was fine, Marcela is very helpful, communication was easy. I enjoyed the stay. Location is great. Thanks for everything.

A minha estadia no apartamento da Marcela foi muito boa. Localização do ap excelente, muito perto da praia, supermercados, fácil acesso para os pontos turísticos do Rio tanto de transporte publico quanto de taxi.
Fomos recebidos pela assistente da Marcela que nos orientou sobre as normas e comodidades do apartamento que é bem fiel as fotos.
A segurança do prédio é feita por porteiros muito educados e gentis que guardaram nossas malas após o check out até nossa ida parta o aeroporto.
Para quem procura um apartamento simples, porem limpo, seguro, confortável e com boa localização é uma boa pedida !

this was a great perfect stay. the apt is small (as described) but super comfy. it has everything you need for a short stay in Rio - even a washing machine. the location is excellent: two blocks from the beach, a few blocks from Lagoa. The area is safe and there are various good restaurants around (including the great Delírio Tropical which is on the same block as this apt). There is a bike sharing station (similar to Citi Bikes in NY) two blocks away right before you get to the beach.  a big plus for us was the silence. and apart from being silent is also full of light - another important feature for us as well. marcela gave us prompt responses to everything we needed and her assistant marlucia as super sweet as well. extremely recommended! and will definitely repeat the experience in two weeks.
Great place.  Affordable and close to shops and beach.  Would stay again, thanks!
Perfect location strongly advised!!!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Excellent apt. Marcela was very helpful! I would stay here again
