The apt is located at the middle of IPANEMA. Felt very safe because of security guard. Also, very smooth commnication with her. Highly recommended!!

Marcela's place was great... clean and in a good location very close to the beach. Marcela was also an amazing host, she communicated with me very well before and during my stay. There was a problem with the electricity in the building during my stay and Marcela got me checked into one of her other apartments a few blocks away the next morning! Great host!

Marcela was great--she worked with my boyfriend and allowed us to check in early and check out late. She was easy to reach by What's App, as well. The apartment is lovely and very, very well situated. She is just a few blocks from the beach, a block from a grocery store, and close to great restaurants. We arrived and the apartment was very clean. Everything in the apartment (washer, coffee maker, stove) worked great. My boyfriend and I thought it was a little smaller than it appears in pictures, but it is still a very comfortable size for two people.
Had an enjoyable stay at Marcela's apartment in Ipanema.  It is in a perfect location that is minutes from the beach and surrounded by numerous shops and restaurants.

It was great location as written in headline. Restaurants, shops and beach nearby. Good wifi and washing mashine was important for us. There is also 24h doorman. First day there was no electricity. Little bit surprise. Marcela was friendly and easy to communicate. Also late check-out was pleasant. Prices for accomodation seems to be very high in Rio.
Fantastic location!  Everything as described.  Place had a 24 hour doorman who was always there to let me in.  Excellent AC and wifi internet speed.  I would recommend to anyone ;-)

Many thanks to Marcela! The communication and the appartment made the best from my whole stay in Rio! The appartment is located in the center of Ipanema. She made an early Check in and late Check out due to my late flight possible and even arranged a taxi for me! The perfect homestay for Rio!!!!

I had a nice stay at Marcelas place, the location is perfect and some of my favorite restaurants in Rio are around the corner! The apartment is a bit sound sensitivily though from the neighbors but still a good place to crash at :-)

Very Nice. 
A great Location. 
Highly recommended.

The apartment was fantastic and exactly as described. Clean and perfect for 2 people. For me this is the most central spot in ipanema to access the nice restaurants and only 1-2 blocks from the beach. 
Check in and out made easy by the 24hr doorman and communication with Marcela is quick and excellent. 
It is on a busy road but the apartment is at the back of the building so it's super quiet for a good nights sleep :)
Thanks!!
Apartamento limpo, correspondente às fotos, bem equipado e super bem localizado. O único problema é se você for de carro, pq o estacionamento na região é bem caro
As described. Great location. Host was receptive and clear. Space is comfortable and close to some great restaurants. Recommended
El departamento estuvo muy bonito y muy bien ubicado. Marcela nos ayudo en todo y siempre respondia rapido. Lo recomiendo al 100%
The photos weren't very accurate. The apt was dark and the building was very old and musty.

The listing location was great. Super convenient spot in Ipanema. It's central and easy to get to the beach, Leblon or the metro station a couple blocks away. Marcela was easy to communicate with and made the checkin/checkout process really easy. The listing is a little smaller than the pictures might depict it but is still good value for the money. Let's be honest, how much time are you going to spend in the listing if you're in Rio?
Nice place, good location for Ipanema. Perfect for 1 or 2 personne for several days to few weeks stay.
The host canceled this reservation 25 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
O apartamento é otimo, bem localizado e bem equipado. A Marcela foi ótima na comunicacao..
Great location and very cozy place!!
Marcela foi fantástica e a comunicação com ela foi super fácil e se mostrou disponível para qualquer dúvida.

Fiquei hospedada no apartamento da Marcela durante uma semana em agosto. O apartamento estava limpo e corresponde as fotos exibidas aqui. Localização ótima, perto de ótimos restaurantes e bares. Perto de metrô, ônibus e perto da praia...
Ótimo apartamento. Excelente localização . obrigado Marcela!
the same thing showed on the photos. very good owner's hospitality. great localization!
Marcela was a great host, very easy to get in touch with and an easy check in/check out process. The apartment is in a perfect location in Ipanema. We found it very easy to get around Rio from here.

The apartment felt more like a room in a budget hotel than an apartment with character. It looks like it has been cheaply and hastily furnished for Airbnb use with the bare minimum and nobody ever lived or planned to live there.
On arrival, the host was not there. The keys were left with the doorman who did not speak English. Luckily we had a friend with us who spoke Portuguese, otherwise it could have been quite a problem.
The shower is absolutely terrible. It's one of those flimsy electrical showers that warm up water as it flows through. Therefore, we had to choose between proper water flow or warm water, both was not an option. We went for the middle and ended up having showers with a pathetic, weak lukewarm stream of water. Also no hot water in the bathroom sink. The air conditioning made so much noise that the neighbors complained and warned us that it might catch fire (!).
There were absolutely no essentials in the apartment, except 3 small bars of soap. There was only 1 electrical outlet near the bed, so not exactly a "laptop friendly workspace" either (we had to take turns using the outlet!).
On the plus side, the location is indeed fantastic. It's right in the heart of Ipanema, with tons of nice shops and restaurants around.  The beach is only a 5 minute walk away. It also feels very safe, even very late at night. 
We would recommend this place to travellers who want a great location but don't plan on spending much time in the apartment (or showering!).

Marcela fue muy correcta, amable y puntual. Como llegamos tarde de nuestro "transfer" de Ihla Grande, le encargó las llaves al conserje, quien nos las entregó a tiempo y además fue muy amable con nosotros.
El apartamento es correcto y limpio. Está ubicado en una de las mejores zonas de Ipanema (muy cerca a Leblon) La verdad es que la zona es ¡¡super linda!! tranquila y segura, y está cerquísima de la playa de Ipanema y del Metro. Lo recomiendo sinceramente.

Comodo, luminoso, muy buena ubicación y seguro, teniendo de todo a la mano. El departamento y su contenido esta acorde a lo que se seña en el anuncio. Lo recomiendo.
Marcela es muy cercana y preocupada.

Excelente ubicación en ipanema, cerca de todo:  playa, supermercado, farmacias, restaurantes! Marcela me atendió muy bien, respondió a todas mis consultas sin importar el día ni el horario, muy recomendable!
Great location and apartment for two!
Marcela foi super gentil desde o início, o apartamento é como nas fotos, localização ótima, funcionários do prédio super simpáticos e nos auxiliou no que foi necessário.

O apartamento é aconchegante, como aparece nas fotos, ideal para 2 pessoas. O melhor de tudo é que está na melhor localização de Ipanema. E a Marcela foi uma excelente anfitriã! Recomendo e ficaria novamente.

Ótima localização! Apartamento organizado e limpo. A Marcela foi super atenciosa, foi fácil a comunicação assim como fazer o check-in e check-out (o check-out ela nos deixou ficar até mais tarde). Tudo perfeito. Super recomendo

Adoramos a nossa estadia no apartamento da Marcela, a localização é perfeita, fica a 2 quadras da praia, perto da lagoa e ao redor do apartamento tem supermercado, bares, restaurantes, lojas e para quem quiser tomar um bom café da manhã na esquina tem um ótimo. A Marcela foi uma ótima anfitriã, super rápida para responder as mensagens e cumpriu com todos os requisitos. Voltaria com certeza!!!

Marcela foi extremamente atenciosa. Sempre disponível e pronta para resolver qualquer problema. A localização do apartamento é excelente: no coração de Ipanema. O apartamento conta com ferro de passar, tábua, toalhas e lençóis, abridor de vinhos e cervejas. Excelente! Recomendo e voltaria com certeza!
Recomendo à todos, Apartamento muito bem localizado, próximo de tudo, perto da praia, vários restaurantes e vizinhança muito tranquila! Espero retornar em breve.
Excelente ubicación para ir a la playa y con tiendas cercanas. El depto cuenta con todo lo necesario para pasar una buena y comoda estadía.

O apartamento é excelentemente localizado.
Somente duas quadradas do posto 10 de Ipanema.
Bem servido de lanchonetes, restaurantes, farmárcias, supermercado, etc.
Muito seguro.
O café da manhã na esquina, no Kikarnes, é excelente, bem carioca.
A localização também para se deslocar é excelente, somente uma quadra do metrô - Estação Nossa Senhora da Paz.
Vale muito a pena.
Muito confortável para duas pessoas, três já fica um pouco apertado, mesmo sendo criança.
Os funcionários do prédio são extremamente educados e prestativos.

O apartamento é muito bem localizado, no coração de Ipanema. A limpeza é adequada, e é bem equipado.
O imóvel é simples e pequeno, acho que as fotos dão impressão de um lugar maior. É parecido com um quarto de hotel, com dormitório, banheiro e uma cozinha bem compacta. É uma espécie de Jk.
É silencioso para dormir, apesar de localizado em rua movimentada, a janela dá para a lateral e fundos. 
Achei estranho anunciarem "TV a cabo", quando existe ligação da net apenas com acesso aos canais usuais da TV aberta. 
O apartamento é interessante para ficar em casal durante alguns dias. O ponto alto, realmente, é a localização.
Ótima localização!!! O apartamento é ideal para duas pessoas, e a Marcela foi uma anfitriã muito atenciosa! Impossível não querer voltar e curtir o mar maravilhoso de Ipanema!
Great location!!

apartamento muito bem localizado, no coração de Ipanema.
tem uma cozinha com utensílios e fogão 4 bocas que atendem plenamente as necessidades.
O banheiro tem um bom chuveiro é uma máquina de lavar que é um diferencial. Precisa arrumar a proteção de descarga do vaso sanitário que estava em má condição.
O quarto tem TV a cabo com os canais básicos e uma cama de casal estreita e com colchão de qualidade.
Marcela foi solícita e ágil na comunicação.
Apartamento bem localizado, pequeno e com um pouco de mal cheiro por ser antigo. Quebrou o galho, mas acho que não voltaria.

The apartment is right sized, clean, and in a secured building with a doorman. Right off the bat, you'll feel safe! The location though, that's what made this experience great! 

Marcela was easy to work with and flexible with check-in/check-out arrangements.
Muy lindo el departamento, con todas las comodidades y excelente ubicación. Ideal para dos personas.
Perfect place!
O apartamento é super bem localizado e aconchegante! Adoramos!!
O apartamento é super bem localizado e aconchegante! Adoramos!!
Não indico.
Great apartment in a very good location in Ipanema. Marcela was a great host. Would stay here again definitely.
An affordable apartment in a great area. Marcela was very attentive, flexible and easy to get a hold of.
Muy lindo departamento, súper cerca de la playa, lugares para salir a comer, bares! Recomiendo

Lugar muito bem localizado, perto de bares, restaurantes,  bancos, lojas, metro, 2 quadras da praia e 4 da Lagoa. Quarto básico, mas para quem quer curtir o Rio e um lugar para dormir está fantástico! Recomendo!

Een betere locatie bestaat niet. Een straat verwijderd van het strand en vlakbij een metrostation. Appartement is op de 6e verdieping, dus geluidsoverlast is minimaal. De spullen zijn soms een beetje oud, maar alles wat je tijdens je verblijf nodig hebt, is aanwezig. Aanrader.

O apartamento é muito bem localizado, e esta em ótimas condições para um casal passar alguns dias em Ipanema. A Marcela foi atenciosa e rápida na comunicação ao longo de todo o (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza recomendo o local.

No nos pudimos ver personas por nuestros horarios pero Marcela siempre tuvo mucha comunicación conmigo y siempre r Silvio todas mis dudas.
La ubicación del apartamento es inmejorable, tienes tiendas, transporte y Playa a la mano, también es una zona muy segura ya que es bastante transitada.

O apartamento fica convenientemente localizado em Ipanema, perto de lanchonetes, bancos, restaurantes, a praia e transporte público. Se você está procurando um lugar pra dormir depois de passar o dia na rua, pode ser uma boa opção. O prédio é mal mantido, com fios expostos e problemas de acabamento. O apartamento é menor do que me pareceu nas fotos e precisa ser renovado.
Excelente apto! Bem localizado. Proprietária educada e disponível. Recomendo!
Excelente apartamento, localização melhor não há, limpeza impecável, mobiliário conservado, porteiro 24hs ( que é algo importante) e total atenção e rapidez junto a proprietario. Recomendo!
Excelente localização, prédio um pouco antigo, apartamento em excelentes condições. Anfitriã super prestativa e rapida na comunicação. Recomendo
Apartamento em uma excelente localização. Marcela sempre prestativa e a Marluce quem fez meu check in, muito simpática e prestativa. Lugar confortável e bem cuidado. Recomendo
Muitissimo bem localizado e em ótimo estado. Voltarei!!!

O apartamento é super bem localizado, a Marcela é uma anfitriã ótima, respondeu minhas mensagens rapidamente e com todos os detalhes que eu precisava. 
O apartamento é exatamente como as fotos e funciona super bem para 2 (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza, voltarei a me hospedar.

The apartment exactly matched the Airbnb photos and description, but we were pleasantly surprised by the location - you really are just steps away from Ipanema beach, bars and restaurants etc.! Check-in was straightforward, even though we arrived a little later than the designated check-in times. When we realised that we'd forgotten our adaptor plug, Marcela bought one over the next morning. Great trip, great host!

O apartamento é muito bem localizado! perto de tudo! ótimo para passear a pé pela zona sul, 15min caminhando chega no leblon, pro outro lado chega quase em arpoador, perto da lagoa rodrigo de freitas tmb! a marcela foi rapida na comunicação e flexível no checkin/checkout, o que nos ajudou muito em razão do horário do voo! o apto tem todas comodidades: ar condicionado, toalhas, secador, equipamentos na cozinha! pretendemos voltar!

El departamento es tal cual lo que se ve en las fotos. La ubicacion es inmejorable, cerca de todo.
Limpio y seguro. Marcela excelente anfitriona. Muy recomendable.
Excelente atencion de Marcela. Muy buen departamento.

Très bon emplacement, résidence sécurisée et plage à deux pas. Marcela est super accueillante et à votre disposition pour n'importe quels problèmes. 
Pour que se soit parfait il manquerait des produits d'usage courant (gel douche, shampoing, lessive..).
Excelente departamento. Pequeño y práctico, súper completo. La ubicación es inmejorable. Muy buena comunicación con Marcela. Totalmente recomendable.
Otimo, voltaremos
Boa localização. Apartamento fiel as fotos.

Great place! Close to everything and close to the beach. Even though it rained a couple days that I was there and it was a quick trip to Rio, everything is close by an excellent restaurants. Marcela is an awesome host! She was very helpful and quick to answer any messages I sent her. Communication was on point and excellent. The place is good enough for two people, clean, And well taken care of. For looking for an awesome place to stay, make sure you stay at one of Marcela’s apartments.
Excelente hospedagem...

El departamento tiene una ubicación excelente, queda a 2 cuadras de la playa y alrededor hay muchas tiendas y supermercados donde se consigue de todo. 
Es algo pequeño,pero es confortable para dos. 
Marcela fue muy atenta, ya que el día que llegamos el calentador no funcionaba y nos solucionó el problema con mucha velocidad.  También, preguntamos si podíamos hacer el check out media hora más tarde y no tuvo ningún problema. 

Lo único para mejorar, siendo exquisito, es que había hormiguitas muy pequeñas en la cocina, y es donde comíamos de vez en cuando, por ello quizás molestaban un poco.
Apartamento com localização perfeita!
Very good location! Flat was clean but it would be good to have new towels, sheets and hand soap. Good wifi, no street noise and also bed was comfortable. I would stay there again.

El edificio es un poco viejo, pero la ubicación es la mejor de Ipanema. El departamento está en muy buen as condiciones para dos personas.

La televisión solo tiene canales básicos, lo que no hay problemas ya que a Río se viene a disfrutar la playa y no a ver televisión. 

Destaco el aire acondicionado que se encuentra en óptimas condiciones, junto al ventilador del techo. También destaco el agua de la ducha con la presión y temperatura precisa, junto con poseer  lavadora que le da un plus. 

Como recomendación sugiero que se incluya un jabón para el baño, al menos para el inicio de la estadía, como también artículos de aseo para limpiar el baño. 

La comunicación con Marcela fue solo a través de mensajes, lo que hace un poco impersonal el trato, pero al menos respondió a tiempo en todo.
Great place in Ipanema, close to many restaurants, supermakets, beach. Marcela was a great host, everything went as planned. Definitely recommend.
Apartment in one of the best blocks in Ipanema, Marcela was always quick to respond and everything met our expectations.

The place is very central and getting in and out is very easy. For the price, the apartment is great.

However, the blanket had a lot of dust on it and set off an allergic reaction for me, which was really unpleasant.
Muy buen departamento y excelente ubicación. El edificio es viejo y le falta un poco mantenimiento, pero el departamento es tal cual las fotos.
Excellent location. Clean, simple space. Very communicative host helped when the internet was out and when I forgot the keys in the apartment.

I enjoyed my stay here. The location is fantastic and it’s a secure building. The apartment was clean and had good kitchen facilities. Good air con and shower. It’s basically a studio so a good option if you will be out and about most of the day.
We loved our staying in Ipanema. All the information correspond to the description and Marcela is very responsive and great host. Will be back again.
Excelente anfitrião e localização excelente...

Marcela mostró en todo momento su hospitalidad de manera virtual puesto que nunca la conocimos en persona. 
Dejó una lista de recomendaciones útiles y respondió de manera inmediata a todos nuestros mensajes tanto antes como durante nuestra estancia.
La mayor puntuación del apartamento es su UBICACIÓN, zona segura, tranquila y cerca de absolutamente todo: supermercados, tiendas, playa, metro, restaurantes, etc.
El tamaño es ideal para una pareja. Todo lo encontramos limpio (sábanas, toallas, suelos, WC, cocina, etc.). El wifi funcionaba bien.

Los únicos puntos negativos no son demasiado relevantes pero los mencionamos como crítica constructiva para futuras mejoras:
-El agua caliente de la ducha no tenía presión.
-El congelador tenía tanto hielo que no cabía una botella grande de agua, pero al irnos se lo dijimos a la señora del aseo y desconectó el refrigerador para descongelarlo así que me imagino que eso se solucionó fácilmente.
-La tele tenía poca variedad de canales y pedía sacar y meter la tarjeta constantemente, quizás fuera un tema temporal de señal
-La ventana no cerraba (encajaba) 100%
-Tal y como se indica en la descripción del apartamento, no cuenta con jabón ni champú por lo que se requiere llevar o comprar allí. 

Si lo que quieren es un lugar seguro, tranquilo y PERFECTAMENTE ubicado, ésta es sin duda la MEJOR opción de Ipanema.

Wir hatten zwei super tolle letzte Tage in Rio - auch Dank Marcela's süßer Wohnung, die zentral in Ipanema gelegen ist. 
Das Appartment war blitzeblank, super ausgestattet (Küche) und die Kommunikation mit Marcela lief einwandfrei und sehr schnell.
Alles in allem seeeehr empfehlenswert!
Einziges kleines Manko: Die Wände sind sehr hellhörig, also Ohropax nicht vergessen ;)
Localização excelente e anfitriã super antenciosa.
Increíble host! Contestaba al segundo y muy atenta, el departamento tiene una perfecta ubicación!
Muito bem localizado. Tive uma ótima estadia!

The location is great! Only a couple blocks from the beach and the subway. Marcela was flexible with our check-in and quickly got us into the apartment. Highly recommended if you want to enjoy the beautiful beach of Ipanema.
Localização excelente! Super recomendo.
Maravilhosa experiência! Adoramos!!!
Tudo como o prometido. Ótima localização!
Apartamento muito bom, super bem localizado e com tudo que precisávamos! A Marcela foi uma ótima anfitriã!
Muy buena anfitrion, el dpto es tal cual las fotos

Marcela foi uma ótima anfitriã; super atenciosa e comunicativa. A localização é muita boa, o prédio é seguro e o apartamento silencioso! No entanto, algumas coisas deixaram a desejar em relação à infraestrutura que não estava conforme a foto (o apt. e as facilidades não estão muito conservados), o secador não funcionou e tinham muitas formigas que apareciam o tempo todo pelo chão. Apesar disso, foi uma boa estadia para um fim de semana. ;)
Localização excelente, apartamento arejado, espaço confortável. Recomendamos e voltaremos com certeza!!
Espaço excelente, muito gostoso, muito bem localizado, limpo, com ótimo estrutura de atendimento e apoio. Recomendo!
Recomendo.

LO MEJOR: La ubicación. la comunicación fluida con Marcela frente a cualquier pedido (early check in, Late chack out) y la ubicación...LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION> Cerca de todo (en Ipanema), entre puesto 9 y puesto 10. A 2 cuadras de la playa, a 2 cuadras del subte,. cerca de todos los Restaurants lindos para la salir a cenar. 
A MEJORAR: Poco, son solo detalles. nada importante.

Excelente nos fuimos super contentos. Marcela muy atenta a todas nuestras dudas y nuestras preguntas una anfitriona de lujo. El departamento cuenta con todo lo necesario para la estadía, la mejor ubicacion cerca de bares y restaurants y a dos cuadras de la playa y tres del shopping de leblon, movimiento de dia y de noche una zona maravillosa. Super agradecida a Marcela. La pasamos increible.

Excellent location -safe with doorman. we spent 5 nights for New Year’s eve. Marcella the owner was very responsive and adapted our check in hours it was appreciated.
However was expensive for the place and amenities (very basic). We would appreciate also more than 2 small soaps and detergent for the washer!

Location location location! This is a great studio in the right place. It has everything in it you could need for a short stay. There’s a doorman at the building who gave us the keys because and everything went smoothly. It looks exactly like the pictures.

name: City Center Rooftop
summary: New apartment located 5/10 minutes walking from main attractions, transports, local restaurants, night life, etc. Totally renovated, situated on the 6th floor with access by elevator, it counts with Kitchen and living room, 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom and terrace. The apartment as Wi-Fi, and cable TV. If you want to be in the center, in a calm neighborhood to relax, drink a Port wine while enjoying the sun in our terrace, this is the right spot.
space: Totally renovated, it counts with Kitchen and living room that can be separated by an electric blackout, 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom and terrace on the 6º floor. The apartment has Wi-Fi, and cable TV.
description: New apartment located 5/10 minutes walking from main attractions, transports, local restaurants, night life, etc. Totally renovated, situated on the 6th floor with access by elevator, it counts with Kitchen and living room, 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom and terrace. The apartment as Wi-Fi, and cable TV. If you want to be in the center, in a calm neighborhood to relax, drink a Port wine while enjoying the sun in our terrace, this is the right spot. Totally renovated, it counts with Kitchen and living room that can be separated by an electric blackout, 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom and terrace on the 6º floor. The apartment has Wi-Fi, and cable TV. The hosts will have full access to the apartment with no shared areas. We are a young couple that will be dedicated to provide our guests the best Porto experience possible. We both work and worked in tourism for a while.  Cátia, 26 years old, will be the person that will answer faster to your call. She worked as receptionist and animator in Hostels and Hotel
neighborhood_overview: It's a calm neighborhood, close to everything you will need to see and do. 5 minutes from comercial street, metro and train station, Cathedral, Luis I bridge, etc.
notes: Our prices don't include heating. Please do notice that at the amenities isn't mentioned. We do have extra blankets. We can provide a small heater to warm up the bedroom.
transit: In the city center parking is payed during week days, and free during weekends. If you arrive by plane, the best way from the airport is by Metro. You need to by "Andante" card and charge it with "Z4" zone that costs 1,85€. Catching the metro until the stop "Bolhão" and you are close from us. If you arrive by train, is normal that your destination is "Campanhã". To the center from there the best way is just changing Train to São Bento, one stop from there.
access: The hosts will have full access to the apartment with no shared areas.
interaction: We are a young couple that will be dedicated to provide our guests the best Porto experience possible. We both work and worked in tourism for a while.  Cátia, 26 years old, will be the person that will answer faster to your call. She worked as receptionist and animator in Hostels and Hotels, so she knows how to host! David, 27 years old, will be there for you as well, and he is a Walking tour guide in the city of Porto, so he can help you with any question or curiosity, but most important, A LOT of good recommendations!!!
house_rules: Not a big deal, take care about the house as if it was yours. We put a big effort to create a nice and comfortable space for you and the next person after you. Help us to have the best conditions possible. When you leave the apartment we ask for the dishes to be washed and the garbage taken out. Check in after 15h00/3PM Check in after 20h00/8PM under agreement. Check out 11h00/11AM. In the building there are other people living, so we need to respect the normal noise rules.

host.host_about: Hi, we are a young couple that loves to travel. But to host as well. Our motto is "be the kind of person you would like to meet."

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
L'appartement est formidable,idéalement situé à 5mn à pied de toutes les animations, une grande terrasse sur laquelle c'est un plaisir de prendre son café le matin. L'appartement est entièrement rénové, c'est agréable d'être dans du neuf. Il est au calme tout en étant dans une zone animée.
David nous a accueilli avec une carafe de Porto et beaucoup de gentillesse et de disponibilité. Il nous a indiqué toutes les bonnes adresses, plan à l'appui, on a tout fait et il a été de très bon conseil. Il est resté disponible par mail tout le temps si nous avions des besoins.
Nous recommandons vivement cette adresse et merci encore à David et Catia.

Foi o melhor apartamento onde já ficámos através da Airbnb! A Cátia e o David receberam-nos muito bem e foi fácil encontrar o local. À nossa espera tínhamos alguma comida e vinho do porto, bem como muitos guias e mapas para nos orientar pela cidade. Apesar da hora tardia, não hesitaram em dar-nos bastantes dicas para a nossa visita. 
A localização é mesmo muito central e a zona é sossegada. O apartamento é novo, bastante bem equipado e confortável. Acordar de manhã e aproveitar o sol na varanda foi especial. Estava tudo bastante limpo e arrumado. 
No dia da saída, como não entrava ninguém, deixaram-nos ficar à vontade até à hora de apanhar o comboio. Foi mesmo uma experiência cinco estrelas. 
Quando voltarmos, não hesitamos no local de estadia: este rooftop! 
Obrigada Cátia e David pela excelente recepção!
Very friendly. Catia took her time to tell us all the important spots. Apartment was also awesome!

Cátia and David have put a lot of thought into ensuring the flat is nicely furnished and well equipped, plus adding homely touches. They are caring and thoughtful hosts, contacting us before and during our time to check everything was fine. Thank you for remembering my birthday; a very special memory. Cátia provided a comprehensive overview of Porto when we met her at the flat and all her recommendations of what to see, where to go and restaurants to eat at were excellent. We didn't have time for your francesinha challenge Cátia but we'll take it up next time! The flat is in an excellent location; easy walking distance from attractions, but also in an area of great local bars and shops. Many happy times watching the world go by, and the football, at Cafe Java. And of course the roof top terrace is an excellent place to relax and enjoy wine, or beer, after a day of exploring the steep streets and many steps of Porto. We will most definitely be returning. Thank you Cátia and David.

El apartamento era igual que en las fotos. Muy bonito, muy céntrico y con todo lo necesario para la estancia. David y Catia tienen experiencia en tours y te explican perfectamente cualquier cosa que necesites.

Die Kommunikation mit Cátia und David verlief reibungslos. Check-in und check-out waren völlig unkompliziert. Cátia hat uns freundlich in Empfang genommen und uns bei einem Erfrischungsgetränk tolle Insider-Tipps für unseren Aufenthalt gegeben. Da wir eine knappe Woche in Porto waren, war es prima, dass Cátia uns auch Tipps für Portos Umland (tolle Strände etc.) geben konnte.

Die Wohnung ist grundsätzlich sauber, modern eingerichtet und liebevoll dekoriert. Die Dachterrasse ein Traum. 
Alles in allem hatten wir einen schönen Aufenthalt. Jedoch wurden während unseres Aufenhalts unter der Woche Bauarbeiten/Renovierungsarbeiten im Haus durchgeführt, weshalb wir durch eine teilweise starke Lärmkulisse gestört wurden. Am Wochenende haben wir davon nichts mitbekommen. Wenn die Renovierungsarbeiten abgeschlossen sind, steht aber auch einem längeren Aufenthalt in dieser Wohnung nichts im Wege.
Appartement très agréable , parfait pour passer un séjour à Porto

Tout était parfait. L'appartement est propre et la terrasse très agréable ! Bien situé, à proximité de tout. Surtout un grand merci à Catia pour l'accueil malgré le checkin tardif qui a pris le temps de nous donner plein de conseils autour d'un verre de Porto bien sur !

Staying at Catia's place was a dream. 
The apartment is clean, has everything you need and the rooftop is amazing. 
It's really close to the center. 
Catia took time to give us recommendations about Porto. And her addresses were good. 
I loved it !!! 
Thank you !

Catia et David ont facilité notre arrivée et surtout Catia à pris le temps de nous recommander les meilleures adresses de shoping, restaurants et visites. Le verre de bienvenue sur la terrasse est un moment privilégié. L'appartement est très bien situé et calme.

Herzlichen Dank an Catia! 
Die Unterkunft und die Tipps und Ratschläge von Catia waren TOP!
Wir haben die Dachterrasse jeden Tag und Abend genossen.
Es war klasse!
Dankeschön nochmals an Catia!
Perfect place in porto! Nearby city center with great rooftop.

Our stay at City Centre  Roof was top in every respect.  The modern apartment with   its amazing rooftop is located in the historic part of Porto.  It is spacious, very clean and lovingly decorated. Catia gave us a very warm welcome and provided us with ample information about the city, places to visit or restaurants to go to (we loved the Francesinha!!!).
We can definitely recommend this place to everyone travelling to Porto. Thank you very much,  Catia and David.
The apartment is great and better that photos. In the middle of Porto downtown so perfect position. I recommend it.

Catia was a lovely host and very welcoming when we arrived. Despite a small mix up she was easy to get hold of and resolved the problem immediately.

The apartment was perfect, great location and lovely outdoor area. Catia also helped with many recommendations at the beginning of our stay, all of which proved to be fantastic.

Would definitely recommend to anyone coming to visit Porto. 

Thank you!

Great apartment, and great communication from Catia. The rooftop deck was perfect. 

Recommendations for around town were spot on, and the apartment was in walking distance to all the main sights.
La casa es estupenda. Bien localizada y con una terraza estupenda. Es más grande de lo que parece en las fotos. Katia nos dio un montón de consejos súper útiles. Muchas gracias por todo

Catia was the best host imaginable! She gave us all insights to Porto & made us feel so welcome. The apartment was amazing with a perfect roof top terrace where we enjoyed a port wine while watching the sun go down - heaven! We will never forgot our time in Porto thanks to Catia!!

It was a really pleasant stay. Perfect location and a clean apartment. Really made our stay great! Also the communication with Cátia and David was very good and a quick response was certified. Would love to stay there the next time I am in Porto

Our stay at Catia and Davi's place was great. The apartment was super clean, spacious, and comfortable. And Catia & David were always responsive and friendly. We particularly appreciated all of their recommendations! I would absolutely recommend staying here.

Gostamos muito . Muito atencioso o vinho do porto e as frutas recebidas.
O apt. Estva muito limpo e arejado.. é bem dividido, o wi fi excelente e ha mapas e dicas suficientes deixadas pelos proprietáriosA cozinha apesar de nao termos utilizada é totalmente equipada e com bons utensílios.
A cama de casal é excelente e o sofa cama tb. 
O banheiro é grande o suficiente e as toalhas deixadas muito macias.O predio fica bem central. Transporte acessivel na rua. Restaurante chines/ japones muito gostoso ao lado do prédio.

Удобная замечательная квартира с прекрасным расположением в шаговой доступности от самых значимых мест в Порту. Отзывчивые, дружелюбные и гостеприимные хозяева, стремящиеся сделать ваше пребывание в городе интересным и незабываемым. Большое им спасибо!
Second time here good apartment I recommend
Cátia's house is awesome. She's very nice, helpful and professional. She gave us a lot of tips for eating, drinking and visiting. We like  her house so much.

Es uno de los mejores apartamentos de airbnb en los que he estado. Se agradece mucho que te reciban con una copa de Porto y te expliquen al detalle los lugares de interés de la ciudad.
Además, el apartamento esta totalmente equipado y muy ubicado para visitar la ciudad.
Calidad-precio inmejorable.
房子的位置靠近市中心,楼下是家日料,住在最高一层,有电梯｡阳台很漂亮,我很喜欢｡性价比很高!房东人也很好!

素晴らしいです｡
ｵｰﾅｰさんもとても親切!
中心地からも近いです｡ﾛｰｶﾙなﾚｽﾄﾗﾝも近くにあり､いい場所です｡ｵｽｽﾒします｡

It was very good.
The place is also good!
I recommande.
Thank you Cátia and David:)

Cátia & David’s place was one of the greatest airbnb experience I've ever had. It is located close to the train station and this rooftop terrace is to die for! Wish we stayed there longer. Catia met us even at 9pm, was very helpful and nice and gave us lots of local tips. Communication was easy. We will definitely come back to Porto some time and will stay at Cátia & David’s place - hope it will be available :)

This is a really nice apartment, much better than the pictures which don't really do it justice. The rooftop is lovely, especially in the mornings when it gets the sunshine. The place was really clean and everything inside is modern, it has everything you need but is done out in quite a minimalist way.

Within 10-15 minutes walk of pretty much anything you could want to do in Porto and a taxi-rank outside if you can't be bothered to walk.

The host is great and will give you some excellent recommendations for places to go in the city.

Be prepared to give your legs a good workout because this is a hilly place!

Appartamento nuovo e comodo con un bellissimo terrazzo... catia è stata gentilissima e ci ha dato un sacco di informazioni utili.. posizione ottima. In 5 minuti a piedi si arriva alla metro e alle attrazioni principali della città
We stayed for a few nights in this nice & clean apartment. Comfy bed in bedroom with dark curtains. Cátia very friendly. Recommended :)

L'appartement est très agréable, tout à fait fidèle aux photos et description. Spacieux, lumineux, confortable, bien équipé.
Catia est charmante et très accueillante, ses conseils ont été très précieux et utiles dans notre découverte de Porto. 
Je recommande les yeux fermés, le rapport qualité prix est juste imbattable ! Encore merci Catia de cet accueil !

Catia es fantástica, muy atenta con todo.
Nada más llegar nos señaló en un mapa los mejores sitios de Oporto. 
La casa es muy bonita, es mucho más grande que en las fotos, la terraza tiene mucho encanto y todo perfecto. Gracias por facilitarnos nuestra estancia. 
Seguro que repetimos¡MUY RECOMENDABLE¡ Besos
Everything was perfect, great flat, good location. Catia gave us really good tips and advices during check in. I recommand everyone to stay there ! Thanks again Catia.

Das Appartement liegt sehr zentral. Schon beim ersten hineingehen waren wir geflasht. Es ist liebevoll eingerichtet, verfügt über eine große Küche mit Ausstattung. Die Dachterasse ist wunderschön und lädt zu gemütlichen Abenden ein. Alles in allem perfekt !! Wir werden wieder kommen! Catia ist eine super Gastgeberin und jederzeit erreichbar!

Nous avons passé un séjour inoubliable à porto ! Catia nous a accueilli parfaitement et a pris le temps de nous donner beaucoup de conseils pour les restaurants et les balades. Elle a fait beaucoup d'effort pour essayer de nous parler en français ! Merci à elle. 
L'appartement est vraiment idéal, très moderne, propre et proche de toutes les commodités. 
Nous reviendrons certainement découvrir encore plus cette merveilleuse ville. 

Obrigado !!! 

Kenavo (au revoir en breton) 

Camille et Patricia

Appartement parfaitement situé, idéal pour un couple, parfaitement équipé.
Les explications de Catia sur l'environnement sont fournies et précieuses.
La terrasse doit être très agréable par beau temps

Very nice, spacious, clean and comfortable apartment, well equipped, with a great localisation and big wonderful rooftop terrace! I definitely recommend :) Catia is very nice and helpful, even agreed for a very late check-in (as our plane landed in Porto at night) and gave us some great advise. Made our vacation the best it could possibly be :) Thank you Catia for your hospitality and your friendly welcome!

Vaste appartement bien situé avec une magnifique terrasse.
Catia nous a breafé sur tous les bons plans, merci pour cet accueil

L'appartement est très bien situé , agréable, cosy et Cátia nous a donné de très bon plans et informations sur Porto. 
Un grand merci !
L'appartement est très bien, placé idéalement au coeur de Porto, le rooftop est idéal pour un weekend d'été, Célia est accueillante, arrangeante et au petit soin. Nous recommandons +++

We loved the flat. It was exactly as on the pictures. It is extremely well located right at the junction of the central streets and a ten minute walk down to the river. Catia gave us great recommendations of places to eat, drink and things to do.

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour dans l'appartement de Catia&David !
A notre arrivé à Porto, nous avons été très bien accueillis par Catia, qui nous attendait à l'appartement et nous a donné de nombreux conseils ! L'appartement est propre et très agréable, le rooftop est juste parfait pour prendre le petit-déj' ou l'apéro le soir !

El apartamento está muy bien ubicado cerca de la estación de trenes Sâo Bento y de muchas de las atracciones turísticas. 
Es excelente, tiene todo lo necesario para disfrutar de una confortable estadía. Absolutamente  recomendable.

The apartment was very bright, clean and comfortable. Terrace is lovely and we wish we had time and good weather to utilize is. The building has a Taxi stand very close by and it is walking distance from city's main attractions. Cátia was great with communicating regarding check-in and offered helpful tips for our short stay. The only thing we found a little disappointing was that hot water ran out when the three of us tried to take showers in a row. I'd suggest staggering them a little to let the water heat up again. If I come back to Porto I'd definitely stay there again.

Bonne communication avant notre voyage et exellent accueil ponctuel de Catia. Logement très bien placé qui permet de tout faire à pieds. Super appart propre, bien équipé et lumineux avec une terrasse bien exposée ou nous avons pris ptit dèj et appéros ...Bons plans de catia pour les ballades et restos.
Super séjour à Porto !

Endroit super bien situé, idéal pour un couple qui veut découvrir, durant quelques jour, la merveilleuse ville de Porto...
Accueil et disponibilité au top
À recommander

Vanessa & Nancy
La hospitalidad y generosidad de CaTia. Fue todo maravilloso!!

Loved having the rooftop patio during our stay! A short walk from the main historic area, it was great to come back after a day of sightseeing and relax. Catia & David were quick to respond leading up to our trip. On arrival, Catia provided an awesome list of suggestions of sights and restaurants so we didn't miss anything during our stay.
Nous avons passé un excellent séjour à Porto, l'appartement est lumineux, spacieux et bien décoré. Il est très bien situé pour les visites du centre historique.

A fantastic apartment, great location, prompt communications, easy check in, nice views, close to everything... couldn't ask for any more. 

Tip: Take the beautiful walk down to the Douro and get the Batalha lift back up. 2,50€ well spent!

This place is the perfect base for a trip in Porto - Catia was a really helpful host - the location is amazing and the balcony the dream ! Will definitely stay there again in my next visit 
Kata
It's my third time in this place! I recommend it very much
Perfect apartment with a great little roof terrace. Everything is clean and works well. Located 5 minutes walk from the centre. Definitely recommend.

Catiá warmly welcomed us at the apartment and provided a citymap, a good bottle port wine and all the information needed. 
The apartment is bright, recently renovated and even better than the pictures. The rooftop terrace is great! It's sunny, provides a great view and is very relaxing after a long day exploring Porto. The apartment is located on the 6th floor of the building (top floor, accessible with elevator). 

The neighbourhood is quiet and very well located. It is within walking distance to the city center, Ponte Dom Luís bridge, (grocery)shops, bars, restaurants and public transportation (bus, train, subway, taxi-stand in front of the apartment). Make sure you visit Casa Guedes for the best pork sandwich (5min. walk). 

Catiá was a great help on our last day when there weren’t any luggage lockers left at São Bento trainstation. We highly recommend the apartment and off course Catiá as host!

Bonito apartamento a pocos metros del centro de Oporto. Muy bien comunicado y cerca de tiendas, restaurantes y estacion de tren. Disfrutamos de la terraza todos los dias, muy agradable especialemente por la mañana cuando dá el sol.
Catia y David fueron muy atentos y nos ayudaron a movernos y vistar los mejores sitios de la ciudad. 

Sin duda,  un apartamento y experiencia muy  recomendable
Had a great stay, very central, great outside space and comfy beds. Catia and David were also very good at communications and extremely flexible with our check in and out. Thanks!

Casa cerca del centro, se puede ir a pie a todas partes. Estupenda terraza, todo muy limpio y pasamos unos días geniales, Catia muy amable y simpática, nos dio todo tipo de informaciones sobre Oporto. Volveremos seguro!! Gracias Catia!!

Absolutely perfect! This flat suited us perfectly for a few days in Porto.
It was very clean and modern with a spectacular roof-deck . We found the location ideal and enjoyed our walks down to the riverside.
Catia was was a very lovely host! Thank you :)

This apartment is the perfect place from which to explore Porto. The location could not be better, just a very short walk from the major attractions in an interesting vibrant neighbourhood with great restaurants, coffee bars and supermarket. The apartment is very clean and comfortable and were greeted by a welcoming glass of Port. We loved having the large balcony. Cátia and David provide great tips for eating and sightseeing. Don't miss a meal at the recommended local restaurant. Also the sushi restaurant downstairs is fantastic. These things made our trip to Porto a further joy.
I mistakenly left a jacket in the apartment and Cátia went out of her way to find it and mail it to me. I really appreciated her willingness to help.
We highly recommend booking a stay here while visiting the beautiful city of Porto.
Super nice stay. Special thanks to Catia, super friendly host! The apartment was even better then on pictures. I recommend it for everybody!

Catia was very flexible with our check in despite a delay In our arrival.  The rest of the stay was perfect, with port waiting for us at check in and the beautiful balcony to take in the views. Would definitely return!

Zuerst vielen Dank an Catia. Alles an und in der Wohnung entsprach voll unseren Erwartungen. Wir würden jederzeit wieder hier übernachten, da auch die Lage hervorragend ist. Die Tipps von Catia für Unternehmungen waren absolut klasse und entsprachen unseren Erlebnissen.

Cátia met us outside when we arrived and was friendly, flexible, and ready with local tips. The apartment was too notch, sparkling clean with all amenities and was in a great location. Highly recommend!
Accueil sympa appartement agréable avec terrasse panoramique et Porto à l'arrivée tout est bien dans le mellleur des mondes
Really good location. Stylish and clean apartment where the owner is very helpful and clearly knows the city well. We will return as it is a beautiful apartment in a wonderful city.
The place was lovely, clean and very central. Easy walking distance to all sights. The welcome gift was very generous and the advice for port tours and other sightseeing activities was great.

Nice and clean flat at the edge of the old town centre. River and historical sights in walking distance, Tourist busses stop right outside the door. I didn't hear any traffic noise as the appartment is on the 6th floor. Great balcony! The welcome was lovely with travel tips and a glass of Port. The only negativ thing was that it was quite cold in January as there is no central heating. There is a a little electric heater though.

Très joli appartement et très bien situé, à l'extérieur des avenues principales et à seulement quelques minutes de marche de celles-ci. Catia est une très bonne hôte elle nous a donné de précieux conseils en arrivant tout en nous offrant un verre de porto. Seul point négatif l'appartement ne possède pas de chauffage central, il faisait donc un peu frisquet quand le temps n'était pas au beau fixe.

Apartamento excelente, com ótima localização. Cátia nos deu ótimas dicas locais e facilitou muito a estadia e turismo em Porto.
Recomendo fortemente !
Catia et David sont des hôtes exceptionnels dans un appart bien plus grand qu'il n'y paraît ! Avec une terrasse superbe et bien exposée. Propreté au top et communication facile et évidente.

The apartement is clean and near the center. Catia was very very nice and reactive. The bottle of porto and the pastéis de nata as welcome gifts were really appreciated and generous. Just one problem, the temperature. The room was ok with the small electric heater but the rest of the apartement had no heating and was so COLD. In summer it should be perfect but in the winter...
Catia and David should buy an other heater from the living room.

Ich kann dieses Appartment nur empfehlen. Wir waren für eine Woche in Catia Wohnung und es ist alles wie man es auf den Fotos sieht. Besonders hervorzuheben ist die Sauberkeit der Küche. Die Lage ist wirklich gut. Man geht ein paar Meter und schon ist man mitten in der Stadt. Ein Aufzug ist auch vorhanden. Die Dachterasse ist sehr schön und groß, aber leider konnten wir sie aufgrund des Wetters nicht so richtig nutzen. Von der Straße oder von irgendwelchen Nachbarn hört man nicht viel, so dass man auf jeden Fall einen ruhigen Schlaf hat. Einzig das Bett war mir etwas zu weich, aber für ein paar Tage geht auch das. Die KOmmunikation mit Catia hat problemlos funktioniert. Sie antwortete auf (Hidden by Airbnb) Nachrichten sehr schnell und hat uns unten an der Straße empfangen, so dass der Check in problemlos war. Sie hatte auch ein paar tolle Tipps für uns. Von mir gibt es eine klare Empfehlung für Catia und diese Wohnung.
A beautiful, well stocked flat. Great location and lovely outside space for when the weather is nice. Plenty of blankets and hot water.
Apartment is in a great location within walking distance to everything. The hosts were really helpful throughout our stay.

Wir wurden sehr nett von Chris empfangen, die uns dann auch einige gute Insidertipps zu Porto gegeben hat. Das Apartment ist super schön eingerichtet und man hat alles was man benötigt. Was uns am meisten gefallen hat war die zentrale Lage und es ist trotzdem total ruhig  der einzige Kritikpunkt ist der Balkon (sehr schön aber leider überhaupt nicht gepflegt und die Bilder zeigen einen anderen Zustand) und es war etwas staubig. Sonst alles perfekt
Sehr schöne Ausstattung, geräumig und sauber. Die Dachterrasse ist ein Highlight!
Een fijn appartement op een perfecte lokatie. Dicht bij openbaar vervoer mogelijkheden. Een aanrader.

Bonjour,
Hôtes très sympathiques, l'appartement est très propre et la terrasse agréable s'il fait beau. Il est situé dans une grande rue mais franchement c'est très calme la nuit, les fenêtres fermées (ce n'est pas forcement simple à porto où les constructions sont assez vieilles). Nous avons tout fait à pied mais attention ça grimpe!
Great location, great patio area to relax on, overall lovely apartment.  I’d stay here again.  Host is super responsive.
Sehr schöne, zentrale und trotzdem ruhige Wohnung mit toller Terrasse . Sehr ausführliche Tipps vom Gastgeber.
Lovely apartment in a great location. Would definitely recommend!

We really enjoyed our stay in this comfortable apartment.  It's in a great location - really easy to orientate and get to key areas quickly. There's a supermarket only a 5 minute walk away and you are really close to St Bento station.  Amenities were good and we even cooked a few times! The fan in the bedroom was a godsend at night to keep the apartment cool.

The apartment is very clean and stylish, in a great location and has a lovely outdoor space- I'd definitely stay here again. 
Catia met us when checking in and was really helpful giving us directions to local shops and recommendations for restaurants. Perfect host!
Porto is beautiful, id love to visit again and I'd definitely stay here again!
El piso está muy bien, tal como sale en las fotos.
A good place in a good location
Great location, lovely rooftop terrace, very good check in with local tips. Porto is beautiful, we will certainly return!

The apartment is perfect located between old and new Porto city center. 
Is nearby alsmost everyting. My sister and I walked almost everything downtown. 
It’s has a lovely balcony! Very large apartment!

Catia & David's apartment is perfect, with a large open kitchen, dining and living area, large double bedroom and large balcony which was great to enjoy breakfast in the sun and evening drinks. The apartment is fully equipped, with a supermarket just 10min walking distance. Famous Sao Bento station is less than a 10min walk so easy to catch a train to Campahna, a beach or elsewhere. The main bridge is also a 10min walk whilst the riverfront with a range of bars and restaurants are a 15min walk. There are also taxis directly outside if you need. Chris met us on arrival and was very helpful in explaining the area and places of interest. Would definitely recommend and stay again. Thank you!

Lovely apartment in the most fantastic location within walking distance of everything. The balcony is a real treat with views across Porto. Thanks to the hosts for being brilliant and giving us some great tips and organising us a cab to the airport.
Good location, communicatie but I missed the authentic Airbnb feeling

Cátia and David’s place was great. It was the perfect size and in a convenient location for walking to everything we wanted to see. It was clean, check in and out were easy and Cris gave us some great tips and recommendations for things to do. We especially loved sitting out on the deck in the evenings.

Bright, modern and cosy flat, very well located in the heart of Porto, making everything reachable by foot easily. It's conform to the pictures and the terrace is particularly enjoyable! Even though its located on a big street, there is absolutely no noise inside with windows closed. 
It is a bit short in kitchen equipment for more than two persons (only two wine glasses, two cups) and in basic stuff (no coffee, tea).
There has been a bit of a mess-up with cleaning (neglicted bathroom) but mistakes can happen. 
Unfortunately, we didn't have the chance to meet Catia or David, but we appreciated flexible check in and out. 
Good place to stay overall!

Simple, Big and Nice.
Next to the old city, train station and supermarket. very safe.
We liked it and we will be happy to come again.
Thanks Rami & Ruth

My wife and I stayed here on our trip to Portugal. This apartment was in a great location for walking around Porto. Catia & David’s hospitality was wonderful! We were welcomed with custard pies and port wine. Catia provides helpful information for places to go and things to do. They were super responsive when we had question. I would highly recommend this apartment.
Apartamento en una situación inmejorable con una terraza enorme que sin duda es su gran valor. Cátia es una excelente anfitriona, sus consejos han sido muy prácticos
Great central location, nice balcony, lots of local amenities nearby, easy to get to from airport.

Large, bright, modern, clean space in a very convenient location ever so slightly off the tourist part but very close enough to enjoy all Porto's beauty and explore some local neighborhoods.  This location would get six stars if I could. Easy check-in, friendly and helpful advice on where to go and a huge space with a wonderful roof terrace to relax on.

Great value, outstanding hosts who will provide good information, very clean, very modern full kitchen - nice tile bathroom, comfortable and private.
Apartamento muy bien ubicado y con buenas instalaciones. La terraza es bastante grande. Todo muy limpio y una acogida inmejorable

It was really clean and calm. 
Kind information about city tour.
Thanks!

La casa de Catia y David es perfecta para pasar unos días en Oporto. La ubicación es excelente. Estas al lado de todo. Tuvieron el detalle de dejarnos un vino de porto y unos pasteles de nata, típicos portugueses, a nuestra llegada.  Estaba todo muy limpio y agradable.

Habríamos agradecido algún calefactor más, ya que ahora en noviembre hemos notado más el frío.

Wonderful place with two large rooms, very clean and cozy, and with a great terrace overseeing the Douro valley. Maybe the most important thing about this place - PERFECT LOCATION! Within walking distance to most iconic places in Porto, but also to a few great bars♣ areas.
A vey cozy, comfortable, and well located place. If I have the chance to visit Porto again, I will stay here, for sure.  Thanks Cátia & David.

Logement très bien situé, ponctualité et accueil très sympa ! Réactivité par mail des hôtes ! Conforme à la description et très confortable !
Je recommande vivement, rien à dire de plus !

Our stay at Catia and David's was great! Their friend checked us in and provided several local suggestions which was really helpful. The location made it easy to walk everywhere. And some treats were left for us which was a very nice touch! Would definitely recommend.
Gostamos muito!

Great apartment with plenty of space and outside terrace a bonus. Short walk to the main attractions and Old Town, plenty going on in Porto for New Year celebrations, plenty of restaurants nearby. Unfortunately the communal lift broke down after 1 day and was left unrepaired for the rest of the stay which was very inconvenient as it was approx. 100 steps up and down to the 6th floor but this couldn't possibly be accounted for by the home owners.

Прекрасное жилье - чисто, уютно, шикарная терраса. Шаговая доступность от всех достопримечательностей.
Гостеприимные хозяева рассказали, что и где посмотреть, побаловали вином и пирожными.

Voyage décevant, malgré un accueil formidable avec des petites friandises ce fut un calvaire de dormir la bas.  En effet cet appartement n'est pas adapté aux frileux. Moins de 10 degrés dans l'appart le soir ,  devoir dormir avec des énormes pulls joggings chaussettes n'est pas normal. Le petit chauffage n'a de chauffage que le nom.  Justifier le prix par la non présence de chauffage est impossible. En effet nous avons rencontré des gens qui ont payé le même prix chauffage compris dans la même localisation. De plus les deux premiers jours le bruit du toit fut insupportable (preuve a l'appui) d'énormes claquements.  Et un évier de salle de bain bouché (preuve a l'appui). bref en soit l'appart est vraiment joli mais le confort n'est pas là en hiver. Je pense que dans l'état actuel il devrait être loué qu en été. Désolé mais pour moi c'est une vraie déception.
체크인도 잘 해주시고 주변정보도 잘알려주시고 숙소도 넓고 주방이용도 편했고 샤워하기에 물도 따듯하다 못해 뜨거울정도라 매우 좋았습니다. 화쥐뫈 봠에 눠무 츄워요우.

name: 8th floor Delightful Balcony Suite w/ Ocean Views
summary: My place is close to parks, great views, art and culture, hulas, diamond head, shopping, transport, surfing, great food, cheap food, nightclubs. You’ll love my place because of the people, the outdoors space, the ambiance, the neighborhood, location, easy access. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

You’ll love my place because of the people, the outdoors space, the ambiance, the neighborhood, location, easy access. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

You’ll love my place because of the people, the outdoors space, the ambiance, the neighborhood, location, easy access. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. Free Luggage Storage Onsite Our Guest Host will meet you at the property for your check-in and give you keys Aloha - Here is the important contact information; We have a Guest Host who will meet you at the property for you
neighborhood_overview: Outdoor activities are countless from this location. Restaurants and international shopping are bountiful nearby. Fast food to 5 star dinning is available. Enjoy the unique Kapahulu Ave. for dinning and shopping with the locals. Hawaiian food, Hawaiian artifacts and Hawaiian clothing are all available withing walking distance. Two blocks from the public library and a botanical garden and a short distance to Diamond Head Theater or the Saturday Farmer's Market at Kapiolani Community College.
notes: FREE ‘Fiber100' high speed Wireless Internet and Advantage Plus TV with 225+ channels
transit: - Uber and Lyft are available in Honolulu and Waikiki - 'Biki' bikeshare is available throughout Waikiki & Honolulu - Try out 'Segway' tours of Waikiki, using their stand-up scooters  - Convenient public transportation options include 'TheBus' and the 'Waikiki Trolley' - Taxis are another great way to travel when in a group and the cost can be shared. You can find taxi stands at hotels, most major shopping malls and at the airport. Note that using taxi stands and calling for pick-ups by phone or via hotel concierge is the norm in Hawaii rather than hailing a cab.
access: Free Luggage Storage Onsite Our Guest Host will meet you at the property for your check-in and give you keys
interaction: Aloha - Here is the important contact information; We have a Guest Host who will meet you at the property for your check-in. Our process is to meet guests for their arrival at the property. It's important to call my Guest Host at ** (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ** when you arrive at the Honolulu Airport. That way he will know when to meet you at the property. This number only accepts calls, no text messages.  We also have a live answering service who will take a message if our Guest Host is unable to pickup immediately, please leave a message and our Guest Host will get back to you usually within 15 minutes Sincerely, Mark G.H., Property Manager, Hawaii Americana Realty

host.host_about: Real Estate Broker

reviews.comments:
This is a cozy, studio-sized apartment. Room was clean, neat and tidy upon arrival and the room is as described.
  
While the building has been around for awhile (it's old), the location is situated in the quieter part of Waikiki which is perfect. The beaches are just around the corner and plenty of shops to buy food/drink.  Teddy's Burgers on the ground floor was the BEST!

The view of Diamond Head from the room's balcony is FAB and you can see the water and beach too. Definitely loved the views from the room.

Note that the bar located on the 2nd level can be loud at night but I closed the balcony doors which mostly shut out the noise. (I mean, it's Waikiki...there'll be noise at night). 

Rob met me at the front entry when I checked in and was great at getting me settled in. He was also very fast in responding to a question about the room and was very approachable.

This apartment is good if you are a solo traveller (possibly a couple, but you would need to be comfortable in a studio-sized place), and want to stay for a few days in the quieter part of town.  The features in the place are a bit worn, but everything worked and it was perfectly fine for me and I enjoyed my stay here. Thanks.

Great view from our balcony and excellent part of town with very good access to restaurants, beach, and night life.  Check in and check out were quick and easy.  Apartment was clean, comfortable, and cozy.  Would recommend.

Very good.
Little bit expensive tough.

I was able to make the reservation quickly. Thank you! The location and view was superb, and having a kitchenette with a two-burner stove was a key reason I booked this place. The only negative aspect of our stay was the extremely uncomfortable bed--way too soft, practically folding in half when sat upon. :( It affected our overall satisfaction, hence the two stars.

Everything as described in the listing.  The view is absolutely incredible!! Can see diamond head, the zoo (elephants!), as well as the ocean. Just around the corner from the beach.  Very easy and a nice stay.

The place was exactly as listed. The view is incredible and a two block walk to the beach!! Rob made us feel welcomed and got us situated right when we arrived! Overall, a great place to stay and would definitely recommend!
We enjoyed our holiday stay at Mark's wonderful airbnb. Great value for a great location. Would recommend!

Pictures were very accurate I loved the patio thank you for your extra effort in cleaning and doing the windows I'm swifted the floors every day the bed could be a little harder I did turn it around would seem to make it better I had a delightful stay and would look forward to renting your unit again thank you PS a Fresh coat of paint could be suggested

Perfect location!  Home was just as listed.  Rob was so kind to accommodate our late check in since our flight was delayed.  Mark answered all my questions in a timely manner.  Highly recommend his place

We stayed for five nights, here are the pluses and minuses:
+view from balcony and roof top fantastic
+kitchen well stocked
+beach towels, beach chairs convenient for short walk to the beach
+AC works great (blocks out noise from the street)
+bus stops within walking distance
+ABC store and LuLu's restaurant close by for food
+dresser and closet (with hangers) nice for longer stays
-bed is uncomfortable
-Street can be noisy

The scenery is beautiful! I think this is in a great place, close to everything and very convenient. The bed was very soft but can get used to it. While there is a kitchen, the stove wasn't really powerful and not enough pottery, so cooking wasn't really easy but one can manage. Other than that I can highly recommend this place! I would definitely go back!

Great location right by Waikiki Beach! Wonderful view of both Waikiki and Diamond Head from the balcony and also the publicly accessible rooftop. Spacious enough for a single or a couple. Highly recommended!
Excellent place with a great view!! Good price right in the heart of Waikiki!! And doesn't charge all the extra BS! Very awesome place!

Mark was very accommodating, I couldn't thank him enough. I was able to book his apartment last minute and same day. It is located at the edge of the main strip of Waikiki Beach. Everything is within walking distance and the view was spectacular! I highly recommend both Mark as a host and his apartment!

This is a great location which makes up for the little bit dated amenities. But the welcome was very nice, service was great too. It is really a worthwhile place to stay at. The view is great as well as the proximity to the beach, the zoo, lots of restaurants and all of Waikiki within walking distance. Great spot.

We were on our Honeymoon & what a great Location to be in. The heart of Waikiki Beach, we loved walks on the beach. The zoo directly across from us, was the Best experience  for us. Best restaurants down stairs who can ask for anything else. We did not rent a car but this location was walkable to shopping food & Waikiki beach, the shuttle picked us up if we wanted to go around the Island, was a dream vacay. 
Mahalo.
Mr. & Mrs. Wisdom.
8-12-2017

The room was great - not luxurious but perfect for what we needed - a place close to the beach and Waikiki Strip, with a small kitchenette so we could prepare some of out own  meals.  The views were great  - both of the beach and Diamond Head. Not a lot of space but enough to feel comfortable.  There is a bar on the 2nd floor but we didn't hear any noise from it - nor from the street except for a few very loud trucks.  Bed is a little soft but we were so tired fro each day's activities that it didn't  hamper our sleep.

Our stay at Mark's place was a very good one. The check-in was easy & everyone working there was very nice. Mark and his staff were quick &  responsive to our needs. The place is very nice having everything that we needed. The room is located within a hotel. The hotel staff was very nice and friendly. They offer parking for small fee and is monitored. The view from the balcony was absolutely beautiful. The view from left to right included Diamond Head, the Honolulu Zoo, and Wikiki Beach. Diamond Head is a short drive, the zoo is across the street and there is a shaded park outside of it to relax, and the beach is a block away.  Along the beach is lots of places to shop and eat. We walked to the Hawaiian Hilton Village
 (about a 15 minute walk)  where we joined others on the beach to enjoy the Friday night fireworks, which were awesome! Kudos to Mark and his staff. Would stay again.

We stayed at Mark's room at the Waikiki Grand Hotel in rooms 805 and 811. Mark was very easy to communicate with and very helpful. I liked just having a key code to open the room instead of an actual key. We loved the view from the 10th floor community balcony. We watched a few sunsets up there. Spectacular. We stayed in room 805 the first night. There was a small problem with the room, which was not Mark's fault at all, and unfortunately there would not be a Technician out to fix it for a couple days. I thought it was no big deal and we would carry on but to our surprise Mark offered to switch us to room 811 across the hall in the same Hotel. We were amazed by his generosity and very grateful! Both rooms are very nice and clean and well stocked. Both rooms had Beach gear, like boogie boards, flippers, snorkeling gear etc. But room 811 has a view over the Honolulu Zoo and Diamond Head and of course Waikiki Beach. If you stay at one of Mark's rooms at the Waikiki Grand Hotel we would definitely recommend getting one with a view. The location of this hotel is awesome. One block from the Beach! Across the street from the Honolulu Zoo! 7 minute bus ride on the #2 bus to Diamond Head, which is a great hike! Spectacular views! Get there early they open at 6am. 30 minute bus ride, with great views along the way, to Hanauma Bay on Bus #22. The best snorkeling experience on the island I'm sure. Also if you stay on the #22 bus for a little longer, past Hanauma Bay is the Sea Life Park bus stop and if you cross the road there then you will find a little place call Makapu'u Beach! This is a very secluded beach. When we went there was only maybe 10 people on the beach. Very scenic! There is a great restaurant on the corner near the Waikiki Grand called Lulu's, which has great breakfast at decent prices and also has a large section overlooking the beach. Also on the first floor of the Waikiki Grand is Teddy's Burgers. They have a very good burger. On the second floor of the Waikiki Grand is night club called Hulu's. Hulu's had a great show the Saturday night we were there. All and all we loved the location of this hotel. The fact that it is at the very end of Waikiki Beach made if feel less crowded. Its a phenomenal location for sure. Oh and there is Diamond Head Luau which is a 10 minute walk from the Waikiki Grand Hotel. That was a blast. Great food and fire dancing and everything you can think of that a Luau would have. Amazing. Things to avoid are the taxis! Wow $50 to get from the airport to Waikiki. We downloaded the Uber app and asked (Hidden by Airbnb) directions using the bus to...

Great unit that suited our needs perfectly!  The private deck is great for relaxation or head up to the 10th floor for a wide-open experience.  We appreciated that there were beach chairs / boogie boards available to use.

Also, this unit is convenient to everything you could ever need, but allows you to avoid the crowds.  Make sure to check out Mimi's Empanadas just around the corner on Cartwright!  Also, be sure to look for free parking on Monsarrat Ave.

Will definitely stay again on our next trip!
Beautiful view!

When we arrived in Honolulu on Jan 25, 2018 we called the guest host from the airport as we had been instructed to do. We were shocked and horrified to be told they did not have a reservation for us. This in spite of the fact I had received a communication from them earlier in the day telling me how the key pad was coded. 
By the time we arrived at the Waikiki Grand (which is where his Airbnb is located) they had obtained a hotel room with an ocean view for us. We were told our reservation “didn’t make it from one system to another “ 
We were told it was an upgrade but looking at the pictures of Mark’s Airbnb, we had reserved and paid in Sept 2017, it was not. It was marginally adequate- at least we weren’t on the street!!
Once we asked they supplied us with an induction cooktop, a pot, frying pan (that didn’t work on induction), some utensils, dish towels, beach towels and mats
All we wanted was the room we reserved! We expected more from Airbnb based on our previous experiences! This has clouded our view of Airbnb and not sure we will use it again! 
In hindsight I should have contacted Airbnb immediately for support, rather than waiting until our vacation was over
Great location! Boogie boards, beach umbrella and chairs were nice. Joey was very helpful.

Mark's place is very near Waikiki beach. Malls, restaurants and grocery stores are nearby/walking distance. We booked 1 room for my husband and I, but we had problems with tv & wifi connectivity, so we were transferred (upgraded) immediately to a room with balcony. Thanks again Mark for sharing your space with us. We had a grand time in Honolulu.
Unit 811 was ideal for our 5 night stay , being close to the esplanade and all the associated shopping and restaurants. The view from the balcony is amazing.

Great studio apartment in a hotel. There were no other buildings blocking the view, just Diamond Head and the beach to wake up to every morning. Would definitely recommend it as a nice place to stay near the beach, restaurants, and shops of Waikiki. Ample parking nearby and even some free spots on the street by the zoo! Awesome value for a trip to Oahu.

I really enjoyed my stay!  The room was everything you needed for a easy, beachy stay in Waikiki!  The room had all the comforts I needed and an inspiring view of Diamond head to wake up to everyday!  Can't wait to be back soon! :]

This room is in a fantastic location just a hop, skip and a jump to the beach which we really really enjoyed.  It was fantastic to just stroll to the beach and back without too much effort.  Starbucks is on the corner and handy plus the bar on the second floor of the building has a great happy hour(s) with great cocktails.
This is not someones home however and lacks a few things in relation to that.  It is an old property and a little tired in our opinion.  It is airconditioned which was nice to come back to everyday however half the balcony is flooded from airconditioner which is not great when your towels and swimmers blow in to the water while they are meant to be drying. 
I would stay in this building again as the location was fantastic however maybe not in  this unit.

Fantastic location. Walkable distance to  attractions and food. Parking available at Zoo. Amazing views of beach and hinterland from balcony.
Tired and dated property. Minor items needing fixing. Cosy for 2.
The location of this place can't be beat. The view from the balcony of Diamondhead and the ocean are incredible.
Ótima localização, vista espetacular.
Super emplacement, bien situé

The location of this apartment was amazing! Beautiful views of both Waikiki beach and Diamond Head.  We loved sitting on the balcony admiring the views and enjoying the beach and local restaurants.  The accommodation was perfect for our holiday.  It had all the amenities we needed.  We would definitely stay here again!
Everything as expected. Mark was very responsive with any questions. A pleasure doing business with him.

The view. It was beautiful and definitely worth it. We were able to wake up and go to bed looking out at diamond head and the beach. It’s definitely something worth experiencing and remembering. But! After our first night, the neighboring guests next to us and above us were loud. At one point, the people next to us seemed to be arguing for a couple hours early in the morning which woke us up and the people above us kept moving what sounded like a table and chairs across the floor. It caused our room to creak with the movement throughout the day. The restaurant below us on the second floor also played their music loud which made things difficult when you’re trying to go to bed early to get an early start the next day. Other then things that were out of our real control, the room was nice and the bed was really comfortable. It was so soft and welcoming after a busy day of exploring the town. Either way, we both really enjoyed our stay. Thank you so much.

I wouldn't stay here again. Loud noise from the street, from the nightclub below, and from the cheap window unit AC. Was wishing I'd brought earplugs. Sliding door feels like it has no rollers, bathroom door doesn't close all the way, and handle falls off the louver windows. No fan in the bathroom. No screens on the windows. We both woke up with mosquito bites. Shower temp is unpredictable: I gave up waiting and just got in the luke warm shower.

The view is beautiful though, and the location is convenient. If the louvers were replaced with casement windows that seal out the noise, and the AC was replaced with a split system or something quieter (+ a few other maintenance fixes) , then this could be a lovely place to stay.
Good location close to the beach and restaurants.

Amazing view and prefect location! LGBT friendly bar on the second floor. 
But I'm competently agree with review below (Joe, December 2018) apartment need some improvement. 
Also we had some issues with the staff on lobby.  First of all on the third day of stay they tried to move us from this apartment to the BASEMENT!!!  I had two pretty nasty conversations with different Grand Hotel representatives. After we refused to move to anywhere they made new trouble for us. When we came to the hotel in the evening our parking lot was occupied. The employee on the lobby said: - it was another mistake you do not suppose to have parking spot because you did not warn manager while you check in. But I did, I already paid and got specific parking lot and permit.  So after some arguing she gave me permit for another parking lot.   All this problems was really unexpected. Just be aware.

The place is a great location and the view is spectacular! Comfortable for any couple wanting to relax in Hawaii. This place is by so many great restaurants and an amazing beach that we didn’t have to go far to have a great time

Très petit studio, très modeste, propre, bien situé qui pourrait correspondre aux besoins d’une personne seule. Difficile d’y cuisiner par manque d’accessoires de base convenables incluant une cuisinière et une hotte.   Très difficile de s’y déplacer tellement que c’est petit.

Best location, great views and close to everything but the same time far enough from the crowds
One block walk to the beach.
I’ll be going back in November.

name: Bragas House - Porto Center 2C
summary: Bragas House is an old house rehabilitated nineteenth century to modern times, with a youthful style in the Center of Porto. The kitchen is open and common with the living room, where guests can cook and eat in a group or alone.
space: Bragas House is an old house rehabilitated nineteenth century to modern times, with a youthful style. It consists of 15 rooms, and has 8 toilets and 7 showers. The kitchen is open and common with the living room, where guests can cook and eat in a group or alone. Guests should expect a peaceful and comfortable stay, sharing experiences with other cultures. The house also has a garden with barbecue where guests can peacefully enjoy the wonderful nights of Porto, accompanied by good food and good drink. In addition, the house has a laundry room (free) for guests who want to wash and dry their clothes. Bragas House is situated in the historic center of Porto, 5/6 minute walking from the main avenue of the city (Avenida dos Aliados) and the whole night area - bars and nightclubs. In this zone are also the best bars, clubs, restaurants and shops in the city, offering a plural choice for everyone. Very near the house there are metro lines, bus and train. What makes this place unique is its p
