address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: It was just perfect! Thanks
Nice House with Hostel-atmosphere. The room was clean and especially the kitchen and garden very nice. Good accomodation to visit Porto.

Bragas house was described very accurately, a very beautiful staircase, very nice common area of kitchen, garden and a place to grill,  the building is an old one restored to be during the year a student house and hostel during the summer months. The host was very kind and helpful. We definitely recommend to stay when looking a convenient place, downtown and on budget!
Nice hostel with Great Kirchen and like backyard
Quartier agréable ,proche du centre de Porto à pied

Very nice place! Bragas was really nice to us and helpful. Close to the centre and if you arrive by car he will let you know where to park for free. Both check in and check out are really flexible. I would come back.
Muy buen alojamiento, muy cerca del centro, baños compartidos bastante limpios y no tuve ningún problema para comunicarme con Bragas. Totalmente recomendado para unos días en Oporto.

The place was great and the room was clean and comfortable. 
In the kitchen there's everything you need and even a washing machine is provided.
I would absolutely recommend it for that price!

Bragas house is more of a sort of hostel with around 12 bedrooms, a shared bathroom per floor and a common kitchen. The house needs some work and the bedrooms are not the cosiest but it is enough if you enjoy a full day out and return just to sleep. The location is good and close to everything in Porto
Practical location to discover the city centre, the place is quite clean even if the bathroom are shared with many other guests. The athmosphere is nice an the host is helpful.
Sitio agradable, buen ambiente, cerca deo centro y patio espectacular

Accueil sympa, locaux spacieux, propres et bien équipés, proximité du centre-ville... tout était très bien, à part que la chambre donne sur une rue un peu bruyante la nuit. Mention spéciale pour le jardin, très agréable pour le petit-déj!

We loved our stay at Bragas' place. Great location, walkable to everything and a cute café on the corner. Room was clean, spacious and comfortable. The communal areas were lovely! Nice big eat in kitchen with best organised fridge I have seen in any place I've stayed! Would definitely recommend.
Atentos, amable, familiares, simplemente no podría a ver sido mejor, la casa y sus instalaciones perfectas y muy limpio todo.
We have the best time in Porto and loved staying at this hostel. The kitchen is amazing and you can cook whatever you like! The rooms are quite spacious and it's close to everything in Porto!
Very good for a quick stay in porto. The kitchen is well equipes and the bathrooms are clean. The house is also very central.
La habitación es mucho más pequeña de lo que parece en las fotografías, no obstante el trato ha sido correcto y por su precio está bien.

Got bitten by bed bugs or something similar :(  rows of 3 or 4 bites in clusters over my arms & legs. We had a private room so may be just that mattress.  Take precautions.

Otherwise everything else was good, nice location & place. Everything we needed.

Logement propre, accueillant et proche à la fois du centre ville et du métro! 
Parfait pour un séjour à porto

This was a great place, great location,  good communal area and garden and only 10 mins into the centre of town. Check in was quick and easy and the place was very clean as a cleaning lady came to clean the communal bathrooms daily. Not like other airbnb experiences as more like a private room in a great hostel.

The room is part of a hostel-like building with a shared bathroom, living room, kitchen and garden. Which are all in a good state. The building can be a bit noisy since you share it with other guests. 

The room is in a quiet neighborhood and walking distance from the city centre. Shops and grocery store are nearby. Would stay here again!

Bragas was an excellent stay for my girlfriend and I. The location allowed us to walk everywhere we went, and we enjoyed the social aspects of meeting other travelers staying at the house. If you're looking (and willing to pay) for a five star experience this may not be the place for you, but if you're looking for a clean, affordable place to stay with more privacy than the typical hostel I would highly recommend Bragas house.
Todo perfecto. Recomendaremos sin duda.
I definitely recommend this place! Location is perfect, a short walk to everything. The host is easy to communicate with and provides great recommendations!
Nice place to stay in Porto! Super friendly hosts.
Increible lugar. Bien ubicado, limpio y con cocina amplia y completa. Patio muy pintoresco

Great stay in Porto !!! The premises are clean and pleasant! Only small problems: not very well soundproofed and it is a little cold in the corridors (we went in early March). Otherwise nothing to say !! Thank you :)
Top location and clean accommodation
Great place for hosepdar in Porto. Great location. Large rooms and very well equipped kitchen to prepare meals.

Bragas House is a great place for socializing. My girlfriend and I met really cool people in the kitchen.  The host is also a very helpful. The location is also great. The only problem we had was that the shower was cold in the morning – two days in a row. But I'm sure they will find a solution for this issue :)
Zentrale Lage. Aufenthaltsbereich ist gut. Allerdings waren wir nicht zufrieden mit unserem Zimmer und dem Bad. Kalte Dusche und durchgelegene Matratze.

My wife left some close in the room
and we never got it back
End of story

Very nice accomodation with super equipment ! The shared spaces, the kitchen and "leaving room" are really nice to hang around and cook in a really nice atmosphere. Nice room, but get ready to climb up the bed ;)
Totally recommand it !

This place was great to stay, the whole house is nice and tidy. It's really close to all kind of shops and in general to the city centre. I loved the garden outside but unfortunately I couldn't use it to the the fullest as the weather was bad :( my room was really pretty with a nice view, I would definitely stay there again next time I'm going to be in Porto :)
Great stay. Recommended. Great location
Réactivité au top ! Bragas a été arrangeant, on reviendra !
Le logement est bien situé
Great place and location! I had a wonderful stay and would love to return.
Had a great stay at Bragas! Not far from downtown, beautiful garden, great kitchen, and a lovely area!

The place is really close from the city center and you can go everywhere by walk. There is only loft bed (visible on pictures but we didin't see it when we reserve). There is also large rooms and it's very quiet.

Great stay at this location. Clean facilities, really well equipped kitchen, lots of common area space to meet people if you like to do so, and the rooms are perfect size for two people. Also, the Airbnb is located SUPER close to great night life.

Had a good stay. The room was not that big but enough for a short stay. Kitchen and yard were pretty nice, same goes for the showers. Matresses were a little thin and at the nights it might become a little louder due to other guests.

Easy communication with the host. Greatly located near the center!

Très facile d’accès et possibilité d’y entrer à nimporte quelle heure pour récupérer les clefs de la chambre (très pratique lors d’une arrivée tardive.) 
Seul point négatif : l’isolation phonique (interne)  n’est pas exceptionnelle, cela manque un peu d’intimité. 
Je le conseille tout de même !
We had a really good time in Porto.  The rooms are very simple but you have anything you need. The host was really friendly and gave us very good tips for our stay.  We recommend it:)

El cuarto es como aparece en las fotografías, el alojamiento es un edificio y en mi planta habian 4 habitaciones y un baño con dos duchas y un wc. Esta a unos 10 minutos del centro. En general todo correcto

The ceiling light in my room was not working, they said it would be fixed immediately but it did not happen during my stay. It didn’t affect my otherwise perfect experience but some other guests may find this relevant. The location is perfect and the atmosphere really nice. Would reccomend!
Fantástico,un buen jardín por pasar el rato,espacioso y con zona común grande y accesible

Great location, very clean, and the check-in process was very smooth. The communal kitchen area and yard are great places to hang out and meet people. I would stay here again on another trip to Porto.
Lieux très agréable, bien placé, où on fait d'agréables rencontres
Nice and clean place, close to the city (20-30 min. walk to Ribeira). We only stayed there for one night, but we have no complaints. :)
Lovely place to stay when you visit Porto! It is a 10 minute walk to the city center. The accommodation is fine!
We do not recommend, it does not value ,

Nous avons passé deux semaines dans cette maison et tout était nickel! Ménage fait tous les jours, hôte accueillant et voyageurs de toute nationalité ici pour partager! 
Le seul point « négatif » que je mettrais est que les photos ne sont pas tout à fait exactes (moins de déco) mais la maison reste agréable !
Easy going. Would recommend it to everybody!
Great stay, comfortable and quick to arrange everything

Bragas is very helpful and quick with response. gave us all the details needed. the location is also good close to everything. the only thing that bothered me a little bit was the matress in our room is very used and feels like sleeping in a bathtube. otherwise highly recommend.

superbe séjour dans cette auberge de jeunesse très convivial , très jolie terrasse ..  proche du centre ville , endroit calme et apaisant .. avec un petit chat de rue adorable ( très gourmand) pour tenir compagnie pendant le petit déjeuner

Endroit calme à 5 minutes à pied des endroit à visiter.  Chambre très propre et très belle! Je recommande cet endroit sans hésiter! Seul petit bémol, l’endroit n’est pas très isolé alors un peu plus de bruit, dépendement des voyageurs qui y sont.
Very central location, easy access to must-see places in Porto!
Nice place, nice room and great location!

The place is absolutely great, also the position is perfect. The host is kind and precise. Actually the house is a Guest House with a beautiful garden. The bathroom is clean,  just a bit small.
We wil definetely recommand it to our friends.
The room was very clean, and the apartment was exactly as described. Central location, a few minutes walk from the main attractions in Porto. I would definitely recommend this place.
Simply great and organized accomodation. Pleasant facilities, outstanding bathroom,  short walking distance to the city center, great host that provides you with all information before your arrival.

Bragas House es una casa antigua reformada que está muy bien ubicada. A unos minutos del centro pero con la calma de no estar justo en la zona más ruidosa. Las fotos se corresponden perfectamente con las habitaciones de la casa y, a pesar de no haber visto al anfitrión, la comunicación fue muy fluída y sin problemas. Fuimos en diciembre y al tener radiador en la habitación no pasamos nada de frío. A tener en cuenta es que hay más huéspedes alojándose en la misma casa así que a veces el nivel de ruído depende de lo considerada que sea la gente. Pero no fue tan incómodo y el anfitrión no es responsable de ello. Nos encantó la habitación!

Week located, you can move by walk wherever and just around are good places restaurants, bars, art galeries ..

 Bragas’house is a very good place, kitchen / garden are very cosy

The room was very nice, with the balcony and the bed comfortable

Very good quality/price


To all who want to book : If you have never lived in community, please respect other people and shared spaces

Es un alojamiento que funciona como un hostal. Habitaciones privadas con llave y un baño con 2 ducas y 1 aseo para cada piso (4 habitaciones), en mi opinión muy correcto. Tiene zonas comunes como la sala de estar y la cocina, que están bastante bien. En la cocina, hay dos neveras donde cada habitación tiene asignado un cajon y armarios para dejar productos no perecederos. Está muy cerca del centro. Tiene un patio interior guai (como fuimos en invierno no lo utilizamos pero en verano tiene que ser genial). Mi novia y yo estuvimos bastante agusto y consideramos la calidad precio muy correcta. Lo único negativo, lo que se puede derivar de un hostal: depende de lo ruidoso y respetuoso que sea el inquilino de al lado te molestará mas o menos.
Great place and great location! Everything we needed
Overall good, but if you have sensitive hearing when sleeping, you might have a difficult time due to noise from other tenants...
There is nothing to complain about this airbnb
best location. House is very clean.

Excelente estadia, todo o espaço extremamente limpo, cuidado e moderno. Único problema prendeu-se com a água quente no piso onde estávamos, mas uma ida a outra casa de banho e tudo se resolveu.
Todos muito simpáticos e dispostos a dar dicas da cidade. Recomendo!
El alojamiento es genial, cercano al centro, limpieza impecable y disponibilidad total.

name: Cozy Private Bedroom - Williamsburg
summary: The room for rent is the second bedroom in my 2-bedroom apartment. Located in East Williamsburg, between Williamsburg and Bushwick. Near bars & restaurants and 2 blocks from L train.
description: The room for rent is the second bedroom in my 2-bedroom apartment. Located in East Williamsburg, between Williamsburg and Bushwick. Near bars & restaurants and 2 blocks from L train.

reviews.comments: Had a really great stay at Naomi's place! Beautiful house and great location, would love to stay there again :) Naomi is wonderful!

name: Kuhio Shores 215: Oceanfront, AC, Whale Watching Views
summary: KUHIO SHORES 215-Ocean front 2 bedroom with stunning ocean views. A/C. Sleeps 6.
space: *Free mid-size car while cars are available. Not valid with any other special offers. The car can be upgraded for a minimal fee, unlimited mileage and taxes included and is picked-up and dropped-off at the airport. Cars are on a 24 hour basis so if flight arrival and departure times exceed the number of days reserved, there will be an additional charge. KUHIO SHORES 215 Hawaiian vacations don’t get much better than Kuhio Shores 215! Bring your ohana – family – and experience a traditional tropical getaway. From the private lanai, you’ll take in sunsets unlike anything you’ve ever seen, perched on the lounge chairs with a cold drink in your hand. In the living room, the magnificent ocean views continue through the floor-to-ceiling windows. Cuddle up on the wicker couch or one of the three arm chairs as you watch the waves outside or the flat-screen TV inside. When you need some substance, the fully-equipped kitchen has everything you need to whip up meals and snacks. Cooking isn’t a cho

neighborhood_overview: Located on Kauai`s beautiful South Shore. The world famous Poipu Beach offers a beautiful beach perfect for swimming, snorkeling or laying out in the sunshine. Poipu Beach Athletic  Club includes a pool, waterslide, hot tub, gym, fitness classes, sports courts, restaurant and more! Memberships available for purchase thru Great Vacation Retreats.
notes: Just 30 minutes from the airport, this condo puts you near Kukui’ula Shopping Center’s upscale grocery store, restaurants, shops, galleries, and a weekly farmers market (11-minute walk). Drive to the National Tropical Botanical Gardens and Spouting Horn Park (4 minutes) for hiking through native plants and to a stunning waterspout. If you’re looking for a resort-style stay, we have you covered. For an additional fee you’ll have uninhibited access to the Poipu Beach Athletic Club, home to a fitness center, hot tub and sparkling pool with a waterslide and sand-bottomed kiddie section – everything you need to work out, cool off or wind down. For more information on the Poipu Beach Athletic Club: (Website hidden by Airbnb) MEMBERSHIPS ARE LIMITED, PLEASE LET US KNOW  IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO SECURE A MEMBERSHIP PRIOR TO YOUR ARRIVAL.
transit: Public transport is limited. Rental car recommended.
access: Oceanfront Split-system A/C in the Living Room - there are no split systems in the bedrooms so you may have to keep the doors open on the hot days. Overhead fans usually keep the rooms comfortably cool. Seasonal Whale watching (Dec. thru Mar.) Fantastic snorkeling next door at Lawai Beach View turtles from your lanai No Washer & Dryer in the Condo but there is a Coin-Operated Laundry Facility on Site - we provide the laundry soap Wireless Internet Cable flat screen TV Elevator - it`s about seven condos down the hall. The stairs are closer if you would enjoy the exercise On the Second Floor No Pool, but you can join the Poipu Beach Athletic Club for a fee (memberships are limited) or jump in the Ocean Fully equipped kitchen Beach chairs, a beach umbrella and a cooler are provided. There could be more beach equipment, too! Twin Bedroom has the Shower opening up into the Bedroom with separate toilet and sink en-suite Complimentary Island Soap and Candle Works toiletries  Starter kit of Ka
interaction: 1. Unobstructed Ocean Views: Sky and water collide along the horizon and you get a front-row seat to the action! The private lanai affords unobstructed ocean views while the Pacific breezes blow across your face. From January through March, you can often see whales swimming and year-round, you’ll catch glimpses of sea turtles playing in the waves. 2. Lawai Beach Next Door: Walk out the back door and in just a few steps your feet are in the sand. Stunning Lawai Beach is your backyard, with opportunities to sunbathe, surf, snorkel and swim in the waves. 3. Convenient Location: When the chef needs the night off, the Shops at Kukui’ula has lots of great restaurant choices. Only a 15-minute walk away, it also houses all kinds of different stores and shops. Don’t miss the farmers market every Wednesday afternoon!
house_rules: 1. Great Vacation Retreats is not affiliated with the onsite management. Please contact us directly with any questions, maintenance issues or concierge requests. 2. To avoid towing of your vehicle during your stay. Please make sure you display your parking pass in vehicle in plain sight. You must sign the Security Parking Pass book in lobby to obtain pass, which security will deliver to your room.  3. Hawaii has a new smoking law which allows smoking only in designated areas outside of any building, 20 feet away from doors. Our units and lanais are all non-smoking. Please use the designated areas if you wish to smoke. They are usually located in the parking lot of the building. There is a $300 fine for smoking in our properties and the State of Hawaii may also impose a fine for not smoking in the designated areas. 4. Please wash off all sand from beach gear and your body before re-entering the condo. Outside showers are available at most beaches and outside of most properties. Please d

host.host_about: We are a boutique property management company on the islands of Kauai and the Big Island. We are here to help you plan your Hawaiian Experience. All of our properties include free WiFi, free parking, fully equipped kitchens and more great amenities. Our team checks our account very frequently to make sure all of your questions are answered as soon as possible. Once on island we are available to help you 24 hours/day. Need a rental car? Where is the best place for a sunset dinner? Where do the locals go? Let us know how we can help you experience the vacation of your dreams!

reviews.comments: Beautiful view of sunsets in the evening.

Had an amazing time in Kauai, thanks in large part to our stay here at Kuhio 215. AMAZING view of the ocean, especially for sunsets and tide pools! Would absolutely stay here again next time we visit.

This property offers a truly incredible view, with a spacious clean unit that is perfect for families and or groups desiring a separate bedroom with twin beds.  Also stocked with beach chairs, umbrella, ice chest, etc.  with short stroll to the public snorkeling beach!

name: Ático exclusivo Barcelona
summary: Lugares de interés: Diagonal Mar Centro Comercial, Diagonal Mar, y Forum Sport Diagonal. Te va a encantar mi lugar debido a la ubicación, las vistas, y la gente. Mi alojamiento es bueno para parejas, aventureros, viajeros de negocios, y familias (con hijos).

name: Cozy apartment with cat at Ferikoy
summary: 2 bedrooms and a cozy Living room with an open kitchen. One bedroom will be rented however the remaining space will be shared with me and my cute Himalayan cat. The location is really close To Taxim square, Beşiktaş and city center. Monthly renting will be appreciated.
description: 2 bedrooms and a cozy Living room with an open kitchen. One bedroom will be rented however the remaining space will be shared with me and my cute Himalayan cat. The location is really close To Taxim square, Beşiktaş and city center. Monthly renting will be appreciated.

name: Large 1/1 in Waikiki, (Family Friendly!)
summary: This one bedroom is 779 square feet making it one of the biggest one bedroom you can rent in Waikiki. It is located 9 to 11 minutes walking distance from the beach. It has large windows and is very bright. It is on the 11th floor and is extremely quiet. Central air in bedroom and living room. The building has swimming pool, Sauna, Jacuzzi and Barbecue areas. It has a brand new 43 inch Hdtv and comes with 200 Channels including all showtimes, Wifi high speed Internet and one free parking space.
space: The day rate is for the whole condo, not just the bedroom!, and INCLUDES ALL TAXES!  You will NOT receive an email from me asking you to pay for taxes after you leave like some other hosts in Waikiki! The price you will be paying now is the final price. (Please consider this when you are comparing my price to hotels!) Please read the WHOLE SITE before booking and all the reviews! if possible! I just want to make sure there are no misunderstandings anywhere! I do not live there either and I do not leave close by, :)  Rest assure I will give you all the space you need!  If you are coming with infants and small children, I will get the condo ready with a playpen (Two if necessary) and a tall chair at no extra charge to you. (no cribs as of this writing, just playpens but that could change!... shoot me an email!). I will bring them to the condo and set them up before your arrival. I do have an elevated twin air mattress as well with an integrated pump (...surprisingly  comfortable!)  I don
description: This one bedroom is 779 square feet making it one of the biggest one bedroom you can rent in Waikiki. It is located 9 to 11 minutes walking distance from the beach. It has large windows and is very bright. It is on the 11th floor and is extremely quiet. Central air in bedroom and living room. The building has swimming pool, Sauna, Jacuzzi and Barbecue areas. It has a brand new 43 inch Hdtv and comes with 200 Channels including all showtimes, Wifi high speed Internet and one free parking space. The day rate is for the whole condo, not just the bedroom!, and INCLUDES ALL TAXES!  You will NOT receive an email from me asking you to pay for taxes after you leave like some other hosts in Waikiki! The price you will be paying now is the final price. (Please consider this when you are comparing my price to hotels!) Please read the WHOLE SITE before booking and all the reviews! if possible! I just want to make sure there are no misunderstandings anywhere! I do not live there either and I do not
neighborhood_overview: My condo is located in Waikiki. Waikiki is a lot of fun and I would invite you to  Go---le it as there are just way too many things to say about it!  It has hundreds of restaurants and stores. Waikiki beach is regularly in the top 10 most beautiful beach in the world. Waikiki alone has 5 different beaches. The famous "Waikiki beach walk" is on Lewers street. My condo is on Lewers street!. (430 Lewers street). the "walk" starts 2 blocks down. (4 minute walk). Go___le it. Waikiki beach (Website hidden by Airbnb) Please click on the map and you will see that you will be right in the middle of all the fun!  Waikiki is a really unique place. You could easily spend your whole vacation here. That's what a lot of tourists do. No need to travel anywhere, just walk down the street!. There are hundreds of activities you can do in Waikiki alone. You will see pamphlets in the condo itself. Just name it and they have it. Dinner cruise, catamaran rides, surf lessons of course!, parasailing,Several te
notes: I will respect your space and privacy. After the original first meeting, you should not see me unless there is an emergency of some kind or there is a problem with something inside the condo. If you need something, I will drop it off in front of the door and send you a text. If for some reasons I need to come in, I will do so with your authorization and in writing through Airbnb's website only. I do not leave in the building or even in Waikiki. If you prefer self-cheking, that is also fine!. Just let me know before you arrive! Also, the kitchen is a full kitchen with plates, glasses, pans, etc. The fridge is really big and the stove is gas. There is also a big microwave, blender, rice cooker and so on. There is no dishwasher though (Sorry!!!). There is a washer and dryer in the bathroom that works very well.  I do provide beach mats, beach towels, soaps, toothpastes, beach umbrellas... even boggy boards at no extra charge. Other than that, you will not see me day to day, either in the
transit: I would recommend renting a car for 2 to 4 days maximum. You may rent it directly at the airport or you could take a cab to my condo for about $28.00 to $35.00. You may also take U---R, that would cost you around $20 to $25.00. I would NOT recommend the Waikiki shuttle from the airport as it will cost you $18 per person! If you want to rent a car but not right away, you're in luck!! "Enterprise Rent a car" in Waikiki is at 445 Seaside Avenue which is exactly one block from my condo. There are really good! and their prices are competitive. I would check out the weather forecast first before renting a car!... We never know!!! We occasionally get a storm if you can believe that... Going around the island is soooo much nicer by a beautiful day!  :) The Must see with a car are:  Circling around the island! go to the north shore to see those huge waves!! (only the winter though),  Hanama Bay (watch out, not open everyday), Pearl Harbor Museum, Ala Moana Shopping Center (one of the biggest in
access: And of course, you have free access to the pool, Sauna, Jacuzzi and Barbecue areas anytime until 10 pm daily. (located on the 5th floor of the building). Sorry there is no gym! But there is a 24 hour fitness a few blocks from the condo just across Kuhio beach which is just before Waikiki Beach. (about 12 minutes of a very nice walk!). The parking space is also free as well as Wifi high speed internet in the condo. There are also several guests parking available on the 1st and 2nd floor if you have friends in town that would like to visit!
interaction: I will be there for you 24/7 if you need anything! I am quick at answering emails and will get all your questions answered in a matter of hours if not minutes! If you need something, I will quickly get it for you within a few hours. I will respect your space and will NEVER show up at the condo unexpected!!!! I will drop what you need in front of the door and will shoot you an email after it is done. It will usually be in the evenings after 8 pm or after 10 pm as I sometimes have rehearsals until 9:30 pm... (I'm a musician...). Again, I am going to show you quickly the in's and out of the condo when we first meet and then it is yours for the duration of your stay unless you email me for something or if there is an emergency of some kind!... but then again there is a fire extinguisher in the condo so ....  (I am joking about this).
house_rules: Please take your shoes off every time you come in my condo as the carpet is of a light brown color and is sensitive to shoes! ... It is also traditional to take the shoes off before entering someone's home in Hawaii. Also, please do not throw food down the kitchen sink, especially coffee ground! (it acts like sand and does not go down!). Throw garbage daily down the trash chute and do not leave food on kitchen counter or dirty dishes in the sink.  Mahalo!

host.host_about: Aloha, My name is Jean-Michel and I am a music teacher and performer here in Honolulu, Hawaii. I have been in the Islands 23 years doing what I love. I feel extremely bless and I would like to share that experience of leaving in Hawaii and everything the Islands have to offer with whom ever want to rent my beautiful condo.

reviews.comments: It was a wonderful stay hosting by Jean-Michel. It was my first time using Airbnb and second time visiting Oahu. Jean-Michel  welcomed me and my wife. He is a very gentle and nice man. He showed us the room, the parking, the facilities and gave all the information we need during the stay. The room was very clean and cozy.  It's one bedroom apartment with kitchen. The bath room is big and also equipped with washer and dryer. The unit has a very nice view. The location is great, close to restaurants, Waikiki beach and shopping malls in a walking distance. It has a parking garage and security gate. The building also has pool on the fifth floor tenants can use.  Definitely I would stay here again  for my next time vising Oahu.
We had a fantastic stay. Jean-Michel was friendly and helpful. The apartment was clean, comfortable, and perfectly located right in Waikiki. Overall this was an excellent place to stay.

My friends and I had the best Airbnb experience at Jean-Michel's place! Overwhelming hospitality and effort in making us feel welcome. He was an absolutely gracious and generous host, allowing us access to his place before the stipulated check in and constantly making sure we were comfortable. The place was very spacious and comfortable, clean and tidy. The location of this apartment is extremely convenient as well, just a 5 minute walk to Waikiki's Main Street.  Enjoyed my stay very much here and would recommend this space to anyone visiting Honolulu and would definitely stay here again if I came back!
The host canceled this reservation 86 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Jean Michel was very helpful, Condo was lovely and in a great location.

Jean was an EXCELLENT host! We had a late arrival from the airport and Jean did not hesitate to adjust his schedule to meet with us. He was very friendly and gave us a very warm greeting as he showed us his place. 

GREAT place - definitely huge! Great location and great recommended dining and exploring options from Jean. The location was super close to everything. Only a block away from the main strip of Waikiki beach and lots of little shops and lounges and are extremely close. 

10/10 would stay here again next time we're in Oahu.

Best value on Oahu.  Jean-Michel was a great host.  First, the condo is right in the heart of Waikiki and easily in walking distance of the entire area.  Easily walked to the beach and to get drinks with friends at the Sheraton Edge, the Royal Hawaiian and to LuLu's for breakfast the next morning.

The condo was spotlessly clean and even included drinks in the fridge, toiletries, and laundry detergent for the in-unit laundry.  The kitchen comes stocked with pots, pans, and utensils.  You can buy grocery items at the small market on the first floor.

The building is great also.  It is very quiet and private, but also includes an outdoor pool, hot tub, and tennis courts.  The residents I ran into were all very nice.

Lastly, working with Jean-Michel was great.  We met him at this music studio once we got our rental car.  He promptly gave us the keys and gave us in-depth instructions on where to park and how to access the unit.  He even let us stay late since there wasn't a reservation for the next day.

Overall, a great stay.  When I come back to Oahu, I'll definitely be staying here.

-Zach
Couldn't  fault host extremely  helpful.Great location everything we wanted close  by. Good safe neighborhood.Great pools  and out door area great.

This apartment was extremely clean, spacious and located right in the heart of Waikiki. We could not fault our stay here as both the apartment and the host were amazing and exactly as described.

We arrived in Waikiki on an early flight and Jean-Michel had no issue with us checking in early and greeted us with a full tour of the apartment.

Would recommend this apartment to anyone looking for an affordable and very well looked after apartment in Waikiki. The host will help you in any way possible and is easily accessible.

Jean-Michel was attentive to all my messages and always answered quickly. He was at the property ready to meet me promptly as he said he would. He was very accomodating and I'm very glad to have found his condo. The view is great!!
This place was awesome! Its close to everything. U can walk to Shopping center, beaches, and a lot of places.
Host was great in communication ! I had a great time and the location us so awesome !

Awesome location and great accommodation. We enjoyed our stay and the facilities the unit block provided were great. The BBQ, pool and tennis court entertained us each afternoon. Would stay here again.

Everything in the listing was accurate. The location is excellent, The unit is well-kept, and Jean-Michel is an upstanding host. I would definitely stay here again and I told my friends that if they are ever in Honolulu they would be wise to stay here as well. I really enjoyed myself and a big part of that was having such a nice condo.

Jean Michel was an awesome host! He had everything we needed and even more! I really appreciated his hospitality-he treated us as if we were family! He stocked the fridge before we got there ( which he didn't have to, but it was definitely appreciated it!) he had coffee and all the basic food and utensils you would need, he had laundry detergent for his washer&dryer, basic bathroom essentials as well and even swim gear in the closet ( things like a beach mat, snorkeling gear, and fins). 
He provided us with all of these things to make sure our stay was as comfortable and convenient as it could be! I appreciate his efforts and that's why I would highly recommend him! 
Also, the place looks better in person than in the pics-it's a great location, close to the beach and downtown, and has a great view from the balcony. I would definitely stay with Jean-Michel if your visiting Hawaii.

Jean-Michel communicated with us readily during the days before our arrival, met us at the apartment and showed us around. He provided us with coffee, tea, bread, butter and an array of drinks, a very welcome surprise. It is a lovely apartment in a great location and Jean-Michel is a very gracious host. We would highly recommend it.

Jean-Michel met me at the condo for check-in, and explained all of the amenities. He even helped me with my luggage which was in the rental car parked in the parking space provided in garage.  

During my stay of more than week, a couple of questions came up.  I sent Jean-Michel a text and he answered immediately.  

I really enjoyed staying in a condo instead ofin  a hotel room.  The extra space was wonderful.  The condo has a nice living room with a lanai and eating area.  There is a comfortable couch, a nice size TV with cable and Wi-Fi. 

The kitchen is fully functional and has everything that I needed to cook meals, make a pot of coffee, and fix toast.  I could have made a cake if I wanted to.

The bathroom is a good size, not at all crowded.  The washer and dryer are very handy.  Meant I could bring fewer clothes, and not go home with a suitcase full of dirty clothes.  Laundry detergent was provided. 

The bedroom has a lot of room, and the bed is very comfortable.  The bedroom also has a dresser and a small desk.  The closet covers on whole wall, and there are extra blankets and pillows.

I think Jean Michel pays a lot of attention to the details and has put  substantial effort into making his guests feel comfortable at this condo.  I would definitely stay here again.  



The bedroom is a nice size with a very comfortable bed.  There is also a dresser and small desk, two end tables and a small desk.
A great place to stay ins perfect location. Jean- Michel is really helpfully.

Everything was as advertised. The apartment is spacious, comfortable, and clean, and Jean-Michel could not have been a more gracious host. I would highly recommend staying here. It truly felt like a home away from home.
Perfect location! Perfect condo, clean, spacious, bright and had everything needed to feel like home!! Jean Michel was welcoming and responsive. Would definitely come back!!

reviews.reviewer_name: Brilliant Space 夏威夷度假屋私人旅行定制服务 - 夏忆
reviews.comments: Thank you for your highly rated warm concierge & coordinating our arrival and throughout our stay.
Nice spacious condo in a great location!

Amazing! We are so sad to leave!!!! Waikiki is a lot of fun and Jean-Michel's condo is in the perfect location to experience it. Very walkable to the beach, shops and restaurants, and public transit. We have a one year old and the three of us were very comfortable during our stay. We arrived late at night and we were so pleasantly  surprised to see the kitchen stocked with a nice breakfast for the morning. There is a convenience store in the building that also has alcohol (so convenient!) and the pool was soooo warm. The weather was unusually rainy on a couple days for us but it was so fun riding out the weather in that super warm (and clean) pool. We loved having a kitchen and laundry for our trip so that was a definite bonus and Jean-Michel was super friendly and helpful. You won't regret your stay here.

I can't say enough great things about the apartment or the host Jean-Michel. This was our first trip to Hawai'i and we were traveling with our 3-yr old from New York. Jean-Michel was super accommodating, and he waited until 11pm to check us into the apartment. He took the time to give us a walkthrough, showing us how to operate the washer/dryer, TV, wi-fi, how to access pool, etc. He had thoughtfully provided a fruit platter which was EXTREMELY welcome after our journey, along with tea, coffee, etc. The apartment was perfect for us, with a large single bedroom and separate living room and kitchen. Jean-Michel also provided washroom amenities as well as liquid for the washing machine. It was winter in Hawai'i, so we REALLY appreciated the heated pool and jacuzzi. Our LO normally struggles with colder temperatures, so he absolutely loved the pool this time. The apartment was perfectly located, 5-10 mins walk to the main strip, with access to shops, restaurants, and (most importantly!) Waikiki beach. If you don't have a car, it's a short bus ride to the shopping mall and Oauhu zoo (opposite directions!). Great first time for us and we will definitely return!

We absolutely enjoyed our stay. Jean-Michel was an amazing host with exceptional hospitality.  He catered to our family of four, which included our two- and one-year old children. Jean-Michel's description of the condo was on-point and was everything we could ask for - from the full-size kitchen (with coffee maker and rice cooker) to the washer/dryer (with detergent and dryer sheets), as well as the Pack N Plays and the beach accessories. The location was convenient and perfectly situated, and the building itself was secure and clean. Although we had a rental car for our travels, we enjoyed walking around Waikiki. There are also a lot of joggers running the path along the Ala Wai canal, which is just two buildings over. We would highly recommend this condo to our family/friends.

Jean Michel's place was gorgeous for my family, Me, my wife and my daughter, she is 6 years old. 
It is in a great location, near everything. Very clean and cozy. everything was available and working like described in his announcement. 
The tradition about take  shoes off before entering was great, like in my home in Brazil, it also make us feel very much comfortable about the cleanness. Perfect place, my family loved. 
Jean Michel was very attentive since the begin. he gave us several delicious things upon our arrival, very kind. Gave me several important tips and always answered my questions. 
we are very happy for have choosing this place. Thanks Jean Michel. Best regards Faria Family
Great accommodations as described, clean, comfortable and good central location.  Host is very attentive and helpful, would highly recommend.

We loved Jean-Michel's place. It was close to the beach, shops and restaurants and very comfortable. He provided many amenities including food for breakfast, coffee, beach towels, and bathroom supplies. The condo is on the 11th floor, so it was great to keep the windows open all night to enjoy the lovely Hawaiian breezes. The best part is it is close to all the Waikiki action, but the building is super quiet. The condo is also quite roomy. Jean-Michel was great communicating as well and super available. We will stay here again.

We were lucky to have found this accommodation! The apartment is clean with a comfortable bed and sofa bed and is in a fabulous location; close to the bridge out of Waikiki and a short walk to the beach. Jean-Mitchel was organized, considerate or our needs and respectful of our privacy. He had prepared so many things for us including; food and coffee, beach towels and equipment, a playpen and high chair for our baby...even movies and popcorn. The building is quiet and clean and we took advantage of the nice pool, sauna and jacuzzi. We would definitely stay there again!

The Apartment was everything we needed for our stay in Honolulu.  It was great to have a kitchen and loved the location near restaurants and shops.  Jean-Michel was great and checked in on us to make sure we had all we needed.  Will book again upon returning.

Jean-Michel's place is great. Great location within walking distance to everything in Waikiki. The apartment is very quiet at night and we didn't have any trouble sleeping. Place is super clean. Jean-Michel is so attentive with every detail and immediately available when you need him. He provided both a high chair and a pack-n-play for our 9-month old baby, both of which were very clean and convenient. There was also food and drink ready for us when we arrived late at night - very thoughtful and kind of him. Lots of beach towels and beach gear and lots of bathroom supplies. We felt very welcomed and accommodated. Highly recommended! Thank you, Jean-Michel!

This is a great place in Honolulu for families with young kids like us. We just stayed 6 nights with our nearly 3 year old twins. The bedroom is large enough to fit two travel cots and the large dining/living area is great for playing in.

Jean-Michel is the loveliest host, full of advice and helpful suggestions. He responds very quickly and is super organised. Our check in was smooth. Jean-Michel even left us lots of little thoughtful extras like fresh muffins, fruit salad in the fridge, bottled water, beach towels, sand toys and lots more. These were much appreciated.

The air-conditioning is quiet and efficient (a must with kids in Honolulu) and the place was clean. We loved having the washer and dryer right in the condo and a parking spot in the building. That said, there's plenty of shops and restaurants within walking distance.

We used the pool in the condo which was lovely and warm (and clean), and would definitely stay again here next time we're in Honolulu.

Simply perfect. We loved this condo, especially the spacious rooms, onsite amenities, plenty of towels, washer/dryer and all the extras provided - snorkelling
gear, tennis equipment, lotions and potions and kitchen snacks. Was nice to have good books, some dvd's, netflix etc when we needed a rest from the hustle and bustle of Waikiki.  Enjoyed using the lanai and watching the world go by.  The place was lovely and quiet - we expect a rare find in Waikiki, yet so close to everything. We look forward to coming back next year! - maybe!

Jean-Michel was an absolutely amazing host. He went out of his way to make sure that the place was ready for our stay. There were added little touches that made us feel extremely welcome and as if we were at a home away from home. We were a group of 4 adults and we fit comfortably in the condo. The condo was walking distance to tons of shops, restaurants, a few pubs, and even walking distance to the canal and beach. The pool and hot tub in the building was an added bonus. Jean-Michel even had a great selection of beach items which we were able to use during our stay which helped us save on our trip. On top of having more than enough kitchen, restroom, and living amenities Jean-Michel checked in on us during the course of our stay to ensure there was nothing else we were needing. His open line of communication was truly appreciated. We have absolutely no complaints with this Airbnb and would highly recommend it to friends, family, or anyone else wanting a place to stay during a visit to Honolulu!

The condo had everything we needed from towels, toiletries, beach gear, DVDs and kitchen stuff. Jean-Michel communicated well and kindly provided things that made us feel welcome and comfortable during our stay. As a mum, having the washer and dryer (with detergent!) was so convenient that I could genuinely enjoy our family vacation with our three kids. The location is perfect, walking distance to the beach and close to shops and restaurants. Highly recommend Jean-Michel's place!

Now we know why this place is rated 5 stars.  It's comfortable in a great location. Even though we didn't do any cooking, having full kitchen is a plus. Included parking is an added bonus for that location. Jean-Michel is very friendly, responsive and accommodating. He even provided beach towels, bogie boards, beach mat, etc. The place makes us feels like our home away from home. Mahalo for the beers!

Jean-Michel was an absolutely amazing host. He sent me plenty of information before our trip and during our stay to make sure we were comfortable> he even set up two beds for the children in the living area which was really nice and aloud them their own space (happy kids happy holiday). He went out of his way to meet us early in the morning and included some breakfast essentials which were greatly appreciated. The apartment is in a great location and very well appointed, as it has everything you need from a usable kitchen, washer and dryer (with liquid), large living space, two TVs one in the bedroom and other in the living room,  plus some boogie boards, beach mats, snorkeling masks, towels etc. The little extras were great, we soon felt like we were in our own home.  We look forward to coming back, next time we are in Hawaii.

Jean-Michel is an awesome host. He sent us a lot of information before our trip and during our stay always checking with us if anything else we might need. He set up one big air mattress for my daughter which she loves and even bought a kettle for our use. The condo is in a fantastic location, close to beach, shops and everything. We spent wonderful time in here and definitely will be back one day! Mahalo Jean-Michel and well done!

Over the years, we had stayed at many different hotels, condos, and apartments. Honolulu is a busy town and we always had we needed to find another accommodation for next trip. Mr.Jean-Michel's condo is the best place we had ever stayed in Honolulu. We felt like we found a hidden treasure. Especially those who value and wants to have a quiet calm grown up atmosphere, his condo is the best. His hospitality is excellent and kind. The condo is carpet floor, we had small children with us and we could manage the carpet clean. Pool and BBQ grill in the building which made our stay easy and fun. We will definitely go back and stay at his place.

We were a group of 3 adults and 1 toddler.  We fit comfortably in the condo. The condo was nice, comfortable, clean, quiet, and convenient.  It is close to the Waikiki beach, shopping area, and lots of good restaurant.  
Jean-Michel was a great host.  He always quickly response my emails, try to satisfy our needs, and make us feel like at home.  In the condo, Jean-Michel also provides a great selection of beach items.  My son really liked the sand bucket and tool sets when he played in the beach.  Jean-Michel even took his time to say goodbye to us on the last of our stay. Mahalo for the souvenirs!  We absolutely enjoy our stay.
We would highly recommend it to our friends, family, or anyone else wanting a place to stay during a visit to Honolulu!
Jean-Michel was great host, apartment has very good location and everything what we needed we found there. :) I wish to stay longer in Hawaii. Mahalo.

初めてairbnbを利用しました｡9ヶ月の子どもと家族3人で利用しました｡部屋はとても広く､部屋全体が土足厳禁の日本のようなｽﾀｲﾙで､清潔なのでﾊｲﾊｲ時期の赤ちゃんでも安心して床で遊んでました｡
ｷｯﾁﾝにはたくさんのきれいな調理器具が揃っていて毎日料理ができました｡お風呂はｼｬﾜｰｶｰﾃﾝではないので､ﾄｲﾚの方が濡れることなく気兼ねなくｼｬﾜｰを浴びられます｡お湯はためようと思えばためられましたが､赤ちゃんもｼｬﾜｰですませました｡ｼｬﾜｰﾍｯﾄﾞも持てるﾀｲﾌﾟのものなので赤ちゃんのお風呂も楽ﾁﾝでした｡洗濯機と乾燥機も部屋に付いてるので洗濯も楽でした｡
初めて赤ちゃんと一緒の海外旅行だったので色々と不安ではありましたが､ｼﾞｰﾝﾐｯｼｪﾙさんが質問にはすぐに返信してくれて安心して泊まれました｡日本語の対応も彼の日本人の友人がしてくれるので全く問題ありませんでした｡何か緊急の際はその方を頼ればいいと思います｡また､ｼﾞｰﾝﾐｯｼｪﾙさんとはﾁｪｯｸｲﾝのときだけお会いして鍵を受け取りました｡彼はこちらのﾌﾟﾗｲﾊﾞｼｰを守ってくれます｡
今回泊まって､とても良くしてくれて､居心地が良かったので､ﾊﾜｲ滞在中に次回の予約をしちゃいました!

거실, 제대로 갖춰진 주방, 퀸 침대 방이 있어 가족단위 여행객에게 추천드립니다. 와이키키해변에서는 10분 정도 걸어야하는 거리지만 주차비와 리조트비를 내지않는 장점이 있고 안에 수영장 (따뜻한 자쿠지와 건식사우나 포함)및 테니스코트가 있어 아이들이 좋아합니다. 집주인이 너무 친절해서 미안할 정도입니다. 도착 첫날 돼지코(110v plug)를 안가져가서 난감해하고 있을때 밤 11시에 직접 사다 준 친절은 있지 못할 경험입니다. 부기보드와 스노클까지 있어서 아이들이 재밌게 이용하였습니다. 감사합니다. Mr. Jean-Michel
It was so nice
Great location, lots of space and cold air conditioning.  Great host!

Jean-Michel's place was clean, well-furnished, and right in the middle of the most happening part of Waikiki. It is also steps away from the beach. Jean-Michel was an awesome host - he waited till late at night to receive us and showed us around the apartment. He always kept in touch and proactively tried to help with our needs. We needed a screwdriver to change batteries for our baby's toy and Jean-Michel dropped off a set the same night. He also stocked up tea and coffee for us, provided us clean linens, and laundry supplies. An awesome apartment, with an even more awesome host, there is really no better way to do Waikiki!

This is 2nd times staying his condominium. I really like this place. I can go everywhere in 10min around Waikiki by walking. And parking is free! You should rent a car, if you stay his condo.
I went to Hawaii without bringing stroller for baby. he helped us to get good stroller. His reply is always timely!
If you can't decide to choose where to stay, you should text him!!

This apartment has it all. A fully functioning kitchen, great washer and dryer, plenty of space, great cooling system, balcony with interesting city views and best of all - a wonderful, attentive host. We loved our stay and coming home each night to a comfortable place to stay topped it off. One of the best places I've ever stayed in.

The house owner is so nice. He sent all important information prior to my arrival. When we got there, everything is prepared. We had one additonal Queen Size airbed and one full side airbed. The suplies in house are sufficient. During the stay, the ower checked even every day to make sure we got everything we need. Thanks again for bought a brand new overware. This is definitely beyond our expect. Hope to come back again.

Jean-Michel is a wonderful host and truly deserves his status of super host. He is a very good communicator. Replies to you within minutes if not seconds although doesn’t bother you if you don’t reach out first. He is very friendly and easy to deal with.  He provided our family with everything a family with young children and infant would need. Clean place, plenty of sleeping (mattresses), a bed with super comfy memory foam mattresses  or something like which was awesome since I have back pains. I slept like a baby during entire vacation. I am now shopping for the same mattress for home :-). Also a crib for a baby, high chair, 2 strollers, beach mats, beach toys, snorkeling gear, even a backpack for hiking and a cooler. Plenty of kids books, DVDs and BlueRays disks, cable TV, activity sets for kids. Basically everything. It’s like we never left our house. Ton of pots and pans for cooking. The kitchen was fully stocked. Bathroom clean and was stocked with clean towels, beach towels, shampoos and soaps and toothpaste that would probably last us for a month. Also cleaning supplies and laundry detergent. We didn’t have to buy anything. The place is very close to everything in Waikiki. We have walked to Waikiki/Honolulu Zoo. It was a nice short walk with kids and stroller along the Waikiki beach. Also DeRussy Park is 4 min away walking. We didn’t use our rental car for 2 days at all as we were exploring Waikiki area by foot as everything is so close. But the apartment itself is not in the noisy area. There is nice pool and barbecue area that we took advantage of in the evenings. Barbecue grills are free (not coin-operated) unlike many other hotels in Waikiki have. Also Jean-Michel provides with a free designated parking spot. We definitely will be back again. Thank you so much for making our first AirBnB experience and our first  Hawaii trip truly unforgettable and wonderful.

とても良かった
言うことなしです!

3歳になったばかりの子どもと生後5か月の子どもを連れて家族4名でお世話になりました｡ﾍﾞﾋﾞｰﾍﾞｯﾄﾞ､ﾊｲﾁｪｱ､子ども用の遊具､ｴｸｽﾄﾗﾍﾞｯﾄﾞ等が全てあり､とても快適でした｡お部屋が広くﾘﾋﾞﾝｸﾞでも十分に寝るｽﾍﾟｰｽがあったため､夜中の授乳も家族を起こすことなく出来ました｡

立地はとてもよく､主要ﾎﾃﾙやｼｮｯﾋﾟﾝｸﾞｾﾝﾀｰ､ABCｽﾄｱなどには徒歩で行くことが出来ました｡お部屋にあった洗濯機と乾燥機のお蔭で､子どもたちが出す大量の汚れた洋服が溜まる事もありませんでした｡
生活に必要なものは一通りお部屋に揃っているため､長期滞在する方や小さなお子さんが居て部屋に居る時間が長い方には特におすすめです｡

ﾎｽﾄの方はﾏﾒに連絡をくださり､何かあればすぐに対応して下さり安心です｡

Jean-Michel is an exceptional host. Very attentive and offers to help. He even went out to buy beach chairs, new snorkels for kids and a cooler.  The unit is really well located with lots to do. The pool, hot tub are warm and clean.  The unit is perfect for a family of 4. The mattresses are comfy. We truly enjoyed our holiday and JM was part of its success. 
We would come back any time and would recommend it.
Great Stay!
Fantastic host and place to stay! Close to everything and very well stocked for a day at the beach or for great WiFi so you can work.

10か月､4歳の子供と一緒に家族で35日滞在しました｡Michelはﾁｪｯｸｲﾝの際に家の中の事を細かく教えてくれ､滞在中にもｺﾝｽﾀﾝﾄに連絡をくれ私たちが快適に過ごせるよう気遣ってくれました｡土足禁止な点と用意してくれたﾍﾞﾋﾞｰﾍﾞｯﾄﾞは高さが低いものだったので赤ちゃんがいても安心して過ごせました｡また､授乳ｸｯｼｮﾝや食事用ﾊｲﾁｪｱｰ､ﾌﾟﾗｽﾁｯｸｺｯﾌﾟや子供用おもちゃ(DVD､64色ｸﾚﾖﾝ､塗り絵､ﾋﾞｰﾁｸﾞｯｽﾞ､水中ﾒｶﾞﾈ､乳児用浮き輪)などがあり､充実ぶりに驚きました｡
乾燥機も完備されており1時間でﾌﾜﾌﾜに乾くので洋服は最低限持参すれば十分足りました｡ﾋﾞｰﾁ用ﾀｵﾙとお風呂用ﾀｵﾙ､ﾌｪｲｽﾀｵﾙなどが各5枚ぐらいありこちらも助かりました｡
お風呂はﾊﾞｽﾀﾌﾞがあり､ﾎｰｽﾀｲﾌﾟのｼｬﾜｰだったので子供を入浴させるのに便利でゆっくり浸かれました｡
部屋からはｺﾝﾄﾞﾐﾆｱﾑのﾌﾟｰﾙが見え､4歳の子供は毎日ﾌﾟｰﾙを利用しました｡ﾌﾟｰﾙにはｻｳﾅやｼﾞｬｸﾞｼﾞｰもあり夜遅くまで使えるのでのんびり浸かっている大人も多かったです｡
ｷｯﾁﾝも清潔で､炊飯器､調理器具､調味料一式(油､塩こしょう､ｺﾞﾏ油､ｶﾞｰﾘｯｸﾊﾟｳﾀﾞｰなど)､洗剤などがそろっていました｡ﾜｲｷｷは日本食のｽｰﾊﾟｰもあるので何でも手に入りますが物価が高いので乾麺やめんつゆは持参して良かったと思いました｡
ﾊﾞｽ停から徒歩3分の立地なので､毎日ﾊﾞｽを利用していた私たちにとってはとても便利でした｡ｺﾝﾄﾞﾐﾆｱﾑの1階はｺﾝﾋﾞﾆのような店舗があり､
ATMもありました｡お水や牛乳など重たいものを買うのには便利です｡
子連れの長期滞在で出発前から色々心配でしたがMichelはﾚｽﾎﾟﾝｽ良く返事をくれ､本当に良かったです｡
ﾊﾜｲに滞在するときはまた是非利用したいです｡

부모님 포함 성인 가족 5인이 5박6일 동안 지내고 왔습니다. 지내는 동안 너무나 만족스러운 숙소였고 가장 좋았던 점은 시설도 물론 좋았지만 위치가 너무 좋았습니다. 와이키키와도 도보 10분거리이고 와이키키 주변 번화가와도 5분이내 도보 이동할 수 있어 너무 좋았습니다. 특히 와이키키 주변은 차량 주차가 힘든데 숙소 주차장에 차를 주차 후 도보로 주변을 돌아볼수있어 너무 좋았습니다. 다른 지역으로 이동시에도 숙소에서 하이웨이로의 진입이 가까워 이동에 정말 편리했습니다. 만약 어린아이가 있으시면 숙소 4층에 수영장을 이용 하실 수 있고 저희 부모님께서는 수영장옆 건습 사우나와 자쿠지를 너무 좋아하셨습니다. 또한 숙소에서 식사를 해 드시고자 하면 도보 10분 거리내의 대형 마트가 있어 필요한 식료품등을 쉽게 구매할수 있습니다. 그리고 숙소 1층에 한국분이 운영하시는 미니마트가 있어 급한 물건 등은 그곳에서 구매할수도 있습니다. 또한 호스트인 jean michel이 필요할때마다 너무 친절하게 도와줘서 정말 마음에 드는 숙소였습니다. 다음에 다시 하와이를 방문한다면 재방문 의사 100% 입니다. 가격대비 정말 좋은 숙소이니 후회하지않으실것같습니다 .

Jean-Michel is nice, flexible and accommodating host. If you have special requests, ask him , he will work with you. The condo is spacious and clean and the best part is there’s free parking and it’s in the middle of Waikiki, walking distance to the beach and restaurants. Mahalo Jean-Michel!!!!

JM is a perfect host and very attentive.
Condo is super clean and cozy.
Waikiki beach is only 10 mins away from the condo and there is everything you need in only footsteps away. 
I will definately stay here again next time if I have a chance. 
Thanks again JM:)

3歳と1歳の子連れり旅行でしたが､ﾍﾞﾋﾞｰﾍﾞｯﾄﾞやﾊｲﾁｪｱなどがあり､日本と変わらない生活がおくれまし送れました｡土足厳禁のお部屋で清潔感もあったので衛生面で非常に安心感がありました｡また､ござや椅子､浮き輪など様々なﾋﾞｰﾁｸﾞｯｽﾞがあり非常に重宝しました｡
ｵｽｽﾒのお部屋です｡

Third accommodation through Airbnb ~ ~ !!! The first was disappointing due to air conditioning breakdown, and the second was so well equipped, the third Hawaiian hostel was a completely second-floor hostel. Location, emanity, designated parking space, host of the hostel were all satisfied with the family. I want to use Hawaii again later.
아이와 부모님과 여행하는 분들에게 추천합니다. 호텔보다 지내는 동안 좋았습니다. 편의시설도 잘 갖춰져있고, 오래 머무는 분들이라면 Jean-Michel 숙소를 선택하면 후회 없을것 같습니다. 다시 하와이에 가게 된다면, 또 머물고 싶습니다.

Jean-Michel was very flexible with the check-in time and check-out time which was very convenient for us with our flight times. It was nice of him to welcome us in and set up an air bed for us. The walk to restaurants, Waikiki beach, and shopping area is very short, very convenient. The WiFi was just kind of slow for my taste. Other than that, this place is perfect for staying in Waikiki.

親切で､土足禁止な室内はとても綺麗でした｡DVDが用意されていたり､各ｸﾞｯｽﾞもたくさん用意されていていました｡
ｱｸｾｽも非常に良かったです｡

도착 예정일 한달전에 예약했는데 AirBnb를 통한 메일로 게스트가 추가로 필요한 사항이 없는지 세심하게 챙겨주시고 
공항에서 숙소로 이동하는 방법과 렌트시 주차와 체크인 및 체크아웃 방법 등을 친절하게 알려줘 아주 편안하게 잘 다녀왔습니다.

Jean-Michel was an excellent host with a perfectly situated apartment. He was communicative and responsive before and during our vacation to Honolulu, making check-in and check-out extremely easy. There were a lot of thoughtful touches that made the apartment ideal for a family vacation: beach towels in addition to bath towels; crayons, coloring books, and story books for young children; and beach toys, pool floats, and snorkeling gear! We didn't have to purchase any beach/pool gear because he had it all. Jean-Michel set up extra air mattresses ahead of time (per our request) and made up all the beds with clean sheets, pillows, and blankets. The apartment itself is not that huge, but when you're in the heart of Waikiki, there's really no need to stay indoors--and the unit has a little balcony where you can enjoy some fresh air. The building has a swimming pool, hot tub, and outdoor grills on the fifth floor, and is very conveniently located--there's a convenience store right next to the main entrance, and it's right by all kinds of restaurants and shops. I'd definitely stay here again.

Jean-Michel was very accommodating throughout our check-in process. The unit was very clean, and had many extra towels and toiletries - also included a washer and dryer, and added bonus... a parking space! The location was wonderful - close to everything in Waikiki, and it was only a ~25 minute walk to Ala Moana. Perfect for 4 guests.

I used to work in Waikiki as a doorman to pay my way through college - so I know places to avoid. This location is excellent. Walk to the beach or a myriad of restaurants and shopping.
The one bedroom and living room was large enough for my college age children and my wife and I. Full kitchen and bath, w/d and free covered parking. We were fortunate to land this place for Christmas in Hawaii. Host is responsive!
Great stay for me and my family!

해변에 놀러가기도 좋고 집 근처에 유명한 쇼핑몰과 음식점들이 많아서 좋았습니다 무엇보다 주차공간이 확실히 마련되어있다는 점도 큰 장점인 것 같습니다 호스트는 굉장히 친절하시고 체크인전부터 체크아웃하는 날까지 불편사항은 없는지 세심하게 체크해주십니다 투숙기간중에도 빠른 답변에 놀랐습니다 하와이에서의 첫 숙소였는데 호스트분 덕분에 안심하고 여행을 순조롭게 시작할 수 있었습니다 적극 추천합니다-!!
It is not a bustling hotel pool, but a secluded apartment pool, and is a perfect place for family travelers in terms of accessibility to Waikiki and free parking.
Jean-Michel is the perfect host and his place is fabulous.

Jean-Michel was a great host to us during our 5 day stay in Waikiki. He met us for our checkin and showed us the key features of the condo which made us fee at ease and comfortable. The condo was very clean, well presented and comfortable and I would have no trouble in recommending this stay to other air bnb users.

This was a great example of the air bnb experience! 

Thanks Jean-Michel!!
Best host & good location.

name: Double room in the middle of Gracia
summary: La casa está situada en el centro del barrio de Gracia. Ofrecemos una habitación con cama doble. Las paradas de metro más cercanas son Fontana (L3) y Diagonal (L3 y L5). También se puede llegar a Plaça Catalunya paseando por Passeig de Gràcia (25') The house is located in the center of Gracia neighborhood. We offer a room with double bed. The closest metro stations are Fontana (L3) and Diagonal (L3 and L5). You can have a nice walk to Plaça Catalunya, walking trought Passeig de Gràcia (25')
description: La casa está situada en el centro del barrio de Gracia. Ofrecemos una habitación con cama doble. Las paradas de metro más cercanas son Fontana (L3) y Diagonal (L3 y L5). También se puede llegar a Plaça Catalunya paseando por Passeig de Gràcia (25') The house is located in the center of Gracia neighborhood. We offer a room with double bed. The closest metro stations are Fontana (L3) and Diagonal (L3 and L5). You can have a nice walk to Plaça Catalunya, walking trought Passeig de Gràcia (25')

reviews.comments:
The room was in a prime location near brilliant local restaurants and very close to main line metro which was handy for getting around. 

The room we stayed in was really comfortable and clean with plenty of storage space.

Very cute hosts. They were very flexible and communicable, allowed us to leave our luggage because we had late flight and also helped me with after sun lotion because I was red after beach) Nice, clean and cute place to live. Easy to get everything from their place.  in few minutes great place to eat that recommend Anna - SMS. Thanks.
Todo perfecto. Muy amables y un piso limpio y acogedor. Nos ayudaron también con algunas dudas sobre la ciudad.  Sin duda recomendable!
Anna is very nice and available. the flat is very nice and clean too, bed comfortable. as Gracia is a bit a noisy district, don't forget your earplugs to sleep well :)
Sejour parfait Anna nous a tres bien accueilli, tarif tres abordable pour une localisation parfaite dans Barcelone ; je recommande!
Nice place to stay in Barcelona!  Anna and her friend are very nice and uncomplicated. We would come again!
Cómodo, limpio, bien situado. Todo muy fácil

Todo muy bien !! Ademas Anna nos ayudo con las direcciones de los lugares que queriamos visitar y como movilizarnos para llegar a ellos. El departamento esta muy bien ubicado, muy cerca al Paseo de la Gracia y los lugares turísticos  y cerca al Metro y estaciones de buses, estuvo  limpio y ordenado y la conexion de internet funciona muy bien. Gracias Anna !!

Andrea and Anna were wonderful hosts who made us feel very welcome! They were easy to communicate with before arriving and made sure we had all the right info when we got to their place about the apartment and city. I only wish we had more time to get to know them! You guys are most welcome wherever we are in the future!

Week-end très agréable! Rapport qualité prix excellent.
Chambre propre et quartier propre !

I had been in Barcelona for a night with my boyfriend. The position is great if you want go out in a quarter not so tiristic. Anna was nice and helpful. The room and the bathroom are essential but comfortable. Good experience.

Le immagini del appartamento corrispondono alla realtà. Ampio, pulito ed in ottima posizione. La stanza va bene per due persone, provvista di lenzuola ed asciugamani puliti. Facile raggiungere le attrazioni turistiche come godere delle bellezze della città e dei servizi dello stesso quartiere di Gracia. Host e coinquilina gentilissime, accoglienti e discrete. Ci ha accolto col sorriso anche se eravamo in ritardo, mostrato le sale comuni della casa (cucina disponibile per cucinare anche se noi non la abbiamo usata), e disponibile per informazioni. Consigliato!
Anna y Andrea son increíbles, nos dejaron usar su lavadora y todo estuvo genial, su departamento es muy acogedor y son excelentes anfitrionas, no se arrepentirán de quedarse con ellas!!
Mi estancia en la casa de Anna fue solo de una noche; el alojamento es simple y sencillo pero todo funciona a la perfección, la cama es muy cómoda. Anna y su inquilino fueron simpáticos y amables.

Anna fue muy agradable y nos hizo sentir como en Anna fue muy agradable y nos hizo sentir como en casa. Nos puso muchas facilidades con la hora de llegada y con la de salida. La casa estaba impecable y resultaba muy cómoda y céntrica. Sin duda volvería a repetir, muy recomendable. Nos puso muchas facilidades con la hora de llegada y con la de salida. La casa estaba impecable y resultaba muy cómoda y céntrica. Sin duda volvería a repetir, muy recomendable.

El Piso de Anna tiene una buenísima ubicación: el barrio es tranquilo, está cerca el metro Fontana, y caminando te puedes desplazar sobre el Paseo de Gracia, en donde encuentras La Pedrera y la Casa Batlló de Gaudí (de los principales atractivos arquitectónicos de Barcelona), así como otros atractivos (tiendas y restaurantes). Anna es una persona tranquila y accesible, me dio indicaciones de como llegar a su casa, y luego me explicó como usar las cosas de la cocina y las llaves; asimismo, en su casa tienes mucha privacidad y comodidad, la habitación es limpia y ordenada, la cama es cómoda, el baño es muy limpio y ordenado, está a unos seis metros de la habitación pero no incomoda la distancia porque tienes privacidad. Lo único a tomar en cuenta es que no hay elevador en el edificio y son varias escaleras las que hay que subir para llegar al piso, entonces eso hace un poco cansada la subida y bajada, y peor si vas con maletas cargadas que es lo que me pasó a mí, pero por lo demás el lugar es muy recomendado, y si no llevas mucha carga o no te molesta subir escaleras, es excelente.
Visite de Barcelone totalement à pied c est parfait logement agréable ancien logement manque d insonorisation

Ana nos acogió bien desde el principio y no tuvimos ningún problema en el apartamento , nos encantó porque el piso está en el centro del maravilloso barrio de gracia ! El único inconveniente que podría decir es que al ser un piso viejo entraba frío por las ventanas aunque hubiera climatización . Pero por el resto fue genial ;)

First of all, Anna and Borja are wonderful hosts who go above and beyond to make your stay comfortable - we had space set aside for us in the fridge and in the cupboards in the kitchen, they left ear plugs in the bed room in case you need extra silence when you sleep (we didn't need them) and little maps and brochures for Barcelona. Anna even offered me after-sun when I had burnt myself in the sun :) honestly they're wonderful people (who speak Catalan, Spanish AND English, and I think Borja speaks French), the flat is great, the room is comfortable and cosy. I felt my partner and I had plenty of privacy and space. It is well-located in Gracia, one of my favourite neighbourhoods. It is situated near the metro and local amenities (and if you fancy a stroll into the center it's around 30 or so mins). I was really hesitant about sharing a place with hosts as I've never done it before, but if every experience is like this, there is nothing to worry about. A thousand times thank you to Anna and Borja!
Notre séjour s'est tres bien passé, rien a dire ! Tout était tres bien ! Je revolande
Location was great, we walked to most of the places and it was a nice, lively neighborhood. The hosts were hospitable and flat was so clean, we are definitely satisfied with our stay.

La casa di Anna corrisponde perfettamente alle foto pubblicate.
Comoda per posizione, metro facilmente raggiungibile a piedi e a poca distanza dalle principali attrazioni della città. 
Cortesia e disponibilità assoluto valore aggiunto! 
Consigliato
Tip top ; )
Essential accomodation, simple and very clean: perfect for our needs. The surroundings are a bit noisy at night but Anna was very kind to provide us with earplugs.

Es un buena habitación. Anna nos ayudó mucho con todo. Muy servicial. La zona es muy cómoda y práctica. A 20 minutos a pie de plaza Cataluña. Muchos colectivos y metro en la zona. El barrio es tranquilo, un poco ruidosa la calle a la noche (el único punto negativo). Todo muy limpio y ordenado en la habitación. Muchas gracias, Anna y pareja!
Sabri y Quique

We lived in Anna's apartment since from June17 to 22. We are satisfied with our choice. The guys are friendly, hospitable, they gave us a lot of advice and useful information (thanks Anna for flamenco and gazpacho). 
The apartment is bright, clean, the room is not very big and noise from the street is heard, but it did not stop us, and the guys give earplugs. To the metro you can reach in 5 minutes, until the Sagrada de Familias and the Park Guell on foot 20 minutes, we reached the beach by metro (without a transfer to the metro station Selva de Mar). Thank you, guys!!!

Anna and her boyfriend were very welcoming and communicated quickly and effectively with us! Her place was pretty convenient and in a nice location, close to public transport and walkable to many things.  We enjoyed our stay in Barcelona very much!

Anna was a brilliant host! Her place is clean, easy to get to from the airport and well served by public transports. The area is central, with plenty of bars and little restaurant at a decent price. It is very lively in the evening and safe for people to walk around at night time (we were two girls and never felt threatened in any way). Anna and Borja were very welcoming and gave us many good tips on things to do in the city. I definitely recommend this place!

name: Cozy room at the Leme
summary: Our House is small and very charming. Has two bedrooms and a kitchen/dining room, overlooking the street, to the top of the Leme's Fort and a small sea view as shown in the photos. It Is easy to access and location.
description: Our House is small and very charming. Has two bedrooms and a kitchen/dining room, overlooking the street, to the top of the Leme's Fort and a small sea view as shown in the photos. It Is easy to access and location. 24 inch tv with cable  Bed linen (except towels) and household items. Furnished house Cleaning and hygiene products (excluding toothpaste, laundry detergent) We offer other services outside the package The House is located five minutes from Leme's beach, by foot. There is the possibility of hiking. There is a vast gastronomic pole. The bus stop is 10 minutes from the site on foot and there are alternative modes of transportation.
neighborhood_overview: The House is located five minutes from Leme's beach, by foot. There is the possibility of hiking. There is a vast gastronomic pole.
transit: The bus stop is 10 minutes from the site on foot and there are alternative modes of transportation.
access: 24 inch tv with cable  Bed linen (except towels) and household items. Furnished house Cleaning and hygiene products (excluding toothpaste, laundry detergent) We offer other services outside the package
house_rules: 1 - Não Fumar nos espaços comuns da casa. 2 - Manter o local e as louças limpas e guardadas nos locais adequados. 3 - Não exceder o número máximo de pessoas,nem trazer visitantes que não estejam hospedados. 4 - Evitar barulhos depois das 22hs e antes das 7hs.

name: Enjoy the summer at sea! Full studio at the beach
summary: Lindo e charmoso studio na zona sul do RJ/ mobiliado ideal para casal . Possui cozinha completa, tv a cabo, wifi, máquina de café, ar-Condicionado, cama queem size e um sofá cama futton. Fica na quadra da praia, parque do Flamengo, Pão açúcar e metrô.
space: A very special place in the heart of Rio de Janeiro. Come enjoy your vacation to rest or prepare for a business meeting in the most charming and quiet neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro. Surrounded by Imperial Palms, tall plants and typical of our tropical country, the neighborhood is surrounded by beautiful specimens. The buildings give charm to the décor art. The Studio is located a few meters from the beach and Flamengo Park where you can enjoy the sea and exercising in miles Ciclovia close viewing of the Sugar Loaf and forward looking left Christ the Redeemer. The apartment sleeps up to 4 people on holiday or 2 people with Total Privacy! Quiet environment. IDEAL FOR COUPLES! 24 hours concierge, wi fi, cable tv, refrigerator, microwave, lcd tv, bike rack. The apartment is located next to Famous Neighborhoods neighbors: Santa Tereza / Lapa / Copacabana / Ipanema / Leblon Sugarloaf / Cristo Redentor / Pedra da Gávea 5 Minutes walking to the subway and 2 minutes walking to the bus. 2 Minut

Surrounded by Imperial Palms, tall plants and typical of our tropical country, the neighborhood is surrounded by beautiful specimens. The buildings give charm to the décor art.
