access: Todo o lugar.
interaction: Se você não tem roteiro pelo Rio de Janeiro, podemos juntos montá-lo. If you do not have script by Rio de Janeiro, together we can ride it. Si usted no tiene guión de Río de Janeiro, juntos podemos montarlo.
house_rules: Pessoas Educadas sempre ganham. Para transformar sua estadia em um momento inesquecível, cuide do lugar que te acolheu não deixando lixo espalhado e tendo cuidado com os utensílios, respeitando o horário de silêncio do prédio a partir das 10 pm. PARA PACOTES ESPECIAIS/ CARNAVAL - FAVOR CONSULTAR ANTES Educated people always win. To turn your stay into an unforgettable moment, take care of the place that welcomed you leaving trash scattered and taking care of the vessels, respecting the building quiet hours from 10 pm. Las personas educadas siempre ganan. Para hacer de su estancia un momento inolvidable, cuidar el lugar que le dio la bienvenida a dejar la basura dispersa y el cuidado de los vasos, respetando el edificio tranquilas horas de 10 pm.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Great place in a cool neighbourhood, very central, close to Lapa, santa Theresa, Corcovado. The appartement is small but its Rio! Remember you're not there to sit on a couch and watch TV. The host was very nice and gave great tips about the city. Definitely my place to stay in Rio.
The studio is exactly like on the pictures. Great location, close to the metro and cool places. Carmella gave us great tips to enjoy even more our stay in Rio.

Ficamos 5 dias no apartamento da Carmella durante os Olímpicos. O apartamento é super bem localizado no bairro de Flamengo com o metro e um supermercado as 5 minutes a pé.

O apartamento é limpo e tem bastante equipamento.

Carmella ficou disponível para ajudar e dar conselhos para nos ajudar a conhecer o melhor do Rio.

O apartamento é compacto, com tudo que a gente precisa, é uma graça. Muito silencioso, fomos muito bem recepcionados, recebemos varias dicas importates do que fazer e como se locomover. Anfitriã prestativa e muito simpatica. Obrigada Carmella a nossa estada no RJ foi excelente. Parabéns abração.
Amazing flat and very welcoming host! She made us feel at home, both at the flat and in Rio. 100% recommended.

O apto é bem fiel ao que está no site, mas o prédio é um tanto antigo . A cama também é um pouco dura, mas a localização do apto é excelente, perto de tudo, com facilidade de transporte. A Carmella é muito atenciosa e nos ajudou em tudo q precisamos, inclusive flexibilizando os horários de check In e check out conforme nossas necessidades.

name: Mosman Apartment
space: Light, bright, breezy and perfectly located. This one bedroom apartment is in the heart of Mosman.  Walk to village shops within minutes. Close to beautiful Balmoral Beach. Walk to Mosman Bay for a ferry to the Sydney CBD on a journey that takes you pass the Sydney Harbour Bridge and Opera House.   Well appointed - new eat-in kitchen, sun drenched deck.  The bedroom has a queen bed and French doors open to a sheltered veranda.
description: Light, bright, breezy and perfectly located. This one bedroom apartment is in the heart of Mosman.  Walk to village shops within minutes. Close to beautiful Balmoral Beach. Walk to Mosman Bay for a ferry to the Sydney CBD on a journey that takes you pass the Sydney Harbour Bridge and Opera House.   Well appointed - new eat-in kitchen, sun drenched deck.  The bedroom has a queen bed and French doors open to a sheltered veranda.
house_rules: Feel free to access the deck off the bedroom.  However, please ensure when you leave that all furniture is returned to the apartment. Thanks

host.host_about: My family time is precious to me.  We love spending time together in our beautiful home.  We spend a great deal of time outdoors - even in the cooler months.  We love to light a fire and sit around it telling stories.  Sharing a delicious homemade meal with family and friends fills me with joy.

reviews.comments:
Loved it! Clean, great location and quiet. Great apartment, everything there you need. 

Mags easy to contact if needed and quick to respond. Highly recommended.

We had a lovely 4 day  here. Great apartment, clean and with everything you could need, and in a beautiful part of Sydney. Mags was very patient with my endless emails and very easy to get in touch with.
We will certainly be recommending this place to friends.
Laura and Tim

My husband and I stayed at mags chic Mosman apartment to break our journey from London to our home up north. We know the area all and love this idyllic Mosman street which is quiet but close to great cafes, shops and the beach. We loved the clean simple furniture and Mags was so easy to deal with.
This is my first airbnb experience as a guest though I have hosted many times and we really enjoyed it.
Hope to stay at Mags lovely apartment again sometime, totally recommend it.

Mavis's apartment was charming, super clean and comfortable, and in a simply lovely residential part of Mosman with a five-minute walk to shops. The kitchen was well equipped, and public transport was 10 minutes away. We greatly enjoyed our stay and would gladly go back!

We enjoyed staying at this apartment very much.  My wife and I especially loved the location - great Sydney Ferries access and lovely neighborhood.  The apartment was charming, very clean, and well equipped.  Big thanks to Mags, for making us feel so welcome!

Thank you for sharing your beautifully appointment apartment with us Mags. Loved the claw bath and ornate ceilings! The location was perfect and the apartment and had everything we could possibly need. We'd love to stay again next time we are in Sydney.
Mags' Mosman apartment was lovely and had everything we needed. It was comfortable and cosy and quiet from city noise. It was within walking distance to a few little shops and takeaways.

A very easy, no-fuss booking experience. We used the accommodation for two nights as we had a wedding in the area. The location was perfect for us, and within easy walking to shops. The accommodation was great, and we would definitely use it again if we wanted to stay in the same area. We had our toddler with us (we took our own cot), and it was great to have a park and play equipment nearby. There was no microwave which would have been handy, but the kitchen is well-equiped to manage without it.

We're local to the area and were looking for somewhere for our visiting in-laws to stay (as our place is just to tiny to fit everyone).

We booked Mags' place and liked it so much we booked again a few weeks later.

Mags was terrific to deal with. Great communication. Very accommodating. An altogether terrific host. We'll definitely be booking again for their next visit and would highly recommend Mags' place to anyone else.

Thanks again Mags

Jillian & Jesse.

Really lovely apartment in quiet block, great federation bathroom and renovated kitchen. Super clean and well equipped, in a nice leafy neighbourhood close to shops and water.
Host is friendly and very fast to respond. Overall a very good experience, highly recommend.

Mag's single bedroom apartment was located in a lovely quiet street in Mosman  not far from Military Road.  Everything in the flat worked well. It was very easy to access, being right at the front of the block. We had a car and thought we might have trouble finding a park in the street, but this proved not to be too difficult either night we were there.

Thanks for your hospitality Mags.

Mags was very efficient in her communications and made accessing the apartment smooth and easy. Location is lovely and quiet, close to shops and restaurants, as well as scenic strolls around Sirius Cove. Apartment is nicely decorated and has everything you need. Bed is especially comfy. Just one note of caution - it can be quite cold on overcast winter days, as there is only one small heater in lounge room. Otherwise, we really enjoyed our stay.

Mags's apartment was spacious, tidy, and beautifully presented. Everything you need is there. Check-in & check-out & dealing with Mags was easy.

Location is perfect. The street is lovely & great for walking around. Breakfast place & shops just around the corner. Balmoral beach is a 30min. walk. 

I would stay here again & would highly recommend it to anyone.

What a fabulous little apartment in Mosman! We were down for a wedding and catch ups with friends and Mags' place was perfect.  Check in and check out was simple.  A bus stop, shops and cafes were a very short walk away and the apartment itself had everything you needed. Someone else mentioned that it was a bit cold with only a lounge room heater but there was actually an extra mobile heater when we stayed so we used it to warm up the room before bed and we felt really cosy.
I would definitely recommend this apartment to family and friends and I wouldn't hesitate in considering staying there again for another Sydney trip!

We had a lovely stay in Mags' Mosman apartment. It was exactly as the photos depict and absolutely spotless. The local area is residential with lots of lovely shops and cafés up on Military road. Balmoral beach was a 20 min walk away and circular quay a short ferry ride from south Mosman (the main Mosman ferry wharf was under re construction in September 2014 so was closed). Thanks Mags.

We would like to thank Mags for her hospitality.   The apartment was  in a lovely neighborhood not far from Military Road.  It was a about a 10-15 minute walk to Spit Junction where you can catch a bus  into the city.  We will refer others who visit Mosman and hope if/when we are able to return Mags' place will be available.

The Apartment is in a great location, close to shops, and eateries. If you don't mind a downhill walk it is also very handy to the Ferry from Mosman. A small, comfortable apartment to stay in and well appointed. ( no microwave if that bothers you) . We loved our stay and it suited our needs perfectly. It was easy to organize with Mags.
Cute apartment in a great neighborhood.  It has all the essentials, minus wifi.  A good bet for your money.

We had a wonderful visit to Mosman and the apartment was lovely. It was neat and tidy and the price was excellent.
The neighbourhood is so nice with all the trees and was also very quiet.
Parking was a bit of a nightmare but we expected that. The ease of booking and the communication with our host was seamless and everything was as described. We would definitely recommend this type of booking, area and our host.
Great apartment!! Really good location and had all the amenities you need for a short stay! Mags was great to deal with and quick to respond
The apartment is very well located and the kitchen has everything from dishwasher to washingmachine. Mags provided us with the basics we needed for breakfast. OK for a short stay.
Charming apartment a 20-minute ferry ride away from Central Quay. Okay for a short stay.

This apartment was very nice to stay in. The pictures are all very accurate. The location of the apartment is very convenient being around a 10 minute walk away from multiple shops. I recommend this apartment to anyone wishing to stay in the Mosman area.
Didn't see/meet the host. A clean flat with well equipped kitchen in a very quiet/safe feeling neighbourhood. We could walk to the bus, the ferry, shops and cafes. Good shower, comfy bed.

The apartment was wonderful and just what we needed for two people. It was super clean and conveniently located near local cafes, convenience stores and a newsagent. It's a bit of a hike uphill to the shops but well worth it and the ferry terminal is just at the bottom of the street. Can't wait to come back again!

Mags was friendly and communicative in her Emails but we had no personal contact. In fact ,we had become used to some personal touches from our airbnb hosts and this was somehow lacking.After a few days we grew more used to the apartment and could appreciate the  functional new kitchen and bathroom. Even though the photos do show the apartment correctly, the actual feel of the place was very different to what we had imagined.In our opinion a few improvements would make a lot of difference.Stepping in and out of the bath for the shower could be a problem for someone with limited mobility.
Mosman is a fantastic area to be in, beautiful tree lined streets with wonderful houses, shops and restaurants and the apartment is situated well for transport once you work out the bus and ferry connections.

The unit was very easy to find in a lovely part of Mosman. Mags gave great instructions, always got back to us very quickly answering any questions that we had. Her place was true to the photos, it was very cute, clean and tidy and felt quite secluded. It was exactly what we were after and everything we needed was provided. We were in Mosman attending a  wedding at Gunners Barracks, so we were very close to the venue. The unit is walking distance from lovely cafes on Avenue Road and we had a fantastic meal at Radio Cairo in Cremorne. The ferry is also walking distance but it is a bit of a hike up the hill, but great views on the way! All in all a very positive experience and very good value for money for accommodation in Sydney!

We had a lovely 3 day stay at Mag's apartment in Mosman. The apartment was very clean, well appointed and spacious and provided for all our needs. The bed was warm and comfortable and the kitchen well stocked. This apartment is in a lovely area with leafy streets, shops close by and easy access to ferries and buses. We will definitely be back.

The Art Deco, newly renovated apartment was meticulously clean, with new kitchen and bathroom. Comfortable airy bedroom, with french doors onto a front patio/balcony. We had a minor hiccup with not receiving the combination code for the door key, because the text message was truncated, but Mags was very gracious and patiently waited on the phone until we were able to access the key. All of this despite the late hour of our phone call! 
The apartment is in leafy, quiet Mosman, within easy walking distance of all the coffee shops & boutiques. Parking was on the street and we were able to get a park each night. It's a very short drive to Mosman wharf, to catch the ferry into the city.

We had a very pleasant stay and would recommend Mags' apartment as a comfortable home base for a short Sydney stopover.

What a wonderful place to stay! This was our second visit to Mag's apartment and it felt like coming home. 
Mag is a wonderful host and with everything on hand to make our stay more enjoyable. The process of booking and dealing with our host was very easy and Mags was most accommodating, as usual. 
The area is close to shops and cafés, which we loved. 
We will defiantly return.

The place was exactly what we were after - a bit of space and all the amenities of home. The apartment was also extremely clean, beautifully presented with lots of character and was well stocked with the basics.
The location is perfect - A short walk to military rd (fantastic cafes and shops), public transport (buses and ferry) and Balmoral (my favourite place on earth).
Whilst we had limited contact with our host, Mags, she was very accommodating of us (travelling with an infant), proactive in contacting us a few time ahead of arrival to make sure we had the information we needed, and knowledgeable of the local area. 
In summary, we had a great time, loved the place and would definitely stay there again.

Mags was prompt in communications and she was very flexible to check in and out times which we really appreciated.
The apartment is exactly as seen in the photos and had all the basics that we needed for a short stay in Mosman, it was clean, had a comfy bed and good shower. (though we did notice hot water seemed to run out quickly)
We didn't actually meet Mags and we missed the personal touch you often get when staying in airbnb accomodation.
The description was accurate and lovely location. We would definitely use this location and appartment again.

Hi Mags!! 

Had a great stay at your Mosman apartment. Definitely would recommend to others. 

If their was something that I would ask for improvement; it would be to have better towels. One had bleach marks on them and the other was to have a full length mirror. 

Thank you so much for your cafe/ restaurant recommendations. The family loved the boathouse in balmoral. 

Once again, thank you.

I did not Meet Mags in person but she was quick to return to me when I had queries and pleasant to deal with. The unit is basic but has everything you need for a short stay and was very tidy and clean.

Such a gorgeous apartment, Mags made the whole stay hassle free and very straight forward. Mosman is lovely, we stayed there for a wedding just down the road at Seargents Mess, Chowder Bay. An easy walk to the shops and restaurants of Mosman, quiet street. The apartment is immaculate, just lovely, thank you Mags.

Lovely apartment beautifully kept and modestly decorated.  Location of mosman very pretty with all amenities close by.  Lovely ferry ride to get to Sydney main area - would certainly return to this address if in mosman again.

Although the pictures of the apartment were fairly accurate, we were unfortunately disappointed with the apartment. The apartment is in an old building and has been fully refurbished, but the net effect is that the rooms are small and dark with large gaps under all the doors. 
Also there was no wifi, which we were not aware of when we booked, and was disappointing - I think this should be standard for all rentals. 
The apartment was clean - but we did find old food in the fridge and freezer.
Good location - easy walk to shops and ferry.

Mag's accomodation is a beautiful art deco apartment  in a quiet, beautiful location within minutes of the ferry which is a 20 min cruise into the city.  Mags was extremely courteous and helpful in answering any queries or issues that we encountered, and everything was dealt with in a concerned and expedient manner, including one unexpected issue that was quickly resolved ( thanks Mags and James :) The flat was well fitted out and we would love to visit again. One of the nicest places we have visited in Sydney. Thanks again Mags!!
Great communication by host and the place was as described in the listing.

We loved our stay here.  The flat is very comfortable and the location, perfect.  The web photos don't do it justice.  The street itself is extremely quiet yet within a short walking distance to shops, restaurants and good public transport.  We also found the place had an ideal weather aspect and always attracted a nice breeze.  Mags was a very efficient host from start to finish.  We were sorry to leave and look forward to a return visit.

Communication with Mags was excellent from the start. When the washing machine was in need of repair prior to our arrival, she let us know, suggested an alternative, and left a change of linens. The apartment was ready for us and was as described. It was simply furnished, but had everything we needed. We did not use the kitchen, so I can't really speak to that, but we enjoyed the deep claw foot tub, abundant hot water, and a good shower. The key lock box  system was efficient and convenient. We enjoyed the quiet, tree-lined street and the short walk to coffee shops, food, and pharmacy. There is no wi-fi and cell connection was spotty.  Overall, the apartment was a good choice for us.
The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Nice tidy apartment in a great area.

The apartment was lovely, comfortable and quiet. 5 min walk to Mosman village where all the shops/cafes/restaurants are. Beautiful Balmoral is only a 15-20 min walk (5 min drive) and the Sydney CBD is easily accessible by ferry or bus. Communications with Mags was really easy.
Great spot to stay and suited us down to the ground. Host was spot on with communication and offering.

Het appartement ligt in een rustige straat en op loopafstand van zee en ferry naar the city Sydney. De voorzieningen zijn basic, geen extra comfort. Geen wifi. Het appartement is donkerder dan foto's suggereren. Prijs / kwaliteit verhouding niet in evenwicht.

My husband and I stayed here for 3 nights for a kid free getaway! We loved the Stylish little apartment in a charming old block in Mosman. Beautiful balmoral beach is. 20 minute walk away - it's a good walk (not one you'd want to do with kids though) Balmoral is a stunning place to relax and swim! The apartment is a 5 minute walk to some great local food options and shops. Lovely quiet area but so close to everything makes is a perfect option!

We have stayed in this apartment on 3 separate occasions, covering a period of nearly four months in total.  Why? It is a spacious airy apartment, ideal for two people, well equipped and nicely furnished, and the landlord has been a joy to deal with on each occasion. The residents of the other apartments have always been friendly and welcoming which is a plus.
	The raison detrê of this apartment however is its location. 
Local buses and shops are a 5 min stroll, with the main shopping centre of Mosman a short bus ride or 20 min walk. Mosman has all one can want in terms of shopping, two small supermarkets, and delightful local shops where we have always found friendly and excellent service, unlike the UK. The library is ideal for wi fi should you need it. In addition there is a local free bus (2 min away) which will take you shopping, to Balmoral beach and Taronga Zoo.  
The Ferry stop to the City is but a 15 min walk or 2 min bus ride.
We cannot recommend this apartment highly enough, for either a short or long stays. We will continue to return here as long as we are able, as it now become home from home.
This apartment is a gorgeous space and in a great location. It was also super quiet and near to the ferry which makes it a great trip into the city. Would stay here again.
Very cute one bedder and wonderfully close to Mosman Ferry for a glorious trip into the city.

Mags' Mosman home is absolutely gorgeous. As a family of three is had everything we could possibly need. We were very comfortable and really settled in for a few months. This place is really more equipped for shortterm stays however.

The big, soaking tub was really lovely and the leafy, breezy outlet was beautiful. The proximity to the local shops, park and waterfront at Mosman Bay made life really easy. The ferry wharves nearby were easy to walk to and connections very frequent for Sydney. The bus was harder to get- but by no means impossible.

Balmoral beach is very close and we spent lots of time there. The bus stop to get the bus to the beach is a fair walk away- but worth it to avoid the nightmare parking situation in summer! Mind you- the drive isn't far at all, so if you get lucky that is the easiest option.

The walk down to Sirius Cove dog beach is lovely and the swimming there is not bad either. You can continue your walk along the headline all the way around to Athol Bay for even better swimming or Taronga Zoo entry.

We only had trouble finding a street parking spot maybe twice in almost three months- so that was pretty manageable I'd say.

The Orpheum Theatre is delightful and the shopping on Military Road east was great.

Beware there is no wifi, microwave or toaster! It's a bit like taking a step back in time. But we loved it all the same.
The host canceled this reservation 27 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great little spot
Clean apartment in a quiet street
Very clean house on leafy quiet street, a few minutes walk from many shops and restaurants
Great location. Peaceful, perfect for relaxing. Great cafe's and coffee close by. Would definitely return.
Gorgeous Art Deco apartment close to shops and ferry ⛴
Great location and well set up. Thanks.
Fantastic stay. Great apartment and spot. Look forward to coming back.

This is the perfect little apartment to base yourself if you’d like to explore the local area or have commitments in the city requiring an overnight stay or two. This gorgeous place has character & charm with a warm and welcoming feel. It’s in a very peaceful and beautiful location. The claw foot bath is a welcome feature for those who like to relax in a deep hot bath listening to the birds. Mags the host was friendly, professional and very responsive in all communications. Thank you Mags
A perfect space to relax and get some work done! The lounge and bed were so comfy and the apartment is cosy and welcoming.
the host had great communication mthe location was very well placed. checking in and checking out were easy.  the place was clean everything was very nice. I would recommend this place.
Great apartment with everything you need in a lovely leafy suburb.
Mags' place is a comfortable, well situated home away from home, in the leafy and peaceful surrounds of Sydney's lower north shore. It was a really nice place to stay.

Good location for Mosman, shops and for ferries to circular quay.
Flat a bit dark but well equipped. It suited us well. Communication with host good. Will book again.
The apartment was in a lovely quiet street and well set up for a couple. There was easy access to local shops and habour walks. Mags was easy to communicate with and very accommodating.

name: Modern Apartment close to the Beach
summary: O meu espaço fica perto de praia, restaurantes, atividades para famílias, belas paisagens, arte e cultura, desporto, piscina, Lidl, metro. Vai adorar o meu espaço por causa de a localização, a cozinha, e as vistas. O meu espaço é bom para casais, viajantes de negócios e famílias.
description: O meu espaço fica perto de praia, restaurantes, atividades para famílias, belas paisagens, arte e cultura, desporto, piscina, Lidl, metro. Vai adorar o meu espaço por causa de a localização, a cozinha, e as vistas. O meu espaço é bom para casais, viajantes de negócios e famílias. The listing is close to the beach, to the metro witch goes to Porto, Airport and others. It's also close to a swimming pool and a park for sports.
transit: The listing is close to the beach, to the metro witch goes to Porto, Airport and others. It's also close to a swimming pool and a park for sports.
house_rules: permitido fumar na varanda

reviews.comments:
Fabuloso apartamento de lujo con unos anfitriones simpáticos, atentos y pendientes en todo momento de que nuestra estancia fuera lo mejor posible.
El apartamento tiene todas las prestaciones de un alojamiento de la máxima calidad. Posee los últimos adelantos constructivos y de habitabilidad. La cocina está absolutamente equipada con todo tipo de electrodomésticos. Las habitaciones son preciosas, con unos armarios amplios y unas camas grandes con colchones comodisimos. El salón, las televisiones, los baños amplios y súper modernos, los cómodos sofás, la agradable y amplia terraza con agradables vistas, los grandes armarios... son sólo algunos ejemplos del gran número de prestaciones que contribuyen a que este apartamento sea una magnífica elección para quienes quieran disfrutar de una estancia fantástica en una zona tranquila y bien comunicada de la costa portuguesa. El apartamento tiene, además, mucha luz natural y es absolutamente silencioso: perfecto para un sueño saludable. Matrícula de honor para el apartamento y para Arlindo y su mujer.

Arlindo y su mujer fueron unos anfitriones inmejorables, atentos en todo momento para que no nos faltase de nada. El apartamento estaba limpio y en perfectas condiciones (mejor aún que en fotos). Nos sentimos como en casa y con todas las comodidades. 100% recomendadisimo

Arlindo y su mujer son unos anfitiornes extraordinarios. Nos recibieron tal y como habiamos acordado y nos obsequiaron con detalles poco habituales al llegar al apartamento (vino, quesos, leche, lo necesario para le desayuno, etc).
El apartamento, los muebles y los enseres de la cocina y los baños están practicamente a estrenar por lo que están en un estado inmejorable, además de que no se echa nada en falta. Se encuentra a 500 metros de la playa y a 500 metros del centro del pueblo  y no hay problemas para aparcar en la puerta.
Un 10 sobre 10 para Arlindo y su apartamento
Superbe appartement, très propre et équipé à la perfection. Très calme proche de la plage. Commerces à proximité. Idéal pour des vacances en famille ou entre amis.

Superbe appartement, très propre très agréable. Extrêmement bien equipé. Commerces à proximité, proche de la plage. Très bien accueilli par les propriétaires. Idéal pour des vacances en famille ou entre amis.

Arlindo's apartment is modern and spotlessly clean. It has a nice balcony and is situated close to the beach. Arlindo and his family were there to receive us and show us around. They were very friendly and made us (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was easy, every question we had was answered satisfactory.

В квартире чисто, тихо, просторно. Хозяева позаботились о том, чтобы там сразу можно жить: чай, кофе, масло, соль, сахар,местные пирожные...
В холодильнике- бутылочка белого вина и немного деликатесов, на столе-бутылочка красного вина. Моющие средства и для посудомоечной и для стиральной машины. Совсем рядом магазин Lidl, где можно купить все необходимое

El apartamento está muy bien, amplio, muy limpio y nuevo, tal y como aparece en las fotos. Es luminoso y cómodo. A destacar la cocina, totalmente equipada. Los anfitriones muy amables y atentos con un generoso detalle de bienvenida. Nos sentimos como en casa.

Magnifique appartement, propreté rigoureuse, équipement complet, accueil chaleureux...tout simplement parfait !
À recommander +++++

What a lovely space. Within walking distance to the beaches and village, it’s a perfect home for relaxing in style! Amazing terrace for relaxing with some wine. The home is spotless and furnished with exquisite taste. Super comfortable large beds, kitchen with everything a chef would need and super helpful hosts. Perfect!
O apartamento é excelente, de primeira qualidade em todos aspectos, e a acolhida da Lucia e Arlindo muito afetuosa.

This is a stunning apartment in a great location. Everything appears brand new and it was extremely clean and well kept. Beds were very comfortable and kitchen very well equipped with Bosch appliances and every pot, pan cup and glass you could wish for. A nice balcony that gets the sun in late afternoon and evening. The apartment is well located about a 10 minute walk to the beach or the town centre. The metro station is about 20/25 minutes walk away. Lots of places to eat close by and the beaches are well served with bars for lunch. The Lidl is a 5 minute walk and has pretty much everything you need. There was a welcome pack that really helped us out as we arrived late so the ham,  cheese and wine hit the spot. We were met by Lucia at the apartment even though it was nearly midnight and her son translated for us. They were very helpful and said we could call them if we needed. We did once to enquire about taxis and they sorted a company for us. Really good people. I cannot say enough about the place its stunning apartment that I would be happy to live in full time. Thanks again Lucia.
Recomendo!

A nice and complete room, wonderful pools, gym, 15 minutes by walk to the nearest mall, very responsive owner,  and a very reasonable price, what else do you need to complete your wonderful experience in Istanbul? THIS IS DEFINITELY THE PLACE TO GO TO! I will definitely suggest this place to everybody who will visits istanbul. The owner is very toughtful also, and she is very nice.

name: Cozy Comfy Suite of Rockaway Beach
summary: Enjoy a luxury and cozy stay at Arverne by the sea beachfront community in the Rockaways. This suite is walking distance to all shops, restaurants like "Thai Kitchen by the Sea, Boardwalk Pizzeria and Dunkin' Donuts. Transportation to  A train, Q22 and QM17 are only blocks away. This is a terrific stay for solo adventurers, couples, friends & families and business travelers.
space: Our suite includes a private bath, a queen platform bed, a twins bed and a sofa bed. As well as a water dispenser, small dining table, and work desk. We also provide fresh and clean bedding, towels, and basic toiletries.  Our suite is next to a set of stairs. When inside the room, you might be able to hear the sound of people going up and down the stairs. Room will be set up base on how many guest is listed in the booking. First two guest uses the queen size bed. Third guest uses the twin size bed. Fourth guest used the sofa bed.

neighborhood_overview: What's around: - The subway, A train, is few blocks away. - The beach is just 2 blocks away.  - Places to eat: Thai Kitchen by the Sea, Boardwalk Pizzeria & Restaurant, Dunkin' Donuts, Subway, Tacos Y Mas, Tio Pollo, and more! - Places to shop: Stop & Shop, Breakwater Surf Co. - Other: Chase Bank, Bank of America
transit: There is free parking by our house (on request prior to the day of checking in.) The A train is 5 minutes walk away, takes a hour to get to Manhattan during the week and during weekend, it can take up to an hour and half.  We are two stop from Howard Beach - JFK  AirTrain station, which take around 15-20 minutes to get to.
interaction: Please feel free to contact us, we will try to accommodate all your needs during your stay.
house_rules: Please treat our home with respect! Put things away after using and leave them in its original condition. Please place all garbage in the wastebasket. Conserve energy and water! Please don't forget to turn off the lights when not in use, or before you leave. No smoking anywhere inside the house.  Please be mindful of neighbors.

reviews.comments: Safa's place was perfect- just what we needed for a short trip to the beach. The place was clean,  quiet,  and had all of the necessities.  The fridge and water cooler were life savers!

This was a wonderful place to stay!!! Really close to the beach. Safa (or the woman who checked us in) was super flexible about our arrival time and took care to make sure everything was set up and clean. In the morning a neighbor had parked us in and she quickly took care of it. Easy to walk to the beach, easy to park, really clean and simple and great.
Safa was very responsive and helpful.  Our accommodations were clean and cozy and perfect for a beach weekend getaway! Very close to the beach and boardwalk, and places to get food and go surfing!
房间崭新舒适,交通便利｡房东热情好客

This was the perfect place for a beach getaway. It felt more like a studio apartment than a room in someone's home, just without a full kitchen (microwave and fridge though!). The room was incredibly clean and the AC was strong and quiet. 5 minute walk from the beach. So great!
Highly recommend staying at this property. Extremely clean, great location minutes from the beach. Host was very courteous. Definitely booking this property again soon!
Clean,  easy, and a quick walk to the beach.  Basically like a hotel room. Safa was quick to respond and very helpful.
Place was convenient, clean and comfortable.  Safa was a pleasure to deal with.
Very nice and clean room! Perfect location for seightseeing New York and a little bit relax on the beach!
Ordentliches, zweckmäßiges Zimmer. Ideal für die Nacht vor dem Rückflug vom JFK Flughafen. Sehr nah zum Rockaway Beach. Die Kommunikation war gut, Ein-und Auschecken haben sehr gut geklappt.

We booked this place for one night based on very good reviews. I had a half marathon race in the next early morning. When we arrived, Derek (the premise manager) welcomed us and everything looked nice, comfortable and clean. The location is also good (close to the A train station and the beach). 
However, it was not quiet during the night sleep. We were woken up by constant loud noises ( between 12am and 2:30am ) from the tenant family (apparently, who also rent and stay in the house but on a different floor or room). We had no choice but called Derek around 12:16am and later with SMS, but the situation was not under control. The tenant's kids kept speaking loudly and running around, we could not get any sleep between 12-2:30am at all. We felt exhausted and bad in the next morning due to disruptions of night sleep (remember, I also had 13miles race to run).  Definitely, it requires further improvements.

The unit was exactly as advertised and it fit our plans for Rockaway perfectly. 

Derek, who was filling in for Safa, was very attentive to make sure everything was in order.

Very clean room, good amenities, no kitchen, but a microwave and toaster. 

The only issue was the noise: the neighbors were very noisy all weekend
It is a great suite.  Everything is perfect. And Safa is easy to communicate

This room was exactly as advertised. It was very clean and the bed was comfortable. Safa was responsive and professional. However, we were only there 2 nights and we hardly slept the first night because the neighbors in the adjacent unit were in the hallway yelling running up and down the stairs until about 3am. It seemed like there was no sound proofing between our room and the stairwell. If not for the noise, I would definitely recommend this room.
Great place, magical location. Private and cozy.
A good inexpensive place to stay. It's a bit out of the way so definitely important to have a car.
The room was clean and exactly as described. We enjoyed our stay.
We stayed for two days with my wife and two kids and the place is exactly how it is advertised . Safa was very responsive and I would definitely stay next time .
very easy check in and communication. short walk from train and beach. walls are thin but otherwise a very nice sunny pleasant room!
We had a great time, the place was everything we expected it to be.
Great place, excellent location, close to the beach, grocery and restaurants, very safe and quiet neighborhood, highly recommended!!

Safa's place is perfect for what myself and friends needed.  Super clean, with good amenities for our weekend [microwave, coffee, toaster, fridge/freezer and even a water cooler]. It was in a quiet neighbourhood, and we could walk to the beach within minutes, and were super close to the metro station 67.  We also could walk to the more lively area with bars and restaurants easily or take the bus if we wished straight down the street. Would definitely book again for a similar weekend trip.
Perfect place to stay when visiting friends. Clean. Near the beach. Communication is excellent.

A great, clean place, but far from a lot of the more happening beaches. There's a subway problem in getting from this part of the Rockaways to the other, more lively parts, so I'd prepare for using Uber or the city bus.

A clean and very spacious room with everything you need...very close to the beach.  We were really impressed with how large the room is, and even though it's part of a larger home, it really feels like a private studio apartment.  Safa has provided everything you might need, and the space was super clean.  Communication was great- he's very responsive, and checking in was a breeze.  This place is an EXCELLENT value for the area.  We will definitely be back!

Had a great time at this studio near the beach but several baffling hosting choices that people should be aware of. 

First: The apartment was listed as having wifi but there was no signal in the unit. Reached out to the host who said the router was in the upstairs stairway and that there was nothing he could do. Unexpectedly had to do some work that required wifi which caused an issue.

Second: Host is stingy about bathroom necessities. No hand towels or wash cloths, a nearly empty paper towel roll next to the sink with no replacement, no extra bath towels in case one gets dirty, a half empty hand soap next to the sink that ran out by the end of the trip, no extra toilet paper, etc. Felt strange that all the cabinets were empty instead of having extras.

Overall, apartment was clean with a convenient passcode entry. Upstairs neighbors and airplanes were a bit noisy but did not bother us too much. Location is great as it is a short walk to the beach. Rockaways are fun in general with great food (tacoway beach!) and different choices of live music on the boardwalk. This is a solid rental and we had a good time but it ended up feeling a bit pricey due to the amenities situation described above.
Great location, close to the beach, and surprisingly quiet.  Some stairs to negotiate and the mattresses are on the firm side which suited us well.
Er ekki eldunaraðstaða. Eiginlega bara herbergi með baði. Staðsetning hentaði okkur vel. Ónæði af íbúum í sama stigagangi.
A convenient, clean and quiet place to stay.

Safa's place was perfect for our weekend getaway. One of the absolute cleanest places I've ever stayed. It was located in a quiet cute neighborhood minutes from the beach. I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a nice beach getaway! :)

Safa's place was very nicely located a short walk from the beach. Check in was seamless and the space was clean and comfortable. The noise from surrounding units and nearby staircase - as detailed in several prior reviews - made it challenging to sleep at night and caused us to wake up quite early. If you're ok with this / not terribly concerned about a great night's sleep, Safa's place is perfect. If you're looking to hear a pin drop, you may want to look elsewhere.

Estuvimos alojados una noche, haciendo escala en el JFK.

Si bien el inmueble está en muy buenas condiciones y el anfitrión fue muy atento, el ruido no nos dejó descansar: al ser los suelos de madera, el ruido de los vecinos de arriba era bastante molesto, aunado a sus altas voces, pero todavía más ruido hacia el tren cercano y los aviones, lo que si bien no es culpa del anfitrión hizo difícil dormir.

Por lo demás, el área donde está el alojamiento es bonita y la playa también, comimos muy bien y nos llevamos un buen recuerdo, a pesar del ruido que, evidentemente, no es culpa del anfitrión, pero insonorizar de alguna forma mejoraría inmensamente la calidad del sueño.
great place
Fab apartment,  1 block from beach.
A comfortable stay, providing what you need.  The space is exactly like the pictures.  Quite close to public transportation and the beach!  Quiet, safe, and clean.  Plan to stay there, again.

reviews.comments: I had the occasion of meeting Kel when I arrived. She is a super friendly Brazilian girl, everything went in a very natural way. The house was spacious and clean. A fat mate of her was there as well in the 2 days I was there, she was easy going. The bed was ready with clean linen and the closet empty (even if I didn't use it, but I appreciated to have some space for my clothes). She said I could just use anything in the kitchen and eat any food in the fridge....ok, :D The house is very well located, a step from Arc de triomf and a park, and the bus terminal. Highly recommended, see you :)

La casa è situata in una zona centrale di Barcellona (vicinissima all' Arc du Triomf), corrisponde tutto alla descrizione, massimo dell'igiene e della pulizia, molte comodità, e una compagnia deliziosa.
Excelente ubicación y Telma súper amable. 100% recomendable

Raquel wasn't home, so unfortunately we did not meet. We communicated over our cell phones and she was available when necessary.
Telma, who also lives in the appartment was there to let me in, she guided me to my room, showed me the kitchen, bathroom and gave me the keys. She speaks perfect english so was able to answer my questions in detail.
As I was in Barcelona for the Be Prog! My Friend Festival I spent the rest of Friday and the complete Saturday outdoors.
On Sunday I had a very nice conversation with Telma which was a highlight for me as I don't speak Spanish or Catalan.
The appartment is as descibed and it's a 2 minute walk to the tube station. Parks, bars, restaurants, bus (Website hidden by Airbnb) all there.
A vibrant part of town.
To be recommended.

name: Haena to re-open in 2019! Ocean Views! Newly added A/C in all rooms! - Haena Kai
summary: Across single land bridges that traverse Kauai's North Shore rivers and streams, nestled in the wild, pristine jungle country side is Haena Kai.
space: Kauai's North Shore has been a frequent backdrop for countless movies due to its incredibly lush beauty and phenomenal beaches.  Nestled within this gorgeous, pristine expanse, lies Haena Kai.  Set back just thirty paces from a soft, deserted, coral sand beach, this three-bedroom, two-bath, elevated home awaits your family retreat.  If you want to escape the crowds and let the soothing surf wash your cares away, welcome to your piece of paradise. Surrounded for privacy by a lava rock wall, towering coconut palms, and lush landscaping, Ha'ena Kai’s elevated position, wall of windows, and wraparound lanai capture superlative views of the reef and fringing mountains. With the newly added split unit air-conditioning system in all rooms, you are sure to stay cool after a day of adventure!   The home’s open architectural design creates an inviting gathering space while also allowing for breezy trade winds to cool the sanctuary naturally.  Additional ceiling fans are strategically located thr

host.host_about: Kahea Zietz is the Broker for Hawaii Life Vacations, a local real estate company offering vacation and long term rentals.  We are based on Kauai with rentals and real estate on all islands. We offer island hosts, property managers and offices statewide. Our rentals are professionally managed and each home comes with complimentary concierge services. We look forward to hosting you.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 159 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Our group of 5 adults and 1 baby had a wonderful stay at Kahea's place. The house is modern and comfortable, with great access to both the popular beaches as well as a nice stretch of beach just down a short path. The views and sunlight from all the windows were a plus. Also, the kitchen is well stocked with any tools and appliances that you may need, which we appreciated. 

There is only A/C in the bedrooms, but the common area has tons of screened windows and screened in doors to help cool off the house.   

In terms of location, the house is a short drive back to Hanalei with a few good dinner options (Hanalei Bay Pizzeria is good), and a couple of good eating options closer (totally recommend Sushi Girl).  

Our whole group loved the house and we would totally stay here again! All in all, a beautiful property in a beautiful setting.
fantastic home, well maintained with premium appliances and all the amenities one can wish for!

This place was absolutely amazing! We stayed a week with our 3 year old and he had so much fun! We are definitely planning on returning next year! The beach access is so close and the beach itself is superb! The only thing they don’t mention is it is on stilts so there are some stairs. But the view was beautiful and all the home decor and linens exceeded our expectations!
Beautiful home and a terrific, quiet location.  Beach access is just a few steps outside of the house.  Kitchen is awesome.
Beautiful home in a beautiful place.

You will want to come to this house if you want to be remote on Kauai and away from the normal tourist areas. Expect both tropical rain and lots of sunshine - it seems to change every few hours. Do not miss the 2 mile hike into Napoli Coast (bring a walking stick) and the sunset at the beach at the end of the road. Your pictures will be incredible. The house is fantastic for 6 adults. Lots of space in rooms and deck areas. The great room/kitchen is fantastic. Having laundry capability also is a nice touch. The beach is just 100 feet away and used by very few people. Snorkeling is ok but be very careful of rip tides - you must be a good swimmer. Go to safer coves for swimming. The small town of Hanalei is delightful and has nearly everything you need (except gasoline) including some good restaurants. The one way bridges from Hanalei to the house add to the ambiance of the journey but be careful at night.
