host.host_about: Aloha- I moved to Waikiki several years ago and love everything about it! I've been in the tourism industry for over 12 years and a few years ago I got lucky and came across an ad to work with Fran and her lovely units.  Now I'm managing them for her! :)  There's a great satisfaction in seeing others enjoy a life changing vacation! Life is too short NOT to vacation!!

reviews.comments:
Loved staying here. It's exactly as pictured in the photos - newly renovated and clean. The bed is comfy, wifi works, and showers get steamy hot (love it).  I liked the little restaurants downstairs (cream pot and burgers & sushi especially). The neighborhood/building has interesting characters especially at night but it's still safe and I never ran into any trouble. 

The place has towels and Franny even provided laundry soap! The laundry is on the 5th floor & does take credit card although loads can be more expensive than independent coin places. I would love to stay at a property of Franny's any time.
Franny was very kind and help me in everything that I needed. The apartment is perfect.

Our stay was wonderful. Franny was great with communication and check in was a breeze. Parking on site was convenient and the on site restaurant was so cute and the food was delicious. We spent hours at the pool and it was a nice place to just relax and unwind. The room was cozy and had a nice view of the city and ocean. Would definitely stay again!
Clean and bright apartment in a great location. Franny was extremely lovely to deal with, very organized and gave us great recommendations on places to go. Would definitely recommend.
Franny was very quick to respond to any questions or needs we had. the place was very clean and updated. We would love to stay here every time we visit Oahu!
Everything was as expected and the stay was great. It's close to a lot of fun stuff in Honolulu and is clean and comfortable. The host was very communicative also. Great stay

I absolutely loved Franny's studio apartment, and she was a fantastic host. The location was ideal. My visit was work related, and the studio was perfectly located in walking distance to the Convention Center. I would stay there again in a heart beat!

Our visit with Franny was the height of professionalism and the epitome of what an Airbnb experience should be. Her space was meticulously clean and her welcome packet gave us all the information we could possibly need. Even if that were not the case, she made herself incredibly available through many means of communication to resolve any issues. Our stay was comfortable and the view out the windows was simply breathtaking.

One note: If you're thinking about renting a car, free parking will be scarce and parking in a garage is not cheap.
Franny sent good detailed info for how to get into the apartment which was great. Excellent on the communication.

This is a well-located, well-appointed, clean, comfortable, and attractive place to stay. The amenities on the property are many and easily accessible. We will look forward to staying again. Communication with the host was exceptionally outstanding!

Franny's apartment was exactly as shown in the pictures. It was in a great location, not too far from Waikiki beach and had on site parking for when we rented a car. The apartment itself was clean and thank goodness for air con! Instructions to find the room key and room were easy and my partner and I both agree that if we ever visited Hawaii again, we wouldn't hesitate to book this apartment.
A great place to stay... Nice view and it's a great location we basically walked everywhere!!! We definitely would stay again!!!

Great place and close to a lot of good restaurants, shopping and the beach. No issues or concerns with the room or getting into the space. The only unfortunate aspect is the cost of parking if you have a rental car. But it's understandable considering the limited amount if parking there appears to be in Honolulu in general. Also Franny provided great recommendations for places to eat! We had a great time on our trip

Nous avons été très satisfait de l'appartement fidèle aux photos et descriptif de l'annonce. La vue sur mer est magnifique, l'immeuble est idéalement bien situé dans Honolulu, entre Waikiki et Ala Monana shopping center, permettant de tout faire à pieds.
Clean

Had a great stay here. Property is on the outskirts of Waikiki which was nice because it's a very short Uber ride away from all the happening areas in downtown and Kakaako. Apartment was clean and comfortable. Would stay here again if in the area.

Franny's  Birds of Paradise room is a beautifully styled, clean apartment with everything we needed at our finger tips. Located on the heart of Waikiki everything was super close and easy to get to.
Frannys communication was fantastic in the lead up and through out our stay. 
I would definitely recommend staying here and I hope to come and stay again soon.
Thank you Franny for a wonderful stay.
Prime location.

Franny was a delight to deal with and so accommodating. We had a lot of trouble finding a place for one night before we flew out the next morning and Franny helped in every way possible. Her flat is in an older building and is small but was perfect for what we needed it for and has beautiful views of the ocean and city. Beautifully decorated and very clean. Our only issue was the noise, the walls are paper thin and we could hear everything! Also causing us not to get much sleep. Overall though this place is great!
Another great stay with Franny. The listing was clean, had a beautiful ocean view, cozy queen bed, and fast wifi. Perfect for business travel or a couple

Upon walking in the unit, you'll be stunned by the gorgeous beach view up ahead. The room itself had a cozy vibe and to my surprise - i had everything i needed in the unit. It was as pictured and the place itself was clean! Everything was walking distance that taking an uber was almost unnecessary if you wanted to take a stroll around the Waikiki area. The only thing is that parking is 25 for 24 hours and it's cash only, but heck, still a better deal than having to constantly look for street parking and it minimizes the risk for theft and being towed. Overall, i'd pick this place again when i get the chance!
Such a beautiful apartment, great views, walking distance to shops and restaurants. And right down the street to a great little craft beer bar. Would definitely stay here again! :)
Great place and fantastic host! I highly recommend it!

Franny's place is just as it appears in photos. Stunning view, spacious for two people, and includes all the amenities you'd need on a short stay. 

The location is also super convenient— located within walking distance of the beach, Waikiki, and Ala Moana. It's also on the outskirts of all the tourist traffic, so requesting Uber was easy; there's also a bus stop down the street that goes towards Pearl Harbor/Aloha Stadium. All the major car rentals were also in walking distance. 

Check-in and check-out was such an easy process and Franny made herself available for questions/concerns. 

Loved this place and will definitely be back!

Walls are paper thin.  Wifi is very spotty.  Size would be ideal for a single.  Building is not modern, however the room itself seemed refreshing and modern, and all necessary amenities we're provided.  Host was easy to contact and gave great pre check in instructions.  Parking is $25/day.  Walking distance to the happening Waikiki strip for shopping and night life.
Really enjoyed the proximity to everything we needed on our trip! Communication was easy and prompt.

Pretty modern room, and close to bus stop and everything was great. Franny was putting everything we need in the room, like dishes, coffee and you can cook there's oil and salt. I really enjoyed my stay
Great little place franny has in Waikiki. 8 mins walk to the beach and everything was nearby. Right downstairs has a super cute breakfast/brunch eatery. Will come back!
Reviews say it all. Super clean and centralized. Great price too!

The apartment was wonderful and exactly as pictured! The location was about a 5 minute walk from all the major tourist areas, and was super convenient. It was also located 5 minutes from the convention center. 
Clean and classy apartment - great stay overall!

Condo is clean and very modern, however, the building itself is in need of considerable updating. Nice view, with most kitchen amenities, beach towels and other modern conveniences. Wifi was patchy, but we managed. A good 20 min walk to the main part of Waikiki beach and most bars and restaurants. Very close to all bus routes and a supermarket. Overall, we enjoyed our stay.
Walkable distance from everything. Beautiful room in a building with security so for two young girls safety was never a concern. Would go back in a heartbeat
We enjoyed our stay at Birds of Paradise!

Dealing with Franny was great. She was quick to respond to any request. We had a pleasant stay at her apartment. The Royal Hawaiian's exterior is in need of some renovations but it is clean and well maintained. The apartment itself feels newly renovated, and it is bright and clean. The mattress was a little soft for my taste. The walls are a bit thin but with the air conditioner unit, you can drown any noise so I was not bothered. Overall, I was comfortable, felt super safe, and enjoyed the amenities and the location. Access to netflix was a nice bonus for those nights that you just want to relax at home. It was only 5 minute walk to the convention center. The walk to the beach was about 10 minutes and you could get to the Waikiki strand in 5-10 minutes.
Great place and good location.
Excellent small apartment, convenient, modern, and clean. Franny is a very responsive host and we had a great time!! Highly recommend this place.
Recommended nice apartment in Waikiki.
Gina's studio in Waikiki was perfect for us. The view was great and we would stay again in a heartbeat.
I would absolutely come back!
Bit of an older building but actual apartment is new, clean with a great view, looks exactly like the picture. 10-15 minute walk to the lagoon/beach or the main strip. Excellent ammenities.
It was just as described. Very nicely renovated! Beautiful view of the ocean!
Very new and nice room. Great ocean view and close to many Waikiki popular restaurants. We saw the Hilton Sunday night fireworks from our room. Great Airbnb experience.
This little place was perfect for my stay. The location is 5 minutes from the beach and great restaurants. The view of the city line and ocean is breathtaking.
Great little spot. While the building itself is basic, they have outfitted the studio nicely. The showerhead is a little low for tall people but that was a small thing. Would stay again!
위치나 모든면에서 만족하였고 창문에서 보는 뷰또한 너무 멋졌습니다 하와이를 갈려면 가격대비 짱입니다!!

Check-in process was smooth and Gina allowed us to check-in a little earlier than the original 3:00 P.M. and she communicated quickly.  The location was fairly close to Waikiki area.  The view was nice.  The room was as described.  If you are going to stay here with a car, account for the $25/day parking.  Mahalo Gina for a great stay!  :)
We had a lovely stay at Ginas place. The apartement is well located with a fantastic view to the ocean. The room was very clean and Gina answered my question very quickly. Thanks Gina

Gina was a very courteous host and quick to respond. The home is perfect  for the traveler who needs  a comfortable place to lay their head after long busy days  exploring  the  city! I'd  rebook  in  a heartbeat

Great view and central location. Clean and fitted out with the essentials. We really enjoyed our stay and the people are all so friendly! Easy access to keys and Gina was very easy and quick to communicate with! :)

We'd stay here again if passing through. Cute place exactly as advertised. Tip: If you plan on parking in the garage, be sure to get your room key first or the parking attendants won't let you enter the garage. Gina was very helpful and responsive, checking-in multiple times with us to see if we needed anything.

Gina's description of her place was 100% accurate. When we arrived it was clean, quaint, equipped with everything mentioned and the view was so much more amazing in person. We loved the location to the city life and beaches in Waikiki. It was in walkable distance to many restaurants. 

The only bummer was that we had to pay 25$ a night to park which she mentions so we already knew that was a thing, we just were hoping to find free parking near where we were staying. Parking was not so easy or cheap, but small price to pay for convenience.

We would definitely book with Gina again and would love to come back to Hawaii.
Great location - neat, tidy, and modern!
The place was great!  We were a short walk to anything we needed - beach, food, shops. It looks just like the pictures and has a great view. The bed was AMAZING! Super comfortable.
Good.

If you wanna be in the center of it all – this is the perfect appartment for you in Waikiki. It's close to the shopping malls as well as to the beach and the restaurants at night. Located in a safe and quiet area you'll have a wonderful view over Waikiki all day and night. As it's pretty hot outside the aircon was a relief and helped sleeping at night. In the appatment itself you'll find everything you need in thoughtful details. It was clean and easy to access although I was arriving very late. And Gina is the perfect host for you – easy to communicate with and responds very quickly. So I will come and visit again.

Nice small studio, very clean & modernized. Although, make sure you contact host before booking to see if all amenities are working. 
(Jacuzzi is broken).

Nice apartment and looks like the photos. It’s walking distance to a number of restaurants and close to the beach. The building itself is quite outdated, but does offer some nice amenities like a gym, pool, and food options. We tried storing our bags with the desk upon departure, but the woman told us it would be $10 per bag/luggage and not a flat fee like the check in notes indicated. Instead we walked over to the Double Tree a few blocks away and they let us store our bags for free (we tipped them). Overall it was a good stay.
Great location. Easy check in process. Will definitely recommend this place to others.

Overall, my wife and I had a good stay at this budget accommodation in Waikiki in November of 2017. The following is a synopsis of our stay:

Location: Exceptional access to Waikiki as a whole. 15 minute walk to pretty much any restaurant. 10-15 minute walk to the beach.

Building: As with many buildings in Waikiki, this condo building/hotel is definitely showing it’s age. It was, however, very safe and the security staff there were helpful with a key card issue and baggage storage. The unit itself was much nicer than the building.

Unit: Much more recent renovation than the condo building itself. Essentially a hotel room with a small kitchenette and surprisingly good view of the ocean. Very functional space with AC, cable TV, coffee maker, mini-fridge and induction cook top/hot plate. Bathroom was small but functional. My one criticism was that cleanliness could be improved upon. The floors were a little sticky and the kitchen could have used another wipe down. No issues with bathroom/shower cleanliness.

Parking: $25/24 hours-yikes! It turns out the most lucrative business venture out there is operating a parking garage in Waikiki. We were able to find daily street parking it just took a little bit of work. 

Gina: Possibly the most responsive AirBnB owner/manager out there. Nothing but good things to say. 

On the whole, this is a good option for the budget traveller wanting to stay in Waikiki.

Très belle appartement conforme aux photos. Bon accueil également par Gina. L'appartement est très bien situé. Uber de l'aéroport (â partir de 2 personnes) reste plus avantageux pour s'y rendre. Il est indispensable de louer une voiture afin de visiter l'île. Plusieurs loueurs de véhicules à proximité.
Parfait séjour

Gina's place has an amazing location near to Waikiki main area. The studio was neat and tidy and well looked after. There was also use of a gym for a small fee, pool and hot tub. The Waikiki brewing company is located only couple steps away from the the studio. Parking is avaialble on site however, costs 25/day which adds up if you plan on using a car during your stay in Hawaii.  My partner and  I we have enjoyed the modern studio and the location.

Small but just right for two people. Easy walking to beach and pick up for tours. Rental car dealer right downstairs as well as a cafe, bar and store. Very clean. But be prepared to wait on the elevators
The people in he complex are very friendly.

Gina’s place was exactly as described on the pictures. 
The location is great, in the center of all. Very near to Waikiki beach and shops. 
The building looks not nice but the flat is very cute and well decorated ! 
We enjoyed our stay.

Gina’s place is everything we needed for a fun weekend celebrating our friends wedding. The place is very centrally located and easy walking distance from shops, restaurants, and beaches. The bed is comfortable, there’s a nicely appointed kitchenette, so overall it’s a great value. The building itself is on the older side but this studio unit is completely newly renovated... it has a nice view too! Would definitely stay again :)
Great little place close to Waikiki! Center to everything.

This is a condo kind of an old hotel same getting in process we were very close to the beach and the view was amazing Gina was great communicating and she even gave us some tips for that night the only thing that I have to say is that the listing Is that a shampoo and conditioner and some other amenities the listing said they provided Were not there. I ended up using my friends soap and shampoo. They had a huge bottle of hand soap that was mostly water and no shampoo. It was great having a coffee maker. However they didn’t have any sugar so we took it dark. Other than that everything was perfect

Thank you Gina for the amazing stay. Gina’s place was amazing for being in the middle of everything, not to far for shopping and not to far for great beaches. Communication was amazing too and we were given great tips that really came in handy. Thanks again :)
Excellent location and the view is amazing! Quick communication and the listing was just as described! I would stay again!

The place was really nicely styled and loved the cute space! Gina was very fast with responding to requests and messages. The TV signal kept glitching but Gina was very accommodating and helpful with trying to solve this. The issue was with the building WiFi itself so it was out of her control. The location is 10-15 mins walk to the main strip in Waikiki. Everything was clean and had most of the amenities needed.
Great place with the best view!
This condo was in a great location, adjacent to all things in  Waikiki area. The listing is exactly as pictured and although small in size is wonderfully appointed and has everything you need!

Very clean! Was just sad the hand soap was very watery like they filled up water in an empty hand soap bottle. No body shower or soap. I found a hair on the pillow...
I enjoyed the view a lot though :)

Perfect location for what we were looking for. Close to the airport and walking distance to Waikiki Beach and shopping. We took uber to different hiking spots which worked out great! Tiny space, but has a great view and is decorated nicely. Would definitely stay again!

Great location with restaurants and coffee shop downstairs (Burgers and Sushi is outstanding!) and small dance club downstairs as well. Rental car and activity desk also very convenient. Renting a SMART car proved to be very useful getting around Waikiki. On site luggage storage was very useful until I could check into the room. Shower stall is a little cramped and bed a little squeaky. Otherwise a great value for a place to stay close to heart of Waikiki!

Thanks for allowing us to stay in your room Gina, we had great time in Hawaii
The room was clean, well maintained and its located about very close to main part of waikiki (walk, tram or biki bike...take a pick, either way no more than 10mins)

The apartment was cozy and charming with a great view! It was close to a lot of key places in Waikiki. Gina always responded right away. We highly recommend this great conveniently located apartment. :) Aloha and Mahalo!
Gina's place i really convenient! Next to 7-11, ABC, with car rental within the building. The place itself is also clean and good enough for two people.

Gina's place is modern, good sized space with lovely views of the ocean and beach. 

Just a few things of note though, check in was very easy with the instructions provided but the front desk (nothing to do with Gina) were very rude when we tried to check our bags for storage. The building itself is a hotel and apartments for tourists but also residential. I must advise that several of the residents that stayed in the building appeared highly intoxicated (all times of day), smelling of marijuana and loud. This was undesirable and they hang around outside the building. I appreciate this is not to the fault of the host, but it is not ideal when you a paying and on holiday - especially if you have children. The road noise can be heard from the apartment but did not bother us. Finally, I was slightly disappointed in the cleanliness of the apartment. The bathroom especially. There was a lot of sand in the bath and the shower head covered in limescale. 

It was a shame to have these things impact our stay, as the apartment itself is well situated and has everything you need and is walking distance from beach or shops.

Gina's place was nice. Very close to the conference center, restaurants, and the beach (all within 10 minute walk.) The only negatives i would say are: should include more towels. Having 3 towels for two people for 6 days was not enough, especially because the towels would take more than a day to dry. There was also no body wash or soap for the shower.

My husband and I enjoyed our stay at Gina’s place. The place is small but it was perfect for what we needed. The bath is also very small and tight, a little uncomfortable especially for my tall husband. The shower curtain kept getting stuck to my body which was a bit annoying. But the place is decorated beautifully with a beautiful view. Another thing that would have been nice is if we would have had more towels. We only had two bath towels, one hand/face towel, two wash cloths, and one beach towel for two people. Otherwise, the place is at a great location close to restaurants and shops. We did not rent a car we walked everywhere. And took shuttle bus for different tours and excursions. Overall, our stay was great!

If you plan on spending time in Waikiki to do some shopping or outdoor activities this is the place to stay. You can find all the stores you want down the street or even grab a bite to eat. If you want to go out to do some exploring the bus stops right across from Gina’s place and takes you to all the stops. I never had a issue and the front desk people were great! Nice place fit for two :) and the view was a plus!

It was doable, my wife and I enjoyed the  actual studio apartment but the building as a whole and immediate surrounding was a bit sketchy. About 20-25 min walk to the main part of Waikiki beach. We rented a convertible smart car for a day and it was $70 for 24hrs. But they close at 5pm and it costs $15 more to return it after that. Otherwise you need to park overnight for $10.

Overall, the place is a good value and about 15 min walk to the heart of Waikiki. The condo is stylish, cute decor, and nice finishes like granite countertops and new cabinets. It has a great view, including ocean view to the side. The building is a bit older, but has pool, hot tub, and bbq grill. Downstairs also has food options and car rental. However, it is a bit small for two people. We also could have used more toilet paper and towels for a 5 night stay.  TV reception was not good but we were able to stream Netflix. It was also hard to walk barefoot as floors could use a deep scrub. Closet height was also short and would not fit full length dress. Windows are a little low and did not lock.

This Airbnb is part of the old Monarch Hotel, which went bankrupt and sold off units as condos a few years back. This definitely colors the experience here. TL;dr is that the room itself was acceptable, with a great view and solid A/C, albeit wildly overpriced, there were definitely some things that made us feel unwelcome and uncomfortable. The first problem was the 4pm check-in. Our flight got in at 10am, putting us at the hotel around 11am. Despite reaching out almost a full week in advance, Gina denied us the opportunity to check in even a MINUTE early, and instead suggested we book the night before if we wanted to check in early, because the cleaning needed to be completed. This was a bit silly as if the unit was available the night before our stay, I can’t imagine that cleaning it that day was necessary. This just showed that the host isn’t that concerned for her guest’s travel experience and is looking to nickel and dime wherever she can. We walked around a bit, then hung out in the lobby bar while we waited. There is NO LOBBY at the building and the luggage storage ($10 per bag) is not locked or watched by the hotel front desk. Your stuff is not safe in there and there is no where comfortable to wait for your ridiculously late check-in. I literally went to the box at 3:59pm and our key still wasn’t in the box. Host showed up at 4:05pm with the keys. It also didn’t work the we got to the room, so had to go downstairs and wait in line for security to check our IDs and fix the keys. This all adds up for a NEGATIVE GUEST EXPERIENCE AND A CRAPPY START to a vacation. A couple other things people should know about this place: - The walls are paper thin. You will hear everything your neighbors do and say. - The water shuts off once a month for half a day. We were not informed of this when booking and plan to request a partial refund for that day. - The wi-fi doesn’t work, like at all. We were told to “turn the router off and back on” and it made zero difference. - The cable doesn’t work. TV constantly flickers and makes shuddering noises. - Host charges an $80 cleaning fee and does the cleaning herself. When I met her when she finally dropped the non-working keys off at 4:05pm, she mentioned that she cleans the rooms herself. So essentially, the $80 cleaning fee is a ridiculous tack on expense and you should figure it into the cost of the room, as its not like she is paying a service to clean for her. Ludicrous, greedy and shady. - Host has a long list of things she will charge you for if you fail to do (taking out trash, getting stains on towels, etc.) Just makes you feel more and more unwelcome. - The...
번화가에서 아주약간 떨어져있지만 위치도 좋고 주변 편의시설도 아주좋아요 abc스토어랑  세븐일레븐 바로코앞에 있고 아침마다 일어나서 보이는 뷰가 정말 최고입니다 호스트의 응대도 아주빠르고 정확하며 친절해요!!
Everything is perfect! I would recommend it to somebody I know! And yep! I will definitely come back.
Recommend this place 100% everything was super accurate with pictures and other reviews. Perfect location didn’t have to Uber anywhere because everything was walking distance. Will def be back

Had a great stay at Gina' s appartment, perfect stay for two people who spent all day at the beach.
15 minute walk to Waikiki beach and all the main shops, restaurants and bus stops.
Very clean appartment, great view, great outdoor pool area on level 6.
Highly recommend and communication with Gina was great. We even got to check-in an hour earlier as the room was ready. 
We arrived at 7am into Honolulu, left our bags in the security room in the lower lobby for $10 which was great as we could go shopping and the beach without our bags.
Would stay again
Gina’s place was in a great location, very clean and perfect for what we needed.

Great location and great view! It was significantly smaller than the pictures make it seem though. Very updated and modern touches. She has a lot of brochures for nearby activities and there’s even a kiosk downstairs to help you if needed. The only thing I would recommend is bringing or buying your own hand and dish soap because most of the soaps were refilled with water. But overall a great stay and I would love to come back!
Great value and clean.
Loved staying at this location for my week long stay in Honolulu. It was amazing waking up to such an great view each morning. Would definitely stay here again.
Thanks again for a great stay
Great space! Enjoyed our stay at Gina’s. Highly recommend!
It was a very clean place with beautiful view and great location.
This is our second time staying at Gina’s (we’ve now stayed at 2 different units) and it’s been excellent both times! Hope to return again soon, Gina’s a great host.
Great place to stay. Clean and convenient. Host is super nice and provide plenty local suggestions

A great simple apartment that is so close to the main Waikiki strip. We walked for about 20 mins to this strip. You could catch a bus also. 

Gina is very helpful and the directions are spot on. 
We will recommend this apartment.
Great location, 10 mins walk to Waikiki beach. Nice ocean view from the bedroom, highly recommend.

Great location, lovely day time and night time view. The room is definitely spacious enough for two—though the bathroom is a little small, especially the shower if you're tall. Be sure to keep the curtains closed during the day as the room gets very hot since the sun pours in all day. Even with the curtains closed, chocolates that we purchased early on in the trip and some cosmetics melted in the heat (in December nonetheless). If you are sensitive to noise, be warned that the a/c unit is quite loud and that there is a strange screeching sound that can be heard from the elevator or parking lot. All that being said, overall value was good being that the room is located conveniently and the process with Gina was very easy.
Nice location, great view, clean and easy. Pictures match reality. Thank you!
Such a great room with a beautiful view and great location- close to shops and beach in Waikiki! It is perfect for two people to have a getaway. Definitely recommend!
Gina’s place was a great welcome after coming from Asia. The room was clean, quiet, and the bed is so comfortable. It’s a short walk to the beach and restaurants on the main road.

Gina’s place is a great value and a great location.  The smart car rental downstairs was so much more convenient and a far better price than a typical rental. Gina’s tips on food available at the condo were spot on, the pizza, and everything we had at Maleko cafe downstairs was delicious, including some of the best coffee! The memory foam bed was very comfortable and we had everything we needed for a great stay.  I would definitely stay at Gina’s when in Waikiki again.

The pool is lovely though on the roof of the lower level building on the 4th floor not the actual roof of the condo building. No ocean view from the pool. For those traveling with kids, beware there is no protection around the huge window of the condo up on the 22nd floor, no screen and it’s kind of low! Coffee maker is a Keurig. Parking garage charges $25/day.

I would happily stay at Gina’s place again as it’s in a fabulous location and quite charming. Excellent deal and stellar view!!
This is a very clean space with a beautiful view. Great location in Waikiki. I highly recommend it.

My partner and I stayed for 12 nights and we loved it. The apartment was very clean and had a great view of Waikiki & the Ocean. Everything was within walking distance (beach, restaurants, luxury row, zoo etc), we managed to cover all of Waikiki from there on foot. Gina was very helpful and a great host. You get more  value for what you’re paying for this AIRBNB than you would for the ocean front hotels/resorts. It’s much cheaper and unless you’re spending your entire vacation inside your hotel room there’s really no need to spend more than necessary. There’s a plethora of things to do in Waikiki and beyond. I would recommend this place to anyone travelling to Waikiki.

name: Porto Beach Apartment T2 com garagem
summary: Apartment in prime area of Porto (Foz), located very close to the sea (200m), ideal to enjoy its varied beaches and esplanades. The apartment was completely renovated in 2016. All the interior design is new, as are the furnishings and all the equipment. The apartment has two fronts, east and west, with two very comfortable bedrooms each equipped with a TV, two bathrooms, kitchen, living room also with a TV and a spacious balcony with a small view of the sea. Easy access to historic center by bus
space: Internet access is available.The kitchen is fully equipped with all appliances such as oven and ceramic hob, dishwasher, fridge and freezer, microwave, washing maschine, electric iron and ironing board, toaster, kettle, coffee maker and hand blender. It has parking in a private garage.
description: Apartment in prime area of Porto (Foz), located very close to the sea (200m), ideal to enjoy its varied beaches and esplanades. The apartment was completely renovated in 2016. All the interior design is new, as are the furnishings and all the equipment. The apartment has two fronts, east and west, with two very comfortable bedrooms each equipped with a TV, two bathrooms, kitchen, living room also with a TV and a spacious balcony with a small view of the sea. Easy access to historic center by bus Internet access is available.The kitchen is fully equipped with all appliances such as oven and ceramic hob, dishwasher, fridge and freezer, microwave, washing maschine, electric iron and ironing board, toaster, kettle, coffee maker and hand blender. It has parking in a private garage. There are several shops in the area (30m-300m) such as supermarket, bakery, pastry shops, pharmacy and a variety of restaurants where you can enjoy Portuguese food. There are also several banks and ATM machines n
neighborhood_overview: There are several shops in the area (30m-300m) such as supermarket, bakery, pastry shops, pharmacy and a variety of restaurants where you can enjoy Portuguese food. There are also several banks and ATM machines nearby. The apartment is very close to the sea (200m), and to several very nice beaches for bathing. Less than 2 km away, there are several surf schools, on a beach ideal for children, in which the sea is shallow.  The avenue that follows along the sea has a wide promenade, ideal for walking, running or cycling. There is a bike path, which runs from the apartment area along the river to the historic city center, and also along the beaches.
transit: From the location, you do not need a car to move around in the city. The area is served by several bus lines, the bus stop is right outside the door. The most interesting bus line (500), follows the course by the sea and river to the historic city center. In the historic city center it is possible to rent bicycles.
house_rules: It is not allowed to make noise after 10p.m. The apartment is inserted in a building of exclusive habitation use. After confirmation of the booking, the SEF accommodation bulletin will be sent. It must be obligatorily completed with the data of all the guests and returned before check-in. The SEF accommodation bulletin is intended to monitor foreign nationals in the country. This procedure is required by nacional law, Lei 63/2015. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation.

address.government_area: Aldoar, Foz do Douro e Nevogilde

reviews.comments:
Tout neuf, tout propre.. super bien localisé et à deux pas de la plage.
Nous avons apprécié la proximité des magasins dont un bio.
Près du sea life et du musée Serralves on a pu également visiter Porto via le vieux tram.
Nous y retournerons sans hésiter...

Location: We spent a great time at this location. It is located very near to the ocean; ready to go swimming every day and night. Also it is perfect for jogging along the coast. In walking distance is the surf spot for surfing lessons and there is a great long white beach. Along the coast are great restaurants and bars to get food. Right on the other side of the apartment is a very nice and tasty bakery, not to mentioned the horse-driven greengrocer standing in front of this bakery.

The view from the balcony is much better, then you may expect from the pictures. There is a second view to the ocean to get a great feeling for the actual weather and the day.

Apartment: The apartment is in BEST shape. Everything is brand-new! Both bathrooms are in perfect conditions and very spacy. Both have showers to walk in. Both sleeping rooms have TV and very big built-in wardrobes. The kitchen has everything, you would need, including sharp knives and nice dishes. There is a separated washing room, where you may dry the towels.

Álvaro & Sílvia are doing a great job, keeping the apartment in perfect and clean conditions.

The most important thing for the kids: WLAN is very good! 

Our favorite as a tip:
Go with the 500-Busline to the "Parque da Arfandega" and rent a tandem at Viegiuni ( (Website hidden by Airbnb) start from there back to the coast to the little ferry boat "Flor do Gas", which takes only people and bikes, cross the Douro to the Gaia-side of porto. Take a bike ride along the river and the coast to the little "Capela do Senhor da Pedra" at the beach. Turn back the same way but go on further to the “Cais de Gaia”. Take a break on the roof of the "Porto Cruz" building. Afterwards, for a climax, go all the way up to the upper level of the bridge "Ponte Dom Luis I", cross the river. The rest is a piece of cake, rolling downhill back to the rental shop at the cost. Back to the apartment with the 500-Busline.

Summary: We did not want to leave and would like to come back in the near future, if possible …

Wir würden jederzeit in diese tolle Unterkunft zurück kommen.
Die Wohnung ist super ausgestattet, hochwertige Einrichtung, es hat uns an nichts gefehlt. Die Lage der Wohnung ist gut, direkt an einem Supermarkt, Bushaltestelle sowie das Meer fußläufig erreichbar. Zum Surferstrand sind es lediglich ein paar Min mit dem Taxi oder Bus. Die Kommunikation mit dem Gastgeber war super und unkompliziert, wir wurden persönlich empfangen und verabschiedet.
The host canceled this reservation 107 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Het was fantastisch in dit appartement en de locatie in de wijk!
Het appartement was schoon, compleet uitgerust in de keuken en voldoende kastruimte voor al je spullen. De communicatie met de verhuurder was super. Heel vriendelijk en behulpzaam. Er werd zelfs 1x per week schoongemaakt en bedden verschoond! Echt vakantie vieren daar! 
De wijk was heel netjes en alles in de buurt: bakker, supermarkt, restaurants en zelfs een paard met wagen met verse groente van de moestuin op de hoek van de straat. De bushalte is ook dichtbij en het openbaar vervoer is uitstekend. Porto centrum is snel bereikbaar per bus of taxi. Veel verschillende stranden zijn in de buurt. 
Ook aan de kinderen werd gedacht: spelletjes waren aanwezig. Super dit appartement! We komen graag terug hier.

Appartement très confortable, lumineux et très bien équipé. Très bien pour un long séjour notamment.
Situé idéalement, l'accès au bord de mer se fait à pied en 2mn. L'accueil de notre hôte était très chaleureux.

Localização e é espaço privilegiados.
No Porto? Só o Apartamento do Guedes!

Het is een prachtig appartement, ruim genoeg voor 4 personen. De zee is om de hoek en Porto is vanaf hier heel eenvoudig te bereiken. In de omgeving zijn diverse winkels en leuke restaurantjes. Kortom een aanrader.

Das Appartement liegt in Foz in 2. Reihe am Strand. Es ist sehr  schön eingerichtet, die Küche ist top modern, es gibt 2 Bäder und einen Balkon zum Meer hin, wo am Nachmittag die Sonne scheint. Das Wohnzimmer ist sehr hell. In direkter Nähe gibt es 4 tolle Restaurants, wo man preiswert sehr gut essen kann. Nach Porto läuft man 1 Std. oder man nimmt für 1,95-- den 500er Bus. Wir bevorzugen Foz, da es nicht so trubelig ist, direkt am Meer liegt, man aber imer nach Porto reinfahren kann, das ist optimal für Familien mit Kindern.
Ótimo apartamento!

We loved staying in Foz. The apartment is on the ocean and we enjoyed morning and evening walks on the promenade. There are grocery stores, restaurants and patisseries nearby. It's a convenient and beautiful bus ride into the center of Porto. We were well taken care of and enjoyed our stay.

We had a great stay.  The apartment is close to the sea, nice restaurants, a supermarket and a bakery. 
Highly recommend staying there.

Porto first timers may end up staying in the center... as an emigree  Porto native myself, I advise they aim for Foz instead, its "upscalest" neighbourhood, a little Riviera at the center of Porto's vaaaast and varied waterfront. 
This apartment is right in the middle of it, literally 2 minutes (walking) from one of many contiguous beaches, while 20 minutes from historic Ribeira and the city center  (cycling on the waterfront, or by nearby bus) ; or with hours of walking or cycling near the sea and/or river, North and South (by catching a boat or crossing the D.Luis bridge), etc.  
The apartment is furnished in "IKEA style" of course, spartan but complete (no expresso coffee though:-( ), and everything was and worked as advertised, TVs, WiFi, kitchen machinery. The garage is very convenient to have (for a car or bicycles), although it felt a bit tight when parking a Nissan X-Trail; most rental cars of course will be easier to park.
We'll return!

name: Hip 2BR in Downtown Montréal by Sonder
summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the sleek decor, spacious living area, and beautiful kitchen with modern appliances. Located in downtown Montreal, known for its lively bars and delicious restaurants.
space: Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials—everything you need for an exceptional stay.
description: At this Sonder, you'll love the sleek decor, spacious living area, and beautiful kitchen with modern appliances. Located in downtown Montreal, known for its lively bars and delicious restaurants. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials—everything you need for an exceptional stay. Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay. Downtown Montreal has plenty to offer within walking distance. Try out Le Taj or Eggspectation for some of Montreal's best dining. For shopping head over to Rue Saint Mathieu on Saint-Catherine St W. To discover the rest of the city just hop on the bus at Sherbrooke/De La Montagne station. Downtown Montreal is the center of Canada's Francophone business community. Bu
neighborhood_overview: Downtown Montreal has plenty to offer within walking distance. Try out Le Taj or Eggspectation for some of Montreal's best dining. For shopping head over to Rue Saint Mathieu on Saint-Catherine St W. To discover the rest of the city just hop on the bus at Sherbrooke/De La Montagne station. Downtown Montreal is the center of Canada's Francophone business community. Bustling with activity, the neighbourhood is full of restaurants, shopping, and is within walking distance of Montreal’s historic old port and Mount Royal. Downtown Montreal is also home to the city’s universities and museums, and you can catch a concert or a hockey match at the Bell Centre.
notes: Due to renovations inside the building, you may encounter some construction that will be audible from your Sonder Monday - Friday from 8:00AM - 5:00PM. Your Sonder's keys will be found in a lockbox and we'll be sending you detailed access information three days before your stay. If you need any help, just give us a call. This Sonder comes with an HDMI cord so that you can connect your laptop to the TV and log in to your personal streaming accounts, but it does not have cable.
transit: Drivers can find free and paid parking options nearby, but please be mindful of street signs.
interaction: Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay.
house_rules: House Rules 1. All bookings require a security deposit of $300 or more. You will not be charged for this in advance. 2. Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. If you cancel within 24 hours of booking, please reach out to our team, as this refund has to be processed manually.   3. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 4. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I

host.host_about:
Sonder provides everything you need for an exceptional stay. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials. And every experience is one-of-a-kind, thanks to our unique spaces and Neighborhood Guides.

To provide a better Sonder guest experience, we're creating local Airbnb accounts, and moving our listings to those new accounts. If you don't see a property you like here, there may be more on one of our new local profiles. Please reach out for more information!

reviews.comments:
really good location, and the centre of downtown is in walk distance.
Room is marvelous, new and mordern decoration, except there's a little bit decoration odour.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Beautiful apartment right in the middle of all the action downtown Montreal! Very easy check in, responsive host service, and everything you need for a short stay! I would definitely want to stay here again for my next visit.
the place is very clean and things are accurately described.
Awesome apartment in the heart of the city. Close to everything. Would definitely stay again !
Very nice appartment, very well located. Only problem: buiding ventilation is very noisy. However, host provided ear plugs and was very quick to respond. Excellent customer service!
They were very helpful!
Bon endroit. Tres propre. Tres bon rapport qualite prix.
No keys required. Great location.
Great stay, host was easy to communicate with via (Hidden by Airbnb) messenger. They fixed a problem with the smoke detector in a timely manner. Would stay again.
Place is in a prime location downtown Montreal. Can walk right up Mt Royal and close to many bars and restaurants in the middle of the city. The place was exactly as it appeared in the pictures.
Great apartment great location
Great spot!

I stayed in this listing w/ a colleague on a business trip. It was perfect and the area is really nice too. Communication w/ Sonder is so incredibly fast and easy. Entry was via keypad so check-in was super easy.
Superbe appartement dans le centre-ville!
I really recommend this rental which was beyon expectations, well located and very clean and tidy.
Nice place!

We can't say enough great things about this host . Any question or concern we had he responded within minutes . The unit was clean and looked like the photos that were posted & all the details about the location were accurate . We would highly recommend this unit and host to anyone considering visiting downtown Montreal .

This apartment was very nice and we really enjoyed our stay. It looks like the pictures and was very quiet, though nearby to restaurants and shopping in the downtown area as well as Mont Royal. The kitchen had all the standard amenities. They provided shampoo/soap/conditioner and towels as well. I would stay in this apartment again. There were only 2 of us but it is large enough to hold a couple more people (though only has 1 bathroom).

Two things to note: as stated in the description, the building is currently under construction. It was very loud for 2 days of the trip but we didn't hear it at all on the 3rd day. Keep that in mind if you choose to book while the construction continues. Second, Sonder requires you to register on their website (with name, email address, and phone number) in order to rent an apartment from them.

The highlight of this place is its location. Easy to access shops, the metro, restaurants, etc. The amenities are good. The kitchen, dinning area, and living room have basic furniture that will work for most travelers. The beds are a little stiff but there are worse places to lay your head. The bedroom with the ball lamps on the side table is very bright while the other bedroom is wonderfully dark. Temperature control is challenging since the only AC unit is in the dining area. Water temp fluctuates without adjusting the nozzle/valve, but that's probably building-wide. During our stay there was construction on our balcony so we woke up each morning to those sounds. We were instructed not to open the windows to avoid dust coming in. On the morning of checkout the next client came in at 7 AM. That was awkward. In summary, it's a nice place but this wouldn't be my first choice for the next visit to MTL.
Beautiful apartment, super clean, easy instructions. I really recommend this apartment!

This is a great spot in downtown Montreal! Close to all the downtown attractions including night life, restaurants, etc. Issues included being a little dusty when we got there also a little too far from the closest supermarket. What you see is what you get. The communication between guest and host was fantastic. Another problem was the fact that while we were there one of the neighbors had construction so we had a lot of noise  early in the morning which deteriorated our sleep. Overall we had a great stay.
They were awesome! The place was amazing, the sonder team were always super accessible and helpful :)
Clean, modern, central, convenient, quiet, safe.
Can't beat the location.  Easy working with Sonder.
Great place! Clean, close to everything. Highly recommended !
Had an amazing stay! The space was spotless and had so many nice touches/features that made it feel like home
Ubicación inmejorable! Acceso súper fácil y gran ambiente. Realmente recomiendo el lugar. Sin duda me quedaría en el mismo departamento en mi próxima visita.
The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Nice staying place! So comfortable!
Great location, clean, very beautiful, walkable to all locations. No AC in the bedrooms but they have plug in fans. One AC unit in the common area is available.
Great location and great price. Issues stem from checkin instructions not coming to us in a timely manner. Also there were a lot of flies in the apartment
Overall good place, but parking isn’t free on weekends as mentioned. Great space, clean overall, although we did find some stains on the bedsheet. Great space overall.

name: Eliseos Luxury Apartment HUTB-001281
summary: Beautiful 100m2 apartment decorated with designer furniture throughout. Large living room open kitchen area with bay window. It has 2 double & 1 single bedrooms & 2 full bathrooms. The master bedroom's ensuite leads to a large & sunny terrace. Centrally located, 1 block from Paseo de Gracia, restaurants, boutiques and bars within walking distance. Close to metro stations, bus stops, casa Batllò, La Pedrera etc Fully equipped kitchen- safe box. Ideal for families, groups or professionals

The master bedroom's ensuite leads to a large & sunny terrace. Centrally located, 1 block from Paseo de Gracia, restaurants, boutiques and bars within walking distance. THIS WILL BE CHARGED AT CHECK IN. There is a 30€ extra charge for late check ins (after 8pm). Please be careful with the keys if you lose them there is a 100 € charge for each lost set of keys.

This is a local brand which is establishing itself worldwide - already has a shop in New York - come and get pleasantly surprised and let them pamper you !
house_rules: - Only small pets allowed

reviews.comments:
thank's for everything
it was

Absolutely wonderful place to stay at. Very nice location, and the apartment itself looks even better in real. 'Coming home' after a long day in Barcelona was always a pleasure.  Upon arrival we got a warm welcome and introduction to the apartment and the city itself. Very clean, no complaints whatsoever.

Two girlfriends and I had an amazing stay at Heike's flat in Barcelona. The location couldn't be better, just blocks from the main shopping & attractions street. It was spacious, clean and inviting and Heike was incredibly responsive throughout our stay. I would highly recommend and would see if it's available next time I'm in Barcelona - thank you Heike!

If we could have slept properly, I would have given it 4 or 5 stars. The location was amazing and made up for what the flat lacked in sound sleep and thorough cleanliness. Heike was great, however, and deserves a lot of credit!
Great apartment in an amazing location.
L emplacement de l appartement est idéal, bien centré et ds un superbe quartier. Par contre, logement tres bruyant, tant en journée que durant la nuiT.

The location of the house is very convenient and central. Walking distance to La Rambla and other shopping streets. The house has a nice small terrace to relax and enjoy your travelmates. We really enjoyed staying thank you!

Schwarz was right on time, although we had a late checkin and she was very helpful. The flat is really beautiful with a great terrace. Location is perfect if you want to be close to luxury shops and restaurants. I would definitely recommend to stay here...
Excellent location and lovely spacious apartment in Eixample area.  Large kitchen and living space for our family.  We hope to return again soon!  Heike was a fantastic host!
Beautiful apartment and great host

The apartment is exactly as the pictures show, we loved the place! It was very clean, comfortable, quiet and a great location. There is a small restaurant below the apartment, where every morning we enjoyed to get a quick coffee and breakfast. We highly recommend staying at this apartment!
Fantastic location. Great patio and apartment. Helpful hosts. Thanks Heike and Alex.
Tres bon séjour agrémenté par un logement agréable et un tres bon accueil ...

Apartamento lindo, grande, buen ubicado
Paseo de gracia a una cuadra, mejor imposible
Todo muy limpio y ordenado
No nos faltó nada! 
Heike, es súper recomendable!!!

Heike and Alex are great hosts to deal with  Very responsive to communications and quick to resolve any issues. Alex speaks perfect English! The two apartments that we experienced (Eliseo & Juliet) were very stylish and comfortable. Juliet is probably quieter amd more homely with fantastic artworks and a selection of books  Location is perfect for shopping at the best stores on Gracias. Very central to the major attractions too. The perfect apartments for those of us who enjoy something more spacious and luxouious  Five stars.

This place is awesome. Excellent location, pretty close to La Pedrera and Casa Batllo. Metro station at walking distance. Plenty of restaurants around. I was traveling with my family (wife and four kids) and Schwarz was a super host. She answered all my messages in minutes and at check in, she brought some chocolates for my kids, and some local food items (olive oil bottle, rice, chocolate and salt).

Great location for restaurants and shopping. Nice and large place for my friend and I. Very nice terrace area but this time of the season perhaps a bit coldish to take advantage of it. Heating works great!
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Booked for some colleagues to stay for a conference in Barcelona, great communication from the host
Great location, apartment, and hosts.  Highly recommended!

Perfect place to stay!!!  It’s in the middle of everything.  You can walk everywhere but you’re not in the middle of tourist central.  GREAT and Beautiful Neighborhood!!  The condo is beautiful!!  Great space and the outdoor patio is a perfect place to relax.
Die Lage ist einfach klasse und wir fanden als Familie die Unterkunft perfekt! Alles sehr stylisch und trotzdem bequem und sehr gemütlich!
Great location! And really cool house!Heike is a very kind  host!
Stayed over the weekend in the apartment. Location is perfect near main shopping areas. Style and space is great. A real luxury find for anyone staying in Barca

Nice place, clean an spacious. 
Great nighborhood.
very pleasant stay. convinet place and the host is very friendly,  shared with us the good place to go in Barcelona.  the apartment is amazing and elegant, will definately stay again next time
Nice flat. Great location. The Air conditional was working perfectly. Spacious enough for four people. Will visit again.

Heike was great!  I was able to get a hold of her as soon as I landed as she was waiting for me when I arrived.  Everything went as smoothly as it could have went and the place was fantastic.  It has a great outdoor space and was a fantastic location just off of Passeig De Gracia near a couple of the Gaudi points of interest.  Highly recommended!
Perfect place to start your trip and stay in Barcelona...
Magnifique logement, très propre et très très bien placé, qui nous a permis de passer un excellent séjour à Barcelone. Merci pour tout.

Fabulous location - we walked everywhere. Quiet bedrooms with comfortable beds. Nice living space to hang out in with our friends, great for 4 people and good to have a balcony option not that we used it, too much fun to be had in Barcelona! Our host gave us fabulous dining recommendations local and further afield and was great at communicating throughout. Great base for our new year celebrations.

Я в восторге от всех трёх апартаментов, которые есть у владельцев (они на одном этаже в одном доме находятся).  Очень удобная локация - всего 5 мин от домов Гауди !  Все магазины рядом, к метро можно дойти за 3 минуты. Мы останавливаемся не первый раз и очень довольны. Спасибо за красивые апартаменты.  PS. Кто был дизайнером данных помещений?

Beautiful apartment - central to all things! Wonderful rooftop patio! A bit noisy with animated conversations from the Alley beside at times - but when you choose to rent in a busy part of town - that can happen! All in all a great stay!

Great stay in Barcelona 
Most of the people who attend the Mobile World Congress know that it is very hard to find decent accommodations during the event! Well, my colleague and I were very fortunate to have found Schwartz’s place! The location can not be beat, very central and close to two metro stations that made traveling a breeze. The building is traditional with a front gate and an elevator. The check is process was very smooth and the communication with Heike was very fast and efficient. The apartment is on the 2nd floor (some would say first!) and it is extremely bright and spacious. This is a high end accommodation that has been thoroughly renovated and everything was functional. Three  bedrooms ( two large ones and one smaller one) with two full bathrooms and a very large kitchen/dining/ living area. The large bedrooms are on opposite ends of the apartment and this provided complete privacy. The kitchen was fully equipped for coffee, cooking, wine glasses, nothing was missing and it felt like home. In addition there is a very nice terrace that can accommodate a large crowd, perfect for morning coffee or an evening drink. I recommend this place very highly if you are considering a stay in Barcelona!

name: Stylish Flat in Center of Fashion
summary: The apartment is just 5 min.s from Tesvikiye mosque, the metro station is 15 min.s away by walking. Nisantasi is surrounded by trendy cafés, restaurants, nightclubs and luxury shopping, the apartment is located in the in the most prestigious neighborhood in Istanbul. It has one bedroom, one living room very bright that related to an open kitchen.

I have an accessories brand called as Tukutukum.

Never be bored of discovering new cultures.

reviews.comments: The appartment is great! We visited with 3 people and really loved the appartment. At arrival we where received very friendly. Communication was quick and easy with Tugba. Beşiktaş is nice neighborhood with lots of small shops and cafes.
Tugba was an amazing host, very cheerful and warm. We felt at home in her flat that has a great location, close to nice cafés and restaurants. Thanks a lot.
It was a great stay, and Tugba is a wonderful host. Thank you!
The host canceled this reservation 23 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Tugba's place was great and as described.  It's a small, but very nice and comfortable one bedroom in a great location.  Though it says Besiktas in the listing, this place is central Tesvikiye/Nisantisi and the walk to anything you'd need is extremely short.

The apartment is really cozy and exactly as described and shown in the pictures. There are a lot of nice bars, restaurants and cafes in the area - walking distance from the apartment. We got a very warm welcome with fruits and drinks and recommendations. Would come back!

Nisantasi, Istanbul'da ulasim acisindan cok avantajli bir yer. Tugba'nin evi de Nisantasi icerisinde cok avantajli bir yerde. Bircok aktivite ve ilgi cekici yere yurume mesafesinde. Taksi ile ulasim cok kolay. Asansor ve klima olmamasi biraz caninizi sikabilir ancak bu bilgi zaten onceden veriliyor.
Thank you! I like this apartment so much!

Great people! Very hospitable and helpful! We had a great experience at her place! The place is very clean and very beautiful! It exactly the same as in the photos. It is in a very nice area to. I highly recommend this place! Tugba is a great host! Thank you Tugba!
Tugba hanima tesekkur ederim.

This place is one of the most comfortable and well-provisioned apartments that I have ever had the pleasure of staying in through AirBnb. All the amenities that you would hope for are available and the location is wonderful! As a host, Tugba was quick to respond to our questions and flexible with our check-in time. My girlfriend and I chose this place in advance specifically because we liked the kitchen very much and we planned on cooking during our stay. We were definitely not disappointed! This location and price are a real bargain!

Just a stone’s throw from one of Istanbul’s hippest neighborhoods, this is a very stylish flat with a nice open kitchen. Only drawback is that it’s on a steep hill- but then again most of Istanbul is! Definitely a great place for people planning on spending a lot of time in Nişantaşı ör Beşiktaş.
Tuğba harika bir ev sahibi. Ev çok temiz ve kullanışlı. Çok merkezi bir lokasyona sahip. İhtiyacınız olabilecek her şey evde mevcut. İhtiyacınız olabilecek her zaman ulaşabiliyorsunuz kendisine.

Evin yeri gerçekten çok harika. 4 dk az eğimli yokuş çıkınca nişantaşı, 6-7 dk dimdik merdivenli yokuş inince beşiktaş çarşının içinde buluyorsunuz kendinizi. Ev son derece temiz, derli toplu ve iyi dizayn edilmişti. En önemlisi bi evde ihtiyacınız olabilecek her sey vardı, çamaşır deterjanı, yumusatıcı, kurutmalık, baharatlar, yağlar, sert/yumusak yastık.. Tuğba Hanım ise son derece cana yakındı. Çok yardımcı oldu demek isterdim ama her sey o kadar yerindeydi ki yardımcı olucağı hiç bir durumla karşılaşmadık. Konum-temizlik-ev sahibi her şey dört dörtlüktü. Fiyat-performans açısından çok memnun kaldık açıkçası. Konumu sebebiyle ulaşıma da cok para harcamadık. Teşekkürler

There's so many nice things I have to say about this apartment, and Tugba as a host! Location wise, this apartment is absolutely perfect its on what seems like the border of Nisantasi and Besiktas. Nisantasi is fabulous - lots of high end designer fashion stores, and Besiktas has endless lovely restaurants and cafes. The apartment is also a short walk to the Besiktas ferry, which has wonderful views on the Bosphorus to other great districts in Istanbul. The apartment was sparkling clean and had so much style which I can imagine comes from Tugba's great sense of style as a designer. It also next door to a small convenient store that keeps late hours, and around the corner from a big supermarket. As a host Tugba was very understanding and responsive and pleasant. I would absolutely love to return to this place, and I am going to encourage my friends to stay here when they are in Istanbul! Fabulous time here!

Tugba, was a great host and the place was very comfy, cozy and neat. I stayed there with my brother for the first week and the 2nd week with two friends after  my brother left. We all enjoyed the place very much. It was very well equipped. Thanks to Tugba and Ali for their nice place, help and advices.

Super comfortable apartment, with all the facilities. It is located in an excellent area. 
Tugba is very kind and she is willing to help you in whatever you need. 
I highly recommend this place for a stay in Istanbul!

Evin yeri gercekten cok guzel, hem toplu tasima bakimindan hem de Nisantasi’nda olmasi sebebiyle kalmaya elverisli bir ev. Ayni zamanda evin dekorasyonu oldukca guzel ve evin ici oldukca bakimli, fotograflarda gorunmeyen giyinme odasi ise cok ise yariyor.

A very nice flat in a great location.   I particularly appreciated the very comfortable bed and the selection of pillows, including an orthopedic pillow, as I have back and neck pain problems.  The shower is excellent, which was also a big plus for me.  I would have liked to have air-conditioning, as it was very hot when I was in Istanbul.  There is a mobile ventilator which helps a lot, but sometimes it is not enough.  You have to be aware that there is no lift, so you will need to go up two flights of stairs which might be a problem for those who have trouble carrying heavy luggage. Tugba is very kind and attentive and is very quick in responding to any queries.   Recommended!

Tugba’s place is strategically located between Besiktas and Nisantasi both of them are very nice neighbourhoods. The apartment is spacious and has everything you need even for a long-term stay. There are plenty of eateries, cafes and bars nearby too as well as supermarkets that are open till late.
Tugba is very nice, she met me in person while my flight had 2 hrs of delay and I literally arrived 1 am. Very pleasant stay, highly recommended.
beautiful host and lovely house

The first three days we were
without hot water and without heating. 
when they suppose repaired the heater, it broke again. When I contacted the host she told me it was strange, if I had touched something... I didn’t understand the comment, the heater was damaged from the first moment I arrived.
There was no toilet paper. 
When we arrived, the host did not even help us with a small suitcase. They are two floors per stairs. 
I love turkey and I love istanbul, is my second time there, but I would not go back to this apartment.

Tugba was a really nice host, although our flight had a delay, she waited patiently for us. 
other than that the apartment was in a really good condition and the location of the place was exceptional.

name: Vela Luxury Apartment HUTB-001280
summary: Spacious 110m2 apartment decorated with designer furniture throughout.  Large living room/dining room area with bay window. 2 double bedrooms leading to balcony & 2 bathrooms. Office area, fully equipped kitchen & safety box. Centrally located, 1 block from Paseo de Gracia, restaurants, boutiques and bars within walking distance. Close to metro stations, bus stops, casa Batllò, La Pedrera etc Ideal for families, groups or professionals. There is a 30€ extra charge for late check ins (after 9pm)
space: The 2nd bedroom can be set up with 2 twin beds or 1 queen size bed.
description: Spacious 110m2 apartment decorated with designer furniture throughout.  Large living room/dining room area with bay window. 2 double bedrooms leading to balcony & 2 bathrooms. Office area, fully equipped kitchen & safety box. Centrally located, 1 block from Paseo de Gracia, restaurants, boutiques and bars within walking distance. Close to metro stations, bus stops, casa Batllò, La Pedrera etc Ideal for families, groups or professionals. There is a 30€ extra charge for late check ins (after 9pm) The 2nd bedroom can be set up with 2 twin beds or 1 queen size bed. Guests have access to the whole apartment We will recommend you the best restaurants in the city from the trendiest to the local secrets for foodies. For our lady guests with a soft spot for shoes and handbags, we can organize a visit to Serena Whitehaven's showroom. This is a local brand which is establishing itself worldwide - already has a shop in Miami - come and get pleasantly surprised and let them pamper you ! THE CITY OF
notes: THE CITY OF BARCELONA IMPOSES A CITY TAX SIMILAR TO THOSE CHARGED BY HOTELS. THE RATE IS 2,48€ PER PERSON (OVER THE AGE OF 16) PER NIGHT FOR A MAXIMUM OF 7 NIGHTS. THIS WILL BE CHARGED AT CHECK IN. There is a 30€ extra charge for late check ins. Please be careful with the keys if you lose them there is a 100 € charge for each lost set of keys.
access: Guests have access to the whole apartment
