For our lady guests with a soft spot for shoes and handbags, we can organize a visit to Serena Whitehaven's showroom. This is a local brand which is establishing itself worldwide - already has a shop in Miami - come and get pleasantly surprised and let them pamper you !
house_rules: - Only smalll pets allowed

reviews.comments: Lovely apartment in a great location. Everything as expected.

El departamento esta en una ubicación excelente, a una cuadra de la casa Batllo y a media cuadra del Paseo de Gracia
Las fotos del anuncio son super exactas...el departamento es igual a lo que aparece en ellas
Buen espacio y dimensiones de todos los recintos 
Nuestra anfitriona fue muy agradable y simpática
La conexion de Wi Fi funciona muy bien y es muy buena
房子很大,位置很好,床和家具也还不错｡但是油漆味道特别重,感觉像刚刷了没两天,很不舒服｡而且入住时还收了21欧元的租房税,这个费用并没有提前说明｡和房东约好的10月11日的清洁服务当天没有来,改约了12日也没有来…很无语｡
Beautiful apartment, as shown in pictures, really spacious, nice modern bathrooms and kitchen in a great location and a responsive host. Top marks!

Wonderful stay in Vega last October .Apartment design and nicely furnished, well located between Casa Pedrera and Casa Ballto. Walking distance from Catalunya plaza (about 10 min). Heike has been very supportive and nice in accommodating us during the week. 
We recommend this address. It is a bit  noisy as really in the city center but we were not bothered during the night.
Lovely apartment, great design, central location
Great location ,, beautiful apartment .. Neat and clean.. Highly recommended.

The apartment is centrally located in a very safe area of Barcelona with easy access to shops, restaurants and some excellent tourist sights.

The apartment is quite beautiful, very clean with high ceilings, wooden floors, very tall windows and doors and nicely furnished.  We visited over the last week of December and the city's Christmas lights were beautiful. 

The heating system was very efficient and no problems with hot water supply.  Fully double-glazed windows and bedroom windows are double-double glazed so no problem with road noise.  Although only on the first floor there is a small lift for those who may find it difficult to climb stairs with a suitcase.

For those interested, the apartment is directly opposite the Egyptian Museum.

Heike was a friendly and efficient host and solved a problem with one of the keys overnight for us.

We really enjoyed our stay at Vela apartment and would recommend to others seeking a classy apartment in a great location in this amazing city.

central location with great public transport close by.Wonderful ,stylish apartment with all you would want available for a short or long stay..Professional assistance from the owner and always willing to assist .The area made me feel like a local which I liked..

We have used Airbnb for our last few family European holidays, so we have some but not a huge experience with Airbnb. 

The host responded to my booking request very promptly and responded to my initial questions straight away. Communication was very good, which I found encouraging. 

When we arrived we were greeted by Alex who politely and articulately showed us around the apartment and resolved a number of very minor housekeeping issues. We had a slight issue with the internet on day 2 which again was dealt with promptly and efficiently. 

The apartment is tastefully decorated and appointed to a high standard and it was also very comfortable. We felt very much at home. 

On the first night we noticed a little traffic noise  ( as was expected from a city centre location) but this was significantly minimized when the outer shutters and inner ornate shutters were closed. 

The apartment is located in a lovely spot, very central but a block or so away from where the main tourist congregations.  We enjoyed exploring the city away from the bulk of the tourists. 

I would definitely recommend this apartment.
Great apartment in the perfect neighborhood to enjoy Barcelona.  Exactly as advertised.  Wonderful host.

The apartment is located on the corner of the main street of Barcelona, which is super convenient to access all the major sightseeings, restaurants and shopping area of the city within 2-3 kilometers. 

It's a really warm and tidy apartment with modern design and classic layout. It has a big dinning room with a super cute balcony, sitting where you can have a cup of coffee and relax for reading. Two bedrooms and two individual bathrooms are quite decent for a family and two couples of friends to stay. 

Alex and Schwartz are very helpful to offer clear instructions and quick response whenever questions were sent. 

It's impressive living experience and I highly recommend to all who gonna come to Barcelona for traveling.

Fantastic home, great location, easy communication and wonderful hospitality!  Highly recommend to anyone traveling for pleasure or business in Barcelona.  We throughly enjoyed our time and will be back again!

nous remercions chaleureusement Heike pour son accueil et Alex pour sa disponibilité et réactivité... tout était conforme à l'annonce et à nos attentes... l'appartement est très bien situé, central mais hors des circuits touristiques ... agréable, bien chauffé et surtout très bien isolé phoniquement ... nous aurons plaisir à revenir

This apartment is in a great location within the Eixample district of Barcelona. Felt safe walking around the neighborhood even late at night. Close to restaurant, bars, local markets, shopping and within walking distance to many local attractions. The beautifully renovated apartment is in a classic building with several exterior balconies. We enjoyed sitting and enjoying our morning coffee in the glass-enclosed balcony. We loved the large clean kitchen that had everything we needed to prepare meals. Heike and Alex were great to work. Our inquiries were responded to quickly. Reported issues were resolved immediately.  We would definitely recommend this apartment to anyone visiting Barcelona. We hope to be back again soon.

The apartment is what we were looking for.  A great location that gave us the ability to dine like a local close to home or an easy walk to any attraction in Barcelona.  The apartment was clean and as advertised.  As one other reviewer wrote, waking up and having your coffee on the glassed in balcony was wonderful.  There are open air balconies off the bedrooms.  Heike was responsive with any questions we had and was very nice to do business with.
Nice apartment in a great central location.

Heike and Alex were wonderful hosts, helpful, responsive and accommodating.
The apartment is beautiful, it's in a historic building with an elevator that looks like a prop from Wes Anderson movie. It's very centrally located. When you stay there, you are surrounded by beautiful architecture, great cafes and restaurants, and lots of upscale shopping. It's also only a couple of blocks from a market and a beautiful flower shop.
We stayed for a month and the place had all the creature comforts we needed: full size oven, good coffee machine, washer/dryer, dishwasher.
Would love to stay there again in future. :)

Fantastic apartment for two couples. Wonderful building in great location. Loved the window box area for people watching. All the amenities were top notch. Very comfortable. Easy to get everywhere. Wonderful hosts!

Simply an amazing unit, in the heart and in a very prestige  part of Barcelona. Communication with both Heike and Alex were instantly responding to our inquiries. Lots of good cafes and restaurants especially the Tapas restaurant underneath the building. Definitely we recommend this place.

Incredible location.  Walk to shops, tapas, subway, Gaudi's Casa Batlllo.
Total 4 window panes to keep the bedrooms silent.  2X2
Super Bay living room extension to watch life on the move.
I recommend it.

What a wonderful apartment in a perfect location. This was our first visit to Barcelona and we could have not been more pleased. The apartment itself had everything we needed and was so nicely decorated. The window box looking over the street was a treat. Our host was so accommodating and helpful throughout our stay. We hope to return to Barcelona and would definitely book this spot again.
Great location, great hosts, really enjoyed our stay

The place is as described. Great location. Alex was the only person I met or dealt with once we arrived and he was tremendously helpful — 
I utilized pretty much all the appliances and had to contact ALEX each time for help. Hopefully there is a guide now in the house with manuals or instructions. It would have made a huge difference! Every thing else was great. The AC was making loud noises and we were told a part needed to be ordered...which seems to be a repeated theme in these comments— just FYI.
Gran apartamento en una de las mejores zonas de Barcelona

Overall I highly recommend the apartment.  Heike was quick to respond and I was able to leave bags there early.  She provided very good restaurant recommendations.  The flat was large, very stylish and has a lovely bay window sitting area overlooking the street.  It had all the amenities and an excellent central location off the Passeig de Gracia - one block to the metro, about 15 minutes or less by taxi to most of Barcelona, easy walk to cafes, restaurants and shopping and a medium walk to the Ramblas, Gotico and Born.  However the neighborhood is a little quiet at night for Barcelona and does not have a late night scene.  We would definitely stay here again.  Thanks, Heike!

This is just a wonderful apartment in the heart of Barcelona. It is almost equidistant to the main sites of the city. The living room has a wonderful alcove over the street and the kitchen is well equipped. We found the place super clean and the beds very comfortable. Heike is a fantastic host! I looked at many airbnbs in Barcelona and was very happy with this apartment.

name: Fully Furnished in Causeway bay
summary: My place is close to nightlife, public transport, and the city centre. You’ll love my place because of the outdoors space. With window in the room. Electricity bill not included in the airbnb payment.
description: My place is close to nightlife, public transport, and the city centre. You’ll love my place because of the outdoors space. With window in the room. Electricity bill not included in the airbnb payment.

host.host_about:
I have a few rooms available. 
 
Lots of room available actually. If you need any help, just message me and will send you some options !

Enjoy your stay.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: The hosting company is very professional and eager to serve. The property is also very close to the MTR and is relatively nice to stay at. I would recommend considering this listing for any short term stays in HK!

name: East Village Living
summary: Welcome to my little oasis in the heart of NYC's vibrate east village.  You'll have the city at your finger tips.  Walking distance to some of the most popular bars, restaurants, and shops!  My studio apt is newly renovated!  Enjoy a queen size Tempurpedic bed accompanied with modern Bo Concept and West Elm decor.  There's plenty of space to unpack and unwind.
space: Super sunny studio apartment!  Exposed brick, hardwood floors, stand up shower, & stainless steel appliences.
description: Welcome to my little oasis in the heart of NYC's vibrate east village.  You'll have the city at your finger tips.  Walking distance to some of the most popular bars, restaurants, and shops!  My studio apt is newly renovated!  Enjoy a queen size Tempurpedic bed accompanied with modern Bo Concept and West Elm decor.  There's plenty of space to unpack and unwind. Super sunny studio apartment!  Exposed brick, hardwood floors, stand up shower, & stainless steel appliences. I'll be away from my home when you stay, but I'm a quick email or (Hidden by Airbnb) away!  My cleaning lady can help directly if there's an emergency. This is an area for foodies, dive bar enthusiasts, artist, and vintage hunters.  The east village is where head turning street style is the norm. Citi Bike is around the corner for an easy commute around the neighborhood.  Most subways are only a three to five min walk away including the F at Houston, L at 1st Ave, 6 at Astor Place, and N,R at 8th st NYU. I only rent to gu
neighborhood_overview: This is an area for foodies, dive bar enthusiasts, artist, and vintage hunters.  The east village is where head turning street style is the norm.
notes: I only rent to guest that have been reviewed by other host.  Thank you for understanding as this is my personal home.
transit: Citi Bike is around the corner for an easy commute around the neighborhood.  Most subways are only a three to five min walk away including the F at Houston, L at 1st Ave, 6 at Astor Place, and N,R at 8th st NYU.
interaction: I'll be away from my home when you stay, but I'm a quick email or (Hidden by Airbnb) away!  My cleaning lady can help directly if there's an emergency.
house_rules: Please remove shoes upon entering home.  Treat my place as your own.  No smoking please :)

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I enjoy traveling and experiencing new things. I'll try anything twice!

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 34 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Erica's East Village studio is great. The apartment is very nicely decorated, exactly as pictured, with lush amenities and a comfortable layout. Neighborhood is cool for exploring. As a host, Erica is top notch. She's proactive, genuinely helpful and gracious. She went above and beyond before, during and even after our stay---mailing something I'd left behind back to me so promptly, I didn't even have a chance to realize I'd left it behind! Def. recommend.

Erica was fantastic and very helpful! She provided a lot of information before we arrived and was very helpful with the checkin process!

The apartment is great and exactly like the photos. Very cute apartment in a great neighborhood. Erica provided a lot of great suggestions for restaurants and things to do in the neighborhood.

Erica's place is adorable. It's actually perfect for a New York apartment. Very clean, comfortable, & in a super accessible location! Erica herself is so sweet and loving. I was fortunate enough to meet her and found her to have a wonderful honest energy. I definitely recommend Erica as a host!
Very cute place.  Host was really responsive and nice.  Definitely recommend this place!

The apartment was wonderful.  The bed is super comfortable, and the apartments' location is fantastic.  The only thing I wasn't expecting was, there were no towels.  I never contacted Erica to let her know or ask her where they were because we had a packed schedule.  So there might actually be towels.  But other than that, my boyfriend and I LOVED the apartment.

Expérience incroyable !!!!! Erica s'est rendu disponible à tout moments pour répondre à nos questions. Elle nous a mis à l'aise dès le début. 
Elle nous a également conseillé de très bonnes adresses de restos et de boutiques de prêt à porter originales près de l'appart. Tout est à proximité. C'est un quartier qui bouge, un quartier d'artistes.
On a passé un merveilleux séjour.
Sans hésitation je recommande cette endroit et j'espère y revenir très bientôt:)
Merci à toi Erica pour cette incroyable accueil :)

Erica's studio was great! Perfect location within walking distance to many restaurants and bars, as well as a subway stop. The place was comfortable and exactly as described. Erica was also quick with her responses and catered to anything we needed. Definitely recommend her place for anyone looking to stay in a prime location for Manhattan.

Had a great experience with Erica and her place.  Extremely responsive and made the whole process extremely seamless.  Her place is in a great location - it is noisy outside on the road but it is NYC so to be expected!
Erica was a fantastic communicator and her apartment is beautiful, clean, comfy!  I would absolutely stay here again when I need a place in the East Village.
Erica was very responsive and her apartment is very clean, cosy and comfortable, great location. Instructions for check in process were perfect and easy! I recommand this place! Many thanks Erica

We loved our stay in Erica's apartment! The listing is exactly how the apartment is. We felt comfortable in her place and it was clean. For a NYC apartment it felt very nice. Erica does a good job of making her space as efficient as possible and provides all of the necessities to stay. The location is great. Close to coffee shops, subway lines and fun neighborhoods and shopping. The process for getting keys couldn't be easier. Highly recommended! Thanks Erica!

Erica's place was a wonderful homebase for my New York City vacation.  A cute apartment with a very comfortable bed, it was located conveniently both for walking adventures & for access to the subway.

we had a wonderfull stay in Erica's place for 7 days in New Year's time!
The apartment is nice and cosy and super well located to enjoy the big City in the best way!
Great restaurant and bar also in the neighborhood!
The only little inconvenience we found is the low pressure in the shower (a little hard for women with long hair ;-)) but everything else was perfect so you'll fast forget it!
we didn't get the chance to meet Erica but everything was perfectly planned for our coming and Erica was more than ever there for us to answer our questions by email even if she was at the other end of the world! 
Don't hesitate and come, you won't regret it!

Beautiful small space in a recently renovated building. Wonderful location. Clean. Erica was very attentive and accommodating host! Would definitely stay here again. Close to everything in the heart of the East Village.

Erica has a beautiful apartment. I had a great time and if I decide to come back to NYC again in future, I know exactly where I will staying! :) I specially liked an amazing list of restaurants and places to go nearby complied by Erica. It helped me so much and saved so much time for me. I absolutely loved Erica's apartment. Its a great location, beautiful decor, clean and comfortable in all aspects. 
Erica was incredibly helpful.
Rekha
Erica has a lovely home in a great location. Communication was great and everything went smoothly. Thanks again Erica!

Erica's place was great!
It was super clean, cozy and in a great location.
On top of that, she was available to answer any questions that we may have had.

El departamento de Erica es hermoso. Muy bien ubicado y cómodo!
La comunicación con ella fue excelente desde el momento en que reservamos el lugar, siempre atenta.

Simply great, safely and strategically situated, comfortable and very sweet home.
Erica is a lovely person.
We would recommend this place in a heartbeat - it had everything we needed and Erica responded immediately and kindly to our questions. Wonderful experience!

Erica’s place is absolutely beautiful! She was very great with communication as well! The place is in the heart of the East Village and in walking distance to NYU and Washington Square Park. A quick ride from all the midtown hot spots like 5th Avenue and Central Park! Home was extremely clean as well! Loved this stay :)
Super cute small space to call you own in nyc! Erica was a awesome host with great ideas on where to stay as as helpful as possible!

El departamento es muy recomendable. Erica es muy cordial y responde a todas las consultas. Tuvimos un inconveniente un día antes de llegar, porque nos cambiaron las fechas de viaje y sin embargo Erica, a pesar de no tener ningún compromiso, nos ayudo a resolver esta cuestión. El departamento esta a solo 3 cuadras de una de las líneas de metro (F) que lleva a conectar con cualquier otra para ir a donde sea necesario. A tan solo una cuadra se tienen bares, lugares para cenar o almorzar, mercados para comprar lo que se necesite, etc.
Tomar en cuenta que el departamento se encuentra en un tercer piso por escalera ya que si viaja gente con dificultades de movilidad, esto podría complicar las cosas.
Muchas gracias Erica!

I had a really good two week stay at Erica’s apartment. Her apartment lies in a really tidy apartment building, with a bike park in the back yard!! The location of the apartment is lovely as well, East Village is just one of the best places to stay in when visiting NYC. The apartment itself was left super clean and it made me feel right at home. Erica was really easy to communicate with and she had a bunch of good recommendations. Thanks again for the great stay!

L'appartement est idéalement situé dans East Village, parfait pour rayonner dans Manhattan et pour un séjour de quelques jours. Erica avait parfaitement préparé notre arrivée et nous a donné de précieux conseils. Son appartement est très petit mais très charmant, très soigné aussi. Seul petit bémol : le bruit dans les rues avoisinantes avec les klaxons et les sirènes de véhicules de secours... mais c'est aussi cela New York ! 
J'ai apprécié la qualité de l'environnement, à proximité. Un conseil : aller se promener à pied tout autour, plein de lieux charmants et animés comme à Greenwich Village, Washington Square, East River Park... etc...
Pratique aussi : le métro ( 2nd Avenue) est à deux pas de l'appartement et c'est très pratique pour se rendre partout dans Manhattan. 
je vous recommande vivement  le logement d'Erica !
Philippe

The place is great, cozy, very comfortable bed, great shower with good power. The kitchen with what is necessary.
The neighborhood very nice and close to bars, cafes, super, and the subway.
To take into account that they are 3 floors by stairs.
Erica was great, we did not meet each other personally, but always attentive, she sent us recommendations and answered questions quickly.
I recommend this place!
Awesome location, definitely the best location for foodies. Gets pretty lively on the weekends, convenient to just walk back home after a few drinks.

We had a great stay at Erica's place. We stayed for more than a month in the summer of 2018. It was a smooth self check-in process. The place itself was lovely - a studio apartment on the 3rd floor, a few steps away from many restaurants and other services, and close to the subway. This is the east village so there are also a lot of bars and people out and about. The bed was comfortable and fits 2 people. The bathroom was spacious in compared to other NY apartments. The storage space was sufficient for the normal amount of travel items for a 2-person trip. The stove and other kitchen appliances were very practical, we would cook our breakfast eggs, while enjoying coffee from Erica's Nespresso machine. We also enjoyed the AC and nNetflix equipped TV for unwinding later. The place has everything you would want for a month's worth stay, with easy access to all of New York's attractions.

Lovely host, extremely helpful.  Charming place, albeit small.  Comfortable bed.  3rd floor walk-up, but no big deal for most.  Excellent location in terms of proximity to everything, but considerable street noise.  Hey, that's NYC!
Amazing apartment, thank you very much for your kind hospitalty!

We had a wonderful stay at Erica’s: the apartment is in my favorite NY neighborhood and at a 5-10 min walk from subway stations. There are a lot of restaurants, bars, shops, the location really is ideal!

In terms of living conditions Erica is an excellent host, super reactive by message and thoughtful for her visitors’ stay: a visitor set (earplugs which are nice to have with the street noise, slippers for each guest), plenty of soap and bathroom products, a Netflix visitor account... 
I loved the comfy pillows, the cozy decoration and the very manhattan-y brick wall! There is also plenty of storage available in the closet for all your NY shopping.

The only trouble I had was with the stairs (3rd floor): I have a cane after a surgery and I couldn’t have brought my suitcase up without my bf’s help. (BF being a fluffy towel person he wasn’t a fan of the fouta towels in the bathroom, but I like the summery vibe!)

I would definitely recommend staying in this adorable and cozy nest Erica has set up, and I will likely be checking it out for any future trip I might plan :)

name: Sydney Centre City View Studio Apartment
summary: My place is close to Hyde Park, AMP Centrepoint tower, World tower, Chinatown, Darling Harbour, Museum, Town Hall and Central stations, Sydney Opera house, Kings Cross, QVB, Westfield shopping centre, Australian Museum, Anzac Memorial, St Mary's Cathedral, St Vincent Hospital. You’ll love my place because of its excellent location and facilities in the building (rooftop pool, spa, sauna and gym). My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, families, and big groups
description: My place is close to Hyde Park, AMP Centrepoint tower, World tower, Chinatown, Darling Harbour, Museum, Town Hall and Central stations, Sydney Opera house, Kings Cross, QVB, Westfield shopping centre, Australian Museum, Anzac Memorial, St Mary's Cathedral, St Vincent Hospital. You’ll love my place because of its excellent location and facilities in the building (rooftop pool, spa, sauna and gym). My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, families, and big groups Currently the rooftop spa is under repairs Located in the Sydney CBD on the corner of Liverpool st and Oxford st opposite the Hyde Park. 10 minutes walk to Darling Harbour and Chinatown. 2 minutes walk to Museum Train Station. 20 minutes walk to Circular Quay and the Opera House. 2 minutes walk to bus stop that takes you straight to Bondi Beach in 20 minutes. Museum station (which is the city circle station) is located only a couple of minutes walk from the apartment. Cot, high chair and stroller are
notes: Cot, high chair and stroller are available at an additional cost of AU$18 per night. Parking is available at an additional cost of AU$35 per night.
transit: Located in the Sydney CBD on the corner of Liverpool st and Oxford st opposite the Hyde Park. 10 minutes walk to Darling Harbour and Chinatown. 2 minutes walk to Museum Train Station. 20 minutes walk to Circular Quay and the Opera House. 2 minutes walk to bus stop that takes you straight to Bondi Beach in 20 minutes. Museum station (which is the city circle station) is located only a couple of minutes walk from the apartment.
access: Currently the rooftop spa is under repairs
house_rules: - We require guests to call us 30 minutes prior to arrival to the apartment for check-in.  - On arrival we require guests to sign an agreement form and provide a AU$500 fully refundable security deposit to insure against damage or loss to the apartment  - On departure, the apartment must be left in tidy condition with rubbish removed and dishes washed. To check-out, please leave the apartment keys inside the apartment on the table and close the apartment door.

host.host_about: I love beautiful Sydney and would like to show all my clients how wonderful Sydney is.

reviews.comments:
I was thoroughly disappointed in this apartment, on arrival we were told we had been moved to a different room. 
The Room we received had no view, no oven, no dryer, the bathroom was disgusting and had to be cleaned by us on arrival.
The walls were covered in marks, we paid for a queen bed, sofa bed and a single bed, however we recieved a double and two singles. 
The Room key didn't even have the correct room number on it, the fridge had milk stains and none of the cutlery matched..
The wine in the room was a nice touch and it was in a great location..
as listed, thankyou

Do not stay here.  EVER. 
The "host" is rude and invades on your privacy as and when she pleases.  The "home" is an ex-hotel room and is one of 40 apartments she owns that have never been lived in. Its dirty, almost everything is broken, the air-conditioning unit leaks, its loud as hell, it cuts out and it looks like it could fall off the ceiling at any point in time.  
This place is a cheap and nasty room used to circumnavigate the standards set by normal accommodations.  Still waiting for Airbnb to fix this problem, have been waiting for them to respond for a month!
STEER CLEAR
Amazing stay and the place is close with a beautiful park. Easy to find foods nearby

name: Direct Beach/Ocean front, 20 Steps to the Water!
summary: Please read entire listing prior to booking to ensure my unit is as good fit for your travel needs! :) Amazing location & view! Remodeled 2Bd/2ba condo located right on the ocean/beach w/ breath-taking ocean views. Relax by the ocean-front pool or walk down the steps to take a dip in the ocean for some  snorkeling! Located next to Honokowai Beach Park in West Maui, only a short distance to Ka'anapali, Kahana, Lahiana & Napili. Centrally located to many tourist attractions & local favorites.
space: This 2 bedroom 2 bath, ocean-view, Maui vacation home is perfect for a family vacations! The master bedroom is downstairs with a brand new king bed and there are two full sized beds in the loft bedroom upstairs in addition to full bath. Both baths have walk-in showers w/ etched glass. Remodeled kitchen with state of the art appliances and granite counter tops. The living room has a plasma TV and DVD player.  The master bedroom also has a flat screen TV.  We offer free Wi-Fi and free parking for one car (no additional parking is available).  The pool is the perfect place to relax and is just steps from the ocean.  Near the pool is a BBQ area where you can cook while you listen to waves come crashing in.  Conveniently located to a beach park, organic super market, restaurants, coffee shop and Farmer's Market.  There is no air conditioning in the unit, however there are fans in every room and since the unit is located so close to the water the trade winds keep the unit comfortable!  Pleas
description: Please read entire listing prior to booking to ensure my unit is as good fit for your travel needs! :) Amazing location & view! Remodeled 2Bd/2ba condo located right on the ocean/beach w/ breath-taking ocean views. Relax by the ocean-front pool or walk down the steps to take a dip in the ocean for some  snorkeling! Located next to Honokowai Beach Park in West Maui, only a short distance to Ka'anapali, Kahana, Lahiana & Napili. Centrally located to many tourist attractions & local favorites. This 2 bedroom 2 bath, ocean-view, Maui vacation home is perfect for a family vacations! The master bedroom is downstairs with a brand new king bed and there are two full sized beds in the loft bedroom upstairs in addition to full bath. Both baths have walk-in showers w/ etched glass. Remodeled kitchen with state of the art appliances and granite counter tops. The living room has a plasma TV and DVD player.  The master bedroom also has a flat screen TV.  We offer free Wi-Fi and free parking for one
neighborhood_overview: The complex is located right on the beach and next door to a county park, which is great for families traveling with children.  The community is called Honokowai and is located south of Ka'anapali and north of Kapalua.  The neighborhood is a mixture of condominium complexes and residential single-family homes.  The complex is about 5 miles north of the town of Lahaina, a 50 minute drive from Kahului Airport.  Across the street there is there is a grocery store, a weekly farmers market, a deli and the well-known Maui roasted coffee shop "Bad Ass Coffee".
notes: In addition to the rental fee, Hawaii State mandated 13.42% GET & TA tax will be collected separately through Airbnb’s resolution center.  At the time of booking, I will provide you with the amount of tax that will be requested.  I will send a request to collect the tax 7 days prior to your arrival.  If the tax is not paid within 24 hours of sending the request, I reserve the right to cancel the reservation without a refund as it will be difficult to re-book the unit on such short notice.  Unfortunately, Airbnb does not have a feature to calculate and add the tax in automatically.  The tax will be assessed on the total nightly rental cost not including the cleaning and services fees.
transit: Maui has a public transit system that stops right next door at Honokowai Beach Park; it is convenient for all local travel within West Maui. However, to make the most of your time here, I highly, highly recommend renting a car. There are several taxi companies that service the West Maui Area.  Uber and Lyft are also becoming more popular but are not as readily available as they are in larger metropolitan areas.  To the best of my knowledge, Lyft and Uber are not permitted to pick up at Kahalui Airport at this time (the rules might have changed so you'll want to look into this if you are considering this option).
access: Guests will be able to access the entire unit, communal coin-op washer/dryer, pool, BBQ area, and one parking spot.
interaction: I am most readily available through the Airbnb messenger app (99% of the time I respond in less than an hour, please take into consideration time zone differences).  Airbnb encourages hosts to communicate through the app.  I provide my cell phone for emergencies.  I do not live on island.  My parents live about 20 minutes away and are available and happy to help if you happen to need anything during your stay.  You will access the unit with a key provided in a lock box.  I will provide you with access information 2-3 days prior to your arrival.
house_rules: Please read our House Rules thoroughly PRIOR to booking to ensure that our unit is a good fit for your trip.  By confirming your reservation, you are agreeing to our house rules.  Confirmed reservations will be subject to our cancelation policy.  No refunds will be granted due to guest failure to read the House Rules.  1.
