host.host_about:
Hello, I'm originally from the LA area but have been back in Hong Kong for about 6 years. I also spent some time on the east coast of the U.S. in the Washington, D.C. area. I teach middle school math at an international school here in Hong Kong and have enjoyed the lifestyle of living and working in this vibrant city. 

Hong Kong has always had plenty of options to stay active. I've played in an expat softball league here for many years and still try to get out as much as I can. When I first arrived, I did a few of the popular hikes, but not so much anymore unfortunately. There are still some places in Hong Kong that I would like to explore and I also find the city to be a great hub for travelling throughout southeast Asia. 

I'm new to Airbnb and open to suggestions on making your stay in Hong Kong an enjoyable experience. Nice to meet you!

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Daniel's apt was in a great location to explore the city. It was close to the Soho area which have bars and lots of nightlife. I would recommend Daniel's place to anyone interested in making the most out of Hong Kong.
Very accommodating host, made the experience very easy. Located in a great part of the City!
it was a comfortable stay at a good location.

Great location, super clean and quite. There is also a door (wo)man in the lobby who is friendly and helpful. Check in and out were more than easy. 

Would def stay here again. 17 min walk from Hong Kong Station for airport connection. Plenty of nightlife close by in Lan Kwai Fong.

It is located in Mid Levels, so...prepare for the steep incline!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Very well maintained place. In the middle of soho. Only downside is the number of steps to get to the apartment, but that's the same for most apartments on HK island. Great value, will stay again.
Daniel's place is located in Central Hong Kong, close to restaurants, shops and bars. The flat is spacious and comfortable! I highly recommend it for your stay in HK!

Fantastic place with a great location. The unit is located right between Sheung Wan and SoHo with a number of good restaurants on the same street.
If you're new to the island or want easy, walkable access to the area around Central, then I highly recommend this place.

Besides the myriad of stairs and steps, the apartment is located within a walking distance to both sights and shopping, as well as to the Central subway station that connects a handful of lines. 

The apartment was quite big by Hong Kong standards, and everything was clean and tidy on top of that. The stay went smoothly without any problems.

Highly recommend!!

Daniel was great at communicating and gave us lots of tips before we arrived.

Arriving was very straight forward (although it was surprising when the Doorman asked for our passport!) Daniel very kindly let us check in early - what a star!

The place is spacious (for Hong Kong), though if you're planning on cooking you'll likely have to spread out into the living room. Bed is comfy, shower is hot - what more could you want :)

If you don't mind walking up lots of steps and steep hills, you can easily see many of the main HK Island sights on foot. If walking isn't your thing, there's plenty of public transport options reasonably close.

This place is really slap bang in the middle of things - close to restaurants, bars, cafes, supermarkets, shopping centres.

It's a great place to base yourself, particularly if you're only there for a short trip, like were.

Warning though: the area is very steep! You'll feel it in your calves :)
Great place to stay if you are visiting Hong Kong. Very close to restaurants and night life. Would highly recommend and would stay again if back in the area.

This modern apartment is located between Sheng Wan MTR & Central MTR. PMQ mall is across the street & visible through the window. Lots of food & drinks nearby, Lan Kwai Fong included (10 min walk). 

Although conveniently located, it is quiet as party-goers are found wandering in the streets starting one block away. For a straight-shot to the Sheng Wan station, take a couple long flights of stairs. If you have luggage & want to avoid that, use the Central station (or Uber) but keep in mind it is always very crowded there. 

Apartment was spacious for Hong Kong standards. Shower pressure was strong & stayed hot through long hair washing. Living room has surround sound system & English channels to watch TV. There's an extra closet room for hanging clothes. 

Overall, great place to stay as compared to other HK apartments. 

Also note, not all amenities at Dan's place are for communal use. This was not listed under House Rules nor noted anywhere. I was surprised to receive a note after check-out that an already open beverage was not for share although fridge was listed as an amenity. Through dozens of stays on Airbnb, this was my first experience encountering such an issue. Just use caution here.
Perfect place in the middle of Hong Kong to explore the city!

summary: My space is close to public transportation, the beach, mall, nightlife. You will love my space because of the warmth, the people and the location. My space is good for individual adventurers and business travelers.

name: Vacances de reve à Espinho (Porto)
summary: Amoureux du nord du Portugal, nous avons acheté cet appartement à Espinho, station balnéaire à 15 kms au sud de Porto (20 minutes en train). Idéalement situé, dans le quartier des Pêcheurs, à 250 m de l'océan (vue mer depuis le séjour) et à 5 minutes du coeur d'Espinho et des commerces.  La plage d'Espinho est un des 10 meilleurs spots de surf du Portugal.
space: Nous avons aménagé ce logement pour qu'il soit convivial et agréable à vivre. Spacieux, avec 3 chambres, une salle de bains et un cabinet de toilettes, il convient parfaitement aux familles. En hiver, nous facturons le chauffage sur la base de 0,20 cts le kwh. Nous sommes particulièrement attentifs à la propreté de ce lieu pour que chaque hôte s'y sente comme chez lui. C'est pourquoi nous assurons le ménage à la fin de chaque séjour.
description: Amoureux du nord du Portugal, nous avons acheté cet appartement à Espinho, station balnéaire à 15 kms au sud de Porto (20 minutes en train). Idéalement situé, dans le quartier des Pêcheurs, à 250 m de l'océan (vue mer depuis le séjour) et à 5 minutes du coeur d'Espinho et des commerces.  La plage d'Espinho est un des 10 meilleurs spots de surf du Portugal. Nous avons aménagé ce logement pour qu'il soit convivial et agréable à vivre. Spacieux, avec 3 chambres, une salle de bains et un cabinet de toilettes, il convient parfaitement aux familles. En hiver, nous facturons le chauffage sur la base de 0,20 cts le kwh. Nous sommes particulièrement attentifs à la propreté de ce lieu pour que chaque hôte s'y sente comme chez lui. C'est pourquoi nous assurons le ménage à la fin de chaque séjour. Les hôtes sont les bienvenus. Ils ont accès à l'ensemble du logement composé de 3 belles chambres. Nous faisons notre maximum pour que nos hôtes passent un séjour agréable. Vous trouverez dans le logemen
neighborhood_overview: Nous sommes situés dans le quartier des pecheurs, quartier populaire et typique, l'ancien coeur historique d'Espinho à 250 m de l'ocean.  Le golf de Paranos est situe à 1 km environ. Le centre ville d'Espinho est à 10 minutes environ à pieds et les commerces à 5 minutes environ. Acces facile aux supermarchés. Endroit ideal egalement pour les ballades à velo (piste cyclable jusqu'à Porto) et pour le surf.
notes: Nous apprécions le coté authentique et populaire de notre quartier avec ses restaurants typiques. Espinho est une station balnéaire réputée de la côte Nord du Portugal.  C est l'un des 10 meilleurs spots de surf du Portugal. Pour les amateurs de velo, une piste cyclable longeant l'ocean permet de circuler jusqu'à Porto tres facilement. C'est le point de départ idéal pour visiter le Nord et le centre du Pays.  Nous sommes à 250m de l'ocean et à environ 1km du golf de Paranos.
transit: La gare d'Espinho (à 20 minutes de Porto) se trouve à environ 10 minutes à pieds de notre appartement. Compter 1€70 par personne pour se rendre à Porto en train. L'aeroport de Porto se trouve à 30 minutes en voiture et 40 minutes par les transports en commun avec des rotations toutes les 15 minutes environ en journée.
access: Les hôtes sont les bienvenus. Ils ont accès à l'ensemble du logement composé de 3 belles chambres. Nous faisons notre maximum pour que nos hôtes passent un séjour agréable. Vous trouverez dans le logement tout ce dont vous pouvez avoir besoin pour passer d'agréables vacances. Les enfants sont les bienvenus. Vous trouverez dans l'appartement un lit BB ( lit  parapluie),   quelques jouets pour enfants, des jeux de plage ainsi qu'un parasol.
interaction: En cas de besoin, mon amie Maria (qui parle français, portugais et anglais) est disponible sur place pour vous apporter toute l'aide nécessaire.  Elle vous donnera de précieux conseils pour votre séjour.  Nous sommes nous mêmes disponibles par téléphone tout au long de votre séjour.
house_rules: Nous vous remercions de ne pas fumer à l'interieur de l'appartement.

host.host_about:
Habitant en Charente Maritime, nous sommes tombés amoureux du nord du Portugal.
Nous souhaitons vous faire decouvrir ce magnifique pays.

reviews.comments: Logement situé dans un quartier typique à proximité des activités de pêche. L'appartement est spacieux, fonctionnel, proche de toutes les commodités et dispose de tout l'équipement nécessaire pour passer de très bonnes vacances. Marie est une excellente hôte, attentive au bien-être des locataires. Nous avons passé un superbe séjour à Espinho, d'où nous avons rayonné sur tout le centre et le nord du pays. La proximité de la plage à moins de 5 minutes à pied permet également de très belles soirées estivales. Hôte que je te recommande pleinement!

Logement très propre, Maria nous a super bien accueillis avec des boissons fraîches dans le frigo comme cadeau de bienvenue. Marie est très facilement joignable.


Superbe expérience AirBnb, je recommande vivement ce logement. Très bon quartier pour découvrir la pêche portugaise.

Un appartement plus que parfait, une hôte   très å l écoute disponible, un accueil chaleureux de la part de Maria nous a fait nous sentir en très å l aise.nous recommandons fortement cet appartement pour son emplacement idéal, son calme, sa propreté et son prix plus que correct. Il est très bien équipé de la table à repasser å la machine à laver et sèche linge enfin liste trop (Website hidden by Airbnb) terminerai en remerciant les propriétaires pour ces vacances formidables.
Muy buen sitio

The apartment is really nice. All you need is there.
Maria is very beautiful. Thanks
Peter
Marie and Maria were very helpful. The apartment was clean and we found everything we needed. Just as described.
Una casa muy amplia con un trato muy bueno. Estancia muy amplia y limpia, tal cual se muestra en las fotos. La playa está a dos minutos andando, pueblo muy tranquilo. Hemos estado muy agusto.

Une semaine très agréable ! Un appartement très bien situez ! Avec une hôte très a l'écoute ! Un petit hic mais tout petit minuscule il manquais les première nécessité gel douche papier toilette etc ! C'est toujours mieux pour se sentir vraiment à l'aise ! A part sa rien à redire et propriétaire très gentille aussi au passage !
El alojamiento está bien, suficientemente equipado pero lejos del centro de la ciudad.

Agréable appartement spacieux pour 5 personnes.  Très bien situé près de la plage. Nous recommandons vivement.
Et sans oublier le très chameureux acceuil de Maria

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour dans cet appartement spacieux qui correspond tout à fait à l accueil d' une famille (nous étions 5 dont 1 (Website hidden by Airbnb) proximité de l'océan 5min à  pieds et des commerces nous ont simplifié les (Website hidden by Airbnb) gare (10min à pieds)nous a permis de ne pas utiliser notre voiture (rester au garage clos)de la semaine .Enfin l accueil De Maria à notre arrivée à été très chaleureux et le fait qu'elle parle Français nous a de suite mis à l aise.
Petit resto pas cher (6 euros le menu avec boisson)en bas de l appartement ou la cuisine est familiale et traditionnelle nous a beaucoup plu!!!!
Nous recommandons cet appartement
Excellent séjour, appartement très agréable !

Apartament czysty, zadbany i dobrze wyposażony. Bardzo wygodne łóżka. Idealny na pobyt wypoczynkowy w wakacje. Pani Marie szybko odpisywała na wiadomości, a wskazówki zostawione dla nas były bardzo pomocne - polecone super restauracje z pysznym i tanim jedzeniem. Gorąco polecam :)
I was happy to stay here. Apartment was big and clean. Location was also good, near cafes, beach, train station. Host helped with any questions.

Logement impeccable, Pres de toutes commodités . 
Situé à 200m du superb spot de surf d'espinho. 
Marie vous met à disposition un petit guide ou tout est bien expliquer , ainsi que conseil des bonnes adresses , resto, visite à effectuer. 
Bref je conseil vivement.
Nice treatment and attention, high recommendable!!
Nous avons passé un tres bon sejour. Accueil super et appartement tres bien equipé

A 15 min. a pé do centro de Espinho e da estação de comboios. Casa boa para grupos, fomos 7 e coubemos perfeitamente. A cozinha está bem equipada. Ambas a Maria e a Marie foram muito simpáticas e muito acessíveis. Uma ótima estadia!

Nous avons apprécié:
- les informations précises des lieux, commodités, guide touristique, ...

Je vous conseille le logement a Marie qui se trouve a 5mn a pied de la plage tout était parfait très bonne accueil de Maria.
logement grand et très confortable il y'a tout ce quil faut pour passer de très bon moment n’hésitez pas 
Merci a vous

Appartement très bien équipé et bien situé pour découvrir une partie du nord du portugal, proche de la gare. Excellent et chaleureux accueil de Maria ! Très bon livret préparé par les hôtes avec les restos ( nous nous sommes régalés) les sites à visiter, les commerces et les bons conseils des us et coutumes.

Bien accueillis par Maria avec en plus une bouteille de vin. Le book fournit était très complet. Proximité de la gare à pied. Logement avec tout le confort situé à côté de la plage, commerce et restaurants(pas chers) Je vous le recommande.
Marie apartment was great and we can definitely recommend it location very handy for Espinoho and the we found tit clean and tidy a great stay was had.
La casa se encuentra en una zona tranquila de Espinho. Al llegar no había toallas en la casa, por lo demás todo correcto.
Nice apartment and convenient location (great for surfers).
voisins pas très commodes

We stayed here for three nights with four people. The communication with Marie is perfect and also with Maria who was there when we arrived. The apartment is with 3 separate bedrooms big and very clean and complete. The neighbourhood is special, in the middle of the fisherman’s area which is a poor environment but very pure. We liked it much, especially the little restaurants around us. The beach is on a 200 meter nearby and the busy boulevard is approximately 1 km. We loved staying here and recommend this venue.
L’appartement est spacieux, très propre et très bien équipé. Nous y avons passé un agréable séjour. L’accueil de Maria est exceptionnel, elle est adorable.
Bardzo sympatyczny apartament. Trochę niejasna numeracja budynków przy ulicy utrudnia znalezienie obiektu.

le logement correspond le logement correspond à nos attentes.
Maria et une personne très accueillante.
Malgré la proximité du chemin de fer l'appartement est très calme.
Nous avons passé un très agréable séjour. La proximité avec la mer nous a fait beaucoup de bien. L'accueil est super avec Maria qui se rend vraiment disponible. Je recommande vivement.
N’hésitez pas à louer vous serez enchanté par cet endroit.
Tout est conforme à l'annonce pas de surprise NICKEL!! à conseiller

A Marie é ótima, apesar de não a ter conhecido pessoalmente. Quem nos entregou as chaves foi uma amiga da Marie, uma simpatia. O apartamento impecável, muito melhor que nas fotos. A limpeza estava perfeita. Em resumo o apartamento e o atendimento perfeitos. Localização boa, local tranquilo e próximo à praia. Estávamos de carro alugado, mas da pra ir caminhando para os lugares, com uma boa caminhadinha. O apartamento é ótimo, podem ficar nele e aproveitarem.
Vacances parfaites, avec un emplacement très proche de la mer! Super! A refaire!

Recomendo vivamente, um espaço extremamente equipado, um t3 que nos dá sensação de  open space. Excelente. Parabéns Marie pelo alojamento local. Irei recomendar a muita gente e irei reservar muitos dias de fim de semana e férias desde já. RECOMENDA-SE :)

name: Sunny, Huge, Quiet Room Doorman Bld
summary: This is a huge, quiet and sunny room with top of the line queen size mattress, Bose radio, Sonos, free fast internet, 37" inch TV for streaming, full closet, huge desk, sitting area, Turkish carpet, very private, quiet and sunny.
space: Extra spacious, quiet, private with free super fast internet, plus : your own closet, bureau, large empty desk, queen size bed that can cure insomina, nightstands, comfy over-size chair, enough space to work out, do yoga, excellent lighting and shared bathroom.  Air conditioning is available upon request. Heat is free. All is provided by a mature, courteous and friendly owner.  This room is on the far side of the apartment allowing visitors to enjoy their space personally and privately. My building is over the Hudson River, near Ft Tryon Park which is cliff-side, scenic and considered the most beautiful park in NYC. A few blocks away is Riverside Park that lends to a bike path over 20 miles long.  The apartment is near all conveniences including many restaurants, gourmet shops, nearby subway (A Train) and so much more.  Twenty five minutes to midtown, closer than Brooklyn.

host.host_about: I offer a warm, friendly environment while respecting privacy and quiet hoping for the same in return.  The room shown is an extra room affording extra comfort not found in many places,  a queen-sized bed that can cure insomnia, super-fast and free internet and huge desk, 36" TV for streaming, Bose radio and more. This room is set up as a home away from home.  Manhattan is my childhood home so I may suggest many great tips. More info is available upon request.

reviews.comments: I am very familiar with the neighborhood and the location was exactly as described.  I loved it.  Lee was a marvelous host and the room was very nice.  Clean, comfortable and with a great bed!  I look forward to staying with her again.

The host Lee Harbison was genuinely nice welcoming calm and genuinely caring about the guest To go to sleep in that bed meant you woke up wonderful to start a great day with a good night's sleep in the nicest city in the world .Lee was very flexible helpful and at times was just like a personal  Lonely planet travel guide
Great host, very accommodating. Lovely apartment. Comfy bed, quiet apartment. Thank you Lee!
Host was excellent and respectful, the room is very nice too.

The room was exactly as pictured. Very spacious. The bed was awesome. Lee was very welcoming and replied to any questions any had almost immediately. I really like the neighborhood- it's clean, quiet, and beautiful. I would definitely stay again!

Lee is an absolutely great host and the space she offers is a very good find. Quiet, safe neighborhood with plenty to offer and just a five minute walk to the 'A' line that will get you almost anywhere in NYC. The view of the Hudson River and the GWB, especially a night are awesome. It was a pleasure staying here. I would say the only downside is parking, but I expect that could be said of anywhere in New York, although there are two parking garages within 200 yards of the front door. This was my first AirBnB experience and Lee set a high bar for anybody else to follow :-)

Ha sido una estadía fetén.-

Manuel was a fabulous host. Very thoughtful guy and a pleasure to chat with. He made every effort to make me feel at home. The apartment was clean, spacious, and had everything I needed. Manuel roommates were also lovely people. I highly recommend staying here and will definitely visit again. Always great when you visit a warm and friendly home and make friends for life.

name: Appartement très tendance en plein centre ville.
summary: Notre appartement est situé en plein centre-ville de Montréal. A 3 minutes à pied du métro Sherbrooke, il s'agit d'un pied à terre idéal pour visiter Montréal.  Avec ses 2 chambres, 2 balcons, et une canapé lit, vous pourrez venir jusqu'à 6 personnes sans aucun problème.  Disposant de la climatisation,  télévision HD , une pS3 , et une connexion Wifi haut débit, vous pourrez vous sentir ici comme chez vous.
space: logement en plein centre-ville avec la climatisation et 2 balcons pour profiter du beau temps.

reviews.comments: What a great spot! Really welcoming and accommodating! Went above and beyond for us!
Great host, great space,  great location.
Sebastian handled my friends and I very smoothly. Check in and out was flexible. Place was great and better than described. I'd recommend anyone to book this place.

Expérience incroyable. Nous avons passé un super week-end en famille. L'emplacement de l'endroit ne peut être mieux situé. Sébastien nous a accueillis comme si nous étions chez nous et à effectué un suivi tout au cours de la fds. Les lieux étaient propre et très confortable. Un gros merci à Sébastien pour son hospitalité.
Excellent experience . Host was very friendly always responded to melt questions on email immediately. Was very helpful.
5 stars. Perfect location. Clean, comfortable apartment. Very accommodating host. One of the best Montreal stays that I've had

Super appartement tout équipé! Très bien situé, dans un quartier vivant et varié. Nous avons apprécié le parking (payant) très  proche, juste à côté du métro.  Sébastien est un hôte fort sympathique.  Il a pu répondre à la moindre question! Nous avons voyagé en famille avec 2 enfants de 7 et 4 ans, et nous avions chacun nos espaces. En tout point recommandable! Encore merci Sébastien.

Nous avons passé une très belle fin de semaine dans l'appartement de Sébastien. Il s'est assuré que nous avions tout ce dont nous avions besoin. L'appartement était tel que décrit très bien situé. Je le recommande fortement!

Sébastien a su se rendre disponible et flexible pour optimiser au maximum notre séjour. Son appartement, bien situé pour découvrir Montréal, est spacieux, récent et comporte tous les équipements pour un séjour agréable. Notre prochain voyage se fera chez lui, c'est sur !

This was the best stay I've had so far on Airbnb. The apartment is located on one of the cutest and most accessible streets of Montreal, and the pictures are very accurate. The apartment is spacious, clean, and a great value! Sebastian was helpful and accommodating to my early arrival, and was very easy to get in touch with regarding our check-out. I will definitely book this Airbnb again and I highly recommend it to others!

Nous avons passé une excellente semaine. L'appartement de Sebastien est idéalement situé pour visiter Montreal. Le métro et les bus sont à proximité. La rue et les quartiers sont très vivants et il y a tout ce qu'il faut. L'appartement est très bien équipé et nous n'avons manqué de rien. Sebastien a été tres disponible pour répondre à nos questions et extrêmement réactif.

We spent a great night between girls at the apartment . The owner was very helpful and was concerned about our comfort. He made us a "small tour" of the apartment and gave us clean sheet, linens, everything we needed . The place well located , close to everything. It costed us 10$ to take a cab from the old Port.   We would definetly go back . Thank you :)

Très bel appartement bien situé. Sebastien était très disponible pour répondre à nos questions. L'appartement est bien équipé pour cuisinier et rien à dire sur la propreté : top !
Pour résumer, très bon rapport qualité prix pour un logement à Montréal.

The apartment was great. We couldn't have asked for a better place at this price.  The location was perfect as it was walking distance from many iconic places.  Bars, parks, clubs, places to eat, and the metro were all easy to walk to.  Sebastién made check in and check out very easy for us. His hospitality was amazing and the apartment was very accommodating for our group. Montreal was beautiful and if we were to come back, our hope would be to stay at this apartment again. The place was comfortable, clean, and overall a relaxing place to stay for a visit to Montreal.

L'appartement de Sébastien est très bien situé, rue très sympas, toutes les commodités à coté.
Il est également très bien situé pour aller visiter le centre de Montréal.
L’appartement est très spacieux et avec tout le confort nécessaire,  climatisation, la cuisine très bien équipée avec tous les ustensiles nécessaires.
Appartement très propre et bien rangé
Sébastien s'est montré très disponible et pas besoin de lui poser des questions car il a pensé a tout.
Je recommande vivement l'appartement de Sébastien
Merci encore pour ton hospitalité.
This apartment was perfect! The location was great and the apartment itself was so beautiful. Easily fits 6 people. Sebastien was quick to answer. I would most definitely stay here again.

Sebastien was A1 out of the gate. Throughout the booking and arriving phase Sebastian communicated clearly and effectively. He was very helpful when we needed suggestions for parking. The unit was in spotless condition and was better than the photos. He even has a handy tour guide booklet printed off for guests. The location was prime for exploring downtown Montreal. It was just a 3-4 minute was from the Metro. 

Unfortunately our visit was tainted by a burglary. The backdoor appears to have been unlocked. We didn't use the door and were unaware of its existence until departing the residence. Sebastien is sure that it was left locked. We had left around 3 pm and returned around 3 Am after attending Kanye West at the Bell center and going out on the town. During the break and enter my personal laptop was stolen and a closet door was destroyed. The police came and there was little they could do without the tracking software installed on my laptop. I do believe Sebastien is a great host and has a great spot, but I was very unimpressed with his handling of the event. He had little to no concern about the loss of my possessions and even tried to charge us 400$ for the damages to his closet. Airbnb costumer service throughout this process was useless and made settling back into things at home quite stressful. This experience has caused me to consider traditional methods of lodging for future trips. Although, I think this was an unfortunate coincidence it certainly put a damper on our trip.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: 2br/1ba,1 kitchentte, 10min walk to Waikiki beach
summary: -Walk-up apartment in convenient location. 10min walk to beach, 5 min to bus stop and ABC store. ~ 400sq ft. -AC in each room (may be loud) -2bedrooms (2beds in each room), 1bathroom, and a kitchenette. (no living room) -Free Wi-Fi, fridge, a hot plate and utensils for simple cooking and eating.  -Parking - additional charge of $15/night. -Coin laundry in garage -Check-in 3PM-9PM: extra $10 after 9PM.  check-out by 11AM.   -The room is on the fourth floor and there is no elevator.

(no living room) -Free Wi-Fi, fridge, a hot plate and utensils for simple cooking and eating.  -Parking - additional charge of $15/night. -Coin laundry in garage -Check-in 3PM-9PM: extra $10 after 9PM.  check-out by 11AM.   -The room is on the fourth floor and there is no elevator.

reviews.comments: I booked this place for my friend and her family for the first time in Honolulu.  They liked the location, very close to beaches and shops and restaurant.  But they wonder why they had to take the trashes down after paying the cleaning fees.
房东非常热心周到负责｡房子非常干净舒适,甚至好于图片｡

친구들과 함께한 청춘여행 8일중 4일을 여기서 지냈는데 가성비 최고의 숙소이다. 호스트인 카즈에씨는 출국 이전부터 세심하게 체크인 시간이며 궁금한 점이 있는지 확인했으며 메세지를 남기면 곧장 답장이왔다. 하와이에 도착하고 약속한 체크인 시간보다 다소 늦었으나 호스트는 진작에 숙소에서 기다리고 있었다.(전반적으로 일관되게 굉장히 친절하게 설명해주고 궁금한 점을 해결해주었다)  이 방은 다소 연식이 있어보이는 아파트 4층에 있으며 유일한 단점은 계단을 이용해야 한다는 것이다.(가벼운 운동한다고 생각하면 무리 없다.) 방으로 들어가니 최근에 인테리어를 해서 그런지 낡은 아파트와는 반대로 다소 깔끔하고 세련된 모습을 하고 있었다. 무엇보다 기대이상으로 깔끔하게 관리되어온 모습이 마음을 굉장히 편하게 만들어 주었다. 호스트가 워낙 꼼꼼한 분이셔서 부족한 것이 하나 없이 구비되어 있던 생활용품이 호텔보다 훨씬 훌륭했다. 이 방에서 4일간 지내면서 가장 큰 장점 두가지를 꼽으라면 깔끔함과 모든 것이 완비되어 있는 것이었다.  총평으로는 굉장히 만족스러웠다. 가성비가 뛰어나다. 특히 친구들끼리 오는 여행객들에게 적극 추천해주고 싶다.

For 4days I've spent fabulous time with my friends. The host, Kazue san was very precise, friendly and kind. She double checked our check-in time to be on time and asked us if we have any questions even before we arrive at Hawaii. The room was spacious and extremely clean. Also interior was fancy.(totally different with the exterior of the building) Beds was comfortable enough to solve our tiredness from tight trip schedules and everything in this apartment was well-prepared. The best two advantages of this apartment are cleaness and Well-stocked daily supplies. Thanks to the host for making us feel and live like one of the local Hawaiians. I would defenetly stay in her place again if I have another chance to go to Hawaii!!

Kazue was very accommodating as soon as we got to the location.
As soon as we walked in, she gave us a detailed tour of the house and the location.

She as well had extra amenities for us to last the whole week, if not extra being provided.

Kazue was a great host and anyone wanting a close home by the beach should definitely go ahead with kazue's airbnb. :)
great location, nice place, great host.....

1. Great location

2. Enough room for 4 guests with 4 beds

3. Easy to check-in & check-out

4. Easy to park a rent-car with extra pay by US$15 cash a day

5. Bad noise from outside and air conditioners inside

6. Don't expect any views through windows

7. It's good for guests who spend most of their time outside till late night
The appartement ist clean, good street - calm  and reale near to Waikiki.

I went to Honolulu for the Honolulu marathon with my parents and my brother. We stayed at Kazue's place because it is close to the finish line. It turned out to be a convinient location for everything else. 
We liked our stay and the host Kazue and John were so kind and friendly. We felt very welcoming.
We had a good time in Honolulu thanks to Kazue and John. Thank you!
정말 깔끔하고 좋았습니다! 다만 음식을 만드는 레인지가 살짝 열이 부족해서 음식을 빨리빨리 만들지 못했네요, 가족과 가시는 분이나 음식을 사먹지않고 하시는 분이라면 가스레인지를 하나 사시는 걸 추천합니다!

친구들과 2일 동안 편안하게 잘 머물렀어요. 
와이키키까지 걸어갈 수 있는 가까운 거리, 별이 잘 보이던 옥상, 산책이나 조깅을 할 수 있던 운하길, 간단한 식사를 할 수 있던 자그마한 주방이 좋았어요.
아쉬웠던 점은 화장실 세면대의 물이 조금씩 나왔고 우리는 4명이었는데 테이블 의자가 3개 밖에 없어서 좀 불편했어요.
We enjoyed our stay at this place as it is very conveniently located in Waikiki. It was very easy to communicate with Kazue and she was very accommodating to our need

Kazue is a good host and very supportive. 
The location is fine and not too far from the Waikiki beach.
This place is recommended for young people who just need a place to sleep and don't care about noise come from the airco or outside. 
The 4th floor without elevator can be an issue if you do shopping a lot in Honolulu.
Thanks Kazue for your support during our stay there!

房子里海滩很近,每天晚上我们都走路去海滩,很方便｡The apt is very close to the beach, every night we walk to the beach, very convenient. Our plane was dalay, but the John has been waiting for us to 1:30 am to open the door, very grateful.
The location is very convenient: an ideal place for people who want to spend time at the beach. It is close to all dining options as well.

Beds were really quite comfortable. Kitchen was perfect with all the basics needed to make our stay comfortable. Location was perfect for getting to all the activities we did. Great place, great stay and would definitely recommend this to others.
It was good ! Really close to evrything . For this price it is really good. WiFi is not sooo good But that was Okay ! We had te best time ever
Everything was ok. In spite there was no elevator they help us with the luggage very kindly. Is an apartment with a very good ubication, near waikiki beach. We enjoy a lot.

What a great place to stay! I took my parents and my family to Hawaii for the first time, with little toddler and two family, we were struggling to find a suitable accommodation in the primary location. This place was nice, clean, best location in Waikiki. Short walk to shops, beach and bus stops. I found most of bus go through Kuhio ave, so it's super convinient.
Great time
Kazue's place is walking distance to everything in Waikiki, and only a few blocks from the beach. It isn't fancy but it was a great price, and I was very happy with my choice when I stayed here.

Kazue is very easy to talk with. Fast response and helpful. The room is clean and convince. The location is just perfect for visitors specially for people want to hang out in Waikiki. 
I highly recommend her place for visiting Hawaii.

Good location to stay.
The room is top floor on corner.
We had a good time on a big terrace, like a Hawaiian!
I'd love to go again!!

室内は可もなく不可もなく､清掃は行き届いており不満はありません｡ｱﾒﾆﾃｨやﾄﾞﾗｲﾔｰなどもあり､生活には困りません｡ただ4ﾍﾞｯﾄに4名で宿泊したが､ﾘﾋﾞﾝｸﾞには椅子が2脚しかなく､4名でゆっくりするｽﾍﾟｰｽはない｡あくまで寝るｽﾍﾟｰｽという印象｡
外に広々としたﾃﾗｽのような共用ｽﾍﾟｰｽがあるのはよかった｡特にﾀﾊﾞｺを吸う人には｡

清潔な部屋でした｡
食器やｺｯﾌﾟも揃っていました｡
ﾊﾞｽﾀｵﾙがいっぱいあったので海に行く時などにも持っていけました｡
ﾎﾞﾃﾞｨｿｰﾌﾟとﾘﾝｽｲﾝｼﾞｬﾝﾌﾟｰもありました｡
場所も買い物に行くのにもｻﾞ･ﾊﾞｽに乗るにも便利な場所です｡
ABCｽﾄｱも近くにありました｡
一点､冷蔵庫に今まで部屋を利用した人たちの残り物らしきものがいろいろあったのが少し気になりました｡｡
Very kind and reactive host. The condo is very clean (but a bit small for a family, no room to be together). Is is very well situated in Waikiki, not far from everything you want!

Definitely would stay again on a future Waikiki visit! Spot is as advertised in the photos. Nothing glamorous but very clean, phenomenal location (walking distance to everything), and Kazue (and John) were extremely communicative. 

Wifi is not extremely strong FYI, had trouble doing high bandwidth work (though worked fine for email, etc).
Highly recommend house! Clean, big enough, near main street and beach, silent and more:)

Overall a good deal for the price. Very conveniently located, only 3 blocks from Waikiki beach. Our host met us at check-in and was very friendly and responsive when we reached out. There are two bedrooms and no living room which made it a little difficult to hang out together. Good if you just need a convenient place to sleep and prepare simple meals. Only electric hot plates were provided, there were no burners on the stove. The kitchen was well stocked enough for light cooking. Bathroom was clean and plenty of towels and toiletries were provided. The wifi was slow but worked for light browsing.
ｽﾃｷな思い出ができました!ありがとうございます!

Kazue's place was great! Very modest, but that was just fine - we didn't visit Waikiki to stay inside all day! It is two air-conditioned bedrooms with two single beds in each, and one bathroom at the end of the hallway/kitchenette combination connecting everything. We tried pushing two beds together to make a double, but they were slightly different heights so it didn't work. There is a nice fridge/freezer, and a stovetop if you wanted to do simple cooking in the kitchenette/hallway, although with so many amazing food options within walking distance, we didn't bother. 

The location is great - walking distance to everything in Waikiki. And the convenience of also being able to rent a parking space helped out tremendously. We rented an affordable car from Turo (use link (Website hidden by Airbnb) for $25 free credit) to explore the island, as Lyft/Uber were surprisingly expensive. I would highly recommend taking advantage of the great parking space and getting a car - Waikiki is one of the many amazing places on Oahu, so give yourself the chance to explore.

I would highly recommend this place if your primary goal is a comfortable place to sleep. If you're looking for a luxury resort room, go to the Sheraton. If you're looking for a modest place to sleep each night, this cozy two bedroom with four single beds in the heart of Waikiki is absolutely the perfect place. Thanks for the great experience, Kazue!

Kazue is a nice and kind host. She made every effort in ensuring a smooth checkin and stay experience. Her apartment is close to the downtown and beach area. We enjoyed our stay very much. Thanks Kazue! :)

とにかくｱｸｾｽもよく､日本語でも対応してくださるので､安心してｽﾃｲすることが出来ました｡

ｷｯﾁﾝもある程度整っているので､外食続きが苦手なわたしにはﾋﾟｯﾀﾘでした｡

何よりﾁｪｯｸｲﾝの際に立ち会ってくれた方がとても親切で､楽しい方でしたので､良い旅のｽﾀｰﾄを切ることが出来ました!

感謝です｡

Great location at walking distance of everything in Waikiki and public transports,, good price and 2 separate bedrooms exactly what we needed! The host is nice and can be flexible on check-in and check-out when it's possible. Had a great time!
Accomodations were excellent! listing was exactly as listed...would stay again in the future

Great place. John was easily reachable and answered all my questions in a timely manner. Little touches like the bottle of aloe gel in the fridge were a nice touch. The place was as described. Would book and stay again. There is no elevator so be prepared to carry your stuff up 3 flights of stairs.
clean and neat.
Great place close to everything, and good price!!

Kazue and John's place was nice, clean, and well located. John gave us help getting our substantial amount of luggage upstairs and gave great advice on local attractions. The apartment has a nice terrace area to kick back with a drink after a day of work or relaxation. Additionally it is located extremely close to Waikiki beach park, Diamondhead, and the Hawaii convention center. The central common space doesn't have AC but the rooms have fantastic window units. Check in and check out were a breeze compared to many other Air BnBs I have stayed at since John and Kazue have it down to a science. This place is truly better than advertised.
Great Location! An easy walk to the beach, restaurants, and bars.
Great location for the price!
La experiencia ha sido buena, John encantador, la ubicación perfecta, deberían renovar algunas cosas.

Kazue and John are amazing hosts! Kazue is very responsive to our queries and really nice, they allowed us to check-in early which we greatly appreciate. John is also exceptional, check-in was so smooth (he helped us with our luggage) and he gave us great advice on Honolulu!

Great location (a lot of things are accessible and the place is easy to find) and the area is safe. Great value for your money! I can't wait to be back in Honolulu and stay again in their place.

Kazueさんのﾚｽﾎﾟﾝｽも早くよかったです!
ﾜｲｷｷﾋﾞｰﾁからの立地も良くさい最高でした!
Location is near by the beach and all the action is. But the place need a lot of upgrade, I guess you get what you paid for, so make sure you are getting a good price.

My family of 4 had a very nice time at this apartment over Christmas/New Years. It's a top-floor corner apt, so it was generally nice and quiet. The AC is a bit loud, but it's fine if you turn it on Low. It's a great place to come home to after a day out exploring the island, but it's a bit small to spend an afternoon there relaxing. There is no living room, and the kitchen/eating space is small. But none of that really mattered to us. We were able to cook a nice egg breakfast every morning, and head out into the the busy Waikiki neighborhood (really crowded!), explore the island, eat dinner out (make reservations! Or try your luck at the Duke's restaurants, some of which don't take reservations), and come back to a quiet apartment. Plenty of hot water, and great water pressure. We loved that there were four separate beds, all comfortable. Our host Joyce was very responsive and attentive.
Incredible value five minute walk to the beach, 4 beds, kitchen and safe.
Kazue’s place was located in an easily accessible place to Waikiki’s main attractions. Communication was prompt and clear and John helped kindly with our check-in process.

Kazue and John are very friendly and responsive. John helped us carry the baggages on to the apartment and provided us a lot of local tips. Flexible check in time, very smooth and easy check-in process.

The place is generally good. Convenient location and reasonable price. The neighborhood is a little noisy. The WiFi and cooktop are slow, made it a bit hard for us to do work on computer or cook meals.

Kazue's place was close to Waikiki beach area and the center. If you want a affordable place to stay and eat out some this place was perfect. Also there are two bedrooms so if you want some privacy its nice too.  Enough kitchenware as well to cook easy meals!
Cons were,  you can hear the next door neighbor if the windows are open, wifi was poor and slow. Three people using internet for work or personal reasons was stressful.

Such a good location for a stay in Waikiki! Pretty basic but has everything you need and the beds were relatively comfortable too :) the bedrooms don’t currently have curtains which was our main issue, but other than that it was a great stay!

ﾜｲｷｷからも近く､動物園や水族館にも徒歩で行けます｡
ﾎﾃﾙのように部屋でのんびりするのではなく､日中はほとんど外に出て､部屋に寝に帰るだけと言う人には十分だと思います｡ﾎﾃﾙよりはずいぶん安く宿泊できると思います｡

name: Perfect Williamsburg Summer Haven
summary: Beautiful, charming, light filled 1.5 bedroom apartment in the heart of happening Williamsburg, one block from the train and steps away from great restaurants, bars, parks and shops. Enjoy a the coolest part of NYC from a haven full of character!
space: Enjoy summer in NYC while staying in our lovely, light drenched Williamsburg, Brooklyn walk-up. Simply and artfully decorated with two bedrooms (one is used as a nursery), the charming apartment  also has a full size living room, eat-in kitchen, and lovely bath and is available for a couple or a single person. No roommates, please. Bedroom has luxury Queen size Keetsa eco-bed and the apartment includes Wi-Fi, 2 AC's, coffee maker, gas stove and lots of plants and art to keep you company. We are in a busy and extremely safe area - just one short block from the 'L' train (whisks you into Manhattan in under 10 minutes), and in the middle of happening Williamsburg with loads of bars, excellent restaurants (mexican, indian, fine dining, turkish, french, juice bar, thai, chinese, korean, vietnamese, italian, all within 5 min walk), coffee shops, boutiques, wine shops, yoga studios, laundry, 24 hour organic groceries, nearby McCarren Park (with giant pool/ice skating rink) and charming Cooper
description: Beautiful, charming, light filled 1.5 bedroom apartment in the heart of happening Williamsburg, one block from the train and steps away from great restaurants, bars, parks and shops. Enjoy a the coolest part of NYC from a haven full of character! Enjoy summer in NYC while staying in our lovely, light drenched Williamsburg, Brooklyn walk-up. Simply and artfully decorated with two bedrooms (one is used as a nursery), the charming apartment  also has a full size living room, eat-in kitchen, and lovely bath and is available for a couple or a single person. No roommates, please. Bedroom has luxury Queen size Keetsa eco-bed and the apartment includes Wi-Fi, 2 AC's, coffee maker, gas stove and lots of plants and art to keep you company. We are in a busy and extremely safe area - just one short block from the 'L' train (whisks you into Manhattan in under 10 minutes), and in the middle of happening Williamsburg with loads of bars, excellent restaurants (mexican, indian, fine dining, turkish, fr
neighborhood_overview: This is THE place to live/stay/explore in NYC right now. Anything and everything you could want is happening in Williamsburg these days. From fine dining, to night hotspots, to charming cafes, parks, galleries, boutique shopping, great food and the best people watching in NYC....we've got it all.
notes: Since our second bedroom is now a nursery, we think the apartment is best suited for a couple sharing the bedroom or a single occupant.
transit: The very reliable "L" train (which intersects Manhattan) is just one block away. It's such a busy area that we feel comfortable taking it even late at night.
access: The whole apartment is yours to use; please be mindful that the nursery is for hanging out/storing your things, but no sleeping or extra guests, please.
interaction: Happy to call, text & email to arrange the stay. It is important that our guest feels comfortable and that we trust the person staying in our home. If we are not in the city when you arrive, we'll arrange a trusted friend to let you in and show you the apartment.
house_rules: Please respect our apartment as our home and leave it as clean and tidy as you found it. We have a number of art objects and books close to our heart that you are welcome to peruse, but please treat with respect. NO smoking inside!! Please, no pets as well. We simply ask that you leave the place as neat as you found it. Bonus points if you want to water our plants:) Thank You.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: She is an actress and writer. He is a visual artist and Pratt professor. They have a baby and have lived in their adorable haven for over seven years. Favorites include late night thai, movies at the Nitehawk, road trips, McCarren Park picnics and gallery days.

reviews.comments: Our stay at Holly's apartment was perfect. The apartment was clean and very well prepared for our arrival. We certainly felt like welcome guests. She was pleasant to communicate with and also very helpful. The location of the apartment was great, and we would certainly recommend her and the apartment to anyone visiting NYC. Thanks!

Holly and Grayson were just great. It was our first time doing this and I can only say good, great things about both of them and the apartment. It was like going to the best hotel in NY with all the good things of having an apartment for yourself. They were very considerate and the flat was really clean and with all the little details you could ask for. They are really nice people and Holly and I have been talking by e-mail before a lot so everything was easy and nice once we get there; She is so sweet, she gave us the best guide for the neighborhood to make us feel at home. If we go back to NYC we'll definetely count on them. I don't want to lose contact because they are people worth meeting and knowing.

Hollis and Grayson were the perfect hosts!  They made up the air mattress for us, left us clean sheets and towels, sent us a great guide to the area, and even left us some delicious coffee.  Their apartment is adorable and in a great area of Brooklyn, but also right on the subway line making it easy to get to Manhattan.  Hollis was great with communication, and made our first airbnb experience stress-free and awesome. Definitely recommended!
The host canceled my reservation 22 days before arrival.

We had already been to New York before (in different hotels and hostels), but this was definitely our best accomodation! 
The apartment is located in a nice, quiet neighbourhood, very close to Manhattan, but interesting in itself (with cafés, shops, etc., at a stone's throw). It's not as small as we thought it would be, and it fitted us four with no problem whatsoever. It's full of books, so you could spend numerous rainy days there without getting bored - but the sun shone almost the whole time we were there. 
Although we had some trouble finding (and giving back) the keys, it was all settled with a phone call (Holly was easily reachable, even early morning on Jan. 1!), and all was well that ended well. We would definitely recommand the place, our only regret being not to have met their owners!

We felt at home from the moment we stepped inside the apartment. There even was a bottle of wine and two glasses waiting for us on the table! The communication with Holly was very easy and she made the whole process of setting the details quite smooth. The fact that she and her boyfriend made themselves available to reach by phone at any time was reassuring, especially for newcomers on airbnb. 
The apartment was really nice, conveniently located near a subway station going to Manhattan or some main streets in Williamsburg, so visiting the neighbourhood was easy. The guest guide Holly provided us was helpful, especially for the restaurants list. The café Lula Bean, next to the apartment, was a good stop for early (and not so early) starts, and we became "regulars" for the few days we were there.
I would strongly recommend Holly's place!

Our stay at Chez Grollis was fantastic! From my first contact with Hollis to checkout on the last day, she was quick to respond  by both email & text and was super helpful. She prearranged a friend to meet us for the key exchange at checkin as they were already out of town, and even sent us an awesome neighbourhood guide days before our arrival. 

 A 2 minute walk to the 'L' train, and minutes away from some great restaurants and bars, this apartment was perfect for our group of three.  Grocery options were also close by, and McCarren Park is nearby for anyone looking to get some exercise in.  The neighbourhood is safe and we did not feel uncomfortable taking the train or walking the area at night. 

Met Hollis & Grayson on the last day to exchange keys  as previously arranged and was happy to meet & thank these polite and helpful hosts  in person for a fantastic stay.
This place was in a great location for us. Hollis and Grayson are such lovely people and have a beautiful home. We would definitely recommend this place to others. Great for one person or a couple.
The reservation was canceled 19 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I had a fantastic stay at Holly's apartment!  The place was cozy and eclectic.  She was a great host...very flexible check in and check out times and very responsive to all my questions. 

I would definitely recommend!

i had a great stay at hollis and grayson's place. it is conveniently located for me, as most of my brooklyn comrades live walking distance from the apartment. the L train is right on the corner, and the nearby stores/restaurants/bars are great. the apartment has a good kitchen, and the shower has really good water pressure. there is a dry cleaner immediately next door to the building, and a laundromat across the street, which was quite handy. could not have asked for better accommodation. thank you.
The host canceled this reservation 26 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Holly has a wonderful apartment, and I spent a wonderful week there. You really can't beat the location, and the place is very warm and cozy -- perfect for the Holidays. Holly had everything set up for me and very clear (and helpful) instructions and suggestions. Plus, she won my heart right away leaving a crystalized ginger, dark chocolate bar as a welcome gift :) I'll definitely be coming back if the apartment is available. Thanks, Holly!
The host canceled this reservation 93 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Hollis was very hospitable, offering recommendations galore for the Williamsburg area. When the keys did not come via mail in time for my flight, she made other arrangements that worked out perfectly! Her home is located right by the L train and so it is very easy to get anywhere in the city! We also really enjoyed Her creativity, as the entire apartment is decorated with beautiful work of art and plants. 
The rooms are set up much differently than the pictures, but we didn't seem to mind, as we were always exploring and touring new areas. 

Definitely recommend her space to anyone traveling to this area!

name: A GEM IN THE HEART  OF BYZANTINE  ISTANBUL
summary: The apartment is 94 squared meters on the third floor of an apartment building. It is  300 meters away from İstiklal Cd, the well known pedestrian walkaway of the City, and 500 meters from the Metro station of Sishane on Istiklal. This is a lovely place with an excellent view of the Golden Horn waterway and the entire Ottoman and Byzantine Istanbul. The apartment is a lovely retreat for business travelers, and families (with kids), and couples on their Honeymoon.
space: Its ideal location, its proximity to all public transportation, museums, and all the sites that one should not miss visiting while in Istanbul. Across the street there is a mini market open 24/7 where one can find from fresh fruit and vegetables to milk and other necessities. In the market one can request assistance with his luggage previously mentioned.
description: The apartment is 94 squared meters on the third floor of an apartment building. It is  300 meters away from İstiklal Cd, the well known pedestrian walkaway of the City, and 500 meters from the Metro station of Sishane on Istiklal. This is a lovely place with an excellent view of the Golden Horn waterway and the entire Ottoman and Byzantine Istanbul. The apartment is a lovely retreat for business travelers, and families (with kids), and couples on their Honeymoon. Its ideal location, its proximity to all public transportation, museums, and all the sites that one should not miss visiting while in Istanbul. Across the street there is a mini market open 24/7 where one can find from fresh fruit and vegetables to milk and other necessities. In the market one can request assistance with his luggage previously mentioned. The entire apartment except a small storage area across from the bathroom. Chronis is only a phone call away and if it so happens that the needs of his work take him away from
notes: For a cost of 5 TL a guest can have his luggage carried upstairs to the third floor.
access: The entire apartment except a small storage area across from the bathroom.
interaction: Chronis is only a phone call away and if it so happens that the needs of his work take him away from the city, he can notify his assistant to come and take care of any problem that might arise.

host.host_about:
I am cinematographer 
I love traveling
I am fanatic about mountain biking
I am in love with Istanbul's old part of the city

reviews.comments: L'appartement est idéalement situé avec une vue à couper le souffle. Il a été décoré avec beaucoup de goût et on s'y sent comme chez soi. Madame Margarita qui a fait le lien avec Chronis est vraiment très sympathique et nous a aidé. Le seul bémol : les coupures d'électricité et d'eau plusieurs fois par jour dans plusieurs quartiers de la ville et qui ont aussi touché l'appartement.

Nicely decorated apartment in perfect location with a stunning view over Istanbul! The host was great, there was no problem with an earlier check in and communication was perfect. Next time I am in Istanbul I'll definitely try to stay in Chronis's apartment!! Thank you

Chronis's apartment is absolutely delightful with magnificent views over the Golden Horn.  It is in easy reach of public transport although we walked to all the major sites and enjoyed the atmosphere of Istanbul.  There are loads of great restaurants close by and we found the local ahopkeepers really friendly.  I would thoroughly recommend staying here.
A lovely place with all the required amenities and a view to die for. Perfect for enjoying a drink after walking the streets of the bazaar. A real pleasure.
Great location, beautiful apartment and views better than anywhere else

The apartment is well located for easy access to tourist sites, shopping and transport. It is spacious, well-appointed and immaculately clean. It has a stunning view (over terra-cotta rooftops, the waterways and skyline of fantastic mosques) with beautiful furniture and a marble bathroom. All communication with the host was timely with clear information and support. I would definite stay here on any future visits.

Where to start? The location? 
The cozy neighborhood? 
The carefully and tastefully decorated apartment with all you need to feel at home?
The view? Morning, afternoon, evening, late at night ... I couldn't get enough of it!!!! If you want to get a glimpse of the beauty of Istanbul then welcome to the most amazing settings. 
Fully equipped Kitchen ... believe me it's worth it when you have fresh ingredients at the corner store (open 24/7 and they speak Farsi and English) 
Restaurants, bars, shops, coffee, tea, buses, metro… everything is literally seconds or minutes away walking from the apartment.
Chronis has been fantastic at coordinating everything, from checking to checkout to perfection, to coordinating with Margarita in Istanbul (by the way she is a Gem)... This is what I call Hosting! 
I would not wish to stay anywhere else in Istanbul for the rest of my life!

Beautiful appartment but...
1) Frequent water shortage. Something which Chronis did not mention beforehand. When we brought to his attention, he says that "this is a usual Istanbul problem. It's not my house problem". A great way to wash his hands off the situation in my opinion. 
2) Cancellation and refunds will not be entertained. Initially, we wanted to change the dates but his appartment was not available on those dates. We had asked if we could get a refund since it's not available but he did not respond. So we went with the initial dates. Second time we asked for a refund was after the water shortage incident. We didn't stay throughout, and had 6 nights remaining. Once again we asked for a refund but he did not respond. 

If you're ok to infrequent water supply and a host that does not respond to refund then the appartment will suit you just fine.

Very spacious and quiet. Excellent view from the large window in living room. Good kitchen amenities. Very clean except for a bit dusty floors for barefoot walking. Wifi worked very well. About 200m walking to a bus stop where many buses pass by. Another 100m lead to a popular commercial street where there are a lot of shops and restaurants. Downstairs is a store for basic groceries but sophisticated groceries were nowhere around. Host's unwillingness to supply toilet paper in addition to a small leftover caused some inconvenience as it was not easy to buy a single roll. We have not met Chronis but communicated often with the caretaking lady who was nice and responsive. Overall the 4 of us had a very good stay of 8 days. I especially enjoyed reading the book about the history of Byzantium on the shelf -- many thanks for providing.
Sehr schöne Wohnung mit einer Traumhaften Aussicht. Kommunikation mit dem Gastgeber war unkompliziert. Lage ist sehr zentral. Gerne nochmal!
It was great. Beautiful view. Cozy apartment. You can feel youself like its your home.
Our second time in this beautiful apartment with a stunning view and great interior. Would definitely recommend! As myself...next time in Istanbul I am staying here !
Extremely nice place to stay with magnificent view on Golden Horn. Good location. Stylish enjoyable interior with attractive dimmable lighting.

what makes a place great in the first place, is the owners mood and hospitality.
Chronis and Margarita were always there for any question or suggestion even when offering a late check out.
the apartment is for sure better than the photos, nothing will deceive u. clean and modern and the space with this panoramic view overlooking the Bosphorus, bridges and old istanbul make it hard for u to leave home.
it is a super place to relax and had a cool vacation and to do some work as well as the internet connection is super. 
the neighborhood is safe and just few steps from the main road where any uber can be late more than 3 min... its 4 min walking from Galata Serai School in Istiklal 
for sure i will be visiting again

We stayed in Chronis's appartment for 17 days. Appartment is stylish, has high ceilings, very light and big. Kitchen is  super equipped! Of course the main is - the amazing view from a big window in living room!!!))) Margarita and Chronis were always on-line to help about all the questions. Thank you very much!!!
Perfect solution for your stay in Istanbul. Amazing view of the city, nice design, everything provided in the kitchen and very spacious. Definitely recommended
Beautiful flat. Decorated with a lot of elegance. The view is spectacular. Accessible location, with the charming 24/7 store right opposite it.

Do you want to have one of the best views in Istanbul while enjoying a glass of "cay" (turkish tea)? Is good communication to your host and a warm welcome important to you? Ever wanted to stay in an amazingly designed, old Istanbul-apartment? Then you found your location to stay! My friend and I, both of turkish decent, stayed in this apartment for a week during March (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Two days before our flight to Istanbuk, Chronis contacted us and gave us thorough information on address and what we should be careful about, like not being too loud with music for the sake of the neighbors. Furthermore he told us, that his assistant Ms. Margarita will welcome us at our arrival, since he was not in Istanbul during that time. He gave us Ms. Margaritas and his phonenumer to contact them upon arrival via phone or (Hidden by Airbnb) Messenger. After our arrival we contacted Ms. Margarita on (Hidden by Airbnb) and told her our approximate time of arrival in front of the apartment. She responded quickly. Upon arrival at the apartment we rang the bell of the flat, which Chronis told us in before and were quickly welcomed by Ms. Margarita. She gave us a very friendly and warm welcome and informed us on everything important about the flat. She had only prepared one bed in the big bedroom, since she assumed we'd be a couple. After having told her, that we need two seperate beds, the quickly prepared the second bed in the small bedroom, without any hesitation. Furthermore she informed us about possible issues like water failures, which is normal in Istanbul during this season, because of heavy rains and a bad water infrastructure. She even prepared water canisters in case, so that we could still finish the shower or use the toilet. Because it was already very late when we arrived, we agreed on asking further questions via phone or (Hidden by Airbnb) . The following days, she wrote us on (Hidden by Airbnb) to check if everything's ok. During our stay we made mostly good experiences with the flat. The most mentionable ones are the following: 1) The bed in the big bedroom is very comfy. 2) There are lots of fresh towels and duvet covers in case that you like to change very frequently. 3) The kitchen is equipped with everything needed for a decent meal. The stove is new and there is a dishwasher, if you like to use one. 4) The view from the living room is AMAZING! I doubt, you can find many other apartments with such a nice view in central Istanbul. 5) The water actually never failed ;) There were also some SMALLER points, which could improve. The most important ones: 1) The bed in the smaller bedroom is directy next to the radiator, which can make sleeping there during the cold season very hot. If you shut off the heating, the floor and flat itself can get quite cold, since it's an old building with wood battens. 2)...

Very nice apartment. 
Nice location and enjoyable walk to the action, spacious, decorated very nicely.  Didn't personally meet owner but very nice and helpful via email. 
Epic view with massive glass windows.  Very comfy bed.  Nice desk if you have any work to do.  Bathroom is very small but practical enough.
Thanks for a great place to stay in wonderful Istanbul!

Amazing flat in an amazing location. Very well planned and super clean. A gem in istanbul. 

My only addition would be securing a person who would help with luggage at a fee as the stairs are steep. 

I will definitely stop by everytime am in istanbul

Thanks
Ahmad

Die Wohnung ist ideal gelegen Anschluss zu vielen Buslinien und nicht weit von der Istiklal Caddesi. Die Aussicht ist wunderschön, die Wohnung komfortable eingerichtet, man fühlt sich sehr wohl darin. Der Supermarkt vi-à-vis hat immer offen, was sehr praktisch ist. Margarita ist sehr nett, hilft, und gibt einem Tipps, falls danach verlangt wird.

Outstanding place, spotlessly clean, stylish, spacious, great finishings,  light, views,... walking distance to most great neighbourhoods and attractions in Istanbul. We couldnt recommend this place and helpful host more !

We had a wonderful time staying at Chronis's place. What a beautiful spot (and view!) We were really impressed by the cleanliness and overall aesthetic of the apartment, and were grateful for the communication and welcome when we arrived. Will recommend this place to our friends!

Great place to stay, I fully recommend it! What you see is what you get ;) Super clean, awesome view, super nice hosts. They assisted us in everything we needed and the communication was always great.

Chronis is a great host. I arrived very late in the evening and he facilitated check-in with no problems. Margarita, the caretaker of the flat, was extremely helpful and available via (Hidden by Airbnb) for any questions or advice. I would happily stay in Chronis' lovely flat again (the flat is located in a quiet neighbourhood but only a 10 minute walk from Istiklal street, Galatasaray and other central neighbourhoods).

This apartment was absolutely incredible, wonderfully spacious, great style and the view was unbelievably beautiful. The location was great too and we walked most places. The only slight problem was there is not even a fan to keep cool so it's not ideal for light sleepers as windows have to be open and those prone to mosquito bites better watch out! Having said that, it was still one of the best Airbnbs we have stayed in.
The place has a unique view on Istanbul. The view from the living room is just the master piece of this place. Flat is on the third floor.

Appartement bien situé, fonctionnel, spacieux et confortable. Splendide vue sur Istanbul. Commerces à proximité.
Pour les moyens et longs séjours, pas de lave-linge dans la location.
great location, 10-15 minutes walking from Taksim place and an amaizing view.
Beautiful apartment & view
We enjoyed our stay at the apartment.
Superbe appartement, très bien décoré avec une magnifique vue sur Istanbul. Le quartier de Beyoglu est assez sympa de jour comme de nuit.

Emplacement idéal pour visiter toute la ville car très proche de tout 
La décoration est très sympathique , la vue est très belle, nous avons adoré cet endroit , Margarita est très gentille et tellement adorable 
Nous avons passé un magnifique séjour dans cette ville 
Je recommande et je reviendrai sans hésitation dans cet appartement

Chronis' flat is very beautiful, decorated tastefully and located superbly in Beyoglu. Everything was clean and tidy. The communication was very friendly. The view from the living room/kitchen is absolutely stunning! Highly recommend to stay at Chronis' apartment.

The view of this flat is breathtaking. The pictures can't really show the beauty of it, you have to be there to grasp it. 

It is very well located and loads of Istanbul attractions are easily eccessible by foot or by public transportation. Across from the flat there is a groceries store, a dry cleaner and a Kebap shop, which come very handy for us. 

Margarita (the lady in charge at the location) is very kind. She speaks English and was very eager to help.

The interior design is very cousy and individualistic, however not too personal so we felt immediately at home. There are so many beautiful objects and pictures there, which expand the spirit of the incredible city of Istanbul to the home environment. 

I definitely recommend it and would go back there whenever I am in Istanbul.
This was our third time at Chronis’s place! Love it every time ! Next time we definitely will try to stay at his home. Thank you !
Great apartment with stunning views. Excellent place to chill out in between sight seeing.  We would go back again.

L'appartamento è semplicemente fantastico. La posizione è ottima, collegata bene con i mezzi pubblici e vicina alla Istiklal Caddesi e Taksim. L'assenza dell'ascensore è ripagata da una vista mozzafiato sul quartiere, sul Corno d'Oro e sulle sagome delle moschee all'orizzonte. Gli spazi sono grandi, comodi e luminosi, mentra l'arredamento è minimale ma elegante. Margarita è stata molto gentile nell'accoglierci e disponibile per ogni consiglio o informazione. Davvero consigliato.

Chronis’s Apartment is most amazing one in the AirBnB because  fantastic view of Golden Horn, perfect location that very close to İstiklal Street, comfortable design for guests and professional house keeping services by Margarita. Street was very silent to take a rest and good sleeping at night although close to attractive places.  We felt like a month although stayed 9 nights only. We loved the apartment and take our time to have coffee in front of window to look perfect panaroma and listen cool music. If you like to enjoy your time, this apartment is definitely for you... Thanks for your kind hosting and professional services.  Hope to see you again.
