name: The Porto Concierge - Bouganvillea Oporto Flat
summary: Lovely apartment in a retro style, fully equipped, in the heart of Porto downtown, right next to one of the most iconic spots: Mercado do Bolhão. Very bright and comfortable with balcony. The Porto Concierge service available 24/7 for your convenience. Free luggage storage at our Welcome Center.
space: 1 bedroom apartment, with a big sofa-bed in the living room. The kitchen comunicates with the living room through an open window with a counter. Very bright and with a beautiful balcony where you can enjoy your breakfast in the morning, or a glass of wine at the end of the day!
description: Lovely apartment in a retro style, fully equipped, in the heart of Porto downtown, right next to one of the most iconic spots: Mercado do Bolhão. Very bright and comfortable with balcony. The Porto Concierge service available 24/7 for your convenience. Free luggage storage at our Welcome Center. 1 bedroom apartment, with a big sofa-bed in the living room. The kitchen comunicates with the living room through an open window with a counter. Very bright and with a beautiful balcony where you can enjoy your breakfast in the morning, or a glass of wine at the end of the day! Guests will have access to all the amenities in the apartment. When you arrive you will be met by The Porto Concierge service that will receive you for check-in and share with you tips about where to find special places to eat, visit and have fun. The Apartment is located in the Downtown of the city, near the important monuments and interesting points that you can visit by walking. The center of all the everyday bustle i
neighborhood_overview: The Apartment is located in the Downtown of the city, near the important monuments and interesting points that you can visit by walking. The center of all the everyday bustle is Santa Catarina street, where you can find the older and typical coffees shops and pastries from Porto, such as the café Majestic, also the old bookstores that healthily coexist with large and modern libraries. Theatres and show halls like the Rivoli Theatre, Coliseu do Porto or São João National Theatre are also in downtown. Downtown - Baixa - is also known for the significant number of nightlife establishments, bars and cafés, in various restaurants from the most traditional to the more sophisticated. There is also a great number of alternative and specialized small shops, especially for art, gourmet, design, sewing, bookstores and antique shops.
notes: Extra Services upon request: •Transfer service to and from airport - 1 or 2 persons: 8€/trip each - 3+ persons: 6€/trip each • City tours with tour guide • Travel Around Northern Portugal (Private sedan will pick you up at the apartment) - Braga - Half Day - 40€ - Guimarães - Half Day - 40€ - Douro Valley - Full Day - 80€ - Braga&Guimarães - Full Day - 65€ - Aveiro - Half Day - 50€ - Santiago de Compostela (Spain) - Full Day - 95€ - Aveiro&Coimbra - Full Day - 80€ - Fátima&Coimbra - Full Day - 99€ • Home groceries delivery • Babysitting • Taxi • Other services as requested Please let us know at the time of the booking if you will be requesting any of the above mentioned services or other special services. Prices may vary according to the services requested and/or guests involved. Services are provided by business partners therefore are subject to availability.
transit: Direct connection to airport by metro. Take the metro at the airport and leave in station "Bolhão". Direct connection to train station "Campanhã". Just take the metro in metro station "Campanhã" and leave in station "Bolhão". All lines stop here.
access: Guests will have access to all the amenities in the apartment.
interaction: When you arrive you will be met by The Porto Concierge service that will receive you for check-in and share with you tips about where to find special places to eat, visit and have fun.
house_rules: Smoking is not allowed inside the apartment, only in the balcony when available or at the window-sill. Please leave all electric appliances turned off, make sure water taps are not running and close all doors and windows before check-out. We request that guests leave the dishes and the kitchen clean and empty out the trash, there is always a garbage deposit in the street nearby. The apartment is cleaned prior to each arrival. Please, keep the apartment tidy and clean as reasonably possible during all the time of your occupancy. If you require extra cleaning during your stay, please contact us - we will arrange it. PLEASE TAKE CARE of the decoration items, furniture, towels/linen and other apartment's equipment. Any doubts handling the apartment's appliances and equipment please call. The neighbors appreciate some peace and quiet as do our guest, please keep the noise level to a minimum between 22h and 8h. Use the place as if it where your own. Check out time is at 11h and Check in is a

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Stayed in Edgar's place for 5 days. Great location, super clean, perfect location for walking everywhere and exploring the city. The apartment itself is really amazing, the photos definitely don't do it justice!

We really enjoyed the flat. It is very well equipped, well located and completely conform to pictures.
Perfect for the long weekend we spent in Porto.
Only negative aspect was a really poor soundproofing, but as we stayed mostly outside, it was not such a problem for us.
Very much appreciated all attentions among others, a bottle of wine, bath towels... 
Another positive thing is the supermarket next door :)

Perfect location and amazing hospitality! Edgar set up a ride for us from the airport to the apartment, and also had a concierge member waiting at the front door to explain the apartment and surrounding area. Also, Edgar had a very quick response time. He answered all questions within minutes. The apartment itself is very modern and has great personality. The back "garden" is secluded and is a nice area to have a morning coffee. There is minimal street/neighborhood noise. All-in-all, the entire experience surpassed my expectations, and I would highly recommend this as a great Porto location!

Un appartement refait à neuf, dans un immeuble du XIX, très bien situé, calme et bien décoré.
Accueil très agréable, il a fait bon vivre dans ce petit cocon!

It was an immaculate apartment, very clean and smelt amazing. It had everything you could possibly need for a comfortable stay. The location is convienient and close to shops and market, and within walking distance to major attractions. Communication with the host was easy. We thouroughly enjoyed our stay in Porto!

This apartment is probably the best AirBnB we have stayed in so far.
It is in a fantastic location and was very easy to find.
The apartment has recently been renovated and has all the essentials you need.
We cooked in the apartment for 2 evenings and the kitchen had everything we required.
The outdoor balcony is a beautiful quiet spot where you can sit back and enjoy a glass of wine after a day of sightseeing.
I would highly recommend this apartment to anyone. We loved (Website hidden by Airbnb) we hope to be back again.

We had a perfect 3 days in Porto. The apartment is perfectly placed, the communication and welcome anticipated our flight delay. The apartment is just beautiful, the photos do not do it justice! Spacious, lovely afternoon light, calm even though it is in the centre. We are definitely keeping this on our list for future visits to Porto. Highly recommend!

The flat looks brand new and modern, better than in pictures. Everything was very clean and we had a pleasant stay. 
The flat is fully equipped with modern appliances, including a dish-washing machine. Also, the coffee machine was very useful in the morning. The led lightning provided a cozy atmosphere.

Although it's on a main street, 5-10 minutes of walking from the main train station, it's not facing the street and it's very quiet.
There are some sources of noise for sensible ears: 
- the early morning resupply of the down stairs supermarket (rather annoying)
- the building is not soundproofed and one can hear some noise from other flats (in our experience it was very limited)

Extremely beautiful and nicely decorated apartment at the perfect spot in Porto! I wish we had more time to spend there. It is very well located on a street that gets quiet at night and very close to the busy nightlife. Definitely recommend and will book there the next time.
Really nice apartment in the city center, with all the comforts and a nice welcome by the host.

I honestly would not recommend booking this apartment to any friend of mine. The flat is beautiful and location very good, but the treatment received does not correspond at all with the quality of accommodation. We were waiting for 40 minutes on our arrival without answering our calls. When we finally went in the apartment was still uncleaned and was not ready until 7pm. When we finally arrived to the flat and it was prepared, the cleanliness left much to be desired. We understand that failures can be anywhere, but Vania, the girl in charge of managing the property did not inform us of anything and when she finally picked up the phone his response was curt and inconsiderate. This unpleasant reception made our arrival in Oporto quite bitter. This level of zero communication is maintained throughout our stay, when we asked if we could leave more than one hour our bags the day of departure (because the apartment had been ready 5 hours later the official checkin it was the minimum) Vania an hour later, curtly he replied that it was not possible ... Anyway, hosts nothing  professional at all times. Very bad

We loved this apartment. It is right next to the old market square in a most central location to get around the entire city. There are plenty of shops, eateries, taxi stands nearby. We were greeted on time right as the apartment finished getting cleaned. We really enjoyed our stay here and will be back the next time we swing through Porto!
Tres bel appartement, idéalement situé
Très joli appartement, conforme aux photos et bien équipe . Nous le recommandons.
Sehr zentrale Lage gleich neben dem Mercado do Bolhão. Wir haben uns in dem Apartment sehr wohl gefühlt.

Mooi ingericht appartement, op een centrale lokatie. Alles binnen loopafstand, en metro om de hoek. 
Het appartement is zeer compleet, alle mogelijke keukenspullen en apparaten aanwezig.  Prima bedden, alles schoon en netjes. Aanrader!

Top! It was a pleasure to stay in this apartment ! Everything was good!
Be careful with your hour of arrival, it s a concierge service (not in the same place)

I have to say, we've stayed in many Airbnbs, and this has to be one of our favorites so far. We loved the layout, design, location, and price. The apartment is very close to the train station, so it was very easy to get to. Once we arrived, we were greeted very promptly and courteously. The apartment is AMAZING! The pictures are exactly what you get. We would DEFINITELY recommend this place to other people.
C'est un bon appartement situé au centre de la ville. Je l'aime beaucoup.
We had great stay in Porto. The apartment was wonderful in a great location. Definitely next time again.
Modern apartment. We had a great time..

Super séjour dans ce bel appartement! Très agréable et calme, bien équipé et très très bien situé! Tout était à portée de main! 
nous y avons passé un très bon séjour! Nous recommandons totalement! (Petit plus pour le lecteur de vinyles, écouter Sinatra en rentrant de balade c'est le top!!)

Awesome apartment right across from the Bolhao market in Porto. Probably the nicest Airbnb apartment I've ever stayed in, in terms of roominess and amenities. WiFi worked great, bathroom was big and roomy, even the shower was big, which is unusual for European apartments.

El apartamento está muy cómodo y bien decorado. Muy buena ubicación y cerca de todo lo importante para ver en la ciudad.
Renato que fue quien nos recibió, nos atendió muy bien y nos explicó en español tips claves de la ciudad para conocer, donde comer ,  etc. Oporto muy bello. 
Gracias!!

Perfect location right in front of the Bolhao Market and near the metro station. We did everything by feet from the apartment wich is really nice.
The appartment looks like in the pictures and is very well furnish with everything you might need.
The small terrasse is just perfect to enjoy the outside - a grocery store is located right down the building if you want to eat at "home".
The place is all quiet since windows are not on the streets side - Our stay was perfect to enjoy Porto.

Nice and cozy apartment, decorated and very well  equipped. 
Good location and close to  2 supermarkets and a market.

The flat is ideally located in the city center, in an old building full of charm. Very clean, very functional, calm (windows/terrace give on the roofs, not the busy road), decorated with taste. 
Our contact Edgar has been very reactive and flexible during the whole booking process.
The only thing to consider is that the fridge in the open kitchen is extremely loud, so if you plan on sleeping on the couch, don't forget to foresee earplugs. Also on the first evening we only had hot water for 3 minutes, probably the cleaning lady used it all to clean the flat in the afternoon...

appartement très bien placé en centre ville appartement propre très déco et tendance immeuble agréable mais sous l'appartement il y a un petit super marché qui a ses livraisons à partir de 6h00 du matin et là plus possible de dormir à cause du bruit vous avez l'impression que les livreurs sont dans votre appartement dommage !!!!!
The place is very central . The apartment is beautiful and retro :) we enjoyed our stay in Porto and would recommend this place to stay .
Great place, awesome location, walkable distance from literally everywhere. Apartment was clean, fully equipped and had a modern feel. Would recommend to anyone that wants to explore Porto.

We had the most wonderful week staying at this apartment. It is beautifully appointed and elegant, with all the home comforts you'll possibly need. It is perfectly situated to get around the city, and also literally right next door to the supermarket.

The communication with the hosts was easy, efficient and non-invasive - just how we like it :) 

We will certainly plan to return when we come back to Porto, an amazing city!

Muito obrigada!
Nice flat, well located, next to the best pastries in Porto (Confeteira do Bolhao) !

The apartment is very beautiful and retro with the place being very clean and functional. The location was perfect with most of the touristy areas being only 15 mins walk away. We definitely enjoyed our stay in Porto and would recommend this place to stay.

We had a really pleasant stay in the Edgar appartement. 
Lovely decoration, confortable and big bed and all the hight point of Porto were easy to go by feet. 
So a perfect location!
One of the best Airbnb I have ever visited, highly recommened.

My husband and I had a wonderful 3 night stay here. The flat was very conveniently located and close to the Balhoa metro station, which made it easy to come in from the airport by metro. The flat was so fun and quirky, I loved the decor. It has everything you might need as far as the kitchen goes, although we personally didn't use any of it because we were enjoying eating out! Check in and check out was very easy. Overall, I would highly recommend this place!

5 stars. Great place to stay for exploring Porto! Very central location and was able to walk to most places. The apartment itself is very well appointed and comfortable. Hosts were very communicative and helpful also. Highly recommend staying here.

wir fanden es toll in der Wohnung. Wir wurden schon mit einer Flasche Wein begrüßt. Die Wohnung ist wirklich sehr schön und hochwertig eingerichtet, selbst die Details sind gut durchdacht und gestaltet. Die Lage der Wohnung ist hervorragend. Man kann von dort wirklich alle interessanten Dinge zu Fuß erkunden. Die Wohnung war viel leiser als erwartet. Lediglich die Rufe der Möwen drangen in morgens in unsere Träume und ließen uns spüren, dass wir am Meer sind. Einziger Nachteil der Wohnung ist, dass die Wohnung nach hinten raus geht und der Blick nur auf ein hässliches Wellplattendach stößt. Aber darauf war ja mit den Fotos eindeutig hingewiesen worden. Dafür ist der Balkon aber groß, schön mit Wein berankt und wunderbar leise. Wir können die Wohnung sehr empfehlen.

The flat is perfectly located in the city centre. It's very close to the station making travelling within the city very easy. The flat was exactly like on the picture: very good! There is 2 supermarket downstairs. I really recommend renting this place!

This is a really lovely apartment and looks just like the pictures. It's well equipped, and it's quiet as others have said as it's to the back of the main street. We left a bit of time between showers as the hot water did run out, but apart from that it was great. Thank you!

Fantastic place, one of the best airbnb placed we have ever booked. Clean, spacious, fully equipped kitchen and beautiful apartment overall - it was such a comfortable and pleasant stay, highly recommend!

The flat is beautiful and is designed very well. The location is great. Not just the small shops and the market, there are plenty of cafés and restaurants. Its also very practical as you can take a direct train to the airport.

We had a good stay at the apartment. It's fully equipped and has fantastic high ceilings, great location, very clean etc. Although, we had to wait outside the apartment for an hour, even though we had arranged a time. Check-in wasn't very good, minimal information on restaurant recommendations etc and the shower barely had any hot water, which is fine in the summer, but not when it's rainy/windy.

Great apartment!

Fantastic flat in an excellent location. Very clean with great communication from the host!

We loved our stay and would definitely stay here again!
Appartement hyper bien situé, et très joli.
This is one of the nicest apartments I've stayed in and I'm traveling a lot. Beautiful decorated and in the perfect location. I'll definitely come back here on my next Porto trip. Thanks Edgar.
Lovely apartment in the city centre. Very well equipped. Very flexible and good services. Helped to arrange car to the airport. 5 stars apartment!

The place is in the central of everything! You can walk everywhere. I had a minor issue with the tap but it was solved right away. Place is beautiful. The shop downstairs has everything you need. I couldn't have asked for anything better. Will book this again when i visit Porto again.

Un logement parfait ! Nous sommes venues en juin dernier avec trois amis; l'appartement est très bien situé, nous avons pu tout faire à pied sans encombres. Dans l'appartement, toute les commodités sont présentes et même plus : tous les ustensiles de cuisine possibles, du vin offert, beaucoup de dosettes de café en avance, savon etc. Un Air BNB professionnel haut de gamme selon moi ! 
De plus l'homme qui nous a accueilli était très aimable et nous a donné de nombreux conseils pour notre visite, et avec le sourire. Je recommande fortement cet appartement :)
Bem localizado, muito confortável, comunicação perfeita, cinco estrelas em toda a linha. Recomendo e tenciono voltar.
Great apartment that was very close to shops and restaurants.  It's only a 2 minute walk to the metro which makes getting around Porto convenient.

Beautiful apartment! Even better than the photos and one of the nicest we've ever stayed in. Clean, spacious, and well-appointed. Terrace is very nice too. Location is good, 5-10 minute walk to Porto's central restaurants and attractions. Highly recommended.

We opted to pick up the key at the Porto Concierge office since we were unsure of our arrival time. The office was about a 15 minute drive from the apartment and could have been more hospitable. Communication could also have been better. Despite receiving several long emails before arrival, two responses with direct questions went unanswered. Everything worked out in the end, but there's a little room for improvement!
Nice place. Central and well equipped.

This apartment is really lovely, spacious, comfortable, very clean and the location is perfect - close to all the sites yet peaceful and quiet at night. The check in was bumpy however, with the representative arriving an hour late. As well, though the apartment advertised air conditioning, the units were either locked or disabled and the apartment was quite hot. We called the main office and emailed the host to request the air conditioning be restored, but we received no response. We would highly recommend the apartment if these small but important issues were addressed.
Such a great apartment, lots of space, super clean and modern, well equipped and perfect location. Loved the secluded balcony too, perfect place for breakfast!

This apartment in Porto is awesome! The location is wonderful for exploring the city, just a 5-10 minutes walk to the city center. It's right near tons of cafes, restaurants and shopping. The hosts were very helpful in terms of having us check in at the office because we were arriving later in the evening (they are open until midnight), and even left us a bottle of wine at the place. Would highly recommend this place. The only thing that was a challenge for us was parking. We ended up having to leave our car in a lot for the days we were in Porto, so factor that into your costs if you have a car.

Beautiful bright, spacious apartment in a great location. Very clean. Easy check in and check out. Due to or evening flight we were kindly allowed to leave our luggage at the porto concierge main office - this is easy to get by train (10-15 mins) but not in the centre of porto.
Geschmackvoll eingerichtet, umfangreich ausgestattet, sehr gute Lage.

This flat was beautiful: clean, spacious and conventiently located. The only small issue we encountered was how to use the air conditioning (for some reason we could not get it to work). I had tried to reach our hosts but hadn't received a response until we were leaving and someone had showed up unannounced to help us.

Bel appartement conforme aux photos.
Seul bémol en arrivant à 17h le ménage n'était pas fait, donc appartement sans dessus-dessous. Les locataires précédents étaient parti trop tard....
Merci à Joao pour ses conseils en arrivant qui a su rattraper ce désagrément.
Nous avons passé un tres bon séjour à Porto dans cet appartement. Une mention particulière pour la deco, la terrasse et le phonographe !

This apartment is as lovely in reality as on the pics, with a very well equipped kitchen (we especially loved that it had a dishwasher!). I had read a couple of 'issues' from previous guests about hot water and air conditioning but everything was in great working order when we stayed. It's in a great location - close to good restaurants but has two mini supermarkets almost on the doorstep for people who wish to self-cater. We had a great stay!

The apartment is exactly as described and in the photos. Beautifully decorated and place is maintained very well.  Apartment was clean upon arrival.  

Porto Concierge is very well run, super fast response times to any inquiries. I didn't have any issues while I was there but would have felt confident that this team would have handled any situation well. 

Location is about a 10-15 min walk to the center of the city and easy to get to. Neighborhood has two supermarkets on the same block and is super quiet.  Would definitely stay again next time in Porto and will be recommending to friends!
Brilliant location and excellent facilities - absolutely perfect place to see Porto. Home away from home.
Tout ce qui est publié sur l'annonce reflète la réalité. Une pépite à ne pas manquer !
The apartment was exactly as advertised and in an excellent position to explore the city. All the conveniences one can ask for and then some. I loved my stay, would definitely return.
Enjoyed staying here, would recommend to others. The flat is bright, clean, comfortable, stylish and the communication with Edgar was great.

If it were not for the communication issues I would have given this place 6 stars.  Beautiful apartment, quiet(except) for rumble of subway which did not bothered us as it served as an alarm clock. Staying in front of Mercado do Bolha was a big bonus along with all the Confeterias.
Metro block away and walking distance to Ribeira...
A gen
Parfaitement conforme à mes attentes !
Fantastic location. Lovely quiet and peaceful apartment. Walkable distance to everything central, shopping street nearby. Great bathroom, comfortable bed and all amenities needed for our stay!

Très bel appartement, refait à neuf, avec une petite terrasse très tranquille. Très proche du métro Bolhao donc parfait pour se déplacer en métro ou pour parcourir la ville à pied. A conseiller aussi pour une famille.

The place is cute and conveniently located but when the sink broke I️ let them know immediately and followed up almost daily and was given the run around and told someone else was looking into I️t. I️t was difficult to figure out who was in charge and who was supposed to help and ultimately we were there for a week with no bathroom sink.

стильные апартаменты в центре города , рядом два магазина и рынок ... в шаговой доступности от всех исторических объектов , в апартаментах есть все необходимое для отдыха . служба консъержа в лице Фабио достойна высокой оценки . Рекомендую данные апартаменты всем , кто хочет получить качественный отдых ))

Nous avons eu un petit problème pour récupérer les clés, mais nous avons passé un superbe séjour. 
L'appartement est fidèle à la description et est très bien placé. Nous avons même été accueilli avec de beaux verres et une bonne bouteille de vin. 
Nous le conseillons sans soucis. Merci encore
Un très joli appartement et un accueil agreable
Great apartment in a great location. It is a short walk to the center. Supermarket is literally downstairs. Metro is around the corner.
Wonderful sytlish and cozy place, fully equipped and great location. Wish to have stayed longer. :)
Great location and wonderful apartment , well decorated, full equipped and a balcony :) The shower was stuffy

마트가 바로 아래라 장보기도 편하고 주변에 맛집이 많아요. 방은 3인용으로 설명되어있었으나 샤워는 따뜻한 물이 잘 안나와서 씻는게 너무 불편했어요. 2명이 씻기에도 부족한 온수... 그리고 8일 숙박했는데 세탁기가 있긴하지만 1인당 수건을 2장만 주는건 좀 아닌듯. 하지만 방은 넓고 난방도 잘됩니다. 배수구와 방문에 문제가 있어서 직원이 여러번 오고갔네요. 빨리 해결해주셨습니다. 개인호스트가 아니고 회사에서 운영한다는점도 참고하세요.

Sehr gut ausgestattete Wohnung in zentraler Lage. Sie ist sehr geschmackvoll eingerichtet und die Fotos entsprechen der Wirklichkeit. Zu Fuß lassen sich die meisten Sehenswürdigkeiten leicht erreichen. Außerdem ist die Metro nah und auch sämtliche Busse. Wir würden die Wohnung sofort wieder buchen.

Stylish renewed apartment, we have 2 kids and we had an enjoyable stay with all required "tools" for kids: baby crib, high chair, kitchenware to keep the food routine etc. The location is great, supermarkets 1 door away, walk distance for shopping and metro station.

El apartamento es tal y como sale en las fotos hasta el minimo detalle.
Muy limpio,tranquilo y en un sitio inmejorable para visitar toda la ciudad.
Al lado del mitico mercado de Bolhao y de su estacion de metro
Very good

A fab apartment in a great location. The apartment had everything we needed and we were able to walk from there to everywhere we wanted to go. The hot water didn’t last long so brisk showers is a must in the morning.
Great place to stay. Central location  and walkable to all the main attractions. Apartment is clean and as described.

Very nice & comfortable appartment in Porto, very close to Bolhao subway
Every places reachable walking, very quite place as not directly on the street (appart from delivery of the food store just behind once every 2 days at 6am).
Lots of advices given when entering the appartement + a bottle of wine. Would definitely recommend it
Great appartment perfect for family. Well placed and very clean. I recommand it for sure!

Appartement au calme, situé sur l’arrière! Très jolie terrasse ombragée et l’appartement très propre et bien équipé. Celui-ci est très bien situé!! 
Nous avons été très bien reçu, Edgar est arrangeant! 
Nous recommandons vivement cette appartement.

This is centralized location with many things to do within walking distance.
The kitchen is very well appointed and you have access to a washing machine.
If you are a light sleeper it may be a challenge for you in the early morning hours. Also, the bed is very firm if you are able bring your own towels.
Amazing service, immediately reacted to our problems. The terrace is absolutely gorgeous, and the house is cleaned. Really recommended to everyone!

This is a beautiful, centrally located apartment.  With two supermarkets downstairs you are able to get supplies in if you like to cook.  Well within walking distance of the metro - so easy to get to.  We loved the Terrace too.  Overall a lovely apartment to stay in on your visit to Porto.

The apartment was really nice, bigger than it appears in the photos, and is a great location. The only reason for the 4 stars and not 5 was because the shower only has enough hot water for one 2-4 minute shower before it would go freezing cold. We asked on day two if they could fix it (our 1 year old had the stomach flu the previous night and we were not able to shower him more than once because of no hot water) and were told they would look into it but never received a response beyond that. The mattress was also quite firm. But apart from those two things it was a fabulous space, very modern and well decorated, with everything you would want and need from a stay in Porto.

Good location near subway and city center. Large appartment as in pictures. Comfortable bed and living area. Supermarket right next door. Kitchen well equipped. Would stay there again and definitely recommend it.
Great place, great location in a very cool city

This apartment is exactly as the pictures show, if not better as is actually bigger than we expected! The most beautiful and stylish apartment and we loved our time here. The apartment is so close to everything, easily within walking distance of less than 30 mins to most major sights and down to the river. There are multiple supermarkets on the same street which is extremely helpful. The air con is fully functioning which was amazing during the hot spells. The apartment is also so quiet and peaceful which was shocking considering how central it is. Also just round the corner from a major metro station and bus stops which was extremely useful. Check-in process was very easy and convenient considering we arrived late at night and were delayed at the airport! The team also provide amazing insights into the city and give ideas on where to visit and when. Overall amazing experience, could not recommend more and would 100% return in the future!
Appart super bien placé et très agréable. Tout y est pour un séjour réussi. Je recommande sans hésitations !
Beautiful apartment in the centre. It was really easy to communicate with the owners. We would definitely recommend this apartment!
Bon emplacement et bon rapport qualité prix malgré la problématique du lit bebe absent bien que prévu

Edgar and his colleagues were great hosts. The check-in was very easy and they respond very fast, as we had a delay with our fly - no problem at all. Rui, who welcomed us in the apartment had a lot of good recommendations regarding food, drinks, sightseeing and other activities with children. The aparment was clean and in a nice design, located in the middle of Porto. We had a great trip and can highly recommend this Apartment - you won't regret it!

This is a great space with an excellent location to the market (temporarily moved until 2020) and restaurants. An easy walk down to the Ribeira area. Washer/dryer conveniently located outside on the patio. If you are in the area, I would recommend eating at the family-run Bulha down the road.
Clean and satisfying features of the cozy apartment. I would definitely consider the second use of this place.
This apartment is close to a lot of the main areas. It was clean and well-supplied.  Loved the high ceilings! I would definitely recommend.

Very nice and design appartement with good location 
The old market is currently under renovation, but no noise at all, since the appartement is facing the rear of the building 
PingoDoce supermarket right at the doorstep
Metro station very close 
Very clean and comfortable 
Great stay 
We recommand
Sehr gut!

A really well appointed apartment that had everything we needed. It’s ideally situated for all the sights of Porto, just a short stroll to the shops & the river. It’s easy to get to if you travel from the airport via the metro. 
It’s worth mentioning that The apartment is up a couple of flights of stairs but to be fair Porto is very hilly so they shouldn’t be a problem. 
The service from Edgar’s place was great, lots of information on extra trips you could book & arriving & departure from the apartment. 
We will be recommending Edgar’s to our friends.

Die Unterkunft liegt sehr zentral und verfügt über einen Balkon, wir haben diesen zwar nicht wirklich genutzt, da wir uns hauptsächlich die Stadt angeguckt haben. Wir können die Unterkunft nur weiter empfehlen.
Lovely flat very stylishly decorated. Super location close to everything.

房間很大很乾淨,挑高的空間住起來相當舒服,浴室很大且明亮,最棒的是廚房各種用具應有盡有(鍋碗瓢盆､微波爐､烤箱､冰箱､各種餐具(甚至有筷子!)),附近就有超市,可以自己準備早晚餐｡
雖然沒有電梯,但房間在二樓而已,樓梯也很寬大,上下行李不會太吃力｡
重點是價格非常實惠,是很超值的住宿點,下次有機會來還會想再住的地方｡
A very stylish and beautiful flat, ideally situated in the center. A great place to stay!
appartement fidèle aux photos, bon emplacement, superette aux pieds et visite a 10-15 min a pied.

We had an incredible time staying at this flat. It was truly beautiful as well as being centrally located, within easy reach of public transport and all the attractions. Fabio checked us in and spent time sharing his local knowledge with us which meant we ate amazing food  in local restaurants and knew what to do and where to visit. We would definitely recommend staying.
Apartamento muy bonito, muy bien situado y con todos los detalles.

tres bel appartement, bien décoré avec tout le necessaire, tres proche du métro et des lieux touristiques, tres bien pour le shopping, cependant durant notre sejour il y avait des travaux contigus a l'appartement qui ont créé des nuisances sonores le matin et le soir

The apartment is comfortable and in a great location. The balcony is a treat! 
We really enjoyed our stay in Porto.
Très bon emplacement, au calme et décoration soignée, une belle adresse

It's a very stylish and cozy apartment, and location is very good! You'll be near Santa Catarina with its tons of commerce! As soon as you get inside you'll be in almost complete silence.

There's a supermarket nextdoor and you'll be less than 10min walk away from Aliados.

It's very hard to park your car at the door to unload your luggage and everywhere is paid parking. You'll find a couple of 24/7 parking silos around with up to 16€/day.
Super accueil et réactivité de l’hôte. Le logement est très joli, assez grand et bien équipé. Super séjour
Great place

L'appartement est très bien situé pour les visites de Porto, et à proximité du métro pour aller directement à l'aéroport. Conforme à la description. Bien décoré, bien équipé. Accueil chaleureux de notre hôte, avec attentions, très bon séjour.

name: CL405-Great Apartment, Everything on its Door Step
summary: Sydney Bridge St ** Property Features ** 2 Bedroom Sleeps 4 1 Queen bed 2 Single beds 1 Bathroom Dishwasher Microwave Stereo TV DVD Unlimited WIFI Fully equipped internal laundry Washing machine Dryer Level 4 Fully prepared with linen & towels Air conditioning Pool Property Code: CL405
space: A complimentary welcome pack includes a number of single use items to get you started including tea, coffee, sugar, milk, snacks, soap, laundry & dish washing supplies.  This fully furnished property includes quality amenities & every convenience to ensure you enjoy a comfortable 'home away from home'. All linen is included in the rental rate. Serviced cleaning is available on request & a departure cleaning charge applies to all bookings.
description: Sydney Bridge St ** Property Features ** 2 Bedroom Sleeps 4 1 Queen bed 2 Single beds 1 Bathroom Dishwasher Microwave Stereo TV DVD Unlimited WIFI Fully equipped internal laundry Washing machine Dryer Level 4 Fully prepared with linen & towels Air conditioning Pool Property Code: CL405 A complimentary welcome pack includes a number of single use items to get you started including tea, coffee, sugar, milk, snacks, soap, laundry & dish washing supplies.  This fully furnished property includes quality amenities & every convenience to ensure you enjoy a comfortable 'home away from home'. All linen is included in the rental rate. Serviced cleaning is available on request & a departure cleaning charge applies to all bookings. Front and centre for all this beautiful city has to offer. Sydney Harbour is one of the most beautiful in the world. Explore the many bars, cafes and restaurants that line the shoreline or take a stroll through the lanes to find one of the many hidden gems. In the city
neighborhood_overview: Front and centre for all this beautiful city has to offer. Sydney Harbour is one of the most beautiful in the world. Explore the many bars, cafes and restaurants that line the shoreline or take a stroll through the lanes to find one of the many hidden gems. In the city centre you will find large shopping centres with high end stores, Australia Department stores such as David Jones and Myer and many other well knows brands and Australian designers. Located close to the Central CBD is Hyde Park and the Botanical Gardens, both are a beautiful place for a stroll or picnic. The CBD area has many great areas to explore, from Circular Quay and The Rocks, to Barangaroo and Darling Harbour or China Town, there is always somewhere to see. Major Attractions Sydney Harbour Bridge Sydney Opera House Luna Park Art Gallery of New South Wales Bondi Beach Manly Beach Places to Eat Sake – The Rocks Mejico – Central CBD area Mamak – Central CBD area China Lane – Central CBD area Chefs Gallery – Town Hall
notes: This great 2 bedroom apartment is as central as it gets. Located in the centre of the city, only minutes walk from all of Sydney’s great sites such as the Sydney Opera House, The Sydney Conservatorium of Music & Circular Quay.  Your apartment, located in the historic heritage listed Cliveden building, boasts high ceilings & a newly renovated common room. The Cliveden also has a fantastic rooftop pool, which will provide a relaxing atmosphere.  With all your modern conveniences provided, this is truly your “home away from home” in Sydney.
house_rules: ** Key Collection ** Please note that if you are arriving outside of business hours (those being outside of Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm) key collection can either be made  - From our offices, which are located Cremorne - Or our property manager will endeavour to make other arrangements. Should a third party be required be to deliver keys to you outside of business hours then an additional fee of $50 may apply, but our property manager will contact you in advance of your check-in and discuss and confirm the most suitable arrangement with you.  Please note if stay is longer than 60 days there will be an additional $55 cleaning fee. ** Rental Terms ** Strictly no subletting without prior written approval from The Apartment Service

host.host_about:
My team and I at The Apartment Service are proud to have been helping people with short and long stay apartment rentals across Sydney since 1989. 

Property professionals say location is everything and we believe that a convenient location is essential, especially in the rental market. We can offer you some of the best locations accross all the major areas of Sydney, and all of our  apartments are carefully selected for their proximity to cafes, key business and retail districts, public transport, and tourist hotspots.

Furnished apartments are a cost-effective alternative to five star hotels and have the added advantage of feeling like you are staying in your own home with separate lounges, kitchens and laundries, and modern appliances.

We've found Airbnb to be a perfect fit for our apartments and we're proud to have achieved a high volume of 5 star reviews consistently since joining. 

Please don't hesitate to view our 150+ properties listed on Airbnb across all areas of Sydney, and do get in touch for quick and friendly assistance.

reviews.comments: Five star location right in the heart of the CBD. Clean, convenient and great value. Will book again.

Pros: perfect location, very clean, extremely central.

Cons: some construction noise on street, windows look directly into office building next door (you'll probably want to keep the blinds closed).

L'appartement est très bien situé, ce qui permet de nombreuses visite à pied. L'immeuble est confortable et calme, par contre nous avons passé une nuit blanche car le tramway est en construction et le chantier fonctionne la nuit et peut être très bruyant. Il n'y a pas de double vitrage et la climatisation ne permet pas d'avoir réellement chaud. Nous avons loué une semaine pour 3 personnes et nous avons eu droit à 1 rouleau de papier toilette et un petit paquet prévu pour l'accueil de 2 personnes ( bouteille d'eau, thé ..) Le ménage n'a pas été fait correctement : poussière et objets oubliés sous le lit) Bref tout cela est un peu juste et demande à être améliore, mais la situation géographique racheté le tout.

We really enjoyed our stay at the apartment. The location was fantastic and made getting around in Sydney very easy. We have very young children who were waking very early due to the light in the bedrooms (thin blinds) but otherwise it was great.

This apartment has the most fantastic location which absolutely makes up for the fact that it is so dark you have to have the lights on at all times and it is a little run down. If you are out all day - as we mainly were - this is simply not a problem. The living area has enough room for two adult and two small children to co-exist quite happily and the bedrooms were a good size. Something we particularly appreciated was that there were lots of towels - often you are left with the bare minimum so this was great.

A really convenient place that close to Circular Quay. We can find everything on George Street like supermarkets, malls and restaurants. The place is well set with all equipments for cooking and cleaning like home. I do love staying there.

Mixed bag on this stay but overall positive.  Great location near Circular Quay and the apartment is comfortable.  However, I was shocked to find out that I was required to supply my own toilet paper, trash bags, etc etc., so take note.  A few single use items were supplied but having to go to the store and buy my own toilet paper was ridiculous and no forewarning was provided.  There were no instructions on how to use the TV so weren't able to watch it. The hot water in the shower was hit and miss and there were no face cloths.

This place was in an awesome location and looks just like the pictures!  the kitchen was well equipped and it was great having a washer/dryer too.
We felt very safe there and were within walking distance to everything!
our host made us feel very welcome and we would recommend this to other travelers for sure!

We had a wonderful time in Sydney in every way, superb dining, still savouring the memories, excellent sightseeing, the apartment worked out brilliantly, quiet, clean, perfect for our needs, in a great  location in it's proximity to Circular Quay with all it's forms of transport to anywhere in Sydney, plus cafe's, restaurants, supermarkets and shopping.  We were met on time on arrival at the apartment our host allowing us earlier entry than listed as well as a later departure time to suit our incoming and out going flights which we really did appreciate. Any issues were dealt with efficiently as per 11 light bulbs which were out and needed changing.  Thanks so much for a lovely stay, we'd definitely book the apartment again.  

Warm regards
Leonie
Great location and nice apartment. Bathroom a bit tight and the tv is a bit outdated but great base for exploring and enjoying sydney.

The location of this apartment is excellent. It's a five minute walk to the ferry and rail terminals and waterfront, and a 15 minute walk to the opera house. It's a suitable size for a family of four, with two beds in the second bedroom. We loved having a washer and dryer. If you plan on using the kitchen, plan on supplying a sponge to wash the counters, salt and pepper, dish soap, paper towels.... There are no extras. This was ok, we just were surprised and ended up buying what we needed. Also, there is road construction going on and it's loud. It goes all night, and some nights were worse than others. Despite the noise, the apartment worked well for our family, and the location is really good.

This appartment is in a fabulous location everything is so close and easy to get to, we had 2 teenage kids with us and all felt safe in the appartment and out on the street, there are fantastic restaurants and market food, bars everywhere it's a lovely short walk to the opera house area the botanical gardens and the city shopping. It was clean and bright with a nice pool on the roof, the only let down was the bathroom is very small and the little things that you expect would to be provided such as salt pepper a roll of toilet paper, sponges an extra tea towel etc are not 
However there are plenty of quality towels and spare linen provided 
The appartment has a very good air conditioning system and the beds are very comfortable

This apartment is very central - 5 minutes walk to The Rocks and Circular Quay, and 10 minutes walk from Pitt Street Mall. There is also a convenience store a few steps away from the building entrance, which came in very handy.

The apartment is beautifully equipped, and a welcome pack provides any small extras you might need. The air-conditioning is fabulous, especially during hot days! The beds are very comfortable and the linen is high quality.

For people with young children it's great to have a bath tub as well. This apartment has everything you need to have a comfortable stay.

The only I would say is to check on the progress and timing of the light rail construction on George Street, as it is very noisy. Otherwise I would highly recommend this apartment.

A great Apartment in a great location.  Everything you need is here, the common parts of the building look a little tired but the flat is comfortable and very well located.  The only downside, which the host cannot influence, is the work taking place on George Street installing the new light rail system.  This work is being done at night and can be a little noisy.  I wouldn't let that put you off as everything else is great, but it may be an issue for young children or light sleepers
Great place, great location!

PLEASE READ. YOU'LL BE GLAD. I'm not usually one to write a review. However, I feel that strongly about my stay at this apartment that I feel I must so other travellers do not experience the problems I had. There is exstensive work happening on the corner of George Street & Bridge Street due to the construction of the light rail system(it was very disappointing that this was not mentioned anywhere in the description or throughout the booking process). On the second night 3 of the 4 guests were unable to sleep due to the excessive noise. When I rang the property manager(Arnold) to inform him of the noise and that we were unhappy about it he said that there haven't been any complaints from previous guests and that there was nothing he could do. I explained that I wasn't concerned about other guests, just my party. After much discussion his resolution was a refund for our unused nights in the apartment..............but we would have to find alternative accommodation ourselves! Not only were we wasting our vacation time trying to rectify the situation, but we then had to use more of our time trying to find alternative accommodation. With our vacation time in Sydney being only 5 nights, you can imagine how frustrating this was. Due to the short period we decided to stay on at the apartment. However, the following night there was noise outside the apartment on Bridge Street due to what looked like industrial electricians laying cables underground. Once again waking the party. The apartment itself was very disappointing, dark & outdated. You can not open the living room blinds as there is an office block a few metres directly adjacent. The bathroom is small & the overall cleanliness of the apartment was very poor. There were clumps of dust in the bathroom & when my partner moved the bed to plug in her phone charger, the dust & dirt was discusting! I found this very strange as a $243 "cleaning fee" is charged at the time of booking? This was relayed back to Arnold who said that he would get the cleaners back that day. Although the cleaners had returned back there, it was quite evident that they had just done the bare minimum & the large clumps of dust were still in the corner of the bathroom. By this stage of the vacation we had gone past caring and just wanted to enjoy our time in Sydney. Arnold did refund the $243 "cleaning fee", but only after a heated discussion. He also had to send in an electrician to fix a power point that was hanging off the wall and on a seperate occasion an electrician to change the light bulbs. Being a property management company you would think the apartment would be checked and this would of been done prior to guests entering the property? In all fairness to Arnold he was very prompt in resolving the issues, but unfortunately it was too little...
Localisation exceptionnelle, parfait pour famille avec deux enfants, seul bémol, bruyant la nuit car travaux sur rue adjacente.
Great location 3 blocks from Circular Quay. Clean and comfort.

Comfortable, nicely furnished apartment in secure building with an excellent location walkable to downtown Sydney attractions.  Check-in on the weekends is a little difficult as the property manager is not available and you have arrange to have someone pick up the keys ahead of time or pick them up from a lockbox in a completely different location.  During our stay, there was serious construction noise at night that started on the second night of our stay.  This was unexpected and anticipated to last two weeks.  Keris was kind enough to allow us to relocate to a hotel and refunded us for the unused nights which we greatly appreciated.  We were sad to have to end our stay early.  We would stay here again in the future if we have the opportunity.
A bit noisy due to the George St road works and buskers that set up in the alley behind the accommodation, but it is an inner city apartment, so to be expected.
It was awesome

This apartment is large enough for up to 4 people as it has a queen bed and two singles and it has 2 bedrooms, which are clean. The kitchen is of ample size and has some cooking essentials included. The location is central to the CBD which made it perfect for us, as we have a chronically ill/disabled son who can't walk very far or fast, therefore making it easier for us to get around.
The apartment is also  very secure, and the internet service was also very good; all in all a great place to stay.
Was a nice place to stay at, unit just needs a bit of a face lift and clean.
Fabulous location, great sized apartment with all mod cons, good value for money
Great location, great building, affordable

name: Sydney CBD 3 Bedroom 1 Bathroom Apartment
summary: My place is close to Hyde Park, AMP Centrepoint tower, World tower, Chinatown, Darling Harbour, Museum, Town Hall and Central stations, Sydney Opera house, Kings Cross, QVB, Westfield shopping centre/Pitt st mall, Australian Museum, Anzac Memorial, St Mary's Cathedral, St Vincent Hospital. You’ll love my place because of excellent location and rooftop pool, spa, sauna and gym. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, families (with kids), and big groups

Museum station (which is the city circle station) is located only a couple of minutes walk from the apartment. Cot, high chair and stroller
notes: Cot, high chair and stroller are available at an additional cost of AU$18 per night. Parking is available at an additional cost of AU$35 per night. Wifi is limited to 1GB per day usage.
transit: Located in the Sydney CBD on the corner of Liverpool st and Oxford st opposite the Hyde Park. 10 minutes walk to Darling Harbour and Chinatown. 2 minutes walk to Museum Train Station. 20 minutes walk to Circular Quay and the Opera House. 2 minutes walk to bus stop that takes you straight to Bondi Beach in 20 minutes. house_rules: - We require guests to call us 30 minutes prior to arrival to the apartment for check-in.  - On arrival we require guests to sign an agreement form and provide a AU$500 fully refundable security deposit to insure against damage or loss to the apartment  - On departure, the apartment must be left in tidy condition with rubbish removed and dishes washed. To check-out, please leave the apartment keys inside the apartment on the table and close the apartment door.

host.host_about: I love beautiful Sydney and would like to show all my clients how wonderful Sydney is.

reviews.comments:
Great position, within walking distance of all the major CBD attractions and inner city suburbs like Darlinghurst, Surry Hills and Woolloomooloo. 

Our host was very friendly and thorough, and easy to deal with. 

The accomodation itself was fine - 5 beds (incl 3 doubles) in 3 bedrooms.  Awesome easterly view from the 13th floor. Perfect for a boys weekend. The fridge didn't work although I can't mark my host down for that as I didn't contact her to give her a chance to fix.

About daniels, i couldn't give any comment, its Just inna who meet us when arriving n communicate with us along our stay,inna stand by to help if you asking..the location is very good, real middle at the city

The apartment is well positioned right on Hyde Park and 300m from the train. There is a great view over King's Cross including sun and moon rises. Rooms are bright and spacious although only one has cupboard space. Gym, swimming pool, Jacuzzi and sauna are easily accessible. The single bathroom/toilet would make it difficult to accommodate 8 people, even though there are beds for 8.

Great spot but a bit basic in facilities and furnishings, but that's reflected in the price compared to the updated rooms offered by the resort. Could do with some updating of the property, paint, flooring etc and décor.
The property was clean and the host was nice and easy to communicate with.
Probably not for me next time but if you don`t mind it a bit "rough around the edges" then you cant beat the location.
This is very nice apartment and good location, very convenience for us in Sydney
Great
good experience

Fantastic location. Host was great and very helpful. Checked out later then the allocated time which was fantastic. Had everything we needed and the beds were really comfortable. It was the second level from the top floor so the view was great. Roof top pool and spa were great as was the view. Pillows were a bit flat and there was only 1 roll of toilet paper for 8 females staying 2 nights. Supermarkets were close by as was everything else. Overall I would highly recommend it there. I will be back.

The host was very welcoming and communicative during the whole stay. The apartment location was excellent, really close to supermarkets and a train station. There was unfortunately alot of noise (construction), lack of basic toiletries and the spa was closed when we were there.

Fantastic location right on the edge of Hyde Park (convenience store next door and BWS and coffee shop within 100 metres), nice pool on the roof (spa undergoing maintenance at time of visit).  A bit dated, but had everything we needed and Inna was very welcoming and friendly.  Bottle of wine upon arrival - nice touch.  The aircon wasn't particularly effective but a fan was also provided.

It is basic but has plenty of room, all the basic necessities (air con, large fridge, three bed rooms and plenty of sleeping space.  The roof-top pool is a wonderful extra at the end of a long 40 degrees Sydney day too. 非常好,市中心,步行很方便,房东也很好
the position of this apartment is wonderful. it's near to Australian museum, Hyde park, st. Mary church, art galerry of NSW and royal Botanic park by walk. inna is very nice.

Inna a été tout a fait facilitante pour toutes nos demandes, et l'appartement est bien équipé et fonctionnel , meme si un toilettage des peintures est nécessaire. l'emplacement est ideal pour découvrir sydney a pied .

Very central! Walking distance to great places.
Inna is a very helpful host.  Gave us tips on places to go which was very helpful.  Let us check in early and check out late.
