name: The charming blue suite - Copacabana
summary: Introducing the blue suite, a double room with en-suite bathroom, part of a newly rebuilt colonial  guest house, located in a private street in the heart of Copacabana. What makes it special? PRIVACY, I don't leave there, it's only for guests; SAFETY,  the house is in a gated community; UNBEATABLE LOCATION, very close to subway, shops, bars, beach; BEST ADVICE: insider's tips from a local host who loves showing Rio with safety; FULLY EQUIPPED; REALLY QUIET PLACE; HIGHLY APPROVED BY FORMER GUESTS
space: The blue suite is located at the front of the guesthouse, facing the small alley that connects it to the outside Pompeu Loureiro Street. It is very silent, a residential hub, an oasis in the middle of the non-stop frenzy of Copacabana. You have your own suite, consisting of a private bedroom for a couple, with its exclusive bathroom inside. But you also share a  kitchen, a TV room and a dining room with other guests. If you got a car, there is possibility to park inside the villa or at my house, at a five-minute walking distance, The bedroom has approximately 12 square meters, has large, old restored windows and is predominantly decorated in the blue color. There is a new and real double bed, with a 33-density mattress, meaning comfort for your nights. There is air conditioner and a small fridge where you can store your own supplies during your stay, Besides, you also find a furniture with empty drawers and another one to hang your clothes and a bedside lamp for night reading. Everythi
description: Introducing the blue suite, a double room with en-suite bathroom, part of a newly rebuilt colonial  guest house, located in a private street in the heart of Copacabana. What makes it special? PRIVACY, I don't leave there, it's only for guests; SAFETY,  the house is in a gated community; UNBEATABLE LOCATION, very close to subway, shops, bars, beach; BEST ADVICE: insider's tips from a local host who loves showing Rio with safety; FULLY EQUIPPED; REALLY QUIET PLACE; HIGHLY APPROVED BY FORMER GUESTS The blue suite is located at the front of the guesthouse, facing the small alley that connects it to the outside Pompeu Loureiro Street. It is very silent, a residential hub, an oasis in the middle of the non-stop frenzy of Copacabana. You have your own suite, consisting of a private bedroom for a couple, with its exclusive bathroom inside. But you also share a  kitchen, a TV room and a dining room with other guests. If you got a car, there is possibility to park inside the villa or at my house
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is truly one of the very best in all Rio de Janeiro, Actually, you will be in the center of the Jewish quarter, just besides a synagogue, an area known for the high level of its inhabitants. Almost in front of the villa, you find a big and classy supermarket. The best restaurants are located at Barao de Ipanema Street, just in front of the outside gate. One block ahead, at Bolivar Street, lies the best nightlife of Copacabana, with many bars, pubs and restaurants that keep open after hours. All main tourist attractions (the Christ, Sugar Loaf, Botanical Garden) are easily accessible by subway, bus or taxi.
transit: Transportation is easy and abundant. The Cantagalo subway station is just one block away, allowing safe and cheap connection to downtown and western areas. At Pompeu Loureiro Street you find several public buses to touristic areas of your interest. Taxis are plenty, you do not spend more than 10 seconds waiting for one (well, not when it rains). From or to the Galeao international airport, a taxi will take about 40 minutes and will cost you no more than the equivalent to US$ 20. From the Santos Dumont domestic airport, it is only 20 minutes far and a taxi ride will cost you the equivalent to US$ 10.
access: In the kitchen, that you can use at your will and anytime, you find cups and glasses, plates of different sizes, spoons + knives + forks, a filter with potable water, a microwave oven to heat your food and a coffee machine, with coffee and sugar available for free. NO STOVE IS AVAILABLE. As other common areas, you find a TV room with Brazilian cable channels and a dining room with fancy table and chairs, located into a high lobby area, with a big chandelier falling over it. You have internet  Wi-Fi everywhere. You will meet only selected guests like you, who booked through online platforms and had their identities previously checked.
interaction: you may count on me as your host in Rio, doing all my best to help you to make this an unforgettable trip. I think that hosting is much more than simply giving you the keys for your bedroom. Soon after your booking, I’ll send you a guide with information on how to get to the guesthouse and tips on what to do in town and in the neighborhood. As you arrive, I’ll personally give you insider information on the city and the best programs for the days you spend here. Along your stay, I’ll invite you to join my family at my own home, located from a five-minute walk, for a pool party or a caipirinha lesson. You will get a friend here for everything, this is my commitment with you and also a pleasure for myself. Hope to see you soon in Rio!
house_rules: No big rules. You will be in a residential villa, so silence is the standard for your and your neighbor's comfort. You can use the kitchen anytime, but you should clean it after using it. Smoking is allowed only outside the guesthouse, never inside your suite. You are expected to help to save the planet and my pocket, by using power and water with no wastes, I'd appreciate if you would help to turn lights off when you are not in that ambient.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
I'm a 52-year old Brazilian guy, who is truly having a great time being a host in Rio! A little about me: I was born in small town who came to Rio to study Engineering and have been living here for the past 35 years. I love this city and know it quite well, please give me a chance to show it to you. For 25 years I have worked in Finance and Mine Engineering, now I'm at a phase of better life quality, working as a consultant from my home office. I live in a big penthouse, which I'm gradually improving. I've tried Airbnb before as a guest and since mid-2014 I've been a host. I try to become a friend to my guests, helping them to take the best of my wonderful city with safety and comfort. I speak fluent English, Spanish, Portuguese (of course), but I also understand German and other Latin-based languages. I have a young mind, love outdoors activity, bike, running at the beach, but also reading, music (from rock to opera) and travel. I'm quite easygoing, sociable and talkative. Hope to see you soon in Rio!



Ich bin 52 Jahre alt, Brasilianer, von einem kleiner Stadt wer kommte nach Rio um Inginieurswissenschaft studieren und hier geblieben. Für 25 Jahre, arbeitete ich mit Finanz und auch im Bergbau,  jetzt bin ich ein Früh-Rentner, mit meinen einigen Büro zur Hause. Ich wohne in Copacabana in einem grosser Wohnung und habe neulich etwa Rennovierung gemacht. Ich hoffe dass Sie mir eine Chance geben eine Chance um Sie meine schöne Stadt zu zeigen! Ich bin sehr lebhafter, radfahre im Strand jeden Morgen, spreche flüssig Englisch + Spanisch (und natürlich Portugiesisch), verstehe auch andere Sprache. Es gefällt mir zuviel yu reisen, ich bin schon in vielen Länder gewesen, so ich galube ich verstehe was Sie brauchen für die beste Reise nach Rio erleben. Wilkommen Sie, es freut mich Ihre Bekanntschaft zu machen!

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
Foi minha primeira experiencia com  o Airbnb. O Sergio é um ótimo  anfitrião.  Nos apresentou a região  e nos proporcionou uma otima estrutura.  Muito obrigado Sergio. Minha mãe  mandou agradecimentos. Até  a proxima camarada. 
Abs

Sergio muy buen anfitrión.
Muy buena ubicación para asistir a las olimpiadas
Had a great stay! Sergio was an amazing host, very friendly and informative. Very safe area, would strongly recommend.

Thank You again Sergio!! Rio was a magical experience! The Blue Suite is very comfortable, spacious, clean, the perfect place to get some rest after long days and nights enjoying Rio. The building is located very near everything, you can walk and see many attractions in Rio from there, theres subway station very near, and its a very safe area. Sergio is an amazing host, very helpful, kind, informative and charming. I definitely have to come back soon!!

This is a beautiful old colonial building renovated with great taste and respect for the spirit of the house. Every room is a little bit different, but all have modern bathrooms and are exactly as in the pictures. The rooms on the lower floor have AC, whereas the rooms on the upper floor have  fans. Both floors have a small kitchen area. There is a washing machine and you can borrow one of the many tour guides. The street where the house is located is very quiet as it is a gated community and closed from traffic. This is a rare find at such a central location at the heart of Copacabana, only 10 minutes walk from the beach, many restaurants and bars. You can also find supermarkets, the pharmacy and the closest metro station just around the corner. Despite the great amenities, the best of all in this place is not the building, but the host. Sergio is an overly friendly host who is eager to guide you through the city and invite you to a caipirinha at his place. He obviously loves being a host and is looking forward to welcoming you to his city!

Apesar de por poucos dias, a estadia foi ótima! O Sérgio foi super atencioso, me explicou perfeitamente a região, pontos turísticos, coisas para se fazer. O quarto condiz com as fotografias e muito confortável! A localização é muito boa, perto de supermercados, das praias, estação de metro...  Enfim, tudo perfeito!

Sergio é um anfitrião incrível! Sua casa de hóspedes fica numa localização fantástica em Copacabana, perto de metrôs, restaurantes, pontos de ônibus e da praia! 
Minha primeira experiência com o Airbnb não podia ter sido melhor.

La habitación es buena para una pareja, tiene aire acondicionado, el baño es amplio y tiene agua caliente, es un punto clave en Copacabana y muy cerca de la playa. Sergio es muy amable y hospitalario. Al llegar se tomó su tiempo para decirnos todo lo que debíamos saber de Río y que sitios deberíamos visitar. Lo recomiendo 100%.

El lugar es buenísimo si son viajeros "todoterreno". Las áreas comunes no son tan amplias y cómodas pero el lugar es privilegiado por estar en Copacabana y accesible a todo. Sergio es muy amable y aunque no lo vimos cuando llegamos, siempre respondió oportunamente al (Hidden by Airbnb) . Nos guardó amablemente nuestras cosas cuando fuimos a Buzios y nos dio todas las facilidades.
Todo tal como describía  el aviso. La casa es muy tranquila y la ubicación es buena.  Sergio fue muy amable con nosotros y respondió  todas nuestras dudas desde el inicio de la reserva.
Muy amable, atento. Muy buena ubicacion!! Gracias por todo!!

O imóvel é muito bom, com excelente localização, próximo a transporte, mercado, restaurantes, praia, bares, praia, tudo!!! Loca muito seguro e o Sérgio um excelente anfitrião, muito dedicado e com uma super acolhida!!! Sabemos onde ficar quando formos ao RJ!!! Obrigado Sérgio!!! Abraços!!!

Die Unterkunft ist von der Lage perfekt. Die Straße ist ruhig. In der Nähe ist eine U-Bahn Station, ein Supermarkt und viele Restaurants und Bars. Wir waren in der Blue Suite das Zimmer ist sehr schön, das Bad ist toll. Sergio ist sehr hilfsbereit.

Sergio es u  anfitrión de lujo, realmente un súper host. Nos dió los mejores tips para conocer Río sin gastar de más y disfrutar de los mejores lugares. Siempre atento a cualquier necesidad que tuviéramos súper amable y divertido. El lugar es tal cual como lo muestran las fotos y la ubicación es excelente para ir a la playa y para salir por la noche, muy seguro y tranquilo. ¡Una hermosa experiencia!
Excellent place and host! Highly recommended.

A pesar que no coincidimos por horarios con Sergio fue una estadía increíble, en pleno centro con fácil acceso a muchos lugares para visitar los cuales puedes movilizarte a pie, casa muy cómoda con huéspedes muy respetuosos de la privacidad del otro,casa acogedora, y con todo lo necesario para hacer tu estadía en Río una comodidad absoluta , muy bonita y limpia.

Wir waren ein paar Tage hier in Rio und die Unterkunft war spitze! Sergio ist ein sehr netter Mann, der uns sehr weitergeholfen hat! Er hatte super Tipps für uns und hat direkt dafür gesorgt, dass wir uns wohl fühlen! Die Unterkunft selbst ist wie beschrieben und ideal für einen Aufenthalt in Rio (Nähe zum Strand, zur Metro, Supermarkt)! Außerdem war alles sehr sauber und gepflegt. Wir kommen sehr gerne wieder hier her!

Sergio es un genio, espero por nuestra llegada en la puerta del hospedaje contó la historia de la restauración de la casa, las comodidades, dio indicaciones de cómo ir a todas la atracciónes de río, que hacer, donde ir a comer..etc etc etc.
Respecto a la casa de hospedajes, la misma está en una zona muy segura rodeada de todos los servicios.
Use muchas veces airbnb en muchos países y sin lugar a dudas está fue la mejor atención. 1000% recomendable

Aloha Sergio, I had an amazing time staying with at your guesthouse! You were very helpful with giving me advice on Rio! I stayed in Brazil for 3 weeks all over the country and this was my favorite home! Muito Obrigado!

Sergio was an absolutely marvelous host!  We couldn't have asked for anybody more hospitable. Before and after arrival, he gave us all of the locals tips, when and how best to tackle the main tourist attractions, as well as vital information on staying safe and making the most of our trip. He even invited us to his home to learn the art of Caipirinha (brazilian cocktail) and have a drink with his other guests. He is delightfully friendly, charasmatic and enthusiastic about sharing his corner of the world. We had such a great time, Sergio!!! Thank you so much!!  Until next time!!!
a localização e segurança são excelentes
Sergio fue un excelente anfitrión! Nos guío muy claramente sobre cómo manejarnos en esta enorme ciudad. Volvimos con un amigo en Río. Muy agradecidos y con ganas de volver.
Super indicado
A localização é ótima. As dicas do Sergio foram boas. Faltou uma pessoa no local para dar um suporte. Sem TV no quarto.

:::.Llegar a la casa de Sergio es llegar a tu propia casa... el recibimiento no puede ser mejor, un cafe y una charla muy agradable donde Sergio nos explicó donde estabamos y cuales son las mejores opciones para nosotros... compartir con los demás huespedes es muy agradable.

Sergio es una persona demasiado agradable, esta siempre atento y te ofrece su tiempo para darte los mejores consejos que como turista necesitas para disfrutar de Rio....

La casa esta muy bien hubicada... a unas cuantas cuadras del metro, de la playa y de restaurantes y bares... el lugar es muy seguro y siempre te sentiras tranquilo de caminar.... la habitacion es amplia, limpia y comoda... agua caliente, una cocina practica y café que para mi siempre resulta muy importante en los viajes.

Sin duda un lugar que recomendaria a ojos cerrados.... volveremos sin dudarlo.....:::

Sergio gave us a great reception! the location is great! a few blocks from Copacabana, Supermarket, NightClubs, Pubs, etc... It's the touristic area, and pretty safe area, you can be walking perfectly at day or night! Uber works great in Rio, so enjoy your stay! Sergio gave us a pretty nice recommendations, you should pay attention, because at least for us they were very helpful!
Ótima estadia, apesar de pouco tempo no Rio o Sérgio deu todas as dicas e esteve sempre à disposição. Muito bom!

Excelente host.
Una casa muy limpia, cómoda y buen hubicada.

O endereço do Sérgio é dez. Fácil acesso para onde você quiser ir. As suítes são confortáveis. O anfitrião acolhe muito bem seus hóspedes. Dá excelentes dicas de passeio e toda orientação necessária para que você sinta-se acolhido e em casa. Adoramos conhecer o Sérgio e sua casa.

Sergio was an EXCELLENT host! He was very informative, enthusiastic and welcoming. The location was nice- quite peaceful yet very close to everything you need/want (beach, grocery, restaurants, shopping). The villa felt familial because of the close proximity of rooms which was great for meeting others. The room wasn't quite as pristine as it appeared in the pictures posted, but otherwise an accurate post. Also, don't expect to cook much of anything due to the limited amenities in the kitchen. Overall, we really enjoyed our stay! Make sure to attend the caipirinhas lesson!

Thank you so much for the amazing and invaluable guide of Rio, I knew the Carioca culture in its maximum splendor thanks to your advices!!! Without a doubt I would repeat the visit to Rio and I would stay at your house again! Expect more friends from Mexico cause I will recommend your house ... greetings from Mexico.

Sergio's place is ideal to visit this amazing city! It is located only a few blocks from Copacabana beach, and within walking distance to Ipanema as well. There are shops restaurants, bars, and everything just outside the door. I felt extremely safe. I only met Sergio very shortly as I only had 3 days in Rio altogether, but he was very engaged and enthusiastic about showing his guests what Rio is all about. I would definitely recommend his place to friends and family and will hopefully come back soon! Thank you Sergio!

Sergio  was a superb host. He gave us detailed tips about Rio in fluent English (he also can speak other 4 or 5 languages). The location is great, safe, close to subway and several main attractions. I will definitely stay here again.

Sergio est un excellent hôte! Il nous a mis à l'aise dès le début et s'est toujours montré très disponible. Dès le premier jour il a gentiment pris du temps pour nous faire une explication claire et conscise de la ville et des différents centres d'intérêts propres à celle-ci. C'est l'hôte parfait: il est soucieux, impliqué et sa sympathie est sans égal. De plus il est polyglotte donc nous n'avons pas eu de souci pour se comprendre. C'est un vrai Carioca et ses conseils nous ont été vraiment précieux tout au long du séjour. En ce qui concerne la chambre bleue, elle est parfaite pour un couple. Je le recommande!
Très bon emplacement, Sergio est un hôte qui sait recevoir et donner les bons plans de la ville. Nous avons passé  un Très bon séjour!
Você precisa conhecer esse lugar quando vir ao RJ. Aconchegante, confortável e próximo aos principais pontos turísticos.

Sergio showed great hospitality from the very second we met him and untill we left- he gave us a very informative intro to Rio and even invited us to a local caparinhia class! One of the best hosts we have had so far, no doubt! The Suite has a great location 5 min walk to Cobacabana and a big supermarket is close by. Highly recommended!

Foi uma otimo estadia!
Recomendadíssimo

We loved our stay in Sergio’s apartment in Rio, Copacabana. The location was excellent! We could walk or take a metro to lots of places. The room was was very safe and spacious, with a big bathroom. It’s located in a gated community, but Copacabana and Ipanema are very safe neighbourhoods in Rio anyway. Sergio gave us some fantastic local tips that made our stay in Rio even better. He also has a water filter tap so we didn’t have to buy bottled water. We will definitely be back to stay again!

Sergio's place is very nice, quite, and safe. Sergio was also available anytime of day to help answer questions, give suggestions and provide driections. A very good value for your money. I will be staying with him next time I come to Copacabana.
ótima acomodação com excelente localização, próxima a restaurantes, mercado, praia etc., e com acesso super fácil.

너무너무너무 친절하고 유쾌하신 아저씨! :) 혼자 왔느네 유용한 정보도 많이주시구, 세심하게 잘 챙겨주셔서 너무 행복했어요. (작긴하지민) 에어컨도 있고 창문도 크고 안전한 동네에 위치해있습니다. 
Highly recommened, sergio is the nicest guy in rio! You’ll definitely love him and his place :)

Fantastic stay at Sergios Home. Perfect location and really safe and secure, quiet at night. The room was great and the local tips from the main man himself made our trip to Rio. Would happily have stayed a lot longer!
Safe apartment. Close to the beach.

Good Airbnb in a a great and secure location two blocks from Copacabana beach. It's also near a metro stop, restaurants, and bars. 

Sergio is a wonderful host and he has the best personality. You'll feel like you've known him for years. The communication between us was outstanding. Upon my arrival, Sergio pulled out a map of the area and gave me helpful hints on what to do in Copacabana. This information was very useful. 

The only negative thing is my bathroom was not clean. I'm sure Sergio will resolve this for future bookings.  I would still recommend his Airbnb.

excelente ubicacion, cerca del circuito de playas (6 min a pie) y de la estacion del metro (3 min). Sergio fue un anfitrion de primera, siempre disponible para cualquier pregunta y aconsejando que lugares visitar. Lo recomendamos a 100%. Gracias por todo.
Sergio is a very nice host. He loves his city and make everything to make you love it !

Sergio is truly an amazing host and who went above and beyond to be hospitable. He accommodated my late arrival, gave an incredible introduction to the city, and was always willing to answer any questions I had. 

The room was clean and in a safe, convenient location only 3 blocks from the beach. I look forward to staying here during my future visits to Rio and highly recommend this listing!
As others wrote, great host, awesome Location, advices about Rio. All the recommendations.
Excelente anfitrión, muy buenas recomendaciones y la ubicación excelente. Todo muy seguro.
Sergio is a very warm helpful man who provides you with tips on places to see around Rio and information as to the best way to get there.  Highly recommended.

Well, Sergio was a really nice and useful person for that reason my time there was perfect. If you want to go to Rio Please listen every single recommendation given for Sergio. He was a very kind and honest person in an amazing place. I love Brazil and of course If I had to come back then never I would thought to stay in other place.

O Sérgio é excelente! Extremamente simpático e atende prontamente a qualquer dúvida. 
A casa tem localização privilegiada, no melhor ponto de Copa. Recomendo!

La habitación es tal cual se muestra en las imágenes, ubicación muy céntrica, a pasos del metro y de la avenida Atlântica. Sergio siempre dispuesto a ayudar, es cosa de preguntar por (Hidden by Airbnb) y listo. 
100% recomendado!!

My stay at Sergio’s apartment was phenomenal! Sergio was a very attentive and accommodating host with great knowledge about Rio. He had a lot of suggestions for things to do and places to visit. 

The apartment is tucked away on a small, private, and quiet street. The room was clean, comfy, and had a private bathroom. It’s a short walk to a metro station and is near the beach. There are also a number of restaurants and bars within walking distance. 

I would highly recommend Sergio’s apartment and I hope to stay here again if I ever am in Rio in the future!

it is located in a very queite place, but close to everything, such as the beach, groceries, public transfortation...everything.

and the host sergio is the one of the finest hosts and guide i've ever met. he will give you very rare information about rio tour.
A hospedagem do Sérgio é muito bem equipada, com itens  básicos necessários, a localização é muito privilegiada , nas redondezas encontra-se de tudo  e realmente ele é um superhost. Eu recomendo!

Sergio es un increíble host, nos ayudo a que nuestra visita fuera más de lo que esperábamos! La habitación está en una ubicación envidiable para ir a visitar todos los lugares importantes! Súper recomendado
Sergio es súper con la info para pasar una excelente estadía en Río y muy amable. La habitación es tal cual se muestra en las fotos y el lugar tranquilo y seguro. Gracias Sergio!

Sérgio é maravilhoso!!!! indico com todo meu coração para escolherem essa hospedagem, o anfitrião  nos deu dicas valiosas sobre passeios que fizeram toda a diferença. A casa é muito bem cuidada e percebe se de longe o carinho com que tudo foi preparado para a nossa chegada. Só tenho a agradecer pelo tempo no RJ.
O melhor anfitrião do Rio que poderia ter encontrado! Me senti em casa... O Sérgio é gentil, alto astral é uma simpatia! Além de que, a localização é maravilhosa!
Sérgio é uma pessoa adorável! Ótima recepção e a localização é excelente
Great location!  And an energetic, very knowledgeable host!
Outstanding hospitality!

name: Rio Antigo, quarto aconchegante!
summary: Ofereço um quarto duplo em um prédio histórico no centro do Rio de Janeiro. A 5 min. a pé da boêmia Lapa, 20 min. a pé min de Santa Teresa, 15 min do Sambódromo, 25 min. de ônibus de Copacabana. Nas proximidades há uma variedade de restaurantes, bares, casas noturnas, farmácias, lanchonetes e supermercados. Transporte público para os principais pontos turísticos da cidade bem na esquina. Você se sentirá em casa!
space: Cosy double room in an historical building in the old center. A 5 min walk to the bohemian Lapa, 20 min walk to Santa Teresa, 25 min by bus to Copacabana.  I offer a bright and quiet room, a bathroom and complete access to the kitchen.

transit: Transporte público para os principais pontos turísticos da cidade a menos de 100 metros.
access: Guests have acces to the entire appartment.
house_rules: Please, treat  the accomodation as yours. Smoke is not allowed.

I like travelling around, love arts, the nature, photography and sports.
I love meeting new people, learning languages, going out and walking around new place.
I work as an account assistant in a federal bank and I travel when on vacations.

name: Sunny & Spacious 1bdrm apt
summary: This apartment is located in the heart of Bushwick, just a block away from the Jefferson stop. You'll be surrounded by art as most of the buildings here are covered in murals, not to mention the abundant amount of bars, restaurants, coffee shops, and galleries.  This is a true one-bedroom apartment with a private bedroom and a living room. The bedroom has a queen bed, and the couch pulls out to a full. Each room has two windows giving the space plenty of light!
space: Great space with a Bluetooth stereo and a projector for those nights in!
description: This apartment is located in the heart of Bushwick, just a block away from the Jefferson stop. You'll be surrounded by art as most of the buildings here are covered in murals, not to mention the abundant amount of bars, restaurants, coffee shops, and galleries.  This is a true one-bedroom apartment with a private bedroom and a living room. The bedroom has a queen bed, and the couch pulls out to a full. Each room has two windows giving the space plenty of light! Great space with a Bluetooth stereo and a projector for those nights in! I'll definitely be around to greet you, hand off the keys, and show you around the apartment. During your stay, there will be a contact person nearby to help you in case you have any questions about the apartment. Just a block away from the Jefferson L stop!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I'm currently in the yogurt racket working for Dannon doing category management (basically the intermediary between sales and marketing). On the side, I love writing and music and art!

reviews.comments:
I loved staying here! I've always stayed in NYC but staying in Brooklyn really opened my eyes to the new side of New York City.

I am an actress so I usually stay here for Broadway shows or doing a show, that's it.

Staying here was really relaxing and I LOVED his "unique" TV style with stereo system and bluetooth easily to hook up the music.

Thank you!

We really enjoyed our stay in Roshan's apt. He made sure we had everything we needed. The apt has a perfect location, in the centre of Bushwick and 1 minute away from the subway. 
I highly recommend it !

The best thing about this apartment for me was the location as it was a stones throw from a friend i was visiting in Brooklyn. It was also very easy to get into Manhattan. Bushwick is a great area with everything you could possibly need.
Really just as the ad describes -- bright, welcoming, pleasant, and in a wonderful location. We enjoyed our night there and would definitely stay there again someday!

Rosh was very easy to communicate with and very helpful with key pick up. I chose this apartment because of the location near family. It's also very near subway station, easy to get Uber, lots of restaurants and groceries. The apartment is good for 2-3 people. It has everything you need but does lack some basic furniture that would make it more comfortable. The building is very quiet. There's a window air conditioner which kept the place comfortable. Good kitchen.

Roshan's place is cozy, perfect location you get in 3 minutes to the subway that connects you easily to Manhattan. The neighborhood is surrounded by graffiti art, bars, but it's still calmed. Me and my friends enjoyed staying at Roshan's place, he was very kind and helpful, actually the perfect host.

The host was very communicative and welcomed us, then got out of the way.  The location was great; near our Bushwick event, easy to get to Manhattan, lots of food and drink nearby.  The neighborhood is in transition from industrial to more residential and there was a lot of interesting things to see nearby.  The apartment had plenty of room for us to sleep and hang out, and the AC in the bedroom worked well to cool off from the warm days on Thursday and Friday.

Roshan was a great host. His place was exactly as described, which was great. The neighborhood was fun. The location was great. Connecting with him to get the keys was easy. He accommodated our request to check in early, said we could stay late on the date of our departure and told us to help ourselves to anything in the refrigerator. I highly recommend him.

We had a great stay in Brooklyn. Clean apartment with a cute view; Roshan was prompt in answering my questions and communicating with me. Had everything I needed. Would recommend to anyone and everyone!

L'appartement de Roshan est calme, lumineux, agréable et cosy. Il est situé dans un quartier sympathique de Brooklyn, à proximité des commerces, bars, restaurants et du métro . Nous y avons passé un séjour agréable, il y manque juste une table et des chaises pour prendre les repas ...
Great location, awesome space. Clean and perfect for a weekend getaway with your loved one or friends

This was a great apartment!  Roshan was very accommodating to my early check in and made my stay in New York great!  The apartment was very spacious, clean and quiet.  I would definitely stay here again.
Roshan is an amazing host. So accommodating and very easy to communicate with. His place has everything you'd need, and check in and out was very easy. Thanks Rosh!
We had a great two-night stay at Roshan's place. Roshan was extremely friendly, welcoming, and helpful. The apartment was cozy and just what we needed for our quick visit.

The apartment is in a good location however keep in mind this is Roshan's own apartment and he leaves when there are guests. It is not as clean as one would expect, the radiator in the bedroom is stuck on "on" and is very loud which made it impossible to sleep. We were only there for two nights.
This place is very well located. Roshan is very kind and helpfull. The appartment is just near Subway station, and there are shops all around. We spent a wonderful time there.
Excellent communication, great location and the place has everything you need.

My brother, sister and I had a good and relax experience at Roshan's place. The flat was clean and has everything you need for a comfort stay. He was very helpful as well ! I strongly recommend the place to stay in NYC, the vibe of the area and the location made it just perfect.

Roshan was very accommodating for our arrival. However, when we settled in we noticed that the apartment was nothing like the listing. On one hand, we felt unsafe because there was an open investigation happening in the neighbouring apartment. On the other hand, the apartment was mouldy and dirty. The bathroom was incredibly dirty and we had to take extra measures to take a shower. Further, there was no ventilation in the bathroom which added to the smell and unappealing look of the bathroom. The shower curtain also had mould-like substance on it. The rest of apartment had mould growing in all corners of the apartment. The apartment was also dusty. Lastly, there were no bathroon necessities provided. All in all, we do not suggest this place and we left two days before the end of our trip.

It was in a great location! Minutes from the metro! 
Very nice apartment!

Roshan is a great guy, and his apartment is perfectly and stylishly appointed, as well as clean :) 
I enjoyed the Brooklyn Roast Coffee beans left for us, and that he was super easy to communicate with.
Wishing you the best Roshan! Thanks again! 
We would definitely stay here again.

Roshan's apartment was perfect for our stay in Brooklyn. Lovely place with everything we needed. Location was amazing, so close to the subway and loads of really great bars nearby. Would thoroughly recommend.
Place was lovely and very well-located. Roshan was extremely helpful and responsive. Recommended!
Great place close to the L-line! Nice neighbourhood with convenience store, bars and cafés. Would stay here again :)

We enjoyed our brief stay at Roshans. Check in and communication were a breeze. It was not the cleanest, and a coat of fresh paint would do it good, but fine by our standards. There is a projector but no streaming media device (like Apple TV) so no TV unless you BYO or have a laptop with an HDMI port (mine does not)

This place is perfect if you need a spot to stay for a couple of nights. It is close to food, subway and bars. If you need to get to the city it is not a difficult transit. He was very friendly and available for any questions or concerns at all times. I would 100% stay at his place again. Was a wonderful Air BNB experience. One of the best!
Good experience , great communication

Rosh’s Place is clean located close to plenty of shops, restaurants and a subway line right in Brooklyn. The best part is Rosh, the host. He’s a kind person who promptly answers any questions you have. I highly recommend Rosh and his apartment!

Bushwick is so fun!! Roshan has acquired a lovely dining table and chairs. The apt is super quaint and very Brooklyn row house vibe. Half a block to a Cajun cafe and bar and an outdoor market. It’s relatively quiet for a Brooklyn St and so close to the action. Hana Market, House of Yes! Milk and Pull (delicious Tumeric Chai- get it dirty ;) the museum of art that is the streets of Bushwick! Close to the L train. Take ride shares around Brooklyn. One bedroom, nice size living room/dining room, small kitchen with a good layout. The apt has an overall nice layout and style. This is someone’s home and his personal belongings are there, he manages to tuck most things away and we felt we had plenty of personal space. He had awesome pots full of lettuce! Also a wall of succulents. Nice plants. Apt feels airy and comfy. 3 flights walk up good for exercise!

The apartment has a great location, surrounded by great local bars and cafes as well as public transport is few minutes away so it’s easy to get to manhattan! We really enjoyed our stay and recommend this place for a trip to New York where the main focus is on getting the true city feeling!

a perfect location, had so much fun in area. really good projector and speakers. BUT not clean at all. smelled really bad, we had to get flowers and a candle for the place. pull out couch was so uncomfortable as well. does not look like pictures, really crowded space. very helpful and nice host though.

An easy walk from the subway (Jefferson st). The corner bar (heavy woods) was super chill. And there’s a grocery store (Key Food) around the corner which was super convenient. Roshan’s decor is so dope. Chill vibe and cool instruments. One of the most comfortable beds I’ve ever stayed in!! Just beware the front door, Roshan was very helpful though.

Amazing stay!! Roshan was very responsive to our messages, his place was clean and it was close to the subway. We liked that it had so many restaurants and it was a fun neighborhood to stay in. Would highly recommend staying with Roshan.
Great place to stay close to Manhattan. Would recommend.

Roshan had a really cozy house with nice and artistic details in the livingroom. Which made us feel like home. His house was really closeby the subway, not even a 5 minute walk. We also found a supermarket, brunch and breakfast places on walking distance. Which was very helpful. We didnt really communicated a lot between Roshan and us, but when we did he had a quick reply and was super nice. All and all we had a great stay and would recommend this airbnb, this was my first time new york and staying in this house as a guest really helped making our stay in this city memorable. Thanks again Roshan!

Great location to stay with lots of stuff to do around the area. Parking was not hard to find. He allowed me to check in whenever i wanted which was great and very easy for me. overall he was great and easy to deal with. He always replied asap when i needed to get in contact with him which was also helpful. I would def reccomend!

name: Rio de Janeiro- próximo ao Parque Olimpico
summary: Meu espaço é perto de Próximo ao shopping, praia, supermercado, restaurantes. Você vai amar meu espaço por causa de o pé-direito alto, a localização e o ambiente. Meu espaço é bom para famílias (com crianças) e grandes grupos. Próximo ao estádio das olimpiadas

name: Apto 2 quartos mobiliado Recreio dos Bandeirantes
summary: Meu espaço é perto de shopping Recreio, há 500m da praia do Recreio.. Você vai amar meu espaço por causa de o apartamento é mobiliado com móveis planejados e equipado com ar condicionado, tv's, mesas, banquetas, sofá e camas confortáveis, fogão, geladeira, máquina de lavar e secadora, o ambiente do condomínio é agradável, familiar, diversificado, moderno, o bairro Recreio dos Bandeirantes fica na zona oeste do Rio de Janeiro, próximo a Barra da Tijuca.

host.host_about: Sou ex jogador profissional, com o meu trabalho investi em imóveis  e os mesmos alugo!! Hoje, estou iniciando a carreira de auxiliar técnico para futuramente ser técnico profissional!! Não vivo sem o futebol e minha família!!

name: Sunset Beach and Ocean Views
summary: Sunset Beach at your fingertips! Why spend hours in traffic for an "Entire Place" (aka someone's garage).  Park the car, lose the keys and live the ALOHA life the way it was meant to be lived. Walking distance:  Sunset beach, Ted's Bakery, Velzyland Biking distance:  Pipeline, Waimea Bay, Sharks Cove, Hiking trails, Foodland, Food Trucks, Coffee shops
description: Sunset Beach at your fingertips! Why spend hours in traffic for an "Entire Place" (aka someone's garage).  Park the car, lose the keys and live the ALOHA life the way it was meant to be lived. Walking distance:  Sunset beach, Ted's Bakery, Velzyland Biking distance:  Pipeline, Waimea Bay, Sharks Cove, Hiking trails, Foodland, Food Trucks, Coffee shops Booking includes 2 bicycles and direct access to the Ke Ala Pupukea bike path, connecting you to all of the North Shore's beautiful attractions.  It also includes snorkels, swim fins, soft top surfboards, an ocean kayak, and free WiFi. Located < 1 mile from bus stop for TheBus; O'ahu's public transportation system
transit: Located < 1 mile from bus stop for TheBus; O'ahu's public transportation system
access: Booking includes 2 bicycles and direct access to the Ke Ala Pupukea bike path, connecting you to all of the North Shore's beautiful attractions.  It also includes snorkels, swim fins, soft top surfboards, an ocean kayak, and free WiFi.

host.host_about: I have a closet full of hats.  I have an engineer hat, an adventurer hat, a motocross racer hat, a gardener hat, a surfer hat, a mechanic hat, a hiker hat and a skateboarding wrist brace.

reviews.comments: Derek's place was rad. He was very chill, kind and helpful. The house was clean, the room was cute and had its own entrance and access to this huge covered deck with lounges and hammock. We took an awesome nap on that porch and also made music! Derek also gave us permission to use all of his water toys including kayak and snorkeling gear which was a big plus for us out of towners. Wonderful and would stay here again!

Derek and his roommate Richie we're awesome hosts. Their location private and ideal. Very short distance from the beach, and close to all the things you would need. It was awesome to make you so all of their Beach things like the kayak, snorkel and fins, surfboard,  beach towels, and even their beach cruiser bike to get to town. The room was private and comfy and the patio was awesome. Made use of the barbecue and living room area was cozy. Derek was full of recommendations and overall an awesome stay

What a perfect first adventure to Hawai'i. Derek and Rich were so amicable and helpful, it felt like we were staying with friends. Everything was clean and lovely. The room has its own private entrance and a beautiful patio with a hammock that we took full advantage of. Sunset beach is literally steps away. They offered up their own water equipment and Derek even recommended the most affordable car rental app ( (Website hidden by Airbnb) which made our stay that much easier. I couldn't have asked for anything better! Mahalo!

It's your typical north shore beach house. 
The guys are very laid back and relaxed, my room was exactly as they described. 
The shower needs a good clean but other than that was a good spot to stay. Very close to the beach and would happily go back and stay again

We stayed for two days at Derek's place. He is a great host and welcomed us with a super friendly aloha. The house and room are clean, comfortable and we felt very save during the stay. We got fresh beach towels, there was a surfboard, a bike, a kayak, wifi, etc... available to use for us! Access to Sunset Beach is just seconds from the House, and if it is raining (one day of our stay), you can enjoy the evening on the balkony deck in front of the room. 
We can definitely recommend this beautiful place to stay at the north shore of Oahu.
Thank you very much Derek, we had a great stay!
Stayed one night. Great host. Right by the beach! Easy.

Anyone would love staying at Derek's! Woke up to birds chirping and gorgeous views. The house is kept very tidy and anything we needed was  pretty much available to us. I miss it already and want to be back there!!
Derek's place is a perfect place to stay steps away from one of the most iconic beaches i  the world! He is very accommodating and made us feel at home. Would highly recommend staying here.

Derek was a fantastic host. He made sure my trip went smoother than expected, and that I had a pleasant stay. From showing me sunset beach, to teaching me about the joys of surfing Derek made sure that I felt like I was living on the North Shore, Even if only for a day.

The best Airbnb we have been to so far. We felt as very at home at Derek and his roommate were awesome. Derek let us borow his surf boards and snorkelling gear and we were told to stay as long as we wanted to the next day. The best Airbnb!!!!!!
Great little getaway steps from the beach! Derek was a great host and very welcoming. I'd highly recommend this place if you want a place away from all the noise and chaos. ❤️

Yes...Derek was great. 
This is about the 6 or 7th time I've written a review for Derek. ..The Airbnb app is messed up because every time I finished, it wouldn't post. ..Any Derek...The reviews were much better on my earlier tries..haha. .lol

Thank you Derek and Rich. This was our first time trying Airbnb and had a great experience. Derek was very accommodating and made our stay pleasant. Loved the room and access to Sunset Beach. Definitely recommend staying here!!
Good clean, private room just as advertised. Would recommend to someone visiting the North Shore who wants to stay near a beach and wants something relatively inexpensive.

Nous avons passé 2 nuits chez Derek. C est la 1ère fois que nous essayions la formule "chambre privée" nous étions plus habitués au "logement entier". Mais Derek a été un super hôte. Très accueillant. Présent mais aussi très discret. C est vrai que la douche mériterait un petit peu coup de neuf mais la chambre est très bien. Nous avons pu également utiliser le lave linge et sèche linge ce qui est vraiment super pendant ses vacances. Derek avait pris soin de mettre à notre disposition des serviettes de plage, de bain et même des produits beauté !
L'emplacement de la maison est parfait. Au calme. Vous ne verrez pas la mer de votre chambre mais il y a moins de 2minutes entre la plage et votre lit ! Ce qui reste le principal !
Il y a une super boulangerie à moins de 5 minutes à pieds (Teds Bakery) et un paquets de super foodtrucks à 10min en voiture. Si vous aimez le thaïlandais essayer le food truck Éléphant un vrai régal ! 
Et bien sûr spot idéal pour les surfeurs !!!! Bref " Enjoy your stay !! "

This place is fun and easy and close to everything you'd want on Sunset beach.  In short - the best things were new clean towels, the island map on the desk, 2 bikes, deck with hammock, walkscore, very secure feeling location, and obvi the beach access.  We had an awesome stay and Derek was very laid back with good energy.  The room has a private entrance off the big back deck and was clean and had everything we needed.  We used his bikes and there's a fantastic bike trail that's accessed from the neighborhood that will take you to the store, the beach, local restaurants etc.  We walked to Ted's for breakfast just around the corner and beach is literally about 100 steps from the house.  The neighborhood has a very local vibe, is off the main roads but literally in the middle of tons of stuff in all directions.  Derek gave us tips on good places to check out and shared his place - kitchen, living room etc. like an old friend.  Definitely recommend :)

Derek was amazing! great communication about what to expect, day of arrival and updated info and was a joy to chat with when we did arrive. He was welcoming, fun, easy going, and was so chill he took us out for a drive to show us the shoreline and give tips on what to see the next day, including beaches, hikes, food trucks, etc. We took his advice, and his cruiser bikes he let us use, and had the best day of our entire trip exploring the north short and enjoying this amazing beach house. 
Hands down I would stay here again and hope to! I recommend this place and Derek as a host to anyone wanting an authentic, chill and enjoyable visit to the north shore.

Derek was simply amazing! He had everything prepped and ready for me when I arrived, really made me feel like home. The house is literally yards away from the beach and has a wonderful open feel. Fell asleep to sounds of the ocean.
Great North Shore Crash Pad.  Right at Sunset and Velzyland.  Close to everything.    Place is clean for a surf shack.  Derek was cool and helpful.
We really appreciate it. Excellent location.. nice room.. definitely would stay there again

Derek and Rich are cool guys and we liked staying with them. Even better if dishes were cleaned right away to avoid ants in the kitchen. Be aware that the a full size XL bed is only 137cm wide. It was great that they let us use their bikes and surfboards! Thank you!
Great location, close to the beach. Loved borrowing the bikes and riding down the bike path.

Derek is a great host. He takes care of everything and had many tips for excursions, hiking and surfing spots. The room is clean and the bed comfortable. The bathroom ist also clean. The beach is 50 meters away. If you want to stay in north shore I recommend Derek's House.

Perfect place for a solo traveler. Stayed four nights in this beach accessible spot. Quiet neighborhood is conducive for the chilled out traveler looking for a clean and laid back home away from home. Derek is a real cool host and engaging to talk story with. ✌
Great pad, right next to the beach. Derek and Rich were very friendly and helpful. We have a great time on Sunset!!

Derek is awesome! A really nice guy and goes to the effort to make your stay comfortable. His roomate Richie is cool and nice company too. The place is amazing - perfect for a visit to the North Shore. The location is right on Sunset beach, and next to the bike bath too. Loved using the bike and also relaxing on the balcony out the back. Everything was great and would love to come back!
Derek was very welcoming and made us feel at home. Great location on North Shore with a beach located across the road.
Derek was awesome.  Gracious host, and the private room was just what we needed. Close beach access too!
Derek was a wonderful host. This place is at a perfect location if you want to explore north shore. A short drive and you will hit all the nice spots to explore on north shore.

Derek's house was dreamy. Beautiful neighborhood, extremely close to the beach and just Hawaiian heaven. He let us use his bikes (which was awesome) and boards. Gave us clean towels and the room was like staying at a hotel. I would stay there again in a heartbeat. Hopefully I'll see you in New Zealand!!

We absolutely LOVED our stay. Derek is a great host. The house is rustic and completely local and was clean and neat. The room was great and had it's own entrance on the lanai on the back of the house and a good sized closet to stow gear. The location is amazing - quiet street 2 doors down from entrance to the beach. Can't beat it.
Nice room. Derek was not there and because of that his friend Richie was our host. Nice guy. He helped us with dinner and tips.

Thankyou to Derek and Rich for the great time and local knowledge. Awesome location with plenty of parking and close proximity to the beach. We thoroughly enjoyed meeting you and borrowing the surf boards!

Derek's place filled our needs in every way.  The private room was cozy and quiet and the large back lanai was great.  The kitchen and bath are shared with Derek and his roommate Rich. They were both friendly and helpful with loads of suggestions as to activities, eateries, etc.  There is no view from the home, but none is needed with the proximity to Sunset Beach - a few steps and you are there. We enjoyed the sunset from the beach nearly every evening, and met several locals there.  We also took advantage of the bikes and snorkeling gear that Derek had available for our use.
Awesome place and host! Perfect location with beach, bakery nearby and top surf spot - Mahalo Derek
Great location, we loved using the bikes and snorkel gear. Friendly and chill atmosphere. Enjoyed very much!
Had a great experience,felt right at home.(Derek is awesome ).Close to the beach and room is cozy/clean.Definitely will be coming back to stay soon..☺

Derek was an awesome host. He was very accommodating and gave great recommendations for places to eat, beaches to see, and hikes to go on. The location is amazing - steps from the beach, and the bikes were a perfect way to cruise up and down the north shore. Close to food trucks, beaches, sharks cove, and grocery. I would definitely recommend this place, and we would have stayed longer if we could!

Derek's place was perfect. The beach is right across the street. The sunset every evening couldn't be anymore breathtaking. He provided us with towels and sheets and even an extra blanket when it got chilly. We had a private entrance and the space was comfortable. Derek is a great host!! He was generous, compassionate, and truly down to earth...communication was great and he recommended a few good spots to checkout in sunset. I wish I could stay forever!!
Derek's the kind of guy who would never take the last slice of pizza without offering you first. Isn't that all you want in humanity?

The room was great! Derek was out of town when we checked in but walked me through everything on the phone and was extremely helpful. His roommate Rich was very nice and accommodating. The room was exactly like the pictures and the whole house was super clean. Awesome location steps away from the beach entrance. I would highly recommend this room to anyone looking to stay on north shore for a few days!

We LOVED our stay at Derek's place.   It's right on the point with amazing sunsets, Derek was a great host, and even though it was a shared house we felt like we had complete privacy.   There were no waves when we were there but we took advantage of the snorkelling equipment and snorkelled everyday.   We definitely would stay here again but next time in winter so we can surf!!

Derek and his housemate Richie are great! They are both super knowledgeable about fun things to do on the North Shore and around the whole island. I didn't have a car so borrowed the bikes they had and was able to get everywhere I wanted to go on the North Shore. My room was super clean and they have a nice kitchen if you wanted to cook. Make sure you lay in the hammock out on the lanai- it has a great view of the sunset!

House in great location right by the beach. Derek is a very relaxed host and makes you feel at home.  He also allows you to use the snorkling gear and bikes which come in handy. Definitely recommend the Northshore for a few nights and Derek's place is the perfect place to base yourself.

Derek's home was one of the best places we have been. Ever. 
The special north shore feeling lives in this house. Nice porch with a comfi hammock. only 2 min walk to the beach. calm and save neighborhood. Derek is very laid back, communicative and generous. you can borrow his bikes, schnorkeling gear, surf boards and more. we would come back any time!

ﾃﾞﾚｯｸはとても素敵なﾎｽﾄでした｡お互いに予定がありたくさん話せたわけではないですが､親切でﾌﾚﾝﾄﾞﾘｰでした｡
部屋は綺麗に掃除と整頓がされていて快適でした｡そしてﾛｹｰｼｮﾝが特に素晴らしく､歩いて20秒ほどでﾋﾞｰﾁに辿り着くことが出来ます｡部屋からの夕日も綺麗でしたし､広いﾃﾗｽでｿﾌｧに座って飲むﾋﾞｰﾙも良いものでした｡
またﾉｰｽｼｮｱで泊まる時は是非利用させて欲しいと思います｡

Fantastic location if you're really looking to enjoy some beach time. You can walk or bike to some of the best beaches (and food trucks!) on the North Shore. Derek and his roommate Richie are very kind and made me feel welcome.

Derek's place was a great location! He had bikes and snorkeling gear available that was so convenient to use. He was knowledgeable about the area and picked fresh papaya for us to eat. Wish we could go back soon!

Derek's place was awesome! My wife and I traveled to Sunset Beach in mid-September and beaches were perfect for us to relax. We made good use of Derek's ice chest and even cruised down the coast on his bicycles. We had a blast! As for Derek, what can I say that hasn't been said already? He's a super nice guy and he always had great recommendations and advice. What a great host!

Derek's house is right across the street from a portion of Sunset beach.  That is an appropriate name given that you can actually see the sunset from Derek's porch.  The room itself was of decent size. A small table and a closet provide ample space for storage.  You have your own screen door onto a back porch with a hammock for two and other beach furnishings.
Derek recently added more space to his house.  There is a shared bath. But Derek opens his entire house for your use.
 This was our first experience with Airbnb. And we were caught a little off guard by the fact that Airbnb's do not usually include breakfast. That really didn't spoil anything though.
There was a great breakfast bakery within walking distance of Derek's -- I had my first experience there with a Moco loco or is it loco moco.
 Derek was very informative about places to eat and things to do in the general area. He and his roommate which he were great hosts. So on the last evening we were there, we decided to make dinner for the four of us -- me my wife and Derek and his roommate Richie. To be honest it was the highlight of the stay. We had a few beers (if I say so myself great food).  We shared war stories laughed a lot and generally had a great time. All in all Derek and his roommate are great hosts and we recommend them to anybody who wants to have a good time on the North Shore.

Derek was very accommodating to us! We needed to arrive a little late and he was available to show us around when we got there. Parking is easy (safe neighborhood) and location is right next to beach access. We made great use of the bikes; snorkel gear and back porch! 25 min bike ride to sharks cove for snorkeling and Teds bakery is great for breakfast and is right across the street. Highly recommend!
离沙滩非常的近,床一个人没问题,2个比较壮的人可能有点紧｡房间非常的干净,房东非常的热情｡

Everything about this place was perfect. Richie was the one to check me into the room/house, and was very kind and hospitable. Derek was great to get to know, and chat with. He was also nice enough to let me know about the damn Turtle Traffic that occurs and when to watch out for it :)  Felt like life long friends, and the place was wonderful. Hammock for relaxing & reading, the location was PERFECT. 'Ocean view' was true to its word, and it was beautiful. Kitchen was immaculate and gorgeously remodeled, and the lanai was perfect to enjoy the views and weather. I would HIGHLY recommend staying here, if you are looking to enjoy a lovely stay on the North Shore!!!
Amazing experiance!

Derek was cool and the room was everything it was described as. He was accommodating, communicated extremely well and we felt welcome during our short stay. When it says it's nearly on the beach, it means it. Had to bounce super early but we were able to stay as late as necessary to check out. Thanks Derek and Rich, Mahalo

We booked Derek’s last minute on our spontaneous trip to Oahu. He was quick to respond and very accommodating. His home was very cozy, peaceful and just steps away from a favorite surf spot on the north shore. Couldn’t have asked for a better stay. Outdoor shower was great too. Mahalo Derek!

Having walked/biked/bused all from Derek's to Haleiwa and back, I really can't imagine a better location for all of the things I did. It was just steps from Sunset Beach and a few blocks from Ted's Bakery and the bus stop. I didn't have a car so that was pretty important. Though I only used a provided bike once, I regretted not using it more. It made it so much easier to get to food. (I mostly walked the 2.5 miles to all the food trucks, or over to Ted's.) This was a working vacation, so wi-fi and a nice outdoor spot to work was high on my list of must-haves for the trip. The back lanai was perfect! I was able to work from the hammock and take a brief lunch-time nap there as well. And with a door from the bedroom to the lanai,  it was nice to be able to get out there without having to walk through the rest of the house. The room was perfectly comfortable, clean, and included an iron & hair dryer. Derek & Rich were both very friendly and it was good chatting & dining with them. Though it was easily walkable, Derek even drove the 2 blocks to pick me up at the bus stop when it was raining heavily upon my arrival. I'd definitely stay again! I may even go back again for Halloween, their neighborhood really knows how to celebrate. Everyone was dressed up and a lot of the homes were decorated for the holiday.

This house is really near the Sunset Beach, just few steps away. You can see the beach from their lanai  We had a very short but awesome stay here, and we’d really love to go back and stay again here.
Brilliant place to stay! Derek´s hospitality was great and the house is close to the beach.

Derek‘s place is one of the most beautiful places we‘ve ever been to. We felt immediately comfortable the moment we arrived. Derek gave us a lot of advices concerning hikes, tours and things to do, furthermore there is a surf board, 2 bycicles, snorkling equipment and fins we could use for free. The kitchen was very well equipped and it was no problem using anything :-)
The lanais are just stunning, with a gorgeous view over Sunset Beach and another one facing the backyard and garden. To Sunset Beach it‘s only a 1-2min walk and to Haleiwa it‘s just a short drive by car (ca. 15min). So just the perfect location for spending your time at the North Shore!
We can definitively recommend Derek‘s place 100%! :-)

Awesome place to know North Shore. 
Great location: Sunset Beach only 1-2 min walk. In close neighborhood Ted’s Bakery. Kitchen very well equipped and was no problem with using anything. Stunning sunset view from porch. Very good equipment: 2 bicycle, free Wi-fi, snorkel, surfboard ...
Great place. Has views to Sunset from the deck. Lots of space and all the amenities you could hope for. Host is ultra friendly and helpful.
하와이 현지를 느낄수 있어 매우 좋았음~~~

I had the opportunity to stay in both rooms in this air BnB and I’m glad I did! My plans changed for the better and it ended up working out better than expected. Derek’s place is AWESOME! The location is right in the heart of sunset beach and is a short distance to all the local beach parks and food trucks. The bikes are great but I also had a car to get around to further places I wanted to check out. Derek is quick with his responses and was able to answer all of my questions. He makes you feel right at home and so welcome from the second you meet him. He also has great advice on good eats and spots to check out. I can’t wait to go back. Mahalo Derek!
Coolest house and greatest hosts on the north shore hands down, we loved staying at Derek’s , and would definitely book another stay there immediately ! 5 stars all the way . Much aloha !
As advertised, great location - close to the beach and with good options for food nearby; quiet as well. Would definitely stay there again!
Derek was a great host to us and the place was amazing - super close to the beach, super close to the pipeline. Would love to come back!

Derek's place has an awesome location, is clean and comfortable, and is accompanied with plenty of amenities to aid in exploring and having fun on the north shore. The house is right on the point at Sunset, just next to a public beach access, in an tight-nit community. All-around great stay and we enjoyed having a low-touch, well-informed, and well-enabled time on the North Shore.

Had a great stay with Derek! There is a wrap around porch with hammocks with water views, and is steps to a beautiful beach. Room is cozy and has what you need to be comfortable, including snorkels, fins, sunscreen, and towels. If you are looking to get out of the city, I would definitely recommend staying here!

Het verblijf bij Derek was erg prettig. Je hebt een gemeenschappelijke badkamer en keuken, maar wel een fijne eigen kamer. Aan de kamer zit een soort van groot balkon, wat erg prettig is om meer ruimte te ervaren. Derek was erg gastvrij en ook zijn kamergenoot Ritchie was een goede gast. De locatie is prettig, met fietsen ben je overal zo. Daarnaast is er voldoende parkeerruimte mocht je een auto hebben.

No words ... What can I say ... it was ... unbelievable! ;) 
Derek deserves the title of Superhost. Not a minute passed without Derek worrying about my well-being. I can only recommend the accommodation! The apartment is cozy ... except for the pillows on the couch! ;) There is a super great mega Refrigerator ;) ! And the apartment is only a few steps away from the most beautiful sunsets on the sea I have ever seen. Derek and Richi have made my stay at the North Shore an unforgettable experience. What I also really liked was .... Ted's bakery was within walking distance and I could always get pies. :)
Great host, great location.

Very nice place to stay in a great location, just a few meters of Sunset beach. The House was very practical, comfortable and clean. The hosts were very friendly. Bikes, snorkel gear and softboards available for use. I will definitely stay again at Derek’s house!

Awesome host, great location and residence, and reasonably priced too - could not be better. I had an incredible stay. Great spot to come back to each day after exploring all the magic that the North Shore has to offer. The perfect escape!

My husband and I booked this place, and ended up finding a different place to stay after check in. I somehow misread the listing thinking it was an entire place, but it is just a private room with a shared bathroom- I should’ve looked more diligently. I would recommend this for a single male, but not for a couple or family. The bed size looked like a full. The bed was also not very comfortable and loud. It had a shared bathroom, which was clean- but we wanted a private bathroom. It did smell like his roommate was smoking weed in his room next to the bathroom... Derek was very kind and understanding when we cancelled our stay there about 15 minutes after arriving.
Awesome location right next to the beach with friendly hosts and handy beach gear.

Il soggiorno nella casa di Derek & Richi è stato esattamente come ce lo aspettavamo! A due passi dalla spiaggia, dagli splendidi tramonti di Sunset Beach e presso due host davvero gentili e disponibili: semplicemente fantastico! 
La camera con bagno in comune con l'altra camera ospiti era di dimensione modeste, ma con tutti i confort necessari per qualche giorno di relax nella North Shore. Il parcheggio gratuito sotto casa, la possibilità di usare le differenti attrezzature sport e la cucina/lavanderia sono sicuramente dei punti a favore di questa struttura. 
Speriamo di tornare di nuovo alle Hawaii & di poter rifare visita a Derek & Richi nella North Shore! Mahalo!

Dereks place was in a great location right next to the beach. The house was cool, with a big patio, and all the extras you could think of for a memorable stay on the north shore. Surfboards, snorkel gear, bikes etc.
Both Derek and his roommate were super friendly

I enjoyed my stay at Derek's place it was even better than I expected. The kitchen and living area had been renovated which was a nice surprise. The room was comfortable and clean. Above all Derek and his roommate Rich were extremely kind and helpful, with extensive knowledge of the area as well. If you're looking for an amazing spot steps from the most beautiful beach at north shore and a friendly environment to relax in, than this is definitely the place to be. Mahalo!
Awesome location with view of sunset surf brake.  Clean and convenient.

This was my first experience using AirBNB and I didn’t know what to expect. The listing was as described and in an awesome location. Derek was there at check-in to show us our room and his home. We didn’t spend much time at the house as we spent most of our time exploring the North Shore, but the room was a great place to relax and the deck was awesome to just sit on and relax as well.

Derek was a great host for my week in Hawaii.  The place is as described and steps away from the sand.  The bikes came in very handy to get around town and stay out of the coastal traffic.  Derek and Rich were very inviting and laid back which made for a very relaxing stay.  The hammock on the lanai was amazing as you can watch the surf and sunset from there.  I would definitely stay again!

Great place right on the beach with all amenities you need and more! Derek and Richie are great hosts, up for a chat any time or happy to leave you be if that's what you want. So quiet and relaxing there, you may be lucky enough to hear Derek and his mate play the guitar and saxophone together! Great stuff. Would definitely stay again!
Great place near the beach. Derek and his mate are great hosts

Derek was a fantastic host. Super communicative and responsive via cell phone when  setting up arrival time and confirming the reservation. He also had great tips for different spots to check out on the North shore. His space was clean and well maintained. Would highly recommend staying here.

Derek and Richie were very accommodating and quick to respond to any questions I had. They also had really good insight and travel tips when it came to checking out the area. The house is clean and spacious, with a really large and relaxing lanai to relax on when you’re not out exploring the North Shore. Many of the main beaches are also nearby and very accessible right from the front door. The bedroom was clean and the bed was comfortable as well. From check-in to check-out, everything went smooth and without any hiccups. I’d highly recommend staying here to anyone looking to visit the North Shore of Oahu!  Thank you Derek and Richie for an awesome stay!

What an awesome place to get some rest and relaxation. 10sec walk to the beach and a peaceful lanai with multiple hammocks to enjoy the sunshine, peace and quiet of the area. Great amenities exactly as described, was able to use the bike(s) to get around the north shore. Derek and Richie were extremely hospitable, will definitely be staying again!

We loved this cute little place. We loved the lenai and the hammocks. It is very blissful just laying on the hammock and resting. You get out of the house and you are in the beach already. Derek and Richie are very friendly. The place is next to some amazing beaches and views in North Shore. Definitely recommend them.

Derek’s place was great. It’s right at the beach, and he has many toys for the water (goggles, fins, board etc.). The room is chill and peaceful with a large lanai, and hammock! His hospitality is that of a friends - welcoming. Whether you prefer your privacy or like to mingle the option is yours. Very helpful in all our questions. Well rounded, cool guy.

Dereck was very pleasant and welcoming. It has been a pleasure to stay in his house.
Everything was clean and the house is very well placed. We highly recommend this locoation and we will come back with pleasure :)

Derek is a great host, friendly and helpful. We were able to use the large kitchen, which was recently remodeled. We were lucky not to have to share a bathroom since the second rental bedroom wasn't rented.  Parking was more convenient on the street due to difficulty maneuvering  our large car inside the gate. Location was convenient, very close to Ted's Bakery (5 min. walk) and Sunset Beach (10 min. walk).

We had a lovely 2 night stay at Derek's but I could have easily stayed longer!
The place is really comfortable, in a quiet neighbourhood and right at the end of a beautiful beach. We really enjoyed using the cruisers to explore the local area.
We only met Derek briefly as he was going away but he was super friendly and lots of great tips. His flat mate Richie was around and was equally friendly and accommodating.
Would definitely recommend this place.
nice location
Very nice location of this home. It was right on the beach literally. We loved how spacious the place felt , and being able to play with kitty who lives on the porch! thanks so much
Great location and great room. It has everything for a great time at the beach and the beautifull North Shore. Surf, snorkel, sup gear also available.

Derek’s place was in a great location and he was a great host. A block away from both sunset beach (which you can see from the deck) and Teds Bakery.  Had bikes and snorkeling gear that you can use - which was awesome to bike along the north shore biking path and to various hiking/beach/snorkeling locations (such as the pillbox hike, snorkeling at sharks cove, Waimea and sunset beaches). Had a great deck out back and front with hammocks - and you can play with his cute kitten as well! Also had great tips for where to hike and eat. Great stay and would stay again!

To stay in Dereks place was amazing. His hospitality, the beautiful place next to the beach and the feeling of beeing welcomed and at home was great! If I come back, I will definitely stay again on this place!

Derek's place was lovely! Outstanding cleanliness, the room was so cozy with a screen door out to a beautiful porch. It is so close to everything, and a nice neighborhood. Derek was very friendly, so accommodating and patient! He had mask, snorkel, fins, noodles, beach chairs we used. He also has a fridge for guests to use. There were surf boards available too! I would stay at Derek's again and would highly recommend his place to friends.  A plus his is sweet kitten Sprocket.
Chill vibes. Fun activities (beach, bikes, snorkels). Great back porch and grill. Everything was fantastic and exceeded expectations.

Derek was a fantastic host. He is very pleasant and courteous. I spent most of my time in the hammock, enjoying the sounds of this beautiful island. A hurricane warning happened to be coming when I was there and he made sure to keep me updated and safe. I traveled alone and didn't know what to expect but I never felt insecure about my accommodations.  I would recommend this place to anyone who wants to be close to the beach, relax in a hammock on the lanai, or take advantage of the surf.

Derek's place is absolutely amazing. It is literally steps away from sunset beach. The room was nice and clean and the house was spotless. There's a great restaurant called Ted's Bakery across the road that I'd highly recommend as well.
Everything was great. Very comfy and clean room. Best location directly by the beach, everything else just a nice bike ride away.  Super open and friendly hosts, thanks for making me feel welcome!

Great place to enjoy the north shore! We had a very relaxing stay at Derek‘s house, which is really located right next to sunset beach in a calm neighbourhood! We could use the bikes, which was very cool and the hammock on the lanai was great as well! Derek was a wonderful host and gave us many advices, thanks again so much! We will definitely recommend this place!

Amazing place with super chill hosts (plus a cute kitty). The house is surrounded by huge deck/lanai that I found myself spent most of my time there when I wasn’t out exploring. You can outlook the sunset beach from the front deck! Derek and Rich are very friendly and helpful. There are bikes, snorkeling gears, and boards to use. Nothing can beat the easy and short access to the beach. Will def come back! Thanks!!

Derek's place was perfect.  What a perfect, quiet location north shore.  he & his roommate were very helpful with local tips.  The perfect shared space set up...nothing fancy but exactly what you'd want from a surfer type beachfront property.  I'll be back.  thanks guys!
We had the best time in Oahu! The beach was right around the corner of Derek's place, and we could take the bikes to get around! Derek is a super super host, we'd come back anytime!

We really liked Derek and his roommate! Great guys! Prime location in north shore Oahu and they have equipment like snorkling stuff and paddle boards you can borrow. 

Few things I was a little disappointed with is the two rooms.”, bathroom and fridge  that are for Airbnb guests are a little unkept and not as appealing to the eye and for the price point, I expected a little more. Luckily for us we didn’t have to share the bathroom but normally they say the bathroom is shared which was another thing I wasn’t expecting. Just needs a few nicer touches to make it feel more welcoming and maybe some touch ups to maintain the Airbnb.
Derek's place was outstanding. Literally steps off of Sunset Beach, the location was outdone only by Derek's hospitality.
Hospitality, privacy, and a great location as a base to see the sights of the area.

Derek is great guy and enjoyed conversation. Even though I accidentaly parked wrong place and got trouble with neighbours, he settled down immediately. His hospitality during stay was awesome. Worth to revisit.
Amazing location near the beach with beautiful view off the deck of the waves at Sunset Beach

I wish I could give this place more stars. I wish we had left the city earlier and stayed here at Derek’s longer! Perfect location literal steps from beach, amazing house/room/patio/kitchen, everything your Hawaii trip should be. Can’t say thank you enough for the genuine kindness and hospitality. We will be back for sure! (Also completely locates to restaurants/market/food trucks - really don’t bother staying anywhere else!
Derek’s north shore house is a gem. 100% recommend the experience of staying there

We had a great time at Derek’s place. Although it’s a shared space, there is a separate entrance to the guest rooms and a private deck. Location was amazing, right next to the beach and we loved staying on the north shore. Great conversations with the host and we would definitely come back! Thanks again!

This place is great.  Exactly as billed and more. The room is tight, private, and all you need.  The house is clean and open. There are decks behind your room looking at at the mountain (with hammock) and in front (with hammock) overlooking sunset through the trees.   I was lucky enough to be there when it was 3-5FT (not 10-15) so quite enjoyed the surf but if I was there on a big day would have had front row seats.
Nice and cosy room. Really big and great house almost directly on the beach. Derek wasn't at home, but his roommate Richie was a very very nice host. We would definitely come again!

Derek's place is the perfect getaway on the north shore. Very close to the beach, where you can spot surfers in the sunset. Ted's bakery is just around the corner and you can take the bikes for easy access to places like the pipeline or food trucks for a delicious dinner. Sleeping with open windows facing the garden the breeze in the jungle leave put us to sleep.

What a nice stay!  Just like the reviews.  Derek was away but Richie was a fabulous host - thoughtful, considerate, informative....  Our only challenge was deciding whether to hang out on the front or back deck!!  Would definitely stay here again.
Derek’s place is a true Gem! Fantastic location and an awesome host. We are already excited to book our next trip and stay with him again.
Dereks place was great.. steps from the beach! highly recommend

name: Chic Queen Bed in 5 Star Location!
summary: Spacious Rooftop Terrace in a Cosmopolitan Suburb. Close to Centenial Park, Right on Oxford st! Close to Paddington Pubs, Restaurants & shops, 15min walk to Central CBD &  15min bus to Bondi Beach. You'll love the apartment which is artfully decorated & the only one (1st floor of townhouse) so very peaceful & private.  I pride myself on giving my guests the best value for money, as that’s what I look for in my air bnbs when I travel too!  Can’t wait to welcome you to Sydney :)
space: Cute rustic apartment with modern interiors, Well styled room with sunlight and a super comfortable queen bed (electric blanket) with organic cotton sheets. Sunny & leafy balcony with French door entry, Split level single apartment. A maximum of 2 guests only. The location is EVERYTHING being right next door to the City or Bondi Beach! Our neighbours include 10 William St, Paddo Inn, The Paddington, Fred's, St Peter's & The London, these are all great venues for going out being on your doorstep! We are also 5min walk to shopping location "The Intersection"... I promise you will love Paddington as much as I do
