Close to Paddington Pubs, Restaurants & shops, 15min walk to Central CBD &  15min bus to Bondi Beach. You'll love the apartment which is artfully decorated & the only one (1st floor of townhouse) so very peaceful & private.  I pride myself on giving my guests the best value for money, as that’s what I look for in my air bnbs when I travel too! Our neighbours include 10 William St, Paddo Inn, The Paddington, Fred's, St Peter's & The London, these are all great venues for going out being on your doorstep! We are also 5min
neighborhood_overview: Paddington is one of the oldest and dearest suburbs in Sydney! Most comparable to London's, Notting Hill or New Yorks, East Village it really is a top cosmopolitan location with some of Australia’s BEST restaurants & fashion boutiques right next door! We also have a great local market across the road every Saturday & 5 minute walk from Sydney Vegan market on a Sunday. Not to mention only a minute walk away from Centenial park, and a 24hr Gym across the road too
notes: Smoking available outside only (balcony) Be kind to our pets (Cat) Kitty litter is kept outside I work full time so the apartment will be mostly free No more construction in the area  PLEASE NOTE- Large main bedroom will be on offer to guests as of December (currently decorating) at no extra cost!
transit: 1 mins walk from a 24hr bus line! (Bus # 333 Circular Quay to Bondi Beach) 10 mins from train stations. Taxi friendly or just walk.
access: Full access to all amenities- including NBN WIFI, Netflix, Apple TV  Also I have a Scooter  that is available for day hire if you have a valid International riders license! Our place is a 10min ride to the beach
interaction: I am available for all questions and recommendations via email or phone, if not in the appartment myself... looking forward to welcoming you to Sydney! :)
house_rules: I’m easygoing, but do ask that you respect what you use in the apartment and clean up after yourself in regards to the Kitchen & Bathroom. Please recycle your rubbish! If there’s this symbol ♻️ it recycles.  Any lost keys will incur a charge.  Strictly 2 guests.  Looking forward to welcoming you here at "Axford Arthouse"!

host.host_about: Travel girl with a free spirit:)

reviews.comments: It was lovely to meet Jessica, she was an amazing host! The apartment was clean and comfortable. The location was great, with Paddington's amazing restaurants and shops just on our doorstep. Jessica was very friendly and helpful and we're definitely planning on staying here again next time we're in Sydney!

Jessica is a genuinely kind hearted person. She made me and my boyfriend feel welcome and helped us in the ways that she could.  She also collects art and has excellent taste, so her flat is absolutely adorable! We stayed 5 nights, and everything was comfortable. There's even an electric blanket in the bed. Paddington is a very nice neighborhood mainly of boutique shopping on the main road. Centennial Park is also a 10 minute walk away, so we took advantage of that. I've been in many a Airbnb, and I definitely recommend Jessica and her flat!
Gorgeous host and such a lovely comfortable room. Very flexible with my arrival.

Jessica is a great host! Amazing location of the place, wonderful accommodations. Seriously, if you're visiting Sydney I highly recommend staying with Jessica. In between the city and the beach. Amazing!

1.房間無對外窗有點悶熱,跟房東借電風扇有所改善,但夏季可能會非常熱
2.有天窗可以引進自然光,因此白天光線很好,當然也不可能睡太晚｡
3.因為直接睡在房東原本的房間,因此房東會睡在客廳的沙發,所謂會提供的洗衣機等配備都不方便使用,連晚上上廁所都要擔心吵到房東｡
4.wifi連線很順暢
5.住宿的幾天附近都有人在施工,因此有點吵｡
6.餐廳有貓飼料等,因此有蠻明顯的貓味道｡
7.距離paddington Saturday market很近
8.房間衣櫃不能使用,且空間小,行李箱一打開就沒有空間可行走
9.有蟑螂
A beautiful, clean and cosy place in a nice and convenient neighbourhood. Jessica is a very friendly and helpful host. We enjoyed our stay here!

It was my first experience with airbnb and I am glad that my host was Jessica, who is a great host! 
And it is true - it is 5 star location place - it is walk away from Hide Park, Opera House, Harbour Bridge, Royal Botanic Garden. I would definitely recommend Jessica´s place.

Staying at Jessica's was great value for money and in a top location! A clean and tidy place and Jessica was lovely.
Thanks for having us!

Jessica's place was lovely! She was so easy to communicate with and accommodating. The bed was super comfortable and had such nice sheets! She provided us with towels and had some lovely complimentary tea and cookies. Jessica was able to recommend many great local spots and made us feel very welcome. I totally recommend if you're looking for a nice spot to stay!
Lots of stairs. No windows but has ample natural skylights.  The neighborhood is trendy with great transportation access.

We stayed at Jess' place over the Easter break and it was a great spot in Paddington with lots of nice bars, shops and restaurants near by. It's just around the corner from the bus stop which has buses running to the city centre and also to Bondi. Jess was friendly and helpful and made us feel welcome during our stay.
Jessica is a nice person! She gave us a lot of useful suggestion! Cats are quiet and cute. Thanks!

Jessica was a lovely host! Despite her being unwell while I stayed there I could always rely on her to help me out with anything around the flat, awesome restaurant and sightseeing recommendations and just generally pleasant company :) The cats were lovely and very affectionate. I definitely felt at home at Jessica's flat. Extremely well located for buses to take you to either Bondi or central Sydney, as it's basically halfway in between. I walked to Mrs McQuarries point one day and it took just over an hour to do so, buses take 10-15 minutes to central. Paddington itself is a cute neighbourhood with some nice places to eat/drink/shop nearby. Quite a few steps to take up to the flat just for anyone who might have issues with that, I didn't. Really enjoyed my stay at Jessica's flat highly recommend it!
Great location, comfy clean bed and great value. Jess is a lovely, friendly, helpful host.
Jessica has a funky Paddo pad in the middle of everything Sydney has to offer. Perfect Sydney stay.
Jessica is so amazing ! She is so sweet and it is in a great location
Very basic but great value for money if you spend most of your time out and about. Host was lovely and accomodating.
Great place to stay! Very clean and comfortable. Good location and some great eating options around.

Jessica était à Paris mais très bon accueil avec sa maman, des cookies chauds, et un chat adorable. Très bon emplacement au coeur de Paddington.
La porte ouverte toute la nuit pourrait peut être être remplacée par une chatière en hiver ? Wifi un peu inconstant.
On recommande ce logement.
The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Jessica very kindly accepted our last minute booking - she was very welcoming and her flat is a lovely little place tucked away in Paddington, which has some greats shops and bars and a market and is very well-connected with the CBD.
However, we did have some trouble sleeping due to construction noise and paint smells coming through the floorboards, as there was a shop being fitted on the floor below. Jessica had said there might be mess downstairs at the entrance to the flat, but didn't mention that the work had been continuing late into the night. We raised the issue with Jessica during our stay, and hoped she would be understanding when we requested a partial refund after our departure. Unfortunately, this wasn't the case and we had to work with airbnb to resolve the issue.

This trip was very special because I used to  live in Paddington. Jessica's place is in heart of Paddington. It was bit hard to find at first but she was guiding us specifically through messages. Bedroom was neat , tidy and stylish. Had such a great time and thanks to Jessica for suggesting nice places. :)

My stay was very enjoyable - everything was clean and the room I stayed in was comfortable  - everything worked in the kitchen and bathroom and wi-fi was dependable. Jessica was quick to answer any questions I had, both before my stay and during, and she has a nice welcoming personality!  The area is a big plus, with a trendy feel, lots of eateries, shops and points of interest.  It was easy to get around from there.  My high expectations from previous reviews were met.

A cozy little place with artsy decorations. Location is perfect being right above the Paddington shoplots, and easy access to the CBD by the bus stop nearby. The room is clean and comfortable, but may get rather hot during summer. Wi-Fi is a plus, and overall very much great for value!

Stayed at Jessica's place for 5 nights. The room was spacious, clean and had everything I needed. 
Quite stylish and practical!
Great location to Bondi and close to bus stops.
Would recommend this place!
Great stay in the perfect location!

Stayed here for a week during NYE and really enjoyed it! The place is in a really good location, walking distance from lots of shops and cafes. The room was great, very comfortable and clean, and we ended up using the kitchen which was quite helpful. Overall, we had a lovely time here and would definitely recommend to anyone!
Nous y sommes restés 5 jours avec mon compagnon. La localisation de l'appartement est vraiment bien. À 15 mn de bondi et à 10 mn du centre par des bus directs. La chambre est spacieuse et propre.

Quirky place in nice location. Noisy - particularly if you're not from a big city. Standoffish host. 

Incident where I was shouted at and accused of trying to watch her do her feet. W hen actually as I was walking to the bathroom, the host was holding her foot up - very much like patients, in my profession - do to show me their injury/ailment/complaint. Therefore, I paused momentarily - about to ask if everything was alright. Got shouted at - totally uncalled for.

The location is perfect, close to everything (between Bondi beach and the Opera house). There is a bus stop very close to have easily access to everything. It’s a lovely place, comfy and Jessica was always there if we had any question. It’s a good place to stay during your holiday.
The apartment is really well located. The bus stop is close to the apartment so you can quickly and easily go to the center and Bondi Beach. Jessica was a very friendly and helpful host.

Characterful, clean and friendly AirBnB in a cool and designer part of Sydney. Easy to access the CBD or beaches and great set up in the room.

Nice touch with the provision of good coffee and breakfast as well

I definitely enjoyed my stay at here. Room is clean and cozy, house is beautiful and artistic, location is convenient, host is  really friendly and great. For me, can’t say anything bad about here!! Perfect!!
It is a lovely room in a really good spot of Sydney. Jessica gave me so many tips from what to see to where to go to party.
Jessica was welcoming and quick to respond to any questions we had. We loved our stay and the location. Easy transport to wherever! We really enjoyed our stay. Highly recommend!

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
Raygs and Camila are simply wonderful.  From the time I booked, they were in regular communication and offered to help every step of the way, including arranging a private car service to/from airport.  If I had any questions about the room, they would return message right away. 

The apt is located in a very well situation place, only about 10 min walk to Copacabana and 5 min walk to Ipanema. The busy Genenral Osorio metro stop's exit D is literally at the doorstep of the apt.  There's just so many things to do in this neighborhood. Everything is walking distance, there are restaurants, bars, supermarkets, and shops galore.  It is also a safe neighborhood and you always see locals walking around.  Note, do your part and be alert - don't walk around displaying expensive gear or wander into unknown neighborhoods.

The Inside is compact and makes very efficient use of space, suitable for 1 or 2 people to stay comfortably.  The unit has recently been completed gutted and renovated. As such, the it is spic and span clean and everything was brand spanking new. EVERYTHING. The amenities are wonderful - the room has modern fixtures and furniture, rain shower (so nice!!) with mood lighting, a small but functional kitchenette with a small fridge, water filteration machine for drinking water, Nespresso machine, microwave, oven, pots + pan, glass, bowls, plates, cuttery and silverware. Leave everything at home b/c you will not need it! There's even a combo washer/dryer machine.  There is a flatscreen TV with cable and there's even a bluetooth enabled Harmon Kardon speaker system. It is LOUD and BASSY (keep your neighbors in mind lol). The bed is a pullout bed that will comfortably sleep two adults. It's not a cheap, creaky mattress but very supportive and a bit on the firm side (which I like).  There's also a small vacuum cleaner if you're like me and like to keep the floor debri-free.

I would not hesitate to stay here again.  It is not beachside like one may first look for but the convenience of being right next to a subway stop, a busy neighborhood that's right in the middle of two very famous beaches is insanely nice. It's not just the beach however; the beautiful lake, Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas (aka "Lagoa") is also nearby and I went for running there around the track. 

Lastly, special thanks to Raygs and Camila for making me feel so welcomed during the Olympic games and being so helpful at all times.  They are extremely friendly, attentive, responsive, and responsible.

Obrigado and until next time!

Nossa estadia no loft foi excelente ! 

Primeiramente o loft é decorado e cuidado com extrema atenção aos detalhes. Nos surpreendeu como tudo foi pensado para dar uma experiencia diferenciada para o hóspede. Como muitos predios em Copacabana, o edíficio é antigo, mas o loft encanta pelo padrão muito superior. 

Dificil dizer o que é melhor, o som alta fidelidade, o chuveiro de alta pressão, o wifi de alta velocidade, colchao especial, a roupa de cama, talheres, fechadura eletronica, tudo funciona e de altíssima qualidade.

A localização é muito conveniente, em frente a estaçao do metro, e para nós que fomos para Olimpiada, perfeito. Entre Copacabana e Ipanema, então não precisa ser dito muito sobre isso.

Agora, o que foi realmente diferencial foi a atenção que o Raygs e Camila deram antes, durante e depois. Eles não se limitam a alugar o espaço tão bem cuidado, fazem questão que a experiencia toda seja legal, e foi, muito. O Rio é um lugar especial, e vocês fazem que os hóspedes se sintam em casa. Vocês estão de parabens e desejo muito sucesso porque merecem.
Abraços e obrigado.

Sem palavras para expressar o quanto fui surpreendido positivamente em todos os aspectos da minha estádia.
O loft é simplesmente perfeito, lindo, pensado em cada detalhe cuidadosamente, todos os equipamentos novos exatamente igual as fotos, o prédio é um tanto antigo e os elevadores deixaram um pouco a desejar, mas está localizado em um lugar super estratégico, com estação de metrô na porta e próximo das praias. 
O Raygs foi extreeeeeeeemamente atencioso e nos surpreendeu com todos os mimos. Super Recomendo e voltarei mais vezes com toda certeza. Obrigado.

A localização do Loft é exatamente em frente ao metrô, o proprietário é muito atencioso, e se mostrou disponível em todos os momentos e quanto ao  ambiente.. dispensa comentários! melhor que nas fotos.
Recomendo a todos, o local e perto d tudo, o loft é lindo, limpo e aconchegante! Estou encantada até agora! Super prestativo! Voltarei mais vezes.
Local limpo, bem estruturado, charmoso. O anfitrião responde rápido e é muito solicito. Recomendo!
Impecable...cerca de copa cabana y playas importantes...recomiendo usar uber en rio
Raygs was an excellent host, quick to respond and helpful with tips on places to visit during our stay. The apartment was exactly as advertised and his loft space was great for the two of us!
Very friendly! Excellent Communication!
Exelente todo , el anfitrión simpre para lo que se necesite y ayudo en todo tipo de consulta. Sin dudas que lo recomiendo
Great host and apt.
Apartment was exactly as advertised, I liked almost everything and entire stay was smooth.

Raygs foi muito solicito em todos os momentos, o espaço é conforme o anunciado, quanto à localização é privilegiado sendo muito fácil o acesso aos principais pontos para turismo, com toda certeza voltaríamos a nos hospedar.
Lovely chic home. 100% recommended

A estadia foi muito boa no apartamento do Raygs. O apartamento é muito bem equipado e charmoso. O Raygs foi muito atencioso o tempo todo, dando muitas dicas de passeios, bares e (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza, recomendo o apartamento do Raygs e certamente quando retornar ao Rio, gostaria de me hospedar novamente nele.

Ótima hospedagem. Loft super bem equipado e com comodidades que não te fazem querer sair de casa. O loft fica em uma ótima localização, entre Copacabana e Ipanema, pertinho do mar e da lagoa. O Raygs é super prestativo e atencioso. Enfim, altamente recomendada a hospedagem para aproveitar tudo que o RJ tem de bom.

The Loft was AMAZING! This was my first experience in Copacabana/Ipanema/Rio! 

Raygs and Camila went above and beyond welcoming me and making this experience flawless! They started out by giving me information on local sites, a recommended itinerary, and video instructions on the loft and its amenities. 

While I embarked on my 4 days in Rio I utilized many of the recommendations including the places to eat, the driver for pick up @ the airport and getting to activities, and the referral for paragliding (a must do)! Their help on this last minute paragliding was unforgettable and made the experience truly epic!

I appreciated being introduced to the neighbor who was so helpful and gave all the information I needed to use the washer, fan, dryer, Bluetooth connections etc! I loved the sound system! 

I was thankful for the USB ports and the US plugins! Was able to charge all my devices without any problems! 

The water filter was nice and the Nespresso machine was easy to use! They even had welcome snacks!  I ate them all! 

I couldn’t have asked for a better place to stay during my 4 days in Brazil! The communication was excellent and I had no problems coming or going and navigating the area! 

Uber and Taxis are easy to use (we used Uber almost all the time) and they come right away! This is a safe neighborhood and I loved the cultural experience right when you enter the streets! My friends who were also staying in the area loved my place and said they would definitely stay there next time they come to visit Rio! 

If you are looking for a centralized location in this area - book this place! You won’t regret it! Raygs and Camila are AWESOME!
Atento, cordial, amable. Siempre respondiendo a las inquietudes con rapidez y aconsejando en todo momento. Lo volvería a elegir si dudas. Muchas gracias raygs!! Solo agradecimiento para con vos!!

Raygs was amazing. The apartment is very clean, excelent neiborhood and had all amenities. Thanks for the extra beers, Nespressos and soap. I just would like to highlight that the carpet near by the bed (was my falt that I did not noticed before). I am allergic and this was an issue to me (besides the place was super clean). Overall a great experience. Thanks!
Perfect apartment to stay for the weekend

A estadia com o Raygs foi simplesmente espetacular. Desde as solicitações pré check-in até o Check Out. Tudo incrível. O loft consegue ser ainda melhor do que nas fotos . Eu e meu noivo nos sentimos em casa, tamanho aconchego. Há vários mimos para o hóspede, coisa que até então só havia visto antes com outro anfitrião. Absolutamente tudo é de extremo bom gosto, qualidade e modernidade. O deslocamento é o mais fácil possível. Utilizamos muito a plataforma e sem medo de errar é um se não o melhor Airbnb que já nos hospedamos.

Wir buchten die Unterkunft ab dem nächsten Tag erst spät abends, und haben bis zum nächsten Mittag kurz vorher der Check in Zeit nichts von dem Gastgeber gehört. Erst nachdem ich ihn zweifach angeschrieben habe.
Nachdem wir aber dann via Self-check in im Apartment waren, verlief die Kommunikation wunderbar.
Wir haben unseren Aufenthalt sogar verlängert. Für zwei Personen war das Apartment groß genug, zu viert wäre es mir persönlich zu klein, außer vielleicht für einen kurzen Wochenendtrip. Das wifi funktioniert sehr gut.
Die Lage war für uns sehr gut. 
Alles weitere war mit Uber zu erreichen, was ich absolut empfehlen würde, da die Fahrer bewertet und die Fahrt getrackt wird.
Das gibt einem ein wenig Sicherheit.
Ich kann es nur empfehlen, tatsächlich so gut wie nichts beispielsweise mit an den Strand zu nehmen. Uns wurden die Flipflops gestohlen, während wir daneben lagen :-/
Aber ich finde die Stadt beeindruckend und ich habe selten in Südamerika so gut gegessen wie in Rio.
Wir wollen auf jeden Fall wiederkommen.

Experiência muito superior ao que imaginava. O host é incrivelmente interessado em deixar sua estadia a mais confortável possível. Recebemos dicas da cidade, um guia para utilizar melhor o loft.. que é um espetáculo à parte. Limpo, moderno e aconchegante, lencois e toalhas brancas cheirosas, sistema de som e tv completo, o banheiro é modernissimo com sistema que muda as cores por um app.. a localização não poderia ser melhor: no final de uma ruazinha residencial mas com uma entrada literalmente em frente ao condominio para a Estacao General Osorio. Fica prox da praia, de bares, da pra andar á pé.. voltarei mais vezes certamente! Melhor host e melhor loft que fiquei no rio!

Raygs é uma pessoa incrível, sempre pronto a ajudar, respondendo muito rapidamente as mensagens! Não tive contratempos, localização muito boa, entre Copacabana e Ipanema. Certamente voltarei. Obrigado pela estadia Raygs, que me deixou ficar um pouco mais de horas no checkout já que não tinha hóspede pro dia!!!

A estadia superou todas as minhas expectativas, o apartamento é maravilhoso, aconchegante e bem localizado. A moça do apartamento da frente está frequentemente a disposição e é muito prestativa. A localização é maravilhosa, ficando apenas a 5 minutos a pé da praia de Copacabana e literalmente na porta de uma estação de Metrô. Literalmente o meu único problema foi que o apartamento era tão confortável que eu não tinha vontade de sair dele.
The loft is very cute and convenient! We loved staying there! There is everything at the loft

Raygs é extremamente profissional e hospitaleiro. Buscou atender às nossas necessidades e foi atencioso nos detalhes. 
A localização é excelente: metrô e Itaú Bike na frente do prédio. 
Internet muito boa, smart tv e Netflix para curtir nos momentos de descanso. 
Banho renovador. 
Agradecemos de coração

If you like style, this cosy loft/apartment is perfect  especially for the price, I was very impressed with it. The beach is 10 minutes away, all the shops and restaurants are very close by also! Raygs was incredibly responsive to any requests!
Thank you!

this place would have received 5 stars from me. but unfortunately I could only leave 3. here was what went wrong. there was a bug infestation in the bathroom shower the first 2 nights when we arrived. we closed all windows but at night there were HUNDREDS of flies. after 2 nights of contacting the host and sending him photos he finally sent someone over to fix this and kill and clean all the bugs. bugs have bacteria and diseases and this was not sanitary. 2nd issue, the toilet seat was old and looked dirty with stains. gross. the host replaced the new seat the next morning. 3rd thing, the walls look used with stains and marks everywhere. it looked like this place was not kept and maintained well for over a year. the host said he would repaint when we left. for all those issues, we  would have booked a 4  star hotel for the same price  with included breakfast. we felt completely ripped off. he didn't  even offer a partial refund for  these issues. here is what was good about the place. check in was easy, and the location is decent. the host is very responsive and fixed most of the issues as best he could . a partial refund would have been appreciated. I am a host myself and whenever an issue arises I always provide partial refund to my guests.

Excepcional! Já usei Airbnb em grandes cidades do mundo e nunca encontrei o que Raygs disponibiliza. Ótima localização e alto nível de atendimento, apartamento impecável. Impossível dar destaques, porque teria que listar todos os itens disponíveis, que são espetaculares. 
Voltarei muitas vezes!!!

Apartamento muito bem localizado , limpo e aconchegante . Varias opções nas redondezas . Amenities de chegada dão um toque especial e a atenção do Raygs com o plus da Daniela (vizinha de frente) complementam . Volto com certeza .

Incredible studio apartment in excellent location! 

Over the past 5 years I’ve rented several apartments in Ipanema and Copacabana and had a wonderful time in all of them, but Raygs’ apartment went beyond my expectations in many ways. 

The location is great for those wanting to enjoy both Ipanema and Copa! The apartment is modern with everything you need and beyond. 

The shower was a nice surprise with a strong flow of water for a nice comfortable shower after the beach. The kitchen is compact but thoughtfully designed to hold everything you need. 

There is a nespresso machine which I appreciated very much! 

There is also a water purifying system that delivers ice cold water so there is no need for buying bottled waters and polluting the environment. 

Bed and pillows were comfy and super clean! 

WiFi was powerful which makes life easier for those traveling on roaming phones. 

As for the host, Raygs was incredible and very accommodating. He communicated well and made sure I was comfortable and had an open line of communication with him for whatever I needed. That makes a huge difference for travelers, especially the ones traveling from abroad and may need a bit more help.

Thank you Raygs for a great stay.

O apartamento do sr. Raygs é como nas fotos, impecável! Foi projeto para ser extremamente funcional, cada cantinho pensado nos mínimos detalhes. Cama boa, cozinha eficiente, tudo limpo, banheiro ótimo! Consegui um check in antecipado por ter chegado cedo ao Rio de Janeiro e isso foi de extrema importância para nós. Sempre pronto a ajudar via (Hidden by Airbnb) , qualquer dúvida é só chamá-lo. 

Indico e voltarei com certeza!!!
Ambiente extremamente moderno, estiloso e muito bem organizado! Ótima localização, bem próximo a praia! Ragys é muito atencioso e zeloso com tudo! Recomendo muito esse lugar!

As pessoas que optarem por este Loft vão se surpreender com a limpeza e os cuidados que o anfitrião tem.
Tudo bem organizado e de muito bom gosto, tudo pensado nos mínimos detalhes.
Tudo que que nos foi indicado como roteiro, foi top!!!!!!
Parabéns Raygs, estava tudo maravilhoso!!!!!!!!
Obrigado

name: Super Studio in Wailea, Maui.
summary: My place is close to Wailea, Maui  hotels, beaches and golf courses. You’ll love my place because it's a very inexpensive way to stay in the best place on earth. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
description: My place is close to Wailea, Maui  hotels, beaches and golf courses. You’ll love my place because it's a very inexpensive way to stay in the best place on earth. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

reviews.comments: The cando is so cozy, informations that Mark gave us were clear & detail. My family had a nice vocation, Thank you :)
You can find a lovely studio in an upscale neighborhood. It is clean and neat.
Very convenient location—walk to shops and restaurants. Nicely maintained and comfortable for our small family.  Seamless check in and check out.

This place is great! We especially enjoyed the balcony every day, with a beautiful view of the garden and the happy sounds of the birds. This location is private, peaceful, and serene. Everything was clean and beautiful. Would definitely like to stay here again!
This is an outstanding studio! Great location and walking distance to everything.  The pools are great as well!  Fully Recommend this place!

I had such a great stay at Mark's place. It was me and my boyfriend and the studio felt more spacious than the pictures. It had amenities that I hadn't even thought about, like a hairdryer, iron, washer and dryer. There was no stove top, but there was a hot plate in the cabinets and some pots and pans. The location was great! So close to the Wailea Shopping Center and other big resorts. I wouldn't hesitate to book Mark's place again when we come back to the area.
Perfect place to stay in Wailea

It is a lock off studio unit on the ground floor at a reasonable price compared to other units in the complex. However expect possible unpleasant noise from the guest staying next door that is attached to your unit or from the people above you. It’s a bright corner studio with plenty of natural light but everything is in original condition and could be updated. The set up for the internet is located in the next door unit and you need to deal with the next door guests and cable company yourself if anything goes wrong. It shouldn’t be set up this way and the owner should deal with the problem when it occurs. Other than the above the owner was very responsive and tried to be helpful.

name: 5*Super host Apartment+terrace  8 min from Ramblas
space: My apartment is very bright with lots of sun and a splendid terrace with a table for 4 people for breakfast , or anything you want to do ... It is a perfect place to relax in an atmosphere of silence ... ( Sun shines 340 days a year ) jjjj The apartment is a penthouse 5th floor , but there is a lift We have 2 wonderful rooms : - A room with a large window (natural light and sun) direct access to the terrace + very comfortable double bed super comfortable   , a wardrobe where you can store your clothes and belongings .... also air conditioning and central heating .. . - A living room  with a super comfortable convertible sofa bed ... easy to  open and fold !!! room have cable TV , air conditioning and central heating, beautiful wood table for 4 people ... the room has plenty of natural light and sunshine, with direct access to the terrace... ( super good ! !) - The bathroom is completely clean ,(super important for me and mi people) with shower and bath, toilet complete with everything
description: My apartment is very bright with lots of sun and a splendid terrace with a table for 4 people for breakfast , or anything you want to do ... It is a perfect place to relax in an atmosphere of silence ... ( Sun shines 340 days a year ) jjjj The apartment is a penthouse 5th floor , but there is a lift We have 2 wonderful rooms : - A room with a large window (natural light and sun) direct access to the terrace + very comfortable double bed super comfortable   , a wardrobe where you can store your clothes and belongings .... also air conditioning and central heating .. . - A living room  with a super comfortable convertible sofa bed ... easy to  open and fold !!! room have cable TV , air conditioning and central heating, beautiful wood table for 4 people ... the room has plenty of natural light and sunshine, with direct access to the terrace... ( super good ! !) - The bathroom is completely clean ,(super important for me and mi people) with shower and bath, toilet complete with everything
neighborhood_overview: Poble sec is a very old neighborhood located een the center of Barcelona,  the district has endless cafes and tapas bars i wine .. and supermarkets open 12 hours a day ...  We are very close to all attractions in Barcelona but in a very quiet spot, perfect for relaxing ...
notes: the apartment is very quiet full of good energy ... is really an oasis city in total silence. well as from the 2 rooms you can see the blue sky ...  the terrace is wonderful to be rest and relax as well as to take wine glasses ... even have a wonderful outdoor shower to soak in summer parking have a extra cost of only 16 euros a day, will be pay at the check in time HUTB-006857
transit: the Parallel metro is 2 minutes from the apartment  taxi 2 minutes ...  in every way from the apartment you can have a nice walk to all interesting locations
access: I will be happy to help  with everything you  need,  information about Barcelona  Bicycle rental car etz ..
interaction: during your stay you can call me for anything you need and to have a nice glass of wine if you like  as you fell  comfortable
house_rules: just respect for the apartment ...

host.host_about:
Mi nombre es Antonio aun que todo el mundo me llama Tato,
Nací el 24 de nov del año 58....
Después de estudiar económicas en Barcelona marche a MOntreal para un stage marketing pasando una temporada en ese maravilloso país . Tiempo mas tarde me mudé a Paris ...
Ahora vivo en Barcelona donde disfruto de la vida , trabajo y amigos ... compartiendo mis aficiones entre ellas la música clásica y la comida-terrazas mediterránea ...
disfruto de la vida y de la gente ...

reviews.comments: Great apartments, new and clean. Nice terrace, everything you need is there, located in the quiet area with a lot of good restaurants and  bars round the corner. Metro is 5 minutes walk, beach is 20 mins walk.

Good apartment! Nice bedroom, well functioning bathroom with bathtub, good kitcken with stove and microwave, refrigerator and washing mashine :) nice small livingroom, AC in both living-room and bedroom and last but not least - a very nice terrace with sun from noontime till evening! Lots of supermarkets/basars around the corner - even a Michelin restaurant (Tapas) down the road. We enjoyed 4 days in this nice apartment. Easy to make all arrangements with Antoni. We recommend this place in Barcelona...best regards T and A

Contactamos a Antoni en medio de una situación extrema. Su amigo Jordi se encargó de alojarnos y explicarnos todo. Los dos son muy simpáticos, atentos y correctos.
El apartamento es un sueño, un verdadero oasis dentro de Barcelona. Muy limpio, renovado y en perfecto estado. Se encuentra a unos 500 metros de la estación Paral.lel, por lo que en pocos minutos podrás descubrir los miles de rincones de esta bella ciudad.
Si volvemos, seguro que los contactaremos. Mil gracias!!!!

J'ai passé 5 jours avec deux amis dans l'appartement d'Antoni. Nous avons passé un séjour fantastique!!!

Voici pourquoi je vous recommande vraiment cet appartement:

- Très bien situé proche ramblas, quartier Gotique, pas très loin de la plage.
- Dans un quartier calme avec toutes les commodités (superette, bar, kebab...) 
- Appartement très propre, lumineux avec une terrasse super agréable possédant une douche extérieure
-Cuisine moderne et bien équipé
-Machine à laver à dispo
-Air climatisé dans le salon (canapé lit) et la chambre
-Wifi qui fonctionne très bien à dispo.

Antoni et Jordi qui gèrent l'appartement sont très sympa...

Antoni est un super hôte ! Il est très sympathique, chaleureux et disponible et il est arrangeant au niveau des horaires d'arrivée et de départ.

L'appartement était très bien aménagé et équipé, tout était à disposition. Beaucoup de points positifs : climatisation dans la chambre et le salon/chambre; cuisine neuve; terrasse spacieuse sans vis à vis avec douche extérieure; rue calme; wifi; appartement propre et clair; proche de toutes commodités, de la Rambla et de la plage à pied.
Seul point négatif : nous étions venus en voiture et cela n'était pas évident pour se garer dans le quartier et tout était payant. Coup de chance au mois d'Août le parcmètre était gratuit !
Adresse et contact à conserver !
Marine & co
Août 2013

The apartments are bright and clean, correspond to the description. a  kitchen is well-equipped and clean, furniture is comfortable . We had a small problem with the shower, but at the first request  Antonio promptly removed it. For any further questions we have received a quick and speedy response. We all loved it!

Antoni y Jordi han sido unos anfitriones excelentes. El apartamento es tal y como se describe en el anuncio. Su localización es excelente para moverse por Barcelona cómodamente. Durante los días que estuvimos hizo bastante calor, así que el aire acondicionado resultó imprescindible para poder dormir. En fin, una grata experiencia que aconsejamos a cualquiera que quiera visitar esta gran ciudad.
¡¡ Muchas gracias chicos!!

Located in quiet el Poble-Sec neighborhood, this apartment is only 10 minutes away from noisy and extremely touristic La Rambla. Metro station is two minutes away, very convenient to transport across the city or to nearest beaches. There are a lot of places to eat near the apartment, but for cooking enthusiasts there is kitchen in the apartment with new electrical range and other useful tools :)
Apartment have all required amenities, including two air conditioners - one for each room, and was very clean and welcoming!
Internet in apartment is high-speed, so you can even able to watch Russian football games online :)
Очень милая квартирка. Месторасположение очень удачное: близко к центру, но тихо и спокойно. Если путешествуете на машине, будут проблемы с парковкой.

The apartment was absolutely perfect. A comfortable kitchen and cosy (Website hidden by Airbnb) tell the truth, we enjoyed a lot the terrace.  Well the atmosphere there was really attractive. Moreover the apartment is close to the Gothic Quarter. And one more pleasent thing- welcome present as bottle of local champange from hosts.
Antoni is a very good host! i had a pleasure to stay at this apartment. terrace is very clean, and every evening we had a beautiful lunch there! apartment were bright and extra clean!
Very nice apartment, located near the center of Barcelona. Everythin you need is there. Highly recommend it!

Antonio was extremely helpful leading up to our trip, being very flexible by arranging for his friend Jordi to check us in after a very late arrival (around 11 PM). Jordi was very helpful, friendly and welcoming. The flat was in excellent condition - very clean, and everything was almost brand new. We especially appreciated the air conditioning as it was nearly 28 degrees in September. Antonio had even left a bottle of wine for us, which was very kind. The location of the apartment is great, as you are 5 minutes from the Paral-lel metro stop, and you can get to most major sites on the metro very quickly. We enjoyed the terrace for our breakfasts. There are lots of restaurants and grocery stores nearby as well, making everything most convenient. Highly recommended.
Alles wie beschrieben, total Klasse. Wir hatten eine wirklich schöne Zeit.

Nous avons passé 1 semaine très agréable dans l'appartement d'Antoni, il correspond parfaitement a la description :
Bien agencé et équipé, propre, lumineux, situé dans une rue calme mais pourvue de bien des avantages : commerces, restaurants, près de la station de métro et des quartiers sympas, la literie est parfaite, seul petit bémol : le bruit de la porte d'ascenseur la nuit, mais sinon tout était parfait. 
Jordi qui nous accueilli est très sympa et nous a bien conseillé, il s'est aussi occupé de nous réserver le taxi pour le retour a l'aéroport. Antoni a  eu la gentillesse de nous offrir une bouteille d'un excellent vin espagnol a notre arrivée.

So many reviews all saying the same, so I will just say I agree, the place is great, Antoni is responsive and a great host, and it's very good value for the money.  Probably best for 2 or at most 3 people as the second room is a rather narrow fold-out sofa in the living area. The terrace is wonderful, gets direct sun only in mid to late afternoon. AC works great. Also note this is a holiday apt not his home so there is not much in the kitchen apart from salt, pepper, oil and vinegar. Several food stores on the same street where you can stock up and are open late. Hope we can return soon!

Everything was fine. Warm welcome in a nice and calm flat with a big terrace. Perfect situation for quickly reaching the main tourist attractions while being safe and quiet. 
We appreciated the easy and welcoming contact with the people who take care of the apartment. We truly can recommend the place. Thanks for participating in making the trip to Barcelona with two teenagers perfect.
Beuatiful apartment and Antoni's friend who showed us round was so lovely and helpful!! Would definitely suggest staying here.

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour. L'appartement est très propre et fonctionnel avec sa charmante terrasse.  Il est  très bien situé, dans un quartier très vivant et chaleureux.
Merci à Jordi qui nous a accueilli avec beaucoup de gentillesse et d'attention. Merci à Antoni pour la bouteille de Pinedes. Nous reviendrons dans cet appartement avec plaisir !
Valérie (et sa famille !).

Amazing place to stay in Barcelona! We didn't meet Antoni in person but his friend who met us was (luckily) very flexible with check-in and check-out times, thank you again for that. Once we arrived I felt the appartment was even nicer than on the pictures, with the terrace being a huge plus. The neighbourhood is quite nice, too, with a small supermarket and a lot of nice bars and cafés close by. To sum up we were very happy to have chosen Antoni's place for our weekend in Barcelona and would definetly recommend it! 
Thank you very much for your hospitality Antoni, we appreciated it very much and sure will try to stay at your place the next time we come to Barcelona.

We've been travelling around Europe for a couple of months, and Antoni's apartment was our favourite place by far! Great neighbourhood, and within easy walking distance to the Gothic Quarter and other popular areas. The apartment was really sweet, with plenty of room for the three of us, and was nicely and simply decorated. It was so nice to have clean white towel sets and sheets! The outdoor area was a big bonus as well. We didn't get to meet Antoni, but he was easy to communicate with and his friend Jordi was lovely. When I come back to Barcelona I'll definitely stay here again!

Gracias Antony pour ton accueil, le cava et cet appartement si cosy et tranquille. Cela a contribué a rendre notre séjour d'autant plus agréable. Pour la prochaine fois, nous commanderons la chaleur avec le soleil ;-) A bientôt, Ana Mari.
Perfect, Antoni was very Nice and the appartement too.
The apartment was lovely and spacious, very clean as well. The host was very friendly and helpful in recommending on places to go with directions.

Antoni is a super nice host that is why the four stars, I thought the apartment was a little bit bigger from the pictures but it is very nice anyway, maybe a bit humid in the winter but cosy enough for 4 days in Barcelona. If you are 4 people it is a bit difficult to have a common room.

Long WE très agréable.
Antoni nous a très bien reçu (merci pour la bouteille de vin  !).
Son appartement est très propre et lumineux.
Une bonne adresse à conseiller et si vous voulez manger une bonne paella, une excellente adresse toute proche : ELCHE
Gracias para todo !

Perfecta!. Tano es un anfitrión como pocos, se nota que ha vivido en otros países y conoce como viajar, así que para todos aquellos inquietos de esta web donde me incluyo, con Tano todo será estupendo.
El piso es confortable, no hay ruidos y tiene lo indispensable para pasar una buena estancia.
Esta muy bien localizado porque Poble Sec es un barrio que te conecta con todo el centro de Barcelona.
Un diez!.

The communication with Antoni was easy. He was always there for us. As we came to Barcelona Antoni welcomed us nicely and warmly at the cosy apartment. Everything  was as we saw it in the pictures and even nicer. Although it was January it was a pleasant stay at the apartment and we loved Barcelona. Near the apartment there are several bars for breakfast that we visited. It was very simple to explore Barcelona from our barrio by walk or metro or bus. For the evening we visited some restaurants on our own and ones that Antoni recommended us - which by the way were clearly better.     
We would warmly recommended the apartment and Antoni is a great host.

Petit appartement, IDEALEMENT situé, pour arpenter et visiter la très attachante ville de Barcelone...A PIED !
1 mois complet dans ce lieu où tout est prévu et fonctionnel.
A 2 pas des "bars à Tapas" de la Carrer Blai (piétonne) et de son animation.
Quant à notre Hôte, ANTONI, il est PARFAIT ! D'une exquise gentillesse et d'une grande amabilité, il saura vous aider à tout moment !
N'hésitez pas une seconde, c'est l'endroit où il faut séjourner à BARCELONE.
ENCORE MILLE MERCI A ANTONI.
A très bientôt, je l'espère

We had a very good staying at Antoni's place. The apartment is cosy, comfortable, luminous. It is in a good district, near good tapas cafés! And easy to get to almost any place in Barcelona. Antoni is a very nice host, warm and wellcoming!

Séjour très agréable dans l'appartement de Antoni, superbe accueil, propre, bon rapport qualité prix. 
Tout y est pour passer un bon moment à Barcelona. 
Pascale et Jeff

Après une arrivée un peu difficile pour cause de travaux à Barcelone, nous avons été accueillis par Jordi qui a tout fait pour nous faire oublier ces petits problèmes .
Ce séjour a été fort agréable et le quartier où est situé l'appartement idéal pour découvrir cette ville extraordinaire; 
Tous les contacts avec Antoni par téléphone et à notre départ ont été fort agréables et nous avons eu un interlocuteur disponible et à notre écoute .
Merci, nous reviendrons
Annette et Jean Louis

Nice cozy apartment in a great location!  Quiet area yet conveniently close to Las Ramblas, supermarkets, and the Metro, which will take you anywhere you need to go in Barcelona.  The outdoor terrace with sunshine is an added bonus.

Antoni was very helpful with all our needs and questions and checking in and out was a breeze.  A champagne welcome started off a fantastic week!  We would stay here again and are considering a summer return.

Thanks for wonderful time!

The appartment is in perfect location - a walking distannce from all major tuorist attractions. It is very clean and fully equipped for short (or long) stay.
The most admirable was the host - shiny, smilling and helping Antoni. He waited for us at arrival although our plane was 2 hours late.
I definitelly will recomend this appartment to my friends.

Great apartment and Antoni is very kind and helpfull! Nice terras on the roof!
I will definity come back there!!
Regards Els

Our stay in Antoni was perfect. He is a very helpful always smiling guy willing to make your stay perfect. The place was reasonably close to La Rambla and had some cheap places to eat around which is very important. The house was very quiet, clean and very convenient to stay for 4 people. Wish we had one more day to stay in there...
If you wish to spend some good time in Barca you must consider this place to stay!

What would I say. Everything was perfect and just like we wanted. Let's start from the location. It's on Poble Sec's small street, maybe 250 m from Paral-El Metro station. There's a lot of small supermarkets, tapas, bars, restaurant. The neighborhood  is quiet and safe. You can get quickly to any part of the city, many of attractions you can reach on walk (f.e Rambla 10-15 min).

The flat is suitable for max 4 people. Everything you need is just there so you can wash, prepare food, eat on terrace and even clean If you wish. You'll find there a lot of space to hide your bags and clothes. According to the price which about ** hotel rate you'll get much more spacious apartment. I don't know what to add about the place - it's bull's eye. 

Antoni is like an angel - he listens to you carefully, smiles a lot and then he does exactly everything not to disappoint you. You can call him any time when in trouble or when any help is needed. You won't regret - do doubts. 

My girl and our son were also under impression of that not expensive way to stay in Barcelona. Of course - there is no need to sit there all day long. There is a million things to do out in the city. 

We highly recommend that place and its absolutely nice owner and we'll stay there again for sure.

Any cons, you wonder? I can't see any. But if you need any I will list some which wasn't too much problem for us, but they exist:

1. The corridor and the elevator are quite small. So we had to do some extra moves:) to get in and out. 
2. From time to time you can smell something not pleasant from the sewerage on the terrace but we've noticed that it happens almost everywhere in Barcelona.
3. Yeah, the scratches on the bathtub could be fixed but if you are not princess nor prince you can do your shower without worries :)


However - we miss the place, we miss Antoni and, of course, we miss Barcelona.

Antoni is a perfect host, Always with a smile and giving good advices for any need. The apartment is warm and confortable and it makes you feel at home. We really enjoyed our stay. Thank you, Antoni, for taking good care of us.

Antoni es un excelente anfitrión, fue nuestra primera experiencia con Airbnb y tanto él como su apartamento superaron nuestras expectativas. Fuimos recibidos con flores que perfumaron el ambiente los 5 días que pasamos alli, una botella de cava que disfrutamos mucho y una tarjeta de bienvenida. El apartamento es muy luminoso y cálido, super comodo y bien ubicado. Se nota que Antoni es una muy buena persona y le gusta lo que hace....ojala podamos volver alguna vez. Gracias Antoni!!!

We had a great time in Barcelona. The city is really worth a trip. Antoni is a very friendly, helpful and caring guy. He is on time and generously. The apartment had enough space for us 4. We enjoyed it to eat breakfast in the morning or to drink some wine in the evening at the great terrace.
There are only two little things we didn´t like...the strange smell on the terrace from time to time and the apartment could be a little bit more clean.
But all in all we had a lovely stay and thank Antoni for being such a nice host.
Lovely Greetings from Berlin/Potsdam :)

L'appartement est cosy et très bien situé. Notre séjour a été des plus agréable. Antoni est un hôte très accueillant et sympathique. Il nous a donné pleins de bons conseils. Merci Antoni et à très bientôt ! On a adoré Barcelone, on reviendra vite :-D

We had an amazing stay at Antoni's place, he made us feel right at home!  Antoni is very kind and is always available if you need anything.  The apartment is lovely, clean, and we loved the terrasse!  We also loved the location, right near Montjuic and not a far walk to the beaches and other central locations.   We would definitely come back to Antoni's place!
Antoni is a great host, he was very helpful, good communication and the apartment is lovely. Thanks very much!

Apartment was great, had everything you could want. The terrace is perfect and gets the Sun pretty much all day. The location is also good as the local bars and restaurants are not expensive. Antoni was also very nice and made us feel very welcome. Will definitely stay here again!

Antoni was a such a great host. He left a bottle of cava for me to enjoy, which I did on my first night. The apt is very warm and light. It was perfect for me. I did not have much time to enjoy the terrace due to my hectic schedule and would have loved a few more days to relax there. The apt is well located. The nice thing is that it is in a neighborhood that is not too tourist-oriented. One block from the apt is Carrer de Blai - a pedestrian only street that for blocks has many restaurants and bars. The food is delicious and costs much less than what you pay in places that most tourists go. Across the street is a small market, and just 3 blocks or so away is the Metro. It was nice after a long day of touring around to stop at a local bar and get some great food, then go back to the apt for a night of rest. I would definitely recommend Antoni's apartment for anyone who wants a true Barcelona experience!
Perfekter Gastgeber

My two girlfriends and I stayed at Antonis for 2 night of luxury! Such a beautiful clean house and such a nice man!! On arrival he surprised us with a bottle of champagne! and was kind enough to tell us where and what to do in barcelona.  I highly recommend staying here if you dont want to be on La Rambla but it is not a far walk! 5 stars! Thank you Antoni!!!

We were warmly welcomed to Antoni's apartment despite our 2 hour delay at the airport. Antoni was so patient in waiting for us and still welcomed us with open arms to his wonderful city of Barcelona. The apartment was in a great location with easy access to the metro connecting you to all the major sites. We loved our short stay in Antoni's apartment in Barcelona and would be thrilled to return. Thank you Antoni!

Antoni was terrific host. He waited patiently to greet us although our flight from Paris was delayed.  The apartment was well equipped and very clean.  I liked its location that is close to the tourist attractions but not in the middle of it.  We enjoyed many meal options in Carrer de Blai and surrounding area.  I was able to walk a few blocks to the Ramblas and used the Metro to visit Park Guell, La Pedrera and La Santa Familia.  Gracias Antoni!

Ça a été facile de joindre Antoni. L'appartement était fonctionnel,  très propre et très calme, on a même dormi la fenêtre ouverte. On a pu profiter le soir  de la terrasse exposée ouest. La station de métro la plus proche est a 5mn a pied. On peut trouver des épiceries dans la rue.
Nous avons beaucoup aimé notre séjour a Barcelone.
Très bon contact avec Antoni qui parle français sans problème!
Was awesome at your apartment! We enjoyed it a lot! Thank u for everything!

I had a wonderful experience with Antoni and this apartment. Antoni was very flexible and accommodating, he even bought me a bottle of champagne! The apartment is beautifully decorated, and is incredibly bright. I couldn't have been happier there for a weekend. It's close to metro, on a relatively calm street, but still close to plenty of bars and restaurants. Would definitely recommend this place.

Excellent accueil. Cadre idéal, à 2 pas du centre et du port. Solution parking : (Website hidden by Airbnb) (45 euros pour 3 jours, valable dans près de 100 parking de Barcelone). Hôte adorable et appartement, très agréable. A coup sur nous y reviendrons. @ bientôt Antoni, signé Christophe

Antoni was a fantastic host.  He met us as soon as we arrived to Barcelona.  His place is located in the Theatre district which was amazing and close to the subway which is very easy to use.  Great space, clean, air conditioned, amazing roof top terrace.  I would recommend his place to anyone.

Lovely and warm greeting, felt instantly at home.  Great location, close to stations, supermarket and local eatieries. Apartment was bright and clean and would definitely recommend this to anyone who wishes to stay in barcelona!! Thank you Antoni x

Nos hemos encontrado súper bien en la hermosa casa de Toni. El piso es muy lindo,silencioso y luminoso, esta situado en una zona llena de bares y locales donde se pueden degustar los "pintxos" y se encuentra muy cerca de la metropolitana. Toni es un huésped muy atento y nos ayudo en todo (incluido montar una cuna por el nuestro bebe ;)
We enjoyed our stay very much and everything was quilte  perfect. Antoni is a very experienced and pleasant host who also kindly organized a taxi for the airport. We would recommend to anyone.

A very central apartment in a quiet neighborhood. Tony is a very smily and welcoming person. The terrace was very nice and cool to take our breakfirst or diner. It would have been perfect if there was a view from the terrace. We will certainly come back to this place. Thank you Antony....

Antoni nous a accueillies comme des reines, très chaleureusement et avec la joie de vivre qui caractérise les espagnols.
L'appartement est vraiment très bien aménagé et confortable. 
Il n'y a pas de bruit malgré une proximité du centre de Barcelone.
La literie est de bonne qualité et nous avons bien dormi.
Nous reviendrons, c'est sûr !!
Merci Antoni.

What a wonderful time we had staying at Antoni's apartment. We had everything we needed for our self catering break and the apartment was clean, airy and well located for all the fantastic sights of Barcelona. Thank You Antoni x

Super séjour, Antoni est un homme très agréable et chaleureux.
L´appartement est situé à 10 à pied de la Rambla principale.
Quartier très sympathique.

Wir hatten eine wirklich tolle Zeit bei Antoni!
Meiner Meinung nach kann die Lage nicht besser sein, die Wohnung ist perfekt und die Kommunikation mit Antoni lief einwandfrei. 
Auf jeden Fall weiterzuempehlen :)

Accueil très chaleureux de la part d'Antoni, aussi dynamique et souriant que lors de nos contacts avant notre arrivée. 
L'appartement est très bien situé, à deux pas du métro Paral-lel... Baigné de lumière, avec une terrasse aussi mignonne et agréable que sur les photos!
Séjour super sympa, on espère revenir!

Alles perfekt: Vom freundlichen Empfang (merci pour le cava!), über die nette kleine Wohnung in sehr guter Lage, in der man sich schnell sicher und wohl fühlt. Wir würden wieder hier wohnen! Und Antoni ist ein sehr guter Gastgeber, der sich immer sofort um einen kümmert, wenn man ein Anliegen hat.
Petra & Nick, Oktober 2014
Merci de tout et bonne journée!

Nous sommes arrivés à l'appartement et avons été accueillis chaleureusement par Antoni . Confortable et bien situé nous avons apprécié sa situation . C'est le deuxième séjour que nous passons chez Antoni .

Alles hat prima geklappt! Antoni hat bereits auf uns in der Wohnung gewartet. Ein schnuckeliges Appartement mit einer tollen Terasse-wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Betten waren frisch bezogen, Handtücher lagen bereit und alles war sehr sauber. Sogar eine Flasche Schaumwein hat uns unser super netter Gastgeber spendiert.
Und Kaffee war auch im Haus! Wir hatten überhaupt gar nichts zu meckern, haben die Tage in Barcelona genossen und können Antonis Appartement allen Barcelona-Freunden wärmsten empfehen. Auch die Lage war bestens: 5 Minuten von der Metrostation und um die Ecke eine Fussgängerzone mit den besten Tapas der Stadt! Lieben Dank nochmals an Antoni für die tolle Zeit .
Petra und Liza (Mutter und Tochter)

Wir haben den Aufenthalt sehr genossen, danke. Die Wohnung liegt zentral, viele nette kleine Kneipen und Restaurants in unmittelbarer Nachbarschaft, trotzdem ist es ruhig. Sowohl vom Flughafen als auch vom Bahnhof ist die Wohnung gut zu erreichen, die Metro ist nah. Verschiedene Sehenswürdigkeiten sind in Spaziernähe. Die Einrichtung ist gemütlich, alles benötigte in Küche und Bad war vorhanden. Antoni ist ein liebenswerter und freundlicher Gastgeber, die Schlüsselübergabe hat sehr verlässlich funktioniert (auch Sonntagmorgen ganz früh, danke!). Sollten wir Barcelona noch einmal besuchen, würden wir die Wohnung auf jeden Fall wieder nutzen.

Un grand merci à Antoni pour sa gentillesse , sa disponibilité et sa joie de vivre. L appartement est parfait, lumineux, calme et très bien situé. Nous espérons y retourner . Un gros bisou de MARGAUX.

Toni was a very welcoming host. He met ke at the apartment and made sure I had everything I needed. The apartment was great - exactly as described and very comfortable. It was in a great location and I had no problem easily getting everywhere else I wanted to go in Barcelona. I would stay at Antoni's place again.

Antoni was a charming host, helpful, warm and friendly. He was waiting for us at the apartment when we arrived, showed us around, gave us some local tip offs and left us a chilled bottle of Cava. He made sure to let us know we could contact him any time, which we did once for restaurant directions and once more for a small problem that arose which he dealt with efficiently and graciously. The apartment was clean and well stocked with everything we needed and Antoni ensured that our first experience in Barcelona was a thoroughly pleasant one.
Antonio is a great host, welcoming us with open arms (and a bottle of Cava) and a great brief of the area, attractions, restaurants and places to go.
Great place. Antoni is very nice.

Fantastico! L'appartamento è esattamente come lo vedete nelle foto (forse non adatto a 4 adulti ma noi siamo stati benissimo in 2 adulti e due ragazzi), pulito anche all'esterno; Antoni è gentilissimo, puntuale e prodigo d'informazioni. Il palazzo è tranquillo e così è il quartiere multietnico. la fermata della metro è a 2 minuti di camminata e da lì si raggiungono tutti i punti d'interesse in un massimo di 15-20 minuti. Rapporto qualità/prezzo inarrivabile!!

Antoni was very friendly, very helpful, absolute reliable!
The rooms were as shown in the picture with no surprises

Antoni was a great host, really helpful and friendly. The room is at really strategic place, near the metro which is very easy to navigate around. His place is really near Montjuic too which is a great place to go for sunsets.

No fue muy bien en el apartamento de antoni. Tenia todo lo necesario para mi y mi familia. Antoni fue muy buen anfitrion y estuvo siempre disponible para cualquier cosa q nesecitaramos. Muchas gracias por todo

The apartment is nice. Everything looks like on the photos. It's located about 5 minutes walk from the metro station Paral-lel and 10 minutes walk from the historical center (Gothic block). Antoni is a nice and very friendly person. The only problem we had with our staying is that it was very cold in the apartment for us. So if you're going to visit Barcelona in January don't forget your slippers and warm pajamas :)

Antoni greeted us warmly upon our arrival to his spacious flat. It is perfectly situated to explore Barcelona, located in close proximity to a metro stop, and also close enough to walk to most areas. We had an excellent stay, and would highly recommend staying with Antoni if you are coming to visit Barcelona!
Antoni was a great host. Thanks for all. Apartment is very nice. Very clean and have all you need. Good location. But in winter is very cold in apartment. For summer it the best option.

Abbiamo soggiornato in questo appartamento tre giorni a gennaio, la temperatura fuori era di circa 5 gradi, purtroppo la casa era molto fredda visto che uno dei due convettori era fuori uso e sostituito da un piccolo calorifero elettrico (cucina e bagno non sono riscaldati). La wifi che per noi era molto importante non ha funzionato neanche per un  minuto. La tapparella di una delle camere è rotta quindi bloccata pertanto non si può abbassare. Antoni ci ha detto che sarebbe venuto a ripararla ma non si è visto nessuno.
L'appartamento in se non è male ma avrebbe davvero bisogno di una sistemata soprattutto per quanto riguarda cose importanti di cui ne va il piacere di trascorrere una vacanza piacevole (il freddo è davvero brutto e anche dormire con la tapparella completamente su).
Antoni ci ha comunque accolto molto bene e ci ha offerto, come promesso, una bottiglia di spumante locale che abbiamo molto gradito. Barcellona è fantastica, l'abbiamo amata e siamo stati davvero bene in questa splendida città.
Il quartiere è carino e comodo alla metropolitana.
Spero davvero che Antoni possa dedicare maggiori attenzioni al suo appartamento perchè con pochi importanti accorgimenti può davvero migliorare la qualità del soggiorno dei suoi ospiti.
Non mi sento di consigliarla per soggiorni lunghi.
Great place, great location and great host! Toni is amazing. I will return to Barcelona and I hope I can stay in Toni's again.

L'appartement lumineux est idéalement situé dans un quartier vivant à deux pas du métro. 
Les photos sont le reflet exact du lieu. La cuisine est bien équipée. La terrasse donne sur une cour très calme en février.
Le seul point négatif  c'est le chauffage insuffisant lorsque la température extérieure est basse.
Toni est un hôte chaleureux .

Kontaktaufnahme mit Antoni vorab per e-mail klappte wunderbar. Als wir in Barcelona gelandet waren, riefen wir noch mal an und trafen dann an der genannten Adresse einen Freund von Antoni, der uns sehr freundlich und herzlich begrüßte, in die Wohnung brachte und alles erklärte. Die Wohnung ist zentral gelegen, aber dennoch ruhig, hat alles was man für einen Aufenthalt in Barcelona braucht und war für uns 3 komfortabel.  Da wir gerne auf den tollen Märkten einkaufen gehen waren uns Küche und Esstische besonders wichtig. Küche mit Kühlschrank, Tiefkühler, Mikrowelle, Ceranfeld, Backofen und Waschmaschine. Ausreichend Geschirr, Töpfe, etc. Esstisch gibt es sowohl im Wohnzimmer (dort auf dem Ausziehsofa Schlafmöglichkeit für 1-2 Personen) als auch auf der großen Terrasse. Viele Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, Kneipen nund Restaurants im Umkreis von 100-200 Metern. Sehr freundliche und unkomplizierte Schlüsselübergabe bei der Abreise. Wir kommen sicherlich wieder und hoffen die Wohnung ist dann wieder frei. +

Antoni y su amigo Xavier fueron muy simpaticos, amables y sonrientes. Hemos podido comunicar muy bien con ellos antes de llegar y nos han ofrecido un viaje muy bonito.
La casa es preciosa, muy limpia y con caracter.
La habitacion es grande y luminosa y todo el piso es muy acojedor.
Recomando esta casa!
Todo genial! Muy bien ubicado! Repetiremos!  Barcelona tiene mucho que ver!!!
Nice clean apartment in great area

Antoni made us very welcome and his apartment was just as described
The location was great literally just round the corner from Carrer Blai the best choice of Tapas bars in Barcelona
We found the apartment easily caught Aerobus to Placa Espanya and walked Everything you want is in easy walking distance but the apartment is very quite
Roger And Trish

Alles war perfekt organisiert. Die Schlüssel- und Wohnungsübergabe fand ohne Probleme statt. Die Wohnung ist einer sehr guten Lage. Barcelona ist von hier aus fußläufig erreichbar. Die Ausstattung der Wohnung wie beschrieben. Die Nachbarschaft als kleines Manko hörbar. Alles in allem war es für uns perfekt. Abends ist man sowieso so müde, dass einem Nebengeräusche nicht weiter stören.

Antoni's place is very cosy and well located. Just a walk away from everything and with markets and bakeries just down on the street.  
The apartment was nice and clean, with everything we needed. 
Definitely recommended!
We had an excellent stay. Great host thank you.

Leuk en lekker eenvoudig appartement, de werkelijkheid is niet anders dan de impressie die je hier op Airbnb krijgt van de foto's en beschrijving. 
Gewoon een keurig en schoon, goed te bereiken en een prima startpunt om Barcelona te gaan ontdekken. Communicatie met eigenaar en vriend die ons in- en uitcheckte verliep vlekkeloos. Wij hebben het in ieder geval prima naar onze zin gehad!

Location was great. Very close to a metro to get around.  Very clean and fantastic terrace.  
Flight was delayed and we had to wait to meet up with Antoni's contact, but was located in a nice area and we were able to wait and enjoy some tapas.

Accueil personnalisé pour la remise des clés et la visite de l'appartement.
Quartier animé et très agréable proche de toutes les commodités.
L'appartement ressemble en tout point à la description et aux photos de l'annonce.

Chambre confortable ainsi que la terrasse. 
Par contre clic clac très dur, appartement mal insonorisé, odeur d égout qui remonte sur la terrasse. 
A l'arrivée ménage laissant à désirer ..baignoire bouchée, ma femme enlevant grosse poignée de cheveux et autres saletés...
pour le parking, gardien super sympa

L'appartement est idéalement situé, quartier sympa avec plein de bar à tapas, tout est très accessible, 10 minutes du centre de Barcelone à pieds, le reste en métro et bus juste à côté. Quant à l'appartement, il est conforme aux photos, c'est grand et la terrasse est super agréable. On a vraiment apprécié de pouvoir manger dehors. Le seul bémol concerne le bruit pour ceux qui dorment dans le salon... le voisin du dessous a été particulièrement bruyant, il  parlait super fort sur sa terrasse jusqu’à minuit, 3 soirs de suite... si vous dormez dans la chambre, ça allait mieux! Ceci étant, malgré ce petit bémol, je reviendrai dans cet appartement qui était très fonctionnel et parfait pour quelques jours à Barcelone

Nous avons été bien accueillis. Le logement est confortable et très bien situé : près d'une la ligne de métro et pas trop loin à pied du centre de Barcelone. 
Par contre, il n'y a pas de quoi écouter de la musique, la télévision ne marchait pas. Le matériel de cuisine pour 4 est vraiment très léger.
Lejligheden er som på billederne

Wir haben uns in der Gegend sehr sicher gefühlt.
Antoni war ein sehr netter Gastgeber.

Very nice place, Antoni was a great host, very responsive, prompt and welcoming.
Excellent central location, close to restaurants, shops and Metro.

Antoni hat uns einen Freund geschickt ,der uns begrüßt hat. Als wir bemerkten ,dass Bettwäsche fehlte, wurde sie uns nach einer Stunde vorbei gebracht.
Wir haben uns gleich wohl gefühlt.

The description was very accurate. We wanted to be near the centre of Barcelona and we were. We were a walking distance from Placa D'Espanya (the train/metro station) so we were able to get around very easily. At night, we walked through the town and were able to find plenty of restaurants and tapas bars. We had a great time! 

The kitchen is perfect and you have all of the cooking tools you need. 

The wifi works great. 

The terrace is extremely nice. 

This is a perfect place for anyone that wants to stay in the city and get a more authentic taste of the downtown Barcelona life. 

My only suggestion is that Antoni use e-mail more, rather than text messages/phone calls. Text messaging and phones calls are not the easiest way to communicate when you're travelling because a lot of people turn their phones off to save on roaming fees, so perhaps it would make sense to use e-mail more. We arrived early, but weren't able to get a hold of Antoni until we turned on data roaming and phoned him directly. That was a very small hiccup though because the rest of the stay was wonderful! :-)
It is very nice and interesting house. The balcony is very good
Fair with the price (y)
super cool apartment with a super nice host. we enjoyed our stay in this area which is really nice and close to the city centre. antoni gave us a lot of good advices....we would come again!

Nice appartment on the roof, beautiful terrace, good location.
Its more or less clean, but not very clean, especially the kitchen.
The contact immediately before our arrival was problematic. But finally we could enter the house with the help of a friendly neighbor who was fortuitous in front of the house. He explained us where the appartment is and there was just the woman cleaning the flat and we could get the keys. There are some supermarkets in the street and first we could buy for example soap and toilet paper.
Nice and clean house! Very convenient position! And great terrace!

I never met Antoni. His nephew met up with us and let us into the apartment. The apartment was okay. The terrace is really nice and the apartment has a lot of natural light. However, there is no outdoor shower on the terrace. The bathroom needs some work. The tub had a rust by the drain and the toilet had problems flushing. Also only one light worked in the bathroom. The bedroom was great. Lots of closet space and the bed was comfortable. The apartment does have a good location. You can walk to many of the main area. It is a 10-15 minute walk to the port. I tried to contact Antoni on my last day to see if it would be possible to leave our luggage in the apartment while we explored since we weren't leaving until later, but I wasn't able to get a hold of him. Overall, an okay experience. I wouldn't stay in the apartment again.
Apartment is in a great location (close to the train station) and walking distance to restaurants and bars. Antoni  was very responsive to all of our questions whenever I contacted him.

Het contact was super goed. Appartement was echt heerlijk en vanuit daar kon je overal naar toe. We hebben het heerlijk gevonden een ervaring om nooit te vergeten.
Ga zeker nog is terug.

Un accueil très chaleureux de Tony qui parle très bien le français (mais ne l'écrit pas). Appartement atypique et confortable, situé tout près d'une rue de bar à tapas ( qu'il faut absolument déguster avec un verre de sangria). Un peu de vis à vis par la terrasse d'en face qui domine celle de l'appartement. Le linge de maison nécessiterait d'être renouvelé.
Great location and very quiet. The air-conditioning was a blessing as we stayed in Aug. Antoni provided us with some great advice about where to visit. We really enjoyed our stay.

Very nice welcome by Antoni's nephew. The apartment was very clean and extremely pleasant. The terrasse is a fantastic plus and the description of the place online is completely accurate.  Poble Sec is changing and we liked the mixed of old feel and upcoming bobo places. The location is very convenient.
We had a bit of a hard time deciding on a meeting time for the keys but it was in part due to my phone problems. As a guest, I suggest you set a time that is reasonable and Antoni or else seem very reliable. I would recommend the place to any friend.

L'appartement était conforme aux photos et correspondait exactement à notre besoin. Dernier étage d'un immeuble à l'accès protégé. Pendant notre séjour (août), pas de bruits dans l'immeuble. Les clims marchaient parfaitement et ce n'est pas du luxe en aout à Barcelone !! De plus, quel plaisir de prendre son petit déjeuner sur la terrasse !! L'appartement est à 2 minutes du Métro et permet de rayonner facilement dans Barcelone. A pied, 15 minutes du port, des ramblas, de la place Espanya. Si vous demandez à Antoni, il réserve une place de parking dans un vrai parking gardé pour 16 euros par jour pas loin de l'appartement. Vous avez une clé et pouvez recupérer la voiture quand vous voulez. Enfin, Antoni est vraiment quelqu'un de sympathique, agréable et arrangeant. Bref, vous l'avez compris, nous avons trouvé notre pied à terre à Barcelone :)

This is a great place to stay in Barcelona! We had a great time here, the terrace is a great place to relax, and it is in a great location in the city. Everything was perfect, communication was easy, and Antoni was a great host. I would stay here again for sure if I came back to Barcelona.

Nous avons passé une semaine agréable dans cet appartement pratique et sympathique situé dans une rue calme de Barcelone et proche du métro. Antoni a répondu rapidement à nos questions. Nous reviendrons avec plaisir...

Wir wurden von einem guten Freund von Antoni in Empfang genommen, da er arbeiten musste. Die Wohnung ist sehr schön. Sie ist nicht weit von der U-Bahn und der Altstadt entfernt. Trotzdem ist sie ruhig gelegen. Perfekt um hier noch in Ruhe auszuspannen. Die Terrasse ist toll, sie hat sogar eine Aussendusche (wer es mag). Die Möbel auf der Terrasse sind mittlerweile besser als die auf dem Foto dargestellten. Einzig ein Sonnenschirm wäre noch eine Option. Lebensmittel konnte man im Umkreis von 5min erwerben(jeden Morgen gab es frisches Baguette). Wir waren 4 Personen und hatten genug Platz. 
 Antoni ist ein sehr herzlicher Gastgeber. Wenn man ihn sieht, mag man ihn sofort. 
Bei einem weiteren Barcelona-Aufenthalt würden wir dort sofort wieder übernachten.

Great service by Antoni!!! We arrived by car and Antoni had already organized a parking place close to the appartement in a parking house. We got addresses and tips for Dinner and Bars in the evenning. When we once come back to Barcelona, we'll rent Antonis appartement again. Thank you Antoni.
L'appartement est conforme aux photos et situé à proximité d'une station de métro donc très pratique pour visiter la ville. L'appartement convient bien pour deux personnes.
Really good place in great location. Very organised with looking after us. Thoroughly recommend.

Caminamos unos 5 minutos desde el metro Para-le y Antoni nos recibió muy amablemente en el departamento, el cual tenía ascensor para subir con las maletas. El departamento es ideal para 4 personas (nosotros éramos 3), el baño es amplio con agua caliente y teníamos toallas para todos. La terraza es muy agradable y también el departamento en general.
Definitivamente lo recomendaría y me quedaría de nuevo cuando vaya a Barcelona.

Antoni ist ein sehr netter hilfsbereiter Mensch. Er hat uns ein paar interessante Tipps bezüglich Sehenswürdigkeiten in Barcelona gegeben. Die Wohnung entspricht der Beschreibung. Die Wohnung liegt hervorragend um mit der U-Bahn oder zu Fuß die Stadt zu erkunden. Trotz zentraler Lage in einer Großstadt ist die Wohnung, da hofseitig gelegen, sehr ruhig. Auch die Nachbarschaft war für uns nicht störend. Das Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis passt auf jeden Fall.

Antoni è stato molto gentile e carino.
La casa è situata centralmente a Barcelona.
La casa è al 4 piano, molto accogliente.

We kwamen iets te laat aan, maar werden persoonlijk verwelkomt door Antoni. We ontvingen een lekkere fles wijn als welkomstgeschenk. De buurt en het appartement waren keurig. We voelden ons direct thuis.

Antoni war sehr nett und freundlich. Er hat uns nach SMS Austausch vor der Wohnung empfangen und alles gezeigt und erklärt.Das Appartement ist sauber,gemütlich und ziemlich zentral.Für 4 Personen schon etwas eng , aber machbar. .
Die Terrasse ist toll und auf jeden Fall ein zusätzlicher Raum. Leider hatten wir nicht bestes Wetter für Barcelona. Aber beide Zimmer konnten geheizt werden.
Das Wifii hat super funktioniert.In der Strasse hat es Lebensmittelgeschäfte und eine Restaurantstrasse ist gleich nebenan.
Alles in allem ein empfehlenswertes Appartement! 
Mucha gracias por todo
Saludos Fabienne y familia

Accueil parfait ! Très chaleureux et fort aimable : Antoni est même venu nous chercher deux rues à côté de l'appartement car nous ne trouvions pas le logement. Appartement propre et très agréable.  Nous reviendrons!!
Ready there to welcome us and very good communications. Got a taxi for airport run at end of our stay. Thanks.
Antoni was very welcoming, although he was two hours late to meet us.  The apartment was very clean and comfortable.  Although a short stay, it was very enjoyable.  The sun terrace is fab!

A bit difficult to find in the beginning but overall very nice~~
Very warm welcome~ Cozy place with everything set up^^

Antoni is an amazing host. He is very enthusiastic, and very helpful! He gave us suggestions about where to go eat, and what to do in Barcelona! His place is clean, and the neighbourhood is very nice! I enjoyed my stay in Antoni's place.

Nice apartment, better recommended for 2 people, but 4 for a short stay is also nice. Not too much hot water from boiler was our only visible disadvantage. Location is nice, beds are convenient, ac / heaters were in each room, terrace was nice. Thanks!

The apartment is nice,clean and quite. I really like the balcony. My friend lost her suitcase at the front door when we arrived during the night. So be careful especially during the night. Antoni is a very nice man. He help us to call the police and is very friendly to us.

The flat was nice and looked as on pictures.
