I would recommend this flat more for 2-3 people, because it is a bit tiny for 4 if you stay for one week, for examle. For a couple of days - it is fine.
The appartment was clean with everything needed. The only one thing to take in mind is that is it better to take bathroom not one after another - the water heater is OK for 1-2 people, but all the rest would need to wash in cold water )).

Location and Accomodation are very convenient and Antoni is a perfect host!

Many thanks!

Tony was really great, very knowledgable and passionate about Spain. The location was really nice as well. When we arrived the Apartment was super clean and Tony made us feel at ease immedietely.

Next time Im in Spain and in Barcelona we will definitely be staying here again.
Great location next to the metro station. Safe and quiet. Great place to come home to. Lots of shops and restaurants nearby for convenience. Definitely recommend for a trip to Barcelona.

El recibimiento ha sido inmejorable. A parte de ser unos anfitriones excepcionales, han sido unos guías maravillosos y nos han ayudado en todo lo que hemos necesitado, tanto en la llegada como en la salida, que es lo que un turista necesita cuando llega a una ciudad que no conoce. Cada vez que estemos en Barcelona repetiremos y os aconsejamos que hagáis lo mismo. El piso es coqueto y esta muy bien situado. En verano esa terracita tiene que ser una gozada.
Antoni是一个非常热情的人,公寓在老城区,周边商店特别多而且便宜,有地铁到附近,交通比较方便,离哥伦布纪念塔很多,可以经常去港口边｡ 我们一共住了4天,屋里餐具比较齐全,两个房间,阳台上可以用来吃饭｡巴塞罗那天气比较好,所以在阳台上吃饭的感觉相当不错,是不是有海鸥飞来飞去｡我们非常喜欢这个公寓,尤其是小孩｡

Genial! El piso está muy bien. Limpio, bien equipado, luminoso, tranquilo y bien situado. Y Tato es un anfitrión excepcional, muy atento, y se ve que disfruta haciéndote sentir a gusto.
Bi heldu ta bi haur joan ginen eta oso ondo pasa genuen. Errepikatzeko moduen!

Antoni is a very friendly host who made my buddy Arjan and I feel at home right away. He was also un-Spanish on time! Only the appartment right below was under construction, they started already at 7h30. But such is life! We highly recommend staying at one of his appartments. During Spring or Summer, you can sit outside on the terrace which is awesome

We arrived in Barcelona early morning and Antoni even while he was not keeping well he came personally and showed us his lovely apartment. 
The apartment is exactly like you see in the pictures. It is a very cozy and beautiful double bedroom apartment.
It is also very well located and has many supermarkets and cafes around the vicinity.
It is also walking distance from a lot of the sites that Barcelona has to offer!

La casa está muy bien, muy cerca del paralelo y de varias calles con muchos bares y restaurantes, pero lejos del bullicio y el ruido. La casa es muy agradable, tranquila, y la relación calidad precio es excepcional. Está muy bien equipada para sentirte como en casa. Toni es un gran anfitrión, puntual, amable y cumplidor. Si vas a BCN es una opción muy muy recomendable.
Tony was impeccable, he was waiting us at our arrival, give us the keys and trusted us.

El apartamento es muy bonito, tal como aparece en las fotos. La ubicación también es muy buena ya que esta cerca del metro, tiene lugares para comer tapas y un supermercado casi al lado. Antoni fue muy amable, siempre disponible, y nos dio incluso una botella de vino de regalo. Volveremos sin lugar a duda y lo recomiendo.

Antoni is a great host, very friendly and welcoming, and the apartment is lovely, exactly like the pictures, with all we needed for our week's stay.  We didn't make full use of the terrace as it was January and not so warm for outdoor eating and relaxing, but I can imagine it would be fantastic out there in the summer.  The apartment fulfilled all our expectations - quiet at night for a decent sleep in the comfy bed, and in a great location with shops, supermarkets, bars and restaurants close by.  We have stayed in El Poble Sec before and found it to be a good base for exploring Barcelona, easy to get to and from the airport by bus, and as we are happy to walk everywhere it was perfect for that, but there are plenty of transport links if you prefer.  All in all another fantastic holiday in Barcelona.  Thank you Antoni for hosting us, and we recommend your apartment to everyone!
Nos ha encantado pasar unos días en casa de Tato, un anfitrión genial, todo estaba perfecto. Volveríamos sin duda!

The house and the terrace are very nice and cosy, the area is really warm, with cafes, bakeries, farmacies and supermarkets and very near to the center. Also during the night it is very quiet!
And finally Tato is a lovely and joyful host, making you feel at home and helping you with whatever you need! I recommend it!!

Antoni est un hôte très accueillant. Nous sommes arrivées très tard un vendredi soir (vers minuit, notre avion avait en plus du retard) et cela n'a posé aucun problème ! Il nous a conseillé une rue sympathique avec plusieurs petits restaurants / bars proches de l'appartement. Il a également été flexible concernant l'heure de sortie de l'appartement. Merci Antoni :)

Accueil chaleureux , Antoni nous a donné de bons conseils pour découvrir Barcelone . L'appartement correspond à la description. Nous avons adoré le quartier , très vivant ( avec la rue Blai et ses tapas )  cosmopolite , familial et tranquille .

Nous avons passé un merveilleux séjour chez Tato. Il nous a gentillement attendu alors que nous avions du retard, il s'est rendu très disponible tout au long du séjour. L'appartement est très bien situé pour pouvoir visiter la ville, les lignes de métro sont à 2 minutes à pied, pour les marcheurs, beaucoup de monuments sont accessibles à pied! Le quartier "Poble sec" est très sympa, il y a des tas d'épiceries dans la rue, impossible de mourir de faim. Nous étions 2 adultes et 2 enfants et l'appartement est suffisamment grand. Je recommande ce logement les yeux fermés.

Antoni was incredibly warm, responsive and helpful throughout the whole trip (and even before and after the trip!)  

The apartment was beautiful and my team loved being in this space. They were honored and excited to spend time in such a conveniently located and lovely apartment for MWC16. I would definitely book Antoni's space again for MWC or for any trip to the Barcelona area.
Warm welkom met heerlijk flesjes wijn

Antoni is really nice and gave us good advices for discovering his neighboorhood and Barcelona ! 
The appartement was very clean and well located ! We recommand it and would contact Antoni for the next time we would go to Barcelona !

Antoni war wirklich ein sehr super netter Gastgeber ! Wir kamen relativ spät an und trotzdem hat er uns sehr warm empfangen mit einer Flasche Wein :)! Das Apartment entspricht genau den Bildern, wobei ein wenig renoviert wurde(Terasse). Die Gegend ist sehr ruhig und multikulturell. Die Stadt und der Hafen sind zu Fuß in 15 Minuten erreichbar. Man liegt sehr zentral mit vielen Öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln. Die Wohnung eignet sich perfekt für 3 Gäste, sodass genug Platz für jeden vorhanden ist. Es war wirklich ein toller Aufenthalt in Barcelona.

Antoni was an amazing host! He was there to greet us when we arrived. He showed us around his apt, where everything was located, linens, wifi, etc. He also had Barcelona maps and a travel guide available for us. He showed us how to get to the metro and gave us helpful tips for navigating the city. He asked us to contact him if we had any issues or concerns. We were all on (Hidden by Airbnb) so that made communication seamless. 
The apartment was exactly like the pictures. It was quaint, neat and charming. It was perfect for 3 people. The terrace was also very beautiful. Due to the cold weather, we were only able to enjoy it one morning. 
The apartment was located 2 blocks from the Paral-el metro stop. You could either walk to Las Rambla or take the metro 2 stops to Liceu. The neighborhood where we stayed was Poble Sec. It was an awesome neighborhood. There were several grocery stores on the block, a pharmacy and cafes. We were in the ideal neighborhood that had many great bars and tapa joints. Despite there being numerous bars, the streets were quiet. The locals were extremely friendly. 
I can't wait to return to Antoni's place!

Antoni is a very nice host. He made everything really easy about the parking and the appartement. Quick respond if we had any problem.
The appartement was very clean and as expected. Thank you !

Antoni was a really nice host! He is extremely kind, helpful and welcoming. His apartment is in a great location: the neighborhood is quiet and you can easily find anything you need (grocery stores, cafes etc.). Definitely recommending Antoni's apartment for your holiday in Barcelona.
Thanks for having you and your Great Apartment! It was awesome and i felt in love with Barcelona. Thank you for your good cityinfo and the nice tapasbar!

Antonio is the best host we could pick! He was very helpful and he gave us good advices for visiting Barcelona. Perfect location of the apartment, it's near to the city center and metro station. Great place to start exploring the city! The apartment is well equiped with a sunny terrace where you can enjoy your morning coffee :) 
We sincerly recommend Antonio and his apartment!

Just back from 4 days in Barcelona. Loved every minute, the host antoni was friendly and helpful right from the moment of booking to the moment we left. The apartment is in a great location and very clean and comfy, would definitely go back . Thanks again for a great stay

We just spent 5 days in Barcelona. The apartment is very well located, close to the metro, the local shops, and a great street full of Tapas restaurant. Antoni is very friendly and welcoming he will give you all the explanation you need. The terrace in the apartment is great! All good. Thank you Antoni!!

We arrived rather late in the evening,  but Tato waited for us, welcomed us and explained what was worth seeing and doing in Barcelona and the neighbourhood. We especially liked a close by restaurant he recommended. The apartment is very close to the metro and buses and conveniently located next to an area with many tapas bars,  a park,  lots of convenience stores, a pharmacy etc., everything one needs. The apartment is clean and cosy and had a splendid terrace.
Everything worked like supposed to, neighborhood is great!

Antoni est un hôte charmant et très chaleureux et extrêmement disponible.
L'appartement est super bien situé pour tout, visites et restaurants. A 2 pas du métro. Très agréable par sa luminosité et sa sympathique terrasse.

Antonio the host was very friendly and welcoming and recommended us to eat at some great restaurants close to the apartment which were great! The location is great and close to the centre but we loved the area we stayed in more which was traditional and full of locals! Would definately stay again. Great host and apartment
The host canceled this reservation 68 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Antoni made us feel very welcome from the moment we arrived.  He gave us some recommendations for food in the area, things to do, places to see.

The apartment was absolutely perfect.  Small, but really well laid out with an amazing rooftop terrace to take advantage of the great Mediterranean weather.  Breakfast in the morning, drinks at sunset, it really made the whole trip feel that much more special. Also, full size tub in the bathroom!!

The neighborhood is a ton of fun, it's close to 2 metro stops, and a short walk to the heart of the Gothic Quarter. We would definitely try to stay here again on another trip.

Thanks Antoni!

We texted Antoni when we were on our way to his apartment and he arrived a few minutes after us, with a big smile and a warm welcome. We had our car with us and he had arranged parking in a secure underground car park, and it felt very secure, although it was 10 minutes walk so if guests have a lot of luggage I would advise dropping bags off first. Also, if driving, note that the roads in the area are one way!

The apartment was as described, comfortable and practical, equipped with everything we needed, good wifi and plenty of hot water. The roof terrace made it for us and we ate every meal outside, which in turn meant we could leave the sofa bed out in the sitting/dining room, making like much easier.

The location was great - an easy walk to Montjuic for cable car and magic fountain. Only 5 mins to Parallel metro, which seemed to be the best line for the touristy things we wanted to do, and 20 mins max walk to La Rambla. Antoni recommended the next road (Carrer de Blai) for good tapas - it was cheap but it felt a bit touristy and not great quality, and there were hardly any children about in the evening so the atmosphere was a bit grown up for our family.

Antoni was so welcoming, we really appreciated his friendliness and would visit his apartment again.
Perfect location, lovely terrace, excellent host. thank you , Antoni!
Antoni's apartment was in a great location with a nice outdoor area for breakfast etc.  apartment had everything we needed for a short break.
Appartement très bien placé permettant de visiter l'ensemble de la ville à pied. Hôte très sympathique et disponible. Super sejour.

We had a great experience at the Antony's apartment. He was great to deal with: easy to communicate with, prompt at pick up, gave us lots of useful tips. The location of the apartment was awesome! Right next to the best street with tapas and other affordable places to eat and walkable  to many places including singing fountains. We would definitely stay there again if went back to Barcelona.

Un appartement idéalement situé pour découvrir et profiter de Barcelone; Nous nous y sommes senti particulièrement bien : la terrasse est un vrai plus. Antoni est un hôte parfait : accueil chaleureux, recommandations et conseils pour découvrir la ville, sourire et bonne humeur ! Merci
He was great at responding and always prompt and when our flight was delayed he met our friend with the keys. What a great guy

Antoni was a fantastic host for our first holiday as a family of 4. He met us at the appartment and was very friendly and welcoming. He gave us all the necessary information for the appartment, suggested good places to eat in the neighbourhood and offered to organise our taxi back to the airport which was a huge help. 
The appartment was quite small as described but we were out enjoying the beautiful city of Barcelona all day every day so it was a perfect place for us to come and chill out. The beds were comfortable and the kitchen had everything we needed for cooking meals for the kids. The bathroom had both bath and shower which was perfect for us because our kids love a bath! The terrace was amazing. A very good size and we ate breakfast out there in the sunshine every day and enjoyed a glass of wine in the evening. 
We would definitely recommend Antoni's appartment to anybody else who was looking for a lovely, comfortable place to stay that was in easy walking distance to many of the beautiful sights Barcelona has to offer and very close to a metro station. Poble Sec was an awesome area which was lively and friendly but also quiet enough that we weren't disturbed by noise at nights. We would choose it again on our return visit (which we absolutely will be booking without too much delay!) 
Antoni, you were wonderful! Thank you so much for hosting us.

It was a great place and a really nice host. We had a marriage in hotel Miramar and this was very near the appartment. Also the environment with the tapas restaurants were great. I really recommend the appartment from Antoni!

All excellent. Very nice apartment with an unbeatable location, just 100 mts to a train station, buses, etc. Downstairs you can find everything, supermarket, bars, restaurants, and the best tapas in Barcelona. The apartment have all you need and more( the terrace is a big PLUS), but all in all, what is the best is the host Antoni, is just a very nice and friendly person that will make you feel like home, and will help you to find nice places in Barcelona. 100% recommend!

Before our visit, Toni was very helpful and provided us with clear directions and instructions on when and where to meet him. Toni was so welcoming and friendly and I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again. The terrace really makes the place!

Tato è un host eccezionale. Persona speciale, disponibile e simpatica. Parla e capisce molto bene l'italiano, quindi non ci sono stati problemi di comunicazione. L'alloggio è molto funzionale, anche per due coppie. Wi-fi e aria condizionata funzionano bene. La terrazza è molto carina grazie anche alle piante di cui Tato si prende cura con amore. Rispetto alle foto ora c'è anche un ombrellone nuovo e un tavolo più spazioso. Risulta fresca la sera e riparata durante la giornata. Il quartiere Poble Sec è multietnico, ma molto sicuro. Comodo alla metro e tutti i servizi (tapas bar, ristoranti, supermercati, farmacie..). Il soggiorno è stato piacevole e lo consiglio.

Antoni was a wonderful host who met us and made us feel very at home. The apartment is very well situated, far enough from the crowds but within walking distance of many restaurants etc... Thanks Antoni for a wonderful stay.

We LOVED Antoni' s apartment! SO charming (and spotless!), and the terrace is an absolute treasure, plus the apt is close by so many things we wanted to see. Antoni is a kind and generous host, and Arthur and I are extremely appreciative: We had a dream vacation, Antoni, and thank you so much for your care and attentiveness. We want to come back!

We had a great time at tato's! He was very welcoming and warm. He provided us with great info on local tapas places and tips on how to get around the city. His apartment was definitely spectacular. Very clean, spacious, and well furnished. We will definitely seek out his place for our next Barca adventure!

L'appartement était très propre, de très bon goût, très bien équipé et très fonctionnel avec une superbe terrasse. Antoni nous a réservé un accueil plus qu'agréable , il est disponible et réactif si l'on a besoin de lui. L'appartement est idéalement situé. On a passé un super séjour. Je recommande vivement !!!
very homey and cozy apartment, we like it very much. terrace is nice. Antony is nice owner, everything is perfect.

hôte agréable parlant très correctement le français. Dommage que le sommier du lit a posé des problèmes ( 3lattes cassées sur 8) occasionnant beaucoup de bruit de literie et nous obligeant à dormir parterre pour éviter une dégradation plus important de la literie. En espérant que le loueur arrangera cela au plus vite plus les prochains locataires. Sinon ce problème de literie cet appartement est très bien et très agréable
Alles hat gepasst, Antoni war ein sehr guter Gastgeber!!
L'appartement est très propre et fonctionnel, la terrasse est vraiment un plus et Antonio est un hôte très sympathique !

Antoni, un anfitrión de lujo!
Realmente una excelente persona dispuesta a dar respuesta a todas nuestras consultas, ninguna sobre el apartamento porque es hermoso, muy bien ubicado, muy calido y con todo lo necesario para una cómoda estadía.
De volver a Barcelona será la primera opción para nuestro alojamiento sin dudas!

Antoni ist ein wunderbarer sympathischer und zuvor kommender Gastgeber. Die Schlüsselübergabe hat trotz des sehr ungünstigen Zeitpunktes sehr gut geklappt. 
Er hat uns gute Tipps zum Essen in der Umgebung gegeben.
Es verlief Alles reibungslos.
Das Appartement ist hell und freundlich eingerichtet.
Sehr empfehlenswert und deshalb auch meistens bereits ausgebucht.

Antoni's apartment was absolutely perfect for our 4-day stay in Barcelona. 

From the moment of booking, Antoni was in contact via the Airbnb app to offer advice about transfers, and to let us know how to locate the place. 

When we arrived, he was there waiting to let us in with a complimentary bottle of wine, and guidance on what to see and how to get around the city. It was great.

The apartment is in a top location. Just a 10 minute walk down one road and you're on the middle of La Rambla's, with some great bars and restaurants along the way, and the best Tapas in the city just around the corner.

The apartment was spotless and using the sun trap every morning for coffee was perfect.

When it was time to leave, Antoni helped us book a taxi to the airport and came to see us off.

Great Host. Great Apartment. Great Location. Would highly recommend Antoni's place to all.

We had amazing time in BCN. The apartment is in cool neighbourhood with lots of grocery shops, tapas bars & restaurants. I found it really interesting that it isn't "tourist only" part of town. You can blend in with the locals and enjoy true spirit of the city.
Everything is good. Perfect house , Kind host ^^
Great flat for 2. Nice terasse. Good location. Would stay there again
Le séjour s'est très bien passé. L'appartement est super bien situé, à 15 min à pied du centre ville.  Antoni est très gentil. Je recommande !

Hola, All 5 stars for Antoni and his wonderful apartment! Thank you for having us in your lovely place. Very close to everything you need, transport, food etc. Homely/warm feel. Has an elevator/lift. Well equipped kitchen. Reverse cycle air-con. Wonderful kind welcome and farewell from Antoni and his friend! Good communication throughout. Antoni is a lovely person and his English was good! Gracias

Great place to stay in Barcelona! Very central and close to public transportation. Antoni was very nice and easy to get in touch with. The apartment was good - perfect for a few days stay. Definitely recommended!
Great location, great flat, great host!

Тони отличный хозяин. Встретил, все рассказал.
Хорошее расположение. 
Были зимой - не хватало вешалки и подставки для обуви в прихожей. В остальном все отлично.

Tato is the best host ever, we landed very late but he was waiting for us and he gave us spanish wine for welcome :) He told us everything about places around flat and also gave some recommendations. Flat is very nice and cosy and close to the city life as well to the metro. Thanks Tato for your hospotality :D

Wir hatten nie einen besseren Vermieter als Antoni! Er ist über unseren eigentlichen Urlaub hinaus uneingeschränkt hilfsbereit und unglaublich zuvorkommend! 
Die Wohnung ist prima und absolut ausreichend für ein etwa 10 Tage in BCN! Die Dachterasse ist auch im Dezember mit einer Decke wirklich toll, um die Sonnenstrahlen zu genießen! Alles, was man braucht, ist in der unmittelbaren Umgebung. Für alles weitere ist die Metro nicht weit weg! Zu Fuß lohnt sich definitiv ein Spaziergang zum Parc Montjuic! 
Alles in allem ein toller Urlaub und Antonis Apartment werden wir wieder buchen!
Great apartment and great host. Highly recommended!

Antoni es de verdad una persona muy amable. Ottima posizione sia per visitare el barrio gotico che per farsi una passeggiata a la Barceloneta. ci sono vicino molte fermate dei bus e metro. Vicino anche supermercati e locali di tapas. La casa è esattamente come in foto ed è fornita di tutto. 
l'accoglienza è stata ottima ed Antoni ci ha consigliato dei locali dove andare a cenare.

Casa molto carina ed accogliente. Quartiere tranquillo, vicino alla metro parral lel. Dispone di tutto il necessario e Antoni è una persona molto simpatica. Consoglio l appartamento x chi voglia visitare barcellona

Antoni is een erg vriendelijke gastheer en gaf ons goede tips voor onze reis. Je kunt hem altijd bereiken als je ergens mee zit of zelfs als je een vraagje hebt over de stad zelf. Het appartement was goed en precies wat je ervan verwacht en ook de ligging vonden wij ideaal. Lopend kun je makkelijk naar de ramblas, de haven en castel montjuïc. Ook het metrostation is dichtbij. Daarnaast is er om de hoek een gezellig straatje waar je heerlijk kunt eten. Al met al een top appartementje op een top locatie.

Super hôte, très disponible pour tout problème ou questions ! Appartement très bien situé et parfaitement équipé ! 
Anthony mérite d'être connu !
Accueil chaleureux, appartement très bien situé, proche des transports publics,... Antoni parle très bien français et était à notre disposition ! Nous avons passé un super séjour.

It' fluently to communicate with Antonio,his English is pretty good. the blacnoy is very good,but unfortunatelly, we've met  2 gale day,so as not to enjoy the blacnoy.Everything in the apartment is good,and Antonio gave us a bottle of local wine as a welcome gift,he was very hospitable,thanks again!
A convenience place, but the block is not very safe in the night, we was nearly stolen by a thief when we got back home around 9 pm.

OMG! 12/10. THIS PLACE WAS PERFECT IN EVERY SINGLE WAY. Location was amazing. Tato showed up with tons of info for us. Gave us a warm welcome and a helpful rundown. If you are the type that doesn't care for human interaction, this is not your place. Unbelievable experience at this flat. The terrace is beautiful and it is kept up very nicely. 

Muchas Gracias Tato.

Perfect place to stay. The host was just amazing, so helpful with everything. We stayed with our 8 year old son and he loved it too. Lots of great places to eat close by and plenty of shops too. 5 minutes walk to subway. The apartment couldn't have been better and Antoni was just the most helpful and friendly host you could ask for.
Perfect place to stay! Antoni is the perfekt host. If you go there you wont be disapointed, promise!
Antoni was a great host, he made us feel confortable straight away in the flat. We were ideally located close to many local restaurants (tapas) delicious & cheap. I highly recommend this flat !

Antoni could not be a better host; friendly, helpful, enthusiastic, passionate, and warm. Made our stay easy and enjoyable  Flat was ideal, close to public transport, resteraunts and a supermarket. Flat was well equipped. Antoni provided maps and leaflets, met us at apartment to show us round and explain things. Antoni was quick to respond to any questions we had. We would stay again, definitely recommend staying here!

Очень удачное расположение квартиры: близко метро, много ресторанчиков-забегаловок и продуктовых магазинчиков, в пешей доступности многие туристические достопримечательности. Квартира тихая, удобная, 2 равноценных комнаты с выходом на террасу. Уютно, неудобств не испытывали. Все соответствовало ожиданиям. Рекомендуем.
Хозяин: встретил вовремя, нужную информацию передал ненавязчиво, был на связи.

Apartment: good location, beautiful terrace, comfortable beds.
Antoni - fine host, warm welcome, answers to all questions.
As gorgeous as in the pictures! Antoni was a wonderful host - very warm and helpful. Would love to come back and stay!

Great location, quiet and only 5 minutes from Parall-el Metro. Lovely roof- top terrace and fully equipped small kitchen. Antonio met us at the apartment and was very helpful. We had a great week in Barcelona.

Apartamento cómodo con ascensor. La zona está muy bien, con buenos restaurantes a buen precio y a unos 10 minutos andando de la Rambla. Muy recomendable. Antoni es muy buen anfitrión. Hay que contactar con Antoni para reservar el parking que está a buen precio para la zona.
Antonio was a great host --  very kind and friendly and was incredibly helpful.  The apartment looks as nice as in the pictures.  The location was great, close to tapas bars and close to the metro.

The place is super cool with two super awesome rooms. It has a great terrace that you can enjoy your morning coffee or breakfast and the sun will shine on you. 

The situation is super good too ... its really walking distance from all the nice areas ( La rambla, La raval, The harbour, the montjuic park etc) and the metro is just at the end of the street. I think for the money it was super worth it. 

Antonio was a super host, he waited for us greeted us and is super smiley and giving positiveness straight away. He offered us to help us at any time of the day, which was great ( although we did not need it, it was nice to know it was there) 

Overall, a super stay at this place... totally recommend it to anyone
Cálido y confortable apartamento, de excelente ubicación para conocer andando Barcelona. Antoni ha sido un inmejorable anfitrión.

Toni was a fantastic host - he met me in the evening and showed me around the apartment to make sure I know how everything worked. He also pointed out some of the best places to visit on a map - he was very excited about Barcelona! 

The apartment itself is great - it is clean and looks exactly as pictured, and the patio is fantastic! It's also in a great neighbourhood with lots of shops and a street full of tapas bars just around the corner.

We had a wonderful stay, and we would definitely book here again if we're ever back in Barcelona.
Petit séjour très agréable. Antoni nous a accueilli très chaleureusement et ses petits conseils nous ont très précieux. Merci pour tout!

Antoni was a wonderful host! Attentive and communicative before we even arrived. He was right on time to let us in which was amazing as we'd done the red eye with our child and we were tired. The neighborhood was close to everything we wanted to see and do. Very easy to take the subway, walk or grab a cab on Parallel. Around the corner I would buy a fresh and warm baguette and some fruit at the corner fruit and veggie stand every morning. The kitchen had everything we needed and we had breakfast at home every morning easily. One of the best things we did was take a 2 hour Segway tour! Really fun- and got to see a lot and learn a lot - my 11 year old loved it! Favorite pizza was 5 blocks away - super friendly and oven baked pizza - delicious - and fast! You can get it to go also - but the place is a real local hang out - enjoy! Pizza del Sortidor on Carrer Blasco de Gary's, #46. Yum! Best meal I had was at Cafe de L'Academia but make a reservation! Delicious!! The apartment is just like the pictures - small - we were a party of three and it was perfect for us. I loved the Gothic but every review talked about late hours and street noise. This apartment was nice and quiet. There was someone who filled the hall with cigarette smoke on two afternoons - but once in our apartment we were fine. Elevator was nice! Highly recommend this apartment and Barcelona! Enjoy!
Antony est très sympa. L'appartement est bien placé dans le centre, la terrasse est sympa, le coin salon est un peu petit avec la table et le BZ !
Great place to stay in Barcelona, very central to many of the sites and close to public transport! An awesome apartment to stay in, would definitely recommend!
Great communication with the host. Check in was easy. The apartment is clean and the terrace adds a nice touch to the apartment. Great host
Perfect location and great host! The apartment looks exactly as shown and was very clean! Thank you Antoni for being so accommodating :)
Appartement de très bon rapport qualité prix, prestations au niveau attendu, terrasse appréciée et proximité du métro, accueil de l'hôte impeccable.
Appartement cosi et super agréable. Localisation au top et terrasse bien investie. Nous recommandons!!

Cet appartement est véritablement charmant , très bien équipé, au calme et dispose d'une très jolie terrasse pourvue d'une table , de chaises et d'un banc ainsi que d'un grand parasol tout neuf. Entourée de plantes vertes , elle est très agréable et sans aucun vis à vis. Le salon , disposant d'un canapé-lit, donne sur la terrasse tout comme la chambre pourvue d'un grand lit très confortable et d'une grande armoire avec des cintres et beaucoup de place. La salle de bains très fonctionnelle avec une baignoire, un wc et un lavabo et une fenêtre pour aérér là pièce. La cuisine est très bien équipée elle aussi avec un four traditionnel ainsi qu'un four à micro-ondes , 4 plaques vitro céramique , un réfrigérateur ainsi qu'un congélateur. Tout est prévu pour nettoyer , aspirateur , produits d'entretień balai, serpillière espagnole , vous trouverez également de quoi cuisiner , huile , vinaigre , épices divers, café et toute la vaisselle et les casseroles nécessaires et 2 cafetières italiennes. Antoni vous donnera des serviettes et torchons qu'il vous renouvellera si vous restez plus d'une semaine et vous répondra immédiatement si vous avez un problème. Il est d'une gentillesse extrême et c'est une personne qu'on est heureux de rencontrer tant il est chaleureux , enthousiaste et sympathique .J'ajouterai qu'il a décoré son appartement de façon charmante avec beaucoup de goût et que l'on s'y sent immédiatement chez soi comme dans un rêve....
Il est très bien situé dans le poble sec car juste à côté de la carrer de blai , rue piétonne remplie de restaurants à tapas et pinxos où l'on mange très bien pour pas cher .C'est un quartier tranquille mais vivant , situé au pied de la colline dé Monjuic couverte de parcs superbes et où l'on peut visiter  la formidable Fondation Miro .
En résumé une excellente adresse que je recommande fortement .
The terrace and neighborhood are great! It's very close to the Metro as well.

L'appartement d'Antoni est très bien situé (métro, restaurants, superette, Montjuïc, La Rambla à 10 minutes de marche...)et très agréable avec sa terrasse. Il est parfaitement conforme à l'annonce. La rue et l'immeuble sont calmes. Nous y avons passé une très bonne semaine. Un grand merci à Antoni pour sa souplesse sur notre heure d'arrivée (21h) et sa gentillesse. Nous y retournerons avec plaisir.

The appartment was very well decarated. We loved to sit at the terrace for breakfast. Antoni was very nice to wait for our car to arrive and help us to park and unload the luggages. He always replied me very fast. He even found a very clear safe indoor parking space for our rental car on our own cost. Many Thanks!

Appartement bien situé pour la visite de Barcelone. La Rambla à 10 min à pied et deux stations de métro à coté. Il y a des restaurants, des épiceries, des boulangeries pas loin, donc vraiment pratique. 
L'appartement est assez grand pour une famille de 4 et la terrasse est appréciable pour le pdj. et l'apéro du soir. 
Facile de communiquer avec Antoni. Je recommande l'appartement.

Antoni was wonderful from start and finish. He waited for us and also gave us a bottle of wine for our stay. The apartment was clean and perfect for 3 people. We were able to cook breakfast every morning and enjoy it on the terrace every morning. Good communication and definitely will be back again. There is a lift so you won't have to worry about lugging your luggage up the stairs. Thank you once again Toni. Xx
Logement parfait placé dans un superbe quartier et très bien situé pour visiter barcelone .

Located in a nice neighborhood and just a couple metro stops from major tourist attractions, Antoni's apartment is very suitable for couples or small families. The terrace is also a great plus, can be used as an outside dining area nicely. Overall, we enjoyed our stay a lot.

Très bon accueil Antoni est vraiment disponible pour ses hôtes l appartement est très bien situé pour profiter de Barcelone station de métro â côté desservant beaucoup d'autres lieux
nous étions en couple avec 2 enfants
Nous le recommandons.

Super séjour. Antony est super...très acceuillant. Il met super à l'aise des l'arrivée. Il est à notre ecoute. L'appartement est super...propre..bien situé.. nous avons (Website hidden by Airbnb) vous le recommande

L'appartement correspond tout à fait au descriptif, agréable, calme et climatisé. La terrasse est vraiment un plus ainsi que la proximité de la carrer del Blai (bars à tapas à deux pas de l'immeuble). L'accueil d'Antoni est vraiment chaleureux, le fait qu'il parle français nous a bien simplifié la vie, il a ainsi pu répondre à toutes nos interrogations. Merci encore Antoni !

Die Wohnung liegt perfekt, um Barcelona zu Fuss zu erleben. Das Viertel mit der Carrer de Blai ist sehr interessant mit vielen Tapasbars und Restaurants. Der Montjuic ist grossartig. Die Wohnung selbst ist gemütlich und die Dachterrasse ist das Highlight. Alles bestens, und Antoni ist ein sympathischer, freundlicher Gastgeber.

Casa pulita ed accogliente. A 10 minuti dalla vita e 15 dalla spiaggia.
Toni simpatico, disponibile e gentile.
Terrazzo fantastico.

My friends and I had the most wonderful stay in Antoni's beautiful apartment. Antoni was excellent at communicating before our stay and my friend's whom he let into the flat said he was a superb and friendly host. I cant say enough nice things about the flat. The spacious terrace is ideal for socialising and relaxing and the flat was extremely clean and well equipt, we all wished we could have moved in there. The location is awesome, right next to a lively street full of tapas bars. The flat was the perfect place to enjoy Barcelona from and we would stay there every time! Gracias Antoni!
Great apartment, very clean and comfortable. Everything was fantastic. Antony was kind and help us make our tour great.

This flat is in a residential area and perfectly located to explore the city. Toni is a fantastic host who spent time when we checked in to be sure he had answered questions and to help us arrange travel back to the airport. He helped make this a truly relaxing experience.

Very excellent host!  Antoni was available to set us up on our first visit to Spain.  The location couldn't be beat.  You can walk anywhere you need.  And you must try the tapas bars around the corner on Carrer Blai!  Unbeatable!

This is the perfect apartment in the city, but far enough away from the hustle and noise of La Rambla!  Easy to walk to the main tourist areas.  There are tons of little markets to buy groceries, plus a great tapas scene just around the corner. Antoni is the most wonderful host!  He has great suggestions - be sure to ask for recommendations!  Wifi is great!  The flat was clean and everything worked well.  The elevator is small, as all European elevators are, but very reliable. The neighborhood is safe, friendly and quiet at night. You will love the terrace!!  It's gorgeous!

Toni's flat was great for our family's first visit to Barcelona. It's clean, quaint and welcoming. The apt is well located for walking to sights or catching  the metro. We hiked to Montjuic for a nice view of the city and there we visited the Joan Miro museum and the Catalan art museum. The neighborhood tapas scene is great and handy groceries are nearby if you choose to cook. We felt safe to walk even late at night. Great experience. Thanks Toni!
Wonderful!

Antoni was a great host, who even when we were 45 minutes late, was understanding and met us within 10 minutes! He even gave us a surprise welcome gift! We had a wonderful stay at Antoni’s place, with some nice patio time. I would definitely stay there again next time I’m in Barcelona!

Perfect location, 19 minutes walk from the Ramblas,and easy access to the metro. Gandy convenient store and pharmacy just across. Will definitely be using the same apartment next time we are in Barcelona.

Toni's apartment was perfect for our family of 3. The location is great - easy walking distance to many central attractions and very close to the metro. It was very clean and well equipped. The terrace added useful living space. Toni is a friendly, helpful host. He leaves you in peace, but makes it clear he is available if you need anything. A welcome bottle of wine was a nice touch.

Toimiva asunto neljälle, sijainti oli erittäin hyvä, lyhyt matka mm. metroasemalle. Kävelymatkan päässä oli mm. Ramblas, Fundació Joan Miró, paikallisia ruokapaikkoja ja lähikauppoja. Ihana kattoterassi. Kummassakin huoneessa oli oma ilmalämpöpumppu. Rauhallinen seutu. Suosittelemme!

Antoni's appartment is in a good, central location close to public transport.Antoni is a very kind, welcoming and humorous person who keeps the appartment meticulously clean. Furnishing is appropriate and in part a little run down. We were three adults and the size of the appartment was comfortable.  I recommend staying atAntoni's place

Nuestra estancia en Casa de Antoni ha sido muy buena! El apto está muy bien equipado, tiene todo lo que se necesita para una buena estadía, está muy limpio y es cómodo, bien iluminado, con hermosa luz natural, acogedor y la ubicación te permite moverte con facilidad en BCN. Antoni es un anfitrion super atento y muyyy simpático. Lo super recomiendo!

The apartment is in a good location just a short walk to the Metro, plenty of restaurants nearby, Antoni is very nice and welcomed us with a bottle of wine!
Very pleasant.

숙소 위치는 지하철역에서 가까웠고 토니는 정말 친절했어요
사고가 좀 있었지만 신속하게 대처해줬고 시설은 깨끗하고 좋았습니다 
주변도 조용하면서 편의시설도 다 있어서 생활의 불편함은 전혀 없었어요
This apartment is perfect! It was so homely, I wish I didn't have to leave! It's walking distance from everything. I wouldn't want to stay anywhere else in Barcelona.

Had an amazing stay at Antoni's beautiful place. We met Antoni and gave us such a warm welcome and he explained to us about the house and the area as well as gave us some local tips! He even gave us some treats as a  welcome gift!  The house has all the appliances, very well equipped and you even have a  beautiful terrace that you can enjoy your breakfast during nice sunny day.
The neighbourhood is lively with a lot of tapas restaurant just around the corner. We went to Blai 9 for tapas and it's amazing plus pretty cheap too! Metro is just short walk away and you can get to most attractions easily. Gothic Quarter is just around 15 mins walk from the place too. Barcelona is such a vibrant and beautiful city that we feel 5 days is not enough for us! We will definitely be back  and highly recommend anyone for Antoni's place to explore Barcelona. Muchas Gracias Antoni :)
Great flat, very central. Fabulous terrace - even in December it was nice to go sit outside. Place was spotless and Antoni was a wonderful host. Highly recommend.
Antoni’s hospitality was the best! We loved his place. The location was great for our stay in Barcelona.

Merci pour l'accueil. Beaucoup de petites attentions (vin, chocolat, eau, ...). 
Séjours parfait dans une ville Exceptionnelle et un appartement nickel. 

Antoni est très réactif pour toutes éventuelles questions. 

Rien à redire, je le conseille fortement et je reviendrais sûrement à barcelone dans son appartement.
Close to everything,  safe, easy to find and Antoni will go out of his way to help you out.

Great area full of bars and places to eat, easy walk to everything in the downtown area, close to the metro.. Perfect location for any length of stay and the apartment has a nice cozy feel to it. Antoni is fantastic host and made us feel welcome from the very beginning.
Great value for the cost, very good location, we had all that was needed in the appartment. Tony, was great, very friendly and helpful. We plan to stay there again in our next visit.
The apartment is as in picture, the accommodation was great and Antoni was a great host giving us advice and indication.
Excelente atención y hermoso apartamento. Altamente recomendable.

Appartement fort agréable, très propre et bien situé. Accueil très chaleureux de la part d'Antoni. Il a beaucoup plu durant notre bref séjour à Barcelone et nous n'avons donc pas pu profiter de la très sympathique terrasse. Cependant, nous nous sommes sentis très à l'aise dans l'appartement d'Antoni. Espérons pouvoir y revenir...
照片與地址差兩號,建議房子外觀改拍正確(56號)的,因為54號住戶感覺應該被其它背包客誤按電鈴好幾次了~

Toni to super host. Powitał nas winem, opowiedział co warto zwiedzić. Apartament w super dzielnicy. Można było poczuć Barcelonę wraz z jej mieszkańcami. Każdy rodzaj sklepu był pod samym apartamentem. Szkoda że nie można dać 10 gwiazdek....Polecam
Great host- met us upon arrival and departure. AirBnB at its best.

The apartment is in a great location within walking distance of everything.  Lots of places to eat in the neighborhood.  The terrace patio would be great in warmer weather.  Antoni was a great host, very accommodating (he met me early to do an early check in).  Place was very clean.  Elevator a great plus if you have bags.  Quiet building. Will stay again if I go back to Barcelona.

Antoni warmly welcomed us with a nice present :) The apartment was beautiful, we found everything we needed. The best was the cozy terrace full of flowers and sun! :) Thank you very much and we're gonna come back :)

A great little apartment in the wonderful city of Barcelona.  Considering how great the location is and proximity to all amenities it is also super quiet in the hustle and bustle.  

Toni is also the best and most attentive host and nothing is too much trouble and I recommend him highly.

First off, Antoni is one of the nicest people you will ever meet. His quick responses and caring personality made it a trip to remember. His location is close to the tram station. (2 min walk) also very close to Ramblas (scenic walk) lots of shops and great restaurants on the way. It is also only 1 street away from a happening street with lots of bars and cafes for any style. I would highly recommend the stay there. Great patio to enjoy aswell. Cheers!
Perfect Location. Everything in walkiung distance. Hopefully when we are next time in Barcelona the appartment is available.
Great apartment, close to Metro and 10-15 minutes walk to Ramblas. Toni was a cheerful and very helpful host. Lots of caves and food shops nearby.
El piso está genial, muy céntrico, limpio, es acogedor y práctico... Y la atención de Antoni es inmejorable (agradable, detallista...) . Totalmente recomendable.

El departamento de Antoni es inmejorable, es super luminoso, comodo. Bien equipado. A dos minutos del metro, De lugares para comer a la noche. El barrio es muy tranquilo. Él es un divino total. Sin dudas volveriamos a alojarnos.

Toni je výborný hostitel, flexibilní a vždy na čas. 

Místo je ideální na procházku na nedaleký kopec, pevnost i fontánu. Stejně tak i na druhou stranu do centra nebo přístavu. Vše tak akorát, že to zvládnou 12 leté děti, případnem je metro hned u nosu. 

Naprosto úžasná je pěší zóna Blai hned pod domem, kde jsme vyzkoušeli skoro všechny tapas bary na snídani nebo večeři, vždy bylo z čeho vybírat pro děti i dospělé.

Byt byl útulný a praktický pro rodinu s 2 dětmi. Čistá koupelna, zařízená kuchyně a hlavně super terasa na snídani nebo večerní posezení u vína. 

Moc jsme si to užili a rádi doporučíme dál :)
Appartement agréable, au pied d'une rue a tapas extra. Ideal pour petite famille avec bébé. Formidable accueil d'Antoni. Nous recommandons

We couldn’t have had a better start to our first international trip than meeting Toni and checking into his apartment. Toni is warm, welcoming, accommodating, and helpful. The apartment is beautiful, clean, relaxed, and in a Perfect location. We Loved the neighborhood! I highly recommend staying here, we definitely would come back and stay longer! We had 4 great days there that flew by! The first night we were there we were having a hard time unlocking the door (which was a simple mistake, we discovered that in Spain you have to turn the key around like two and a half times to unlock it, so no problem with the door, just with us!), and Toni sped right over to help us figure it out. I can’t say enough good things!
Toni was a great host. Very thoughtful and wanted our visit to be the best.

We stayed for the week over primavera festival. Ideal location for exploring the city and near the 1 euro tapas bars which are great! The sun terrace is a great addition and a sun trap. Ideal for a group of 3 who plan to be out and about exploring the city.

First of all, Toni is a great host. We immediately felt welcome and communication was swift and easy. Minor issues were also taken care of in no-time. 

Second, the appartment is great. The terrace is a delightful place to hang out with both shadow and sun throughout most of the day. Opening all doors in the appartment ensures fresh air and a cool breeze so that it never gets too hot. (Temperature during our stay was around 25 degrees Celsius.)  

Location is also great. Ramblas are walking distance. We also walked to the beach but that 45 minute walk can also be replaced by a 25 minute metro ride. The metro station is very close and convenient. 

Note: we were a group of three and stayed for 6 nights.
Ótimo apartamento! Bem localizado!   O Toni nos recebeu muito bem. Corresponde com o anúncio. Eu recomendo!!!!

A great place with an exceptional host. We were greeted on our arrival by Antoni and made comfortable in the beautiful and well furnished appartment. We had a great stay, location is perfect with Metro station close by.
Value for money spent for a family of four.

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour dans l’appartement d’Antoni. Bien agencé et très propre (petit plus pour la climatisation dans tout l’appartement), il est situé proche d’une rue à tapas très sympa et du métro. Notre hôte a été très accueillant et nous reviendrions avec plaisir.
Alles bestens. Würde ich sofort wieder buchen.
Antoni was the best host ever always very responsive to all our needs and very friendly. The flat is cozy and nothing lacked ! A very good adress recommend !
appart et carrer de blai juste à côté
très bel appartement idéalement situé dans Barcelone. Antoni est disponible et fait le maximum pour que votre séjour soit réussi ( conseils, bonnes adresses,...). A recommander!!

Hôte très accueillant et sympathique. 
Logement non conforme aux photos (comme la salle de bain), mal entretenu, beaucoup de poussières. La déco de l'appartement est à refaire avec soin. Le logement ne comporte pas 2 chambres mais 1 seule avec un canapé lit dans l'espace commun (12m carré environ). Les lattes du sommier du lit de la chambre sont cassés depuis sûrement pas mal de temps. L’hôte a mis une planche de bois à la place pour remplacer le sommier. A noter aussi que le matelas du canapé lit et les têtes d'oreillers sont tachés (protège matelas et tête d'oreiller non présents). La télé avec câble était inexistante (d'ailleurs il n'y avait pas de son). 
Les indications misent sur l'annonce sur le temps de trajet sont erronées (mer a 15min alors qu'il faut bien 40/45 min pour y aller).
A noter aussi que la cuisine n'a pas de lave vaisselle et qu'il y a très peu d'ustensile pour y faire à manger (donc prévoyez des torchons !). Il n'y a pas de cafetière comme indiqué sur l'annonce.
Les volets sont vétustes et fonctionnent très mal. Nous avons eu le désagrément, au bout de 3 jours, de voir un des volets se casser. 
Nous sommes allés à Barcelone en voiture, une fois arrivée sur place nous avons eu la mauvaise surprise d'avoir un parking réservé par l'hôte mais payant (environ 80 euros la semaine) alors que sur l'annonce il est bien indiqué que le parking est gratuit. 

Malgré tout, nous avons passé un bon séjour à Barcelone. L'appartement est néanmoins au calme et la terrasse pour déjeuner le matin est agréable mais trop chaude en été (à partir de 12H). En bas de l'appartement, il y a beaucoup de petits commerçants pour y faire quelques courses et la bouche de métro est très proche (environ 5 min). Il y a une longue rue à tapas (carrer de blai) très sympathique ou nous pouvons y manger de bonnes spécialités. 

Par correction, nous avons indiqué lors de notre départ, à Toni, toutes ces informations pour le tenir au courant.
Great person and great value for your money!!
Antoni was a great host who was happy to help. The apartment was a lovely place to stay and was a great location

Toni’s apartment was amazing! We sat on the terrace almost every day. The location was great because it was very quiet but La Ramblas was a short walk away! He also gave us amazing suggestions on restaurants and places to see while we were in Barcelona. When we come back to Barcelona we definitely want to stay at Toni’s place again!

Toni went above and beyond to provide accomodation that made my stay in Barcelona all the better. He has a great space and really made me feel like it was a home away from home with the little things (coffee, breakfast fixings and local reccos). The spot is located in a safe and convenient location to a lot of the big sites and just around the corner from a strip of amazing tapas places and a killer gelato place. Chill out on the terrace after a long day sightseeing or getting the morning started for a nice respite. I'd recommend Toni's place to my closest friends and family and you should consider staying here too!

Antoni's apartment was clean, bright and in a great location! The terrace area was beautiful, and our favourite part of the apartment. Antoni is also a very friendly and thoughtful host who gave great suggestions on places to go in Barcelona.

We are a group of four girls and the apartment was perfect for us. We felt very welcome due to Antonis warm greeting. 
The apartment was located in a lively and authentic neighbourhood. The well-known tapas street „carrer de blai“ is right around the corner! 
Antoni took care of everything and he was always within reach.
Our stay in Barcelona was awesome and we will come back for sure! Thank you, Antoni!

Warm Hugs!

Perfect place as a base to explore the city! My friends and I found the apartment to be very central, but also away from obvious touristy areas. There are some lovely little places to eat all around and enough supermarkets to get essentials from. We felt safe at all times and found Antoni to be a kind and thoughtful host. Really appreciated the small touches like wine and breakfast things to make us feel welcome. Will stay again!
还是很不错的体验
Cozy place located next to everything. Friendly host with tea and coffee in the kitchen and extra toiletries in the bathroom. I would stay here again =)
It was a great apartment, clean, good conditions, close to the city and a very great host!!

Antoni was a wonderful host - very easy to communicate with and happy to answer all our questions. The location is close enough to the tourist areas that you can easily walk or pick up the Metro very close by, yet it feels more like a regular family neighborhood. We stayed 7 nights and loved it.
Brilliant apartment in a great location with the best host (Thank you Toni). What more do you need? Highly recommended. Already looking forward to our next stay here!!

Antoni place was amazing. It was a perfect location close to a great metro stop and near a lot of places to get quick bites to eat. He was extremely responsive and available to help. I would definitely stay here again.
Perfect location to explore Barcelona, either by foot or public transportation.  Toni is very charming  helpful,  and  responsive.

Toni is the best host.  He provides personalized service and little touches that make your stay really special.  The terrace is awesome!  The apartment is close to the Metro and many tapas restaurants and shops.  It is sparkling clean!  We had a great 7 days at Toni’s place!

This is a lovely place in a perfect location. walking distance to shops, restaurants, pubs and metro, as well as the city centre.
Toni was a great host and made sure we were settled in before allowing us to explore (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was perfect and everything went as expected.

He's welcome was incredible, waited for us as we were lost and late getting to apartment. The apartment was everything we could hope for and central to all our needs. Made us really welcome and made my birthday special. Left us everything we needed after a long journey which was most appreciated. Would definitely stay again. There was lots of information on the city. Antoni thinks of everything to make his guests feel welcome and comfortable. Very quiet area with lot's of places to eat and a short walk to las ramblas. Prefect location.

Amazing amazing stay at Toni,s place
Everything was great. I fully recommend him
The apartment is so warm and clean, Toni is a nice person and very welcoming he’s very helpful and kind I highly recommended him to anyone

O apto é muito bom,  ideal para o verão, pois no inverno, para mantê-lo aquecido tivemos que deixar o ar condicionado ligado o tempo  todo na opção quente. O apto é limpo, bem equipado, com tudo, inclusive com lava roupas e a  cozinha é  muito boa também. 
A localização é boa , principalmente para quem gosta de curtir barzinhos a noite, o bairro oferece muitas opções. Há nas proximidades farmácia, frutarias, mercado,  etc...
Os transportes públicos dependem de uma pequena caminhada.
Para quem viaja de carro,  na região tem poucas vagas de estacionamento na rua, mas o Antoni oferece um estacionamento coberto, com custos adicionais, distante do prédio, porém é a melhor opção. 
Nossa estadia foi ótima!

This guy is amazing. So charming. As gift he gave us on first day a good breakfast for free and on our last day a good spanish wine - perfect. Didn't expect something like this.
The appartment is in perfect conditions. The balkony is very chilled with an amazing view. The bathroom was well prepared for four people with towels and more.
When I'm going to visit Barcelona again, first I'll ask Toni if the appartment is booked!

There is only one word to describe Toni’s apartment and hospitality: perfect! Not only the flat is beautiful and perfectly located, Toni made us find milk, water and some food in the fridge for our breakfast, not to talk about beautiful flowers. Staying at Toni’s is a must in Barcelona!!

토니가 매우 친절하고 소통도 잘 되는 편이에요. 테라스도 예쁘고 집도 넓은데 침대가 하나라 두명까지만 묵을 수 있을 거 같네요. 위치는 카탈루냐 광장까지는 20분 좀 넘게 걸어가야 해서 조금 애매하지만, 웬만해서는 걸어다녀서 교통비는 적게 들었어요. 주변에 작은 식당이나 타파스바, 슈퍼들이 많아서 먹을거 걱정은 없이 살 수 있어요. 그리거 한국분들은 열쇠가 익숙하지 않아서 문 여는게 힘들 수 있으니 꼭 토니와 연습해보세요....

Everything is just wonderful.
Clean and neat room.
Convinent place.
Sweet service.
Antoni was an amazing host and his place was a beautiful and peaceful oasis from the City. You’ll have everything you need at the apartment, and more. I was very sad to leave.

The stay at Antoni's place was a great experience. His hospitality, coupled with the charm of the apartment, outdoor lounge area, and location made the stay at Barcelona all the better. I would definitely book again!

Toni is a supervisor for a reason. he was great to deal with and the place is easily recommendable as it's in a great location and easy to get anywhere. business trip and truly a great experience. thanks Toni!

name: Family Matters | Historic Centre
summary: Designed to be suitable for couples, individual adventures and families (with kids).
space: Renovated apartment in a historic and classified building in the city center of Porto. The apartment is very cosy and with a nice decoration. Very well located in the heart of the city and only 40 minutes from the airport by Metro. Near bars, shopping, cafes, tascas restaurants and cultural places.  - 650 meters from the Aliados Avenue - 500 meters from Clérigos Tower - 800 meters from the Metro station  - 750 meters from the famous São Bento Train Station known for its' beautiful tile murals. Beds and rooms information: Room 1 - 1 double bed (140cm * 200cm) - 1 single bed (90cm * 200cm) Room 2 - 1 double bed (140cm*200cm) When you arrive I will provide maps and some suggestions for restaurants and places to visit. You will also find tourist information near the apartment. Other information: - Baby bed (by request and availability) - Baby high chair (by request and availability) - All linen and towels included  - Hair dryer   - Satellite TV (32'') If you have any questions, please do n
description: Designed to be suitable for couples, individual adventures and families (with kids). Renovated apartment in a historic and classified building in the city center of Porto. The apartment is very cosy and with a nice decoration. Very well located in the heart of the city and only 40 minutes from the airport by Metro. Near bars, shopping, cafes, tascas restaurants and cultural places.  - 650 meters from the Aliados Avenue - 500 meters from Clérigos Tower - 800 meters from the Metro station  - 750 meters from the famous São Bento Train Station known for its' beautiful tile murals. Beds and rooms information: Room 1 - 1 double bed (140cm * 200cm) - 1 single bed (90cm * 200cm) Room 2 - 1 double bed (140cm*200cm) When you arrive I will provide maps and some suggestions for restaurants and places to visit. You will also find tourist information near the apartment. Other information: - Baby bed (by request and availability) - Baby high chair (by request and availability) - All linen and towels
neighborhood_overview: The people of Porto have a natural way to approach to the others without any shyness. They simply just love to meet new people and have a way to do it absolutely natural, so do not be afraid of them, be kind and… be welcome!
notes: All linen and towels are included in the apartment. After one week stay (stays up to 7 nights), changing of linen/towels and general cleaning of the apartment, free of charge.
transit: If you come from the airport, you only need to take the metro from the airport to the city centre (Trindade). To explore the city centre, you don't need car or any public transport. You can always go everywhere by foot.
access: The apartment is all for you and your family/friends.
interaction: I'm always here for my guests!  You can contact me during your stay through the Airbnb platform, cellphone, email, iMessage, SMS and (Hidden by Airbnb) .
house_rules: - The apartment will be cleaned before the arrival of each guest;  - On leaving, the guest must leave the apartment without waste, all the lights turned off and windows closed;  - Always maintain the front door of the building closed;  - Check-in from 3pm and check-out until 11am (other hours may be agreed when possible);  - Report if some incident happens;  - The furniture of the apartment should be left in the same places where you found them-

host.host_about: I have always lived in Porto, for me it's the most beautiful city in the world. I also like to travel and meet new people. Like good food, radical sports and motorcycling. One day I'm going to do the Dakar.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: The flat is really lovely as seen in pictures. It's new, clean and well located, close to the centre, shops and restaurants. We had a great time staying there. Tomas was very nice and incredibly helpful introducing the main attractions in town. He made sure we had everything we needed, welcoming us with complementary tea and biscuits. He was a wonderful host and genuinely cares about the property and people renting it out.  I recommend this place!
Tomás no pudo estar presente el día de la entrega de las llaves, pero una amiga suya quedó con nosotros para darnoslas, así que todo perfecto, nuestra estancia fue corta pero muy buena.

It was an amazing stay at Tomas's. Really beautiful apartment, right in the middle of the centre. Communication 1A!
Will def. come back-
Nous avons été très bien accueilli à Porto, l'appartement se situe au 3 ème étage. Si vous aimez le réveil des mouettes c'est idéal. Rien à redire hormis le petit problème de colonisation de fourmis.

Clean, attractive remodel, comfortable sleep accommodations for at least five people. Tastefully decorated, fun and funky. Great location, near top sites and restaurants, cafes. Tomas was very responsive and accommodating; he forwarded a helpful info guide, and in the flat had an even more helpful book full of suggestions and commentary on local restaurants and sites. The part of town can be noisy - especially the seagulls! - and lots of sound leakage from other flats, so earplugs may be helpful at night. Though that's true of most central city accommodations.

Tomas ha sido un magnífico anfitrión. Disfrutamos de unos días excepcionales en su apartamento. Tuvimos una estancia de gran calidad. El apartamento perfectamente situado, cerca de la zona nocturna. Las camas muy cómodas. Sin duda para repetir.
The apartment in Porto was great. Really new and clean. Great bathroom. Nice living space. And a greta area close to the shops the night life and the sights.

Appartement très bien situé, propre, au dernier étage. Les mouettes sont bruyantes ! Nous n'avons pas vu Tomás à notre arrivée mais la clef était à disposition et tout était bien indiqué. Attention si vous venez en voiture : trouver une place en fin de journée et dans un endroit non payant.
Very friendly!

Tomas was extremely helpful and professional throughout the process. He emailed instructions with the best way to get to the apartment well in advance, and there was a detailed guide book waiting for us when we arrived that included restaurants, attractions, and maps.

The apartment itself was very clean and fairly well-appointed. A wine opener would have been nice to have, but we successfully cooked fajitas for dinner without any issues, and the location is very convenient to all the sites in the old city.

The apartment can be noisy in the evenings depending on other residents/guests. Also, there is no A/C (which is not necessary in Porto), but the area can be loud overnight with the windows open.

Espaço fantástico, super bem localizado. Limpeza na perfeição, mobiliário e decoração simples mas de muito bom gosto. A localização é perfeita, perto das principais atracções e ideal para ir com a família. Tem restaurantes muito bom mesmo por baixo do prédio. O Tomás mostrou-se sempre disponível e correu tudo na (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza numa próxima ida ao Porto será o meu espaço de eleição.
The apartment corresponds perfectly to the announcement. It is functional, comfortable and placed well. Do not hesitate!

Una estancia maravillosa. El apartamento impoluto, perfecto para ir en familia y en una zona céntrica. Tomás nos ayudó en todo y nos dejó información turística y de transporte muy útil. Muy recomendable.

J'ai apprécié le message d'accueil, l'ardoise avec mon prénom sur la porte d'entrée. Bonne indications préalables par mail pour récupérer les clefs. Appartement très propre , bonne isolation phonique. Bien situé dans le quartier historique et proche du métro ce qui est très pratique lorsque l'on arrive de l'aéroport. On peut tout faire à pied. Très bon séjour.

Un grand merci à Tomás pour son accueil et sa disponibilité ainsi que tous ses conseils bien utiles. L'appartement est idéalement situé en plein centre ville. Parfaitement fonctionnel et propre, je le recommande vivement
Tomas was extremely welcoming and helpful with everything we needed. The apartment has an amazing location, however it is fairly small.

Tomas' apartment is quite cute. Equipped kitchen, fridge, big table for dinners, etc.
Rooms are big as well and double beds are comfortable. Single bed is not so comfortable, probably it's expected to be used by a baby or little boys.

Very well located, you can reach any point of interest in max 20 minutes walking (have a good breakfast, Porto' slopes are exhausting!)
A very nice flat located in the heart of a great city. WiFi was a little slow at times but it didn't matter as the rest of the flat (and specially location) made up for it.
L'hote a été super disponible, réactif et nous a fournis toutes les précisions nécessaires pour un excellent séjour et visite

Fui con unos amigos y la verdad que nos sorprendio mucho la ubicacion y el trato de el hacia nosotros. Como teniamos que hacer checking a las 15h nos dejo dejar antes las maletas en su oficina. Seguro que cuando volvamos a Oporto repetiremos. 100% recomendable.
Apartamento céntrico. A un paso de la mayoría de cosas para ver en Oporto. Recomendable sin duda por la limpieza del mismo y la atención de Tomas. Repetiría.

Super expérience chez Tomas, l appartement est idéalement situé, propre, joli et calme. Nous avons passé un excellent week-end en famille à Porto. 
Tomas est très serviable, réactif et fait en sorte que tout soit idéal. 
Je recommande !

En general todo correcto.  Limpio.  Se ajusta a las fotos y a la descripción.  Perfecto emplazamiento para hacer turismo en Oporto.  Las recomendaciones de lugares para cenar correctas.  Las recomendaciones de aparcamiento correctas también

El apartamento de Tomás es un apartamento súper bonito, comodo y que cuenta con todo lo necesario para pasar una buena estadia, destacamos la comodidad y la cercania a la mayoria de las atracciones de la ciudad, el piso est amuy centrico justo al lao de la Universidad de Oporto, de la Torre de los Clerigos. El apartamento se adecua de forma perfecta para personas que viajen con familia y sobre todo niños pequeños. Una vez más muchas gracias Tomás, fue un placer estar en tu apartamento.

MERCI TOMAS !
Porto dans les meilleures conditions. Appartement très cool, et PARFAITEMENT BIEN PLACÉ.
Nous reviendrons!
Tomas was very helpful during the trip. Very easy to get in touch with. The flat was lovely, exactly like the pictures. I recommend it!
Excelente local bem central para todas as opções. Conforme mostrado nas fotos. Fomos recebido por Andreia que nos deu todas as informações . Recomendo e voltaria a utilizar.

Deux adultes et un enfant de moins de 2 ans : Tomás avait ajouté un lit bébé dans une des chambres. Le logement est au troisième étage dans un quartier à la fois animé et tranquille. Sa situation permet de faire la majorité des visites à pied. Nous n'avons pris le métro que pour venir de l'aéroport ou aller au centre commercial (El Corte Ingles). La pièce de vie et la cuisine sont séparés de l'espace nuit par un long couloir ce qui permet de bien isoler les chambres du bruit (en gros de coucher les enfants plus tôt). L'accueil est juste parfait : ni trop ni trop peu, sympathique, serviable, efficace. Les équipements sont modernes (plaque vitro, micro ondes, tv samsung, enceinte bluetooth, douche). Le chauffage était appréciable en ce mois de mars. Les 4 jours passés dans cet appartement étaient une bonne expérience !

Togheter with 4 friends I visited Porto and stayed at the apartment of Tomas. 
We had a lovely stay. The apartment is located in the centre of Porto, so everything is in walking distance. The apartment itself was clean and big enough for the 5 of us. We appreciated the welcome book with information about the nearby supermarkets and restaurants. I would definitely recommend this place!
We loved our stay at Tomás's place! Our only regret is not being able to stay longer. Centrally located! Would not recommend to someone who has any disability as it is on the third floor.

L'appartement de Tomás est très bien situé. Proche du vieux centre et de toutes commodités, vous pourrez aisément vous déplacer à pied pour visiter Porto. Nous n'avons pris le métro qu'une seule fois pour nous déplacer vers la plage.
Avec notre fille de 2 ans nous avions largement assez de place. L'appartement conviendra également très bien pour une famille de 2 voir 3 enfants ou 2 couples.
Tomás n'était pas disponible à notre arrivée, mais nous avons pu récupérer les clés facilement et il s'est rendu disponible immédiatement lorsque nous avons claqué la porte avec les clés à l'intérieur de l'appartement... :)
Seul bémol, l'appartement est mal isolé. Bien qu'il se trouve au 3ème étage, on entend légèrement le bruit de la rue et les voisins du 2ème étage.
First of all, we couldn't have been located better! The appartment is great and really offered every facility. Very smooth and clear communication. I can only recommend this place!
The family matters apartment was perfect for my family vacation.  Very clean with comfortable beds.  Tomas was very helpful and we had a great stay.  Thanks Tomas!
Très bon appartement, toutes commodités à disposition et bon emplacement

Tomás apartment is great. There's 3 comfortable beds with sheets, pillows and towels and the kitchen is fully equipped. The apartment was bigger than we thought seeing the pictures and the location is perfect, almost any place in Porto is in a walk distance. The only thing that could be better is the acoustic isolation with rest of the building.

Lovely flat on the top floor of a building 10 minutes walk to the centre of town. Tomás was very helpful with everything: including getting us to the flat and during our trip in the city. I recommend sleeping with the windows closed as we found the street to be very noisy and busy during the night. But apart from that the apartment was perfect.
Appartement idéalement situé et propre! Nous avons été très bien accueilli par marianna qui a pris le temps de nous donner les bonnes adresses! Je conseille cet appartement!
Tomàs was a great host! The stay was really nice.

You couldn't get more central than this - on one of the main shopping streets and just off a couple of gorgeous historic squares lined with cafes - but somehow also very peaceful! The apartment was all set up for us with the baby cot made up in one of the bedrooms and was very clean. Andrea was really helpful too! 



It's perfectly equipped with everything we needed to cook, do laundry etc. 

The only thing to be aware of is that it's located on the fourth floor so if you've got lots of bags or baby gear (like us) it's a bit of a workout, but nothing too major. 

The guide in the apartment was really helpful with recommendations for finding places to eat, buy groceries etc. There are loads of independent cafes and quirky bars in the surrounding squares and lane ways, as well as being a short walk from the city's historic sites so couldn't have asked for a better base for a few days.

Thanks guys!

This penthouse is on the 4th floor - view from the window is amazing. The hot also made my stay amazing: draw a map for me with best sights (definitely go to bazaar!), kitchen was well equipped, washing machine worked perfectly, beds were really soft and whole apartment was clean.

I enjoyed every minute at this apartment!

We are a family of four (two kids at the age of 3.5 and 2) and the apartment was great for us. There was even a babycot for the litte one. The location is great - a lot of restaurants in walking distance. The apartment was clean and spacious.
Very good

This place was amazing. It was within a short walking distance of a whole heap of great bars and restaurants and was situated perfectly in the main part of the Old Town of Porto. The place was clean, comfy, and large, with plenty of room for the two of us, with space for a couple more people. Not only that, but we were given a quick rundown and  some ideas of what to  I do in Porto and things to do, something that sometimes can be a little hard to figure out at first so it was great that we got some guidance. I think it is safe to say that I will stay here again and enjoy this wonderful place to stay.
The place is exactly what it looks like online! The host is very informative on the area and things to do around the apartment. Also very accommodating!! Thanks again!

Tomas est un vrai professionnel du tourisme. Il donne toutes les informations utiles pour visiter à pied la ville. le logement est parfait mais je constate vite que cela ressemble davantage à un city appart et meuble 100% IKEA. Tomas propose d'ailleurs d'autres logements dans l'immeuble et ailleurs. Ce n'est pas un logement privé. La situation est idéale pour visiter de jour comme de nuit la ville mais attention n'ayez pas un sommeil léger car retour festif matinal dans la rue et les mouettes bien piplettes auront raison de votre grasse mat !.

Tomas arranaged  a Taxi from the airport which was excellent she showed us to the door. we were met be a lady who went out of her way to be helpful  showing us on the map where to go. The Flat was great very central to the city. everything we needed was there, plenty of space. We traveled with two children aged 10 and 14 we all had a great stay . Tomas was very good with contacting us. A very good start to our holiday.

Our stay in Tomás' place was great. The apartment is really well located so you can go by walking to the main places to visit (from 5 to 20 minutes away). The lady who received us at our arrival was very helpful and gave us many tips and suggestions. The communication with Tomás was perfect as well and we loved the decoration of the house! The only negative point might be the bathroom, too small so not enough for a group of 6/7 people.
Emplacement idéal. Très bien équipé. Parfait!

Tomás pese a estar fuera los días de nuestra estancia ha sido un perfecto anfitrión, dándonos todas las indicaciones necesarias. Es un tercer piso sin ascensor (la unica pega que tiene) pero es tal cual se ve en las fotos, limpio, perfectamente equipado con camas cómodas, incluso el sofá, agradable y bien decorado. Si vuelvo a Oporto no dudaría en repetir!
Excellent location. Cozy place with very comfortable mattress. Throughout trip we had constant communication with Tomás. We would recommend this place to anyone travelling with family or/and friends.

Die Lage von Tomás Wohnung ist perfekt um zu Fuss die Stadt zu erkunden. Die Wohnung war sehr hübsch und ordentlich und professionell aufgezogen.
Da er uns leider nicht empfangen konnte, hat eine Freundin unser Check In übernommen. Sie hatte zahlreiche Tipps für uns und alles hat prima funktioniert.

The apartment is at the top floor, with a nice view on both sides. The apartment is spacious and nice. The street has a lot of shops and there's some noise there at night time, but only for some hours and more as a result of people passing than people hanging outside. If you want to go out and eat or drink, the area is superb, and you practically live in the center of everything. I would like to go back if I had the chance.

The apartment is very nice, greatly situated and furnished. Communication with Tomás and Andreia was great. We stayed there with two 4-year-olds and a toddler, so the only downside for us was the three floors up. We will come again, when all of them can walk the stairs more easily!
Great and useful host. Flat perfect size for 4 people and in the best location.
Was a great apartment with plenty of space. Nice location.

The apartment is very modern with a lot of kitchen equipment. The location is perfect - close to the attractions, quiet and with a great view over Porto (3rd  floor). The shopping street is right under the apartment.
Tomas was a great host (Good communication, suggestions for the city, ...)
We would definitely recommend going to the apartment!
Good place, well decorated and functional. Location is key, a lot of nice bars in the surrounding.

This apartment is just amazing. Centrally located it in a very nice area. Everything is just around the corner. Porto is a beautiful city and this apartment makes it even better. Thank you Tomas for everything, the apartment, the location, the cleanliness, the hospitality, everything is above a beyond. Thanks a lot, I will definitely stay in your place again.
The house is just a short walk away from most key attractions. The place is spacious and is complete with everything you need from toiletries to heating. Tomas is available to help 24/7.
The apartment is perfect to enjoy the city! Good position and big enough for a group of people. Moreover, Tomas is always available to help for everything, he's very nice! I defenetly recommend it

Casa espaçosa, bem localizada junto a restaurantes e bares. O barulho não é um problema apesar de ser uma zona animada da cidade. Quem fez o check in foi a Mariana que foi muito atenciosa e prestável, com uma série de indicações de lugares a visitar e cafés a experimentar. Contamos voltar.

Thomas est très disponible, réponses très rapides, 
L'appartement est bien situé à proximité du centre aucun transport à prévoir.
Propre et agréable, 
Étant dans une rue commerçante on entend le bruit extérieur certaines nuits mais nous étions fatigués et cela ne nous a pas trop dérangé.
