Manque un miroir pour se recoiffer car la salle de bain est petite
Très bon séjour chez Thomas Merci

La ubicación es muy buena y el apartamento acogedor y coqueto. La zona es ruidosa por las noches, pero con buen ambiente. Nos ha gustado mucho y repetiremos a buen seguro. Para personas con movilidad reducida el acceso no es bueno.

We got to the place around 11am due to our flight, tomas arranged the shuttle for us and let us drop the bag off early. Upon arrival, he explained the area for us, and things to do. It was bit challenging for us to go all the way to the third floor with 2kids but stairs are wide enough. He arranged everything for us so our stay couldve gone smoothly.

The apartment was nicely furnished and the kitchen/lounge was a particularly pleasant place to sit and relax. Although Tomás was away the weekend we visited, two of his friends were there to welcome us and answer all our questions. Their suggestions about where to eat and where to visit made our trip significantly more enjoyable than it would otherwise have been.

The apartment is very central. There are dozens of bars, restaurants and bakeries within a few minutes walk, a large supermarket five minutes walk up the road, and most of the city's places of interest within an easy twenty minute stroll.

You may have to put up with some noise at night. Porto is a lively city and there were a lot of student activities taking place the weekend we were there.  If you're planning to be out late this won't be a problem, but if you have kids and want an early night, and especially if you sleep with the windows open, you might not get the good night's sleep you were hoping for. But then, the bakeries are really close in the morning!
El apartamento está en una ubicación inmejorable. La hospitabilidad y atención de Tomás y Mariana fue genial. 100% recomendable!

Ubicación perfecta. Nos gusto mucho. Tenia todo lo que necesitamos. Es un 3º sin ascensor pero se sube sin problemas. Los colchones son buenos y cómodos para un buen descanso. Todo el piso reformado sencillo pero con gusto. Si he de poner una pega es la falta de colgadores en el baño para las toallas y estantes para las cosas de aseo. Algo sin importancia teniendo en cuenta que el piso estaba impecable. La comunicación con Tomás muy buena y sus recomendaciones muy acertadas. Si vuelvo a Oporto, repetiría sin dudarlo.

The place is very nicely located within walking distance of everything. The unit was spacious with 2 separate bedrooms and an extra bed just outside the one bedroom as well as a pullout sofa bed in the living room. The kitchen was nice and well stocked with cooking items. There was wifi included. It's up a few flights of stairs, on the 3rd (top floor) I believe. For the colder months there were a few electric heaters which warmed up the unit nicely. The rooms are decent size and the bed was firm but quite comfortable.
The bathroom is quite small with just a small stand up shower. Since the bathroom was so small it would have been very helpful if there were some shelving or some vanity space since there was really nowhere to put any toiletries. I would highly recommend installing some inexpensive shelving as there was ample room to install these and that would solve the issue of lack of toiletry space. We brought in a chair to set our toiletries on but then it crammed the space even more. 
Overall it was great value for a great location and I would not hesitate to consider this property when in Porto.

Buon appartamento. Ottima posizione (anche se un po' rumoroso di notte, ma non intollerabile) e ottima comunicazione con l'host, sempre disponibile e cordiale. Uniche "pecche": il riscaldamento (c'erano alcuni fornellini elettrici, ma non è stato facile riscaldare l'appartamento) e la mancanza di mensole/appendini in bagno. Nel complesso una buona soluzione per visitare la città.
Altisima atención en todo momento. El piso muy cuidado y con todo tipo de detalles. Muy Limpio.

This unit is conveniently located in the center of Porto, and it is located on a walking street with many shops and restaurants.  The space has a lot of usable space, and the bedrooms are nicely isolate from the living room and kitchen.

The best part of the unit is the friendly, helpful support provided by the people who run the unit.  Extremely helpful, informative and supportive.

Very nice flat and perfect location
Tomas was a perfect host. Highly recommended

Apartamento no 3.º andar de um prédio antigo sem elevador, no centro do Porto, em rua pedonal. É acolhedor, o soalho de madeira range bastante e ouve-se algum barulho na rua à noite, mas que não é insuportável. Colocaram berço para o bebé e havia bastantes aquecedores. Gostámos!

We really enjoyed the appartment which is comfortable and very well located. We were welcomed very well and received kind advice to visit Porto. Tomás also had booked a taxi for us at our arrival and had been very reactive to each of our question.

We strongly recommand Tomás! 
Thank you for everything!
Alice
Appartement très agréable, spacieux, silencieux. Très bien situé dans Porto, pratique avec des enfants  (2 ans)
Perfect ! Super séjour à porto dans l’appartement de Tomas qui est très bien placé, très agréable et joli. Tomás est très disponible.

We were 2 adults and a baby. This place was perfect for a few reasons. There are two separate bedrooms which allowed our baby to have his own room so he can sleep peacefully. The windows can be closed so that it's pitch black which also helps. Tomas also prepared for us a baby cot and baby high chair which was very helpful. In the kitchen, there is also a blender which also helps for making baby food. 

The place itself is very big and spacious. It is also very clean and simple without a lot of "stuff" which is good for babies exploring. The place was clean and tidy. The kitchen was well stocked such that we can cook all our meals.

The location was great. It is within 15 minute walk to all major touristic sites

Tomas was very hospitable. He was able to respond to all our requests before/during our stay. He gave us great tips and maps during check in. He also helped us store our luggage after our check out as our plane was later in the evening. 

My only note is that there are some noise from the nearby streets. However, we were all still able to sleep. Also the place is on the 3rd floor without elevator. So be prepared for stairs with children.

The location of the apartment was excellent, very central and very clean and fairly well kitted out. Didn't have a microwave which would be useful. The apartment is on the top floor of the building, so 50+ stairs up to it, some people with health issues, or not very fit may have a problem. Nice restaurants and bars in the local. Closest metro at Trindade was only 10mins walk. Would return to this apartment.

superbre emplacement pour attaquer la découverte de Porto.
ne pas rater le cours food dans le marche au bord du douro

This is a cute apartment located in a great part of town with many nice restaurants. 

The host are very helpful. We would stay here again.
El apartamento es bonito y está muy bien ubicado cerca de todo lo que hay que visitar en Oporto. El anfitrion ha estado atento a nuestra estancia y todo lo que hemos podido necesitar.

This is a great flat in a perfect location. Our group of four adults and a toddler had plenty of space. It was easy to walk from the flat to lots of historic sites and delicious restaurants. Tomás’ detailed guidebook for Porto was much appreciated, as were his thoughtful touches like writing our name on a chalkboard on the front door and leaving toys for our toddler. Thank you Tomás!

Très bon emplacement. Pas bruyant mais central. Tout se fait à pieds depuis le logement.
Nous n'avons pas rencontré Tomas mais les indications étaient très claires pour récupérer les clés

We enjoyed our stay in Porto. Tomas' flat is wery well localised, and we walked without difficulty to major monuments. Firstly, Tomas and us had a misunderstanding about the number of rooms we needed, but he promptly solved the problem and was very sorry.

Het verblijf was heel schoon en netjes. De verhuurders waren erg gastvrij (we mochten onze koffers bij hun achter laten totdat het tijd was om in te checken). Daarnaast gaven ze ons ook nog nuttige informatie en tips. De locatie was ook erg fijn, het was namelijk op loopafstand van het centrum vandaan. Bovendien waren er ook nog een apotheek, een supermarkt en nog een paar andere winkeltjes in de buurt.

Beautiful, spacious and stylish, very well equipped. The welcome from the host was both warm and informative. We had only planned to stay before a long drive, but actually would like to visit Porto again. It has lots to offer, beautiful Moroccan inspired architecture , warm people and plenty of attractions. Great hosts, lots of unique touches. Highly recommended.
Great spot. Perfect location.

El apartamento de Tomas es tal y como aparece en las fotos. Cuenta con dos habitaciones amplias y un baño. Lo mejor del apartamento es sin duda su ubicación. Está en una zona perfecta!
Como único punto negativo señalaría la falta de aire acondicionado que con la ola de calor que nos pilló los días que estuvimos en Oporto hizo que durante el día el calor en el piso fuera insoportable.
El resto todo muy bien. La comunicación con Tomas fue muy fluida y rápida. Tomas y su equipo siempre estuvieron atentos y dispuestos a ayudar. Sin duda lo recomendaría para cualquiera que quiera visitar Oporto y estar en una zona privilegiada.

all in all we were very pleased with our stay at the apartment, it is really great. however we got told that we could stay in the apartment till the evening on our checkout date, in the morning we got a message that we have to check out at 12:00 which was very stressful for us considering that we just got the message 1 hour before checkout. 
Still the location apartment and appliances were outstanding, I would not mind staying there again.

Très bon emplacement
Super accueil de l'équipe, très réactive.
Merci pour le séjour
Beautiful apartment just off centre. Very kind hosting. A bit noisy at night.

Très agréable séjour dans l’appartement de Tomas ! Le quartier est idéal, pas surpeuplés de touristes , proche de plusieurs attraits à visiter , cafés , restaurants , bars . L’appartement était très propre et charmant . Tomas et son équipe sont très présents , la communication est facile et rapide et ils ont pris le temps de nous expliquer quoi visiter et où aller manger ! Très agréable ! Nous y retournerons sans hésiter !

L'appartement est vraiment bien situé tout près du centre historique et les services offerts pour cette location sont dignes des meilleures agences pro avec le sourire et la gentillesse en plus. Merci à Tomas et à son amie pour l'accueil.

Really enjoyed staying here! Tomás and Joana were great at communication and help with suggestions and tips. The area is fun with lots of restaurants and shopping, and also a perfect location for someone planning on just walking and exploring the city by foot. Thanks for everything!

The apartment is really better, than on pictures, very stylish, big,  absolutely clean and have everything for feeling comfortable, like at home! Location is perfect, right in the city centre,  you dont need car or public transport to visit all popular places. Around apartment few supermarkets, hop on/hop off bus station and a lot of bars and restaraunts for every tasty. I definitely can recommend this apartment and would love to stay there in next trips! Thank you Thomas!
Great place, great location, useful tips from the host when we arrived!
Todo perfecto. Ubicación inmejorable.

Excellent flat for a visit to Porto. Right near the City Centre, walkable to most any location. There was some noise from late night partiers (4-5am), but that's expected when you're staying near bars/restaurants/plazas in Portugal! ;)
A great, clean, spacious apartment right in a central spot in Porto close to restaurants and bars.
Lovely airy clean apartment perfect for two couples. Really good location for all the sights and on a road with lots of nice cafes. Really good value too.

logement très agréable bien décoré, bien équipé,  très lumineux.  Un peu bruyant la nuit avec les bars alentours. 
nous avons cependant passé un excellent sejour et je recommande vivement Tomás pour son accueil et sa réactivité

Tomas’s place is an ideal base for exploring Porto. You can get just about everywhere on foot. It’s smart and clean and there’s lots of helpful information for where to go and what to see. I’d happily stay again

Very nice flat in the city center on a pedestrian road. We arrived early and left our bags in the office within walking distance from the flat, this was very helpfull.  Also, the host was very friendly and gave us quite a lot of tips for sightseeing.

This is a relatively bare bones place, but for folks who aren't looking for bells and whistles, totally doable. My cousin and I stayed here for 5 nights. The walls are super thin, which can be rough if you're a light sleeper. And it gets cold at night (in Nov), though the space heaters are quite functional (the bathroom doesn't have one, though). But the location is superb, and Tomás was great to interact with beforehand.

Excelente localização! O Tomás é um excelente anfitrião, comunicação excelente e super prestável. O apartamento fica perto de todos os principais pontos turísticos, restaurantes, etc. Super limpo, bem decorado e com todas as comunidades necessárias.
Bem localizado, muito bem limpo e confortável, e os anfitriões são muito hospitaleiros!

This place is really well located. The place is nice and clean. sadly the place is heated by electrical heaters but this is not unsual in Porto. Also the single bed frame makes a lot of noice so we removed it. Definetly would recommend though!

L’appartement était mieux que nous l’imaginions ! Très très bien situé, la visite de la ville peut se faire intégralement à pied ! L’endroit est très calme pour se reposer après une grosse journée de visite !
Great location, lovely appartement!
Everything top !! Perfect position and house very clean and cozy. I suggest to everyone this apartment
The apartment was great in an amazing location.

name: Manly Escape
summary: This deluxe studio apartment with balcony is located  in the heart of Manly.  Twin lifts access, plunge pool and spa, gym, coin operated washers/dryers. Apartment facilities:Air conditioning, bathroom with shower/spa bath, 1 queen sized bed, 1  sofa bed, smart TV, DVD player, radio, full kitchen, oven, cooktop, microwave, dishwasher, fridge, all utensils for cooking and BBQ. Linen, towels, hair dryer, iron/board are provided. Parking under the building. Free WiFi. Apartment is serviced weekly.
space: Entire apartment is dedicated for the guests.

reviews.comments:
We had a returning guests we couldn't accommodate for their requested period. After getting in touch with Ziggy we were very happy with communication, the guests gave good feedback about the property, we will be thinking of Ziggy's apartment whenever we can help a guest. 
Thanks Ziggy!

We really enjoyed our stay in Manly. Great location with plenty of coffee shops and resturants just down stairs and even markets on the weekend! Also close to the beach and wharf. Accommodation was just as described and pictured. Full working kitchen was a bonus. Ziggy was easy to deal with and even arranged early checkin. We would definitely choose to stay again.

My husband and I stayed here for 2 nights and we loved it. A very clean and modern studio. The location you can't beat.  Walking distance to main streets.  The studio had a complete kitchen with everything we needed.  The check-in process was smooth.  Would definitely recommend
Great location, unit very clean and had everything we required

The Apartment is clean and modern, well equipped with nice linen and very centrally located in the heart of Manly. 
Ziggy welcomed us warmly when we arrived and was available to contact if needed. The location was perfect for us as it was easy to just walk to cafes or shops or the beach. We would definitely stay here again.

J ai réservé cet appart en dernière minute, tout s est très bien passeé, l appart était impeccable, propre et très bien situé au milieu de la rue commerciale. L hôte etait déjà sur les lieux quand je suis arrivée.
Cependant wifi n est pas inclu dans le forfait, l hôte m a propose le wifi pour des couts supplementaires.

Ziggy is an absolute gentleman. Easy to communicate with and very flexible and happy to help. (Our flight was delayed and we didn't get in till midnight and it wasn't a problem)
The apartment is perfect. Location is 10/10. Right in the middle of manly, you can walk everywhere.
Will definitely come back and recommend to anyone!!

Ziggy was a great host. We asked for an early check in so we could leave our staff and enjoy the beach, and he was really helpful.
The studio is in a perfect location in Manly and had everything we needed to spend a couple of days.
We hope to come back in a near future!

Ziggy's place in Manly suited us superbly well. It is just off the Corso so was not at all noisy, it was a very secure, clean, and well appointed apartment for 2 people, close to both beaches, ferries and public transport etc.  The neighbourhood was friendly (cafe owners were OK for us to squat for an hour waiting for our transit to airport) people were helpful and we found great places to eat only minutes away. Can highly recommend Ziggy's apartment in Manly. a top spot!
Jude and Brian

The apartment is modern and well located between shops, cafes, ferry, beach and bus. Light sleepers may need ear plugs, as we found the neighboring wall a bit thin. Kitchen & bathroom brilliant, great water pressure and temperature, great air con, stove top and dishwasher.  Even has small spa bath which was lovely. Didn't use BBQ on balcony or oven but available if needed. Basic gym and pool available in apartment building. Tourist maps and booklets supplied. Wonderful home away from home.

Ziggys place is great. The location of the unit is close to cafes, shops and beach. Its clean and modern with everything you need. The kitchen was particularly well equipped for those wishing to cook for themselves. Ziggy was helpful when we needed to ask questions. We would recommend his unit to anyone wanting to stay in Manly.
Perfect location for anything in Sydney.  Looked exactly like the pictures.  Ziggy was very quick to reply to any questions we had. Would stay again.
Great apartment in awesome location. Perfect for a weekend away. Ziggy was very prompt with any questions.
Ziggy's place is excellent.
Lovely place
Convenient location, tidy and comfortable apartment.
Would stay again

Ziggy place was in the best location, 150m from the beach and the corso, 500m to Manly wharf, access is on a mall so no traffic noise and so convenient. The place was well equipt, clean and professionally handled. Totally recommend it.
Ziggy provided a great place to stay right in the centre of manly, he was also very flexible which helped out massively!
Close to everything, nice apartment!
Great location. Easy and tidy
What a comfortable place for a gateway weekend. Strategic location, cooking friendly. We really enjoy our stay at Ziggy's :)

A lovely apartment, right in the heart of Manly. It was clean, tidy, well appointed and provides everything  required. We were met with a very friendly welcome on arrival and shown the unit, but after that we were left undisturbed. I would happily recommend this apartment.
perfect location right on the Corso. You can walk every where & close to bus and ferry. Clean, modern and comfortable. The host kindly drove me to a function I was attending
My Daughter and I spent the weekend at Ziggy's. It was so clean and central to the beach and ferry. I would highly recommend this apartment to stay in. Thanks again Ziggy.
Great place. Close to ammenities, comfortable and spacious.
Perfect location, comfortable, clean. A great little place to stay in the heart of Manly. I will definately like to stay again in the future.
Great location and the apartment was perfect for my short stay. Would definitely recommend.

Check in and communication was quick, easy and efficient. Ziggy was a great host, as well as quite accommodating to our needs.  You couldn't get closer to the beach, and the markets and ammenities around the apartment were better than expected!
Great place, great location, great hosts - very responsive.

Excellent modern and clean apartment. Close to all amenities and the beach, but also peaceful at night. Great communication from Ziggy. Would recommend for anyone looking for a nice place to stay in Manly.

This place is amazing in Manly. I have friends who live in the area and commented about how central this place was. Ziggy was great with check-in, the apartment itself was super nice and clean. I told Ziggy, the only thing is the pull out mattress is uncomfortable so if staying with more than 2 people, you might need a mattress pad. He said he was going to look into it. It really is a beautiful spot. Would stay again.
We would 100% re-book

Great stylish apartment within walking distance to everything that Manly has to offer. Our favourite place to relax was the balcony that received sunshine throughout the day. The service provided by Ziggy was outstanding, and we most definitely plan to stay again when visiting Manly in the future.

Great stay at Manly escape.  Ziggy is a great host.  The apartment is in a great location and very clean.  The building overall is a bit old however the apartment is updated.  The bed was a bit hard but overall we were satisfied with our stay..  location location is perfect.

Ziggy's apartment was exactly as described/represented in the pictures. Ziggy was very easy to deal with and he was very accomodating when we needed to make an amendment to our booking. The apartment was modern and very clean and the location was extremely convenient. 2min walk to the beach, 5min to the wharf and surrounded by shops. I would highly recommend this listing for a couple wanting to stay in Manly.

Would highly recommend this place!! It’s in the center of Manly, 2 min to the beach, shops and wharf from where you can catch the ferry if you want to go to the city. Very clean as well which is one of the most important things for me. Very nice balcony as well. Thank you, Ziggy!
Great location in Manly, lovely and clean and Ziggy was very easy to deal with. Loved it and would certainly come back!
Beautiful place within walking distance of surfing in the heart of Manly Beach. Great for 1 - 2 people, you cannot go wrong!

Spent 7 nights at Manly Beach and loved every minute of it. The location is great - quick walk to the Corso, the beach or the ferry. There is a lot to explore just walking around. From the outside, the building could use some TLC but Ziggy’s Place is well cared for, bright and airy. The bed is comfortable, bathroom spacious and the place is clean. Lots of towels and toiletries provided, including beach towels. Enjoyed the balcony although the views aren’t that great, there isn’t much foot traffic below, except when the cafe is open but that isn’t a bother. It’s great for bird watching and we were lucky to have cockatoos and lorikeets and noisy miners come to our balcony. Enjoyed the whirlpool and did use the BBQ. Did not use the laundry $6 to wash and dry a load. Neighbors are quiet. Most of all, loved going into the city but coming back to Manly.

This place was super clean and modern.  Loved the patio/balcony where you could see glimpses of the sea, the Corso, and the roof tops of Manly.  During the day parrots came to visit and at night the fruit bats would fly by.  Great grill for cooking meats and veggies on the patio.  The beach just a short walk away.  Snorkeling in Cabbage Tree Marine reserve is full of life with giant cuttlefish, rays, and countless fish. I've never been to a place where at sunrise SO many people were up and active with either surfing, running, swimming, kayaking, yoga, etc.... Manly is a must and this location makes you feel like you are part of something special.
(Ziggy, by accident we had a towel out of the room after leaving the keys inside at checkout and hung it on the door. I hope it made its way back in.)
Very central location, well-equipped, good value, very clean and modern.

Ziggy's place was exactly as described in a great location. Everything manly has to offer was in walking distance. Most surprising was the smell of freshly cleaned linen when you walk in the door. 5 stars.
Fab few days in manly. Ziggy was super responsive and helpful, location was amazing. Apartment had everything you could want for a few days
Central location, fabulous clean and modern space. Ziggy was a excellent host. Will definitely return!
Great location, easy access to beaches, food and amenities. Really enjoyed our stay!
We loved the location, right in town and walking distance to everything. Apartment was well described, clean and comfortable. We would definitely use again. In summer the pool area would be lovely.
Highly recommended this place,Ziggy the host very friendly and gave us a very good thougher handover.Very central to all you need in Manly..will be back again one day
Great location fabulous apartment easy check in lovely host thankyou
Ziggy's place is very nicely located, close to the Corso, with fresh clean facilities and amenities.
A wonderful relaxing stay in beautiful Manly. PERFECT location, appartment and host. 5 stars!!!!
Ziggy was responsive and very helpful. He greeted me with keys and showed me how everything worked. The apartment was very clean and in a great location.

Located right in the heart of Manly, this immaculate, nicely appointed apartment is suited to all kinds of travellers and presents great value for money. Very short walk to ferry, the beach, restaurants & bars yet surprisingly quiet. Fitted with nice, modern furnishings & conveniences, this was perfect for our 5-day stay. Ziggy was a great host with fantastic, prompt communication. Thank you for hosting us!

The manly escape is exactly as pictured, a very clean compact apartment. Ziggy greeted me on arrival and showed me around the building, its in a great location in Manly. I have mobility issues but i was able to walk everywhere i needed to, its minutes from the wharf and the local Hop on Hop off bus which is something i used everyday. Manly escape was the perfect base, tea and coffee were provided as well as basic pantry staples. In the bathroom Ziggy is very generous with the white fluffy towels and bathroom staples. Thank you so much for a lovely secure place to stay, loved the view from the balcony too!!

Ziggy's place was exactly as advertised, along with a great orientation from Ziggy on our arrival.  Everything in the studio was of an excellent standard and the great location of one block off the Manly Corso and Manly surf beach was perfect.  Excellent value for money and we will book again for Manly/Sydney visits. A super host.  Peter
Very clean and comfortable. Great location. Host Ziggy was very accommodating. A must stay if staying in Manly
Ziggy was really quick to respond to my calls , and helped us find parking for our car. He and his wife are amazing people to have as a host.
Good location, small but comfortable and clean.
Thanks for the great stay at short notice
Great apartment, great location and parking under building is a great bonus!
Great location and close to cafes, restaurants etc.
Prefer not to write a review, sorry

Ziggy's place was clean, nicely furnished and had all the amenities and services I needed, with plenty of towels, bathroom items etc. The apartment was light and airy, with good facilities and a nice balcony. The location is excellent for everything Manly has to offer. Ziggy was well organised and friendly - an excellent host and I would have no hesitation in stopping here again.

Ziggy’s place was an unreal spot in Manly, so close to the beach and in the main town you couldn’t ask for better! He was an easy host to deal with and was flexible with checking in and out. Will definitely be staying again when I’m next in Manly.
awesome place in central Manly location! highly recommended

Everything was amazing. I have stayed here twice within one month and it was great! Ziggy was so accommodating with checking in early for a wedding I needed to attend and late check out when needed as well. I will be staying here again!

Exceptionally clean apartment just one block from the beach with everything you could want.   The shower was awesome.  The bed was very comfortable.  It’s even possible to see the sea from the balcony.  The use of the underground car park made life very easy.  Ziggy was extremely accommodating.  A great stay.  Will be back!

This was a great place to stay for a couple of days chilling in Manly. Clean and comfortable with everything we needed. The location is fantastic - very close to the beach, restaurants and shops but still nice and quiet for a good night's sleep. Would recommend.
Great communication with Ziggy. Made it all very easy. Apartment is in great central location, close to everything which was very handy. Clean and nice light. Would recommend.
Great space, great location, what more could you want!

Ziggy’s apartment is in a fantastic position between the harbour and the beach (it even has water glimpses). 
Communication and check in was timely and easy. 
It is a very clean and spacious studio apartment. 
When we are back in Manly we will stay with Ziggy again.

Bright and spacious little apartment in Manly, perfect for a short stay. Ziggy and his wife were great hosts, very welcoming and helpful. The apartment is in a fantastic location. Walking distance to just about every Manly attraction.
Great place to stay in Manly - the apartment was clean and had everything we needed. Would highly recommend to others
Great location, close to the beach and shops. Very clean and nice apartment.
Modern clean and great location
Fantastic value and location. Super clean and nicely redecorated. Wouldn’t hesitate to book again

Thanks for having us and your understanding with our delayed checking in. 
The accommodation was excellent and very clean, loved the extra touch of providing beach towels and soaps, shampoo etc. 
Will highly recommend to anyone. Thanks Stacey
Great location in the heart of Manly, surprisingly quiet too. Perfect for a couple, the apartment has everything you need - a home away from home.
Great location, spacious well appointed apartment.  Top host, looking forward to returning one day.
Outstanding location, very clean and has all the amenities needed for a great stay in Manly!
Clean, close to town and Ziggy is a legend

Central accomodation in Manly in a modern style. The apartment is on the top floor and you have a little bit of ocean view. It is very gut supplied with kitchen affairs and also different sorts of cappuccino and tea are available. All the furniture is in white and in the bed you can sleep very well. We loved it and would come here again!
Great unit everything in it you will need. Right in the heart of Manly so no need to drive anywhere. Highly recommend to all.

This studio apartment in the centre of Manly is  modern, clean and convenient to all of Manly's attractions. The beach is only minutes away, as are the shops, the ferry and other transport. The apartment has all of the amenities you would require for an enjoyable stay.

Amazing location, so close to the ferry and even closer to the beach! Ziggy was so helpful as I needed an early check in and he was there to let me in no worries! Very clean and had everything I needed whilst being in Manly. Thank you!
Awesome location and well fitted out. Thanks Ziggy.

Ziggy’s studio is in an amazing location. You definitely can’t be more central in manly. A short walk from the beach, the ferry dock, the nightlife and all the restaurants. It’s a small-ish studio, but on on the top floor of the building and has a great and large patio. The plunge pool on the 3rd floor is very small so don’t expect a large pool...and with the beach that close, who needs a big pool!? 

Ziggy was great. We had another host bail on us the day we were supposed to check in, Airbnb cancelled the reservation and we were left with nowhere to stay. I booked into this new apartment and Ziggy was there, communicating and helping us find the place even though we booked the day of. Two thumbs up!
Amazing place, super close to the beach! Extremely clean and secure

Ziggys place is excellent.. its clean, pretty modern and has all of the things you need to keep going... its on the top floor, which is nice as well... the most important thing is that it is in an excellent spot with some brilliant things at the front door... super convenient to excellent beaches or ferry transport... markets on the weekend just outside in the mall.... several great coffee shops in the area and a really great little sandwich shop just outside... i would stay again....

A great spot in the heart of manly beach- close to the Main Street and a block off the beach. 
Ziggy’s place is spotlessly clean and he is a very attentive & accommodating host.

The only negative is that the sofa bed is not too comfortable- (mattress is thin and sags in the middle) but probably fine for a small child. 

I highly recommend this place.
Ziggys place is really close to the surf and lots of food outlets. Very safe and clean. Nice gym on site.
Great location and apartment.

We had a wonderful stay at Ziggy’s place! Everything was spotless and Ziggy has thought of everything.

The bed was super comfortable, the appliances and furnishings were modern and every other mod con was accounted for - even a blender <3 

We already knew the pool and hot tub weren’t the star of the show, but that’s a-okay, because you are a stone’s throw from the refreshing and exciting Manly Beach!

We were really sad to be leaving and hope to be back soon
Fantastic location just off the Corso, and metres from the beach. Clean and comfortable, all as advertised.
Great place! Exactly as advertised and Ziggy is super responsive. Highly recommend.
Great unit in a fantastic location. Was EXACTLY what we had hoped for and Ziggy was flexible in meeting us to let us check-in a few minutes early.  Wonderful stay and highly recommend!
Ziggy’s place was great! Very clean, quiet and fantastic location right in the center of town and minutes walk to the beach. Would stay again.

name: Beautiful flat in Hong Kong Island (Sheung Wan)
summary: Just 1 min away from SHEUNG WAN station, 10 min walk to CENTRAL. SPACIOUS walk-up 2 bedroom flat. Fully furnished modern, bright, clean and very quiet. 1 room available , with super size single bed, air conditioner, small table, ceiling cabinet, and two racks where you can easily hang your clothes.  You’ll love my place because of the location, the ambiance, and the neighborhood. My place is good for solo adventurers and business travelers. If stay for long term, the rent is negotiable.

Eduardo war immer erreichbar und konnte immer hilfe leisten falls dies notwendig war. Er hat uns dabei geholfen uns in der stadt zurechtzufinden und unsere trips zu planen.
Er war immer super freundlich und gut gelaunt.

name: Jolie Chambre-Grande Maison-10min Bondi beach
summary: The house is 10min walk to  the Beaches ; Bondi Beach, Tamarama and Bronte beach And 3min from buses on Bondi Rd, that can take to the city or/and Bondi Junction And only 10min walk to Bondi Junction You have close restaurants, and grocery shop next door (situated on Bondi Rd) You'll find all the amenities that you need in the house, TV, internet... We have a big garden at the back of the house, who is really sunny (on sunny days) and a large living room and kitchen, two toilets and one bathroom.

name: Self-contained beach accommodation near Manly
summary: A beautiful room overlooking a sunny garden, just a few minutes walk to Curl Curl & Dee Why beaches & ideally located for tourist destinations in & around Manly, the northern beaches & the stunning city of Sydney.  You’ll love the Garden Room because it is quiet yet in a beautiful location, with close proximity to wonderful walks, beaches, restaurants & public transport.  Ideal for a couple or single female.
space: The Garden Room is a completely self-contained space within a quiet family home (we have 2 well behaved children aged 13 & 12).  As our welcomed guests you will have access to a well equipped kitchenette within your living space, a large private ensuite bathroom, plus your own spacious deck (with table & chairs) overlooking a peaceful, sunny garden.  If the weather is not so good you have a table & stools to enjoy using inside the Garden Room.
description: A beautiful room overlooking a sunny garden, just a few minutes walk to Curl Curl & Dee Why beaches & ideally located for tourist destinations in & around Manly, the northern beaches & the stunning city of Sydney.  You’ll love the Garden Room because it is quiet yet in a beautiful location, with close proximity to wonderful walks, beaches, restaurants & public transport.  Ideal for a couple or single female. The Garden Room is a completely self-contained space within a quiet family home (we have 2 well behaved children aged 13 & 12).  As our welcomed guests you will have access to a well equipped kitchenette within your living space, a large private ensuite bathroom, plus your own spacious deck (with table & chairs) overlooking a peaceful, sunny garden.  If the weather is not so good you have a table & stools to enjoy using inside the Garden Room. You will have your own independent access through the back entrance sliding doors (watch out for the friendly golden retriever), with a larg
neighborhood_overview: North Curl Curl, especially up on the headland, is unique as it's one of the quieter beaches with little development (except at either end of the beach).  North Curly has a superb surf beach (probably the best next to Narrabeen for keen surfers, yet safe enough for beginners too).  You can walk down to Curl Curl beach & Dee Why beach in minutes, & of course there are the superb restaurants along Dee Why beachfront to enjoy.  If you are reasonably fit you would enjoy the cliff top hike between North Curl Curl Surf Club & Dee Why beach, & of course you can also enjoy the superb walk from North Curl Curl to Manly (45-60 minutes walk), which meanders along beaches, through landscaped parks & a stunning boardwalk.
notes: FYI we do have a (very quiet) friend who stays in our cabin sometimes but she is hardly ever there!  We also have a golden retriever & 6 chickens/bantams (feel free to feed the chooks & take an egg or two if you find any there).  We also have a veggie patch so feel free to help yourself if there is an excess of any fresh veggies in there ; )
transit: Bus transport connections are superb for Manly, the city & Chatswood, which you can access at the bottom of our road.  No need to worry about finding a parking spot near the beach - you can just walk to either Curl Curl or Dee Why beaches from the Garden Room in just a matter of minutes!
access: You will have your own independent access through the back entrance sliding doors (watch out for the friendly golden retriever), with a large sunny back deck for your private use to enjoy leisurely breakfasts overlooking our garden while listening to our chickens.  You also have exclusive use of a large sumptuous & contemporary ensuite bathroom.
interaction: We will most likely be home but sometimes we are away - you may well not see us even if we are home as you have your own independent access to the Garden Room.  Of course if we are home, then please do wander upstairs to ask us any questions you may have.

I'm on the side of the new subway station that will be ready on August 2nd 2016. It's right next to the Leblon shopping mall, bus stops, shops, banks, pharmacy, restaurants and bars. You will love my space because of its comfort and location. My space is good for couples, solo adventures, business travelers and families (with children).

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Olá! Tenho 27 anos, sou atriz e conheço bem o Rio de Janeiro. Ofereço quartos em meu apartamento e minha atenção para que você passe lindos dias na cidade maravilhosa.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: O apartamento é ótimo e a Sara (amiga Sabrine) super atenciosa e flexível! A localização é excelente (na divisa de Leblon com Ipanema, próximo a lagoa), o metro é em frente ao predio (nova linha que abrirá ao publico em alguns meses). Ap é claro, exatamente como nas fotos! O único ponto é o nível de ruído atual. A construcao do metro/reforma do canteiro central é bem próximo ao ap e o barulho é moderado durante o dia, tb c movimentação em algumas noites, o que deve durar mais algum bom tempo. Além disso, o predio está em reforma externa no térreo e o nível de ruído foi muito alto no período em que estivemos. Depois da reforma ficará lindo! Obrigada pela acolhida Sara!
Mesmo chegando às 6:30 da manhã e com apenas um dia de antecedencia para a reserva fomos recebidos muito bem e fizeram de tudo para garantir que nossa estadia fosse perfeita. Localização excelente.

Apartamento incrível na melhor localização possível! Alem disso, Sara é muito fofa, educada e faz de tudo para ajudar!
Recomendo muito!

O apartamento é maior do que parece nas fotos, para um casal o espaço é ideal. Estava tudo limpo e organizado. A localização é excelente, perto da praia, do shopping Leblon, na frente do metrô, perto de lojas, mercados, restaurantes e cafés. A anfitriã é atenciosa e disponível. O prédio é reformado e os funcionários super educados. Voltaremos com certeza! Ahhh Rio, que cidade maravilhosa!!!

The apartment is clean, spacious and well equipped. The localisation is perfect: in front of metro, near the shopping Leblon, 2 blocks from the beach. Sabrine was very reactive, the checkin and checkout were well organized. Excellent value for money.

name: Bright Architectural Oasis w/Chef’s Kitchen #10305
summary: JUST GUT RENOVATED. No cost was spared in remodeling this sun soaked wonder, a high end chefs kitchen w/ induction stove, all-clad cookware, an airy living room, full bath & separate shower.  A private apartment 36 steps up a brownstone w/ your own separate keyed entrance. Close to Central Park, Columbia University & subways. This 2-bedroom is furnished w/ high end elements (Miele Washer/Dryer, monogram appliances, designer mattresses) Exacting eco conscious remodel/furnishing.
space: This high end designer art filled apartment provides comfort throughout. Attention to detail and access to one of Harlem's most beautiful neighborhoods  make this place a gem. Any special requests... Just ask.

neighborhood_overview: Central Park is a 10-minute walk south (or 2 stops on the downtown 2/3 train) Playground, pool and soccer field is 2 blocks east of the apartment. Turn left off the stoop and walk until you hit Marcus Garvey Park. Playground, running path and duck pound is 4 blocks west of the apartment. Turn right off the stoop and walk until you hit Morningside Park. Whole Foods Harlem is 2 blocks north on Lenox Avenue. It has a coffee breakfast stand, great salad bar and for pharmacy needs there is a CVS directly across the street.  125 and Lenox is the Time Square of Harlem and has every kind of shop you might be looking for. GETTING FED Below is a list of our selected restaurants nearby:  Directly Across the street is BLVD (Website hidden by Airbnb) which was voted by the food network the best soul food in America and i think it is! Great for dinner, lunch or brunch.  Sottocasa (Website hidden by Airbnb) on Lenox a half block down is amazingly good classy pizza wine etc.  Barawine  (Website hidden
notes: Completely New ECO designed renovated apartment, as a high end hotel suite. 1. ALL CLAD Kitchen with Induction stove and convection oven 2. Riedel Wine & Champagne Glasses 3. Sleep Cool luxury sheets 4. Fully equipped kitchen for cooking 5. Emile Henry dishes - made in France 6. Mikasa Crystal glasses 7. Luxury bath towels 8. European style heated bathroom towel rack 9. Bathroom heated floors 10. Miele washer and dryer 11. Beds with memory foam and gel mattresses 12. 75" internet connected TV 13. Commercial grade fast WIFI 14. Exquisite bamboo cabinetry, reforested oak floors  15. Nespresso coffee maker and coffee 16. Non toxic paints, and eco friendly building materials 17. Rain shower head. 18. Separate bathtub and shower 19. SONOS sound system (download sonos app to play all your music)  As this unit is so design oriented we would prefer not to have children accept babies (please see our other units which are for kids!)  Please note that this is a 3rd floor walkup (good for the calv
transit: The closest subway is:  2/3 Train (2 blocks north on Lenox and 125th street) A/C and B/D Train (St. Nicolas Avenue and 125th street) There is a bus stop on the corner of 122 and Lenox  There are Citibike stalls a block away in most all directions.  Notable Destinations:  - Central Park: 5 minutes by car, 10 minutes by train, 10 minutes walking - Yankee Stadium: 25 minutes by car, 13 minutes by train - Randall’s Island: 25 minutes by car, 24 minutes by train - New York Botanical Garden: 28 minutes by car, 24 minutes by train
access: The entire apartment will be yours for the duration of your stay!
interaction: I will be traveling, so have asked a concierge service to look after my guests while I am away. They will reach out to you shortly after booking to share check-in details. Should you have any questions during your stay, please feel free to ask away! They're all locals and offer great advice on the city. They are also familiar with my home should you have any questions.
house_rules: We ask that you read and observe the few rules we have placed. We are not only your hosts but also your neighbors. We live in the building with a wonderful 5 year old boy and it is important that the people we welcome into our home uphold the same good habits we try to expose to our son.   READ BELOW -No Smoking inside the building. We ask that you smoke on the lower stoop or the sidewalk and please dispose of cigarette butts to keep our community clean. -No drug use in the apartment or on our property. This is non negotiable.  -We will need to know about any additional guests (outside of the agreed contract) staying in our home. It should be noted that we have a security camera system in place for our safety and the safety of our guests. - please be aware more than 4 adults is not advisable and needs to be approved by us before your stay.   -We ask that you treat the apartment like it is your mother in law's home. Leave it as clean as you found it and if any damage is done we ask that

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: My partner and I are world travelers. We have a beautiful friendly Family building in the heart of harlem.

reviews.comments: Todo muy correcto, el barrio muy tranquilo y lindo

Josh and his wife were great with us!They texed us every day to know if there was any problem or if we needed something.The apartment is beautiful,modern and perfect for 4 (Website hidden by Airbnb) full of light and very clean.The neighbor is fantastic : cheap and great restaurants, bars and shops everywhere. The express train is only 2 blocks away and 10 minutes from Times Square.

Josh was super easy to communicate with. He was very helpful about recommending good places to eat etc. in the neighbourhood. The place was very comfortable and the location was perfect for us.
All in all a great experience!

Great space, wonderful location. The floor mats lining the hallway blocks the way of closet door which is very hazardous my guest injured his face opening the door because of the position of the floor mat. The flimsy shower head  feel and hit me in the face when trying to adjust it which was very painful!!minor fixes can make this place great.. Josh the owner is pretty straight forward and is very friendly. Hopefully this review can help get this place to where it needs to be.
Josh was just a great host; very smooth communication.
everything was great and clean.

Josh a ete un hôte formidable.Très accueillant , chaleureux et de bon conseil.
Sa connaissance de NYC est irréprochable , ce qui nous a permis de découvrir de tes bons restaurants dans les alentours et ailleurs.
L'appartement est très bien place dans le beau quartier d'Harlem , le metro est a 2 pas avec une ligne directe sur Downtown Manhattan (15min a peine). L'appartement est très bien entretenu, propre, agréable, exactement comme sur les photos avec de jolies peintures aux murs.
C'était un reel plaisir de rester ici! Je reviendrais très certainement.
Good communication with the landlord.
The host canceled this reservation 126 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great experiences in NYC. Most of it is because we rant this comfortable house.
Zeer mooi ruim 2 slaapkamer appartment. Goede locatie, alles is voorzien, perfect voor een week NY,...

A beautiful apartment in a great area - we absolutely loved Green's flat and had an amazing time. Green was a fabulous communicator and so helpful throughout our stay. We would recommend a stay here to anyone visiting NYC.

The apartment is amazing, very well equipped and in a very quiet area but just 10 minute walking to Central Park and 15 minutes by subway to Times Square.

Josh has been very kind and attentive to any needs. As I had problems with the virtual key he was waiting for me at the entrance, and even offered us his stroller for our son.

This has definitely been a great choice for our stay in NYC.
Very nice place to discover Harlem.

Lovely apartment in a lively neighborhood. Our host was very attentive and the check-in and check-out process was easy. The cleaning service in between our long stay was a welcome addition that Joshua threw in at no charge. The apartment is great for a family and has most everything you'd need while traveling. We would definitely book again.

Really enjoyed staying at this apartment with my family this week. Josh was extremely flexible with check in and check out and helped us out when Delta lost our luggage. The apartment is bright and airy and the aircon was amazing for NYC August weather!
This place was really lovely, beautiful, peaceful apartment. There were no negatives really, apart from not having a microwave. Other than that it was truely a wonderful way to stay in Harlem

A true gem in the heart of Harlem. My family and I enjoyed our stay! Check in/out was a breeze. The apartment was  cozy and clean, exactly like the pictures. Josh was a very attentive host only a text/phone call away if we needed anything. We look forward to staying again in our future travels to NYC!

A really nice place to spend your vacations ! Everything is great : the apartment, the neighbothood, the location... really near nice restaurants, subway, parks... Josh is really attentive, and it was really easy to speak with him. So don't hesitate come to his place !
The place is lovely. Lots of sun and close to a fun area in Harlem. Will be back

This place is as stated and more.  Perfect for a long stay in NYC.  Spacious and clean.  Easy access to all of Manhattan on the Subway. (A, 1, 2 and 3)  Our hosts were very easy to contact and were able to provide advice when requested.  Good restaurants in the area for late evening meals. Access was easy and we were met on our arrival.  Simple access to JFK (A then AirTrain).  Will recommend to friends travelling to NY.  Thanks.
Great two bedroom apartment in Harlem. Close to train station, supermarket and restaurants.

Ήταν πολυ ευχάριστη η διαμονή μας σε αυτο το σπίτι. Η διακόσμηση ειναι πολυ ωραια. Η οικοδέσποινα ειναι πολυ ευγενική και ήταν πρόθυμη να μας εξυπηρετήσει και να μας βοηθησει σε οτιδήποτε χρειαστήκαμε!

Uns hat vor Allem gefallen, abseits der Touristenströme zu wohnen und trotzdem eine wunderbare Anbindung (Subway) an die Innenstadt zu haben. Die Atmosphäre in der Wohnung ist v.a. durch die hohen Decken wunderschön.

Apartment was amazing even bigger than in the photos ! Great location near the subway and short walk to Central Park. Lots of places to eat and drink nearby. Jessica was a great host very helpful and on our last day we were able to leave our cases in the apartment as we had a late flight. Highly recommend this place !

El apartamento está perfectamente comunicado a dos manzanas de la línea 2/3 de metro en 125 Street (Harlem). Es muy bonito, luminoso, amplio, confortable, tiene de todo y con mucho gusto diseñado. Las camas son enormes y cómodas. El baño pequeñito pero completo. Éramos 4 y nos dieron hasta 8 toallas! ;) Los dueños, Jess y Josh han sido encantadores y mucho tiempo antes de el viaje nos enviaron las instrucciones de cómo acceder a la casa y las recomendaciones de servicios del barrio.  Viven en la primera planta y están accesibles por si hay algún problema. Muchas gracias!!! Ojalá volvamos algun día. 100% recomendable!!!
Lindo departamento, buena ubicación para hacer combinaciones con los subtes y barrio tranquilo.

A perfect space to spend an extended time in NY. It’s got everything including a short walk to the metro, food markets and good coffee. The unit is clean and the hosts are friendly who allowed us to live there like it was our own. The only negative was that it’s on the third floor which made it a little difficult with a 3 yr old. We otherwise recommend this hip and quiet spot.

This apartment is beyond amazing . The bathroom has heated floors, the kitchen is gorgeous and fully equipped, you can buy groceries from whole foods on 125th street and cook. The living room and bedrooms are nicely decorated and comfortable. It was more than what we expected and will definitely book it again for our next NYC trip.

Une très bonne situation près du métro à Harlem mais surtout un logement exceptionnel dans une brownstone typique. Le logement est très contemporain avec tous les équipements nécessaires de très grande qualité.
Jessica est très réactive et réponds rapidement à toutes nos questions.
Je recommande très vivement ce logement (où nous sommes restés 7 nuits) pour profiter de NYC tout en étant au calme.

Green was an incredible host with an incredible home! He was quick to communicate, thoughtful and all around amazing. The home itself is as beautiful as the photos imply. Well decorated, very spacious and pristine! We've bookmarked this property for future bookings and would come again in a heartbeat. Thank you, Green!
Amazing space with all the amenities. Beds were very comfortable; kitchen was well stocked and high tech; and location was great. Highly recommend.

This apartment is beyond amazing!

I rented it for family members visiting from France, and I was actually lucky enough to meet with the architect Scott who did an unbelievable job to fully renovate and redecorate this apartment, really "top notch" now.

please believe the airbnb description about how beautiful everything is, wonderful design, amenities, comfort, space, etc. you won't be disappointed.

Josh is the best possible host and I can't thank him enough (I rented 3 apartments at the same time for a large group of family and friends visiting from France, I live closely with my family).

a real gem, highly recommended!!
We enjoyed our stay at appartament. It was clean, new, stylish. Thanks Michelle !

Our stay here was fantastic! The apartment is stunning and the beds were insanely comfortable. Checking in and out was a breeze! In addition, everything you need (amazing restaurants, Whole Foods, train, etc) is within walking distance. We would stay again in a heartbeat!

Amazing apartment and Harlem was surprisingly nice.
We strongly recommend staying here.
Family of four grown ups from Scandinavia
Nov 2018
Karin
The house is nice, there seems has several hosts, and our host didn't response urgent message very timely.

Everything was great, except the location wasnt the nicest plus for the entire lenght of our stay the shower didnt work properly. Quite disappointed that the host didnt let us know in advance that the home had water issues (despite paying full price), nor even apologized for this inconvenience and the water puddles before we had to complain about this several times.
Great space and very comfortable.  We had some issues with the shower's water temperature and pressure, but hosts were very responsive and did their best to fix all. Overall great stay!

I highly recommend this accommodation! The apartment is beautiful. Sure, it’s in a third floor and it’s a fair bit of stairs but you only really feel that when carrying heavy suitcases! 
But it makes up for it in everything else - check in was super smooth, the flat was spotless, it is decorated with immense taste and is furnished with top notch appliances. The washing machine/dryer are a luxury in Manhattan!
Both beds have beautiful foam mattresses and very soft sheets. 
Also, it’s just round the corner from Whole Foods and a number of lovely places to eat. 


It is a wonderful space and we truly enjoyed staying here very much.

name: Bronte, Waverley - Large Apartment with pool
summary: My place is superbly located close to Charing Cross cafes and Bronte Beach. Minutes walk to Queens Park. Peacefully positioned well back from the street, this stylish renovated apartment reveals an open plan layout with modern, contemporary finishes. Bright and airy with open plan living and an additional office/study zone. Both bedrooms are doubles with robes and storage. The sleek bathroom has gorgeous quality fittings and a large bath. The apartment has a large internal laundry.
space: The sliding doors off the dining area step out onto a sizable balcony. It is peaceful and private overlooking the gorgeous gum trees.

notes: - Our apartment is based in a quiet location with considerate/quiet neighbours. reviews.comments: We had a wonderful stay and the flat was everything we had hoped for. The extra help with cot, pram and even toys for our 15-month old made it so easy. And the flat was in a great area with a few brunch places and restaurants nearby as well as Bondi Junction just a short bus ride away. Overall we'd highly recommend staying here. Thanks Moira!

reviews.comments: Thanks for being a great host
Great apartment

Alquilamos el piso por un mes, fue una experiencia fabulosa. El Piso es una belleza, elegante, cómodo, tenía todo lo que se necesita y está ubicado en una de las mejores zonas de Barcelona. Sabrina siempre estuvo atenta con nosotros. Quedamos encantados con la decisión que tomamos y nos sentimos privilegiados y agradecidos. Altamente recomendado, con los ojos cerrados!
Gracias miles Sabrina!
Estuvimos un poco mas de un mes en el apartamento de Sabrina. La verdad. Ls encantó. Es super bien ubicado, muy cómodo y agradable. Sin duda repetiremos!!
Es un apartamento muy comodo y está muy bien situado , me gusto mucho estar allí , y todo está cerca comercios Restaurates , más bien todo lo que uno espera para sentirse como en casa!!!!!

name: Ohana House retreat
summary: Ohana House is close to nature and all green.  Solar powered lighting. {we  just don't leave lights on all night} But you can  charge your phone ... c-pack.. all the necessities.  Hot water by solar and Propane on demand water heater. No refrigerator/ coolers provided You’ll love  the beautiful gardens and  the star gazing/no light polution!. Enjoy therapeutic tiled steam room. light airy great room the fully equipped kitchen, the cozy nooks the nature trails a quiet  private Glamping experience

host.host_about: i live on property which consists of 4 acres. I'm into green living and have been here off-grid for 36 years. i have a seperate driveway next door and am  always available. I am an artist and this is my gallery!

reviews.comments: Our Ohana House stay was very comfortable.  One of the beds is surrounded on 2 sides with windows!  So perfect to wake up in the morning to a beautiful view of the Ohia forest!  We had a wonderful fire in the potbellied stove at night to take the chill off.  We played games, fixed our meals and generally had a totally comfortable and relaxing time.  It felt as comfortable as "home" with books and magazines to read and games to play.  During the days we went out "gallivanting".  We were a 20 minute drive to Ho'okena (a white sand beach where the dolphins come to swim).  There were coffee farms near by and we were able to easily access South Point (where the first Hawaiians landed on the island!)  This is a very conveniently located area for access to many of the Hawaiian island's attractions!

Wanda contacted me early and was very gracious to meet us and familiarize us with the property; great with communication.  

Guests should know up front that "off the grid" means solar charged battery at night, never a problem for us; and rain water catchment (drinking water is provided seperately.)

Recycling and composting is actively practiced.  

Since evening chill is taken off by use of a wood stove, guests might wish to check exit procedures and test smoke alarms.

Had a wonderful time in this secluded, unique home.  There was so much personality and I had a blast exploring the house. It was a perfect distance from the main city of Kona and Hilo. Close to a wonderful Blacksand beach  and of course the Punaluu bakery! Wanda was a perfect host always checking in to make sure I had everything I needed. She also kept me updated on things that needed to be fixed in the house. If you are a low maintenance traveler this is the perfect place to stay.

This is a creative place to stay with many nooks and crannies to explore.  Wanda is an artist and it shows.  It's off the grid, so don't expect the Hilton, expect a non-traditional home that you will remember and enjoy.  The photos on the site are accurate.  Have fun!

We had a great time at Wanda's place. It's off the grid, quiet, cozy and clean. Wanda let us check in earlier and even provided delicious fruits. Lots of interesting books to browse, great place to see the stars at night and bird watching from the bed in the morning was awesome.

I recommend this stay especially for travelers who have been on the go for a while and need a few nights to recharge, and anyone else who is looking to relax and have privacy. The property is secluded and quiet (other than nature sounds of birds chirping, etc.), it is eco-friendly with solar energy, wood burning stoves, catchment tank, etc, with recycling and compost. The comfort of home without feeling like you've left the great outdoors. Also, a brilliant night sky from a private balcony. It's like camping, only in a big comfortable house designed by a local artist.
Wanda is very nice host.

This place is off the beaten track. We definitely enjoyed are stay
(family of four)

I enjoyed my stay at Ohana House, and I would stay there again.  Guests should keep in mind that this is a rustic, off-the-grid place.  And the location is remote from many of the more popular tourist spots (i.e. longer drives to get places).  But if you are feeling adventurous, or are look for a very quiet and peaceful setting, this is a good choice.

Lots of people could stay here without a problem.  There was plenty of room.

It was nice to be able to come "home" in the evenings and warm up some soup or heat water for a cup of hot chocolate or tea.

Unfortunately, there was an issue with getting hot water to the shower.  We had plenty in the bathroom sink and in the kitchen.  But not the shower.  We improvised by washing there, but a hot shower would have been much nicer.

We went in October, and it is cold and a long way out.  It is more like glamping and not a vacation B&B.  The refrigerator is run on propane and is very old and unreliable, where a bungee cord is used to keep the freezer door closed and sealed.  There were spiders and spider webs throughout the house.  When my daughters sat on the couch and moved a pillow, there were spiders moving everywhere and she killed three of them.  It is very dusty, and one of the mattresses was soiled and should not have been offered for sleeping.  Multiple dog excriment (poop) was in front of the entry door which we go in & out of and was never removed.  We brought our concerns to both the attention of Wanda and Airbnb as I believe we were exposed to health dangers that should be brought to the attention of the County and State Agencies Of Hawaii.  Photos were taken and presented to all parties involved.

We were so uncomfortable we began looking for other accommodations after one night.  While bringing these multiple problems to Wanda's attention, she was unwilling or concerned enough to resolve any of the problems we identified and we were charged for three nights which was her minimal requirement.  I absolutely do not recommend the Ohana House as a vacation stay and in fact raise a RED FLAG WARNING.  It appears to be a bait-and-switch where you stay one night and then charged for three.

Wanda’s “Ohana house “was amazing!;)
She is a great artist. I was so happy to be there. But I just want to say one thing. It was a pretty dark at night. And cold ( Nov). So you need to request to her about many candles ( there were just some candles and light). Phone battery, warm clothes. Enjoy!

Ohana House is wonderful for that secluded getaway you’ve dreamed of. Bring beer and a deck of cards because there’s nothing around you but stars, quiet and the company of folks you brought with ya! Luckily, my friends are awesome and we had an amazing time. 

Read Wanda’s description, because the cabin is EXACTLY as advertised. If stargazing, falling asleep around a roaring fire, short drives to beautiful destination hikes and sometimes a rooster wandering around (that you aren’t particularly sure where it came from or exactly where it disappeared to but it’s in the mix anyhow) are your idea of vacation - then book Ohana House today! 

If you are looking for close access to a white sand beach and a Piña Colada while you watch beautiful surfers touch each other playfully, Yacht Rock playing in the cabana behind you - thisisnotwhatyouarelookingfor.

Vacation responsibly and book the place that’s right FOR YOU. For us, having a short drive to South Point, Black and Green Sand Beaches and epic Volcano hikes was what we were looking for. But remember, this is a cabin. Pack like you are glamping and enjoy Wanda’s beautiful, kooky and wonderful home.

This place is great if you are looking for a camping vibe while on the island. Starting a fire for warmth, washing your dishes and showering in rain water and using flash lights at night. For those that are not used to living out of a city enviroment and do not like "different" this may not work for you. But if you can handle the old style of living it's worth a shot to discover what you are able to handle

The location is exactly as described. It is off-grid. I liked the cuteness of the house except the fact that it was either cobwebbed or stained wherever I could sit or sleep. Though there were a lot of towels available some of them had holes in it. For the price I paid I would expect something cleaner though it’s off-grid.
Nice place to stay at.

name: Enjoy! Your House during the Olympics!
summary: This is your place for the Olympic Games. You will have no problem for moving around, since the condo is 500 m from the Alvorada Terminal which will have direct connection with the Olympic Park. In addition to also make connection with the Galeão International Airport by the BRT Transcarioca. Next to the condo there are several leisure options like Shopping Rio Design, OutBack, Cervantes and Barra Shopping. The condo has parking, swimming pool, sauna, barbecue and exclusive ferry to the beach.

My place is good for couples, business travelers and families (with children). Village house with family atmosphere. Traditional and bohemian neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro.
