name: Modern Beachside Apartment with Balcony
summary: Wind down in an elegant designer apartment just steps from the beach. Indulge in the laid back lifestyle of this space featuring thoughtfully curated furnishings and decor, soothing earth tones throughout, and a private balcony.
space: The top quality of all the furniture, beds, sofas and appliances, and the detailistic decoration, which combines design and contemporary pieces with antiques, makes this a unique apartment. You have a lovely terrace with a table and chairs where relax taking a drink or breakfast, wifi, cable TV...and all the details you can imagine, like first-aid kit, sewing kit, trolley for going shopping, high chair, cot, an office table, rain shower, air conditioned and heating, dishwasher, washer, dryer, several coffee machines...anything you need for a long or short stay.
description: Wind down in an elegant designer apartment just steps from the beach. Indulge in the laid back lifestyle of this space featuring thoughtfully curated furnishings and decor, soothing earth tones throughout, and a private balcony.
neighborhood_overview: Take a short walk to restaurants, supermarkets, shopping mall Diagonal Mar, Rambla Poblenou, the Barcelona promenade, and Mar Bella Beach. Discover the city with buses across the street and the metro just three blocks away.
notes: The apartment atmosphere and the service I will offer you will make your stay unforgettable!!!. This is a legal apartment, with License Number HUTB (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
transit: In the apartment street itself, C. Provençals, you have an underground (Metro) stop only 3 blocks away. Station name "Selva de Mar" line 4 (yellow). This is 5-7 minutes walking to the station. In example to go to the cathedral from the apartment by underground it takes only 10-to-15 minutes ( 7 stops: Selva de Mar- Jaume I). The public transport system in Barcelona is at the highest level in Europe. You can buy a “T-10” transport card for less than 10 euros valid for 10 travels for both bus or underground (not valid for Airport "airbus" shuffle to city) at any underground station. There are automatic machines that sell them in all stations. Otherwise a single ticket's cost is 2€ so it's really worth buying the card, that you can share (it's not individual). Also bus stops only 50m away, and the access by car to “ronda litoral” which is the internal “motorway” that goes underground in the city center is only 100m distance. Also you have three touristic “hop on – hop off” bus stops betwe
access: Guest can access of course the apartment in exclusive, terrace, and the garage.
interaction: I answer fast when asked by email, or I'm always easily reachable by mobile. I am always looking forward to answer to my guests questions!!. I live close to the apartment, and have family same block, so I am around the apartment area often, and might come to see you and check how you are, if you agree. I will ask you during your stay if you need anything!!!
house_rules: - Families and children welcome!, Children ready. - No groups of young people (alone) allowed. Minimum 26 years old. - No smoking, but you have a terrace where you can smoke. - No Pets allowed - No partying apartment (a polite and not noisy behaviour is assumed)

host.host_about:
I was born in Barcelona, and love my city and Catalonia.
I have a background in Security and HSE, and as hobbies, I like cinema, computers, electronics and sports, and above all meeting people from all around the world and showing them my hospitality!
I have been hosting guests for years at Tripadvisor, and probably I am number one in reviews in Barcelona!

address.government_area: Diagonal Mar i el Front Marítim del Poblenou

reviews.comments:
David's large, modern, cozy, clean and comfortable apartment is located in the newer section of Barcelona, in a quiet neighbourhood. The large underground parking is well lit, clean and roomy making manouvering our car very easy. It has direct elevator access to the apartment above, so unloading and loading the car was very convenient.

The area around the apartment has stores, restaurants, a Mercadona Supermarket, and many smaller grocery stores. The sidewalks are broad and evenly graded which makes for easy walking, and clean.

Public buses are frequent and easy to use, and there is an underground Metro station nearby within easy walking distance.

David was what I would call a super host. His apartment was well equipped with every modern convenience and very clean. It was also very well stocked with food; bread, milk, juice, fresh fruit, butter, coking oil, etc., including a bottle of wine.

He patiently and carefully explained the works of every appliance in the apartment, including the use of the television features, and he made sure you are aware that he is available for any question later on. Communicating in English was not a problem.

We greatly appreciated the considerable time he spent providing us with detailed explanation of all the major attractions of Barcelona and how to get there. His Guest Guidebook includes all the details one could possibly ever need while in Barcelona, from managing emergency situations, using public transport, maps, to restaurants, shops, museums and all major attractions. Our visit to Barcelona was made much easier because of the book, and we learned a lot more.

We would recommend anyone visiting Barcelona to use David's place. We will definitely return to David's apartment if we should want to visit Barcelona again. The five days we were there were not enough.
David a un accueil convivial et très précis avec toutes les informations dont vous avez besoins.L'appartement est bien placé, agréable et chaleureux.Nous y retournerons sans hésiter.

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour dans l'appartement de David. Il est très bien aménagé et confortable. L'appartement se situe à environ 20 minutes à pied de bars et discothèques pour sortir le soir et proche des transports en commun pour rejoindre le centre-ville. 
L'appartement est très propre et bien équipé (serviettes, plaids, petit déjeuner, savon, etc.)
David nous a donné beaucoup d'informations (attention à ne pas être trop long ;-) ) pour se restaurer (très bonnes adresses), visiter et sortir!
Je recommande cet appartement.

Nuestra estadía de 16 días en el departamento de David fue fabulosa. El departamento era espectacular y limpio, con una muy buena ubicación en una zona moderna y silenciosa de Barcelona. 
David es gentil, empático, correcto y por sobretodo, amable. Siempre disponible 24 horas ante cualquier duda o circunstancia. Nos recibió con comida, vino y muchos otros artefactos que fueron indispensables en nuestra estadía allí (shampoo, pasta de dientes, elementos de limpieza). No solo eso sino que también, se tomó el tiempo para explicarnos los lugares que no nos podíamos perder, y los restaurantes a cuales ir.  Fue un placer para nosotros poder conocerlo, y estamos seguros que en nuestros próximos viajes a Barcelona, contactar a David será nuestra primera opción. 

En fin, nuestra estadía en Barcelona fue asombrosa, y gran parte fue gracias a David. Nos hizo sentir en casa. Muchas gracias!!

Excelente todo!! David además es muy atento, si quieres te ahorras dinero en guías y libros sobre Barcelona y Cataluña ya que te lo explica todo. Inclusive se ofrece para llevarte a ver sitios que nadie ve. El apartamento a dos pasos de la playa, del Mall y del Metro con el cual podes ir al Centro Histórico, mucho mejor que quedarte en el mismo ya que ni dormirías... Recomendable !!!!

David est un hôte particulièrement accueillant et arrangeant. Il nous a grandement conseillé mes amis et moi sur la ville de Barcelone. Son appartement est très propre et cocooning. Merci encore à lui pour ce séjour je le recommande.

Booking a holiday at this lovely apartment affords the luxury of two vacations rolled into one -- to easily explore the vibrant city of Barcelona, plus relax and unwind at the beach.  That's reason enough to chose to stay at Centric Boutique at the Beach.  What comes as a bonus is David, a host who takes pride in what he does and who understands that "goodwill is everything".  It is no surprise that the owner has been awarded the Tripadvisor Certificate of Excellence.  

David keeps in touch, checking in to see if/what there is anything we need, in addition to recommending places to visit.  It's not just lip service.  For example, we suggested he consider adding a mat in the bathtub, which could be a bit slippery.  Later that day, DONE.

For example, when it was was time to vacate after our ten-day stay, we asked if would do us the favour of arranging for a mini-van to pick us up at 5:30am, as we were taking a train on to San Sebastian, and couldn't risk any misunderstanding if we tried booking this ourselves.  After checking around, David came back with an answer.  The going rate was too high and he was still looking to find us much more reasonable transportation.  He DID.

This beautifully decorated, two-bedroom apartment is everything as described, well-equipped, well-stocked, clean and comfortable with a lovely balcony and close to all amenities.  

Do we recommend it, most definitely YES.

Our stay at David's apartment was everything it was supposed to be and so much more.  One of the main reasons we chose the apartment was the great reviews that David received as a host.  It turned out that those reviews didn't do him justice.  From the moment I booked, David made sure to stay in contact with us to ensure that we would be fully prepared for our Barcelona experience.  He even offered to pick us up at the airport!  Upon arrival, David gave us a car tour of the city and took us to some out of the way sights that we would have otherwise missed.  The day before we were leaving, I received a message from David offering to drop us back at the  airport.   He went above and beyond to make sure that our time in Barcelona was as wonderful as possible.  David is the ultimate host and I can't recommend him highly enough.

Tout d'abord 
L'appartement été très propre dans un endroit calme  a côté de la plage ça traversant un rue pour arriver à la plage ,,

Dans l'appartement y'a tous ce qu'il faut pour la cuisine,,
Le toilette aussi y'a tous ce qu'il faut de Serviettes et savon ،، 
Je me sentais comme si je suis  dans mon appartement.
 
David est un personne  merveilleuse il a bien nos accueillir dans son appartement,, il a nous donné toutes les informations touristiques sur la ville.
Et il était en contact avec nous Pendant notre séjour pour savoir si on besoin de qqch ou pas .

David is truly a wonderful host. He really took his time to make sure we had all information about the apartment, the area, restaurants, public transport etc. That was wonderful. We felt David was there to help if anything. We had a great weekend!

David is a fantastic host.  Not only did he explain everything about his wonderful apartment, but really covered a lot of detail about the surrounding area - places to eat, drink, avoid!!!  

The apartment is lovely.  Everything works fantastically well. 

If you are going to the CCIB or beach, this is perfect.

Thank you David.  Fantastic host and fantastic apartment.
Tony

Lovely place in between Barcelona and badalona. Great location for shops and a beautiful beach just a few minutes walk. David is a great host and this is his full time job so reply’s within a few minutes and is always on call.  He asked us for 2 and a half hours of our time on arrival to explain the apartment and area which isn’t really needed and can be abit over helpful at times which some people might find annoying but overall 5/5 from me.

Large apartment within close distance to the city of Barcelona. Good for families or couples as the apartment has two bedrooms with a double bed in one and a queen size in the main. Good sized kitchen with all amenities including a washing machine and dryer. Even supplies such as butter, jam, milk, tea, coffee, wine, olive oil, etc available. Good sized lounge room with views of the courtyard in the middle of the apartment complex. Train station only a 5 minute walk with the underground being a great way to get around. David provided very in depth details and maps of things to do and see in Barcelona and details of the best ways to get around. He was available to answer questions prior to our arrival and during our stay. Check in and out was easy as David was very flexible and able to work in with our flight schedules.

Where to begin? Yeah! David, the owner. It's really hard to described how helpful and awesome he is. The best host in all our life. Very kind, friendly. You can always count on him, in every details. He took care of us before we even arrived. He explained how to get to the apartment in the best way. And he was there when we came. Ready to tell us everything. You can ask him about even unexpected things about your stay and be sure he will find an answer in a very short time. How to get to any museum or tourist attraction, where to go in Barcelona,  what to do with kids, where to go to a whole day journey outside the town etc. He's knowledge about Catalonia's history and Catalan architecture is unbelievable. We spending a whole week in Barcelona with our little daughter. She was so happy possessing her own room so she would not go outside. She told us every day she find herself as a princess. She's eight and believe me, she will never said this in our flat. The apartment is amazing. Full of every conveniences you need. Honestly, we haven't got in our own kitchen so many stuff. The apartment is stylish and cosy. So you could feel very comfortable here during your stay. If you need coffee you could make it in many ways, you could cooked here, prepared a dishes, and what it's really really awesome, you could spend a whole evening or night on a lovely terrace. But who wants to stayed on a terrace in Barcelona? If you decided to explore a town, you will find in David's apartment a special guide book which he prepared for his guests. You can't miss it. It's huge as an Encyclopedia Britannica. Neighbours are friendly, you will find a nice bakery and full equipped stores just around the corner. Location is just excellent. Lovely beach is a few blocks from your apartment, underground station just five minutes by walk. Bus stop is on the same corner as a David's apartment. It's hard to believe, but yes. You will find there everything what every high-maintenance resident need. So, if you really want to enjoy your stay at Barcelona, choose this unusual opportunity for living. You will not regret. We are sure! We fell in love with Barcelona, we fell in love with David and we plan to go back as soon as we can. What about next week?

David is an excellent host, very knowledgable.  His apartment is in a quiet block and looks as good as the photos.  We were attending a conference at the CCIB and it was a 15 min walk along by the sea. It is also about a 10-15 min walk to selva de mare tube station.  Just over an hour from the airport.

It is hard to write a review which should be full of superlatives, without making it sound false, but I must try!  
David is truly the perfect host: his love for his city and his dedication to hosting, means he is incredibly generous with his time- the check in is amazing...  The flat is lovely with lots of style, and very well furnished, the location a stone's throw away from easy and quick connections into tow is fantastic.
I would recommend anyone visiting Barcelona to stay at David's: i simply could not rate him high enough!
David is a very nice guy, everything is perfect.

David was the perfect host. He was there to meet my friend before I even reached Barcelona, and helped us when we lost a passport. He offered such great insight into all the best things to do and see around Barcelona, advising us on the best routes to get to the popular destinations. The flat was beautiful, with a big kitchen. Walking distance from the metro, we found it very easy to get into the City, without having to pay for a taxi.

David is a very nice person. On our first day in Barcelona, our car has some problems, none of us can speak Spanish so we call David and he came and help us and solve problems. Also, his apartment is very good and tidy. It is good choice for 4 or 5 friend or family to live. Only 5 mins to the beach and shopping mall very convince. We really enjoy the day in Barcelona. Last, David will give you a lot advices for traveling in Barcelona. His apartment is the best choice
Espaço incrível, localização maravilhosa e uma super hospitalidade. Barcelona é SENSACIONAL. Espero voltar em breve!
This apartment is great for visiting Barcelona!!
Très bon appartement !!! et super bien localisé.

really I don't know from where I will start
the apartment location is perfect near to bus station . underground metro. tourist bus. supermarket .shopping mall . bars .
the apartment decoration is amazing appliances. heating .air conditioning . terrace .
he made  amazing book that book has a lot of information for the gust 
david really friendly man he is so so so nice 
he come with us to the hospital after that he take us for tour trip for hole day 
really it was best apartment in the world 
really I love my stay because of you 
he didn't leave us any time 
all the time he keep contact me 
we love our stay and I will come again and again to your apartment
I recommended this apartment for all 
you will not fined better this apartment in Barcelona
hope to see you soon david

We hebben een fantastisch verblijf gehad hier!
Het appartement is mooi, netjes, schoon, goed uitgerust. We hebben niets gemist, tot aan strandhanddoeken en strandspeelgoed toe. Bedden zijn goed, banken zitten lekker.
Goede WiFi.
David had zelfs allemaal eten en drinken voor ons klaargezet, zodat we voor de eerste dag/ontbijt al verzorgd waren.
David kan alle info en tips geven over de hele stad etc. Hij reageert op al je vragen direct en staat altijd voor alles klaar.
De locatie is ideaal met kinderen, rustig, lekker dicht bij strand en goede aansluiting op alle OV.
Ook voor een congres in het ccib perfect gelegen, minder dan 10 min lopen.
Kortom: perfect voor stedentrip en voor congres!

David ist ein super Gasgeber mit vielen hilfreichen Tipps.
Alles in einem hat man einen schönen Aufenthalt. Die Lage des Appartements ist zentral, liegt jedoch nicht im Herzen der Stadt.

David’s apartment was a wonderful spot for myself and a colleague attending a conference at the convention center. It was a quick ten minute walk there, and yet we had a wonderful place apart from the hustle and bustle. The apartment was extremely well appointed (including coffee, milk, fresh fruit, and muffins!) and within walking distance to a metro stop and the beach. The balcony, looking over the central courtyard was also lovely. It was everything I was hoping for, plus a supremely knowledge, and friendly host!

Well what can I say...what a fantastic few days in Barcelona! David was an amazing host, providing us with tonnes of info about Barca; where to visit, how to get about, as well as some local places that are usually hidden to tourists. The apartment itself was awesome. Perfect location, immaculately clean, luxurious, fast wi-fi and the cupboards were stocked with treats! So often apartments are not what they say on the tin, but David's 100% is, and then some. He really does go above and beyond for his guests and is always available if help is ever needed. Can't recommend Davids apartment enough and we can't wait to be back!

I highly recommend staying at David’s apartment. He puts so much effort into being the best host possible. He treats his guests like family and it makes such a difference in the overall experience. The location is excellent next to the beach, great parks for children, easy transportation, and nice restaurants. Thank you, David!

You can expect a great host and exactly what you see in the listing.  The location across the street from the beach is perfect. David had a handmade guide book available in the apartment to make exploring Barcelona easy.  Fabulous!

David is the very most professional, helpful and considerate host I ever met, he provides you more than you could ask for. And the apartment is very well organized. Will definitely come back in the future.

We had a great time in a beautiful city, in a beautiful apartment.  David is a wonderful host and very informative.  The apartment is spacious and immaculate.  David is a gracious host and I only wish we were able to spend a few more days in the apartment and explore the city more.  Thank you David!

David was hands down the best communicator we have ever worked with during our travels. His response time was great, along with his response to our questions came so much information as to what else do in and around Barcelona. 
Fortunately, for us he had an available day to give us a tour of many sights. He took us to places that are not on the usual tourist’s bucket list. 
We thoroughly enjoyed our tour! We rented a car so having driven around the city, previously with David, made our adventures go much more smoothly!
David’s apartment was clean and very comfortable! I highly recommend booking with him!
Thanks David!
David kümmert sich vorzüglich um seine Gäste.

We would thoroughly recommend David’s apartment - from the friendly welcome and excellent local tips at check-in, the perfect location with the beach very close and the city sights a short trip on the Metro and a stylish and comfortable apartment with thoughtful extra touches. Thank you David!

We are a family of 5 and we can only highly recommend the apartment, its location to site seeing, transportation and the beach. We felt secure and safe in the area and the apartment had everything a family would need, including parking, great Wi-Fi, cable TV, good beds, good space and all the amenities of home. The host was incredibly accommodating, informative and friendly. Here is my note to the owner -  We are back in the States after a very long journey with a cancelled flight!! We truly enjoyed staying with you and your help and hospitality was greatly appreciated. The thoroughness that you went through to ensure we knew the apartment well, the local area and the do's and don'ts in Barcelona, made our trip so much better. and of course thanks so so much for taking us to the airport on the last day, with the taxi strike, that would otherwise have been a big issue for us.

David is so hospitable. He had so many nice touches to make life more convenient such as a kitchen stocked with coffee, milk, fabulous muffins, fresh fruit and even his favorite wine.  He is always available for help or advice and tries to do what he can to make your stay extra special!

Had a wonderful stay at David’s in Barcelona. He was very helpful in organizing the transportation to the unit(which was considerably less expensive than what I’d found online, worked out to 40€ one way and 45€ the other but there are 5 of us so need a bigger taxi) and was waiting when we got there. The hop-on hop-off bus stops nearby which was handy for us and there were many nice restaurants nearby as well as the beach, though wouldn’t recommend the beach. We were coming back from Croatia, they’re much nicer there. To be fair my understanding is most locals go to the beach outside the city where it’s quieter and nicer. Such a beautiful city and this unit is a great place to start if you want to see it!

Congratulations David,
Our stay was fantastic, accommodation very good, location is also good.
The tips that David gave us were very useful.
I strongly recommend ...

David est un hôte exceptionnel ! Logement au top, guest book mieux que de nombreux guides professionnels, conseils personnalisés, bonnes adresses, disponibilité totale! Si nous revenons à Barcelone, ce sera chez David!

David nous a accueilli chaleureusement ! Nous à expliqué tous les coins de Barcelone à visiter et à même créer un livre où se trouve toutes les informations nécessaires (visites, restaurants etc) top ! 
L'appartement était propre et très joliment décoré, proche du métro et surtout de la mer ! 
L'appartement est également bien équipé, cafetière, serviettes, ustensiles de cuisine, machine à laver, sèche linge et j'en passe. Il ne manque rien. Les lits sont confortables, pas de bruit pour dormir ce qui est très important pour moi. 
Lors de notre arrivée, David nous avait préparé une belle coupe de fruits, mais également acheté de quoi déjeuner et même du vin . 
Je recommande vivement son logement ! David est un super hôte !

Die Wohnung ist nur zu empfehlen. Sie entspricht eins zu eins dem Profil. Auch die Lage ist perfekt. Direkt am Meer und mit der U Bahn ist man schnell an allen wichtigen Plätzen Barcelonas. Der Gastgeber selbst ist sehr bemüht und gibt einem viele Tipps was man in der Stadt erleben kann. Alles in allem würde ich die Wohnung auf jeden Fall wieder buchen. Es war ein toller Aufenthalt.

David was by far the best host I have had since using AirBnB. He is super professional, incredibly friendly and reliable. His beautiful appartment is 2 minutes from the beach, with a supernice garden park and a balcony, it offers EVERYTHING you might possibly need...even a garage spot for your car. David provides his guests with fresh fruit, drinks, sweets, coffee and tea and even a little breakfast. The bathroom is fully equipped and there are extra beach towels ready to use. We LOVED it and can only 200 % recommend everyone to book this place.

From booking to checking out David has been fantastic. Answered all our questions and gave us lot of tips for our stay. There are plenty of amenity within 10 mins of walking. The beach is only 5 mins walk. The flat is spacious and David provide everything. All you need to pack is your clothes. He even provide breakfast items like bread, jam and butter. He even fill the fridge with some drinks and milk. The kitchen has a coffee machine as well. Highly recommended.
Great host and location

The apartment was great and as seen on the pictures! David is a superb host with great hospitality and he gave us some great tips for visiting the city! The apartment was clean and equipped with nice furniture but the location is a bit far away from the city center and from the balcony you can not really see the sea but only the other apartments. All in all it was a great place to stay :) Thx David!

David is a great host!   He has a book full of good tips for visiting Barcelona.   He is willing to help and show you good options for your time in his lovely city.   He clearly wants you to love his city as much as he does.  Highly recommend!
excellent

David made our trip in Barcelona absolutely unforgettable! His apartment is located in a quiet neighborhood, and was the perfect place to unwind after long days of exploring the city. It's super close to both the Metro line and Bus stops, and the beach is a short walk away. David's knowledge of Barcelona's history is incredible; he was able to help us plan out our stay, and make the most out of our experience. The value that he provides simply by being knowledgeable of the city and its best attractions is almost worth the price of staying at his apartment. No matter why you're visiting Barcelona, David will be able to make sure you have the best experience possible. I would HIGHLY recommend his apartment to anyone visiting the city for the first time, or anyone visiting Barcelona again.

The apartment was a perfect spot for our stay. We loved staying away from the busy part of the city and close to the beach. Even though it's cold in November, we went over to the beach almost every day. The sunrises were stunning!  It was very nice to be in a quiet neighborhood and felt great to be out of the touristy areas. There is a grocery store just a few blocks away and a delicious bakery on the next block. Fresh croissants are the best! 

David was very helpful and showed the apartment and also offered to tell us all about seeing the city. He communicated through the Airnbn app during the week to make sure all was okay. The best thing was the refrigerator was stocked with water, milk, orange juice, water and even butter and jam. There was coffee and some muffins and toasts for the morning. What a nice touch to see a bowl of fresh fruit on the kitchen table. After a long day of travel, it was very nice to not have to worry about those things needed for the morning. 

The apartment is in a very quiet area with a balcony and windows that look out onto a park. We couldn't hear any cars or traffic at all.

I will definitely recommend the apartment to others. Even though it's a distance from the main part of the city, the Metro is SO easy to use and we could easily get to all of our destinations. We became Metro experts. What a fantastic transit system. If I return to Barcelona, I would definitely stay here again.

David might be the most thorough and thoughtful AirBnB host in the world. His place is perfect and he adds many nice touches like meeting with guests to go over the city and providing fresh fruit, food and wine for visitors. I can’t imagine a better place in Barcelona!
Die Unterkunft ist sehr gut! Sehr gut ausgestattet und in Strandnähe. David ist der beste Gastgeber den wir bis jetzt hatten. Sehr zu empfehlen!

There needs to be a category above Superhost created for David. He went above and beyond any expectation I had of an Airbnb host, spending so much time welcoming my husband and I to his home, helping us create a custom itinerary for what to see while we were in Spain, and swooping in to help us when a travel plan outside of the city  fell through. Just an absolutely pleasure getting to know him and staying at his place.

The apartment itself is beautifully decorated and well set up, everything you could need is available. It’s in a quieter neighborhood of the city, which was perfect for us traveling with a small child, but only 3 blocks from the yellow line metro station so we were able to get almost anywhere in the city within 15 minutes. I would highly recommend staying there.
Cant recommend David and his hospitality highly enough.

Que puedo decir, una maravilla, David es una persona muy dedicada, te sientes a gusto en todo momento, esta en todos los detalles, impecable e inmejorable experiencia. Sin exagerar. Gracias David nuevamente por todo y por tu linda energía. Abrazo. Hasta pronto!

David was a fantastic host and all 3 of us hope to be able to stay with him again. Please take the time to let him tell you about the city, it’s worth it! The apartment is located in a quiet neighborhood with easy access to the metro, perfect for our few days in Barcelona. It’s a well equipped, comfortable, and stylish apartment. It was absolutely the best place we stayed on our road trip through Spain! We loved meeting David and it set the tone for a magical experience in Barcelona.

David is a terrific host who feels that he has a responsibility to ensure that you enjoy your stay, not only in his home but in Barcelona as well. Because of this, he goes out of his way to provide his guests with the living space and amenities needed, but also all of the information necessary to have an enjoyable stay. His home is perfectly located in a quiet area easily accessible to the main tourist areas by the city's excellent metro system. The apartment is clean, roomy enough for four (or more), and contains everything necessary for a comfortable stay.

pasamos unos días sensacionales, David es un anfitrión de primerísimo nivel, y el apartamento está espectacular, mucho mejor que lo que uno imagina al ver las fotos.
La ubicación también es muy buena, a 500 m del metro y a 50 del bus.
Volveremos seguramente si vamos otra vez a Barcelona.

Having stayed various airbnbs over 4 different continents,  I can honestly say that my stay at David's place in Barcelona has been my best experience. The place was clean, cozy and very close to the city center. We were just there for 2 days but David essentially designed an entire travel plan for us. David truly felt like family during our stay and was incredibly helpful in all aspects. Definitely highly recommend for any future trip to Barcelona!
Alojamiento muy cómodo y con muy buen estilo, con Trasporte muy cerca del alojamiento
David offers great and unique assistance , never before have I stayed in an Airbnb with such a good service, location, design and atmosphere all in one! I highly recommend it!

Wow! What an incredible experience. We can honestly say this is the best airbnb we have ever stayed in and David is the best airbnb host we have ever had. From the moment we arrived, we were greeted the the most warm welcome from David. He personally met us to walk us through the apartment and answer any questions we might have. He even treated us to coffee across the street and helped us plan our sight-seeing in Barcelona (incredibly helpful!). We were in Barcelona for our honeymoon and we were thrilled that we had such a fantastic experience. The apartment is gorgeous, immaculate and very conveniently located with the beach just down the street and a quick train ride to anywhere you may want to go. We really enjoyed the neighborhood as well! He exceeded every expectation we had and if you're looking to stay in Barcelona, THIS must be your home while you're there. We couldn't recommend it more. Thank you for everything, David! It was absolutely lovely.
Off all our travels and staying at AirBnBs this has been the BEST experience we have ever had. Amazing Host.  Amazing Location.  Amazing Apartment. LOOK NO FURTHER, YOU WONT REGRET IT!
Nice and beautiful place. David was really kind and also told us about tips for Barcelona and hidden places of BCN. It was perfect hosting. Thanks for everything:)
David was an awesome host! Very thoughtful, very detailed, very organized and I would stay at his place again in a heartbeat!
David是特别好的房东,细致贴心,非常周到,还准备了许多吃的｡房间宽敞,干净,很舒适,地下停车库也很方便｡

I want to start with talking about the Host, David. David contacted us professionally before our stay so we knew he would be good, but he certainly hit it out of the park with his incredible information about the area, perfectly clean apartment, all the thoughtful extras and the taking care of any question or problem we had (none with the apartment, but we almost missed our flight and he was a great help). David is the most thoughtful, gracious host.
He provided us with all the information we needed and showed us around. The apartment is just perfect! Kitchen is roomy, and it contains everything one needs.
The beds are comfortable, bathroom and terrace overlooking a nice courtyard with olive trees, are excellent. Location is incredible right near all the transportation lines (we never needed to cab it other than our manic ride to the airport when I mixed up our departure time by several hours, metro and bus is right there to all of Barcelona).
David had excellent restaurant, sightseeing and transportation recommendations and was of great help.  He shares everything he knows abour Barcelona, and it is comprehensive. He went way beyond anything I would call usual (though it seems to be for him) to make our long-weekend comfortable and memorable. I consider him a friend now!
Quiet neighborhood. Seems to be a lot of families here and it is very safe. You can walk here at any time, day or night. There is a cooking school right across the street and it was a great deal. 2 blocks over we attended an arts festival, the beach is 2 blocks the other way. On Sunday, we actually walked from La Rambla, to the seaport, down the beach and then to the apartment, seeing sights, people, entertainers and every type of food, beer and wine. What a great place.
We could go on and on, but to summarize, this is a great, roomy apartment, fullequipped, central to all transportation, right near the beach, restaurants and things to do right nearby, David is fantastic (best host ever!). We hope to go back soon.

A fabulous apartment in a great location, quiet, but convenient for public transport, shops restaurants etc. David was a very thorough host, giving lots of excellent tips & advice. We would definitely like to return here.

name: CONDO SUR LE PARC JARRY
summary: My place is close to Jean-Talon Market. You’ll love my place because of the neighbourhood, the ambiance, and the outdoors space. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, and families (with kids).
description: My place is close to Jean-Talon Market. You’ll love my place because of the neighbourhood, the ambiance, and the outdoors space. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, and families (with kids).
house_rules: quiet time after 10hpm... lost key...120$ fees

reviews.comments: My guest and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Herve's condo. Herve communicated well before our stay and was very accommodating with scheduling our arrival and departure times. He was also very responsive to any questions we sent him via text. Upon arrival, Herve provided a tour of the building, its amenities (gym, spa) and the condo itself. The condo is exactly as seen in the photos, new and clean, and felt welcoming. The location was also great - directly across from a large park, while close to the metro, which made it easy for us to explore Montreal.

I had a great stay at Herve's condo. I travelled with my 4 year old. Herve's son (Jean) met us with the keys and gave us a tour. The location is perfect with Jarry park just across the street. The condo is quite modern and extremely clean. There was even shampoo, conditioner and soap laid out in the bathroom - just like in hotels. The shower stall was so lovely. Everything was beautiful I can't emphasize it enough. Communication was easy. Herve was available by phone at all times if I needed anything. Thank you Herve and Jean!

Everything was perfect, we loved our stay to Herve's condo. Herve was on time for the mettings and he answered fast to our questions before our stay. The condo itself was awesome, brand new and clean. I strongly recommand to everybody.

Très bel appartement conforme aux photos. Très bien situé, près du Parc Jary, à proximité des stations de métro et de l'incontournable Marché Jean Talon. Nous y reviendrons et Hervé est vraiment sympathique.

Herve's condo is beautiful. Well decorated and very comfortable for anyone looking to have a clean, private, comfortable place to stay in Montreal. We absolutely loved the location, walking from Jean Talon Market back to the condo was so convenient. There are some great cafe's near by and good transit access. Herve was a great host, very accommodating to our schedule, providing us with maps of the area and great suggestions. Herve and his son Anthony were very friendly. I would definitely recommend staying at this spot!

Great very new appartment in great location near Little Italy and Parc Jerry. Place was clean, modern, quiet and nice.
Would definetly come back

Anthony made my husband and I feel very welcome in his lovely home. It is well located and in a quiet neighborhood. The apartment was clean, nicely decorated and stocked with everything we needed for our stay. Highly recommended!
Very pleasant place to stay & excellent and rapid communication with Anthony. Super clean and new apartment, very well equipped and good location close to Jean Talon/Little Italy.

summary: Moderno, aconchegante com estilo esse silencioso apartamento de quarto e sala está localizado na área mais sofisticada de Ipanema a apenas três quadras do posto 10 entre as badaladas ruas Garcia D'avila e Aníbal de Mendonça. No entorno TUDO Q HÁ DE MELHOR O imóvel acomoda 4 com total conforto.
space: Moderno, aconchegante com estilo esse silencioso apartamento de quarto e sala está localizado na área mais sofisticada de Ipanema a apenas três quadras do posto 10 entre as badaladas ruas Garcia D'avila e Aníbal de Mendonça. No entorno TUDO Q HÁ DE MELHOR O imóvel acomoda 4 com total conforto Em uma área de 50 m², o imóvel possui capacidade de acomodar com conforto até quatro (04) hóspedes. O quarto está equipado com 01 (uma) cama de casal, ar condicionado e ventilador de teto. A unidade também dispõe de armário com bastante espaço para pendurar e armazenar suas roupas e pertences. A sala possui um sofá-cama, ventilador de teto, ar-condicionado, uma TV de Led 32', TV a cabo, internet Wi-fi com banda larga. Planejada e integrada a cozinha em estilo americano conecta a sala, propiciando momentos super descontraídos para quem gosta de cozinhar enquanto desfruta da companhia de amigos e/ou familiares nos dois ambientes. Totalmente equipada com geladeira, forno e fogão, microondas, cafeteir

neighborhood_overview: O entorno também oferece toda infraestrutra e atrativos, como: restaurantes, supermercados, padarias, bares, farmácias, e todo o comércio do bairro. Situado entre as ruas Aníbal de Mendoça e Garcia D'avila a sofisticação é marcante. Uma localização perfeita para àqueles que desejam viver um momento único na cidade maravilhosa.

house_rules: REGRAS DA CASA PORTUGUÊS - ENGLISH - ESPAÑOL 01) O LOCATARIO É RESPONSÁVEL PELO PAGAMENTO DO CONSUMO DE ENERGIA ao longo do período acordado neste contrato. Para a verificação do consumo o registro sinalizado no medidor de energia será fotografado no momento do check-in, e check-out. O resultado do consumo será multiplicado pelo valor do Kw e essa taxa deverá ser paga na saída; 01) THE TENANT IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE PAYMENT OF THE ENERGY CONSUMPTION over the period agreed in this contract. For verification consumption a photo of the record signaled at the energy counter will be taken by the Legal Representative at the moment of the check-in and retaken at the check-out. The result of the consumption difference will be multiplied by the value of Kw and this fee must be paid on the check-out; 01) EL INQUILINO ES RESPONSABLE POR EL PAGO DEL CONSUMO DE ENERGÍA durante el periodo acordado en el presente contrato. Para el consumo de la verificación una foto del registro señalado en el medidor

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Leonardo was born and raised in Rio de Janeiro, along with his multilingual skills, has enabled Leonardo to form an international career.  He speaks English, French, Spanish, German, his native Portuguese and a little bit of mandarin, and has travelled to over 50 countries - dealing with many different cultures, people and markets - where he has given marketing and sales lectures, presentations, all the while developing his own sales strategies.  Leonardo lived in Switzerland working in the fashion industry, and upon returning to Brazil he worked for Brazil's top multinational jeweler in a sales capacity, 2 years of which was managing its international store about the Queen Mary 2 luxury cruise ship.  
Leonardo and Archanjo are together for the last twenty one  years.
Archanjo was Advertisement/Marketing Execute Manager and Teacher of the biggest private University in Brazil.
 He taught several disciplines such as Creation, Art Direction, Experimental Projects Orientation, Graphic Computing, Strategy Plans, Sales, CRM, Customers Behavior, etc. He speaks English, Spanish, French and Italian.
His career was developed since a trainee to the High Administration of the University.
They did decide to join in the segment of rentals like partners.
Both of them are graduated in Publicity and Media, MBA in Marketing and Executive Management experience.
'We don't sale a simple stay. We provide excellent experiences.'

reviews.comments:
Apartamento numa localização fantástica! À pé a gente faz de tudo, inclusive compras nas lojas mais bacanas. O pessoal do prédio é muito gentil. 
Os meninos organizaram as coisas com muito capricho e o apartamento tem tudo o que precisamos durante uma hospedagem curta. 
Além disso, tanto o Leo como o Archanjo são simpáticos demais! Respondem às dúvidas prontamente e ainda dão dicas valiosas do que fazer no Rio.
Foi tudo ótimo. O ap é muito bem localizado, perto de bares, restaurantes, praia e lagoa. As fotos refletem precisamente o apartamento.
Super 10/10
Maravilhoso!! Localização ótima, ap bem arrumado e novinho. Bem recebido pelos anfitriões. Perfeito!

Leo and Archanjo were both their to greet us. They were very friendly and efficient as they showed us around and offered to provide more info about the neighborhood, but since we were familiar already that was not needed. The apartment was comfortable enough for my wife two kids and me.

The only thing missing when we got there were sheets for the day and trundle bed, which Leo promptly went and got for us.

The apartment itself is thoughtfully and colorfully decorated. The internet and tv work well, as do the kitchen appliances.

Leo and Archanjo are the friendliest and most responsive airbnb hosts I've ever interacted with. Obrigado!w

We had a great stay at Leo & Archanjo's apartment. The apartment is even  prettier than the pictures! It was very clean and quite cozy. The location is fantastic, close to numerous bars and restaurants (and to the new subway line). This is a great base to explore Ipanema, Leblon, and the Lagoa area. 5 stars!

Apartamento pequeno, muito bem decorado e com todos os detalhes bem cuidados.  Bonito e confortável.
Uma excelente escolha no concorrido bairro de Ipanema.

Apartamento muito bem localizado! 
Tudo funcionando perfeitamente!
Os donos foram muito simpáticos.
Fomos muito bem recebidos pelo Leo e pelo Archanjo. O lugar é exatamente como prometido e a localizacao e a melhor do Rio.
apartamento fantastico, muito bem localizado e agradavel.

Cosy flat very well located in Ipanema. Everything went well, checkin and checkout were made super easy by our hosts, who kept in touch with us during our whole stay to be sure that everything was going well. Super experience!

Leo y Archanjo son los mejores hosts, el departamento impecable. La ubicación a 2-3 cuadras de la playa ( posto 10 ) de Ipanema. Con lugares para comer. Supermercado cerca y ómnibus. El Departamento es muy cómodo y la decoración genial. Tiene todo lo necesario para la estadía de vacaciones. La verdad no se les escapa ni un detalle. Felicidades Leo y Archanjo!
O apto é exatamente conforme as fotos, limpo e agradável. Fica bem localizado e o anfitrião foi muito receptivo. Adorei e indico a todos!

Nuestra experiencia en Rio fue inolvidable. El departamento era exactamente como en las fotos, limpia, y llena de colores. La posicion es excelente, a 2 minutos de la playa pero con negocios, retaurantes y clubes todo al rededor. La metro Nossa Senhora da Paz dista 300 metros y la zona es segura a toda hora del dia y de la noche. La organizacion y la comunicacion con Leo y Archanjo fue super y lo chicos se demostraron siempre  disponibles para cualquier cosa. Nos servia un tranfert airport/apartment y nos resolvieron el problema. Muuuucho mejor que un hotel. 
Si buscan un departamento en Ipanema este es el mejor!
Gracias por todo Leo y Archanjo!
Nati y Nico

Léo e Arcanjo foram ótimos. Estavam na portaria esperando nossa chegada, subiram com nossas malas.. o apê estava lindo, luzes indiretas, cheiroso.. eles respondem no whattsapp na hora.. adoramos. Voltaremos com certeza!
Apartamento super bem localizado, confortável, limpinho e com cozinha bem equipada para cozinhar. Os meninos são uns queridos, ótimos anfitriões!
Muy buena comunicación con los huéspedes, excelente predisposicion ante cualquier inquietud.
Ótimo espaço para um casal.

Leo & Archanjo foram perfeitos no acolhimento na chegada, momento crítico de uma viagem. 
O apartamento é perto de tudo, super fácil ir à praia. E tem cadeira de praia e guarda-sol, que nos ajudaram muito!
Como houve chuva em alguns dias, percebemos também que o apto tem tudo que se precisa para "ficar em casa" com conforto.
Pretendemos retornar!
Ap super arrumadinho e ótima localização! Próximo a praia, mercados, sorveterias, lojas e restaurantes deliciosos! Super recomendo! ;)

El departamento tal cual como es en la foto.. un poco chico para 4 personas, pero te arreglas. 
El aire de la habitacion no andaba muy bien y entonces hacía calor para dormir. 
Sacando eso, muy bien equipado.
Y leo y Archanjo muy buena onda.

Nuestra estadía en el departamento fue genial. Está muy bien ubicado y tiene todo lo necesario para sentirse como en casa. Leo y Archanjo estuvieron siempre pendientes de que nos sintieramos cómodos. Muy recomendable!
O apartamento é super bem cuidado e bem localizado. Leo e Archanjo são anfitriões muito cuidadosos. Voltando ao RJ procurarei um de seus apartamentos com certeza!

L'appartement de Léo et Archanjo est idéalement situé pour profiter de Rio et de ses différentes facettes. Léo et Archanjo sont deux hôtes attentionnés, de très bons conseils et participent ainsi à la réussite du voyage ! Nous reviendrons !
Todo excelente. El secador de pelo no funcionaba y el tema  fue resuelto en el día.

O apartamento tem uma localização sensacional, há 2 quadras da praia, 2 quadras da Lagoa, 3 quadras do Leblon Shopping, Estação de Metro, ponto de ônibus. O apartamento é ideal para duas pessoas, mas pode ser ocupado por 4 devido ao sofá cama. Os móveis e talheres são relativamente novos e confortáveis. O prédio tem elevador e porteiro, o que também gera facilidade. Certamente, uma ótima opção, no coração de Ipanema e num dos melhores pontos do RJ. Conhecemos somente o Léo, que foi atencioso e sanou todas as dúvidas tranquilamente.

Apartamento super completo, atendeu nossas expectativas, alem de ficar muito bem localizado, proximo a tudo! O anfitrião Leo não poderia ter nos atendido melhor! Simplesmente tudo perfeito, esperamos voltar em breve.
Ótima localização, excelentes anfitriões e com tudo bem pertinho. Recomendamos.
Localizacao excelente, apartamento muito bom, bem equipado, decoração de muito bom gosto e harmoniosa( minha bebê adorou). Muito obrigado e voltaremos em breve.
Bien decorado! Es tal cual se ve en las fotos. Cerca de la playa y de los bares y tiendas de Ipanema. muy recomendable!
Great place!
O apartamento é uma delícia, super ajeitadinho, ótima localização. A experiência foi muito boa. Além disso, Leo&Archanjo foram muito atenciosos e estiveram disponíveis durante toda a estadia.
Ótima localização e recepção dos anfitriões, perto da praia e do metrô, super recomendo!
Muy buen departamento, edificio y ubicación.

O apartamento é exatamente como está nas fotos. É pequeno, mas muito aconchegante e bem decorado.
Não tem barulho de carros e fica bem escuro devido ao blackout, que cobre bem as janelas. 
O prédio fica na melhor parte de Ipanema, perto de vários restaurantes maravilhosos. A praia é linda!
Adorei.
Lovely apartment in a very good location in Ipanema, near bars, restaurants and the beach. Lovely hosts.
Excelente localização, no melhor pedaço de Ipanema. A garagem é um diferencial. Perfeito para um casal! O apê é agradável e lindamente decorado. Adoramos e voltaremos!
Excelente recepção! Ótimo apartamento com localização perfeita. Os anfitriões foram super solícitos e ajudaram em tudo.

Appartement conforme aux photos. Idéalement situé dans Rio, le tout proche de la plage et des restaurants. Leo et Archanjo nous ont très bien accueilli et on été très réactifs à toutes nos demandes. Très satisfaite, je vous recommande ce logement !

Es la segunda vez que nos alojamos en este departamento. Excelente relación precio calidad. Cómodo y muy bien ubicado. Leo y Archanjo son muy atentos y están siempre disponibles ante cualquier consulta.

Estamoa super conformes con el departamento! Es tal cual se ve en las fotos!! Tiene de todo!!! Nos sentimos como en casa!! 
La ubicación sin dudas, es la mejor.. habiamos ido 2 veces a Rio anteriormente.. pero esta zona no la cambio x nada!! La cuadra esta llena d bares y restaurantes!! Todos los comercios!! Podes caminar tranquilo de noche! 
Ellos son super amables... dos genios!! Estoy muy contenta con mi experiencia! Ojala puedan disfrutarlo uds también!!
Todo ha sido perfecto y tal cual se ve en las fotos... una muy buena opción  con una excelente ubicación.

We had a lovely 3 night stay in Leo and Archanjo’s place. The apartment is perfectly located in the best street in Ipanema, surrounding by some great bars and restaurants, plus it’s just 2 blocks from the beach. The apartment has everything you need to cook, although it’s a shame not to try the restaurants nearby. There are some lovely colourful touches that make it feel homely. Only thing we found unusual is being charged for electricity usage during the stay, but I guess if someone keeps the air con on the whole time then it adds up. All in all we would definitely recommend a stay here when visiting Rio!
Local muito agradável, bem localizado, aconchegante, e ótima hospitalidade de Leo e Archanjo, os quais foram super disponíveis e nos ajudaram no que precisávamos. A estadia foi ótima!

Leo & Archanjo fueron muy buenos anfitriones. Nos explicaron con detalle como recorrer la ciudad y fueron super atentos a nuestras consultas. El dpto esta ubicado en ina zona excelente, muy segura y linda. El departamento es hermoso. Gracias!
Leo and Archanjo are excellent hosts. They are responsive, super nice, and keep a stylish place. The location of this apartment could not be better. I would gladly stay here again!

Léo e Archanjo foram extremamente solícitos e amigáveis. Ao mesmo tempo que todo o processo foi bastante profissional, foram nota 10 em dar pessoalidade à experiência. 
A localização do apartamento é perfeita. Todos os melhores spots de Ipanema estão a poucos passos de distância.

Apartamento muy bien ubicado !
Pasamos una estadía genial en Río.
Los chicos fueron muy hospitalarios; 
sin duda recomendamos está ciudad y su hogar

O lugar é igual nas fotos e o Leo e o Arcanjo nos recebem com muita simpatia e profissionalismo cuidam para que tenhamos todas as comodidades oferecidas e o ambiente limpo e confortável.
Obrigada Léo e Arcanjo

O apto é bem pequeno mas muito aconchegante, bem decorado e ensolarado, apesar de ser virado para o fundo dos prédios vizinhos. Talvez no verão fique quente, mas tem ar condicionado. A localização é perfeita e é talvez o ponto mais forte do apto! Muito silencioso (tirando algum barulho eventual de vizinhos), perto da praia, da Lagoa e com tudo em volta. Os anfitriões foram super gentis. Facilidades como um carrinho para compras são um mimo apreciado! Funcionários do prédio muito atenciosos também. Detalhe apenas para a capacidade do apto: não recomendo mais do que duas pessoas, pois só tem um banheiro, a cama de casal é pequena e se abrir a bicama na sala não há espaço para mais nada, principalmente malas (já que no quarto só há um armário pequeno). Eu fui com a minha mãe e dormi na sala para termos mais conforto e individualidade, então para nós foi bom (e guardei tudo no armário). Vale conhecer os outros imóveis que Leo & Archanjo administram. Uma experiência muito agradável ! ótimos dias!

Estamos muy agradecidos con Leo y Archanjo por nuestro hospedaje, son super amables y tuvimos una comunicacion muy buena. El departamento es tal cual se observa en las fotos, muy luminoso y estaba impecable. La ubicacion es inmejorable, la mejor zona de Ipanema, ya se lo hemos recomendado a amigos. No tenemos mas que palabras de agradecimiento, vamos a regresar seguramente!

Leo's and Archanjo's place was everything we needed, had all the amenities and was exactly as listed. We stayed for almost two weeks. 
Leo and Archanjo are extremely nice people, and we would totally come back and stay at one of their places.
Apartamento estiloso, localização excelente, perto da praia e dos  points de Ipanema , ótimo custo benefício, porteiros muito gentis e educados, Léo & Archanjo ótimos anfitriões, super indico

El apartamento es perfecto, lo habitamos con mi esposa e hija y estuvimos muy cómodos. La ubicación es inmejorable, en el corazón de Ipanema, a 5 minutos de la playa y a 1 minuto de los mejores restaurantes de Río de Janeiro. A la vuelta de la manzana sin cruzar una sola calle te encontras con supermercado, kioscos y farmacias. Leo y Archanjo son unos huéspedes de lujo, excelente predisposición y honestos. Sin duda volvería con ellos cada vez que visite Río.

name: Apartamento com vista para o mar no Recreio.
summary: Meu espaço é perto de atividades para famílias e transporte público. Você vai amar meu espaço por causa de a cozinha, o aconchego, as vistas e a localização. Meu espaço é bom para casais, famílias (com crianças) e grandes grupos.

name: Um Quarto Aconchegante em Ipanema
summary: É bom para casais, amigos que viajam juntos, aventuras individuais, viajantes de negócios e amigos peludos (animais de estimação).
space: O quarto possui um sofá cama para casal e uma bicama de solteiro. Acomoda até 4 hóspedes, sendo que é cobrada a taxa extra para a quarta pessoa. Claro e bem arejado.
description: É bom para casais, amigos que viajam juntos, aventuras individuais, viajantes de negócios e amigos peludos (animais de estimação). O quarto possui um sofá cama para casal e uma bicama de solteiro. Acomoda até 4 hóspedes, sendo que é cobrada a taxa extra para a quarta pessoa. Claro e bem arejado. Sem problemas para uso da cozinha e da máquina de lavar roupas. Não é permitido trazer pessoas estranhas.  A acomodação é somente para os hóspedes combinados com antecedência. Metrô, ponto de táxi e paradas de ônibus a cerca de 100 metros de distância. Mercado, farmácia, banca de jornais, restaurantes e lanchonetes que funcionam 24 horas também bem pertinho. Não tem estacionamento tão próximo ao prédio e é complicado para encontrar vaga na rua. Não tem ar condicionado.  Possantes ventiladores de teto nos cômodos e um de mesa extra.

reviews.comments: O apartamento da Teresa é muito aconchegante e confortável. Ficamos muito bem hospedados. Fomos bem recebidos por todos que encontramos; o pessoal da portaria, a Teresa sempre pronta a nos atender e o Ulisses que também nos recebeu muito bem e nos deu ótimas dicas de passeios e viagens. O lugar é ótimo, Ipanema... fizemos vários passeios inclusive a pé. Facil acesso a restaurantes, lojas, meios de transportes públicos, etc. Local bem tranquilo. Tem uma feira grande de artesanato muito pertinho.... cheia de coisas lindas. Praticidade, compromisso, atenção, tranquilidade,  hospitalidade e uma ótima opção para se ficar quando falamos em Rio de Janeiro.

Passei um fim de semana com 2 amigas e adoramos o lugar, perto da praia, transporte publico, mercados restaurantes e barzinho e da feria de Ipanema. O apartamento é bem confortável, limpo aconchegante, a anfitrião foi bem simpática e nos deixou bem a vontade.

O apartamento da Teresa é aconchegante e bem localizado. Entre Ipanema e Copacabana, próximo a estações de Metrô e Bike Rio, restaurantes, bancos. Internet de boa qualidade. Fui com minha família e ela nos deixou muito à vontade. Teresa é prestativa e atenciosa. Voltarei em breve!
El lugar es muy acogedor, accesible y Teresa muy atenta y acogedora

비교적안전한이파네마지역에있습니다.
지하철역이랑해변엄청가깝고 마트주위에있어서 위치가좋아요.
아주머니가 영어를 잘못하시는데 친절하고 집이아주 깔끔합니다.
추천해요

Location is near the metro&beach.
Everything was great.
She don't speak English very well, but she is nice!
House is super clean!
I recommend
Atendeu bem nossas expectativas. A localização é maravilhosa, a anfitriã nos deixou super à vontade. É perto de tudo: praia, bares, estação do metrô, restaurantes...
Localização ótima do apartamento! A casa é super limpa e arrumada, o quarto é confortável e coube tranquilamente 3 pessoas. A Teresa é uma anfitriã ótima, atenciosa e super animada! Valeu a pena :)

Tudo perfeito! A Teresa uma pessoa maravilhosa! O apê super fofo, aconchegante, confortável! O local, melhor impossível! Perto de tudo! As melhores praias á um quarteirão do apê! Realmente tudo o que é anunciado é verdade, até melhor! Com certeza sei onde ficar hospedada na minha próxima visita ao rio! Até breve Rio! ❤️

Me deparei com uma casa suja e em obras. Falta tomadas pela casa, o banheiro estava entupido e nao possuia espelhos, sem contar que a cozinha estava com um cheiro muito desagradável. 
Sem dúvidas, o apartamento tem boa localização o preço é atrativo, porém não estava apto à receber hóspedes.
Great host, super friendly! :) Place as expected as shown in the website.
Persona muy amable y con buena disposición a todo. Departamento muy limpio y ordenado, cercano playas y metro. Totalmente recomendable

Nous avons passés un super séjour chez Theresa. L'appartement est idéalement situé, et très agréable à vivre. Il y a plein de bar et restaurants pas loin et le quartier est très sûr.
Theresa est très accueillante et toujours souriante. :) 
Pour un voyage à Rio c'est idéal !
Apartamento muito bem localizado, perto de tudo. Super confortável, impecável. A Teresa é uma anfitriã maravilhosa, pessoa do bem, alto astral. Te deixa super a vontade. Deu ótimas dicas de passeios.
It was our second time in Teresa's place, always a pleasure ! :)

Excelente localização, perto para ir a pé à praia de Ipanema, a supermercados, a lojas e à Estação General Osório, que nos dá acesso de metro a todos os locais mais importantes do Rio de Janeiro.
Fomos muito bem recebidas pela Teresa, tinhamos fruta de qualidade preparada, café, biscoitos, matte geladinho e uma casa com todos os utensílios à nossa disposição.
O quarto tem o tamanho suficiente para três pessoas dormirem confortavelmente e a restante casa é muito aconchegante. Durante a noite é barulhento, mas todos os restante pontos positivos compensam.
Adoramos!
Recomendo, a anfitriã é super simpática, o apartamento aconchegante e perto de tudo. Voltaremos em breve.

Teresa é uma mulher e anfitriã incrível! Sempre muito prestativa, fez a gente se sentir em casa durante os dias da nossa estadia. O aluguel era de apenas um quarto, mas, no fim das contas, sentimos como se fosse da casa inteira. Voltaremos em breve!

Ótima localização, perto da praia de Ipanema, copacabana, arpoador... Próximo a vários  pontos turísticos e a 2 minutos de distância da  estação general Osório do metrô. Ótima anfitriã, super simpática e acolhedora, deu ótimas sugestões de passeios.

O espaço da Teresa é realmente aconchegante e bem cuidado, a localização é excelente, bem próximo ao metrô, praia, restaurantes, bares e supermercados. A hospitalidade da anfitriã nos encantou, assim como as belezas da cidade maravilhosa...
Excelente localização do lado da estação de metrô, ótima hospitalidade, tudo muito perfeito. Não há o que reclamar !!
Gostamos bastante do local, muito bem localizado, gostamos também da Teresa, um amor de pessoa, muito prestativa e atenciosa. Recomendo!

Muy confortable, muy limpia, ordenada y queda todo cerca (playa, supermercados, restaurantes, etc) 
De todos los espacios que conozco por airbnb definitivamente el mejor y sobre todo por la EXCELENTE atencion de Teresa. Ella prepara las mejores limonadas de todo Rio de Janeiro
Recomiendo!! Muy lindo, limpio y cómodo. Teresa fue muy amable nos dio buenas recomendaciones.

O apartamento é pequeno porém é super agradável. O ponto alto é a localidade e a hospitalidade da Teresa; Recomendo a todos que quiserem estar em um local em conta, bem localizado e numa ótima região. Voltarei assim que possível.
Muy recomendable. Super atenta y siempre predispuesta a ayudarnos. Su hospitalidad es excelente
Ótima localização, muito perto da praia. Hospitalidade incrível.
Schoon huis precies tussen Ipanema en Copacabana strand in. Aardige eigenaresse. Spreekt geen Engels, maar ze probeert het wel en met de 10 woorden portugees die wij kenden kwamen we er wel uit.
Espaço muito limpo, organizado, bonito e localização ótima!

Teresa es muy amorosa y atenta, su casa muy limpia, bonita y comoda. Esta cerca de la playa, metro, buses, mucho comercio.
Todo excelente!!!, gracias!.
Teresa é simplesmente maravilha. Recomento para todos... Eu e as crianças já estamos morrendo de saudades!
Teresa fue muy amable y nos atendió con mucho esmero. El apartamento está en una excelente ubicación.
Excelente anfitriã, muito comunicativa, atenciosa, preocupada com o bem estar dos seus hóspedes, quando eu voltar ao Rio, com certeza será minha primeira opção.
excelente localização, ao lado da estação de metrô General Osório...alem de que a Teresa é muito amável e atenciosa, deixando o espaço muito bem cuidado e confortável! recomendo  a todos!

Teresa é muito simpática e atenciosa. A comunicação entre o anfitrião e os hóspedes foi incrível! Teresa nos deixou a vontade em sua casa, que é, extremamente, aconchegante! Com certeza voltarei mais vezes. Recomendo!
Muito bom !
Lugar incrível! Casa limpa, linda e muito bem localizada. Eu e minhas amigas ficamos encantadas! Teresa é uma excelente anfitriã!
O apto da Teresa tem excelente localização, bem pertinho de tudo e muito perto de Ipanema e Copacabana. O apartamento é aconchegante, limpinho, super organizado e a Teresa foi muito prestativa.

Passei 4 dias do feriado na casa da Teresa. Casa muito bem localizada. Estávamos preocupados por conta de segurança e etc, mas o bairro que ficamos é muito tranquilo e não tivemos problemas com nada. A casa da Teresa é bem equipada com tudo ... ítens de cama, mesa e banho e utensílios de cozinha. O banheiro é a coisa mais linda kk bem clean (amamos) ... A recepção dela foi muito boa e a dos porteiros também. Todo mundo bem receptivo e acolhedor. Voltarei para lá com certeza

name: Large Bedroom in amazing Apt - 10min Manhattan
summary: Enjoy your time in NY with this lovely and spacious  bedroom and its large balcony. Very close to Manhattan, 3-10min to metro GJML and 2 stops to the city. Free street parking.
space: Big bedroom. Share bathroom very clean. Balcony. Big living room with a kitchen available for you with all the furniture needed. Washer and dryer in the basement of the building free to use.
description: Enjoy your time in NY with this lovely and spacious  bedroom and its large balcony. Very close to Manhattan, 3-10min to metro GJML and 2 stops to the city. Free street parking. Big bedroom. Share bathroom very clean. Balcony. Big living room with a kitchen available for you with all the furniture needed. Washer and dryer in the basement of the building free to use.

host.host_about:
Welcome in our 2 Bedrooms apartment. My roommate and I are sometimes out of New York for business trip and we like to fill our empty rooms with incredible guests. It's always a nice experience to meet people through Airbnb and we will do our best to make your staying in New York amazing :)
Enjoy!

reviews.comments: Mathieu and Thomas were perfect hosts. My boyfriend and I never actually got to meet them (lol) because we all had a very busy weekend! Even still, they made us feel very comfortable and at home. The apartment is very nice. The bed is to die for, the balcony that has a private entrance from the room is just great. The bathroom is spacious and the shower is lovely. They had towels and toiletries set up waiting for us and a key we were able to keep for the weekend. The entire space was great ❤️❤️❤️ 10/10 would definitely stay here again! Thanks Mathieu

The guys were great. Mathieu was very welcoming and even offered to let us watch the France championship game with him and some friends at the place. The area was super nice, rather quiet, and parking was easy. It's a great apartment.

Our stay was wonderful with Mathieu! The room was as described, spacious, clean and comfy. He greeted us when we arrived,make sure we have everything we need,suggested some good food around. Mathieu make sure we were comfortable with having friends around the house by notifying us and he even invited us to his birthday celebration. Overall,it was a good stay and we would definitely go back to him again if we ever visit NYC.

Mathieu was really available before and during my stay for questions and tips. His apartment is very well-located in Williamsburg and easily accessible through various subway lines. The neighborhood is safe and the building is super quiet. The room was clean, comfortable and convenient (double bed, desk, access to the balcony), perfect for both business trips and vacational stays.

The apartment was superbly clean, modern, and relaxing. The bed was so comfortable and the bathroom was really really nice. Mathieu was so welcoming and provided us with everything we needed (fresh towels, soaps, shampoos). The airconditioning was also on point for the hot summer days, going back to the place was my favourite time of day because I got to relax in a really nice place. Mathieu also allowed us to use his balcony, which is really relaxing at night. 5/5 stars for this place, I'd go back next time I'm in Brooklyn.
Great spot in a good neighborhood.
J'ai eu un séjour très agréable chez Mathieu & Thomas. Tout était comme sur les photos, agréable et fonctionnel. Merci pour votre accueille et votre aide !

Our stay at Mathieu's and Thomas's place was super! Mathieu was kind and nice to talk to and made sure we had everything we needed. Since we stayed during the week and Mathieu was working, it pretty much felt like the whole apartment was only for us. The location is great too! It's walking distance from several subway stations and the cool streets of Williamsburg. Would definitely recommend staying here!
WONDERFUL! Great location and great hospitality. :) Highly reccommend it!

This was one of our best stays in New York. Room was clean and had a heat on clean bathroom great neighborhood full kitchen. Matthieu was so responsive and helpful. Definitely will stay again for our trip to New York next time ! Thank you ))

It's a very good apartment, clean and nice, the owner is very nice and helpful. 
The location is a bit scary, across a gas station, and going out at night is not that nice.
great apartment ever!

This room exceeded our expectations! While you are looking for an Airbnb you first judge by photos. And I have to say the photos posted are not even as great as how the room actually is. It is clean, bright and beautiful. Even has a cool restaurant a few doors down where I grabbed an amazing burger and chatted with locals. Book with him without question if you want the perfect Williamsburg experience. Thank you again Mathieu!

Perfect Airbnb apartment and perfect host! It's great to share life experience with new people meeting on the road or, in this case, in a house! Mathieu room is very nice, confortable and clean. He is nice on aswering questions and giving advice, even if we didn't got the chance to meet him. We meet his housemate.. Guy, very kind and positive person. Great host, easy to talk with.
The apartment is nice, nicer than you can see from the photos. Clean and modern, with all you may need. 5 minute walk from J Line, 15 minutes from Manhattan. Close to restaurant and grocery stores.
Perfect for your holiday in New York, you can live the cool atmosphere of Brooklyn! Enjoy!

A very comfortable, clean flat....the most comfortable Airbnb experience I have had. Mathieu answers all questions very promptly, all is as described, Mathiu's room mate was lovely and I would highly recommend his place to other guests.
Mathieu and his roommate are both great. Very accommodating despite having a few mishaps checking in. Wonderful neighborhood. Definitely recommend!

Best place we have stayed at in NYC! The room and the apartment is very clean and comfortable. Mathieu was super helpful and kind and his roommate is so nice as well. We definitely recommend this place and would love to go back.

Mathieu's place is in a great Brooklyn location.  Five minute walk to three different subway lines for easy access to Manhattan and other neighborhoods in BK.  Super clean modern space with easy access and available parking on the surrounding streets.  Yes, parking!  Walking distance to some great Williamsburg spots.  Would stay again in a heart beat.

Communication très fluide avec Mathieu, grande souplesse pour les clés au moment du check-in et check-out, tout est propre, compter un peu de marche pour rejoindre le centre de Williamsburg pratique à pied
Mathieu's place was nice and cozy and very centrally located.  comfy bed and very homey feeling apartment. Would definitely recommend to anyone traveling to Williamsburg.

Our stay with Matthieu was wonderful. His apartment was neat and clean. It made us feel like home. Matthieu was also very helpful during our stay. Living at his place definitely made our experience at Williamsburg more pleasant and memorable.

Beautiful, sparkling clean, fresh room in bustling Brooklyn. Easy access to Manhattan ( 5 minutes on foot plus 8 minutes on train.) 
Communication excellent, and all promises and descriptions 100% accurate. Thanks Mathieu.

Mathieu is a fabulous host and has an awesome place to live. The Bathroom was super clean and the apartment is cozy and feels like home. 

Well located to M, G and J trains. 

I would keep coming back to this place and definitely recommend to everyone. 

The elevator was the icing on the cake.

Location and quick responses were just a few
Reasons we would rent from Mathieu again! Great place!

name: Central Waikiki Beauty Close to Everything #AS1508
summary: This corner Studio unit has everything you need for comfortable stay, and all the convenience of a central Waikiki location. Enjoy morning coffee and mountain views for the balcony. Featuring a full size bed, single bed and futon. Complete with a 2 burner cook-top, microwave, some kitchen prep tools, a coffeemaker, beach towels, beach chairs and a beach umbrella.
space: This high floor Studio unit has everything you need for comfortable stay, and all the convenience of a central Waikiki location. Enjoy morning coffee and mountain views for the balcony. Featuring a full size bed, single bed and futon Complete with a 2 burner cook-top, microwave, some kitchen prep tools, a coffeemaker, beach towels, beach chairs and a beach umbrella. Be one of the first to experience the new International Market Place and enjoy everything Waikiki aka t the "Manhattan of the Pacific" has to offer, with world-class shopping, fine dining and nightlife. The Aloha Surf Hotel has swimming pool, picnic and barbecue area, exercise area, and great open-air lobby. The condo is located next to the Food Pantry which is the only large grocery store in Waikiki. Located on the corner of Kanekapolei and Ala Wai Blvd, you are moments from the Ala Wai canal and green belt for its enjoyable walking and jogging, watching the paddlers, and tropical breezes. And the Ala Wai has the free park
