The Aloha Surf Hotel has swimming pool, picnic and barbecue ar
neighborhood_overview: There are wonderful restaurants nearby, including the well-known Cheesecake Factory; Hy's Steak House for a very special dinner; Tiki's Grill & Bar for great food, inexpensive drinks and Duke's Canoe House, oceanfront, food, drinks, with both places great spots for sunsets, people watching and nightly entertainment; and Cheeseburger in Paradise, always crowded, located at each end of Waikiki.
notes: Hotel has swimming pool, picnic and bar-b-que area, exercise room, and great open-air lobby. The condo is located next to the Food Pantry which is the only large grocery store in Waikiki. There is also a cafe in the lobby of the Aloha Surf where you can enjoy breakfast for $6, all you can eat lunch for $ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , and all you can eat dinner for $ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) You can dine and visit with all the other guests staying in the hotel and make lasting friendships. Owners State of Hawaii Tax ID# TA (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
transit: - Uber and Lyft are available in Honolulu and Waikiki - 'Biki' bikeshare is available throughout Waikiki & Honolulu - Try out 'Segway' tours of Waikiki, using their stand-up scooters  - Convenient public transportation options include 'TheBus' and the 'Waikiki Trolley' - Taxis are another great way to travel when in a group and the cost can be shared. You can find taxi stands at hotels, most major shopping malls and at the airport. Note that using taxi stands and calling for pick-ups by phone or via hotel concierge is the norm in Hawaii rather than hailing a cab.
access: Our Guest Host will meet you at the property for your check-in and give you keys
interaction: Our Guest Host will meet you at the property for your check-in, and a Property Manager is available by phone, text or email. 24 hour answering to take messages, and alert for emergencies

host.host_about: Real Estate Broker

reviews.comments:
O hotel fica bem localizado em Waikiki, com acesso direto ao canal e a praia. Bastante opções de alimentação e compras no local.
O apartamento está bastante conservado e conta com 1 cama de casal e 1 cama de solteiro, além de sofá, e bancada com equipamentos de cozinha.

Mark's location at Aloha Surf is very convenient to a lot of great places in Waikiki. For one it is less than a block away to the hotel where I did my training, secondly it is close to a variety of stores (newly opened International Market Place) and restaurants and bus stops, and last but not least it is just a couple of blocks away from the famous Waikiki beach and Kalakaua Avenue. The room is as described in his post, and I personally liked the view of Manoa from the lanai and the birds chirping right before sunrise! We were met by Rob for the keys and he has been very responsive to our needs as well (allowing us to check out at mid afternoon). And the hotel staff were very pleasant and accommodating as well despite knowing that we were staying at a private unit. Overall it was a great stay in Mark's place and certainly I wouldn't think twice of booking it again for my next trip to Honolulu.

I was very welcome and my friend came later and was very very welcome too. I need just thanks for the hostel for open the door for my friend when I wasn't there. That's was very nice. Thanks!!!
the place is very locate and very clean.
Central location

The pictures of the room were very accurate and representative. The room is smaller than we thought and the kitchen dosen't allow to cook full meals.  The main great factor is The location. The apartment is located in vicinity of grocery store, restaurent, shops, beach and local market.The manager was always avalable to answer our questions.
위치가 지도에서 보는 것 보다 좋습니다. 해변도 가깝고 버스타기도 좋아요. 숙소 내부도 깨끗합니다. 욕실이 좁고 네명이 쓰긴 무리가 있습니다. 숙소 앞에 푸드팬트리 하이스테이크 진짜 맛있어요! 여기서 지내게 된다면 꼭 드셔보시길!!

Had a great experience. The guest host Rob was very accommodating and easy to communicate with for check in and check out. 

The location is convenient, just a 5-10min walk from Waikiki, right next to multiple convenience stores/small food shops, and has a small bar downstairs as well.

The place itself was simple, but clean and well-maintained. Overall, we had a great stay!
Good service. Worked everything. Very good location in Waikiki.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Quiet and convenient.

Great location! Walkable to everything and everyone! We didn't have a rental car, but we used the bus and uber to get to a few places. The place is perfect if you just need a place to sleep and shower, when most of your day is spent enjoying outside. Amazed how the small portable stove can cook pretty much anything!
위치가 너무 좋습니다. 와이키키와 가까울 뿐만 아니라 주변에 먹거리며 쇼핑 등 필요한 모든 것들이 가까이 있습니다. 호스트 또한 매우 친절하고 숙소 또한 매우 편안합니다. 추천합니다.
very nice~

Great little room! It was perfect for my mom, brother, and myself. It was a little smaller than expected but i was not disappointed! Close to nightlife, central to restaurants, and shops. The parking is a little expensive, but better than struggling to find a spot or pay for something more expensive.  I would stay here again!
The location of the place is awesome! Everywhere is walking distance. If they have an air exhauster inside the bathroom, then it will be awesome!
합리적인 가격에 완벽한 위치!

The location is about a 5-min walk to the beach and central to many restaurants and shops in Waikiki.  We were out most of the time but when I did use the wi-fi it was slow, practically useless, lol. The only inconvenience was finding parking, some nights we just paid the $25 for the hotel parking.  The night before checking out though there was a cockroach on the coffee table (no food was left out), although not a big deal. The interior was cute and for four people the place didn't feel overcrowded. I liked that extra towels were provided as well as pillows and blankets. Everything else is as reflected in the photos. The place was clean and the view was perfect. My parents liked the included amenities but my sister said the bed after a night started to feel uncomfortable. The other beds were fine though. Communication with Mark was a breeze and checking in was easy. All in all it was a good place to stay. Thank you!

The best thing about this place is the location, it was within a 10 minute walk to the beach, shops and restaurants. The room looked exactly like the pictures, however the bathroom could use some work. Some of the towels provided did have some stains, however we brought our own. Overall, it was a good stay for the value.
condo的位置很不错,到海滩及商业区都很近｡附近的公交也很便利,建议大家可以购买一日公交票,很方便｡房间不大,但是很干净,设施也齐备｡就是有点小麻烦,因为机票是晚上到,退房后行李没地方寄存｡总之,性价比还不错!

The place is an actual hotel room. The pictures show a much cleaner and brighter “unit”. The place feels worn down and it didn’t smell incredible when i got there. The toilet paper holder is ripped off the wall and so was the swing lock that goes on the door (it closes and locks but the usual safety swing lock was ripped off the wall). The exercise area in the hotel is literally 2 worn down treadmills that out outside next to a lat pull down machine that didn’t look very clean or inviting. The host did allow me to check out an hour after my checkout time which made up for not being let in until 445 when air b&b said I could check in at 3. Other than that it was in a good location. I would just spend the extra money for something that feels cleaner and better kept.
Mark’s place was great! Wish we could’ve stayed longer!
Great location and value

The condo was conform as describe, was clean and the location is very good. 
But the building was very noisy, our neighbors had a child that scream every night 12 am till 4am ! Was not possible the sleep ! 
Also check in early are not free and they don’t even help for one hour early, then you have to speak with 3 different personnes for finally check in. For the check out no one answer ! 
I recommend this condo with hopping that the neighbors won’t be there ;)
Room was just just as expected, however, door was very difficult to open from both the inside and outside.
Great location and as advertised!

We were there for 2 weeks on our Honeymoon. For the first 10 days we had 2 of our friends stay with us. Fit the 4 of us nicely. Everything was within walking distance that we need that was very helpful in keeping our total costs down. Car prices ranges from $95-$140 per day so it helps a lot.
I do have to say that the front door and back door did stick a bit when you try to open them but this didn't cause any issues. (Other than laughing at our friends when they couldn't seem to open the door on the first try. hehe)
For being on the 15th floor the water presser is great I wasn't expecting it to be as my husband called it "Niagara Falls".
This was a great first time trip to Hawaii. If you are starting out or want to enjoy the best tourist spots this is a good place to visit for sure. Can't be this location.
great place, clean, close to Waikiki restaurants and shopping centers and the beach. Great communication.

Small but clean and comfortable accommodation, central for Waikiki beach and amenities. 
Fold out bed comfortable.
Had great stay, thanks
地理位置优越,就是办理入住时不在大堂办理,要房东来开门给我们,这对我不懂英文又不知情的人有点麻烦,但这是我的问题｡房东是个很勤快的小伙子,入住当天也主动与我联系到达时间,很好的｡

name: Fantastic Apartment in LEBLON
summary: Meu espaço é perto do Shopping Rio Design e do Shopping Leblon. Você vai amar meu espaço por causa da cama confortável e pela proximidade da praia. Meu espaço é bom para casais, aventuras individuais e viajantes de negócios.
description: Meu espaço é perto do Shopping Rio Design e do Shopping Leblon. Você vai amar meu espaço por causa da cama confortável e pela proximidade da praia. Meu espaço é bom para casais, aventuras individuais e viajantes de negócios.

name: ORM - Chã 02 Apartment
summary: Studio on the 2nd floor of a 4-storey, fully rehabilitated for touristic rental due to its prime location in the historic center of Porto, within the limits of the wall "Muralha Fernandina", 1 minute walking from the Cathedral and Luís I Bridge.  It has 2 single beds, 1 bathroom with shower, fully equipped kitchen, living room with sofa a double bed and a balcony with a wonderful view of Sé, Porto's Cathedral. Ideal for 1 - 4 persons. Prices vary according to the seasons.
space: If this apartment is not available on the required dates, check out our other apartments through our profile. See also our list of additional services, which will elevate your experience in our city. This apartment is located on Rua Chã, whose name designates the fact that it is a flat street, with records of its existence as far back as 1293. It has gone through several phases, from the place of sale of electrical appliances, now passing through the great amount of  multi-cultural supply store. There are, however, still tenuous shopkeepers, from another era, old houses of buttons and cobbler articles. It has as points of interest the Cathedrall of Porto and the D. Luís I bridge . Ideal for families wishing to book several apartments in the same building, or for couples or groups up to 4 people who prefer to stay in the heart of the historical center of Porto, within walking distance of the main points of interest of the city.
description: Studio on the 2nd floor of a 4-storey, fully rehabilitated for touristic rental due to its prime location in the historic center of Porto, within the limits of the wall "Muralha Fernandina", 1 minute walking from the Cathedral and Luís I Bridge.  It has 2 single beds, 1 bathroom with shower, fully equipped kitchen, living room with sofa a double bed and a balcony with a wonderful view of Sé, Porto's Cathedral. Ideal for 1 - 4 persons. neighborhood_overview: 4-storey building, totally rehabilitated in 2016 for touristic rental, situated in a residential area, 140m (1 minute walk) from the Porto Cathedral (Sé) and the famous Luís I bridge where you can enjoy a breathtaking and unforgettable view of the historic Ribeira and modern Cais de Gaia, divided by the imposing Douro River. You can also visit on foot the main tourist points of the city, as well as the area where are the cafes, bars and places of entertainment. Points of interest: - Porto Cathedral (Sé do Porto) (140m / 1min walk)  - Luís I bridge (350m / 3min walk)  - Rua de Santa Catarina - Majestic Café (550m / 6min walk)  - Avenida dos Aliados (400m / 5min walk)  - Ribeira (650m / 7 min walk)  - S. Francisco Church (750m / 8 min walk)  - Mercado do Bolhão (1km / 15min walk / 5 min by subway/tram)  - Torre dos Clérigos - Lello Library(650m / 7 min walk)  - Nossa Senhora do Carmo das Carmelitas Church (900m / 12 min walk)
notes: Check-in: from 16h on Check-out: until 12h (We are flexible depending on availability and upon prior notice) Late Check-in (After 20h): additional fee of 15€. Let us introduce you that Porto, since 1st March haves a tourist fair, 2€ per night/person, which at the check-in we need to collect the total amount, as the City Hall will charges us at the end of every month. Please check the information at the link bellow:  (Website hidden by Airbnb)
