Therefore, we have at your disposal: - Air conditioning - TV (more than 140 channels, including international channels) - Wi-Fi (high speed) - Hair dryer (1 unit) - Fridge with freezer - Glass ceramic hob - Microwave - Dishwasher - Italian coffee machine - Juicer - Kettle - Toaster - Blender - Ironing board and iron - Bath and hand towels (1 set per guest and per WC) - Bed linen Additional services: We offer several additional services, which we find useful to enrich your experience in our city. - Transportation from / to the airport: Preference of our guests. Taxi service, faster, less tiring. Driver waiting for you in the arrivals area. Sign with your name. No waiting time. Journey of 30 minutes. 1 car for 4 people. - Average cost of 25/30 €. - Baby pack (baby cot, bed linen, blanket, towel, high chair for meal and baby bathtub) - 30 € - Breakfast: Breakfast 1 - 3 varieties of mini bread, croissant, butter or jam, ham, cheese,
interaction: We will be delighted to know our guests and we will always be available to give information, advice and help in everything you need.
house_rules: The perfect guests: - Turn off the air conditioner / heater and lights before leaving the apartment. The environment and we thank you! - Make a conscious use of water to avoid waste. The environment and we thank you! - Respect the quiet hours, avoiding noise after 22h. - Respect the common areas of the building, avoiding noise. - Only smoke on the balcony / window. On the street there is no problem smoking, but the tobacco smoke adds smells difficult to eliminate from the apartment. - Put the trash in the public container in order to avoid unpleasant odors in the apartment. - Before checking out, check if the building's entrance doors are unlocked. - If notice any abnormalities in the apartment, let us know immediately. - Enjoy tremendously our city, Porto! Thank you for being one! The ORM team Check-in: from 16h Check-out: until 12h (We are flexible depending on availability and upon prior notice) Late Check-in (After 20h): additional fee of 15€. We do not accept pets to prevent serio

host.host_about:
Four friends, a lot of dreams, a common path

Oporto Rental Management was created in 2015 by the wishes of four young friends: Rosa, Tania, Igor and Nuno. The ORM was born of the combination of the main passions of its founders: the city of Porto and its cultural characteristics; the architecture and decoration; the gastronomy and photography and, above all, the contact with different cultures.

The project is based on the support and guidance of property owners located in the center of the city who want to direct their homes to the tourism market.

It also involves the design and decoration of these same spaces, giving them a unique identity that translates into the extremely positive reaction of our guests.
Our project culminates in the total management of the property, which includes the organization and preparation of these spaces for the tourist rental.
So with our dedication and daily work we have been able to please our guests who show the highest intention of repeating their experiences with our team. 
In addition, besides the management, we are responsible for the constant guests' contact and that we privelege the personalized accompaniment - what distinguishes us and allows us a greater proximity to the diverse cultures.

-------

Quatro amigos, muitos sonhos, um caminho em comum

Oporto Rental Management surgiu em 2015 pela vontade de quatro jovens amigos: a Rosa, a Tânia, o Igor e o Nuno. A ORM nasce da combinação das principais paixões dos seus fundadores: a cidade do Porto e as suas características culturais; a arquitetura e decoração; a gastronomia e fotografia e, acima de tudo, o contacto com diversas culturas. 

O projeto baseia-se no apoio e orientação de proprietários de imóveis localizados no centro da cidade que pretendam direcionar as suas casas para o mercado do turismo.
Envolve ainda a conceção e decoração destes mesmos espaços, conferindo-lhes desta forma, uma identidade única que se traduz na reação extremamente positiva dos nossos hóspedes. 
O nosso projeto culmina na gestão total do imóvel, que inclui a organização e a preparação destes espaços para o arrendamento turístico. 
Assim, com a nossa dedicação e trabalho diários temos vindo a conseguir conquistar todos quantos nos visitam e que demonstram a maior intenção de repetir as suas experiências com a nossa equipa. 
Acrescentamos ainda que além da gestão somos responsáveis pelo contacto constante com os nossos hóspedes e que prezamos o acompanhamento personalizado - o que nos distingue e nos permite uma maior proximidade com as diversas culturas.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Foi uma estada maravilhosa. O apartamento, o local e os anfitriões nos proporcionaram dias inesquecíveis no Porto. Recomendadíssimo!!!

We had a perfect stay in the clean, quiet and new appartment. The appartment is nicely decorated, the airco works perfect and the beds are good. ORM was very accomodating in prolonging our check out time and arranging our tour on the douro river. The location is very central and or top of a hill. It's very close to the top platform of the Luis I bridge which give you the most beautyfuI view over the city and the river. The downhill walk to the Ribeira riverside is nice and just 5-10 Minutes. To go up, you can take the funiculaire which stops 2 minutes from the front door. Every other sight is also in walking distance. l would stay here again !!
Great venue in the middle of the town!

It was one of the best apartment we stayed! The flat was as nice as very convenient, also only a few minutes  from the most popular places to visit. Many thanks to host, who provided us information we needed before and during our trip.  Strongly recommending this place for your staying in Porto.

Our stay at ORM's apartment in Porto was wonderful!! The apartment was centrally located, very clean and modern, and the team was a pleasure to communicate with. We would highly recommend this place for anyone staying in Porto!

L'appartement est très bien situé, proche de tout, notamment de la gare et des arrêts de bus. Magasins d'alimentation à proximité, fermant tard le soir. 
L'accueil a été sympa et efficace. Igor et son équipe sont très réactifs, sur place les jours de la semaine ce qui facilite les choses. Nous avons eu une réponse rapide et efficace à toutes nos questions.
L'apparement correspond aux photos. Bon à savoir : la salle de bain est petite et n'a pas beaucoup de rangement et le salon manque un peu de mobilier si quelqu'un y dort.
Great apartment! Recently removated, walking distance from all atractions and very nice staff. Will definetly recommend to friends and family.

El apartamento está  muy bien, cerca de todo, la única pega es que la presión del agua es totalmente insuficiente en el lavabo y en la ducha. Las personas que nos recibieron, muy amables. Las camas comodísimas. Oporto precioso.

Nous avons été très satisfaits de cet appartement qui est en tout point conforme à la description.  Très bonne situation, tout peut se faire à pied.  Nos hôtes nous ont réservé un super accueil avec plein d’explications sur les sites à visiter. Nous avons pris l’option petit déjeuner amené chaque matin par Pédro et sa bonne humeur. Une adresse à retenir. Merci à nos hôtes.

Our stay with ORM was very pleasant. They gave us a very nice welcome and informed us very well about the city itself. The apartment was just like the pictures and the neighborhood in which the apartment was located was also very nice. We really enjoyed our stay and they really deserve their 5 stars!

The apartment is cosy, modern and equipped with everything one needs for a short-time stay. Moreover the location could barely be better. Communication was clear, pleasant and without any problem. Perfect for single or couples. Gladly again.

When we arrived at the apartment, we immediatly got a lot of information about Porto by our host. If we had questions during our stay, we could always got in contact with them and got a quick respond.

The apartment itself was really great, you could find everything you could ever need. It was very clean and spacious.

We would definitely come back to this apartment when visiting Porto and recommend it to all our friends! We had a great stay.

When we arrived and the airport, the taxi driver was waiting for us. We had a warm welcome. If we needed something, we could ask anytime. The apartment was clean. You have everything what you need. The location of the apartment is perfect. You can go everywhere by walk. Near the station, shops,.. 
We had a great time here!

L'appartement était vraiment bien, disposant de tout le confort.
Il était par ailleurs bien placé, nous avons pu faire toutes nos visites à pieds.
Un grand merci à Tania qui a tjrs été disponible et à Bruno (je crois) pour son accueil et ses explications/conseils.

Nice location and nice place!!
Totally recommend!!

Excellent séjour dans cette belle ville de Porto! L'appartement est idéalement situé, très calme et très bien équipé. Il est en tout point conforme aux photos et à la description. Les hôtes ont été à l'écoute et nous ont donnée d'excellents conseils (restaurants, visites, lieux incontournables...). Je n'hésiterai pas une seule seconde à les conseiller à des amis!

Siisti ja toimiva asunto erittäin keskeisellä paikalla! Vaikka liikenteen ja rakennustöiden melu oli kadulla päivisin kovaa, ei sisälle kuulunut ääniä juuri lainkaan. Mukavat isännät olivat hyvin tavoitettavissa. Wi-fi toimi moitteettomasti ja TV:ssä oli paljon kanavia. Moderni ja laadukas sisustus.

Escogí este alojamiento para mis padres durante su estancia en Oporto por su situación y características. Desde que han vuelto solo he oído cosas buenas del apartamento. Su ubicación ha resultado ser perfecta encontrándose a muy pocos pasos de la mayoría de lugares interesantes que descubrir de esta ciudad. Prácticamente al lado de la Catedral de Oporto y a unos minutos de la preciosa Plaza de la Ribera.

Por su parte la atención ha sido inmejorable, ofreciendo información, tours, recogida y traslados al aeropuerto e incluso servicios de desayuno en caso de que te interese.

Sin duda recomendaría este apartamento
Lugar fantástico , atención fantástica , ubicación inmejorable! 100% recomendable! Gracias y hasta la próxima!

The apartment was really nice and perfectly located! in the middle of the old town, just next to the Dom Luis bridge, it couldn't have been better!
The communication with the ORM team was great!
I would definitively recommend this place and would love to stay here again for my next visit!

El apartamento estaba muy bien situado. Muy moderno con todo lo necesario. Muy bonito. Si tuviera que poner algo negativo sería el grifo del baño que era incómodo para lavarse la cara. Las chicas de la agencia muy atentas. En seguida resuelven los pocos problemas que hayan y te dan un mapa para moverte por la ciudad con consejos de a donde ir a comer.

The staff was there to welcome us and explained things in the city in details, very friendly and helpful. As I had a parcel sent to the address, they were very helpful on that from receiving the parcel, paying the postman in advance to passing it back to me. I and my friend left the keys in the room with the door shut and they solved the problem smoothly as well. 
The room is spotlessly clean, good shower, well-equipped kitchen although the beds are relatively small but we still slept well.

The location is very central, 3 mins walk to Sao Bento station.

I definitely recommend this place to everyone!

Le hôte présent à notre arrivée, nous a donné des explications sur les visites à faire en 3 jours.
A répondu à chacune de nos questions durant le séjour également.
Le logement est très bien situé, proche de tout ce qui est a visiter.
Le logement correspond tout à fait aux photos, pas de surprise.

Los apartamentos de ORM están genial ubicados, al lado de todo lo turístico, sin el ruido en una calle tranquila. El trato del personal fue excelente, cuando llegamos nos recibieron y nos dieron tips de dónde comer y cenar buenísimos. MUY recomendable!
Perfect apartment

Host: The staff were very nice at check-in
Location: It is in a very good location, walkable to the attractions and close to the public transit
Apartment: spacious, nice furnishings
Problems: The heating system is off automatically when it reached 19 or 20 degree. We checked in on Friday afternoon and only realised the problem on Friday night after going out for dinner. So we sent them email. Their office was close on Saturday and Sunday. But they reported that no problems were found. We wore jackets in the apartment to keep us warm until check out on Tuesday. We have a similar problem with the hot water. The hot water is not enough for 2 people to take showers. So the first night was very bad. The hot water was gone after my friend put shower gels and shampoo, so she had to take a cold shower. I felt very sorry for her as I choose the apartment. But the staff reported that everything was okay. After it, my friend and I decided that one had shower at night, the other had shower in the morning.

The apartment was really perfect and looks like the pictures you see on the page ! The situation is very central and the welcome was nice as we also received information regarding the activities to do plus the restaurants / bars to go :).
The team is very reactive if you need anything!
Thank you very much again for this lovely stay!
Melody
L'accueil était super , nous avons été super bien accueilli , et l'appartement est génial , super propre et tendance , je conseille vivement , merci encore
Perfect location for a short stay in Porto. The ORM staff was always available and went literally out of their way to help us in any way required. Definitely recommended

Our stay in this apartment was great! The apartment is exactly how it looks in the pictures, everything is new and there all all the comforts (tv, heatings, great shower). The location is perfect: in the heart of the historical centre, few steps from the cathedral and the bridge that takes to the wine cellars on the other part of the river. Communication was great, and the guys gave us a lot of nice recommendation about things to do, that helped us a lot to plan out weekend. Highly recommended!

Estuvimos un finde largo en Porto y el sitio está muy bien situado, cerca de la catedral y del Puente. La casa está muy bien pero es más un concepto de hotelillo que de Airbnb. Para aparcar puedes dejar el coche al lado de casa, el parking es de pago pero se puede renovar con el móvil descargando la app.

Hemos pasado 3 días maravillosos,el apartamento es tal como se describe y  su situación nos ha permitido desplazarnos a pie a todos los lugares de interés.Solo nos queda darles las gracias a los anfitriones por el trato recibido
Tres bon séjour

Studio neuf, moderne dans sa conception et dans sa décoration, situé dans une rue calme.  Rien ne manque et tout fonctionne : vaisselle, lave vaisselle,  literie impeccable. Escalier magnifique en bois. Le tout dans le quartier historique de Porto, en pleine rénovation.  Agés de 75 ans, nous avons apprécié la proximité des principaux monuments, des rues animées du centre ville, ainsi que la diversité des moyens de transport.  Accueil chaleureux et disponibilité permanente de Renata et de l'équipe d'ORM qui occupe les bureaux au rez-de-chaussée.

Very clean and well equipped. The beds and pillows are very comfy, which is a huge plus. The place is as nice (or nicer) than the pictures. A note about location- it is centeal, but it is near the train station... never the most charming neighborhood, no matter the city.  The place itself is great and if you want centrally located then I would recommend.
Excelente
Die Unterkunft war großartig. Sehr sauber und ordentlich. Der Check in verlief reibungslos und unkompliziert. Ich komme gerne wieder! Vielen Dank an ORM.

Repetiría sin dudarlo. Nos alojamos el puente del 1 de mayo y pasamos unos estupendos. La casa es muy comoda y acogedora y tiene todos los utensilios de cocina disponibles. Todo el mobiliario esta genial y en muy buenas condiciones. La casa esta a 5 min. andando de la estacion de tres y todo pilla a buena mano, es una zona muy tranquila. A la llegada nos explicaron todo lo que nos hacia falta de la casa y luego nos explicaron los sitios mas importantesy curiosos para ver. Los propietarios son muy agradables y siempre se muestran disponibles ante cualquier duda.

Notre séjour à Porto se termine et ce fût très agreable. L'appartement est conforme aux photos. Il est tres bien situé : à la fois dans le centre historique de la ville, mais surtout dans une rue au calme. Il est très bien équipé pour passer quelques jours. Merci à Bruno qui nous a accueilli et conseillé. Nous le recommanderons sans hésitation.
Otima escolha pelo custo-beneficio. Apartamento novissimo e bem acolhedor e aconchegante. Bem seguro, limpo e (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltarei para Porto e ficarei la novamente.

This place is phenomenal and great for all. I would recommend the apartment and Oporto Rental Management for all services and apartments. From sunrise to late into the evenings, the staff was onsite (office is on the first floor), professional and always helpful. The apartment itself was clean, fully equipped (cable tv, kitchen accessories, AC, towels, etc.) close to everything (transit, shops, food, and sites) and I would say it's perfect for 2-4 people looking to explore Porto for a couple days. 

Can't say thank you enough.

Best Regards,
Patrick A.
Super appartement, très bien situé, pas loin des transports publics!
We had a great time for 3 days in Porto, the recommendations from the staff at ORM were top notch. Thank you again Alex!
Appartement très bien situé au coeur historique de Porto, et près d'une gare/métro. L'hôte était très accueillant, je recommande.

Logement très confortable, propre avec un super agencement, et tres bien situé. Nous avons été ravis de rencontrer Alex dès notre arrivée,  il est très accueillant et donne des conseils sur les petits coins sympas de porto! 
Je recommande ce logement si vous voulez passer quelques jours tranquille  pour visiter le beau centre de  porto

The apartment was very clean and quiet, located conveniently near Sao Bento and a short walk to Ribeira. Our hosts were wonderful, greeting us late in a Sunday, ready with lots of information for our stay.

This is technically a studio apartment but is huge, bright , and spacious.  The location is perfect--right in the heart of the centro historico.  My host waited for me as I was late and showed me everything.  God WIFI, good AC.  Highly recommended.

인테리어도 깔끔하고 위치도 좋고 
모든것이 다 좋았어요!

Excellent stylish apartment. Very close to main shopping streets and also short hilly walk to and from river but easily manageable. Metro and train station are a stones throw from the apartment also. Alex our host gave us some excellent recommendations also and was extremely helpful. The restaurant Rua for tapas was one of the highlights of our trip for food and was recommended by him. All in all would stay again.

Bel appartement bien situé idéal pour visiter Porto quelques jours. 

Très bons conseils de l'hôte.

The place to stay in Porto! Close to the main Church, 2min walk from the tube and the room is amazing!

Plus the host company cares to make it a very harm welcome by giving you all sorts of tips plus a map. Next trip if not this room I'll choose another from ORM, I'm really impressed with the quality of the room, the decor and their organisation.

Le logement est moderne, bien équipé, tranquille et sécuritaire. Les photos reflètent parfaitement la réalité. Vous serez a quelques minutes de marche de la gare et du métro Sao Bento. Comme le logement est parfaitement situé, vous pourrez vous rendre au cœur de l'action de cette magnifique ville à pied. Les hôtes sont remarquables. Ils sont disponibles et prêts à vous aider à la moindre question. Toutes nos demandes ont été répondues rapidement et efficacement. Je recommande donc ce logement sans aucune hésitation, vous y passerez un bon moment !

The place is so strategic if you are in Porto as a tourist for sightseeing. Literally up the hill from the train statiom, right across the street from the Cathedral and a stonethrow away from the bridge. Apartment was clean and as described and check in communication was great
Très bien

Muy muy recomendable. Genial la ubicación, el trato y el apartamento. Es precioso, al lado de la catedral y la zona de más ambiente y centro, mucha luz, nada ruidoso y con un estilazo. Nos recibieron genial y además nos hicieron grandes recomendaciones de la ciudad. Volveremos sin ninguna duda.
Host very kind and reliable. The apartment is located in the city centre, provides every comfort and is also very beautyful. I would suggest this apartment to everyone.
Everything was perfect: great great location, really nice and clean apartment, staff was friendly... Do not hesitate!

Wir verbrachten 4 wunderschöne Tage in Porto. Die Lage der Wohnung könnte nicht besser sein. Etwa 2 Minuten braucht man zu Fuß bis zur berühmten Ponte Dom Luís I. Auch die Metro Station und der Bahnhof Sao Bento sind nur einen Katzensprung entfernt- einfach fantastisch!!
Wir hatten während unseres Aufenhaltes ein Problem mit der Klimaanlage, aber das ORM Team war sehr hilfbereit und hat sich sofort darum gekümmert. 
Die Wohnung war insgesamt sehr sauber und sah genau so aus wie auf den Bildern. 
Vielen Dank für die schöne Zeit und das schöne Appartement. Wir kommen gern wieder!

This place was perfect for sightseeing in Porto.  Great location near the bridge to Gaia.  Slept 2 comfortably, could have slept 4.  Very clean, cozy, on a beautiful little side street.  Management of this place is superb with great communication.  They called cabs for us, confirmed our Douro Valley tour, made recommendations with marked maps, and were just super nice.  Their office is in the same building and it seemed like they were always there!   We will definitely try to reserve the same place when we come back to Porto.
this apartment is ideally situated in the city, so everything can be done by foot

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour à deux dans cet appartement ! Il est très bien situé : dans le centre de Porto et à proximité des transports en commun. L’appartement est propre, design et fonctionnel. L’équipe Oporto est très accueillante, arrangeante et présente pour nous conseiller dans notre séjour.  Nous recommandons vivement ce logement. Marion & Arnaud

Appartement idéalement situé, très bien équipé. L'équipe ORM nous a fait un super accueil et toujours disponible si besoin . Ils nous ont donné des très bon conseils pour les restaurants ou les visites à ne pas manquer . 
L'appartement correspond tout à fait aux photos ! 
Nous reviendrons à Porto et dans ce même appartement !!

We really enjoyed our stay here. The hosts are very welcoming, the place is really nice and just as described. It is also nicely located, perfect to visit the city by foot! 
Thank you very much for everything!
산벤투 기차 역에서 걸어서 3분 거리의 좋은 위치. 호텔처럼 깔끔한 실내. 아무 문제 없었던 와이파이. 원활한 체크인과 의사소통. 직원들이 주로 1층에 있기에 뭐 필요하면 바로 요청 가능. 세탁기가 없다는게 유일한 흠. 그래도 그것 외에는 다 별 다섯개!

My boyfriend and I stayed in Porto for 2 nights and we loved this Appartment! The location is on of the best you can get, you will be everywhere in 15 minutes (walking). The Appartment itself looks even better in real life then on pictures! The guy (I think Alex was his Name) who waited for us at the Appartment was super nice and gave us great ideas where to go and what to see. (He also knows where to find the best Francesinha - we tried it and agree with him! ) 

We will be back in agust and will hopefully get one of your Appartments again!

Excellent appartement, idéalement situé pour visiter porto. 
Métro à 1 min à pied.
The airbnb was the most convenient place ever and location, service and communication were nice

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here.  The ORM team will meet you upon arrival, accompany you to your apartment, orient you to the apartment, neighborhood  and highlight places to go on a Porto map.  The team will do anything to help make your stay in Porto a good one.  Igor recommended  Bentotapas restaurant behind the train station to us.  We are so glad he (Website hidden by Airbnb) was one of the finest dining experiences we've ever had!  They made our Douro River boat tour reservations and arranged a taxi pick up at the airport which we greatly appreciated.  The apartment location is great.  The cathedral built in the 12th century can be seen from the balcony.  It is an enjoyable walk to the riverfront and many restaurants and small markets for groceries are nearby.   The apartment is modern, hot water plentiful and beds comfortable.  I highly recommend this apartment for your stay in Porto.

El departamento es tal cual se ve en las fotos. Estaba muy limpio y contaba con todo lo necesario para una buena estadía.
La recepción fue excelente, nos explicaron sobre los lugares que podíamos visitar, dónde ir a comer y todo con la mejor predisposición y simpatía.
La zona es inmejorable, a 200 metros de la estación Sao Bento, a 200 de la catedral (incluso se la puede ver desde el balcón) y si uno disfruta de recorrer la cuidad a pie, la ubicación es la ideal ya que está bastante cerca de todo y la calle es muy tranquila.
Oporto es una ciudad maravillosa y sin dudas el departamento está a la altura!
Si volviera no dudaría en alojarme nuevamente allí.
Gracias por todo al equipo de ORM!

This was a great place and helped to make us fall in love with Porto.
The ORM team is super-friendly and knowledgeable and the units are beautiful and clean. Furthermore, it has great amenities and utensils and come stocked with basic needs.

The location is probably the best in Porto. It is a very short walk to absolutely everything! Close to the bridge and the main station and squares.

My one friend is so impressed that he is bringing his whole family to Porto and will only stay in these apartments! Enough said!
Great place To live in Porto!
Great location. Very helpful hosts who gave great tips and helped organise tours for us. We loved our stay in Porto.

Nice location: just 5min away from the bridge, and Sao bento train station. Clean facilities: guess old building, but renovated inside. Response: quick and accurate for first visit travlers. Helpful staff.
felipa was very helpful on check in. she gave us great tips! tapas Bento was AMAZING! loved the style of the apartment, the quiet area and the location. taxi from the airport was very handy!
Great space and location. Friendly and helpful staff. Very clean and attractive, new and modern space.

Encantados con la visita. El apartamento es tal y como se muestra en las fotografías. La ubicación en todo el centro y el trato con el personal ha sido magnífico. Nos ha gustado tanto que decidimos quedarnos un día mas nos han dado todas las facilidades. Repetiríamos seguro. Un 10
We had a wonderful time. Nice people, decent place, clean, new and all you need. Fast communication and hospitality.

El apartamento es pequeño, pero perfecto para dos personas. La ubicación es impecable, al lado de la catedral. Se ventila a través de dos balcones que dan a la calle Chá, y desde los que se ve en un lateral la Catedral. 
El apartamento está muy nuevo y todo de diseño. Tiene abundante agua caliente y climatización. La zona de dormitorio esta separada de la zona de estar a través de un pasillo, en el cual se ubica el baño. Dicha zona se puede independizar del resto con una corredera y una puerta intermedia. En la zona de estar se ubica una pequeña cocina, una mesita de comedor con dos sillas y un amplio sofá esquinero convertible en cama auxiliar. La cocina es pequeñita, pero tiene las cosas necesarias para pasar unos días, incluido lavavajillas y microondas.
En la planta baja se encuentra una oficina desde donde se gestionan los apartamentos, cuatro en total en ese edificio, uno por planta. 
Las personas que nos atendieron fueron muy amables, nos explicaron en español lo que podíamos ver en la ciudad y los temas propios del checking y nos permitieron dejar las maletas allí unas cuantas horas más el dia de salida.

The apartment was brilliant. Very central walking distance to everything, great layout with everything you need and spotless.  OMR gave some great recommendations and even booked dinner and tours for us. I'd definitely highly recommend these apartments.

A beautiful modern apartment contained in a stylish original building. Loved the location,  cleanliness, support staff, and security. A great stay, and would highly recommend it for a lovely visit in Porto!!
This space was clean, modern and perfect jumping off point for 3 exploring Porto. The staff were courteous and professional at every stage of our booking. We would highly recommend this spot.
Todo muy correcto!
A great place! Big and bright! Beautiful views.
We had a perfect stay in Porto, thanks to ORM! The space was new and clean. Igor gave us some great tips on where to eat in Porto. We could store our luggage after check out, recommended!

An amazing spot to stay. 

Far exceeded our expectations and was in the perfect spot to explore the city, travel across the river to the port houses aswell as being close to down town and almost all of Porto's major attractions.

Place was quite, modern and secure with great staff. We will be back.
사진 그대로예요 햇볕 잘 드는 거실에 심플한 부엌, 깔끔한 침실까지. 위치는 역이랑 걸어서 5분? 1분만에 큰 대로변에 나갈 수 있어요 도우루강도 가깝구요~ 도착하면 지도 펴서 이것저것 정보도 많이 알려 주셔서 진짜 여행 잘했어요~ 추천합니다! 건뮬내에 엘링벵이텅가 엄꼬, 계단에소 문을 열면 바로 췸대라 오고가뉸 쇼리가 뜨문뜨문 들린긴 합뉘당 췜고하세용

THIS PLACE IS AWESOME. Ok first of all it's almost like staying in a hotel in that you get your own studio. But it also comes furnished and the large size of the place allows for ample dining and living space where you can unwind by lounging on the couch and watch some TV. The place is modern and clean, and there's even a tiny adorable balcony to step out. 

Not to mention the fantastic hospitality of the staff working at ORM. Filipa greeted us and gave us a very thorough list of recommendation on places to see and foods to eat. She tailored it to the fact that it was our first time there and we were only there for 2 days. It really eased our last minute planning (we didn't have any plans when we got there haha...). 

All in all, 120% recommend this place if anyone's looking to stay comfortably in Porto.
Great location, cozy appartment and a lot of local tips upon arrival! We recommend staying here during your stay in Porto.

A estadia foi impecável! As acomodações são modernas, confortáveis e limpas, oferecendo todo o necessário para o hóspede se sentir em casa. A localização do apartamento é perfeita, perto de todo o centro turístico de Porto, com fácil acesso a meios de transporte. Fizemos todos os passeios a pé e ainda conseguíamos descansar pós almoço porque o apartamento estava no centro de tudo. A recepção da Maria foi um ponto altíssimo, nos indicando restaurantes, pontos turísticos e dicas de uma moradora da cidade. Se voltarmos ao Porto, com certeza nos hospedariamos no mesmo lugar!
상벤투역에서 매우 가까우며 호스트 분들은 매우 친절하며 정말 너무너무좋습니다!
The apartment was amazing!! I would diffinitely stay again when I visit Porto!

We enjoyed three nights at this apartment. The bed and shower were excellent and the apartment was big enough for our needs. The staff with Oporto Rental Management were friendly and provided excellent recommendations. The location is perfect as it is near the train station and everything you want to see is a 5-10 minute walk.

엘레베이터가 없어서 계단 너무 힘들엇어요
하지만 최고의 숙소였습니다 위치도 너무 좋구요!! 완벽 다음에 또 가고싶어요
Really lovely central apartment. Greeted on arrival and given some wonderful local tips. Highly recommend to anyone visiting the city.

This is by far the best service I have received in an Airbnb property. These guys were very responsive, accommodating and attentive at all times. They explained to us the whole city with a map: places to eat, bars, activities and local attractions. The breakfast service was great. The place was very clean, equipped and stylish. I highly recommend them.

숙소는 사진대로 굉장히 깨끗하고, 인테리어도 좋았고, 모든게 잘 구비되어 있었습니다. 1층에 사무실이 있어서 필요할 땐 언제든지 도움을 요청 할 수 있는점이 좋았습니다. 
상벤투역과 루이스 다리 2층의 중간 위치라서 매일 선셋을 감상하기 좋았습니다. 층간소음이 있는편인데, 전 예민하지 않은 편이라 괜찮았습니다. 또한, 주변에 간단히 끼니를 때울만한 곳이 없습니다. 대신 조용하게 쉴 수 있는 장점이 있는 곳이었습니다.

Filipa and Pedro welcomed us a lot. We didnt plan anything when we were there but fortunately they let me know all around city when we check in. I’ve used airbnb for many years but it was the first time that I’ve got local tips. Accommodation was perfect ! If I go to Porto again, I would definitely book here again. It was all brand new place and my wife and I loved it ! If I need to give a down for this would be weakness of blocking noise from stairs but I didnt need to mind it. Totally enjoyed your accommodation, thank you !
Appartement très bien situé. Très bonne accueil. A réserver sans hésiter

The apartment is centrally located in the heart of historical Porto. We had access to Sao Bento train station and gorgeous views of the Cathedral from our balcony. Filipa, our host was gracious and candid and gave us amazing tips on the “must dos and eats”. All her advise was fantastic! We walked every where from our apartment and never once felt the need for a cab. Ideal for 2 people. They provided us with shower gel and shampoo and even offered amazing breakfast and cleaning services if we needed it. Would definitely come back to this apartment is we need to!!!
Great place and great location. Loved it.
La situación es perfecta, muy limpio y con todo lo necesario. Ideal para una pareja. Perfecto para conocer oporto

강추
위치도 짱좋았고 큰길바로옆이라 안전함
호스트 겁나친절하고 근처 자세히 설명해줌
체크아웃 후 짐도 맡아줌
집도 깔끔하고 온갖 조리도구와 조미료 등등 없는게 없었음
수건도 넉넉히 줌
포르투갈에서 머문 숙소중 제일 맘에듬 (세개중에ㅋㅋ)
너무 좋았습니다!! 다시 가면 꼭 여기로 다시 올듯해요

name: Bright studio in the heart of the east village
summary: You’ll love my place because of the amazing location, it's in the heart of the east village/union square area and is surrounded by restaurants, nightlife, cafes and grocery stores.  The train and buses are less than a block away, making exploring NYC so easy.
space: My studio is bright and cozy, with a newly renovated marble bathroom, fully functional kitchen with coffee maker and all cooking essentials. There is also table and chairs to enjoy your meal or use as a workspace. My bed is a brand new posterpedic bed and is very comfortable. The apartment faces a back patio so it is very quiet at night, despite it's amazing location.
description: You’ll love my place because of the amazing location, it's in the heart of the east village/union square area and is surrounded by restaurants, nightlife, cafes and grocery stores.  The train and buses are less than a block away, making exploring NYC so easy. My studio is bright and cozy, with a newly renovated marble bathroom, fully functional kitchen with coffee maker and all cooking essentials. There is also table and chairs to enjoy your meal or use as a workspace. My bed is a brand new posterpedic bed and is very comfortable. The apartment faces a back patio so it is very quiet at night, despite it's amazing location. I rent the entire studio so the apartment will be all yours during your stay. I provide clean linens and towels, bathroom essentials and free coffee. The kitchen has a microwave and all the kitchen essentials. I  like to meet my guests when they arrive and show them around the apartment and give them the keys. At times I am traveling myself, in this case my friend wi
neighborhood_overview: The east village is a vibrant, exciting and very safe neighborhood. It's surrounded by the best restaurants, nightlife, cafes, shopping and union square and Washington square park is a five minute walk away. You can easily walk to many other popular neighborhoods in NYC such as the west village, Chelsea, and gramercy.
transit: The location of my apartment is perfect for exploring the city. The L train is half a block away and union square which has multiple train lines is a five minute walk.
access: I rent the entire studio so the apartment will be all yours during your stay. I provide clean linens and towels, bathroom essentials and free coffee. The kitchen has a microwave and all the kitchen essentials.
interaction: I  like to meet my guests when they arrive and show them around the apartment and give them the keys. At times I am traveling myself, in this case my friend will meet you with the keys and show you around.  I'm happy to provide restaurant recommendations in the neighborhood, tips for exploring NYC and directions. I enjoy getting to know my guests and am available 24/7 by phone if my guests need anything.
house_rules: I only ask that you don't smoke or have parties in the apartment

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I'm a healthcare professional and I grew up and live in new york city. I've been hosting for almost 3 years now and i love it! I love meeting my guests and giving them tips to enjoy new york city. I also love to cook and travel, hoping to go to europe this summer.

reviews.comments: I was looking for a place in an interesting neighborhood that allowed me to rest when I wanted, and Christine's apartment was perfect.  It has a great location, is very quiet, has great air conditioning, and has blackout curtains that allowed me to control the light.  The last three are critical if you plan to stay up late or are in town for an interview (like I was).  Christine herself was super, super helpful -- we mixed up arrival times and she adapted gracefully, and when I forgot a phone charger she very helpfully agreed to meet me again to retrieve it.  I highly recommend both Christine and this apartment and I'd stay there again without any hesitation.  Thanks Christine!

As a host, Christine is amazing! Responsive, welcoming, made everything logistical very easy! She really cares about creating a special experience for her guests! 

Her place is lovely, sweet, clean, organized and comfortable! and the location is perfect!!....safe, fun neighborhood; easy to walk to anything you need or want, or, the subway steps away! Being in the east village is a great way to really experience living in NY! 

We will definitely hope Christine's place is available for our next NYC visit! (thank you Christine!)
Great location. Clean and basic apartment with everything you need. Comfy bed. Fast Wifi. Good AC. Lovely host. All in all a great stay...
A cosy studio in a great location. Proximity to Union Square makes exploring and getting around Manhattan very convenient. Christine made me feel welcome and I had a great time.
Great stay!

Christina was such a nice host! Easy communication before and during our stay. Her studio is clean and offers everything you need. The neighbourhood is great, you easily reach L-train, that transports you into Brooklyn or the heart of Manhattan. But the neighbourhood itself is so good and quite relaxed compared to the rest of Manhattan ;). Still, there are shops and diners and everything you need.

Me and my girlfriend spent a week in Christine's apartment. 
The apartment is exactly as it appears in photographs, really nice for a holidays.  It is located in a quiet neighborhood and very well connected by public transport (5 min. walk from Union Square!!!!). We found it neat and clean, and Christine was really nice and helpful.
Finally we really spent a great period in NY!!!

The apartment is a cozy and bright space. Perfect for a great pit stop in the middle of your busy day and a great, quiet place to sleep. We never met Christine but she made sure that we were well situated during our stay. She made sure that we were handed off the keys and also gave us some great suggestions for places to visit during our stay. She was also very easy to reach in case we had any questions. Thank you Christine!
Christine was a great host!

The host was very helpful and kind with us. Very good position in NYC.
East Village is cool.
Good experience.

Great location! Close to many good restaurants and stores and a 5min walk from Union Square. The place was also clean and very quiet at night which helped us adjust to time differences. Christine was easy to communicate with and was quick to accommodate our stay times.

The apartment is ideally located. It's very easy to commute to any part of the city. Christine was very accommodating, offering recommendations and assistance whenever needed. The apartment was clean and easily accessible upon arrival. I would rent here again.
Great location in heart of Manhattan. Christine is a excellent host and communicates well.  Thanks.
Christine recommended many restaurants in the area and was very responsive when there was problem with our keys. Apartment is very quiet and very conveniently located.
Christine's place is exactly as advertised and she is a very friendly and responsive host.  Christine provided thoughtful suggestions for local restaurants/spots.

Christine's place was in a perfect location as it's close to the subway and many restaurants. The apt was as described and Christine was easy to reach, responsive, and very helpful throughout our short stay. Though we did have a small issue with the linens, Christine was quick to respond and to help resolve. Thanks for a great stay.
Had a great stay in Christine's place. She was super easy to communicate with and very accommodating. Gave recommendations and advice and the apartment was clean, warm and comfortable. :)

Great base for a fun week in Manhattan. Well connected travel wise and there is so much to do just within the east village itself. Christine was very welcoming and gave us a great list of suggestions for places to eat and drink. Would definitely stay here again if I returned to NYC.

Christine has a genuinely welcoming spirit, is eager to please, and her place makes for a very nice temporary pied-à-terre. The studio has afternoon sun, and it's even pretty bright in the morning with light coming in from the courtyard. Functional kitchenette, larger-than-expected bathroom, no street noise and just occasional awareness of neighbors.
Very clean! Christine's place was the perfect location - right next to the subway. The host was very helpful and always available.

The place was clean, quiet, and located In a nice neighborhood. I would stay at this place again. Chtistine responded promptly to text messages and gave recommendations on where to go. One tip, ask how to use the shower.  It worked fine I just didn't initially know how to turn it on.

Christine's place was clean, quiet and perfect for our five night stay in NYC. Her place was centrally located which made it  easy to travel to many parts of the city by metro or by foot. Christine was very responsive to our texts and emails answering any questions we had before and during our stay. Overall, we had a great stay at Christine's and would recommend her studio to others.

Christine's studio is great! it is at a very good location, close to subway L line, bus stop m14a/d, 10 min walk to trader joes/whole food market and filled with restaurants! Although it is at 3rd floor with no elevator if you are not carrying much luggage it is not a problem. Christine is always quick and nice to response, additionally, she gave us lots of great advices about restaurants in the east village. I would recommend this place to everyone.
Wonderful location. Very functional and useful studio apartment. You do need to walk up several flights of stairs but that was good for me. I'd definitely stay there again.

Muy buen lugar, la ubicación es muy central a pocas cuadras de Union Square y al lado de la  linea L (1 Av.) ... El departamento es tal y como aparece en las fotos; es un muy agradable  pequeño departamento de un solo espacio. Muy recomendable.
A great stay in this studio. A good bed, great shower and enough space for a city trip. The L Subway line is 2 minutes away.

Christine communicated very well before & during my trip, she was flexible with check-in/out times, and was kind enough to email me restaurant recommendations. Her apartment was just as described--simple, quiet, and clean. Conveniently located just across the street from the L train. The only downside was the 3 flights of stairs, which served very necessary, especially after all the eating I did on my 5 days in NY lol. Will definitely request to stay at Christine's place again on my next trip to the city!
Great location, lively neighbourhood tough quiet room! Very clean appartement. Not a big 2 persons bed, linnen was clean. Quick respons from Christine.

Le logement de Christine est propre et très bien pour deux personnes. Au troisième étage sans ascenseur, l'appartement est au calme de la vie new-yorkaise. Il est situé à deux pas d'une station de métro (L). 
Christine est vraiment une hôte parfaite. Elle est réactive aux messages et attentionnée. Elle nous a donné de bonnes adresses. 
Merci beaucoup pour notre séjour. Je recommande ce logement.

Christine's place made the perfect home base for our first trip to NY. The location was key - good restaurant and food options close by, but also centrally located within the city to explore neighborhoods and sights to the north and south. The apartment was just as described - a clean, quiet, centrally-located studio. She communicated clearly and quickly, and checked in half-way through our stay to make sure we had what we needed. If we return to NY, we'd love to stay here again.

We loved Christine's place, which was as described. Very comfortable, well located and super clean. Christine was easy to communicate with and was very helpful with anything we needed. She also gave us some tips where to eat. It was quite hot during our stay and when the temperature went up she immediately texted me to use the aircon, which saved our sweet night sleep! If we go back to NYC, we would love to stay in Christine's place again.

Christine's apartment was exactly as described. It's not fancy, but quiet, clean and comfortable in a fabulous location, with everything you need. Christine gave great recommendations for where to eat too. Definitely will stay again!

This apartment is a great value.  It's not fancy, but it has a small kitchen and a nicely remodeled bathroom.  The bed is very comfortable (it's a full/double size so for two people to sleep on it is cozy).  Also, we were there on a warm & humid weekend in June and the AC kept us cool at night.  The location is great and communication with Christine was easy - she even let us check out a little later at the last minute which was super helpful.

Me and my girlfriend had a great stay in the apartment. Everything is very close, public transport, grocery store, pharmacy etc. Good A/C and the bed felt comfortable. The only thing you need to watch out for is to check the fridge settings, the tempature was set to max and we didnt notice the first day so the vegatables and fruits froze (but the beer got really cold which was great after a long day). Great location - would definitely stay again!

We were visiting New York from Wednesday to Sunday, and Christine's place was a great and Central place to stay. The building looked a bit older from the outside, but the apartment itself was clean and quiet, and the A/C was a huge bonus as it was HOT. We took the subway everywhere, and found our location to be really accessible. There are also some  cool and unique restaurants just a few streets away (about a 15 min walk), and we were able to cook breakfast ourselves in the kitchenette, which was a bonus for the budget. The newly renovated bathroom was really nice to have, too! Christine was very responsive when we had questions - we would definitely stay here again!

Christine's flat was great! Very helpful, effective and timely communication. Key retrieval at "key cafe" (in the back of nearby 7-Eleven) worked without any trouble. Updated bathroom was awesome. Entire flat was super clean. Wifi worked very well. All in all, great place, great location and good value. Thanks Christine!

Very nice place, well located in a great neighborhood. The apartment looks a bit bigger on the pictures than it actually is but it's cozy for two people. Christine was a very nice host, who was always responsive. We enjoyed New York a lot and can recommend this place!

Christine's apartment cannot be beat for staying in Manhattan! It's in a prime location for anything you might want to do in the city (with public transportation nearby) and yet is surprisingly quiet, relaxing, and homey in the midst of it all. Christine is also a perfect host, and she was extremely flexible with our uncertain travel plans to and from the city. I found the apartment larger than expected and in great condition. The AC couldn't totally beat the above average summer temperatures (90F+), but it did keep it cool enough for restful sleep when we got back to the apartment after adventures in the city during the day.

Christine's apartment was a lovely place! It was clean, plenty spacious, comfy bed, lots of natural light. The subway was less than a block away, there were plenty of little shops to pick up snacks and drinks nearby. The key transfer was easy. Christine sent us a great list of restaurants in the area and was extremely responsive to texts while we were there. Highly recommend this little gem!

Christine was great, and the apartment was just as described - clean, comfortable, super close to transit, and right in the heart of the East Village. She gave us a list of restaurant recommendations (which was spot on) and was even super flexible with our check-out time so we could leave our bags a little longer while we explored the city. Highly recommend!
Appartement très bien placé, très bien desservi par le métro. Quartier agréable avec bars et restaurants à proximité.
Excellent! Had a wonderful time :)

small 3rd floor walk up right in the east village. this is the same apartment you'll find in all of the metropolises throughout the world—if that's what you're looking for, (i am) then this is it. the space feels extremely civilized, there's a table to eat, a comfortable bed to sleep in, mirrors to check your clothes, and a merciful AC unit to keep your body from turning into a puddle in the summer humidity and heat.

if you're looking for a cavernous room with an immense and imposing TV staring at you while you sleep, find a hotel, they're all like that now. if you want a break from that, this is your place.
Great place to stay. Very close to food and subway. Joe's pizza isnt too far! Lots of things to eat around the vicinity. Christine is a really helpful and great host!
Host provide great tips to restaurants nearby.  Good value compared to NYC hotel.

Small apartment , neat place and a very nice renovated bathroom.

Need to go up 3 flights of steps to get to apartment. Be careful if you have heavy luggages.

Unfortunate incident when some authority came knocking for room inspection, did not open door as unsure if this is a legit inspection. Christine is very helpful and agreed for cancellation of stay.

Christen was able to accommodate me at the last minute with a wonderful place to stay. One stop away from the L train and right in the middle of many restaurants and bars. Would definitely stay here again great bed and really clean place.

I stayed at Christine's apartment for a few days (September, 2017) and it was, as other reviews have indicated, very good. The location is close to Union Square, the subway, and numerous shops and restaurants. Air conditioning works well (cools the entire apartment quickly), the bed was very comfortable, there is a good-size closet and dresser to use, and it's quiet. WiFi worked perfectly. Communication with the hosts was easy, efficient and friendly. A great find for anybody visiting NYC, and a definite recommendation.

Bien situado, cerca de metro y Union Square. Supermercado y locales cerca.
Edificio antiguo pero estudio con baño renovado. 
Tercer piso sin ascensor.
Great location and Christine was very helpful and accommodating. We didn't fly till late on our last day so Christine allowed us to have a late checkout

Christine’s place has everything you need for a perfect stay in New York. Great studio in a wonderful location.
And Christine is a superb host. Great communication, flexible and very helpful. I’d definitely come again.
The apartment is great, bright and clean, just like in the pictures, perfect location in a very pleasant neighbourhood.

I stayed in Christine's apartment three nights in October, and it was great, so I agree with the other reviews here. It's as announced: a bright, clean space with good AC and well-functioning wi-fi. The location is perfect for traveling around Manhattan, and has many good restaurants close by (Mogador, for instance). Christine's co-host Andrew welcomed us at the apartment and gave us a nice introduction to the apt and the city. It has my warm recommendation!

Christine was an awesome host!! Checking in was so easy, and the location was great. It was so nice to be in the heart of great restaurants and getting to the subway was so easy. I would totally recommend this if you are looking for a true New York experience.

Christine was great. i really don't need much as far as help around the city, and I didn't want a swank place so Christine's was great. its got the basics, its clean the shower has great pressure and its a quiet building. someone in the building likes to make curry! Christine was super accommodating  getting me checked both in a and out.  location is great, the neighborhood has everything you need and theres easy access to everywhere. great place to stay especially if your just looking for a place to sleep.

Christine's apartment is cute and very conveniently located. I highly recommend this spot and will try to stay next time I visit as well. Christine was quick to respond and help with any questions I had. She was accommodating with a late check out so we didn't have to drag our bags around on our last day. Andrew, her co-host was very friendly and gave us some great tips on where to go. Overall great stay. Clean and quiet apartment. Great location.
Excellent location, spacious and bright studio, simple logistics!
This apartment has a great location near bustling 2nd Avenue, but my stay was quiet and peaceful. I appreciated the decorating touches and Christine’s quick and friendly communication.

L'appartamento è piccolino ma situato in una zona centrale e molto trafficata. Per chi sosta a new York pochi giorni è perfetto per visitare la.città. 
La disponibilita' e la cortesia di Christine è impeccabile. 
Abbiamo Fatto il check in molto tardi ed inoltre non avendo altre prenotazioni per il giorno del check out ci ha lasciato l'appartamento fino alle 16,00.
Tuttavia l'alloggio non è dei migliori.
Poco curato nei dettagli e soprattutto la cucina non da una buona impressione.
Great location, will stay again!

Christine and her co-host were quick to respond, helpful, and friendly. Great location, close to all food places, blocks away from union square. The apartment was clean, small yet spacious, and perfect for someone who needs a last-minute stay.

Perfectly situated in the middle of Manhatten and absolutely calm! 
Highly recommendable!
Really enjoyed our stay, great area & location, nice, cosy space...
Christine’s place was awesome!!! NY Style pizza and bagels around the corner. Close to the subway and centrally located.

We looked at a few apartments before booking Christine’s place and I’m glad we chose to stay at Christine’s. 

Great location a few stops away on the subway to Time Square and grand central station which helped us go and explore NYC with ease. 

Apartment was cold when we arrived due to the radiators coming on at certain times. However we spoken to Christine and with quick responses she was on hand to facilitated our needs promptly. Great communicate throughout our stay - couldn’t ask for anything more.

A lot of restaurants, shops on the street which is perfect if you want to quickly grab any amenities and if you want to eat in I would highly recommend Joe’s Pizza - you can go get it or have it delivered! 

Clean and tidy plus the bed super comfy. As it’s an apartment block don’t expect it to be quiet but this adds to the experience of New York. 

I would definitely recommend for anymore looking to stay.

I usually don't do pro-con lists for reviews, but we had some difficulty with this airbnb. Overall, everything was fine, but I do not think we would come back. I will say that Christine was friendly.

Pros-
-Cannot hear a lot of street sound
-Nice bathroom
-Christine is very quick to get back to us with all of our messages

Cons-
-The hallway leading into the apartment smelled very bad, and the smell would seep into the apartment
-Check-in is listed as 12PM but was not clean until 6PM
-No control over the heating that we could tell, though there is a small space heater provided
-Possible to hear neighbors every movement

I wish I had seen the recent review stating the pros and cons of this apartment. I would not have chosen to stay here. I have no idea where the rest of the reviews came from - the rave reviews are confusing. I'm going to take the same approach as the previous reviewer - pros and cons.
Pros
Good communication from Christine
Great location. Near amazing restaurants and steps to the subway
Remodeled, clean bathroom and kitchen
Cons
The building the apartment is in is dirty and has a horrible odor, which permeates the studio.
The linens are old. The towels are mismatched, as if they were friends' or family's castoffs - it was odd.
The pillows were old, again, as if they were castoffs from somewhere. I contacted Christine about this, and she reimbursed us for buying some new pillows. The pillow and linen comments may seem picky, but, combined with the smells, the dirty pillows just made everything feel dirty - even though the apartment itself is clean.
All in all, we would not stay in this apartment again.

Christine’s appartment is right in the center of everything. Great location! We met with her co-host upon arrival, he was really nice. We could also easily communicate with Christine through the airbnb app. Her place is in the middle of an appartment building and you can easily hear the neighbours, but not more than expected. Overall Christine’s place is perfect if you want walking distance to everything you need.

It’s an old building that is very clearly an old building. It’s exactly what you would expect. The floors are creaky and the hallways are narrow. This adds to the overall charm of the place. 

If you’re scared of old, clearly lived-in buildings, this isn’t for you. But for me it was perfect. 

Christine was super accommodating too, which made my stay even better!
We loved our stay here! Such a stylish, upbeat, fun neighborhood to stay in.

This 3 story walk up is a no frills apt but we had everything we needed. I had a huge suitcase and it was a little hard to get up the stairs, but we managed fine. The pictures are very accurate, which I appreciated as this was our first experience with Airbnb. Christine answered all our questions and gave me great suggestions along the way. I also felt very safe as you have to unlock 2 locked doors just to get in the building. Didn't really hear the neighbors, it was kinda quiet. I would recommend you stay here if you are looking for a true New York studio experience.
We had a nice stay at Christine's apartment and we loved how close it was to the subway.
Amazing host. Very accommodating and good with communication. Incredibly fast responses.

We enjoyed our stay in Christine's studio. The size was great for the two of us, there was barely any noise at night, and the location was very convenient! The bed and sofa were comfortable, and the shower was nice - we got everything we needed. 

The heat was a little loud when it was on, but it didn't cause us any problem. Sometimes there was a smell in the hallway and in the room, but we solved it by opening the window. 

Christine was very responsive to our texts, and her co-host Andrew met with us for the checkin and showed us everything we need to know about the studio. It was overall a good experience!

Bonne location pour son prix et surtout l'emplacement! C'est pas un hôtel 4 étoiles, mais ça fera l'affaire si vous n'êtes pas trop difficile.

Beaucoup de commerces et restos a proximité. Proche de la station Union Square qui est parfait pour prendre le métro partout dans Manhattan.

Nous avons louer un véhicule avec L (Website hidden by Airbnb) de JFK pour USD 63 (pourboire inclus a l’avance). Au retour aussi. Les cartes de crédit sont acceptés :-)

Si vous arriver a La Guardia ou Newark, les taxes d'aéroport sont moins chers que JFK! Donc vos tickets aussi probablement. Faites la comparaison.

Pour un super resto Grecque avec le meilleur baklava sur la planète, allez au Slouvaki GR, 116 Stanton Street, East Village.

The main benefit of this accommodation was the location. We didn't meet Christine but communication was good and she responded quickly when messaged.  We were disappointed in that the kitchen area wasn't as well equipped as expected from the advert with lack of drinking vessels and cutlery and the level of cleanliness of the bed linen was not as good as we have previously experienced in other Airbnb accommodation.
Christine was extremely accommodating! We arrived early after a red eye flight and she helped us figure out logistics and accommodate our needs. Clean and comfy bed! No complaints :)

This Airbnb is a cute apartment with great access to Manhattan hot spots . Christine was very helpful and responded timely in her communication. There were some reviews about a bad smell in the stairwell . While there was a faint odor it did not interfere with our stay at all and was not in the apartment . This apartment is cost effective and perfect for a couple .
El departamento es limpio. Como en las fotos. A Christine no la conocimos personalmente nunca. La bienvenida no fue buena. Esperamos 1 hora para poder entrar con las valijas.
Parfait emplacement du transport commun. Communication avec la hote facile plus acces au wifi.

I enjoyed my stay at Christine's place. It's not the largest space, but it worked well for me, and was well-located. I also appreciated the flexible check-in process, and Christine was quick to reply to messages.

Christine's place is in a very convenient location, right around the corner from the L train and only about a 10-minute walk to Union Square, where you can get pretty much anywhere in the city. We enjoyed the neighborhood - it's full of bars, restaurants, shops and local culture.

The apartment is small, but it is the perfect size for 2 people, and the bathroom was actually much bigger and nicer than we expected. The bed and sheets were comfortable, and despite the apartment's central location, it actually wasn't noisy at all. There was plenty of space to put our things and still not feel cramped.

We'd definitely stay here again :)

For location this place is amazing. But that's where it ends. The apartment is dirty and needs a good scrub. The bed is really soft so if you have back problems this is a no go. It's also a double bed so pretty tiny for 2 people. There are limited amenities ie no tv or ironing board. Kitchen is small but manageable. The air con was broken when we arrived but was replaced after 2 days of our stay. It's on the 3rd floor with very steep stairs that are not level so I wouldn't recommend for elderly or kids or anyone with any walking difficulties. Overall the stay was okay but I wouldn't go back.

Christine’s studio was cozy and comfortable, in great East Village location near tons of restaurants, bars, and central location to easily access sights and attractions of NYC. The studio had everything we needed including comfy bed and AC. We didn’t want to leave! Thanks for a great stay.
Chritine's apartment was an excellent base of operations - amazing location, super clean and welcoming. Couldn't be happier with our stay and would definitely stay again!
Very nice apartment and convenient location. A good choice of living in Manhattan.
Great location. Perfect for a weekend exploring New York City

Christine was great! She was very accommodating to our needs during the trip. The place was pretty modern, had a great AC and walking distance to a lot of food. Close to boba, halal guys and what not. Everything was either a subway trip or 5$ Uber line away. Bed was a full, sheets are clean and ready for new guests each time!

I would recommend this bright studio.

Christine’s place in East Village was a great location with lots of restaurants close by within walking distance. The place was small but cosy and more than enough for us as we were out for most of the day and night. Christine was quick to respond and really helpful. Would recommend this place.
Great location! very close to Williamsburg Bridge, Union Square, Soho and many other cool places.

Chris answers fast and is very gentle. The appartment is very simple, but confortable. I had some problems with the noise (from the floor and the neighborhood) and some power plugs tha wasn't work very well. The best point, however, is the restroom (beautiful and spacious) and the localization - this is amazing!

Christine’s place is very comfortable and perfectly located for a stay in NY. We were very pleased with her responsiveness. Make sure you are comfortable walking up stairs and bring flip flops / slippers if you plan to walk in the studio without shoes on.

Christine’s place was perfect! It was very clean and comfortable. The space is centrally located in the East Village and we were able to walk everywhere! The Metro station was a block away and incredibly convenient for when we decided to venture out of the neighborhood. Christine was a lovely host; her responses were quick and friendly. When we had a scheduling issue she was able to accommodate us and really saved the day! I can’t recommend her flat enough!!!

Centralt boende med bra tillgång till tunnelbanor!
Vi träffade aldrig Christine personligen men vi fick alltid snabba svar och ett trevligt bemötande. Incheckning och utcheckning gick väldigt smidigt.

We had an absolutely great time. From the moment we walked in we felt right at home. 
The host is very friendly and accomodating, very responsive as well.
The appartment is clean, well equiped, and surprisingly quiet for nyc.
And we loved the neighborhood. 
So: nothing but praise from our side. Recommended!
The apartment couldn’t be in a better location and is large by NYC standards. Great price for the stay and everything was as expected.
Great location and Christine was a friendly host, quick respons and easy check-in/-out.
Christine was fantastic! She made coordinating my arrival/checkout very easy and recommended several coffee shops nearby. Would definitely stay again!
Everything required in this studio, perfectly located for a visit of New York.
Simple apartment, great location. Christine was helpful and responsive.
Great place and location.  Christine is great at answering questions.  Great Host!

The space is nice and has an updated bathroom.  It's small and simple overall, if that's all you need.  There is no TV.  The bed is only a full size, so it was a bit small for the two of us.  The kitchen has some basics, but no pots.  The floor was not clean - my feet got dirty when I walked around barefoot.  Otherwise, the apt seemed pretty clean.

The apartment has an AC unit, but it didn't work very well.  We stayed here when highs were in the 90s.  The first night, we didn't even use the blankets because it was too hot.  In the morning I noticed a light on the AC unit indicating the air filter needed to be cleaned, so I cleaned it myself hoping this would help.  The AC was a little better after that, but still never quite got as cool as we would've liked.

El departamento es igual que en las imágenes. Es pequeño, pero perfecto para días de vacaciones. Las ventanas tienen termopanel por lo que no se escucha ruido además dan a un patio interior.  El baño funciona perfecto y tenía de todo para pasar unos días  cómodos y tranquilos.  La ubicacion es perfecta, cuenta con aire acondicionado, es un poco ruidoso, pero muy necesario para días de calor en NY. Personas que tengan algun problema para subir escalas deben  considerar que es tercer piso sin ascensor. A  Christine no la conocimos pero siempre estuvo atenta a todo. Volvería sin duda.
Great place in a good area. Christine was a great host and the communication was perfect. I'd stay here again. Thanks!

This is a great little apartment ideally situated in the Lower East Side. While the entrance may be a bit off-putting the apartment is safe, clean and comfortable and Christine provided clear and accurate instructions throughout our three day visit.

We had a very comfortable stay in Christine’s apartment. It was clean, bright, had all the facilities needed (and as advertised) and was situated in an excellent location where we felt safe. If you are looking to properly experience living in New York City, tucked away from the busy touristy areas, this is ideal. Christine was also superb at responding to any of our queries. We highly recommend and would definitely consider staying there again.
Great location! Christine was very responsive with any questions that I had before and during my stay.

Perfect location for great local restaurants and bars in the East Village. The key cafe exchange was very convenient. Christine was really quick to respond to any questions we had. A water pipe happened to bust just prior to our stay (no water leaking, it just wasn’t running) and she responded immediately and had her super on it - it was literally fixed within an hour. The bed and linens were very comfortable. I would definitely stay here again.
Christine’s place is great located, great value for location. The apt is good for a short stay in the city. Communication was fluent, easy check in-out.

Great place to stay! Close to everything and easy to get around the city. Plenty of places to eat close by and supermarkets too.
Communication throughout the process was amazing and we would stay again in a heart beat

Christine was a great host and had the place well prepared for our arrival. 
We had a great stay however the boiler broke for the last two days of our stay, so heating and hot water was out. Christine did not hesitate in paying the refund for us for those two nights so we could get other accommodation. An unfortunate thing which can happen to anyone but she dealt with it very well. Would recommend this place to anyone, great location for food and drink.

It's rare to find a space to rent short-term where you can live alone in NYC. Christine's place is ideal if that is what you desire and the location is fantastic with the East Village just outside of the front door. I really appreciated not needing to take trains and taxi's to get the places I was going. In addition, Christine's response times were very fast and that made me feel safe. I would stay here again.
A great little studio perfectly situated for your exploration of NYC
Located in the East Village right near the metro, this apartment is perfect for a quick getaway. Christine made sure the room was clean and ready for our stay. Will definitely be revisiting.

super close to the L train, and an easy walk to the larger 14th St station that connects to many other trains. really easy to get on a train and hop over to Brooklyn or uptown to Manhattan/midtown or over to the west village and Chelsea market area, all within 10-20min via train. east village is an interesting place to explore as well. there is a YMCA right downstairs and a few parka within easy walking distance. everything was clean and comfortable, was very happy with our stay here.
Christine was excellent. Fast communication and very friendly. It is a studio apt though so be aware. It is quiet from the street noise which is a bonus in noisy cities.

The location of the apartment is great, next to the subway and lots of bars & restaurants. Christine was quick with all responses. The apartment is a little dated while the key collection is difficult if you don’t have internet or install the right app beforehand.

Room is exactly as it is pictured and is it a walk up, only if you have big bags might be an issue otherwise its totally fine.  Great location not far from the trains and buses and loads places close by for food and shopping.
Great neighborhood. My favorite part of the city. Would definitely recommend to people who want to stay in the village and get out and experience the city. Very comfortable bed too:)
Decent spot in a great location. Thanks!
Great location and easy access to the property. Christine responded very promptly and we enjoyed our stay.

This place is perfect for any New York trip. Just blocks away from the subway, it is easy to get around almost anywhere. If you want to stay close to home, there are plenty awesome bars and restaurants to keep you busy. The apartment was clean and comfortable. A great deal overall!
Great location!!  Christine's place has everything you need to comfortably crash in between galavanting around the city and is blocks away from great bars and food.

Nice small apartment with all you need for a sightseeing trip in NYC. Perfect location - direct connection to the subway. Stores and restaurant just in the street. Perfect communication with Christine.

Great locality, everywhere close because of the subway which is on the corner across the street. Lots of shops and restaurants around the apartment. In the apartment is a complete kitchen with everything that you need...

The location is very convenient, situated between Brooklyn and lower Manhattan.  Trains are nearby as well as local restaurants, coffee shops , etc.  Loved that the apartment was on the third floor off the street and in the back off the main street.  It has a lot of natural light and is pretty quiet considering it's a very old building.
If you are looking for an affordable, comfortable, and excellently located place to stay in NYC, this is the best option! We greatly enjoyed our stay  and will absolutely stay there again.
Very nice location and clean apartment! Thank you.
Nice stay in Christine’s apartment, good location and great bed, very comfortable in deed! Got a good sense of what it might be like to be an East Village local. Thanks for having us Christine!

Christine’s place is a good value for the east village. The studio was clean, though the building smelled a little funky. The keys were left in a key box (secured) in a nearby 7-11 so I never met the host or had much communication. NYC is very walkable, so it’s easy to get around (as well as by subway and Lyft of course). 9th Street is a fun shopping street!

name: Spacious Modern Apartment in Central Hong Kong
summary: Our home is minutes walk to Soho, Sai Ying Pun, and Sheung Wan with easy access to public transport and the mid-levels escalator.   We hope you'll love the the light and airy modern feel and great views over the surrounding quiet neighbourhood.  The apartment is ideal for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers.
space: We hope you'll love the the light and airy modern feel and great views over the surrounding neighbourhood.  The apartment is ideal for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers.
description: Our home is minutes walk to Soho, Sai Ying Pun, and Sheung Wan with easy access to public transport and the mid-levels escalator.   We hope you'll love the the light and airy modern feel and great views over the surrounding quiet neighbourhood.  The apartment is ideal for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers. We hope you'll love the the light and airy modern feel and great views over the surrounding neighbourhood.  The apartment is ideal for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers. The apartment is well located between three great neighbourhoods in Central Hong Kong.    The apartment overlooks the backstreets of Sheung Wan and Tai Ping Shan street where you will find hip boutiques and great coffee shops.   A few minutes walk away are the streets of Soho where you will be overwhelmed with dining options.   A ten minute walk in the other direction will find you in Sai Ying Pun where you'll find a mix of old local eateries and new restaurants and bars. Our home is
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is well located between three great neighbourhoods in Central Hong Kong.    The apartment overlooks the backstreets of Sheung Wan and Tai Ping Shan street where you will find hip boutiques and great coffee shops.   A few minutes walk away are the streets of Soho where you will be overwhelmed with dining options.   A ten minute walk in the other direction will find you in Sai Ying Pun where you'll find a mix of old local eateries and new restaurants and bars.
transit: Our home is minutes walk to Soho, Sai Ying Pun, and Sheung Wan and has easy access to public transport, taxis and the mid-levels escalator.

host.host_about: Kiwi living in Edinburgh.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

name: Little New York on Riley - 1BR Darlinghurst
summary: With the CBD within walking distance, this brand new, fully self-contained 1BR apartment is the perfect choice for executives or holiday makers. Stylishly decked out and fully equipped, this is Sydney apartment accommodation at its finest. Please note, this is a duplicate listing, set up to attract longer bookings with weekly and monthly discounts.
space: Discover inner city living at its best in this brand new 1BR luxury apartment. The apartment is decked out with funky living and dining room furniture, a brand new HD flat screen TV with platinum Foxtel access and a fully equipped kitchen, including a Nespresso coffee machine with an initial supply of capsules provided. As with all Uptown Apartments, linen and towels are provided and wi-fi access is free of charge. The apartment features a good sized bedroom with queen bed and ensuite bathroom, separated from the open plan living/dining and kitchen area by sliding glass walls. There is ample storage, with a European laundry located in the entrance corridor.
description: With the CBD within walking distance, this brand new, fully self-contained 1BR apartment is the perfect choice for executives or holiday makers. Stylishly decked out and fully equipped, this is Sydney apartment accommodation at its finest.
