neighborhood_overview: The location is perfect - just five minutes from Sydney's CBD, Kings Cross and Potts Point, and two minutes from Oxford St. Bus stops that service Paddington, Bondi Junction, Bondi Beach and beyond are right on your doorstep. Darlinghurst is a cosmopolitan suburb, with busy cafes, restaurants, bars and nightlife venues along Oxford, Crown, Victoria and Stanley Streets. The Darlinghurst Village is a heritage precinct where the majority of buildings are early 20th century terrace houses. It comprises 20 blocks bounded by Barcom Avenue, Forges and Oxford Streets and Taylor Square. Oxford Street is Sydney’s most famous shopping street, where you will find everything from supermarkets and gift shops, to alternative clothing boutiques, late night bookshops and music stores. Darlinghurst is home to a range of exceptional designer and home wares outlets, as well as a great selection of various ethnic cafes and restaurants, from basic to up market. Oxford Street' exclusive cinemas, the Chauvel
notes: We have 3 apartments in this block, but only one car space. Parking can be provided on a first-come-first-served basis for $20 per night. Street parking is restricted and limited, though there is a multi-storey car park next door to the building.
transit: There is no shortage of public transport options surrounding this apartment. Catch a bus from any number of bus routes with numerous stops within a 1 minute walk. You can get to Museum or Kings Cross train stations in a 5 to 10 minute walk, or you can walk into the CBD in the same length of time.
access: You will be provided with instructions for self-check-in once we process your booking. Once you collect your keys from the property, you will be able to access the apartment via the lift after you enter the building through the front glass security doors. Once inside, you will have access to the entire apartment.
interaction: We leave you to enjoy the apartment in peace, but we do live nearby and are able to discuss any questions you have over the phone, or we can get to the apartment in around 20 minutes to attend to anything urgent.
house_rules: - By booking with us you agree to the terms and conditions outlined in our Rental Policy and agree to follow our HOUSE RULES: No pets; No smoking anywhere inside the apartment; Report any breakages or damage; Leave all keys inside the apartment when you check-out; Check-out by your agreed time; Respect our neighbours by keeping noise to a minimum after 11pm; Follow our STRICT NO PARTY POLICY. If you are in any doubt as to this policy, please contact us immediately. Following these rules will ensure your security bond is returned to you in full and on time. Breaking these rules may result in charges being incurred as detailed in our terms and conditions. If you respect the apartment as you would your own home, you can relax and enjoy your stay.

host.host_about: We live in Sydney and run an executive accommodation business in Sydney and Brisbane. All our apartments are located in high-demand inner-city locations, a short distance from the CBD. Whether you’re on a business trip or vacation for a few days, or are after a longer stay due to relocating or home renovations, we have executive accommodation to suit your needs. Our apartments offer everything you require for a short-term or long-term stay. All our apartments are fully furnished and have a fully equipped kitchen (complete with all kitchenware), a washing machine and dryer, a brand new flatscreen tv and a Nespresso coffee machine, along with an initial supply of capsules for you to enjoy. We provide linen and towels, platinum Foxtel (cable tv) access and free wifi in every apartment. We pride ourselves on our customer service, ensuring that your stay is a uniquely positive experience. We encourage guests to provide feedback, and regularly update our apartments and services based on your recommendations. We look forward to having you to stay and aim to ensure you keep coming back.

reviews.comments: The location was very convenient, and the apartment was clean and new - perfect for my girlfriend and I. My only issue was that the sink was quite small, which made rinsing plates, pots and pans quite difficult before putting them in the dishwasher. Overall, it was a great stay, and dealing with Nicki before the stay was a pleasure. Recommended for someone who wants to stay within walking distance to the city.
Unit was amazing, a few small issues here and there but otherwise very well thought out and beautiful home. Would stay again.

Nice flat, centrally located in an elevator building. It was very easy to check in and get settled. I stayed for 3 nights while traveling for business and the listing was a great base camp in the city where I could catch up on work and sleep. Sydney was experiencing a heatwave that week and I was very thankful for the air conditioning.

Nicki and Dave are great hosts! They always responded me in a swift manner with good solutions to all of my minor issues (including the early arrival, coffee machine repair, cleaning service question and light bulb request). 
I liked the apartment very much. It was convenient to do anything in the city and quiet and comfortable to sleep at night. To highlight the convenience, I want to note that the nearest supermarket is just one or two blocks away (to the north) and pubs and restaurants are also a block away (to the south). Some may worry about bugs at such location, but during my 40-day stay, I did not have any bug issues. 
The only possible setbacks I can think of are the tiny kitchen sink and occasional odor from outside. 
The kitchen sink is certainly small although this place has a dishwasher. So, for a short stay and people who do not cook very much will not have any problems. However, if you want to do dishes during your stay, you will probably find the sink space cramped. 
The outside smell was very occasional during my stay in a rainy summer (I think it was related to the weather). When I noticed the weird smell, I just needed to close the windows to shut it out. The AC works very well. So, it was not a big deal for me to do so. 
Overall, I am happy with the values and qualities I got here, and I would highly recommend this place to anybody who wants to enjoy the city activities and have good rests in the same time.

Unfortunately very disappointed with the overall listing description which does not accurately reflect any similarities to the actual apartment at all.. 'Uptown' property management state that they offer PLATNIUM Foxtel in all their properties - in this case; the Foxtel box was present but the network connection was not. We could not even manage to watch starred TV.. & it was more frustrating to also realise that most of the Foxtel channels were not subscribed to, therefore there isn't anything PLATNIUM about this packgage! This is not a 1br, it is an older style, but externally refurbished block, there was no room to move & even if we did get the TV working, there was no chance of watching it due to the dining setting blocking the view. Please update the listing description :(
Great location, great place, felt really comfortable here. Would recommend to anyone staying in town for a few days

The check-in was really easy, a big relief as we arrived late at night. Extremely clean and had all the kitchen facilities, washer, dryer, big table (used as our working desk), big long sofa (easily converted to an extra bed for a tall person). The bed was a bit too soft for my preference and I had body ache the next mornings. Not a problem as we are sports masseurs. Other than this, the stay was great.

Very modern apartment in a great location.  It's particularly convenient to Oxford St.  Lots of cute local restaurants in the area.  Easy to walk to the wharf, downtown, botanical gardens, and opera house.  The owners were immediately responsive when I had a question at check in.  Definitely recommend this apartment.

The apartment was great overall. Fantastic location in Darlinghurst, right off of Williams St, a 10 minute walk to Town Hall station. 5 minutes to Hyde Park and 10 minutes to King's Cross. The studio is very well designed, with a nice large living area and floor to ceiling windows. The furniture could use an upgrade, as the chairs are a bit shabby, but they do the job.
Fantastic location, 5 min walk to city and surrounded by cafes, restaurants and such. Apartment fit out was very new and nice.

name: Sydney Olympic Park High Level Stunning View Apt
summary: This brand new two-bedroom apartment with 2 bathroom at high level of the iconic Australia Tower in the heart of Sydney Olympic Park. Our place is welcoming. It contains 2 urban design bedrooms with buitl-in wardrobes. It could accommodate up to six adults, the ensuite room and the second room are both with band new Queen size bed can fit two people comfortably, the sofa bed in the living room can convert to Queen size bed, if necessary.

It could accommodate up to six adults, the ensuite room and the second room are both with band new Queen size bed can fit two people comfortably, the sofa bed in the living room can convert to Queen size bed, if necessary. neighborhood_overview: Guests will enjoy an abundance of world class sporting and recreation facilities on their doorstep, as well as being surrounded by Australia's largest urban Parkland. Sydney Olympic Park provides a unique balance of exciting venues and entertainment, shops and sophisticated restaurants. Guests will also enjoy all the benefits of effective public transport including ferry, bus and train services. - DFO shopping centre 10-20 minute walking distance - Rhodes shopping centre 20-30 minute walking via bicentennial park walkway. - ANZ stadium & Allphones are 10-20 minute walking distance - There are a number of cafes and Restaurants in the area.
transit: Restaurants, Convenience store,shopping bus and train station at door step. Ikea, DFO and shopping centres within minutes' drive Easy and short access to M4&A3
access: Stylish furniture include lounge, dining table, beds, full equipped kitchen, television and much more! High Speed NBN Internet secure parking spot in the building Video Security Intercom Fully equipped kitchen with stone benches and stainless steel appliances  Reverse Cycle Air conditioning for every room and intercom Video security access, lift access, and storage cage.
interaction: We are always contactable by mobile, SMS, E-mail or airbnb. Please feel free to get in touch with me, If you have any questions about where to eat, where to shopping etc.
house_rules: - - No parties, events or group gatherings. - -Check-in time is 3.30pm or earlier on request, if available - -Check-out time is 12pm, however we have a generous late checkout - - Policy which is subject to "next booking" availability. - - No pets are allowed at this property. - - Quiet Enjoyment Only - we ask that you remain respectful of our neighbours by keeping noise to a minimum, especially after 10:00pm - - Smoking - Smoking is only allowed outside of the apartment on the open balcony and the balcony doors must remain closed at all time if smoking occurs.

reviews.comments: Our crew stayed here for a business trip for Supanova Popculture event. It was great, spacious and walking distance to everything. Parking was a breeze, restaurants around the area and a convenience store. You even get 10% off at the restaurants when you mention your a resident.

Nicole was an amazing host. The apartment was perfect and even better than the pictures. Excellent location to see a show at Sydney Olympic Park. 
Highly recommended

From the first email to Nicole, it felt like I was talking to a friend. She was so welcoming and helpful, and responded quickly to every request. On arrival I was met at the elevator with a big smile and the key. My surprise when I walked in the door was immense! The apartment is beautifully appointed, fresh spotless linen, a bowl of fruit, chocolates, and even an array of teabags and biscuits to have with my coffee. Such a lovely surprise. It's a spacious apartment with two beautiful bathrooms and amazing views. Even a large balcony with deck chairs. This apartment truly had everything we needed. There was a chemist near the ground floor doors, and a convenience store as well; coffee shops and cafes are nearby, and an excellent DFO shopping centre nearby (within walking distance; 1.3km I think).  I recommend this apartment to you without hesitation. Thanks Nicole! We'll be back!

For a family of 5 the apartment was excellent with a fantastic view.   Everything you need is supplied and Nicole is a perfect host.  It is close to restaurants, public transport and sporting events. Highly recommend.
Really nice apartment - everything was clean & comfortable!

A great place to stay. Close to everything in Olympic Park (including being around the corner from the train station), and a phenomenal view. From the lounge room as well as both bedrooms and balcony you can clearly see every major sporting venue. And what's better is it's only roughly a 10 min walk to any one of them, making it incredibly easy to access any one of them with ease. 

The apartment itself was very clean, with a modern look and feel, and had everything we needed. And whilst we didn't actually meet Nicole, her communication was excellent and she was very accommodating when we had a couple of extra guests show up at late notice wanting to stay, and she allowed us to have a late checkout.

All of this for a great price.

Thanks Nicole. I would definitely stay there again.

We stayed in the apartment for an even held at Qudods Bank Arena. It was the perfect location, we were able to duck out for a quick shop to the DFOs and a quick easy walk to our event. 
The apartment was excellent the beds were really comfy and having 2x bathrooms suited us well.

Nice touches with fresh fruit, porridge and sweets.  Not set up with cooking ingredients or milk etc.  Lovely modern unit, far better than staying at one of the nearby expensive hotels.  Lots of restaurants in walking distance.  Host was easily contactable and understanding when we left the key in the wrong mailbox.
Was really good staying with Nicole, whe was very easy to conect with and her housr was very clear and organized with everything I needed and well located, super happy, thanks Nicole x

Good location but no supermarkets nearby - only expensive convenience stores. There was a fire alarm on one of the days which shut down the elevator all day requiring us to climb 18 flights of stairs. Other than that we had a good stay.
This is a lovely 2 bedroom apartment on the 11th floor overlooking Sydney's Olympic Park. Plenty of room and nice amenities.
Definitely a great place to stay, such a beautiful apartment. Thank you so much for ur kindly host Nicole :)

Really enjoyed our stay.  The apartment was clean and comfortable with great facilities and had everything we needed.  Very convenient location.  Host was easy to contact and deal with.  Will definitely be staying again when next in the area.
Great communication! Great location with great price! Thank you Nicole and Vicky!
Everything good^^

Nicole had fantastic communication leading up to and during our stay. The apartment was much bigger than represented in the photos and was in a perfect location accessing event venues around Olympic Park. Would easily recommend and stay again... Thanks for making our trip so easy Nicole !!

On entering the apartment we knew straight away we would have a great stay. There was fruit and chocolates in a little bowl, a large and after our journey from Adelaide and working out the train system to get to the apartment we were exhausted and instantly felt welcomed, exactly what we needed. We were there for the Australia Dance Festival which was exactly what Nicole had said just a short 10min walk, so fantastic for our needs. Perfect location with a couple of great places to eat a pharmacy and a convenience store just at the bottom of the apartment building.
We would definitely stay again when visiting Olympic Park.
Thanks Nicole!!

Loved arriving to a wonderful view, top notch apartment with everything you could need on hand. It was very well kept, immaculate and well stocked with tea, coffee, basic pantry items, bathroom and laundry products.  We were 2 families staying together and needed to co-ordinate our outings as there is only one car parking key, that is the only downside.

Apartment was really well positioned and nicely appointed. Could not fault anything during our stay and the nice touches like fresh fruit on arrival was appreciated. 
Thanks Nicole we will be back.
I would highly recommend this apartment. Clean, modern, comfortable and better than expected. Friendly host who spoilt us with biscuits and great communication at all time. We will be back!
Nicole was a wonderful host and really thought of everything. We arrived to fruit ,chocolates and biscuits. It was really close to the conference venue as Nicole said and a lovely bright apartment.

The room was lovely and clean, smelt of freshly washed linen.

Fantastic view, really comfortable space, easy walk to restaurants, good parking space and the kids loved the internet.

Will recommend and stay again when we next need to come to Sydney.

A great first Airbnb experience for us.

Fabulous apartment, very clean, modern and spacious. Awesome location, so close to ANZ Stadium for events. Nicole was a wonderful host providing little added touches such as fruit and chocolates. We would definitely look at staying here again.
Very nice apartment very clean and tidy
My family of five found this apartment to be very comfortable and suiting our needs.  We wil stay again.

Fantastic, almost brand-new, nicely decorated, very clean, well-cared for apartment on the 18th floor.  Minutes walk to Olympic Park train station, 10 mins walk to Quodos Arena.  More than enough space for 5 of us.  2 double bedrooms (one ensuite with double shower) and a comfortable sofa bed.  2 bathrooms (one with a large bath).  We were met by Vicky who gave us the keys and entry fob for the carpark.  We didn't meet Nicole, but she was in constant communication during our stay to make sure that all was well.  The apartment has fantastic views and is light and airy. Nice touches were the bowl of fruit, plate of lollies and chocolates, biscuits, milk in the fridge and teabags.  We were really impressed and would certainly recommend a stay here.  Such fantastic value compared to the hotels in the immediate vicinity.
5-star everything

I have been to Sydney Olympic Park many times for sporting activities, this apartment is an outstanding place to stay in that area.  An apartment with a stunning view, easy access to the things we wanted to do in the inner west of Sydney

the place was so nice with a beautiful view. I did my wedding's Chinese tea ceremony there. Nicole was a great host. Without her understanding and support, wedding wouldn't go as smoothly. I highly recommend the place.:)

Nicole was a great host. Always prompt with her responses and the apartment as well as the view was excellent. We'd like to thank Nicole for allowing us to stay the night whilst we prepared for the wedding.
We had a great stay inNicole's apartment. Great for when attending any sporting event at SOPAC.

Very good. Came to this place on short notice (1 hour) after talking to the host. There are a number of wifi networks in the unit but the host made sure I could connect easily and everything went well. Host left fruit and chocolate too which I didn't eat but was very thoughtful! Top marks!

Nicole was extremely flexible when it came to check in and out times which we appreciated very much. The apparment was meticulous and well equipped. The view at night was a highlight. It's is surrounded by a multitude of world class stadiums and parks. Public transport at the doorstep and shops/restaurants in abundance.
One word. Awesome.
All expectations of our accomodation were exceeded .

Very clean and tidy place, restaurants nearby, bus stop is at the front of the building, train station is just walking distance.
Very easy checking in and out, Nicole is available for contact any time and always helpful, it is value for money, will definitely stay there again.

Perfect unit for the Olympic precinct.  Nicole was a great communication and facilitated early check-in.

The perfect host

We had a wonderful stay at Nicole's apartment. From the great communication, to the chocolates on arrival, to the excellent showers and superb views, we got great value for money. Would stay here again.

Handy location for Olympic Park venues.  Easy to find, walking distance to everything, restaurants/cafes nearby.  Check-in process was seamless and Nicole was fantastic communicating prior and after arrival.  Thanks for a great stay!
Great location if you are staying to go to a concert, restaurants under the building and can walk to the stadium.  Easy to find.
Absolutely perfect for the purposes of two independent work colleagues attending a trade fair at Sydney Olympic Park. Clean, tidy, close.

Apartment was perfect for what we wanted.  Nice and clean.  Parking downstairs.  Nicole was great with communications and check in etc.

Definitely recommended!

Close to all amenities, Sydney Olympic Park stadium.
Comfortable well stocked apartment. Even had supply of washing powder, body wash , shampoo and conditioner, very thoughtful. Fruit and chocolates on arrival too. Great communication with Nicole, check in/out was a breeze.
A beautiful apartment. Loved the fact that Nicole left washing powder, soap, shampoo & conditioner. She was very flexible with great communication. Would definitely recommend.
Clean,  tidy with a lot of extra care. Highly recommended

Nicole was really helpful.  The place was easy to find and clean.  Only one night stay.  Couldn't wash anything up because didn't have a tea towel.  The beds were wonderfully comfortable and lovely to have milk there for coffee.  The hot water was a little reluctant and the floor outside the lift was not there.  Maybe under construction.   Location is great and beautiful views.  Thank you Nicole for a great stay.
Great location, easily accessible to Olympic park. Great communication, reliable.  Great facilities and love the extra little touches.
Definable try the Thai downstairs and Mellow Me cafe for breakfast options
Wonderful place. Very easy communication. Love it

Thank you so much for providing an amazing place to stay! Firstly communicating with the host was so easy and quick. The apartment was better than the pictures displayed. Everything was very clean and nicely organized. The view was outstanding!! There was so much to use, plates, cups, cutlery, fresh cold water in fridge, ice in freezer, shampoo and conditioner in both bathrooms, clean towels to use, extra sheets and blankets to use for the sofa bed. What an amazing experience. Thank you again.
Fantastic apartment. Very clean, great communication and perfect location for any event at Sydney olympic Park
We had a great stay at Nicole's and found it incredibly accommodating.
Nicole was lovely and her place was perfect!

Nicole's place was wonderful - we were in Sydney for a conference and coming home to the apartment was perfect! Comfortable, clean, modern, spacious & a great view! Will definitely be staying here again :)
Nicole communicates very well, the view is spectacular. Rooms were very clean would recommend to anyone.

Simple, Easy
There are two Thai food restaurant nearby.
Wine & Coffee at north street corner is a good place for breakfast.
Great place to stay at! Walkable distance to bus stand and Train Station!
The clean apartment has well-equiped kitchen, beautiful view and strong wifi. Prompt and helpful communication. Thanks.
Great apartment, great location for events at Olympic park! Easy check-in and communication with host. We will definitely stay again!
Very good place

Great apartment for business travelers. Short walk to where my trade show was being held. I would happily stay here again, Nicole was a helpful and friendly host who even accommodated an early check in.
We highly recommend Nicole's apartment and her hospitality is second to none.
Beautiful apartment, great location

Great location and fantastic value for money. Nicole was very accomodating and easy to communicate with. Apartment was well equipped with everything you need. Fantastic location if attending ANZ stadium and close to cafes and bars and DFO.
Lovely apartment in a great location. Perfect for attending (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication with the host was great. Would definitely stay again.
Easy relaxed host and yet efficient communication in a location that was perfect for our needs great experience will definetly  book again.
A great apartment with a view
Every detail was thought of. The place was super clean, really luxurious and had such beautiful views.
Room is spacious with a great view. Very clean and comfortable and communication was quick
Great location , great place to live. Thank you!
Great host and lovely apartment. Perfect communications made our stay so easy and enjoyable. Loved the location of the apartment too. Thank you!!
Wonderful apartment with thoughtful touches of comfort.
Convenient location to Olympic park activities and train station.  Great cafes and restaurants within walking distance.
Fabulous, big and stylish apartment with nice furnishings and great view. Nicole was very easy to deal with and very quick to respond to any queries. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
Nicole was so helpful with accommodating our travel and new year plans! Just wonderful!! And the kids loved the treats left for us!! Gorgeous apartment. Thank you.
Amazing views!
Very clean, perfect for what we need.  Great communication. Will use again.
Short easy walk to stadium. Great restaurants and cafes downstairs. Loved the apartment. Will definitely stay here again.

The apartment was fabulous for our short stay but you could quite comfortably stay for a longer period. It was sparkling clean, in a great location and well equipped.
Check in was easy & Nicole was very responsive to questions.
I would definitely stay here again.

The host is super helpful and the house is immaculate.
Plenty of personality and cute finishing touches around the apartment ☺️
I definitely recommend,Thank you
Such a great location for going to events in Olympic Park!
Great Location, close to all the arenas and easy walk to restuarants etc. Found the apartment clean and tidy, will stay again if we need to be out there again.
We've stayed here before and returned because our last stay was so great.  Really comfortable and clean, and great location.  Thanks again, looking forward to returning another time!
This place has everything you need. Great location wonderful host & plenty of places to eat to choose from. Will definitely stay there again.
So easy to communicate with Nicole. She answers questions really quickly. The apartment is generous in size and  clean.
A great location for events at Olympic Park
Great communication.
Very responsive. Great location

Thanks Nicole a great unit and ideally located. The unit has a great floor plan with balcony, is perfectly set up with everything you need. Clean, very well fitted out with everything you could want. Fully recommend it to anyone looking for great accomodation close to Showgrounds.
Great and clean place. Everything you need for a comfortable stay. Two thumbs up.
Thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Apartment was stylish, clean and great access to nearby restaurants. It’s also a Perfect location to visit the Olympic sporting facilities. Highly recommend
Wonderful apartment, great location @ Olympic Park, easy access, great views & thoughtful extras. Will make your Sydney stay memorable
A lovely apartment - modern with convenient location and wonderful views. Definitely recommended.

Fantastic apartment! 
Clean and tidy, good price, great communication from host and within walking distance to Anz Stadium and Quodos Bank Arena...
Highly recommend Nicole’s place! Will stay again without any hesitations
very convenient to public transport as well to the Olympic park. Enjoyed staying  here.
Great location for any Olympic Park events. The apartment is spacious and has great views!
Awesome location. Great service from host. Great accommodation

Excellent location. Lovely quiet, well appointed apartment with an excellent degree of cleanliness. Lots of things to see and do in and around the apartment and lots more things very close by. Wouldn’t hesitate to recommend it!
Great location, lovely space.
the apartment is very clean and tidy and the view is fantastic. communication was prompt and host very welcoming. would definitely stay again
A lovely BnB with everything that is required for a great stay at Olympic Park.  Close to Rhodes - IKEA, DFO. Sydney Markets and so much more.  A wonderful place to stay in Sydney

Excellent staying  here.  Clean and bright and modern apartment with everything you need.   Good bed linens and beds make for a great sleep.    Also close to train station, good restaurants close by and easy walk to most venues Iin Olympic Park,  The car park is also useful.  Highly recommend.  We would come again.
Nicoles place was nice and roomy - lots of seating and even a little desk. Views were great - can get hot if you don't turn on the a/c or open the windows. Great location and very comfy beds

This apartment is in a great location, within walking distance of Olympic Park Station, sports stadiums, restaurants and shops. We enjoyed meals at a nearby cafe and Vietnamese restaurant.  There is also a convenience store, Asian grocer, pharmacy and medical centre within the complex.   

The unit presents as photographed with genuine views from a high floor and a furnished outdoor balcony.  It's well equipped although some items (cracked crockery and threadbare towels) need replacing. 

The check-in process was efficient and informative.  Our only gripe on this visit was with the quality of the cleaning.

We had a great stay at Nicole’s apartment - the location was perfect and absolutely ideal for us as we attended a concert at Olympic Park. The apartment slept the 6 of us comfortably. Nicole’s communication was amazing, always very quick to respond and very easy to deal with. We would recommend Nicole’s apartment to everyone, and we definitely plan on staying here again next time we come to Homebush!

name: The best of the Olympic village.
summary: My space is next to the Olympic village (about 15/20 min walk. Aroazes Street is parallel to the AV. Abelardo Bueno), next to the BRT, shopping center, Rio Center, 10/15 minutes from the beach of Barra (by car), recreation, Barrashopping, various restaurants, parks, etc. You will love my space because of the location, the ambiance, the neighborhood, the people, the outside area, inner space, condominium, etc. My space is good for couples, individual adventurers, business travelers and families (with children).

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Moro na cidade do rio de janeiro, sou casado, 63 anos de idade, sou Capitão de Longo Curso da Marinha Mercante resido na barra da tijuca e temos um ótimo e muito bem localizado apartamento de dois quartos, em frente ao parque olímpico, na avenida abelardo bueno (Condomínio Villas da Barra-rua aroazes, 101/502), Edifício vercelli, o qual está disponivel para alugar para as olimpíadas/paralimpíadas Rio 2016 e/ou em outras oportunidades.

reviews.comments:
Jorge went way above what is required of a host. He met us at the airport and transported us to his apartment despite the fact that one of our group arrived on an earlier flight. This was great as we arrived on the eve of the Olympics opening ceremony when traffic was at a peak!!
On arrival at the apartment he had filled the fridge with some goodies and put lots of cleaning equipment in the cupboards for our 10 day stay.
Again this was not really what we expected but it was lovely to get up on our first morning and have breakfast already in our cupboards without having to seek out the local supermarket.
The apartment was brand new and had no furniture in it when we looked on the website but Jorge was true to his word and all the furniture was in place for our arrival.
We had wi fi access which we didn't expect! This was a bonus as we were swimming coaches and it allowed us to keep up to date with work while we were away.
The apartment had a washing machine which we utilised to keep our supply of towels nice and fresh.
We could not fault the available furnishings and could have used much more e.g. barbeque facilities on our balcony, but we were too busy attending all the swimming sessions.
The location opposite the Olympic Park was superb for us as we were attending all the swimming sessions. 5 mins walk took us into the Park which was superb!! No busing and train journeys between sessions. A bit more complex when I travelled to the athletics but the transport system linked well.
Before going to Rio we were slightly worried about security but in this complex there was a security guard in place at the entrance to the apartment and also barriers at the end of the street. The guard was extremely pleasant on our entry and exits of the complex.
Jorge supplied us with information about where to eat in the local area and also took Matt and myself on a day trip to see the sights of Rio before our departure.
We both had a fantastic day with breakfast on Copacabana Beach. A trip up Sugarloaf Mountain to experience the most fantastic views over Rio. Lunch in Downtown Rio and then taken home. An unforgettable day which just made the trip along with the silver medal my swimmer won at the Olympics!!
Many thanks to Jorge for helping make this trip so wonderful.
I would recommend this apartment to anyone. Jorge is a real gentleman!

Jorge was very kind to quickly have his apartment cleaned and allowed us to move in with very short notice during the Olympics. He thoroughly explained how everything is the apartment worked. Even stocked the fridge and cabinets with milk, water, and snacks. It's the little things that set people apart. He was so helpful and even volunteered to take us to the airport for free! I would highly recommend this place
